ITshatha yeNkathalelo yaBathengi
Umqulu woNakekelo lwaBaxumi
Itshata yeNkathelelo yoMxumi
UXwebhu lwaMalungelo eNkathalo ngabaXumi
Umqulu woNakekelo lwaBaxumi
Itshata yeNkathelelo yoMxumi
UXwebhu lwaMalungelo eNkathalo ngabaXumi
ITshatha yeNkathalelo yaBathengi
Itshata yeNkathelelo yoMxumi
UXwebhu lwaMalungelo eNkathalo ngabaXumi
ITshatha yeNkathalelo yaBathengi
Umqulu woNakekelo lwaBaxumi
UXwebhu lwaMalungelo eNkathalo ngabaXumi
ITshatha yeNkathalelo yaBathengi
Umqulu woNakekelo lwaBaxumi
Itshata yeNkathelelo yoMxumi
Wamkelekile kwiTshatha yethu yaBathengi
Wamkelekile kuMqulu wethu waMalungelo aBaxumi
Wamkelekile kwiTshata yethu yoMxumi
Wamkelekile kuXwebhu lwethu lwaMalungelo abaXumi
Wamkelekile kuMqulu wethu waMalungelo aBaxumi
Wamkelekile kwiTshata yethu yoMxumi
Wamkelekile kuXwebhu lwethu lwaMalungelo abaXumi
Wamkelekile kwiTshatha yethu yaBathengi
Wamkelekile kwiTshata yethu yoMxumi
Wamkelekile kuXwebhu lwethu lwaMalungelo abaXumi
Wamkelekile kwiTshatha yethu yaBathengi
Wamkelekile kuMqulu wethu waMalungelo aBaxumi
Wamkelekile kuXwebhu lwethu lwaMalungelo abaXumi
Wamkelekile kwiTshatha yethu yaBathengi
Wamkelekile kuMqulu wethu waMalungelo aBaxumi
Wamkelekile kwiTshata yethu yoMxumi
Sifuna wena, umthengi wethu, usijaje ngomgangatho wenkonzo esiyisekileyo kule tshathi.
Sifuna ukuba nina, baxumi bethu, nithathe isigqibo ngathi ngokuphathelele kwizinga leenkonzo esizidandalazisileyo kulo mqulu.
Sifuna wena, mxumi wethu, usigwebe ngomgangatho wenkonzo esiwumiselayo kule tshata. 
Sifuna ukuba wena, mxumi wethu, wenze isigqibo ngathi malunga nomgangatho wenkonzo esiwuchaza kolu xwebhu lwamalungelo.
Sifuna ukuba nina, baxumi bethu, nithathe isigqibo ngathi ngokuphathelele kwizinga leenkonzo esizidandalazisileyo kulo mqulu.
Sifuna wena, mxumi wethu, usigwebe ngomgangatho wenkonzo esiwumiselayo kule tshata. 
Sifuna ukuba wena, mxumi wethu, wenze isigqibo ngathi malunga nomgangatho wenkonzo esiwuchaza kolu xwebhu lwamalungelo.
Sifuna wena, umthengi wethu, usijaje ngomgangatho wenkonzo esiyisekileyo kule tshathi.
Sifuna wena, mxumi wethu, usigwebe ngomgangatho wenkonzo esiwumiselayo kule tshata. 
Sifuna ukuba wena, mxumi wethu, wenze isigqibo ngathi malunga nomgangatho wenkonzo esiwuchaza kolu xwebhu lwamalungelo.
Sifuna wena, umthengi wethu, usijaje ngomgangatho wenkonzo esiyisekileyo kule tshathi.
Sifuna ukuba nina, baxumi bethu, nithathe isigqibo ngathi ngokuphathelele kwizinga leenkonzo esizidandalazisileyo kulo mqulu.
Sifuna ukuba wena, mxumi wethu, wenze isigqibo ngathi malunga nomgangatho wenkonzo esiwuchaza kolu xwebhu lwamalungelo.
Sifuna wena, umthengi wethu, usijaje ngomgangatho wenkonzo esiyisekileyo kule tshathi.
Sifuna ukuba nina, baxumi bethu, nithathe isigqibo ngathi ngokuphathelele kwizinga leenkonzo esizidandalazisileyo kulo mqulu.
Sifuna wena, mxumi wethu, usigwebe ngomgangatho wenkonzo esiwumiselayo kule tshata. 
Siya kukuphatha ngentlonipho futhi sikunike impatho entle ehambelana nemithetho-siseko ye-BATHO PELE.
Sizakukuphatha ngembeko sizesikunike iinkonzo ezintle mgokuhambisana neenqobo zeBATHO PELE.
Siya kukuphatha ngembeko yaye sikunike inkonzo elungileyo ngokuhambelana neenqobo zeBATHO PELE. 
Siza kukuhlonela kwaye sikunike inkonzo elungileyo ehambelana nemithetho-siseko yeBATHO PELE.
Sizakukuphatha ngembeko sizesikunike iinkonzo ezintle mgokuhambisana neenqobo zeBATHO PELE.
Siya kukuphatha ngembeko yaye sikunike inkonzo elungileyo ngokuhambelana neenqobo zeBATHO PELE. 
Siza kukuhlonela kwaye sikunike inkonzo elungileyo ehambelana nemithetho-siseko yeBATHO PELE.
Siya kukuphatha ngentlonipho futhi sikunike impatho entle ehambelana nemithetho-siseko ye-BATHO PELE.
Siya kukuphatha ngembeko yaye sikunike inkonzo elungileyo ngokuhambelana neenqobo zeBATHO PELE. 
Siza kukuhlonela kwaye sikunike inkonzo elungileyo ehambelana nemithetho-siseko yeBATHO PELE.
Siya kukuphatha ngentlonipho futhi sikunike impatho entle ehambelana nemithetho-siseko ye-BATHO PELE.
Sizakukuphatha ngembeko sizesikunike iinkonzo ezintle mgokuhambisana neenqobo zeBATHO PELE.
Siza kukuhlonela kwaye sikunike inkonzo elungileyo ehambelana nemithetho-siseko yeBATHO PELE.
Siya kukuphatha ngentlonipho futhi sikunike impatho entle ehambelana nemithetho-siseko ye-BATHO PELE.
Sizakukuphatha ngembeko sizesikunike iinkonzo ezintle mgokuhambisana neenqobo zeBATHO PELE.
Siya kukuphatha ngembeko yaye sikunike inkonzo elungileyo ngokuhambelana neenqobo zeBATHO PELE. 
Siyayibophelela njengenxenye yoxanduva lwethu ukunikezela inkonzo ekudidi lwehlabathi, sikunike iinkcukacha ezichanekileyo, iingcebiso noncedo kuzo zonke iinkonzo zethu.
Sizinikele ekunikezeleni ngeenkonzo eziphambili, njengenxenye yoxanduva lwethu, sikunike neenkcukacha ezichanileyo, iingcebiso kunye noncedo kuzo zonke iinkonzo esinikezela ngazo.
Sizibophelela njengenxenye yoxanduva lwethu ukunikela ngenkonzo yomgangatho wehlabathi, ukukunika ulwazi, icebiso noncedo oluchanekileyo kuzo zonke iinkonzo zethu.
Njengenxenye yoxanduva lwethu sizimisele ukunikela ngenkonzo ekudidi lwehlabathi, ukunika iinkcukacha ezichanekileyo, amacebiso noncedo ngazo zonke iinkonzo zethu.
Sizinikele ekunikezeleni ngeenkonzo eziphambili, njengenxenye yoxanduva lwethu, sikunike neenkcukacha ezichanileyo, iingcebiso kunye noncedo kuzo zonke iinkonzo esinikezela ngazo.
Sizibophelela njengenxenye yoxanduva lwethu ukunikela ngenkonzo yomgangatho wehlabathi, ukukunika ulwazi, icebiso noncedo oluchanekileyo kuzo zonke iinkonzo zethu.
Njengenxenye yoxanduva lwethu sizimisele ukunikela ngenkonzo ekudidi lwehlabathi, ukunika iinkcukacha ezichanekileyo, amacebiso noncedo ngazo zonke iinkonzo zethu.
Siyayibophelela njengenxenye yoxanduva lwethu ukunikezela inkonzo ekudidi lwehlabathi, sikunike iinkcukacha ezichanekileyo, iingcebiso noncedo kuzo zonke iinkonzo zethu.
Sizibophelela njengenxenye yoxanduva lwethu ukunikela ngenkonzo yomgangatho wehlabathi, ukukunika ulwazi, icebiso noncedo oluchanekileyo kuzo zonke iinkonzo zethu.
Njengenxenye yoxanduva lwethu sizimisele ukunikela ngenkonzo ekudidi lwehlabathi, ukunika iinkcukacha ezichanekileyo, amacebiso noncedo ngazo zonke iinkonzo zethu.
Siyayibophelela njengenxenye yoxanduva lwethu ukunikezela inkonzo ekudidi lwehlabathi, sikunike iinkcukacha ezichanekileyo, iingcebiso noncedo kuzo zonke iinkonzo zethu.
Sizinikele ekunikezeleni ngeenkonzo eziphambili, njengenxenye yoxanduva lwethu, sikunike neenkcukacha ezichanileyo, iingcebiso kunye noncedo kuzo zonke iinkonzo esinikezela ngazo.
Njengenxenye yoxanduva lwethu sizimisele ukunikela ngenkonzo ekudidi lwehlabathi, ukunika iinkcukacha ezichanekileyo, amacebiso noncedo ngazo zonke iinkonzo zethu.
Siyayibophelela njengenxenye yoxanduva lwethu ukunikezela inkonzo ekudidi lwehlabathi, sikunike iinkcukacha ezichanekileyo, iingcebiso noncedo kuzo zonke iinkonzo zethu.
Sizinikele ekunikezeleni ngeenkonzo eziphambili, njengenxenye yoxanduva lwethu, sikunike neenkcukacha ezichanileyo, iingcebiso kunye noncedo kuzo zonke iinkonzo esinikezela ngazo.
Sizibophelela njengenxenye yoxanduva lwethu ukunikela ngenkonzo yomgangatho wehlabathi, ukukunika ulwazi, icebiso noncedo oluchanekileyo kuzo zonke iinkonzo zethu.

Iinjongo zoMqulu waMalungelo

Iinjongo zoMqulu waMalungelo
Injongo yeTshata
Le tshatha ikuxelela malunga nomgangatho wenkonzo ekufuneka uwulindele kwiArhente yaseMzantsi Afrika yoKhuselo lweNtlalo   (SASSA). 
Lo mqulu ukuchazela malunga nomgangatho weenkonzo omawulindele ukuzifumana kwi-Arhente yoKhuseleko loLuntu yaseMzantsi Afrika  (iSASSA).
Le tshata ikuxelela malunga nomgangatho wenkonzo ongawulindela ovela kuNcedo loMenzeli lwaseMzantsi Afrika loKhuseleko lwezeNtlalo (u-SASSA).  
Olu xwebhu lukuxelela ngomgangatho wenkonzo onokuwulindela kwiArhente yaseMzantsi Afrika yoKhuselo lweNtlalo (SASSA).
Lo mqulu ukuchazela malunga nomgangatho weenkonzo omawulindele ukuzifumana kwi-Arhente yoKhuseleko loLuntu yaseMzantsi Afrika  (iSASSA).
Le tshata ikuxelela malunga nomgangatho wenkonzo ongawulindela ovela kuNcedo loMenzeli lwaseMzantsi Afrika loKhuseleko lwezeNtlalo (u-SASSA).  
Olu xwebhu lukuxelela ngomgangatho wenkonzo onokuwulindela kwiArhente yaseMzantsi Afrika yoKhuselo lweNtlalo (SASSA).
Le tshatha ikuxelela malunga nomgangatho wenkonzo ekufuneka uwulindele kwiArhente yaseMzantsi Afrika yoKhuselo lweNtlalo   (SASSA). 
Le tshata ikuxelela malunga nomgangatho wenkonzo ongawulindela ovela kuNcedo loMenzeli lwaseMzantsi Afrika loKhuseleko lwezeNtlalo (u-SASSA).  
Olu xwebhu lukuxelela ngomgangatho wenkonzo onokuwulindela kwiArhente yaseMzantsi Afrika yoKhuselo lweNtlalo (SASSA).
Le tshatha ikuxelela malunga nomgangatho wenkonzo ekufuneka uwulindele kwiArhente yaseMzantsi Afrika yoKhuselo lweNtlalo   (SASSA). 
Lo mqulu ukuchazela malunga nomgangatho weenkonzo omawulindele ukuzifumana kwi-Arhente yoKhuseleko loLuntu yaseMzantsi Afrika  (iSASSA).
Olu xwebhu lukuxelela ngomgangatho wenkonzo onokuwulindela kwiArhente yaseMzantsi Afrika yoKhuselo lweNtlalo (SASSA).
Le tshatha ikuxelela malunga nomgangatho wenkonzo ekufuneka uwulindele kwiArhente yaseMzantsi Afrika yoKhuselo lweNtlalo   (SASSA). 
Lo mqulu ukuchazela malunga nomgangatho weenkonzo omawulindele ukuzifumana kwi-Arhente yoKhuseleko loLuntu yaseMzantsi Afrika  (iSASSA).
Le tshata ikuxelela malunga nomgangatho wenkonzo ongawulindela ovela kuNcedo loMenzeli lwaseMzantsi Afrika loKhuseleko lwezeNtlalo (u-SASSA).  
I-SASSA sisongezo sengalo lonikezelo lweenkonzo zikarhulumente esilawula unikezelo lweminikelo kubemi boMzantsi Afrika.
I-SASSA licandelo elisisongezo  kunikezelo lweenkonzo zikarhulumente nelijongene nokunikezela kweenkonzo nezibonelelo zoluntu kubemi baseMzantsi Afrika. 
U-SASSA sisolulo sengalo karhulumente yokulawula unikezelo lwezibonelelo zentlalo kubemi baseMzantsi Afrika. 
ISASSA sisolulo sengalo karhulumente yobonelelo nenikela ngezibonelelo-mali kubemi baseMzantsi Afrika.
I-SASSA licandelo elisisongezo  kunikezelo lweenkonzo zikarhulumente nelijongene nokunikezela kweenkonzo nezibonelelo zoluntu kubemi baseMzantsi Afrika. 
U-SASSA sisolulo sengalo karhulumente yokulawula unikezelo lwezibonelelo zentlalo kubemi baseMzantsi Afrika. 
ISASSA sisolulo sengalo karhulumente yobonelelo nenikela ngezibonelelo-mali kubemi baseMzantsi Afrika.
I-SASSA sisongezo sengalo lonikezelo lweenkonzo zikarhulumente esilawula unikezelo lweminikelo kubemi boMzantsi Afrika.
U-SASSA sisolulo sengalo karhulumente yokulawula unikezelo lwezibonelelo zentlalo kubemi baseMzantsi Afrika. 
ISASSA sisolulo sengalo karhulumente yobonelelo nenikela ngezibonelelo-mali kubemi baseMzantsi Afrika.
I-SASSA sisongezo sengalo lonikezelo lweenkonzo zikarhulumente esilawula unikezelo lweminikelo kubemi boMzantsi Afrika.
I-SASSA licandelo elisisongezo  kunikezelo lweenkonzo zikarhulumente nelijongene nokunikezela kweenkonzo nezibonelelo zoluntu kubemi baseMzantsi Afrika. 
ISASSA sisolulo sengalo karhulumente yobonelelo nenikela ngezibonelelo-mali kubemi baseMzantsi Afrika.
I-SASSA sisongezo sengalo lonikezelo lweenkonzo zikarhulumente esilawula unikezelo lweminikelo kubemi boMzantsi Afrika.
I-SASSA licandelo elisisongezo  kunikezelo lweenkonzo zikarhulumente nelijongene nokunikezela kweenkonzo nezibonelelo zoluntu kubemi baseMzantsi Afrika. 
U-SASSA sisolulo sengalo karhulumente yokulawula unikezelo lwezibonelelo zentlalo kubemi baseMzantsi Afrika.

Sizinikele 
Sizibophelela 
Ukunikezela iinkonzo ezisemgangathweni zokhuseleko lwentlalo, ngexabiso elifanelekileyo nangenkuthalo usebenzisa ezona ndlela ezifanelekileyo. 
Ekunikezeleni ngeenkonzo zezibonelelo zoluntu ezisemgangathweni, ngaphandle kweendleko nangokusebenzisa ezona ndlela ziphambili nezisebenzayo.
Ukulawula iinkonzo zodidi zokhuseleko lwezentlalo, ezinesiqhamo nezisebenza ngolwazi zisebenzisa ezona ndlela ziphucukileyo.
Ekunikeleni ngeenkonzo ezisemgangathweni zokhuselo lwentlalo, ngendlela eyonga imali nangezenzo ezibalaseleyo nezisebenzayo.
Ekunikezeleni ngeenkonzo zezibonelelo zoluntu ezisemgangathweni, ngaphandle kweendleko nangokusebenzisa ezona ndlela ziphambili nezisebenzayo.
Ukulawula iinkonzo zodidi zokhuseleko lwezentlalo, ezinesiqhamo nezisebenza ngolwazi zisebenzisa ezona ndlela ziphucukileyo.
Ekunikeleni ngeenkonzo ezisemgangathweni zokhuselo lwentlalo, ngendlela eyonga imali nangezenzo ezibalaseleyo nezisebenzayo.
Ukunikezela iinkonzo ezisemgangathweni zokhuseleko lwentlalo, ngexabiso elifanelekileyo nangenkuthalo usebenzisa ezona ndlela ezifanelekileyo. 
Ukulawula iinkonzo zodidi zokhuseleko lwezentlalo, ezinesiqhamo nezisebenza ngolwazi zisebenzisa ezona ndlela ziphucukileyo.
Ekunikeleni ngeenkonzo ezisemgangathweni zokhuselo lwentlalo, ngendlela eyonga imali nangezenzo ezibalaseleyo nezisebenzayo.
Ukunikezela iinkonzo ezisemgangathweni zokhuseleko lwentlalo, ngexabiso elifanelekileyo nangenkuthalo usebenzisa ezona ndlela ezifanelekileyo. 
Ekunikezeleni ngeenkonzo zezibonelelo zoluntu ezisemgangathweni, ngaphandle kweendleko nangokusebenzisa ezona ndlela ziphambili nezisebenzayo.
Ekunikeleni ngeenkonzo ezisemgangathweni zokhuselo lwentlalo, ngendlela eyonga imali nangezenzo ezibalaseleyo nezisebenzayo.
Ukunikezela iinkonzo ezisemgangathweni zokhuseleko lwentlalo, ngexabiso elifanelekileyo nangenkuthalo usebenzisa ezona ndlela ezifanelekileyo. 
Ekunikezeleni ngeenkonzo zezibonelelo zoluntu ezisemgangathweni, ngaphandle kweendleko nangokusebenzisa ezona ndlela ziphambili nezisebenzayo.
Ukulawula iinkonzo zodidi zokhuseleko lwezentlalo, ezinesiqhamo nezisebenza ngolwazi zisebenzisa ezona ndlela ziphucukileyo.

Yintoni onokuyilindela kuthi
Into ongayilindela kuthi
Onokukulindela kuthi
Yintoni onokuyilindela kuthi
Into ongayilindela kuthi
Onokukulindela kuthi
Unokulindela kuthi
Into ongayilindela kuthi
Onokukulindela kuthi
Unokulindela kuthi
Yintoni onokuyilindela kuthi
Onokukulindela kuthi
Unokulindela kuthi
Yintoni onokuyilindela kuthi
Into ongayilindela kuthi
Ukunyuswa komgangatho nokhuseleko lwesidima soluntu, iMfihlo, iMfezeko, Ubulungisa, Ukungabinakhethe nokuLunga.
Uphuhliso nokhuseleko lwesidima somntu buqu, Ukuba semfihlakalweni, Ubulunga, Ukwenziwa kwezinto ekuhleni kwanenoBulungisa.
Kukukhuthaza nokukhusela isidima somntu, iNtembeko, iNgqiqo, ukuLingana, ukuNyaniseka nobuLungisa.
Ukukhuthazwa nokhuseleko lwesidima somntu, ukuGcinwa kweeMfihlelo, iNgqiqo, ukuNgabi naKhethe, ukuThembeka nokuSebenza ngobuLungisa.
Uphuhliso nokhuseleko lwesidima somntu buqu, Ukuba semfihlakalweni, Ubulunga, Ukwenziwa kwezinto ekuhleni kwanenoBulungisa.
Kukukhuthaza nokukhusela isidima somntu, iNtembeko, iNgqiqo, ukuLingana, ukuNyaniseka nobuLungisa.
Ukukhuthazwa nokhuseleko lwesidima somntu, ukuGcinwa kweeMfihlelo, iNgqiqo, ukuNgabi naKhethe, ukuThembeka nokuSebenza ngobuLungisa.
Ukunyuswa komgangatho nokhuseleko lwesidima soluntu, iMfihlo, iMfezeko, Ubulungisa, Ukungabinakhethe nokuLunga.
Kukukhuthaza nokukhusela isidima somntu, iNtembeko, iNgqiqo, ukuLingana, ukuNyaniseka nobuLungisa.
Ukukhuthazwa nokhuseleko lwesidima somntu, ukuGcinwa kweeMfihlelo, iNgqiqo, ukuNgabi naKhethe, ukuThembeka nokuSebenza ngobuLungisa.
Ukunyuswa komgangatho nokhuseleko lwesidima soluntu, iMfihlo, iMfezeko, Ubulungisa, Ukungabinakhethe nokuLunga.
Uphuhliso nokhuseleko lwesidima somntu buqu, Ukuba semfihlakalweni, Ubulunga, Ukwenziwa kwezinto ekuhleni kwanenoBulungisa.
Ukukhuthazwa nokhuseleko lwesidima somntu, ukuGcinwa kweeMfihlelo, iNgqiqo, ukuNgabi naKhethe, ukuThembeka nokuSebenza ngobuLungisa.
Ukunyuswa komgangatho nokhuseleko lwesidima soluntu, iMfihlo, iMfezeko, Ubulungisa, Ukungabinakhethe nokuLunga.
Uphuhliso nokhuseleko lwesidima somntu buqu, Ukuba semfihlakalweni, Ubulunga, Ukwenziwa kwezinto ekuhleni kwanenoBulungisa.
Kukukhuthaza nokukhusela isidima somntu, iNtembeko, iNgqiqo, ukuLingana, ukuNyaniseka nobuLungisa.
Kuyo yonke kwiArhente yaseMzantsi Afrika yoKhuselo lweNtlalo siya 
Kwi-Arhente yoKhuseleko loLuntu yaseMzantsi Afrika iphela - 
Ngalo lonke uNcedo loMenzeli lwaseMzantsi Afrika loKhuseleko lwezeNtlalo, siya
Kuyo yonke iArhente yaseMzantsi Afrika yoKhuselo lweNtlalo, siya 
Kwi-Arhente yoKhuseleko loLuntu yaseMzantsi Afrika iphela - 
Ngalo lonke uNcedo loMenzeli lwaseMzantsi Afrika loKhuseleko lwezeNtlalo, siya
Kuyo yonke iArhente yaseMzantsi Afrika yoKhuselo lweNtlalo, siya 
Kuyo yonke kwiArhente yaseMzantsi Afrika yoKhuselo lweNtlalo siya 
Ngalo lonke uNcedo loMenzeli lwaseMzantsi Afrika loKhuseleko lwezeNtlalo, siya
Kuyo yonke iArhente yaseMzantsi Afrika yoKhuselo lweNtlalo, siya 
Kuyo yonke kwiArhente yaseMzantsi Afrika yoKhuselo lweNtlalo siya 
Kwi-Arhente yoKhuseleko loLuntu yaseMzantsi Afrika iphela - 
Kuyo yonke iArhente yaseMzantsi Afrika yoKhuselo lweNtlalo, siya 
Kuyo yonke kwiArhente yaseMzantsi Afrika yoKhuselo lweNtlalo siya 
Kwi-Arhente yoKhuseleko loLuntu yaseMzantsi Afrika iphela - 
Ngalo lonke uNcedo loMenzeli lwaseMzantsi Afrika loKhuseleko lwezeNtlalo, siya
Kukunika ulwazi neengcebiso malunga nayo yonke iminikelo onokuthi ufake isicelo sayo. 
Sizakukunika iinkcukacha kunye neengcebiso malunga nazo zonke izibonelelo onokufaka izicelo zazo.
Kukunika ulwazi necebiso malunga nazo zonke izibonelelo ongazenzela isicelo.
Ekukunikeni iinkcukacha namacebiso ngazo zonke izibonelelo-mali onokufaka izicelo zazo.
Sizakukunika iinkcukacha kunye neengcebiso malunga nazo zonke izibonelelo onokufaka izicelo zazo.

Siza kukuthumela kwamanye amaziko anokuthi akwazi ukujongana nezidingo zakho.

Kukuncedisa ekugcwaliseni/ekuzaliseni iifomu zethu nokufaka isicelo somnikelo.
Sizakukuncedisa ugcwalise iifomu kwanokufaka isicelo sesibonelelo.
Kukunceda ukuzalisa/ukugqibezela iifomu zethu nokwenza isicelo sesibonelelo.
Kukuncedisa ngokuzalisa/ngokugqibezela iifomu zethu nokufaka isicelo sesibonelelo-mali.
Sizakukuncedisa ugcwalise iifomu kwanokufaka isicelo sesibonelelo.

Sizakugcina iinkcukacha osinike zona zisemfihlakalweni.

Hlala njalo uxhasa uMgaqo-siseko weRiphablikhi yoMzantsi Afrika, imithetho elawula inkonzo karhulumente kunye nomgaqo wokuziphatha wenkonzo karhulumente 
Sizakusoloko sizinikela ekufezekiseni uMgaqo-siseko weRiphabliki yoMzantsi Afrika, imithetho elawula ukunikezelwa kweenkonzo zoluntu kuye neenqobo zokuziphatha zabasebenzi baseburhulumenteni.
Kuxhasa ngamaxa onke umGaqo-siseko weRiphablikhi yomZantsi Afrika, imithetho elawula inkonzo yoluntu nomgaqo wokuziphatha wenkonzo yoluntu
Kusoloko silandela uMgaqo-siseko weRiphablikhi yoMzantsi Afrika, imithetho elawula iinkonzo zoluntu nendlela yokuziphatha kwabeenkonzo zoluntu

Sebenzisana nabantu esibancedayo kunye namanye amaqela achaphazelekayo. 
Sisebenzisane nabantu esinikezela ngeenkonzo kubo kwanabanye abangeneleli.
Kukusebenza ngolwahlulelwano nabantu esibakhonzayo nabanye abaxhasi.
Kusebenza ngolwahlulelwano nabantu esibakhonzayo kunye nabanye abachaphazelekayo.

Kuzama ukuphucula rhoqo unikezelo lweenkonzo ukuze sikwazi ukufikelela koko ukulindeleyo
Sizame ngako konke esinako ekuphuculeni ukunikezelwa kweenkonzo zoluntu ukuze sikwazi ukufezekisa oko ukulindeleyo.
Kuzama ngokuqhubekayo ukuphucula unikezelo lwenkonzo ngenjongo yokwanelisa izinto ozilindeleyo
Kuzabalazela ukuphuculwa okusoloko kuqhuba kokunikelwa kweenkonzo ukuze kuhlangatyezwe izinto ozilindeleyo

Nangaliphina ixesha uqhagamshelana nathi ubuso ngobuso, ngefowuni, ngeleta okanye nge-imeyile oku kulandelayo kuya kwenzeka: 
Qho uqhagamshelana nathi buqu, ngefowuni, ngeleta okanye nge-imeyile, oku kulandelayo kuzakwenzeka:
Nanini xa uqhagamshelana nathi ngobuqu, ngomnxeba, ngeleta okanye nge-imeyili kuya kwenzeka okulandelayo:

Igosa leenkonzo zabathengi elikuncedayo liya kuzazisa. 
Igosa leenkonzo zoluntu ozakube usebenzisana nalo lizakuzichaza kuwe ukuba lingubani.
Umenzeli wenkonzo yomxumi osebenzisana nawe uya kuzazisa.
Iarhente yeenkonzo zabaxumi ozidibanise nayo iya kuzazisa.
Igosa leenkonzo zoluntu ozakube usebenzisana nalo lizakuzichaza kuwe ukuba lingubani.
Umenzeli wenkonzo yomxumi osebenzisana nawe uya kuzazisa.
Iarhente yeenkonzo zabaxumi ozidibanise nayo iya kuzazisa.
Igosa leenkonzo zabathengi elikuncedayo liya kuzazisa. 
Umenzeli wenkonzo yomxumi osebenzisana nawe uya kuzazisa.
Iarhente yeenkonzo zabaxumi ozidibanise nayo iya kuzazisa.
Igosa leenkonzo zabathengi elikuncedayo liya kuzazisa. 
Igosa leenkonzo zoluntu ozakube usebenzisana nalo lizakuzichaza kuwe ukuba lingubani.
Iarhente yeenkonzo zabaxumi ozidibanise nayo iya kuzazisa.
Igosa leenkonzo zabathengi elikuncedayo liya kuzazisa. 
Igosa leenkonzo zoluntu ozakube usebenzisana nalo lizakuzichaza kuwe ukuba lingubani.
Umenzeli wenkonzo yomxumi osebenzisana nawe uya kuzazisa.
Imibuzo ngefowuni kunye neyobuqu, siya kuyisombulula imibuzo yakho ngokukhawuleza. 
Ngokuphathelele kwingxaki yakho oyifakileyo ngefowuni nangokobuqu, siza kuyisombulula ngoko nangoko.
Malunga nemibuzo yomnxeba neyobuqu, siya kusombulula imibuzo yakho ngoko nangoko.
Malunga nemibuzo ebuzwa emnxebeni okanye ubuso ngobuso, siya kuyiphendula kwangoko imibuzo yakho.
Ngokuphathelele kwingxaki yakho oyifakileyo ngefowuni nangokobuqu, siza kuyisombulula ngoko nangoko.
Malunga nemibuzo yomnxeba neyobuqu, siya kusombulula imibuzo yakho ngoko nangoko.
Malunga nemibuzo ebuzwa emnxebeni okanye ubuso ngobuso, siya kuyiphendula kwangoko imibuzo yakho.
Imibuzo ngefowuni kunye neyobuqu, siya kuyisombulula imibuzo yakho ngokukhawuleza. 
Malunga nemibuzo yomnxeba neyobuqu, siya kusombulula imibuzo yakho ngoko nangoko.
Malunga nemibuzo ebuzwa emnxebeni okanye ubuso ngobuso, siya kuyiphendula kwangoko imibuzo yakho.
Imibuzo ngefowuni kunye neyobuqu, siya kuyisombulula imibuzo yakho ngokukhawuleza. 
Ngokuphathelele kwingxaki yakho oyifakileyo ngefowuni nangokobuqu, siza kuyisombulula ngoko nangoko.
Malunga nemibuzo ebuzwa emnxebeni okanye ubuso ngobuso, siya kuyiphendula kwangoko imibuzo yakho.
Imibuzo ngefowuni kunye neyobuqu, siya kuyisombulula imibuzo yakho ngokukhawuleza. 
Ngokuphathelele kwingxaki yakho oyifakileyo ngefowuni nangokobuqu, siza kuyisombulula ngoko nangoko.
Malunga nemibuzo yomnxeba neyobuqu, siya kusombulula imibuzo yakho ngoko nangoko.
Ukuba asikwazi ukusombulula ngokukhawuleza siya kukunika izizathu futhi sazise umxhasi ukuba angayilindela nini impendulo. 
Ukuba asikwazi ukuyisombulula ngoko nangoko, sizakukunika izizathu sizesikwazise ukuba impendulo uyilindele nini na.
Ukuba asinako ukusombulula ngoko nangoko siya kunikela ngezizathu yaye sazise umxumi ukuba angayilindela nini  impendulo.
Xa singakwazi kuphendula kwangoko siya kumnika izizathu umxumi kwaye simazise ngexesha anokuyilindela ngayo impendulo yethu.
Ukuba asikwazi ukuyisombulula ngoko nangoko, sizakukunika izizathu sizesikwazise ukuba impendulo uyilindele nini na.
Ukuba asinako ukusombulula ngoko nangoko siya kunikela ngezizathu yaye sazise umxumi ukuba angayilindela nini  impendulo.
Xa singakwazi kuphendula kwangoko siya kumnika izizathu umxumi kwaye simazise ngexesha anokuyilindela ngayo impendulo yethu.
Ukuba asikwazi ukusombulula ngokukhawuleza siya kukunika izizathu futhi sazise umxhasi ukuba angayilindela nini impendulo. 
Ukuba asinako ukusombulula ngoko nangoko siya kunikela ngezizathu yaye sazise umxumi ukuba angayilindela nini  impendulo.
Xa singakwazi kuphendula kwangoko siya kumnika izizathu umxumi kwaye simazise ngexesha anokuyilindela ngayo impendulo yethu.
Ukuba asikwazi ukusombulula ngokukhawuleza siya kukunika izizathu futhi sazise umxhasi ukuba angayilindela nini impendulo. 
Ukuba asikwazi ukuyisombulula ngoko nangoko, sizakukunika izizathu sizesikwazise ukuba impendulo uyilindele nini na.
Xa singakwazi kuphendula kwangoko siya kumnika izizathu umxumi kwaye simazise ngexesha anokuyilindela ngayo impendulo yethu.
Ukuba asikwazi ukusombulula ngokukhawuleza siya kukunika izizathu futhi sazise umxhasi ukuba angayilindela nini impendulo. 
Ukuba asikwazi ukuyisombulula ngoko nangoko, sizakukunika izizathu sizesikwazise ukuba impendulo uyilindele nini na.
Ukuba asinako ukusombulula ngoko nangoko siya kunikela ngezizathu yaye sazise umxumi ukuba angayilindela nini  impendulo.
Siya kukunika inombolo yesalathisi ukwenza ukuba ukwazi ukulandela umbuzo wakho 
Sizakukunika inombolo ekhethekileyo ezakukunceda ekuthini ukwazi ukulandelela ingxaki yakho.
Siya kukunika inombolo yokubhekisa ukwenzela ubenako ukwenza ulandeliso kumbuzo wakho
Siya kukunika inombolo yesalathiso ukuze ukwazi ukulandela uqwalaselo lombuzo wakho
Sizakukunika inombolo ekhethekileyo ezakukunceda ekuthini ukwazi ukulandelela ingxaki yakho.
Siya kukunika inombolo yokubhekisa ukwenzela ubenako ukwenza ulandeliso kumbuzo wakho
Siya kukunika inombolo yesalathiso ukuze ukwazi ukulandela uqwalaselo lombuzo wakho
Siya kukunika inombolo yesalathisi ukwenza ukuba ukwazi ukulandela umbuzo wakho 
Siya kukunika inombolo yokubhekisa ukwenzela ubenako ukwenza ulandeliso kumbuzo wakho
Siya kukunika inombolo yesalathiso ukuze ukwazi ukulandela uqwalaselo lombuzo wakho
Siya kukunika inombolo yesalathisi ukwenza ukuba ukwazi ukulandela umbuzo wakho 
Sizakukunika inombolo ekhethekileyo ezakukunceda ekuthini ukwazi ukulandelela ingxaki yakho.
Siya kukunika inombolo yesalathiso ukuze ukwazi ukulandela uqwalaselo lombuzo wakho
Siya kukunika inombolo yesalathisi ukwenza ukuba ukwazi ukulandela umbuzo wakho 
Sizakukunika inombolo ekhethekileyo ezakukunceda ekuthini ukwazi ukulandelela ingxaki yakho.
Siya kukunika inombolo yokubhekisa ukwenzela ubenako ukwenza ulandeliso kumbuzo wakho
Siya kwamkela ukufumana nalo naluphina uqhagamshelwano osithumelele lona futhi siya kujongana nombuzo wakho kwiintsuku ezisi-7 zomsebenzi. 
Sizakukunika isiqinisekiso sokuba siyifumene imbalelwano yakho nokuba sizakuyisombulula ingxaki yakho zingaphelanga iintsuku ezi-7.
Siya kukwazisa ngokufumana naluphi unxibelelwano lwakho osithumelela lona yaye siya kujongana nombuzo kwithuba leentsuku zomsebenzi ezisi-7. 
Siya kukwazisa xa sifumene naluphi unxibelelwano oluthumelayo kwaye siya kuwuqwalasela loo mbuzo kwiintsuku ezisi-7 zokusebenza.
Sizakukunika isiqinisekiso sokuba siyifumene imbalelwano yakho nokuba sizakuyisombulula ingxaki yakho zingaphelanga iintsuku ezi-7.
Siya kukwazisa ngokufumana naluphi unxibelelwano lwakho osithumelela lona yaye siya kujongana nombuzo kwithuba leentsuku zomsebenzi ezisi-7. 
Siya kukwazisa xa sifumene naluphi unxibelelwano oluthumelayo kwaye siya kuwuqwalasela loo mbuzo kwiintsuku ezisi-7 zokusebenza.
Siya kwamkela ukufumana nalo naluphina uqhagamshelwano osithumelele lona futhi siya kujongana nombuzo wakho kwiintsuku ezisi-7 zomsebenzi. 
Siya kukwazisa ngokufumana naluphi unxibelelwano lwakho osithumelela lona yaye siya kujongana nombuzo kwithuba leentsuku zomsebenzi ezisi-7.

Siya kukwazisa ngokufumana naluphi unxibelelwano lwakho osithumelela lona yaye siya kujongana nombuzo kwithuba leentsuku zomsebenzi ezisi-7. 
Ukuba asikwazi ukukuphendula ngokugcweleyo kwiintsuku ezisi-7 zomsebenzi, siya kukuxelela unobangela woko nokuba ungayilindela nini na impendulo. 
Ukuba asikwazi ukukunika impendulo ngokupheleleyo zingaphelanga iintsuku ezi-7, sizakukuchazela ukuba kungani nokuba impendulo kumele uyilindele nini na.
Ukuba asinako ukuphendula ngokupheleleyo kwithuba leentsuku zomsebenzi ezisi-7, siya kukuxelela isizathu kwanokuthi ungayilindela nini impendulo.  
Xa singakwazi kukuphendula ngokupheleleyo kwiintsuku ezisi-7 zokusebenza, siya kukuxelela ukuba kutheni nokuthi ungayilindela nini impendulo.
Ukuba asikwazi ukukunika impendulo ngokupheleleyo zingaphelanga iintsuku ezi-7, sizakukuchazela ukuba kungani nokuba impendulo kumele uyilindele nini na.
Ukuba asinako ukuphendula ngokupheleleyo kwithuba leentsuku zomsebenzi ezisi-7, siya kukuxelela isizathu kwanokuthi ungayilindela nini impendulo.  
Xa singakwazi kukuphendula ngokupheleleyo kwiintsuku ezisi-7 zokusebenza, siya kukuxelela ukuba kutheni nokuthi ungayilindela nini impendulo.
Ukuba asikwazi ukukuphendula ngokugcweleyo kwiintsuku ezisi-7 zomsebenzi, siya kukuxelela unobangela woko nokuba ungayilindela nini na impendulo. 
Ukuba asinako ukuphendula ngokupheleleyo kwithuba leentsuku zomsebenzi ezisi-7, siya kukuxelela isizathu kwanokuthi ungayilindela nini impendulo.  
Xa singakwazi kukuphendula ngokupheleleyo kwiintsuku ezisi-7 zokusebenza, siya kukuxelela ukuba kutheni nokuthi ungayilindela nini impendulo.

Siya kuzama ukusombulula umbuzo wakho zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-21 zomsebenzi.
Siza kuzama ukuyisombulula ingxaki yakho zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-21.
Siya kuzama ukusombulula umbuzo wakho kwithuba leentsuku zokusebenza zingama-21.
Siya kulenza ilinge lokuphendula umbuzo wakho kwiintsuku ezingama-21 zokusebenza.
Siza kuzama ukuyisombulula ingxaki yakho zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-21.
Siya kuzama ukusombulula umbuzo wakho kwithuba leentsuku zokusebenza zingama-21.
Siya kulenza ilinge lokuphendula umbuzo wakho kwiintsuku ezingama-21 zokusebenza.
Siya kuzama ukusombulula umbuzo wakho zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-21 zomsebenzi.
Siya kuzama ukusombulula umbuzo wakho kwithuba leentsuku zokusebenza zingama-21.
Siya kulenza ilinge lokuphendula umbuzo wakho kwiintsuku ezingama-21 zokusebenza.
Siya kuzama ukusombulula umbuzo wakho zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-21 zomsebenzi.
Siza kuzama ukuyisombulula ingxaki yakho zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-21.
Siya kulenza ilinge lokuphendula umbuzo wakho kwiintsuku ezingama-21 zokusebenza.
Siya kuzama ukusombulula umbuzo wakho zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-21 zomsebenzi.
Siza kuzama ukuyisombulula ingxaki yakho zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-21.
Siya kuzama ukusombulula umbuzo wakho kwithuba leentsuku zokusebenza zingama-21.
Ukuba uyasifowunela, sinenjongo yokuphendula ifowuni yakho ngokukhawuleza okukhulu ngolwimi olusemthethweni olukhethileyo. 
Ukuba uyasifowunela, sizimisele ukuyiphendula ifowuni ngokukhawuleza ngolwimi olukhethileyo.
Ukuba usitsalela umnxeba, sizimisele ukuphendula umnxeba wakho kamsinya kangangoko sinako ngolwimi olukhethwa nguwe.
Ukuba uyasifowunela, sinenjongo yokuphendula umnxeba ositsalele wona msinyane kangangoko ngolwimi lwaseburhulumenteni olukhethwe nguwe.
Ukuba uyasifowunela, sizimisele ukuyiphendula ifowuni ngokukhawuleza ngolwimi olukhethileyo.

Siya kukuxelela nasiphina isigqibo malunga nomnikelo wakho ngokubhala phantsi 
Sizakuthetha nawe ngembalelwano malunga nesigqibo ngasinye esimalunga nesibonelelo sakho.
Siya kunxibelelana ngesigqibo esinye nesinye malunga nesibonelelo sakho ngokubhaliweyo
Siya kukwazisa ngokukubhalela ngesigqibo ngasinye esenziwe ngesibonelelo-mali sakho
Sizakuthetha nawe ngembalelwano malunga nesigqibo ngasinye esimalunga nesibonelelo sakho.

Kwiiofisi zakwa-SASSA
Xa ufika kwenye yee-ofisi zethu, abasebenzi bethu abakwidesika yoncedo baya kukunceda ngokukhawuleza.
Xa ufika kwenye yee-ofisi zethu , abasebenzi abakwidesika yoncedo bazakukunceda ngoko nangoko.
Xa ufika kwenye yeeofisi zethu, isitafu sethu sedesika yoncedo siya kukunceda ngoko nangoko. 
Xa ufika kwenye yeeofisi zethu, abasebenzi bethu abasedesikeni yoncedo baya kukuncedisa kwangoko.
Xa ufika kwenye yee-ofisi zethu , abasebenzi abakwidesika yoncedo bazakukunceda ngoko nangoko.
Xa ufika kwenye yeeofisi zethu, isitafu sethu sedesika yoncedo siya kukunceda ngoko nangoko. 
Xa ufika kwenye yeeofisi zethu, abasebenzi bethu abasedesikeni yoncedo baya kukuncedisa kwangoko.
Xa ufika kwenye yee-ofisi zethu, abasebenzi bethu abakwidesika yoncedo baya kukunceda ngokukhawuleza.
Xa ufika kwenye yeeofisi zethu, isitafu sethu sedesika yoncedo siya kukunceda ngoko nangoko. 
Xa ufika kwenye yeeofisi zethu, abasebenzi bethu abasedesikeni yoncedo baya kukuncedisa kwangoko.
Xa ufika kwenye yee-ofisi zethu, abasebenzi bethu abakwidesika yoncedo baya kukunceda ngokukhawuleza.
Xa ufika kwenye yee-ofisi zethu , abasebenzi abakwidesika yoncedo bazakukunceda ngoko nangoko.
Xa ufika kwenye yeeofisi zethu, abasebenzi bethu abasedesikeni yoncedo baya kukuncedisa kwangoko.
Xa ufika kwenye yee-ofisi zethu, abasebenzi bethu abakwidesika yoncedo baya kukunceda ngokukhawuleza.
Xa ufika kwenye yee-ofisi zethu , abasebenzi abakwidesika yoncedo bazakukunceda ngoko nangoko.
Xa ufika kwenye yeeofisi zethu, isitafu sethu sedesika yoncedo siya kukunceda ngoko nangoko. 
Zonke ii-ofisi zethu zivuliwe ukususela ku-08h00 ukuya ku-16h30, ngoMvulo ukuya ngoLwesine nango-08H00 ukuya ku-16h00 ngoLwesihlanu.
Zonke iiofisi zethu zivula ngo-08h00 zivale ngo-16h30, ngoMculo ukuya ngoLwesine zize zivule ngo-08h00 zivale ngo-16h00 ngoLwesihlanu.
Zonke iiofisi zethu zivuliwe ukusuka kwiyure yesi-08h00 kude kube yiyure ye-16h30, ngoMvulo ukuya ngoLwesine nangeyure yesi-08h00 ukuya kweye-16h00 ngoLwesihlanu.  
Zonke iiofisi zethu zivulwa ukususela ngentsimbi ye-08h00 kude kube yeye-16h30, ngoMvulo ukuya ngoLwesine ukuze kube yintsimbi ye-08h00 kude kube yeye-16h00 ngoLwesihlanu.

Uncedo lwezonyango ukuba ubazisile abasebenzi xa unesidingo

Kuncedo lonyango xa saziswe kwangaphambili ngesidingo esilolo hlobo
Uncedo lwezonyango ukuba ubazisile abasebenzi xa unesidingo
Uncedo lwezonyango ukuba saziswe kwangaphambili ngentswelo enjalo
Kuncedo lonyango xa saziswe kwangaphambili ngesidingo esilolo hlobo
Uncedo lonyango ukuba saziswe kwangaphambili ngemfuno enjalo
Uncedo lwezonyango ukuba saziswe kwangaphambili ngentswelo enjalo

Siya kuza kuwe ukuba ngenxa yezizathu zonyango, awukwazi ukufikelela kwii-ofisi zethu.
Siza kuza kuwe ukuba awukwazi ukuza kwii-ofisi zethu ngenxa yempilo.
Siya kuza kuwe ukuba ngenxa yezizathu zonyango awunako ukuza kwiiofisi zethu.  
Siya kuza kuwe ukuba ngenxa yezizathu zonyango akukwazi kufika kwiiofisi zethu.
Siza kuza kuwe ukuba awukwazi ukuza kwii-ofisi zethu ngenxa yempilo.
Siya kuza kuwe ukuba ngenxa yezizathu zonyango awunako ukuza kwiiofisi zethu.  
Siya kuza kuwe ukuba ngenxa yezizathu zonyango akukwazi kufika kwiiofisi zethu.
Siya kuza kuwe ukuba ngenxa yezizathu zonyango, awukwazi ukufikelela kwii-ofisi zethu.
Siya kuza kuwe ukuba ngenxa yezizathu zonyango awunako ukuza kwiiofisi zethu.  
Siya kuza kuwe ukuba ngenxa yezizathu zonyango akukwazi kufika kwiiofisi zethu.
Siya kuza kuwe ukuba ngenxa yezizathu zonyango, awukwazi ukufikelela kwii-ofisi zethu.
Siza kuza kuwe ukuba awukwazi ukuza kwii-ofisi zethu ngenxa yempilo.
Siya kuza kuwe ukuba ngenxa yezizathu zonyango akukwazi kufika kwiiofisi zethu.
Siya kuza kuwe ukuba ngenxa yezizathu zonyango, awukwazi ukufikelela kwii-ofisi zethu.
Siza kuza kuwe ukuba awukwazi ukuza kwii-ofisi zethu ngenxa yempilo.
Siya kuza kuwe ukuba ngenxa yezizathu zonyango awunako ukuza kwiiofisi zethu.  
Ungasifowunela thina senze amalungiselelo otyelelo ekhaya.
Usenokusifowunela ukuze sikwazi ukulungiselela ukuba uzelwe ekhayeni lakho.
Ungasitsalela umnxeba yaye siya kwenza ulungiselelo lotyelelo lwekhaya. 
Unakho ukusitsalela umnxeba ukuze senze amalungiselelo otyelelo lwasekhaya.
Usenokusifowunela ukuze sikwazi ukulungiselela ukuba uzelwe ekhayeni lakho.

Unakho ukusitsalela umnxeba ukuze senze amalungiselelo otyelelo lwasekhaya.

Unakho ukusitsalela umnxeba ukuze senze amalungiselelo otyelelo lwasekhaya.

Siya kuqala ukujongana nesicelo sakho kwangalo suku.
Sizakuqalisa ukujongana nesicelo sakho kwangolo suku esingene ngaso.
Siya kuqalisa ukulungisa isicelo sakho kwangolo suku.
Siya kuqalisa ngokuqwalasela isicelo sakho kwangolo suku.
Sizakuqalisa ukujongana nesicelo sakho kwangolo suku esingene ngaso.

Kufuneka siqinisekise ukuba unelungelo ngokwasemthethweni lokufumana umnikelo.
Kufuneka siqinisekise ukuba uselungelweni ngokusemthethweni lokusifumana isibonelelo eso. 
Kufuneka siqinisekise ukuba unelungelo lesibonelelo ngokusemthethweni.
Sifanele ukuqinisekisa ukuba unalo ilungelo lokufumana isibonelelo-mali ngokwasemthethweni.
Kufuneka siqinisekise ukuba uselungelweni ngokusemthethweni lokusifumana isibonelelo eso.

Sizibekela iithagethi zokujongana nebango lakho futhi sibhatale umnikelo wako zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-90.
Sizisikela ixesha lokusabela kwibango lakho sikuhlawule isibonelelo sakho zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-90. 
Sizibekela imigqaliselo yokujongana nebango lakho nokuhlawula isibonelelo sakho kwithuba leentsuku ezingama-90.
Sizibekela imigqaliselo yokuqwalasela ibango lakho ukuze sihlawule isibonelelo-mali sakho kwiintsuku ezingama-90.

Siya kukucebisa ngelungelo lakho lokufaka isibheno xa uthe awamkelwa, wasikwa futhi warhoxiswa.
Sizakukucebisa ngelungelo lakho lokufaka isibheno xa isicelo sakho sithe sakhatywa, isibonelelo sakho sanqunyanyiswa saze sacinywa.
Siya kukucebisa ngelungelo lakho lokubhena kwimeko yokukhatywa, yokumiswa neyokucinywa
Siya kukucebisa ngelungelo lakho lokukhalaza xa kunokubakho ukukhatywa, ukuxhonywa nokurhoxiswa kweemeko ezithile

Ukuthatha izigqibo
Ukuthatha isigqibo.
Ukuba senza isigqibo malunga nesicelo sakho somnikelo kwaye ucinga ukuba akufanelekanga, okanye ufuna ulwazi olongeziweyo malunga nesigqibo, ungenza oku kulandelayo:
Ukuba sithatha izigqibo malunga nesicelo sakho sesibonelelo kwaye ucinga ukuba siphosakele, okanye ungathanda ukufumana iinkcukacha ezithe vetshe malunga nesi sigqibo, usenokwenza oku kulandelayo:
Ukuba senza isigqibo malunga nesicelo sakho sesibonelelo yaye ucinga ukuba siyimpazamo, okanye ungathanda ulwazi oluthile olongezelelweyo malunga nesigqibo, ungenza okulandelayo:
Ukuba senza isigqibo ngesicelo sakho sesibonelelo-mali uze wena ucinge ukuba asichanekanga, okanye xa unqwenela ulwazi oluthe vetshe ngesigqibo eso, unakho ukwenza okulandelayo:
Ukuba sithatha izigqibo malunga nesicelo sakho sesibonelelo kwaye ucinga ukuba siphosakele, okanye ungathanda ukufumana iinkcukacha ezithe vetshe malunga nesi sigqibo, usenokwenza oku kulandelayo:

Sicele ukuba sikucacisele ngesigqibo ngokubanzi thina siya kusebenzisana nesicelo sakho.
Sicele ukuba sikucacisele ngesigqibo ngokucacileyo kwaye sizakuphathisana nawe ngesicelo sakho.
Ukusicela ukuba sichaze isigqibo ngokubanzi yaye siya kusebenzisana nesicelo sakho.
Ucele ukuba sichaze isigqibo eso ngokunika iinkcukacha ezithe vetshe kwaye siya kusisabela isicelo sakho.
Sicele ukuba sikucacisele ngesigqibo ngokucacileyo kwaye sizakuphathisana nawe ngesicelo sakho.

Ungafaka isibheno ngesigqibo sethu kuphela kwiintsuku ezingama-30 omhla weleta yesigqibo.
Usenokufaka isibheno ngesigqibo esisithathileyo zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-30 ukususela kumhla ekhutshwe nawo ileta yesigqibo.
Ungenza isibheno malunga nesigqibo sethu kuphela kwithuba leentsuku ezingama-30 zomhla weleta yesigqibo.
Unakho ukukhalaza ngesigqibo sethu kuphela kwiintsuku ezingama-30 zomhla oseleteni yesigqibo.
Usenokufaka isibheno ngesigqibo esisithathileyo zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-30 ukususela kumhla ekhutshwe nawo ileta yesigqibo.
Ungenza isibheno malunga nesigqibo sethu kuphela kwithuba leentsuku ezingama-30 zomhla weleta yesigqibo.
Unakho ukukhalaza ngesigqibo sethu kuphela kwiintsuku ezingama-30 zomhla oseleteni yesigqibo.
Ungafaka isibheno ngesigqibo sethu kuphela kwiintsuku ezingama-30 omhla weleta yesigqibo.
Ungenza isibheno malunga nesigqibo sethu kuphela kwithuba leentsuku ezingama-30 zomhla weleta yesigqibo.
Unakho ukukhalaza ngesigqibo sethu kuphela kwiintsuku ezingama-30 zomhla oseleteni yesigqibo.
Ungafaka isibheno ngesigqibo sethu kuphela kwiintsuku ezingama-30 omhla weleta yesigqibo.
Usenokufaka isibheno ngesigqibo esisithathileyo zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-30 ukususela kumhla ekhutshwe nawo ileta yesigqibo.
Unakho ukukhalaza ngesigqibo sethu kuphela kwiintsuku ezingama-30 zomhla oseleteni yesigqibo.
Ungafaka isibheno ngesigqibo sethu kuphela kwiintsuku ezingama-30 omhla weleta yesigqibo.
Usenokufaka isibheno ngesigqibo esisithathileyo zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-30 ukususela kumhla ekhutshwe nawo ileta yesigqibo.
Ungenza isibheno malunga nesigqibo sethu kuphela kwithuba leentsuku ezingama-30 zomhla weleta yesigqibo.
Ungafikelela kwifayili yakho kulo naluphina ulwazi onokuthi ulufune.
Ungakwazi ukuyifumana ifayile yakho ukuze ufumane naziphi na iinkcukacha ozidingayo.
Ungafikelela ifayili yakho malunga naluphi ulwazi onokulufuna.
Unakho ukufikelela kwifayili yakho ngazo naziphi na iinkcukacha onokuzidinga kuyo.
Ungakwazi ukuyifumana ifayile yakho ukuze ufumane naziphi na iinkcukacha ozidingayo.
Ungafikelela ifayili yakho malunga naluphi ulwazi onokulufuna.

Ungafikelela ifayili yakho malunga naluphi ulwazi onokulufuna.
Unakho ukufikelela kwifayili yakho ngazo naziphi na iinkcukacha onokuzidinga kuyo.
Ungafikelela kwifayili yakho kulo naluphina ulwazi onokuthi ulufune.
Ungakwazi ukuyifumana ifayile yakho ukuze ufumane naziphi na iinkcukacha ozidingayo.
Unakho ukufikelela kwifayili yakho ngazo naziphi na iinkcukacha onokuzidinga kuyo.
Ungafikelela kwifayili yakho kulo naluphina ulwazi onokuthi ulufune.
Ungakwazi ukuyifumana ifayile yakho ukuze ufumane naziphi na iinkcukacha ozidingayo.
Ungafikelela ifayili yakho malunga naluphi ulwazi onokulufuna.

Ukusibonelela ngokulandelayo:
Idilesi yakho yeposi neyasekhaya echanekileyo.
Idilesi yakho echanekileyo yeposi neyokuhlala.
Idilesi yakho echanekileyo yeposi neyendawo yokuhlala.
Iadresi yakho echanekileyo yeposi neyendawo ohlala kuyo.
Idilesi yakho echanekileyo yeposi neyokuhlala.
Idilesi yakho echanekileyo yeposi neyendawo yokuhlala.
Iadresi yakho echanekileyo yeposi neyendawo ohlala kuyo.

Idilesi yakho echanekileyo yeposi neyendawo yokuhlala.
Iadresi yakho echanekileyo yeposi neyendawo ohlala kuyo.
Idilesi yakho yeposi neyasekhaya echanekileyo.
Idilesi yakho echanekileyo yeposi neyokuhlala.

Ukutshintsha kweemeko ezizezakho ezinjengomvuzo, idilesi, imeko yezempilo, njl.njl.
Iinkcukacha ngotshintsho malunga nemeko-bume yakho njengomvuzo, idilesi, imeko yempilo, njl-njl.
Iinguqu kwiimeko zakho zobuqu ezifana nengeniso, idilesi, imeko yezempilo, njl.njl.
Iinguquko kwiimeko zobuqu bakho ezifana nengeniso, iadresi, imeko yonyango njalo njalo.
Iinkcukacha ngotshintsho malunga nemeko-bume yakho njengomvuzo, idilesi, imeko yempilo, njl-njl.
Iinguqu kwiimeko zakho zobuqu ezifana nengeniso, idilesi, imeko yezempilo, njl.njl.
Iinguquko kwiimeko zobuqu bakho ezifana nengeniso, iadresi, imeko yonyango njalo njalo.
Ukutshintsha kweemeko ezizezakho ezinjengomvuzo, idilesi, imeko yezempilo, njl.njl.
Iinguqu kwiimeko zakho zobuqu ezifana nengeniso, idilesi, imeko yezempilo, njl.njl.
Iinguquko kwiimeko zobuqu bakho ezifana nengeniso, iadresi, imeko yonyango njalo njalo.

Iinguquko kwiimeko zobuqu bakho ezifana nengeniso, iadresi, imeko yonyango njalo njalo.

Iinguqu kwiimeko zakho zobuqu ezifana nengeniso, idilesi, imeko yezempilo, njl.njl.
Ukuthembeka, inyaniso, ukuchaneka nolwazi olupheleleyo okanye ingcaciso ngawo onke amaxesha.
Iinkcukacha okanye ingcaciso enyanisekileyo, ethembekayo, echanekileyo kwanepheleleyo ngawo onke amaxesha.
Ulwazi okanye inkcazo enyanisekileyo, echanekileyo nepheleleyo ngamaxa onke.
Iinkcukacha ezithembekileyo, eziyinyaniso, ezichanekileyo nezipheleleyo okanye inkcazo ngawo onke amaxesha.
Iinkcukacha okanye ingcaciso enyanisekileyo, ethembekayo, echanekileyo kwanepheleleyo ngawo onke amaxesha.
Ulwazi okanye inkcazo enyanisekileyo, echanekileyo nepheleleyo ngamaxa onke.
Iinkcukacha ezithembekileyo, eziyinyaniso, ezichanekileyo nezipheleleyo okanye inkcazo ngawo onke amaxesha.
Ukuthembeka, inyaniso, ukuchaneka nolwazi olupheleleyo okanye ingcaciso ngawo onke amaxesha.
Ulwazi okanye inkcazo enyanisekileyo, echanekileyo nepheleleyo ngamaxa onke.
Iinkcukacha ezithembekileyo, eziyinyaniso, ezichanekileyo nezipheleleyo okanye inkcazo ngawo onke amaxesha.
Ukuthembeka, inyaniso, ukuchaneka nolwazi olupheleleyo okanye ingcaciso ngawo onke amaxesha.
Iinkcukacha okanye ingcaciso enyanisekileyo, ethembekayo, echanekileyo kwanepheleleyo ngawo onke amaxesha.
Iinkcukacha ezithembekileyo, eziyinyaniso, ezichanekileyo nezipheleleyo okanye inkcazo ngawo onke amaxesha.
Ukuthembeka, inyaniso, ukuchaneka nolwazi olupheleleyo okanye ingcaciso ngawo onke amaxesha.
Iinkcukacha okanye ingcaciso enyanisekileyo, ethembekayo, echanekileyo kwanepheleleyo ngawo onke amaxesha.
Ulwazi okanye inkcazo enyanisekileyo, echanekileyo nepheleleyo ngamaxa onke.
Impendulo ngexesha kuko lonke uqhagamshelwano lwethu ukuquka uhlelo ngokutsha okanye naluphina ulwazi olungolunye olucelwe kuwe.
Impendulo ekhawulezileyo kulo lonke unxibelelwano nathi kuquka uhlaziyo okanye aziphi na iinkcukacha esiye sazicela kuwe.
Impendulo ekhawulezileyo kuyo yonke imbhalelwano yethu equka iinkqubo zokuhlola okanye naluphi olunye ulwazi olucelwe kuwe.
Impendulo enikwa kwangexesha yayo yonke imbalelwano yethu kuquka nophengululo okanye naziphi na ezinye iinkcukacha ezifunwe kuwe.
Impendulo ekhawulezileyo kulo lonke unxibelelwano nathi kuquka uhlaziyo okanye aziphi na iinkcukacha esiye sazicela kuwe.
Impendulo ekhawulezileyo kuyo yonke imbhalelwano yethu equka iinkqubo zokuhlola okanye naluphi olunye ulwazi olucelwe kuwe.
Impendulo enikwa kwangexesha yayo yonke imbalelwano yethu kuquka nophengululo okanye naziphi na ezinye iinkcukacha ezifunwe kuwe.
Impendulo ngexesha kuko lonke uqhagamshelwano lwethu ukuquka uhlelo ngokutsha okanye naluphina ulwazi olungolunye olucelwe kuwe.
Impendulo ekhawulezileyo kuyo yonke imbhalelwano yethu equka iinkqubo zokuhlola okanye naluphi olunye ulwazi olucelwe kuwe.
Impendulo enikwa kwangexesha yayo yonke imbalelwano yethu kuquka nophengululo okanye naziphi na ezinye iinkcukacha ezifunwe kuwe.
Impendulo ngexesha kuko lonke uqhagamshelwano lwethu ukuquka uhlelo ngokutsha okanye naluphina ulwazi olungolunye olucelwe kuwe.
Impendulo ekhawulezileyo kulo lonke unxibelelwano nathi kuquka uhlaziyo okanye aziphi na iinkcukacha esiye sazicela kuwe.
Impendulo enikwa kwangexesha yayo yonke imbalelwano yethu kuquka nophengululo okanye naziphi na ezinye iinkcukacha ezifunwe kuwe.

Sithathe ixesha elide kakhulu ukwenza umnikelo wakho kunye/okanye awuyifumananga intlawulo yakho ngexesha.
Yokuba sithathe ixesha elide ngokujongana nesibonelelo sakho kunye/okanye awufumenanga ntlawulo kuthi.
Sithathe ixesha elide kakhulu ukulungisa isibonelelo sakho kunye/okanye awuyifumananga ngethuba intlawulo yakho.
Sithathe ithuba elide ukuqwalasela isibonelelo-mali sakho kunye/okanye akuyifumenanga kwangexesha intlawulo yakho.

Indlela yokuziphatha yegosa lethu ibingafuneki.
Yesiphatho segosa lethu besingesihlanga.
Ukuziphatha kwegosa lethu akuthandekanga.
Ayithandeki indlela eliziphatha ngayo igosa lethu.
Yesiphatho segosa lethu besingesihlanga.
Ukuziphatha kwegosa lethu akuthandekanga.
Ayithandeki indlela eliziphatha ngayo igosa lethu.
Indlela yokuziphatha yegosa lethu ibingafuneki.
Ukuziphatha kwegosa lethu akuthandekanga.
Ayithandeki indlela eliziphatha ngayo igosa lethu.
Indlela yokuziphatha yegosa lethu ibingafuneki.
Yesiphatho segosa lethu besingesihlanga.
Ayithandeki indlela eliziphatha ngayo igosa lethu.
Indlela yokuziphatha yegosa lethu ibingafuneki.
Yesiphatho segosa lethu besingesihlanga.
Ukuziphatha kwegosa lethu akuthandekanga.
Abasebenzi bethu benze impazamo kwisicelo sakho okanye bakunike iingcebiso ezingachanekanga.
Yokuba abasebenzi bethu benze impazamo malunga nesicelo sakho okanye bakunike ingcebiso engachanekanga.
Umsebenzi wethu wenze impazamo kwisicelo sakho okanye ukunike icebiso eliphosakeleyo.
Abasebenzi bethu benze impazamo kwisicelo sakho okanye bakunike icebiso elingachanekanga.
Yokuba abasebenzi bethu benze impazamo malunga nesicelo sakho okanye bakunike ingcebiso engachanekanga.
Umsebenzi wethu wenze impazamo kwisicelo sakho okanye ukunike icebiso eliphosakeleyo.
Abasebenzi bethu benze impazamo kwisicelo sakho okanye bakunike icebiso elingachanekanga.
Abasebenzi bethu benze impazamo kwisicelo sakho okanye bakunike iingcebiso ezingachanekanga.
Umsebenzi wethu wenze impazamo kwisicelo sakho okanye ukunike icebiso eliphosakeleyo.
Abasebenzi bethu benze impazamo kwisicelo sakho okanye bakunike icebiso elingachanekanga.
Abasebenzi bethu benze impazamo kwisicelo sakho okanye bakunike iingcebiso ezingachanekanga.
Yokuba abasebenzi bethu benze impazamo malunga nesicelo sakho okanye bakunike ingcebiso engachanekanga.
Abasebenzi bethu benze impazamo kwisicelo sakho okanye bakunike icebiso elingachanekanga.
Abasebenzi bethu benze impazamo kwisicelo sakho okanye bakunike iingcebiso ezingachanekanga.
Yokuba abasebenzi bethu benze impazamo malunga nesicelo sakho okanye bakunike ingcebiso engachanekanga.
Umsebenzi wethu wenze impazamo kwisicelo sakho okanye ukunike icebiso eliphosakeleyo.

Yempazamo esiyenzileyo yangabom/engeyiyo yangabom
Nangayiphi na impazamo ngakwicala lethu ebicwangciselwe/ebingacwangciselwanga
Nayiphina impazamo yangabom/impazamo engenziwanga ngabom kwicala lethu
Yempazamo esiyenzileyo yangabom/engeyiyo yangabom
Malunga nasiphi isiphosiso ngenjongo/ngempazamo kwicala lethu 
Sixelele malunga nayo kwaye siya kuyilungisa ngokukhawuleza nayiphina impazamo esiyenzileyo.
Sazise ngayo kwaye sizakuyilungisa ngokukhawuleza nayo nayiphi na impazamo esiyenzileyo.
Sazise malunga naso yaye siya kusilungisa ngoko nangoko nasiphi isiphosiso esisenzileyo.  
sixelele ngayo kwaye siya kuyilungisa kwangoko impazamo esiyenzileyo.
Sazise ngayo kwaye sizakuyilungisa ngokukhawuleza nayo nayiphi na impazamo esiyenzileyo.
Sazise malunga naso yaye siya kusilungisa ngoko nangoko nasiphi isiphosiso esisenzileyo.  
sixelele ngayo kwaye siya kuyilungisa kwangoko impazamo esiyenzileyo.
Sixelele malunga nayo kwaye siya kuyilungisa ngokukhawuleza nayiphina impazamo esiyenzileyo.
Sazise malunga naso yaye siya kusilungisa ngoko nangoko nasiphi isiphosiso esisenzileyo.  
sixelele ngayo kwaye siya kuyilungisa kwangoko impazamo esiyenzileyo.
Sixelele malunga nayo kwaye siya kuyilungisa ngokukhawuleza nayiphina impazamo esiyenzileyo.
Sazise ngayo kwaye sizakuyilungisa ngokukhawuleza nayo nayiphi na impazamo esiyenzileyo.
sixelele ngayo kwaye siya kuyilungisa kwangoko impazamo esiyenzileyo.
Sixelele malunga nayo kwaye siya kuyilungisa ngokukhawuleza nayiphina impazamo esiyenzileyo.
Sazise ngayo kwaye sizakuyilungisa ngokukhawuleza nayo nayiphi na impazamo esiyenzileyo.
Sazise malunga naso yaye siya kusilungisa ngoko nangoko nasiphi isiphosiso esisenzileyo.  
Ukuba ufuna ukufaka isikhalazo, nceda usibhalele okanye usifowunele uze ucele ukuba ugqithiselwe kwiyunithi yethu yenkathalelo yabathengi.
Ukuba ufuna ukufaka isikhalazo, nceda usibhalele okanye usifowunele uze ucele ukugqithiselwa kwicandelo lethu lonakekelo lwabaxumi.
Ukuba ufuna ukufaka isikhalazo, sicela usibhalele okanye usitsalele umnxeba ucele ukubhekiswa kwiqela lethu lenkathalelo yomxumi.
Ukuba ufuna ukufaka isikhalazo, nceda sibhalele okanye sitsalele umnxeba uze ucele ukugqithiselwa kwicandelo lethu lenkathalo ngomxumi.

Singakuvuyela ukufumana iimbono zakho malunga neenkonzo zethu.

Sinomdla kwizimvo zakho ngeenkonzo zethu.

Siya kulusebenzisa ulwazi osinike lona ekuphuculeni iinkonzo zethu.
Sizakusebenzisa iinkcukacha osinika zona ukuze siphucule iinkonzo zethu.
Siya kusebenzisa ulwazi osinikayo ukuphucula iinkonzo zethu. 
Iinkcukacha osinika zona siya kuzisebenzisela ukuphucula iinkonzo zethu.
Sizakusebenzisa iinkcukacha osinika zona ukuze siphucule iinkonzo zethu.
Siya kusebenzisa ulwazi osinikayo ukuphucula iinkonzo zethu. 
Iinkcukacha osinika zona siya kuzisebenzisela ukuphucula iinkonzo zethu.
Siya kulusebenzisa ulwazi osinike lona ekuphuculeni iinkonzo zethu.
Siya kusebenzisa ulwazi osinikayo ukuphucula iinkonzo zethu. 
Iinkcukacha osinika zona siya kuzisebenzisela ukuphucula iinkonzo zethu.
Siya kulusebenzisa ulwazi osinike lona ekuphuculeni iinkonzo zethu.
Sizakusebenzisa iinkcukacha osinika zona ukuze siphucule iinkonzo zethu.
Iinkcukacha osinika zona siya kuzisebenzisela ukuphucula iinkonzo zethu.
Siya kulusebenzisa ulwazi osinike lona ekuphuculeni iinkonzo zethu.
Sizakusebenzisa iinkcukacha osinika zona ukuze siphucule iinkonzo zethu.
Siya kusebenzisa ulwazi osinikayo ukuphucula iinkonzo zethu. 
Nceda usithumelele ingxelo ngayo nayiphina indlela kwezi zilandelayo ngezantsi:
Nceda usithumelele iimbono ngamava akho ngathi ngenye yezi ndlela zilandelayo:
Ngesicelo sithumelele impendulo malunga nayiphi yeendlela ezilandelayo:

Gcwalisa ikhadi lezimvo lomthengi elifumaneka kwii-ofisi zethu nakwiindawo zokuhlawulela. 
Gcwalisa ikhadi lamagqabantshintshi abaxumi elifumaneka kwii-ofisi zethu nakumaziko okuhlawulisa.
Gcwalisa ikhadi lomxumi lenkcazelo elifumaneka ngokubini kwiiofisi zethu neendawo zentlawulo.
Zalisa ikhadi yezimvo zomxumi efumaneka kwiiofisi zethu nakwiindawo zokuhlawula.

Gqithisa ingxelo ebhaliweyo kuyo nayiphina enye yee-ofisi zethu. 
Ngenisa isiphakamiso esibhaliweyo kuyo nayiphi na kwiiofisi zethu.
Thumela uveliso olubhaliweyo kuyo nayiphi yeeofisi zethu.
Faka okubhaliweyo nakweziphi na iiofisi zethu.
Ngenisa isiphakamiso esibhaliweyo kuyo nayiphi na kwiiofisi zethu.
Thumela uveliso olubhaliweyo kuyo nayiphi yeeofisi zethu.
Faka okubhaliweyo nakweziphi na iiofisi zethu.

Thumela uveliso olubhaliweyo kuyo nayiphi yeeofisi zethu.
Faka okubhaliweyo nakweziphi na iiofisi zethu.
Gqithisa ingxelo ebhaliweyo kuyo nayiphina enye yee-ofisi zethu. 
Ngenisa isiphakamiso esibhaliweyo kuyo nayiphi na kwiiofisi zethu.
Faka okubhaliweyo nakweziphi na iiofisi zethu.
Gqithisa ingxelo ebhaliweyo kuyo nayiphina enye yee-ofisi zethu. 
Ngenisa isiphakamiso esibhaliweyo kuyo nayiphi na kwiiofisi zethu.
Thumela uveliso olubhaliweyo kuyo nayiphi yeeofisi zethu.

Imibuzo okanye izimvo malunga nale tshatha 
Imibuzo okanye amagqabantshintshi malunga nomqulu
Imibuzo okanye amagqabantshintshi malunga nale tshata
Ukuba ufuna nayiphina ingcaciso engenye malunga nale tshatha, yiza kwenye yee-ofisi zethu.
Ukuba udinga iinkcukacha ezithe vetshe malunga nalo mqulu, fowunela kwenye yeeofisi zethu.
Ukuba udinga naluphi ulwazi olongezelelweyo malunga nale tshata, tsalela umnxeba enye yeeofisi zethu. 
Ukuba udinga naziphi na iinkcukacha ezithe vetshe ngolu xwebhu lwamalungelo, yiya nakweyiphi na enye kwiiofisi zethu.
Ukuba udinga iinkcukacha ezithe vetshe malunga nalo mqulu, fowunela kwenye yeeofisi zethu.
Ukuba udinga naluphi ulwazi olongezelelweyo malunga nale tshata, tsalela umnxeba enye yeeofisi zethu. 
Ukuba udinga naziphi na iinkcukacha ezithe vetshe ngolu xwebhu lwamalungelo, yiya nakweyiphi na enye kwiiofisi zethu.
Ukuba ufuna nayiphina ingcaciso engenye malunga nale tshatha, yiza kwenye yee-ofisi zethu.
Ukuba udinga naluphi ulwazi olongezelelweyo malunga nale tshata, tsalela umnxeba enye yeeofisi zethu. 
Ukuba udinga naziphi na iinkcukacha ezithe vetshe ngolu xwebhu lwamalungelo, yiya nakweyiphi na enye kwiiofisi zethu.
Ukuba ufuna nayiphina ingcaciso engenye malunga nale tshatha, yiza kwenye yee-ofisi zethu.
Ukuba udinga iinkcukacha ezithe vetshe malunga nalo mqulu, fowunela kwenye yeeofisi zethu.
Ukuba udinga naziphi na iinkcukacha ezithe vetshe ngolu xwebhu lwamalungelo, yiya nakweyiphi na enye kwiiofisi zethu.
Ukuba ufuna nayiphina ingcaciso engenye malunga nale tshatha, yiza kwenye yee-ofisi zethu.
Ukuba udinga iinkcukacha ezithe vetshe malunga nalo mqulu, fowunela kwenye yeeofisi zethu.
Ukuba udinga naluphi ulwazi olongezelelweyo malunga nale tshata, tsalela umnxeba enye yeeofisi zethu. 
Ungayifumana le tshatha ibhalwe nge-Braille, ngeteyiphu ne-CD, ukuba ucele njalo.
Usenokuwufumana lo mqulu ngoMbhalo wabangaboniyo, ngentetho erekhodiweyo kunye ne-CD, ukuba usifakile isicelo soko.
Ungayifumana le tshata nge-Braille, ngeteyiphu yesandi okanye nge-CD, xa ucela.
Unakho ukulufumana olu xwebhu lwamalungelo kwiBreyili, kwiteyiphi emanyelwayo nakwiCD, xa uyicela.
Usenokuwufumana lo mqulu ngoMbhalo wabangaboniyo, ngentetho erekhodiweyo kunye ne-CD, ukuba usifakile isicelo soko.

Le Tshatha iya kuqala ngomhla we-01/04/2007 kwaye uya kuhlaziywa rhoqo ngonyaka ukuze ukwazi ukujongana nezimvo zakho.
Lo Mqulu uzakuqalisa ngomhla woku-01/04/2007 kwaye uzakuhlaziywa  qho ngonyaka ukuze ukhawulela namagqabantshintshi owenzileyo.
Le Tshata iya kuqalisa ngomhla we-01/04/2007 yaye iya kuhlolwa unyaka nonyaka ukuhlangabezana namagqabantshintshi akho.
Olu Xwebhu lwaMalungelo luya kuqalisa ngalo mhla 01/04/2007 kwaye luya kuphengululwa ngonyaka ngamnye ukuze kwamkelwe izimvo zakho.
Lo Mqulu uzakuqalisa ngomhla woku-01/04/2007 kwaye uzakuhlaziywa  qho ngonyaka ukuze ukhawulela namagqabantshintshi owenzileyo.
Le Tshata iya kuqalisa ngomhla we-01/04/2007 yaye iya kuhlolwa unyaka nonyaka ukuhlangabezana namagqabantshintshi akho.

INkonzo yoMzantsi Afrika yeNgqokelela yamanani - iiNdaba
lziko leeNkcukacha-manani loMzantsi Afrika –Iindaba
IiNkcukacha-manani eMzantsi Afrika – iiNdaba
Iziko laseMzantsi Afrika leNgqokelelo-manani - Iindaba
lziko leeNkcukacha-manani loMzantsi Afrika –Iindaba
IiNkcukacha-manani eMzantsi Afrika – iiNdaba
Iziko laseMzantsi Afrika leNgqokelelo-manani - Iindaba
INkonzo yoMzantsi Afrika yeNgqokelela yamanani - iiNdaba
IiNkcukacha-manani eMzantsi Afrika – iiNdaba
Iziko laseMzantsi Afrika leNgqokelelo-manani - Iindaba
INkonzo yoMzantsi Afrika yeNgqokelela yamanani - iiNdaba
lziko leeNkcukacha-manani loMzantsi Afrika –Iindaba
Iziko laseMzantsi Afrika leNgqokelelo-manani - Iindaba
INkonzo yoMzantsi Afrika yeNgqokelela yamanani - iiNdaba
lziko leeNkcukacha-manani loMzantsi Afrika –Iindaba
IiNkcukacha-manani eMzantsi Afrika – iiNdaba
Phakathi kwiNkonzo yoMzantsi Afrika yeNgqokelela yamanani: Imfuneko yengqokelela yamanani iza kukhula njengoko iya isiba nzulu nedemokhrasi. 
Ngaphakathi kwiiNkcukacha-manani: Isidingo seenkcukacha-manani sizakwanda ngokuye kusendela idemokhrasi
Ngaphakathi kweeNkcukacha-manani: Intswelo yeenkcukacha-manani iya kwanda njengoko idemokrasi isendela
Ngaphakathi kweleNgqokelelo-manani: Isidingo sengqokelelo-manani siza kwanda ngokuya lukhula ulawulo ngentando yoninzi
Ngaphakathi kwiiNkcukacha-manani: Isidingo seenkcukacha-manani sizakwanda ngokuye kusendela idemokhrasi
Ngaphakathi kweeNkcukacha-manani: Intswelo yeenkcukacha-manani iya kwanda njengoko idemokrasi isendela
Ngaphakathi kweleNgqokelelo-manani: Isidingo sengqokelelo-manani siza kwanda ngokuya lukhula ulawulo ngentando yoninzi
Phakathi kwiNkonzo yoMzantsi Afrika yeNgqokelela yamanani: Imfuneko yengqokelela yamanani iza kukhula njengoko iya isiba nzulu nedemokhrasi. 
Ngaphakathi kweeNkcukacha-manani: Intswelo yeenkcukacha-manani iya kwanda njengoko idemokrasi isendela
Ngaphakathi kweleNgqokelelo-manani: Isidingo sengqokelelo-manani siza kwanda ngokuya lukhula ulawulo ngentando yoninzi
Phakathi kwiNkonzo yoMzantsi Afrika yeNgqokelela yamanani: Imfuneko yengqokelela yamanani iza kukhula njengoko iya isiba nzulu nedemokhrasi. 
Ngaphakathi kwiiNkcukacha-manani: Isidingo seenkcukacha-manani sizakwanda ngokuye kusendela idemokhrasi
Ngaphakathi kweleNgqokelelo-manani: Isidingo sengqokelelo-manani siza kwanda ngokuya lukhula ulawulo ngentando yoninzi
Phakathi kwiNkonzo yoMzantsi Afrika yeNgqokelela yamanani: Imfuneko yengqokelela yamanani iza kukhula njengoko iya isiba nzulu nedemokhrasi. 
Ngaphakathi kwiiNkcukacha-manani: Isidingo seenkcukacha-manani sizakwanda ngokuye kusendela idemokhrasi
Ngaphakathi kweeNkcukacha-manani: Intswelo yeenkcukacha-manani iya kwanda njengoko idemokrasi isendela

Eli nqaku lashicilelwa okukuqala kwi-Business Report yomhla we-05 kuAgasti 2004.
Eli nqaku lapapashwa okokuqala kwiNgxelo ngaMashishini ngomhla wesi-05 Agasti 2004 
Eli nqaku lapapashwa kuqala yi-Business Report ngomhla wesi-05 ngo-Agasti 2004.
Eli nqaku lashicilelwa okukuqala kwi-Business Report yomhla we-05 kuAgasti 2004.
Eli nqaku lapapashwa ngokwentsusa kwi-Business Report yomhla wesi-05 kweyeThupha 2004
Kwiveki ephelileyo ndandikhona kwintlanganiso yebhodi yabacebisi kwiNgingqi, e-Tanzania kwiZiko lokuQeqeshela inzululwazi ngeNgqokelela yamanani kwiAfrika eseMpuma, kulapho ndaba nethuba lokuya kwitheko lothweso-zidangalweli ziko lonyaka wama-39, kulapho kwakuthatha inxaxheba abasebenzi abahlanu beNkonzo yoMzantsi Afrika yeNgqokelela yamanani.
Kwiveki ephelileyo ndiye kwintlanganiso yebhunga lezeengcabiso lesithili yamacebiso kwiZiko loQeqesho kwezeNgqokelelo-manani kwiAfrika eMpuma yeTanzaniya, apho ndathi ndafumana ithuba lokuba yinxalenye yomsitho wothweso-zithaba lonyaka wama-39, nalapho amalungu amahlanu laseMzantsi Afrika leNgqokelelo-manani ayethatha inxaxheba khona.
Kwiveki ephelileyo ndizimase intlanganiso yebhodi ecebisayo yommandla yeSiza soQeqesho seeNkcukacha-manani seMpuma-Afrika eTanzania, apho ndibe nethuba lokuzimasa umsitho wothweso-zidanga wonyaka wama -39 wesiza, apho amalungu abasebenzi amahlanu eziko leeNkcukacha-manani laseMzantsi Afrika ethathe inxaxheba.
Kwiveki ephelileyo bendiye kwintlanganiso yengingqi yebhodi yamacebiso kwiZiko loQeqesho kwezeNgqokelelo-manani kwiAfrika eseMpuma eTanzania, apho ndifumene khona ithuba lokuya kwitheko lothweso-zidanga lonyaka lama-39 leziko, nalapho ebenenxaxheba khona amalungu abasebenzi amahlanu eziko laseMzantsi Afrika leNgqokelelo-manani.
Kwiveki ephelileyo ndiye kwintlanganiso yebhunga lezeengcabiso lesithili yamacebiso kwiZiko loQeqesho kwezeNgqokelelo-manani kwiAfrika eMpuma yeTanzaniya, apho ndathi ndafumana ithuba lokuba yinxalenye yomsitho wothweso-zithaba lonyaka wama-39, nalapho amalungu amahlanu laseMzantsi Afrika leNgqokelelo-manani ayethatha inxaxheba khona.
Kwiveki ephelileyo ndizimase intlanganiso yebhodi ecebisayo yommandla yeSiza soQeqesho seeNkcukacha-manani seMpuma-Afrika eTanzania, apho ndibe nethuba lokuzimasa umsitho wothweso-zidanga wonyaka wama -39 wesiza, apho amalungu abasebenzi amahlanu eziko leeNkcukacha-manani laseMzantsi Afrika ethathe inxaxheba.
Kwiveki ephelileyo bendiye kwintlanganiso yengingqi yebhodi yamacebiso kwiZiko loQeqesho kwezeNgqokelelo-manani kwiAfrika eseMpuma eTanzania, apho ndifumene khona ithuba lokuya kwitheko lothweso-zidanga lonyaka lama-39 leziko, nalapho ebenenxaxheba khona amalungu abasebenzi amahlanu eziko laseMzantsi Afrika leNgqokelelo-manani.
Kwiveki ephelileyo ndandikhona kwintlanganiso yebhodi yabacebisi kwiNgingqi, e-Tanzania kwiZiko lokuQeqeshela inzululwazi ngeNgqokelela yamanani kwiAfrika eseMpuma, kulapho ndaba nethuba lokuya kwitheko lothweso-zidangalweli ziko lonyaka wama-39, kulapho kwakuthatha inxaxheba abasebenzi abahlanu beNkonzo yoMzantsi Afrika yeNgqokelela yamanani.
Kwiveki ephelileyo ndizimase intlanganiso yebhodi ecebisayo yommandla yeSiza soQeqesho seeNkcukacha-manani seMpuma-Afrika eTanzania, apho ndibe nethuba lokuzimasa umsitho wothweso-zidanga wonyaka wama -39 wesiza, apho amalungu abasebenzi amahlanu eziko leeNkcukacha-manani laseMzantsi Afrika ethathe inxaxheba.
Kwiveki ephelileyo bendiye kwintlanganiso yengingqi yebhodi yamacebiso kwiZiko loQeqesho kwezeNgqokelelo-manani kwiAfrika eseMpuma eTanzania, apho ndifumene khona ithuba lokuya kwitheko lothweso-zidanga lonyaka lama-39 leziko, nalapho ebenenxaxheba khona amalungu abasebenzi amahlanu eziko laseMzantsi Afrika leNgqokelelo-manani.
Kwiveki ephelileyo ndandikhona kwintlanganiso yebhodi yabacebisi kwiNgingqi, e-Tanzania kwiZiko lokuQeqeshela inzululwazi ngeNgqokelela yamanani kwiAfrika eseMpuma, kulapho ndaba nethuba lokuya kwitheko lothweso-zidangalweli ziko lonyaka wama-39, kulapho kwakuthatha inxaxheba abasebenzi abahlanu beNkonzo yoMzantsi Afrika yeNgqokelela yamanani.

Kwiveki ephelileyo bendiye kwintlanganiso yengingqi yebhodi yamacebiso kwiZiko loQeqesho kwezeNgqokelelo-manani kwiAfrika eseMpuma eTanzania, apho ndifumene khona ithuba lokuya kwitheko lothweso-zidanga lonyaka lama-39 leziko, nalapho ebenenxaxheba khona amalungu abasebenzi amahlanu eziko laseMzantsi Afrika leNgqokelelo-manani.
Kwiveki ephelileyo ndandikhona kwintlanganiso yebhodi yabacebisi kwiNgingqi, e-Tanzania kwiZiko lokuQeqeshela inzululwazi ngeNgqokelela yamanani kwiAfrika eseMpuma, kulapho ndaba nethuba lokuya kwitheko lothweso-zidangalweli ziko lonyaka wama-39, kulapho kwakuthatha inxaxheba abasebenzi abahlanu beNkonzo yoMzantsi Afrika yeNgqokelela yamanani.

Kwiveki ephelileyo ndizimase intlanganiso yebhodi ecebisayo yommandla yeSiza soQeqesho seeNkcukacha-manani seMpuma-Afrika eTanzania, apho ndibe nethuba lokuzimasa umsitho wothweso-zidanga wonyaka wama -39 wesiza, apho amalungu abasebenzi amahlanu eziko leeNkcukacha-manani laseMzantsi Afrika ethathe inxaxheba.
Ukuqeqeshwa kwabasebenzi boMzantsi Afrika kwiNgqokelela yamanani lulangazelelo lombutho.
Uqeqesho lwabasebenzi be-Stats SA luyinto ephambili yalo mbutho.
Uqeqesho lwabasebenzi beziko leeNkcukacha-manani laseMzantsi Afrika lifuthe lombutho. 
Uqeqesho lwabasebenzi beziko laseMzantsi Afrika leNgqokelelo-manani bubutsha-ntliziyo beziko.
Uqeqesho lwabasebenzi be-Stats SA luyinto ephambili yalo mbutho.
Uqeqesho lwabasebenzi beziko leeNkcukacha-manani laseMzantsi Afrika lifuthe lombutho. 
Uqeqesho lwabasebenzi beziko laseMzantsi Afrika leNgqokelelo-manani bubutsha-ntliziyo beziko.
Ukuqeqeshwa kwabasebenzi boMzantsi Afrika kwiNgqokelela yamanani lulangazelelo lombutho.
Uqeqesho lwabasebenzi beziko leeNkcukacha-manani laseMzantsi Afrika lifuthe lombutho. 
Uqeqesho lwabasebenzi beziko laseMzantsi Afrika leNgqokelelo-manani bubutsha-ntliziyo beziko.
Ukuqeqeshwa kwabasebenzi boMzantsi Afrika kwiNgqokelela yamanani lulangazelelo lombutho.
Uqeqesho lwabasebenzi be-Stats SA luyinto ephambili yalo mbutho.
Uqeqesho lwabasebenzi beziko laseMzantsi Afrika leNgqokelelo-manani bubutsha-ntliziyo beziko.
Ukuqeqeshwa kwabasebenzi boMzantsi Afrika kwiNgqokelela yamanani lulangazelelo lombutho.
Uqeqesho lwabasebenzi be-Stats SA luyinto ephambili yalo mbutho.
Uqeqesho lwabasebenzi beziko leeNkcukacha-manani laseMzantsi Afrika lifuthe lombutho. 
Kufutshane emva kokuba ndinyulwe njengomqokeleli-manani olawulayo ngabeNkonzo yoMzantsi Afrika yeNgqokelela yamanani ngokusebenzisana neKhansile yeNgqokelela yamanani, saba besindululo esingxamisekileyo sokuphanda ngamaziko anikezela ngengqeqesho efanelekileyo yeenkcukacha zaseburhulumenteni.  
Emva nje kokonyulelwa ukuba ngumcwangcisi-manani jikelele, i-Stats SA ngokubambisana neQumrhu leeNkcukacha-manani laye lagunyazisa uphando olungxamisekileyo lwamaziko anikezela ngoqeqesho olufanelekileyo malunga neenkcukacha ezisemthethweni.
Kwakamsinya emva kokuba ndalathelwe ukuba ngusonkcukacha-manani jikelele, iziko leeNkcukacha-manani laseMzantsi Afrika, ngokudibeneyo neQumrhu leeNkcukacha-manani, indulule ukufuna okungxamisekileyo kwamaziko anikela ngoqeqesho olufanelekileyo lovimba weenkcukacha zoburhulumente.
Kungekudala emva kokuba ndityunjwe njengenjengele kwinzululwazi ngengqokelelo-manani, iziko laseMzantsi Afrika leNgqokelelo-manani, nxamnye neBhunga lezeNgqokelelo-manani, indulule uphando olungxamisekileyo ngamaziko anikela ngoqeqesho olufanelekileyo ngeenkcukacha zaseburhulumenteni.
Emva nje kokonyulelwa ukuba ngumcwangcisi-manani jikelele, i-Stats SA ngokubambisana neQumrhu leeNkcukacha-manani laye lagunyazisa uphando olungxamisekileyo lwamaziko anikezela ngoqeqesho olufanelekileyo malunga neenkcukacha ezisemthethweni.
Kwakamsinya emva kokuba ndalathelwe ukuba ngusonkcukacha-manani jikelele, iziko leeNkcukacha-manani laseMzantsi Afrika, ngokudibeneyo neQumrhu leeNkcukacha-manani, indulule ukufuna okungxamisekileyo kwamaziko anikela ngoqeqesho olufanelekileyo lovimba weenkcukacha zoburhulumente.
Kungekudala emva kokuba ndityunjwe njengenjengele kwinzululwazi ngengqokelelo-manani, iziko laseMzantsi Afrika leNgqokelelo-manani, nxamnye neBhunga lezeNgqokelelo-manani, indulule uphando olungxamisekileyo ngamaziko anikela ngoqeqesho olufanelekileyo ngeenkcukacha zaseburhulumenteni.
Kufutshane emva kokuba ndinyulwe njengomqokeleli-manani olawulayo ngabeNkonzo yoMzantsi Afrika yeNgqokelela yamanani ngokusebenzisana neKhansile yeNgqokelela yamanani, saba besindululo esingxamisekileyo sokuphanda ngamaziko anikezela ngengqeqesho efanelekileyo yeenkcukacha zaseburhulumenteni.  
Kwakamsinya emva kokuba ndalathelwe ukuba ngusonkcukacha-manani jikelele, iziko leeNkcukacha-manani laseMzantsi Afrika, ngokudibeneyo neQumrhu leeNkcukacha-manani, indulule ukufuna okungxamisekileyo kwamaziko anikela ngoqeqesho olufanelekileyo lovimba weenkcukacha zoburhulumente.
Kungekudala emva kokuba ndityunjwe njengenjengele kwinzululwazi ngengqokelelo-manani, iziko laseMzantsi Afrika leNgqokelelo-manani, nxamnye neBhunga lezeNgqokelelo-manani, indulule uphando olungxamisekileyo ngamaziko anikela ngoqeqesho olufanelekileyo ngeenkcukacha zaseburhulumenteni.
Kufutshane emva kokuba ndinyulwe njengomqokeleli-manani olawulayo ngabeNkonzo yoMzantsi Afrika yeNgqokelela yamanani ngokusebenzisana neKhansile yeNgqokelela yamanani, saba besindululo esingxamisekileyo sokuphanda ngamaziko anikezela ngengqeqesho efanelekileyo yeenkcukacha zaseburhulumenteni.  
Emva nje kokonyulelwa ukuba ngumcwangcisi-manani jikelele, i-Stats SA ngokubambisana neQumrhu leeNkcukacha-manani laye lagunyazisa uphando olungxamisekileyo lwamaziko anikezela ngoqeqesho olufanelekileyo malunga neenkcukacha ezisemthethweni.
Kungekudala emva kokuba ndityunjwe njengenjengele kwinzululwazi ngengqokelelo-manani, iziko laseMzantsi Afrika leNgqokelelo-manani, nxamnye neBhunga lezeNgqokelelo-manani, indulule uphando olungxamisekileyo ngamaziko anikela ngoqeqesho olufanelekileyo ngeenkcukacha zaseburhulumenteni.
Kufutshane emva kokuba ndinyulwe njengomqokeleli-manani olawulayo ngabeNkonzo yoMzantsi Afrika yeNgqokelela yamanani ngokusebenzisana neKhansile yeNgqokelela yamanani, saba besindululo esingxamisekileyo sokuphanda ngamaziko anikezela ngengqeqesho efanelekileyo yeenkcukacha zaseburhulumenteni.  
Emva nje kokonyulelwa ukuba ngumcwangcisi-manani jikelele, i-Stats SA ngokubambisana neQumrhu leeNkcukacha-manani laye lagunyazisa uphando olungxamisekileyo lwamaziko anikezela ngoqeqesho olufanelekileyo malunga neenkcukacha ezisemthethweni.
Kwakamsinya emva kokuba ndalathelwe ukuba ngusonkcukacha-manani jikelele, iziko leeNkcukacha-manani laseMzantsi Afrika, ngokudibeneyo neQumrhu leeNkcukacha-manani, indulule ukufuna okungxamisekileyo kwamaziko anikela ngoqeqesho olufanelekileyo lovimba weenkcukacha zoburhulumente.
Sachonga amaziko amabini: iziko loqeqesho elise-Dares Salaam yaseTanzania nelo liseUganda loQoqosho olunxulumene neeMeko zokwenene.
Saye sachonga amaziko amabini: iziko loqeqesho elise-Dar es Salaam, eTanzaniya kunye neZiko leNgqokelelo-manani nezoQoqosho zaMacandelo eUganda.
Sichonge amaziko emfundo amabini: isiza soqeqesho e-Dar es Salaam, e-Tanzania, nesiza seZiko leeNkcukacha-manani noQoqosho oluSebenzayo e-Uganda.
Sichonge amaziko amabini: iziko eliseDar es Salaam, eTanzania, kunye neZiko leNgqokelelo-manani nezoQoqosho zaMacandelo eUganda.
Saye sachonga amaziko amabini: iziko loqeqesho elise-Dar es Salaam, eTanzaniya kunye neZiko leNgqokelelo-manani nezoQoqosho zaMacandelo eUganda.
Sichonge amaziko emfundo amabini: isiza soqeqesho e-Dar es Salaam, e-Tanzania, nesiza seZiko leeNkcukacha-manani noQoqosho oluSebenzayo e-Uganda.
Sichonge amaziko amabini: iziko eliseDar es Salaam, eTanzania, kunye neZiko leNgqokelelo-manani nezoQoqosho zaMacandelo eUganda.
Sachonga amaziko amabini: iziko loqeqesho elise-Dares Salaam yaseTanzania nelo liseUganda loQoqosho olunxulumene neeMeko zokwenene.
Sichonge amaziko emfundo amabini: isiza soqeqesho e-Dar es Salaam, e-Tanzania, nesiza seZiko leeNkcukacha-manani noQoqosho oluSebenzayo e-Uganda.
Sichonge amaziko amabini: iziko eliseDar es Salaam, eTanzania, kunye neZiko leNgqokelelo-manani nezoQoqosho zaMacandelo eUganda.
Sachonga amaziko amabini: iziko loqeqesho elise-Dares Salaam yaseTanzania nelo liseUganda loQoqosho olunxulumene neeMeko zokwenene.
Saye sachonga amaziko amabini: iziko loqeqesho elise-Dar es Salaam, eTanzaniya kunye neZiko leNgqokelelo-manani nezoQoqosho zaMacandelo eUganda.
Sichonge amaziko amabini: iziko eliseDar es Salaam, eTanzania, kunye neZiko leNgqokelelo-manani nezoQoqosho zaMacandelo eUganda.
Sachonga amaziko amabini: iziko loqeqesho elise-Dares Salaam yaseTanzania nelo liseUganda loQoqosho olunxulumene neeMeko zokwenene.
Saye sachonga amaziko amabini: iziko loqeqesho elise-Dar es Salaam, eTanzaniya kunye neZiko leNgqokelelo-manani nezoQoqosho zaMacandelo eUganda.
Sichonge amaziko emfundo amabini: isiza soqeqesho e-Dar es Salaam, e-Tanzania, nesiza seZiko leeNkcukacha-manani noQoqosho oluSebenzayo e-Uganda.
Iziko loqeqesho lasekwa ngo-1965 yeyeZizwe eziManyeneyo iKhomishoni yezoQoqosho lweAfrika, uMbutho weAfrika eseMpuma weeNkonzo eziQhelekileyo kunye neyeZizwe eziManyaneyo iNkqubo yoPhuhliso. 
Iziko loqeqesho lasekwa ngo-1965 yiKomishoni yezoQoqosho yeZizwe eZimanyeneyo yaseAfrika ye-UN, uMbutho weeNkonzo eZifanayo amazwe aseMpuma Afrika kunye neNkqubo yoPhuhliso lweZizwe eZimanyeneyo ye-UN.
Iziko loqeqesho lasekwa ngowe-1965 yiKomishini yoQoqosho eAfrika yeZizwe eziManyeneyo, uMbutho weeNkonzo eziQhelekileyo eMpuma-Afrika neNkqubo yoPhuhliso yeZizwe eziManyeneyo.
Kwasekwa iziko loqeqesho ngo-1965 yiKhomishini yezoQoqosho yeUN ukulungiselela iAfrika, uMbutho weAfrika eseMpuma weeNkonzo zesiQhelo kunye neNkqubo yoPhuhliso yeUN.
Iziko loqeqesho lasekwa ngo-1965 yiKomishoni yezoQoqosho yeZizwe eZimanyeneyo yaseAfrika ye-UN, uMbutho weeNkonzo eZifanayo amazwe aseMpuma Afrika kunye neNkqubo yoPhuhliso lweZizwe eZimanyeneyo ye-UN.
Iziko loqeqesho lasekwa ngowe-1965 yiKomishini yoQoqosho eAfrika yeZizwe eziManyeneyo, uMbutho weeNkonzo eziQhelekileyo eMpuma-Afrika neNkqubo yoPhuhliso yeZizwe eziManyeneyo.
Kwasekwa iziko loqeqesho ngo-1965 yiKhomishini yezoQoqosho yeUN ukulungiselela iAfrika, uMbutho weAfrika eseMpuma weeNkonzo zesiQhelo kunye neNkqubo yoPhuhliso yeUN.
Iziko loqeqesho lasekwa ngo-1965 yeyeZizwe eziManyeneyo iKhomishoni yezoQoqosho lweAfrika, uMbutho weAfrika eseMpuma weeNkonzo eziQhelekileyo kunye neyeZizwe eziManyaneyo iNkqubo yoPhuhliso. 
Iziko loqeqesho lasekwa ngowe-1965 yiKomishini yoQoqosho eAfrika yeZizwe eziManyeneyo, uMbutho weeNkonzo eziQhelekileyo eMpuma-Afrika neNkqubo yoPhuhliso yeZizwe eziManyeneyo.
Kwasekwa iziko loqeqesho ngo-1965 yiKhomishini yezoQoqosho yeUN ukulungiselela iAfrika, uMbutho weAfrika eseMpuma weeNkonzo zesiQhelo kunye neNkqubo yoPhuhliso yeUN.
Iziko loqeqesho lasekwa ngo-1965 yeyeZizwe eziManyeneyo iKhomishoni yezoQoqosho lweAfrika, uMbutho weAfrika eseMpuma weeNkonzo eziQhelekileyo kunye neyeZizwe eziManyaneyo iNkqubo yoPhuhliso. 
Iziko loqeqesho lasekwa ngo-1965 yiKomishoni yezoQoqosho yeZizwe eZimanyeneyo yaseAfrika ye-UN, uMbutho weeNkonzo eZifanayo amazwe aseMpuma Afrika kunye neNkqubo yoPhuhliso lweZizwe eZimanyeneyo ye-UN.
Kwasekwa iziko loqeqesho ngo-1965 yiKhomishini yezoQoqosho yeUN ukulungiselela iAfrika, uMbutho weAfrika eseMpuma weeNkonzo zesiQhelo kunye neNkqubo yoPhuhliso yeUN.
Iziko loqeqesho lasekwa ngo-1965 yeyeZizwe eziManyeneyo iKhomishoni yezoQoqosho lweAfrika, uMbutho weAfrika eseMpuma weeNkonzo eziQhelekileyo kunye neyeZizwe eziManyaneyo iNkqubo yoPhuhliso. 
Iziko loqeqesho lasekwa ngo-1965 yiKomishoni yezoQoqosho yeZizwe eZimanyeneyo yaseAfrika ye-UN, uMbutho weeNkonzo eZifanayo amazwe aseMpuma Afrika kunye neNkqubo yoPhuhliso lweZizwe eZimanyeneyo ye-UN.
Iziko loqeqesho lasekwa ngowe-1965 yiKomishini yoQoqosho eAfrika yeZizwe eziManyeneyo, uMbutho weeNkonzo eziQhelekileyo eMpuma-Afrika neNkqubo yoPhuhliso yeZizwe eziManyeneyo.
Ngo-1977 urhulumente wase-Tanzania wathatha iintambo ekulawuleni eli ziko, walandisa inani lamazwe ase-Afrika awasebenzelayo lafika kwi-13. 
Ngo-1977, urhulumente waseTanzaniya waluthathela kuye ulawulo lweli ziko, wongeza namazwe aseAfrika anikezela iinkonzo kuwo abali-13.
Ngowe-1977, urhulumente wase-Tanzania wathatha ulawulo lweziko, waze wandisa inani lamazwe aseAfrika eliwakhonzayo ukuya kwi-13.
Kuthe kufika unyaka ka-1977, wabe urhulumente waseTanzania seleliqhuba ngokwakhe iziko, waze wandisa inani lamazwe aseAfrika awanika inkonzo ukuze abe li-13.
Ngo-1977, urhulumente waseTanzaniya waluthathela kuye ulawulo lweli ziko, wongeza namazwe aseAfrika anikezela iinkonzo kuwo abali-13.
Ngowe-1977, urhulumente wase-Tanzania wathatha ulawulo lweziko, waze wandisa inani lamazwe aseAfrika eliwakhonzayo ukuya kwi-13.
Kuthe kufika unyaka ka-1977, wabe urhulumente waseTanzania seleliqhuba ngokwakhe iziko, waze wandisa inani lamazwe aseAfrika awanika inkonzo ukuze abe li-13.
Ngo-1977 urhulumente wase-Tanzania wathatha iintambo ekulawuleni eli ziko, walandisa inani lamazwe ase-Afrika awasebenzelayo lafika kwi-13. 
Ngowe-1977, urhulumente wase-Tanzania wathatha ulawulo lweziko, waze wandisa inani lamazwe aseAfrika eliwakhonzayo ukuya kwi-13.
Kuthe kufika unyaka ka-1977, wabe urhulumente waseTanzania seleliqhuba ngokwakhe iziko, waze wandisa inani lamazwe aseAfrika awanika inkonzo ukuze abe li-13.
Ngo-1977 urhulumente wase-Tanzania wathatha iintambo ekulawuleni eli ziko, walandisa inani lamazwe ase-Afrika awasebenzelayo lafika kwi-13. 
Ngo-1977, urhulumente waseTanzaniya waluthathela kuye ulawulo lweli ziko, wongeza namazwe aseAfrika anikezela iinkonzo kuwo abali-13.
Kuthe kufika unyaka ka-1977, wabe urhulumente waseTanzania seleliqhuba ngokwakhe iziko, waze wandisa inani lamazwe aseAfrika awanika inkonzo ukuze abe li-13.
Ngo-1977 urhulumente wase-Tanzania wathatha iintambo ekulawuleni eli ziko, walandisa inani lamazwe ase-Afrika awasebenzelayo lafika kwi-13. 
Ngo-1977, urhulumente waseTanzaniya waluthathela kuye ulawulo lweli ziko, wongeza namazwe aseAfrika anikezela iinkonzo kuwo abali-13.
Ngowe-1977, urhulumente wase-Tanzania wathatha ulawulo lweziko, waze wandisa inani lamazwe aseAfrika eliwakhonzayo ukuya kwi-13.

Kule minyaka mithathu idlulileyo, abeNkonzo yoMzantsi Afrika yeNgqokelela yamanani bebesoloko bethumela abasebenzi kula maziko emfundo.
Kule minyaka mithathu idlulileyo, i-Stats SA ibimane ithumela abasebenzi bayo kula maziko.

Oko babuyileyo, sebebonakalise ukuphucuka komgangatho wabo kwintsebenzo, abanye kubo ngeli ixesha basezikhundleni njengabalawuli.
Ekubuyeni kwabo, baye babonisa ukukhula okumangalisayo emsebenizni wabo, kwaye abanye babo bakwizikhundla zolawulo.
Njengokuba bebuyile, babonise impucuko enkulukazi ekwenzeni umsebenzi, apho abanye babo bephethe izithuba zolawulo.
Lakuba libuyile, libonakalise ukuphucuka okumangalisayo komgangatho wokusebenza, kanti abanye babo ngoku basezikhundleni zolawulo.

Imfuneko yolwazi ngengqokelela yamanani ukuze kuthathwe izigqibo, kuwo omathathu amacandelo karhulumente, seyinyuke ngokumangalisayo.
Isidingo seenkcukacha zocwangciso-manani ekuthathweni kwezigqibo, kuzo zontathu izigaba zoburhulumente, siyesakhula ngokumangalisayo. 
Intswelo yolwazi lweenkcukacha-manani malunga nokuthatha izigqibo, kuwo onke amathala karhulumente, yande kakhulu gqitha. 
Isidingo seenkcukacha zengqokelelo-manani ekuthathweni kwezigqibo, kuzo zonke zontathu iingalo zikarhulumente, sande ngendlela emangalisayo.

Ngokukodwa, abantu abaqeqeshelwe ukuqokelela ulwazi nokusebenzisa amanani, kumanqanaba oomasipala, oko sekufuna ukujongwa ngeliso elibanzi.
Ngokukodwa, abantu abaqeqeshiweyo ekuqokeleleni nasekusebenziseni ulwazi lweenkcukacha-manani kwisigaba sikamasipala baya bedingeka nangakumbi. 
Ngokukodwa, abantu abaqeqeshelwe ukuqokelela nokusebenzisa ulwazi lweenkcukacha-manani kumgangatho kamasipala bafuneka ngokubalulekileyo.
Enyanisweni, abantu abaqeqeshelwe ukwenza ingqokelelo kunye nokusetyenziswa kweengcuka zengqokelelo-manani kwinqanaba loomasipala kuya ngokubaluleka kangako.

Ngeenjongo zokwanelisa le mfuno, kuza kufuneka siqeqeshe abantu , ubuncinane babo bube ngama-2 000 ngonyaka.
Ukuze kufezekiseke esi sidingo, kuzakufuneka siqeqeshe abantu ubuncinane abangama-2 000 ngonyaka.
Ukwanelisa le ntswelo, kuya kufuneka siqeqeshe abantu ngesantya sobuncinane bama-2 000 ngonyaka. 
Ukwanelisa esi sidingo, siya kufanela ukuqeqesha abantu ngesantya esingama-2 000 ngonyaka obona buncinane.
Ukuze kufezekiseke esi sidingo, kuzakufuneka siqeqeshe abantu ubuncinane abangama-2 000 ngonyaka.
