Iziko loqeqesho lase-Tanzania neZiko laseUganda leNgqokelela yamanani nezifundo zoQoqosho olunxulumene neeMeko zokwenene ehlabathini, omabini awanakumelana neemfuno zabaqeqeshwayo abaninzi kangako. 
Iziko loqeqesho eliseTanzaniya kunye neZiko leeNkcukacha-manani neMiba yezoQoqosho elise-Uganda alingekwazi ukumelana nale mfuno ingakanana.
Iziko loqeqesho lase-Tanzania kunye neZiko leeNkcukacha-manani noQoqosho oluSebenzayo laseUganda womabini akanako ukumelana nentswelo ephakeme kangaka.
Iziko loqeqesho laseTanzania neZiko lezeNgqokelelo-manani kunye neZiko laseUganda lezeNgqokelelo-manani nezoQoqosho lwaMacandelo awanakukwazi ukumelana nemfuno ephezulu kangako.
Iziko loqeqesho eliseTanzaniya kunye neZiko leeNkcukacha-manani neMiba yezoQoqosho elise-Uganda alingekwazi ukumelana nale mfuno ingakanana.
Iziko loqeqesho lase-Tanzania kunye neZiko leeNkcukacha-manani noQoqosho oluSebenzayo laseUganda womabini akanako ukumelana nentswelo ephakeme kangaka.
Iziko loqeqesho laseTanzania neZiko lezeNgqokelelo-manani kunye neZiko laseUganda lezeNgqokelelo-manani nezoQoqosho lwaMacandelo awanakukwazi ukumelana nemfuno ephezulu kangako.
Iziko loqeqesho lase-Tanzania neZiko laseUganda leNgqokelela yamanani nezifundo zoQoqosho olunxulumene neeMeko zokwenene ehlabathini, omabini awanakumelana neemfuno zabaqeqeshwayo abaninzi kangako. 
Iziko loqeqesho lase-Tanzania kunye neZiko leeNkcukacha-manani noQoqosho oluSebenzayo laseUganda womabini akanako ukumelana nentswelo ephakeme kangaka.
Iziko loqeqesho laseTanzania neZiko lezeNgqokelelo-manani kunye neZiko laseUganda lezeNgqokelelo-manani nezoQoqosho lwaMacandelo awanakukwazi ukumelana nemfuno ephezulu kangako.
Iziko loqeqesho lase-Tanzania neZiko laseUganda leNgqokelela yamanani nezifundo zoQoqosho olunxulumene neeMeko zokwenene ehlabathini, omabini awanakumelana neemfuno zabaqeqeshwayo abaninzi kangako. 
Iziko loqeqesho eliseTanzaniya kunye neZiko leeNkcukacha-manani neMiba yezoQoqosho elise-Uganda alingekwazi ukumelana nale mfuno ingakanana.
Iziko loqeqesho laseTanzania neZiko lezeNgqokelelo-manani kunye neZiko laseUganda lezeNgqokelelo-manani nezoQoqosho lwaMacandelo awanakukwazi ukumelana nemfuno ephezulu kangako.
Iziko loqeqesho lase-Tanzania neZiko laseUganda leNgqokelela yamanani nezifundo zoQoqosho olunxulumene neeMeko zokwenene ehlabathini, omabini awanakumelana neemfuno zabaqeqeshwayo abaninzi kangako. 
Iziko loqeqesho eliseTanzaniya kunye neZiko leeNkcukacha-manani neMiba yezoQoqosho elise-Uganda alingekwazi ukumelana nale mfuno ingakanana.
Iziko loqeqesho lase-Tanzania kunye neZiko leeNkcukacha-manani noQoqosho oluSebenzayo laseUganda womabini akanako ukumelana nentswelo ephakeme kangaka.
Xa kwakuvulwa inkongolo yoMbutho weNgqokelela yamanani yoMzantsi Afrika kunyaka ophelileyo, umphathiswa wezimali onguTrevor Manuel wacela umngeni kwiyunivesithi zoMzantsi Afrika ukuba mazihlangabezane nokunqongophala kwezakhono ezinokufumaneka ukuze kuncedwe urhulumente akwazi ukuthatha izigqibo ngengqiqo nangokusekelwe kulwazi oluchanekileyo lwengqokelela yamanani.,
Xa kwakuvulwa inkomfa yoMbutho wezeNgqokelelo-manani waseMzantsi Afrika kunyaka ophelileyo, umphathiswa wezemali uTrevor Manuel wacela umngeni kwiyunivesithi zasemZantsi Afrika ukuba zihlangabezane noshokoxeko lwezakhono zeenkcukcha-manani ezikhoyo ukuze kuncediswe urhulumente akwazi ukuthatha izigqibo ngokuphathelele kwiinkcukacha ezichanileyo zeenkcukacha-manani.
Xa kuvulwa inkomfa yoMbutho weeNkcukacha-manani waseMzatsi Afrika kunyaka ophelileyo, umphathiswa wezemali u-Trevor Manuel wacela umngeni kwiiyunivesithi zaseMzantsi Afrika ukuba  zijongane nokunqongophala kwezakhono zeenkcukacha-manani ezifumanekayo ukuncedisa urhulumente ekwenzeni izigqibo ezisekelwe kulwazi oluchanekileyo lweenkcukacha-manani.
Xa wayevula inkomfa yoMbutho wezeNgqokelelo-manani waseMzantsi Afrika kunyaka ophelileyo, umphathiswa wezemali uTrevor Manuel wacela umngeni kwiiyunivesithi zaseMzantsi Afrika ukuba zihlangabeze unqongophalo olukhoyo lwezakhono zobuchule kwezeNgqokelelo-manani ukuze urhulumente akwazi ukwenza izigqibo enolwazi olusekwe kwiinkcukacha ezichanekileyo zeengqokelelo-manani.
Xa kwakuvulwa inkomfa yoMbutho wezeNgqokelelo-manani waseMzantsi Afrika kunyaka ophelileyo, umphathiswa wezemali uTrevor Manuel wacela umngeni kwiyunivesithi zasemZantsi Afrika ukuba zihlangabezane noshokoxeko lwezakhono zeenkcukcha-manani ezikhoyo ukuze kuncediswe urhulumente akwazi ukuthatha izigqibo ngokuphathelele kwiinkcukacha ezichanileyo zeenkcukacha-manani.

AbeNkonzo yoMzantsi Afrika yeNgqokelela yamanani sebeziqalile iingxoxo neeyunivesithi ngeenjongo zokwazisa ngoqeqesho olunjalo.
I-Stats SA iqalise iingxoxo neeyunivesithi ngenjongo yokuqalisa uqeqesho olukumila kunjalo.
Iziko leeNkcukacha-manani laseMzantsi Afrika liqalise iingxoxo neeyunivesithi ngenjongo yokuqalisa uqeqesho olunjalo. 
Iziko laseMzantsi Afrika leNgqokelelo-manani seliqalile ngeengxoxo neeyunivesithi ngenjongo yokuqalisa ngoqeqesho lolo hlobo.

I-Stats SA iqalise iingxoxo neeyunivesithi ngenjongo yokuqalisa uqeqesho olukumila kunjalo.
Iziko leeNkcukacha-manani laseMzantsi Afrika liqalise iingxoxo neeyunivesithi ngenjongo yokuqalisa uqeqesho olunjalo. 
Noxa kunjalo, ngalo eli xesha ayikho iyunivesithi yoMzantsi Afrika enikezela ngezifundo zengqokelela yamanani eburhulumenteni.
Nangani kunjalo, ngokwangokunje akukho yunivesithi yaseMzantsi Afrika enikezela ngesifundo esingeenkcukacha-manani zaseburhulumenteni.
Nangona kunjalo, njengangoku ayikho iyunivesithi yaseMzantsi Afrika enikela ngoludwe lwezifundo zeenkcukacha-manani zoburhulumente.
Nangona kunjalo, okwangoku eMzantsi Afrika akukabikho yunivesithi efundisa ezi zifundo zezengqokelelo-manani zaseburhulumenteni.
Nangani kunjalo, ngokwangokunje akukho yunivesithi yaseMzantsi Afrika enikezela ngesifundo esingeenkcukacha-manani zaseburhulumenteni.
Nangona kunjalo, njengangoku ayikho iyunivesithi yaseMzantsi Afrika enikela ngoludwe lwezifundo zeenkcukacha-manani zoburhulumente.
Nangona kunjalo, okwangoku eMzantsi Afrika akukabikho yunivesithi efundisa ezi zifundo zezengqokelelo-manani zaseburhulumenteni.

Nangani kunjalo, ngokwangokunje akukho yunivesithi yaseMzantsi Afrika enikezela ngesifundo esingeenkcukacha-manani zaseburhulumenteni.
Nangona kunjalo, okwangoku eMzantsi Afrika akukabikho yunivesithi efundisa ezi zifundo zezengqokelelo-manani zaseburhulumenteni.
Noxa kunjalo, ngalo eli xesha ayikho iyunivesithi yoMzantsi Afrika enikezela ngezifundo zengqokelela yamanani eburhulumenteni.
Nangani kunjalo, ngokwangokunje akukho yunivesithi yaseMzantsi Afrika enikezela ngesifundo esingeenkcukacha-manani zaseburhulumenteni.
Nangona kunjalo, njengangoku ayikho iyunivesithi yaseMzantsi Afrika enikela ngoludwe lwezifundo zeenkcukacha-manani zoburhulumente.
AbeNkonzo yoMzantsi Afrika yeNgqokelela yamanani  banesicwangciso sokuseka iziko loqeqesho kwingqokelela yamanani kwamsinyane kwixa elizayo, injongo kukunikezela ngoqeqesho  lwengqokelela yamanani eburhulumenteni, kusenzelwa abasebenzi bangaphakathi nabo bamanye amasebe.
I-Stats SA iceba ukusungula kungekudala iziko loqeqesho ngeenkcukacha-manani, nelizakunikezela ngoqeqesho lweenkcukacha-manani zaseburhulumenteni kubasebenzi besebe nakumagosa wamanye amasebe.
Iziko leeNkcukacha-manani laseMzantsi Afrika liqalise liceba ukuseka isiza soqeqesho seenkcukacha-manani kwixesha elikufuphi elizayo, elinikela ngoqeqesho lweenkcukacha-manani zikarhulumente ukwenzela ngokubini abasebenzi bangaphakathi kwakunye namagosa avela kwamanye amasebe.
 Iziko laseMzantsi Afrika leNgqokelelo-manani  linenjongo yokuseka iziko loqeqesho lezengqokelelo-manani kungekudala, elinikela ngoqeqesho kwezengqokelelo-manani zaseburhulumenteni kubasebenzi bangaphakathi nabasebenzi bamanye amasebe.
I-Stats SA iceba ukusungula kungekudala iziko loqeqesho ngeenkcukacha-manani, nelizakunikezela ngoqeqesho lweenkcukacha-manani zaseburhulumenteni kubasebenzi besebe nakumagosa wamanye amasebe.
Iziko leeNkcukacha-manani laseMzantsi Afrika liqalise liceba ukuseka isiza soqeqesho seenkcukacha-manani kwixesha elikufuphi elizayo, elinikela ngoqeqesho lweenkcukacha-manani zikarhulumente ukwenzela ngokubini abasebenzi bangaphakathi kwakunye namagosa avela kwamanye amasebe.
 Iziko laseMzantsi Afrika leNgqokelelo-manani  linenjongo yokuseka iziko loqeqesho lezengqokelelo-manani kungekudala, elinikela ngoqeqesho kwezengqokelelo-manani zaseburhulumenteni kubasebenzi bangaphakathi nabasebenzi bamanye amasebe.

AbeNkonzo yoMzantsi Afrika yeNgqokelela yamanani  banesicwangciso sokuseka iziko loqeqesho kwingqokelela yamanani kwamsinyane kwixa elizayo, injongo kukunikezela ngoqeqesho  lwengqokelela yamanani eburhulumenteni, kusenzelwa abasebenzi bangaphakathi nabo bamanye amasebe.
I-Stats SA iceba ukusungula kungekudala iziko loqeqesho ngeenkcukacha-manani, nelizakunikezela ngoqeqesho lweenkcukacha-manani zaseburhulumenteni kubasebenzi besebe nakumagosa wamanye amasebe.
Iziko leeNkcukacha-manani laseMzantsi Afrika liqalise liceba ukuseka isiza soqeqesho seenkcukacha-manani kwixesha elikufuphi elizayo, elinikela ngoqeqesho lweenkcukacha-manani zikarhulumente ukwenzela ngokubini abasebenzi bangaphakathi kwakunye namagosa avela kwamanye amasebe.
Ukuthiwa thaca kwenkqubo yeyesizwe ingqokelela yamanani izakuba nesiphumo semfuno yokuseka iiyunithi zale ngqokelela kumasebe ahlukileyo karhulumente, kwakutsho kufuneke kakhulu ubuqili obungaphezulu bezakhono ezibalaseleyo kwingqokelela yamanani.
Ukuqaliswa kwenkqubo yeenkcukacha-manani zesizwe kuzakukhokelela kwisidingo sokusungulwa kweeyunithi zeenkcukacha-manani kumasebe karhulumente awohlukileyo, nto leyo ezakwenza kubekho isidingo esiphezulu sabasebenzi abanobuchule beenkcukacha-manani. 
Ukwamkela inkqubo yesizwe yeenkcukacha-manani kuya kuba nesiphumo sentswelo yokuseka amacandelo eenkcukacha-manani kumasebe ahlukeneyo karhulumente, kwandise nentswelo enkulu yeengcali zezakhono zeenkcukacha-manani.
Usungulo lwenkqubo yesizwe yezengqokelelo-manani luya kukhokelela kwisidingo sokusekwa kwamacandelo ahluka-hlukileyo karhulumente, ukuze kubekho nemfuno ethe kratya yesakhono sobuchule kwezengqokelelo-manani.
Ukuqaliswa kwenkqubo yeenkcukacha-manani zesizwe kuzakukhokelela kwisidingo sokusungulwa kweeyunithi zeenkcukacha-manani kumasebe karhulumente awohlukileyo, nto leyo ezakwenza kubekho isidingo esiphezulu sabasebenzi abanobuchule beenkcukacha-manani. 
Ukwamkela inkqubo yesizwe yeenkcukacha-manani kuya kuba nesiphumo sentswelo yokuseka amacandelo eenkcukacha-manani kumasebe ahlukeneyo karhulumente, kwandise nentswelo enkulu yeengcali zezakhono zeenkcukacha-manani.
Usungulo lwenkqubo yesizwe yezengqokelelo-manani luya kukhokelela kwisidingo sokusekwa kwamacandelo ahluka-hlukileyo karhulumente, ukuze kubekho nemfuno ethe kratya yesakhono sobuchule kwezengqokelelo-manani.
Ukuthiwa thaca kwenkqubo yeyesizwe ingqokelela yamanani izakuba nesiphumo semfuno yokuseka iiyunithi zale ngqokelela kumasebe ahlukileyo karhulumente, kwakutsho kufuneke kakhulu ubuqili obungaphezulu bezakhono ezibalaseleyo kwingqokelela yamanani.
Ukwamkela inkqubo yesizwe yeenkcukacha-manani kuya kuba nesiphumo sentswelo yokuseka amacandelo eenkcukacha-manani kumasebe ahlukeneyo karhulumente, kwandise nentswelo enkulu yeengcali zezakhono zeenkcukacha-manani.
Usungulo lwenkqubo yesizwe yezengqokelelo-manani luya kukhokelela kwisidingo sokusekwa kwamacandelo ahluka-hlukileyo karhulumente, ukuze kubekho nemfuno ethe kratya yesakhono sobuchule kwezengqokelelo-manani.
Ukuthiwa thaca kwenkqubo yeyesizwe ingqokelela yamanani izakuba nesiphumo semfuno yokuseka iiyunithi zale ngqokelela kumasebe ahlukileyo karhulumente, kwakutsho kufuneke kakhulu ubuqili obungaphezulu bezakhono ezibalaseleyo kwingqokelela yamanani.
Ukuqaliswa kwenkqubo yeenkcukacha-manani zesizwe kuzakukhokelela kwisidingo sokusungulwa kweeyunithi zeenkcukacha-manani kumasebe karhulumente awohlukileyo, nto leyo ezakwenza kubekho isidingo esiphezulu sabasebenzi abanobuchule beenkcukacha-manani. 
Usungulo lwenkqubo yesizwe yezengqokelelo-manani luya kukhokelela kwisidingo sokusekwa kwamacandelo ahluka-hlukileyo karhulumente, ukuze kubekho nemfuno ethe kratya yesakhono sobuchule kwezengqokelelo-manani.
Ukuthiwa thaca kwenkqubo yeyesizwe ingqokelela yamanani izakuba nesiphumo semfuno yokuseka iiyunithi zale ngqokelela kumasebe ahlukileyo karhulumente, kwakutsho kufuneke kakhulu ubuqili obungaphezulu bezakhono ezibalaseleyo kwingqokelela yamanani.
Ukuqaliswa kwenkqubo yeenkcukacha-manani zesizwe kuzakukhokelela kwisidingo sokusungulwa kweeyunithi zeenkcukacha-manani kumasebe karhulumente awohlukileyo, nto leyo ezakwenza kubekho isidingo esiphezulu sabasebenzi abanobuchule beenkcukacha-manani. 
Ukwamkela inkqubo yesizwe yeenkcukacha-manani kuya kuba nesiphumo sentswelo yokuseka amacandelo eenkcukacha-manani kumasebe ahlukeneyo karhulumente, kwandise nentswelo enkulu yeengcali zezakhono zeenkcukacha-manani.
Nangona kunjalo, ukuphuhliswa kombandela wengqokelela yamanani sekudityaniswe ngaphezulu kweemfuno zikarhulumente zolwazi oluchanekileyo.
Nangani kunjalo, ukuphuhliswa kweengcali zeenkcukacha-manani kungaphaya kwesidingo sikarhulumente sokufumana iinkcukacha ezibhanileyo.
Nangona kunjalo, isakhono sokuphuhlisa iinkcukacha-manani kunxulumene nentswelo engaphezulu kwekarhulumente malunga nolwazi oluchanekileyo.
Nangona kunjalo, uphuhliso lwesakhono sengqokelelo-manani luxokomezelwe ngokuthe kratya kwisidingo sikarhulumente seenkcukacha ezichanekileyo.
Nangani kunjalo, ukuphuhliswa kweengcali zeenkcukacha-manani kungaphaya kwesidingo sikarhulumente sokufumana iinkcukacha ezibhanileyo.
Nangona kunjalo, isakhono sokuphuhlisa iinkcukacha-manani kunxulumene nentswelo engaphezulu kwekarhulumente malunga nolwazi oluchanekileyo.

Nangani kunjalo, ukuphuhliswa kweengcali zeenkcukacha-manani kungaphaya kwesidingo sikarhulumente sokufumana iinkcukacha ezibhanileyo.

INgqokelela yamanani iya entliziyweni yedemokhrasi.
Iinkcukacha-manani ziyingxenye engundoqo wedemokhrasi.
Iinkcukacha-manani zisingisa kumbindi wedemokrasi. 
Iingqokelelo-manani zisesizikithini solawulo ngentando yoninzi.
Iinkcukacha-manani ziyingxenye engundoqo wedemokhrasi.

Iingqokelelo-manani zisesizikithini solawulo ngentando yoninzi.
INgqokelela yamanani iya entliziyweni yedemokhrasi.
Iinkcukacha-manani ziyingxenye engundoqo wedemokhrasi.
Iinkcukacha-manani zisingisa kumbindi wedemokrasi. 
UHG Wells, kwasekuqaleni kwenkulungwane yama-20,  wacinga ukuba kwixa elizayo, ingqokelela yamanani iza kufuneka kubemi njengoko ibanika amandla okufunda nokubhala.
I-HG Wells, ekuqaleni kwenkulungwane yama-20, yaphakamisa ukuba iinkcukacha-manani zizakubaluleka ebantwini ngokufananyo nesakhono zokufunda nokubhala.
U-HG Wells, ekuqaleni kwenkulungwane yama-20, wacinga ukuba kwixesha elizayo, iinkcukacha-manani ziya kufuneka kubemi njengoko isakhono sokufunda nokubhala sifuneka.
UHG Wells, ekuqaleni kwenkulungwane yama-20, waphakamisa ingcinga ethi kwixesha elizayo, inzululwazi yengqokelelo-manani iya kuba yimfuneko kwimeko yobumi besizwe njengesakhono sokufunda nokubhala.

Ingqokelela yamanani aseburhulumenteni yimpumelelo yakutshanje kwiinkcubeko, nto leyo iphuhle ngokuvela kwedemokhrasi. 
Iinkcukacha-manani zoluntu ziyimpumelelo yakamvanje yenkcubeko neyeyaphucuka nokufika kwedemokhrasi.
Iinkcukacha-manani zoluntu yimpumelelo yakutshanje yenkcubeko ephuhliswe kukufika kwedemokrasi. 
Iingqokelelo-manani ezimalunga noluntu ziyimpumezo yenkcubeko yakutshanje ephuhle ngokufika kolawulo ngentando yoninzi.
Iinkcukacha-manani zoluntu ziyimpumelelo yakamvanje yenkcubeko neyeyaphucuka nokufika kwedemokhrasi.
Iinkcukacha-manani zoluntu yimpumelelo yakutshanje yenkcubeko ephuhliswe kukufika kwedemokrasi. 
Iingqokelelo-manani ezimalunga noluntu ziyimpumezo yenkcubeko yakutshanje ephuhle ngokufika kolawulo ngentando yoninzi.

Iingqokelelo-manani ezimalunga noluntu ziyimpumezo yenkcubeko yakutshanje ephuhle ngokufika kolawulo ngentando yoninzi.
Ingqokelela yamanani aseburhulumenteni yimpumelelo yakutshanje kwiinkcubeko, nto leyo iphuhle ngokuvela kwedemokhrasi. 
Iinkcukacha-manani zoluntu ziyimpumelelo yakamvanje yenkcubeko neyeyaphucuka nokufika kwedemokhrasi.
Iinkcukacha-manani zoluntu yimpumelelo yakutshanje yenkcubeko ephuhliswe kukufika kwedemokrasi. 
Kwimeko yaseAfrika, apho idemokhrasi iyinkqubo yakutshanje, siza kubona ukunyuka okumandla kwemfuno yengqokelela yamanani eburhulumenteni njengoko iya isiba nzulu nedemokhrasi.
Apha eAfrika nalapho into yedemokhrasi yinto entsha khona, siza kubona ukwanda okuphawulekayo kwesidingo seenkcukacha-manani zoluntu ngokuye ikhula idemokhrasi.
Kwimeko yaseAfrika, apho idemokhrasi iluluvo lwakutshanje, siya kubona ukwanda okuphawulekayo kwimfuno yeenkcukacha-manani zoluntu njengoko idemokhrasi isendela.
Kubume obungqonge iAfrika, apho ulawulo ngentando yoninzi lusengumba osandula ukufika, siza kubona ukwanda kwemfuno yeengqokelelo-manani ezimalunga noluntu xa lusiya ngokukhula ulawulo ngentando yoninzi.
Apha eAfrika nalapho into yedemokhrasi yinto entsha khona, siza kubona ukwanda okuphawulekayo kwesidingo seenkcukacha-manani zoluntu ngokuye ikhula idemokhrasi.

Apha eAfrika nalapho into yedemokhrasi yinto entsha khona, siza kubona ukwanda okuphawulekayo kwesidingo seenkcukacha-manani zoluntu ngokuye ikhula idemokhrasi.
Kwimeko yaseAfrika, apho idemokhrasi iluluvo lwakutshanje, siya kubona ukwanda okuphawulekayo kwimfuno yeenkcukacha-manani zoluntu njengoko idemokhrasi isendela.
Iingcali kwinzululwazi ngengqokelela yamanani zingabagcini beyedemokhrasi imimiselo engenazimfihlelo kumlinganiselo nakwindlela yokufikelela , lilonke ziyalumela uxanduva olujongene nazo.
Abacwangcisi beenkcukacha-manani ngabagcini beenqobo zedemokhrasi zokuba selubala ngokomlinganiselo nangokufikeleleka, kwanangokunika iimpendulo.
Iingcali zeenkcukacha-manani ngabalondolozi beenqobo zedemokrasi zokwenza izinto elubala kwimilinganiselo nofikelelo, ngako oko nokuba noxanduva.
Iingcali ngeengqokelelo-manani zingabagcini bemithetho-siseko yentembeko yemilinganiselo nofikelelo, ngoko ke nokuphendula ngezenzo zazo.
Abacwangcisi beenkcukacha-manani ngabagcini beenqobo zedemokhrasi zokuba selubala ngokomlinganiselo nangokufikeleleka, kwanangokunika iimpendulo.
Iingcali zeenkcukacha-manani ngabalondolozi beenqobo zedemokrasi zokwenza izinto elubala kwimilinganiselo nofikelelo, ngako oko nokuba noxanduva.
Iingcali ngeengqokelelo-manani zingabagcini bemithetho-siseko yentembeko yemilinganiselo nofikelelo, ngoko ke nokuphendula ngezenzo zazo.

Abacwangcisi beenkcukacha-manani ngabagcini beenqobo zedemokhrasi zokuba selubala ngokomlinganiselo nangokufikeleleka, kwanangokunika iimpendulo.
Iingcali ngeengqokelelo-manani zingabagcini bemithetho-siseko yentembeko yemilinganiselo nofikelelo, ngoko ke nokuphendula ngezenzo zazo.
Iingcali kwinzululwazi ngengqokelela yamanani zingabagcini beyedemokhrasi imimiselo engenazimfihlelo kumlinganiselo nakwindlela yokufikelela , lilonke ziyalumela uxanduva olujongene nazo.
Abacwangcisi beenkcukacha-manani ngabagcini beenqobo zedemokhrasi zokuba selubala ngokomlinganiselo nangokufikeleleka, kwanangokunika iimpendulo.
Iingcali zeenkcukacha-manani ngabalondolozi beenqobo zedemokrasi zokwenza izinto elubala kwimilinganiselo nofikelelo, ngako oko nokuba noxanduva.
Loo nto yeyona isemngciphekweni xa kuphehlwa indlela yokuphuculwa kobuchule kwingqokelela yamanani, ukuphuhliswa kwala maziko emfundo afunekayo, kwenzelwa ukwanda okukhawulezayo  nokumandla ngokufundiswa  kweenkcukacha zaseburhulumenteni.
Oko kokona kusemngciphekweni xa kujongenwe nokukhuliswa kweengcali zeenkcukacha-manani, kwanokuphuhlisa amaziko adingekayo kulwandiso olumandla nolukhawulezileyo malunga kokufundisa ngeenkcukacha zaseburhulumenteni. 
Yiyo into engundoqo kwimfuno yokwandisa isakhono seenkcukacha-manani, nokuphuhlisa amaziko afunekayo ukwenzela ukwanda okukhulu nokukhawulezayo ekufundiseni oovimba  bakarhulumente beenkcukacha.
Oko kuphambili kwinzondelelo yokwanda kwesakhono seengqokelelo-manani, nakuphuhliso lwamaziko afuneka kulwandiso olubanzi nolukhawulezayo ekufundiseni ngeenkcukacha eziqokelelweyo zaseburhulumenteni.
Oko kokona kusemngciphekweni xa kujongenwe nokukhuliswa kweengcali zeenkcukacha-manani, kwanokuphuhlisa amaziko adingekayo kulwandiso olumandla nolukhawulezileyo malunga kokufundisa ngeenkcukacha zaseburhulumenteni. 
Yiyo into engundoqo kwimfuno yokwandisa isakhono seenkcukacha-manani, nokuphuhlisa amaziko afunekayo ukwenzela ukwanda okukhulu nokukhawulezayo ekufundiseni oovimba  bakarhulumente beenkcukacha.
Oko kuphambili kwinzondelelo yokwanda kwesakhono seengqokelelo-manani, nakuphuhliso lwamaziko afuneka kulwandiso olubanzi nolukhawulezayo ekufundiseni ngeenkcukacha eziqokelelweyo zaseburhulumenteni.
Loo nto yeyona isemngciphekweni xa kuphehlwa indlela yokuphuculwa kobuchule kwingqokelela yamanani, ukuphuhliswa kwala maziko emfundo afunekayo, kwenzelwa ukwanda okukhawulezayo  nokumandla ngokufundiswa  kweenkcukacha zaseburhulumenteni.
Yiyo into engundoqo kwimfuno yokwandisa isakhono seenkcukacha-manani, nokuphuhlisa amaziko afunekayo ukwenzela ukwanda okukhulu nokukhawulezayo ekufundiseni oovimba  bakarhulumente beenkcukacha.
Oko kuphambili kwinzondelelo yokwanda kwesakhono seengqokelelo-manani, nakuphuhliso lwamaziko afuneka kulwandiso olubanzi nolukhawulezayo ekufundiseni ngeenkcukacha eziqokelelweyo zaseburhulumenteni.

Oko kokona kusemngciphekweni xa kujongenwe nokukhuliswa kweengcali zeenkcukacha-manani, kwanokuphuhlisa amaziko adingekayo kulwandiso olumandla nolukhawulezileyo malunga kokufundisa ngeenkcukacha zaseburhulumenteni. 
Oko kuphambili kwinzondelelo yokwanda kwesakhono seengqokelelo-manani, nakuphuhliso lwamaziko afuneka kulwandiso olubanzi nolukhawulezayo ekufundiseni ngeenkcukacha eziqokelelweyo zaseburhulumenteni.
Loo nto yeyona isemngciphekweni xa kuphehlwa indlela yokuphuculwa kobuchule kwingqokelela yamanani, ukuphuhliswa kwala maziko emfundo afunekayo, kwenzelwa ukwanda okukhawulezayo  nokumandla ngokufundiswa  kweenkcukacha zaseburhulumenteni.
Oko kokona kusemngciphekweni xa kujongenwe nokukhuliswa kweengcali zeenkcukacha-manani, kwanokuphuhlisa amaziko adingekayo kulwandiso olumandla nolukhawulezileyo malunga kokufundisa ngeenkcukacha zaseburhulumenteni. 
Yiyo into engundoqo kwimfuno yokwandisa isakhono seenkcukacha-manani, nokuphuhlisa amaziko afunekayo ukwenzela ukwanda okukhulu nokukhawulezayo ekufundiseni oovimba  bakarhulumente beenkcukacha.
 UPali Lehohla yingcali-jikelele ngengqokelela yamanani, ungumphathi weNkonzo yoMzantsi Afrika yeNgqokelela yamanani.  
UPali Lehohla ngumcwangcisi-manani jikelele kwanengqonyela ye-Stats SA.
U-Pali Lehohla ngusonkcukacha-manani jikelele nentloko yeziko leeNkcukacha-manani laseMzantsi Afrika.
UPali Lehohla ngunjengele wenzululwazi yengqokelelo-manani nentloko yeziko laseMzantsi Afrika leNgqokelelo-manani.
UPali Lehohla ngumcwangcisi-manani jikelele kwanengqonyela ye-Stats SA.
U-Pali Lehohla ngusonkcukacha-manani jikelele nentloko yeziko leeNkcukacha-manani laseMzantsi Afrika.
UPali Lehohla ngunjengele wenzululwazi yengqokelelo-manani nentloko yeziko laseMzantsi Afrika leNgqokelelo-manani.
 UPali Lehohla yingcali-jikelele ngengqokelela yamanani, ungumphathi weNkonzo yoMzantsi Afrika yeNgqokelela yamanani.  
U-Pali Lehohla ngusonkcukacha-manani jikelele nentloko yeziko leeNkcukacha-manani laseMzantsi Afrika.
UPali Lehohla ngunjengele wenzululwazi yengqokelelo-manani nentloko yeziko laseMzantsi Afrika leNgqokelelo-manani.
 UPali Lehohla yingcali-jikelele ngengqokelela yamanani, ungumphathi weNkonzo yoMzantsi Afrika yeNgqokelela yamanani.  
UPali Lehohla ngumcwangcisi-manani jikelele kwanengqonyela ye-Stats SA.
UPali Lehohla ngunjengele wenzululwazi yengqokelelo-manani nentloko yeziko laseMzantsi Afrika leNgqokelelo-manani.
 UPali Lehohla yingcali-jikelele ngengqokelela yamanani, ungumphathi weNkonzo yoMzantsi Afrika yeNgqokelela yamanani.  
UPali Lehohla ngumcwangcisi-manani jikelele kwanengqonyela ye-Stats SA.
U-Pali Lehohla ngusonkcukacha-manani jikelele nentloko yeziko leeNkcukacha-manani laseMzantsi Afrika.
 Ukuze nifumane  olunye ulwazi ngeNkonzo yoMzantsi Afrika yeNgqokelela yamanani nangeemveliso zayo, tyelela u-www.statssa.gov.za okanye fowunela u-(012) 310-8600.
Ukuze ufumane iinkcukacha ezithe vetshe malunga ne-Stats SA kunye noko ekwenzayo, ngena ku- www.statssa.gov.za okanye ufowunele ku-(012) 310-8600
Malunga nolwazi olongezelelweyo ngeziko leeNkcukacha-manani laseMzantsi Afrika neemveliso zalo, tyelela apha www.statssa.gov.za okanye tsalela umnxeba apha (012) 310-8600
Ngolwazi oluthe vetshe ngeziko laseMzantsi Afrika leNgqokelelo-manani kunye nemisebenzi yayo, tyelela apha www.statssa.gov.za okanye tsalela umnxeba apha (012) 310-8600

IiNtsuku ezili-16 zokuba liTshantliziyo:  ubusazi na?
IiNtsuku ezili-16 zoKuthatha amanyathelo: Ubusazi na?
IiNtsuku zobuQuquzeleli bePolitiki ezili-16: ingaba ubusazi?
Iintsuku ezili-16 zoMzabalazo: ubusazi?
IiNtsuku ezili-16 zoKuthatha amanyathelo: Ubusazi na?

IiNtsuku ezili-16 zokuba liTshantliziyo:  ubusazi na?
IiNtsuku ezili-16 zoKuthatha amanyathelo: Ubusazi na?
IiNtsuku zobuQuquzeleli bePolitiki ezili-16: ingaba ubusazi?
Ukususela ngowe-1994 uRhulumente uqulunqe uwiso-mthetho lokulungisa okungalunganga okuchaphazela abantu ababhinqileyo nabantwana.
Ukususela ngo-1994, uRhulumente waseka umthetho wokuhlangabezana nezinto ezigwenxa ezichaphazela amabhinqa nabantwana.
Ukusuka ngowe-1994, uRhulumente uphuhlise umthetho wokulungisa izinto eziphosakeleyo ezichaphazela abasetyhini nabantwana.
Ukususela ngo-1994, uRhulumente uphuhlise uwiso-mthetho lokulungiswa kweemeko ezingalunganga ezichaphazela amabhinqa nabantwana.
Ukususela ngo-1994, uRhulumente waseka umthetho wokuhlangabezana nezinto ezigwenxa ezichaphazela amabhinqa nabantwana.
Ukusuka ngowe-1994, uRhulumente uphuhlise umthetho wokulungisa izinto eziphosakeleyo ezichaphazela abasetyhini nabantwana.
Ukususela ngo-1994, uRhulumente uphuhlise uwiso-mthetho lokulungiswa kweemeko ezingalunganga ezichaphazela amabhinqa nabantwana.
Ukususela ngowe-1994 uRhulumente uqulunqe uwiso-mthetho lokulungisa okungalunganga okuchaphazela abantu ababhinqileyo nabantwana.

Ukususela ngo-1994, uRhulumente uphuhlise uwiso-mthetho lokulungiswa kweemeko ezingalunganga ezichaphazela amabhinqa nabantwana.
Ukususela ngowe-1994 uRhulumente uqulunqe uwiso-mthetho lokulungisa okungalunganga okuchaphazela abantu ababhinqileyo nabantwana.
Ukususela ngo-1994, uRhulumente waseka umthetho wokuhlangabezana nezinto ezigwenxa ezichaphazela amabhinqa nabantwana.
Ukususela ngo-1994, uRhulumente uphuhlise uwiso-mthetho lokulungiswa kweemeko ezingalunganga ezichaphazela amabhinqa nabantwana.
Ukususela ngowe-1994 uRhulumente uqulunqe uwiso-mthetho lokulungisa okungalunganga okuchaphazela abantu ababhinqileyo nabantwana.
Ukususela ngo-1994, uRhulumente waseka umthetho wokuhlangabezana nezinto ezigwenxa ezichaphazela amabhinqa nabantwana.
Ukusuka ngowe-1994, uRhulumente uphuhlise umthetho wokulungisa izinto eziphosakeleyo ezichaphazela abasetyhini nabantwana.
UkuKhuthazwa kokuLingana nokuKhuselwa koMthetho ka-2000 kwaphumeleliswa kuqinisekiswa ukuba wonke umntu uyonwatyiswa ngamalungelo oMgaqo-siseko.
Umthetho wokuKhuthazwa kweMpatho eLinganayo noThintelo loCalucalulo oluneKhethe, ka-2000 wapasiselwa ukuqinisekisa ukuba eonke ubani uyawanandipha amalungelo angokomGaqo-siseko.
UMthetho wokuKhuthaza ukuLingana nokuThintela uCalulo oluneKhethe, wama-2000 waphunyezwa ukuqinisekisa ukuba wonke ubani wonwabela amalungelo oMgaqo-siseko.
Umthetho wokuKhuthazwa kweMpatho eLinganayo noThintelo loCalucalulo oluneKhethe, wango-2000 umiselwe ngenjongo yokuqinisekisa ukuba wonke umntu uyawonwabela amalungelo akuMgaqo-siseko.
Umthetho wokuKhuthazwa kweMpatho eLinganayo noThintelo loCalucalulo oluneKhethe, ka-2000 wapasiselwa ukuqinisekisa ukuba eonke ubani uyawanandipha amalungelo angokomGaqo-siseko.
UMthetho wokuKhuthaza ukuLingana nokuThintela uCalulo oluneKhethe, wama-2000 waphunyezwa ukuqinisekisa ukuba wonke ubani wonwabela amalungelo oMgaqo-siseko.
Umthetho wokuKhuthazwa kweMpatho eLinganayo noThintelo loCalucalulo oluneKhethe, wango-2000 umiselwe ngenjongo yokuqinisekisa ukuba wonke umntu uyawonwabela amalungelo akuMgaqo-siseko.

Lo Mthetho uyaqinisekisa ukuba abantu ababhinqileyo bonwatyiswa ngokulinganayo ngamalungelo nangeenkululeko, injongo kukuhlangabezana nokungalunganga kweminyaka eyadlulayo.
Lo Mthetho uqinisekisa ukuba amabhinqa awanandipha ngokulinganayo amalungelo  kwanenkululeko, ekulungiseni ubugwenza obenziwayo kwixa elidlulileyo.
Lo Mthetho uqinisekisa ukuba abasetyhini banokonwabela okufanayo kwamalungelo neenkululeko, ekulungiseni iziphoso zexesha elidlulileyo.
Lo Mthetho uqinisekisa ukuba amabhinqa awonwabela ngokulinganayo amalungelo neenkululeko, ngokulungiswa kweemeko ezingalunganga zexesha elidlulileyo.
Lo Mthetho uqinisekisa ukuba amabhinqa awanandipha ngokulinganayo amalungelo  kwanenkululeko, ekulungiseni ubugwenza obenziwayo kwixa elidlulileyo.
Lo Mthetho uqinisekisa ukuba abasetyhini banokonwabela okufanayo kwamalungelo neenkululeko, ekulungiseni iziphoso zexesha elidlulileyo.
Lo Mthetho uqinisekisa ukuba amabhinqa awonwabela ngokulinganayo amalungelo neenkululeko, ngokulungiswa kweemeko ezingalunganga zexesha elidlulileyo.
Lo Mthetho uyaqinisekisa ukuba abantu ababhinqileyo bonwatyiswa ngokulinganayo ngamalungelo nangeenkululeko, injongo kukuhlangabezana nokungalunganga kweminyaka eyadlulayo.
Lo Mthetho uqinisekisa ukuba abasetyhini banokonwabela okufanayo kwamalungelo neenkululeko, ekulungiseni iziphoso zexesha elidlulileyo.
Lo Mthetho uqinisekisa ukuba amabhinqa awonwabela ngokulinganayo amalungelo neenkululeko, ngokulungiswa kweemeko ezingalunganga zexesha elidlulileyo.
Lo Mthetho uyaqinisekisa ukuba abantu ababhinqileyo bonwatyiswa ngokulinganayo ngamalungelo nangeenkululeko, injongo kukuhlangabezana nokungalunganga kweminyaka eyadlulayo.
Lo Mthetho uqinisekisa ukuba amabhinqa awanandipha ngokulinganayo amalungelo  kwanenkululeko, ekulungiseni ubugwenza obenziwayo kwixa elidlulileyo.
Lo Mthetho uqinisekisa ukuba amabhinqa awonwabela ngokulinganayo amalungelo neenkululeko, ngokulungiswa kweemeko ezingalunganga zexesha elidlulileyo.
Lo Mthetho uyaqinisekisa ukuba abantu ababhinqileyo bonwatyiswa ngokulinganayo ngamalungelo nangeenkululeko, injongo kukuhlangabezana nokungalunganga kweminyaka eyadlulayo.
Lo Mthetho uqinisekisa ukuba amabhinqa awanandipha ngokulinganayo amalungelo  kwanenkululeko, ekulungiseni ubugwenza obenziwayo kwixa elidlulileyo.
Lo Mthetho uqinisekisa ukuba abasetyhini banokonwabela okufanayo kwamalungelo neenkululeko, ekulungiseni iziphoso zexesha elidlulileyo.
UMthetho ka-1998 wobuLungisa kwindawo yoMsebenzi uyaqinisekisa ukuba kuyapheliswaukucalulwa kwabantu emisebenzini, impangelo nentlawulo apho kusebenzisana abaqeshi nabaphangeli, konke okusisiphumo semithetho yoontamo-lukhuni kuyathintelwa.  
UMthetho wobuLungisa kwiNdawo yeNgqesho, ka-1998 uqinisekisa ukuba kupheliswa ukucalulwa ngokwengqesho, ngokwemisebenzi nangokwemivuzo emisebenzini nokuziziphumo zemithetho yorhulumente wocalulo.
UMthetho woBulungisa kwiNgqesho, we-1998 uqinisekisa ukuba ucalulo kwingqesho, kwisikhundla nengeniso phakathi kwemalike yomsebenzi esisiphumo semithetho yocalucalulo luyapheliswa. 
UMthetho wobuLungisa kwiNdawo yeNgqesho, wango-1998 uqinisekisa ukuba ucalucalulo kwindawo yengqesho, emisebenzini efanayo nakwingeniso kummandla wabasebenzi olwenzeka ngenxa yemithetho yocalucalulo luyacutheka.
UMthetho wobuLungisa kwiNdawo yeNgqesho, ka-1998 uqinisekisa ukuba kupheliswa ukucalulwa ngokwengqesho, ngokwemisebenzi nangokwemivuzo emisebenzini nokuziziphumo zemithetho yorhulumente wocalulo.
UMthetho woBulungisa kwiNgqesho, we-1998 uqinisekisa ukuba ucalulo kwingqesho, kwisikhundla nengeniso phakathi kwemalike yomsebenzi esisiphumo semithetho yocalucalulo luyapheliswa. 
UMthetho wobuLungisa kwiNdawo yeNgqesho, wango-1998 uqinisekisa ukuba ucalucalulo kwindawo yengqesho, emisebenzini efanayo nakwingeniso kummandla wabasebenzi olwenzeka ngenxa yemithetho yocalucalulo luyacutheka.
UMthetho ka-1998 wobuLungisa kwindawo yoMsebenzi uyaqinisekisa ukuba kuyapheliswaukucalulwa kwabantu emisebenzini, impangelo nentlawulo apho kusebenzisana abaqeshi nabaphangeli, konke okusisiphumo semithetho yoontamo-lukhuni kuyathintelwa.  
UMthetho woBulungisa kwiNgqesho, we-1998 uqinisekisa ukuba ucalulo kwingqesho, kwisikhundla nengeniso phakathi kwemalike yomsebenzi esisiphumo semithetho yocalucalulo luyapheliswa. 
UMthetho wobuLungisa kwiNdawo yeNgqesho, wango-1998 uqinisekisa ukuba ucalucalulo kwindawo yengqesho, emisebenzini efanayo nakwingeniso kummandla wabasebenzi olwenzeka ngenxa yemithetho yocalucalulo luyacutheka.
UMthetho ka-1998 wobuLungisa kwindawo yoMsebenzi uyaqinisekisa ukuba kuyapheliswaukucalulwa kwabantu emisebenzini, impangelo nentlawulo apho kusebenzisana abaqeshi nabaphangeli, konke okusisiphumo semithetho yoontamo-lukhuni kuyathintelwa.  
UMthetho wobuLungisa kwiNdawo yeNgqesho, ka-1998 uqinisekisa ukuba kupheliswa ukucalulwa ngokwengqesho, ngokwemisebenzi nangokwemivuzo emisebenzini nokuziziphumo zemithetho yorhulumente wocalulo.
UMthetho wobuLungisa kwiNdawo yeNgqesho, wango-1998 uqinisekisa ukuba ucalucalulo kwindawo yengqesho, emisebenzini efanayo nakwingeniso kummandla wabasebenzi olwenzeka ngenxa yemithetho yocalucalulo luyacutheka.
UMthetho ka-1998 wobuLungisa kwindawo yoMsebenzi uyaqinisekisa ukuba kuyapheliswaukucalulwa kwabantu emisebenzini, impangelo nentlawulo apho kusebenzisana abaqeshi nabaphangeli, konke okusisiphumo semithetho yoontamo-lukhuni kuyathintelwa.  
UMthetho wobuLungisa kwiNdawo yeNgqesho, ka-1998 uqinisekisa ukuba kupheliswa ukucalulwa ngokwengqesho, ngokwemisebenzi nangokwemivuzo emisebenzini nokuziziphumo zemithetho yorhulumente wocalulo.
UMthetho woBulungisa kwiNgqesho, we-1998 uqinisekisa ukuba ucalulo kwingqesho, kwisikhundla nengeniso phakathi kwemalike yomsebenzi esisiphumo semithetho yocalucalulo luyapheliswa. 
Ukhuthaza ukumelwa ngobulungisa kwabantu ababhinqileyo nabanye abantu ababehlelelekile ngokwembali kuwo onke amacandelo eenkampani zikarhulumente nawezabucala. 
Ukwakhuthaza ukubandakanywa ngokulinganayo kwamabhinqa kwanabo babesaya kucalulwa kuwo onke amanqanaba oluntu nawamaqumrhu abucala.
Ukhuthaza ubumeli obunobulungisa babantu basetyhini kwanabanye ababefudula bebandezwa ngokwembali kuyo yonke imigangatho yoluntu nemibutho yabucala.
Ukhuthaza ukuqeshwa ngobulungisa kwamabhinqa nabanye abantu abebehlelelekile kwithuba elingaphambili kuwo onke amanqanaba amaqumrhu karhulumente nawabucala. 
Ukwakhuthaza ukubandakanywa ngokulinganayo kwamabhinqa kwanabo babesaya kucalulwa kuwo onke amanqanaba oluntu nawamaqumrhu abucala.
Ukhuthaza ubumeli obunobulungisa babantu basetyhini kwanabanye ababefudula bebandezwa ngokwembali kuyo yonke imigangatho yoluntu nemibutho yabucala.
Ukhuthaza ukuqeshwa ngobulungisa kwamabhinqa nabanye abantu abebehlelelekile kwithuba elingaphambili kuwo onke amanqanaba amaqumrhu karhulumente nawabucala. 
Ukhuthaza ukumelwa ngobulungisa kwabantu ababhinqileyo nabanye abantu ababehlelelekile ngokwembali kuwo onke amacandelo eenkampani zikarhulumente nawezabucala. 
Ukhuthaza ubumeli obunobulungisa babantu basetyhini kwanabanye ababefudula bebandezwa ngokwembali kuyo yonke imigangatho yoluntu nemibutho yabucala.
Ukhuthaza ukuqeshwa ngobulungisa kwamabhinqa nabanye abantu abebehlelelekile kwithuba elingaphambili kuwo onke amanqanaba amaqumrhu karhulumente nawabucala. 
Ukhuthaza ukumelwa ngobulungisa kwabantu ababhinqileyo nabanye abantu ababehlelelekile ngokwembali kuwo onke amacandelo eenkampani zikarhulumente nawezabucala. 
Ukwakhuthaza ukubandakanywa ngokulinganayo kwamabhinqa kwanabo babesaya kucalulwa kuwo onke amanqanaba oluntu nawamaqumrhu abucala.
Ukhuthaza ukuqeshwa ngobulungisa kwamabhinqa nabanye abantu abebehlelelekile kwithuba elingaphambili kuwo onke amanqanaba amaqumrhu karhulumente nawabucala. 
Ukhuthaza ukumelwa ngobulungisa kwabantu ababhinqileyo nabanye abantu ababehlelelekile ngokwembali kuwo onke amacandelo eenkampani zikarhulumente nawezabucala. 
Ukwakhuthaza ukubandakanywa ngokulinganayo kwamabhinqa kwanabo babesaya kucalulwa kuwo onke amanqanaba oluntu nawamaqumrhu abucala.
Ukhuthaza ubumeli obunobulungisa babantu basetyhini kwanabanye ababefudula bebandezwa ngokwembali kuyo yonke imigangatho yoluntu nemibutho yabucala.
UMthetho weSondlo ka-1998 uyaqinisekisa ngamalungelo omntwana angumgangatho wokuphilaokufanele uphuhliso lomzimba, lwengqondo, lomphefumlo  nolwentlalo. 
UMthetho weSondlo, ka-1998 uqinisekisa ngamalungelo omntwana okufumana izinga elifanelekileyo lokuphila ngokuphathelele ngokwasemzimbeni, ngokwasengqondweni, ngokwasemoyeni nangokwentlalo.
UMthetho woLondolozo, we-1998 uqinisekisa amalungelo omntwana kumgangatho wokuphila owaneleyo ukwenzela uphuhliso lomzimba, lwengqondo, lomphemfumlo nolwentlalo. 
UMthetho weSondlo, wango-1998 uqinisekisa amalungelo omntwana okuba semgangathweni wokuphila owanele uphuhliso lomzimba, lwengqondo, lomoya nolwentlalo.
UMthetho weSondlo, ka-1998 uqinisekisa ngamalungelo omntwana okufumana izinga elifanelekileyo lokuphila ngokuphathelele ngokwasemzimbeni, ngokwasengqondweni, ngokwasemoyeni nangokwentlalo.
UMthetho woLondolozo, we-1998 uqinisekisa amalungelo omntwana kumgangatho wokuphila owaneleyo ukwenzela uphuhliso lomzimba, lwengqondo, lomphemfumlo nolwentlalo. 
UMthetho weSondlo, wango-1998 uqinisekisa amalungelo omntwana okuba semgangathweni wokuphila owanele uphuhliso lomzimba, lwengqondo, lomoya nolwentlalo.
UMthetho weSondlo ka-1998 uyaqinisekisa ngamalungelo omntwana angumgangatho wokuphilaokufanele uphuhliso lomzimba, lwengqondo, lomphefumlo  nolwentlalo.

Lo Mthetho uyaqinisekisa ukuba isondlo umntwana uyasifumana kubazali bakhe okanye kwabanye abantu abanoxanduva lokumsindleka ngezimali.
Lo mthetho uqinisekisa ukuba ukunakekelwa komntwana kuyafumaneka kubazali okanye kwabanye abantu ukuze bafezekise iimfanelo zokunakekela umntwana ngokwasezimalini.
UMthetho uqinisekisa ukuba ulondolozo lomntwana luyafunyanwa kubazali okanye abanye abantu abanoxanduva ngokwezemali malunga nomntwana.
UMthetho uqinisekisa ukuba imali yesondlo somntwana ifumaneka ebazalini okanye ebantwini abanoxanduva loncedo lwemali yomntwana.
Lo mthetho uqinisekisa ukuba ukunakekelwa komntwana kuyafumaneka kubazali okanye kwabanye abantu ukuze bafezekise iimfanelo zokunakekela umntwana ngokwasezimalini.
UMthetho uqinisekisa ukuba ulondolozo lomntwana luyafunyanwa kubazali okanye abanye abantu abanoxanduva ngokwezemali malunga nomntwana.
UMthetho uqinisekisa ukuba imali yesondlo somntwana ifumaneka ebazalini okanye ebantwini abanoxanduva loncedo lwemali yomntwana.

UMthetho ka-1998 ojongene nobuNdlobongela obusetyenziswayo kwiiNtsapho, wawiswa ngokomthetho ukuze abo basindileyo emva kokuphathwa  gadalala bakhuselwe ngokumandlakwimpatho-gadalala abayifumanayo kumakhaya abo. 
UMthetho wobuNdlobongela baseKhaya, ka-1998 yasungulelwa ukunikezela kumaxhoba okuhlukunyezwa ngolona khuseleko malunga lokuhlukunyezwa ekhaya.  
UMthetho woDushe lwaseKhaya, we-1998 waphunyezwa ukubonelela abasinde kudushe olona khuselo lukhulu kwimpatho-mbi yasekhaya. 
UMthetho wobuNdlobongela baseKhaya, wango-1998 wawiswa ngenjongo yokunika amaxhoba asinde kubundlobongela ukhuselo olulolona luphezulu ekuxhatshazweni ekhaya.
UMthetho wobuNdlobongela baseKhaya, ka-1998 yasungulelwa ukunikezela kumaxhoba okuhlukunyezwa ngolona khuseleko malunga lokuhlukunyezwa ekhaya.  
UMthetho woDushe lwaseKhaya, we-1998 waphunyezwa ukubonelela abasinde kudushe olona khuselo lukhulu kwimpatho-mbi yasekhaya. 
UMthetho wobuNdlobongela baseKhaya, wango-1998 wawiswa ngenjongo yokunika amaxhoba asinde kubundlobongela ukhuselo olulolona luphezulu ekuxhatshazweni ekhaya.

UMthetho wobuNdlobongela baseKhaya, ka-1998 yasungulelwa ukunikezela kumaxhoba okuhlukunyezwa ngolona khuseleko malunga lokuhlukunyezwa ekhaya.  
UMthetho woDushe lwaseKhaya, we-1998 waphunyezwa ukubonelela abasinde kudushe olona khuselo lukhulu kwimpatho-mbi yasekhaya. 
Abantu ababhinqileyo, abangabona baluvayo ulwamvila lwempatho-gadalala bekumakhaya abo, ngoku banoncedo olusemthethweni oluza kuqinisekisa ngokhuseleko lwabo.
Amabhinqa, ahlukunyezwayo ekhaya, ngoku anomthetho oqinisekisa ngokhuseleko lwabo.
Abasetyhini, abazizisulu zodushe lwasekhaya, ngoku banoncedo lomthetho oluya kuqinisekisa ukhuselo lwabo.
Amabhinqa, azizisulu zobundlobongela basekhaya, ngoku anoncedo lwasemthethweni oluya kuqinisekisa ukhuselo lwawo.
Amabhinqa, ahlukunyezwayo ekhaya, ngoku anomthetho oqinisekisa ngokhuseleko lwabo.
Abasetyhini, abazizisulu zodushe lwasekhaya, ngoku banoncedo lomthetho oluya kuqinisekisa ukhuselo lwabo.
Amabhinqa, azizisulu zobundlobongela basekhaya, ngoku anoncedo lwasemthethweni oluya kuqinisekisa ukhuselo lwawo.

Abasetyhini, abazizisulu zodushe lwasekhaya, ngoku banoncedo lomthetho oluya kuqinisekisa ukhuselo lwabo.
UMthetho ka-2005 ojongene naBantwana kunye noMthetho ka-2007 wesiLungiso ojongene naBantwana, owathi phakathi kweminye, wakhusela abantwana abangondlekanga, abangahoywanga, abaphathwa gadalala okanye abafakwa ehlazweni. 
UMthetho wokuvikelwa kwabaNtwana ka-2005 kunye noMthetho oLungisiweyo wabaNtwana, ka-2007 phakathi kwezinye zezinto eyasungulelwa zona kukukhusela abantwana ekuphathweni gadalala, ekubeni bangahoywa, ekuhlukunyezweni okanye ekucekelweni phantsi.
UMthetho waBantwana, wama-2005 noMthetho waBantwana oLungiswayo, wama-2007 uyilwe ukuba phakathi kwezinye izinto, ukhusele umntwana kwimpatho embi, ukungahoywa, ukunyeliswa okanye ukuthotywa.
UMthetho wabaNtwana, wango-2005 kunye noMthetho oLungisiweyo wabaNtwana, wango-2007 wawiselwa ukuba, phakathi kwezinye ezinto, ukhusele umntwana ekuphathweni kakubi, ekubeni angahoywa, ekuxhatshazweni okanye ekuhlazisweni.
UMthetho wokuvikelwa kwabaNtwana ka-2005 kunye noMthetho oLungisiweyo wabaNtwana, ka-2007 phakathi kwezinye zezinto eyasungulelwa zona kukukhusela abantwana ekuphathweni gadalala, ekubeni bangahoywa, ekuhlukunyezweni okanye ekucekelweni phantsi.
UMthetho waBantwana, wama-2005 noMthetho waBantwana oLungiswayo, wama-2007 uyilwe ukuba phakathi kwezinye izinto, ukhusele umntwana kwimpatho embi, ukungahoywa, ukunyeliswa okanye ukuthotywa.
UMthetho wabaNtwana, wango-2005 kunye noMthetho oLungisiweyo wabaNtwana, wango-2007 wawiselwa ukuba, phakathi kwezinye ezinto, ukhusele umntwana ekuphathweni kakubi, ekubeni angahoywa, ekuxhatshazweni okanye ekuhlazisweni.

UMthetho waBantwana, wama-2005 noMthetho waBantwana oLungiswayo, wama-2007 uyilwe ukuba phakathi kwezinye izinto, ukhusele umntwana kwimpatho embi, ukungahoywa, ukunyeliswa okanye ukuthotywa.
URhulumente sele esebenzise waza waxhasa iindlela ezininzi zokulamla ezikhusela isidima sabantu abangabafazi kunye nabantwana.
Urhulumente useke waze wanika inkxaso amanyathelo aliqela okungenelela nakhusela isidima somntu olibhinqa nabantwana.
Urhulumente uphumeze nokuxhasa amancedo amaninzi akhusela isidima sobuntu sabasetyhini nesabantwana.
Urhulumente uphumeze kwaye uxhase amalinge amaninzi ongenelelo akhusela isidima sabantu abangamabhinqa nabantwana.
Urhulumente useke waze wanika inkxaso amanyathelo aliqela okungenelela nakhusela isidima somntu olibhinqa nabantwana.
Urhulumente uphumeze nokuxhasa amancedo amaninzi akhusela isidima sobuntu sabasetyhini nesabantwana.
Urhulumente uphumeze kwaye uxhase amalinge amaninzi ongenelelo akhusela isidima sabantu abangamabhinqa nabantwana.
URhulumente sele esebenzise waza waxhasa iindlela ezininzi zokulamla ezikhusela isidima sabantu abangabafazi kunye nabantwana.

Urhulumente uphumeze kwaye uxhase amalinge amaninzi ongenelelo akhusela isidima sabantu abangamabhinqa nabantwana.
URhulumente sele esebenzise waza waxhasa iindlela ezininzi zokulamla ezikhusela isidima sabantu abangabafazi kunye nabantwana.
Urhulumente useke waze wanika inkxaso amanyathelo aliqela okungenelela nakhusela isidima somntu olibhinqa nabantwana.
Urhulumente uphumeze nokuxhasa amancedo amaninzi akhusela isidima sobuntu sabasetyhini nesabantwana.
UXwebhu lwamaLungelo aBantwana luyaphononongwa kwaye luyahlaziywa ukuze kuqukwe nemingeni evelayo efana nokusetyenziswa kwabantwana njengamaxhoba emifanekiso nemizobo yoburheletya.
UMqulu waMalungelo Abantwana uahlaziywa ukuze uquke eminye imingeni evelayo efana nokusetyenziswa kwabantwana  kwimibukiso yokwabelana ngesondo kwanokubukeliswa kwabantwana imiboniso yabantu ababelana ngesondo.
ITshata yaMalungelo aBantwana iyahlolwa yaye ihlaziyiwe ukuba kananjalo iquke imiceli-mngeni emitsha efana nokusebenzisa abantwana njengezisetyenziswa zoburheletya nokubeka abantwana esichengeni sezinto zoburheletya.
UXwebhu lwamaLungelo abaNtwana luyaphengululwa futhi luyahlaziywa ukuze luquke imingeni emitsha efana nokusetyenziswa kwabantwana njengezixhobo zoburheletya nokuba sesichengeni kwabantwana kwiimveliso zoburheletya.
UMqulu waMalungelo Abantwana uahlaziywa ukuze uquke eminye imingeni evelayo efana nokusetyenziswa kwabantwana  kwimibukiso yokwabelana ngesondo kwanokubukeliswa kwabantwana imiboniso yabantu ababelana ngesondo.
ITshata yaMalungelo aBantwana iyahlolwa yaye ihlaziyiwe ukuba kananjalo iquke imiceli-mngeni emitsha efana nokusebenzisa abantwana njengezisetyenziswa zoburheletya nokubeka abantwana esichengeni sezinto zoburheletya.
UXwebhu lwamaLungelo abaNtwana luyaphengululwa futhi luyahlaziywa ukuze luquke imingeni emitsha efana nokusetyenziswa kwabantwana njengezixhobo zoburheletya nokuba sesichengeni kwabantwana kwiimveliso zoburheletya.

ITshata yaMalungelo aBantwana iyahlolwa yaye ihlaziyiwe ukuba kananjalo iquke imiceli-mngeni emitsha efana nokusebenzisa abantwana njengezisetyenziswa zoburheletya nokubeka abantwana esichengeni sezinto zoburheletya.

UMqulu waMalungelo Abantwana uahlaziywa ukuze uquke eminye imingeni evelayo efana nokusetyenziswa kwabantwana  kwimibukiso yokwabelana ngesondo kwanokubukeliswa kwabantwana imiboniso yabantu ababelana ngesondo.
UXwebhu lwamaLungelo abaNtwana luyaphengululwa futhi luyahlaziywa ukuze luquke imingeni emitsha efana nokusetyenziswa kwabantwana njengezixhobo zoburheletya nokuba sesichengeni kwabantwana kwiimveliso zoburheletya.
UXwebhu lwamaLungelo aBantwana luyaphononongwa kwaye luyahlaziywa ukuze kuqukwe nemingeni evelayo efana nokusetyenziswa kwabantwana njengamaxhoba emifanekiso nemizobo yoburheletya.
UMqulu waMalungelo Abantwana uahlaziywa ukuze uquke eminye imingeni evelayo efana nokusetyenziswa kwabantwana  kwimibukiso yokwabelana ngesondo kwanokubukeliswa kwabantwana imiboniso yabantu ababelana ngesondo.
ITshata yaMalungelo aBantwana iyahlolwa yaye ihlaziyiwe ukuba kananjalo iquke imiceli-mngeni emitsha efana nokusebenzisa abantwana njengezisetyenziswa zoburheletya nokubeka abantwana esichengeni sezinto zoburheletya.
URhulumente uwusabele umngeni wokunyanzelwa kwabantwana ukuba batshate nabantu abadala kunabo phantsi kwamampunge okusetyenziswa kwesithethe ekuthiwa  “kukuthwala”.
Urhulumente uye wasabela kumngeni wokwendiswa ngenkani kwabantwana besendiselwa ebantwini abadala kusetyenziswa isiko “Ukuthwala”.
URhulumente usabele kumngeni wokutshatisa abantwana ngenkani kubantu abadala phantsi kokusithela ngesiko elibizwa "Ukuthwala". 
Urhulumente uphendule ngomngeni wemitshato enyanzeliswayo yabantwana besendiselwa ebantwini abadala phantsi kwesebe lokusithela lesiko elibizwa ngokuthi “Kukuthwala”.
Urhulumente uye wasabela kumngeni wokwendiswa ngenkani kwabantwana besendiselwa ebantwini abadala kusetyenziswa isiko “Ukuthwala”.
URhulumente usabele kumngeni wokutshatisa abantwana ngenkani kubantu abadala phantsi kokusithela ngesiko elibizwa "Ukuthwala".

URhulumente uzimisele ekuqinisekiseni ukuba izithethe kunye neminye imimiselo yesizwe, zonke ziyahambelananoMgaqo-siseko kunye nowise-mthetho olusetyenziswayo.
Urhulumente uzinikezele ekuqinisekiseni ukuba amasiko kunye nezinye izithethe ziyahambelana noMgaqo-siseko kwanokuba ayangqinelana nemithetho esekiweyo.
URhulumente uzibophelele ukuqinisekisa ukuba iinkqubo zesiko nezinye zihambelana noMgaqo-siseko yaye zihambelana nomthetho.
Urhulumente uzinikele ekuqinisekiseni ukuba amasiko nezinye izenzo ziyawuthobela uMgaqo-siseko nowiso-mthetho olufanelekileyo.
Urhulumente uzinikezele ekuqinisekiseni ukuba amasiko kunye nezinye izithethe ziyahambelana noMgaqo-siseko kwanokuba ayangqinelana nemithetho esekiweyo.
URhulumente uzibophelele ukuqinisekisa ukuba iinkqubo zesiko nezinye zihambelana noMgaqo-siseko yaye zihambelana nomthetho.
Urhulumente uzinikele ekuqinisekiseni ukuba amasiko nezinye izenzo ziyawuthobela uMgaqo-siseko nowiso-mthetho olufanelekileyo.
URhulumente uzimisele ekuqinisekiseni ukuba izithethe kunye neminye imimiselo yesizwe, zonke ziyahambelananoMgaqo-siseko kunye nowise-mthetho olusetyenziswayo.

URhulumente uzimisele ekuqinisekiseni ukuba izithethe kunye neminye imimiselo yesizwe, zonke ziyahambelananoMgaqo-siseko kunye nowise-mthetho olusetyenziswayo.
Urhulumente uzinikezele ekuqinisekiseni ukuba amasiko kunye nezinye izithethe ziyahambelana noMgaqo-siseko kwanokuba ayangqinelana nemithetho esekiweyo.
URhulumente uzibophelele ukuqinisekisa ukuba iinkqubo zesiko nezinye zihambelana noMgaqo-siseko yaye zihambelana nomthetho.
Le nkqubo iqaliselwe ukuseka kwakhona amacandelo amapolisa akhethekileyo, aqwalasele amatyala obundlobongela obenziwayo kumakhaya nakwezesondo, nolunye ulwaphulo-mthetho olwenziwayo kubantu ababhinqileyo nasebantwaneni.
Inkqubo sele iqalisiwe yokuvuselela iiyunithi ezikhethekileyo zamapolisa ajongene namatyala asekhaya nawezesondo kwanamanye amatyala ajoliswe kumabhinqa nasebantwaneni. 
Inkqubo iyaqulunqwa yokuseka kwakhona imibutho ekhethekileyo yamapolisa ajongana nezenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho ezingqamene nezenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho zasekhaya nezesondo nezinye iimeko zolwaphulo-mthetho ezibhekiswe kwabasetyhini nabantwana. 
Isendleleni inkqubo yokuseka ngokutsha amacandelo amapolisa ohlobo olulodwa aphatha izenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho ezimalunga neziphakathi kwezini nezinye iintlobo zolwaphulo-mthetho malunga namabhinqa nabantwana.
Inkqubo sele iqalisiwe yokuvuselela iiyunithi ezikhethekileyo zamapolisa ajongene namatyala asekhaya nawezesondo kwanamanye amatyala ajoliswe kumabhinqa nasebantwaneni. 
Inkqubo iyaqulunqwa yokuseka kwakhona imibutho ekhethekileyo yamapolisa ajongana nezenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho ezingqamene nezenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho zasekhaya nezesondo nezinye iimeko zolwaphulo-mthetho ezibhekiswe kwabasetyhini nabantwana. 
Isendleleni inkqubo yokuseka ngokutsha amacandelo amapolisa ohlobo olulodwa aphatha izenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho ezimalunga neziphakathi kwezini nezinye iintlobo zolwaphulo-mthetho malunga namabhinqa nabantwana.
Le nkqubo iqaliselwe ukuseka kwakhona amacandelo amapolisa akhethekileyo, aqwalasele amatyala obundlobongela obenziwayo kumakhaya nakwezesondo, nolunye ulwaphulo-mthetho olwenziwayo kubantu ababhinqileyo nasebantwaneni.

Isendleleni inkqubo yokuseka ngokutsha amacandelo amapolisa ohlobo olulodwa aphatha izenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho ezimalunga neziphakathi kwezini nezinye iintlobo zolwaphulo-mthetho malunga namabhinqa nabantwana.

Le nkqubo iqaliselwe ukuseka kwakhona amacandelo amapolisa akhethekileyo, aqwalasele amatyala obundlobongela obenziwayo kumakhaya nakwezesondo, nolunye ulwaphulo-mthetho olwenziwayo kubantu ababhinqileyo nasebantwaneni.
Inkqubo sele iqalisiwe yokuvuselela iiyunithi ezikhethekileyo zamapolisa ajongene namatyala asekhaya nawezesondo kwanamanye amatyala ajoliswe kumabhinqa nasebantwaneni. 
Inkqubo iyaqulunqwa yokuseka kwakhona imibutho ekhethekileyo yamapolisa ajongana nezenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho ezingqamene nezenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho zasekhaya nezesondo nezinye iimeko zolwaphulo-mthetho ezibhekiswe kwabasetyhini nabantwana. 
Ukusekwa kwamacandelo akhethekileyo kuza kuhlanganisa ubuqili obufunekayo bokuphucula ezolawulo notshutshiso olunempumelelo kulwaphulo-mthetho olwenziwa kubantu ababhinqileyo nasebantwaneni.   
Ukusekwa kwezi yunithi zikhethekileyo kuzakuyondelelanisa ubuchule nobugcisa obudingekayo ekuphuhliseni ulawulo kwanasekutshutshisweni ngokuyimpumelelo kwamatyala abo bahlukumeza amabhinqa nabantwana.
Ukusekwa kwemibutho ekhethekileyo kuya kusebenzisa ubuchule obufunekayo ukuphakamisa ulawulo nokutshutshisa ngempumelelo iimeko zolwaphulo-mthetho ezichaphazela abasetyhini nabantwana.  
Ukusekwa kwamacandelo ohlobo olulodwa kuya kukhuthaza ubungcaphephe obudingeka ekomelezeni ulawulo kunye nokutshutshiswa okunempumelelo kweziganeko zolwaphulo-mthetho olwenziwa kumabhinqa nasebantwaneni.
Ukusekwa kwezi yunithi zikhethekileyo kuzakuyondelelanisa ubuchule nobugcisa obudingekayo ekuphuhliseni ulawulo kwanasekutshutshisweni ngokuyimpumelelo kwamatyala abo bahlukumeza amabhinqa nabantwana.
Ukusekwa kwemibutho ekhethekileyo kuya kusebenzisa ubuchule obufunekayo ukuphakamisa ulawulo nokutshutshisa ngempumelelo iimeko zolwaphulo-mthetho ezichaphazela abasetyhini nabantwana.  
Ukusekwa kwamacandelo ohlobo olulodwa kuya kukhuthaza ubungcaphephe obudingeka ekomelezeni ulawulo kunye nokutshutshiswa okunempumelelo kweziganeko zolwaphulo-mthetho olwenziwa kumabhinqa nasebantwaneni.

Ukusekwa kwemibutho ekhethekileyo kuya kusebenzisa ubuchule obufunekayo ukuphakamisa ulawulo nokutshutshisa ngempumelelo iimeko zolwaphulo-mthetho ezichaphazela abasetyhini nabantwana.  
Ngalo eli xesha kukho aweThuthuzela amaZiko oNonophelo ali-17 awasekwayo kwimimandla yeli lizwe, leyo inezehlo ezoyikisayo zobundlobongela kwezesondo. 
Ngoku kukho amaziko ali-17 abizwa ngokuthi ngamaZiko Anakekelayo e-Thuthuzeleka nakhoyo kwilizwe ngokubanzi kwiindawo ezineziganeko ezininzi zokuxhatshazwa ngokwesondo.
Njengangoku kukho amaziko ali-17 abizwa amaZiko eNkathalelo ayiThuthuzela asekwe ukucanda ilizwe kubahlali abaneziganeko eziphezulu zodushe lwezesondo. 
Ngoku kukho amaZiko eNkathalo ekuthiwa yiThuthuzela ali-17 asekwe kububanzi belizwe kumaqela oluntu aneziganeko eziphezulu zobundlobongela phakathi kwezini.
Ngoku kukho amaziko ali-17 abizwa ngokuthi ngamaZiko Anakekelayo e-Thuthuzeleka nakhoyo kwilizwe ngokubanzi kwiindawo ezineziganeko ezininzi zokuxhatshazwa ngokwesondo.
Njengangoku kukho amaziko ali-17 abizwa amaZiko eNkathalelo ayiThuthuzela asekwe ukucanda ilizwe kubahlali abaneziganeko eziphezulu zodushe lwezesondo. 
Ngoku kukho amaZiko eNkathalo ekuthiwa yiThuthuzela ali-17 asekwe kububanzi belizwe kumaqela oluntu aneziganeko eziphezulu zobundlobongela phakathi kwezini.

Ngalo eli xesha kukho aweThuthuzela amaZiko oNonophelo ali-17 awasekwayo kwimimandla yeli lizwe, leyo inezehlo ezoyikisayo zobundlobongela kwezesondo. 
Ngoku kukho amaziko ali-17 abizwa ngokuthi ngamaZiko Anakekelayo e-Thuthuzeleka nakhoyo kwilizwe ngokubanzi kwiindawo ezineziganeko ezininzi zokuxhatshazwa ngokwesondo.
Njengangoku kukho amaziko ali-17 abizwa amaZiko eNkathalelo ayiThuthuzela asekwe ukucanda ilizwe kubahlali abaneziganeko eziphezulu zodushe lwezesondo. 
La maZiko abonelela ngeenkonzo zempilo nentlalontle, nangokuqalisa iinkqubo zokunika ingxelo ngendlela esebenzayo, nokutshutshiselwa amatyala kwimeko enesidima nenkathalo, oko kusenziwa ngabatshutshisi abaqeqeshelwe loo msebenzi.  
La amaziko abonelela ngeenkonzo zempilo nezeemeko-bume zize ziqhube neenkqubo zokufakwa kwamatyala nokuchotshelwa kwawo ngokuyimpumelelo nangendlela endilisekileyo phantsi kwemo efanelekileyo ngabantu abakuqeqeshelweyo oko. 
Amaziko abonelela ngeenkonzo zempilo nentlalontle yaye aqalisa iinkqubo ezinempumelelo zokuxela nokutshutshisa izenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho ngendlela enesidima nenkathalelo yokusingqongileyo ziingcali eziqeqeshiweyo.
AmaZiko la anikela ngeenkonzo zempilo nentlalontle aphinde andulule iinkqubo zokunikwa kweengxelo ezifanelekileyo notshutshiso lweziganeko zolwaphulo-mthetho kubume obungqongwe sisidima nenkathalo yeengcali ezineziqinisekiso zemfundo.
La amaziko abonelela ngeenkonzo zempilo nezeemeko-bume zize ziqhube neenkqubo zokufakwa kwamatyala nokuchotshelwa kwawo ngokuyimpumelelo nangendlela endilisekileyo phantsi kwemo efanelekileyo ngabantu abakuqeqeshelweyo oko. 
Amaziko abonelela ngeenkonzo zempilo nentlalontle yaye aqalisa iinkqubo ezinempumelelo zokuxela nokutshutshisa izenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho ngendlela enesidima nenkathalelo yokusingqongileyo ziingcali eziqeqeshiweyo.
AmaZiko la anikela ngeenkonzo zempilo nentlalontle aphinde andulule iinkqubo zokunikwa kweengxelo ezifanelekileyo notshutshiso lweziganeko zolwaphulo-mthetho kubume obungqongwe sisidima nenkathalo yeengcali ezineziqinisekiso zemfundo.
La maZiko abonelela ngeenkonzo zempilo nentlalontle, nangokuqalisa iinkqubo zokunika ingxelo ngendlela esebenzayo, nokutshutshiselwa amatyala kwimeko enesidima nenkathalo, oko kusenziwa ngabatshutshisi abaqeqeshelwe loo msebenzi.  
Amaziko abonelela ngeenkonzo zempilo nentlalontle yaye aqalisa iinkqubo ezinempumelelo zokuxela nokutshutshisa izenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho ngendlela enesidima nenkathalelo yokusingqongileyo ziingcali eziqeqeshiweyo.
AmaZiko la anikela ngeenkonzo zempilo nentlalontle aphinde andulule iinkqubo zokunikwa kweengxelo ezifanelekileyo notshutshiso lweziganeko zolwaphulo-mthetho kubume obungqongwe sisidima nenkathalo yeengcali ezineziqinisekiso zemfundo.

La maZiko abonelela ngeenkonzo zempilo nentlalontle, nangokuqalisa iinkqubo zokunika ingxelo ngendlela esebenzayo, nokutshutshiselwa amatyala kwimeko enesidima nenkathalo, oko kusenziwa ngabatshutshisi abaqeqeshelwe loo msebenzi.  
La amaziko abonelela ngeenkonzo zempilo nezeemeko-bume zize ziqhube neenkqubo zokufakwa kwamatyala nokuchotshelwa kwawo ngokuyimpumelelo nangendlela endilisekileyo phantsi kwemo efanelekileyo ngabantu abakuqeqeshelweyo oko. 
Amaziko abonelela ngeenkonzo zempilo nentlalontle yaye aqalisa iinkqubo ezinempumelelo zokuxela nokutshutshisa izenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho ngendlela enesidima nenkathalelo yokusingqongileyo ziingcali eziqeqeshiweyo.
INkxasomali yokuFunyanwa kwakhona kwezinto zeXabiso eziqwalasela uLwaphulo-mthethoyasetyenziselwa ukunceda kwiiprojekhthi ezili-19  zokuxhobisa amaxhoba. 
Ingxowa-mali yoKufunyanwa kweerekhodi zaMatyala yasetyenziselwa ukuxhasa iiprojekti zophuhliso lwamaxhoba ezili-19. 
Iingxowamali zokuFumana kwakhona iiMpahla zoLwaphulo-mthetho zisetyenziswe ukuxhobisa ngengxowamali iiprojekthi ezi-19 zogunyaziso.
INgxowa-mali yokuBuyiswa kweMpahla yeXabiso yolwaPhulo-mthetho yasetyenziselwa ukuxhasa iiprojekthi ezili-19 zokuxhotyiswa kwamaxhoba.
Ingxowa-mali yoKufunyanwa kweerekhodi zaMatyala yasetyenziselwa ukuxhasa iiprojekti zophuhliso lwamaxhoba ezili-19. 
Iingxowamali zokuFumana kwakhona iiMpahla zoLwaphulo-mthetho zisetyenziswe ukuxhobisa ngengxowamali iiprojekthi ezi-19 zogunyaziso.
INgxowa-mali yokuBuyiswa kweMpahla yeXabiso yolwaPhulo-mthetho yasetyenziselwa ukuxhasa iiprojekthi ezili-19 zokuxhotyiswa kwamaxhoba.
INkxasomali yokuFunyanwa kwakhona kwezinto zeXabiso eziqwalasela uLwaphulo-mthethoyasetyenziselwa ukunceda kwiiprojekhthi ezili-19  zokuxhobisa amaxhoba. 
Iingxowamali zokuFumana kwakhona iiMpahla zoLwaphulo-mthetho zisetyenziswe ukuxhobisa ngengxowamali iiprojekthi ezi-19 zogunyaziso.
INgxowa-mali yokuBuyiswa kweMpahla yeXabiso yolwaPhulo-mthetho yasetyenziselwa ukuxhasa iiprojekthi ezili-19 zokuxhotyiswa kwamaxhoba.
INkxasomali yokuFunyanwa kwakhona kwezinto zeXabiso eziqwalasela uLwaphulo-mthethoyasetyenziselwa ukunceda kwiiprojekhthi ezili-19  zokuxhobisa amaxhoba. 
Ingxowa-mali yoKufunyanwa kweerekhodi zaMatyala yasetyenziselwa ukuxhasa iiprojekti zophuhliso lwamaxhoba ezili-19. 
INgxowa-mali yokuBuyiswa kweMpahla yeXabiso yolwaPhulo-mthetho yasetyenziselwa ukuxhasa iiprojekthi ezili-19 zokuxhotyiswa kwamaxhoba.
INkxasomali yokuFunyanwa kwakhona kwezinto zeXabiso eziqwalasela uLwaphulo-mthethoyasetyenziselwa ukunceda kwiiprojekhthi ezili-19  zokuxhobisa amaxhoba. 
Ingxowa-mali yoKufunyanwa kweerekhodi zaMatyala yasetyenziselwa ukuxhasa iiprojekti zophuhliso lwamaxhoba ezili-19. 
Iingxowamali zokuFumana kwakhona iiMpahla zoLwaphulo-mthetho zisetyenziswe ukuxhobisa ngengxowamali iiprojekthi ezi-19 zogunyaziso.
Kwaqulunqwa uLuhlu lweeNkonzo zaMaxhoba obuNdlobongela noLwaphulo-mthetho, oluqulathe iinkonzo ezinikezelwayo yimibutho karhulumente engaphezulu kwe-1 500 nayimibutho yabahlali kuwo onke amaphondo.   
Kwasekwa uvimba weeNkonzo zaMaxhoba oXhatshazo noBundlobongela noqulethe iinkonzo ezinikezelwa yimibutho karhulumente neyoluntu engaphezu kwe-1 500 kuwo onke amaphondo.
IsaLathiso seeNkonzo zamaXhoba oDushe noLwaphulo-mthetho esiqulathe iinkonzo  ezinikelwa yimibutho karhulumente neyentlalontle yoluntu engaphezulu kwe-1 500 efunyanwa kuwo onke amaphondo siphuhlisiwe. 
Kwaphuhliswa uluhlu lweeNkonzo zamaXhoba obuNdlobongela nezoLwaphulo-mthetho oluqulethe iinkonzo ezinikwa yimibutho engaphezu kweli-1 500 zikarhulumente nezoluntu olungelolwamkhosi kuwo onke amaphondo. 
Kwasekwa uvimba weeNkonzo zaMaxhoba oXhatshazo noBundlobongela noqulethe iinkonzo ezinikezelwa yimibutho karhulumente neyoluntu engaphezu kwe-1 500 kuwo onke amaphondo.

Olu luhlu luxhobisa abantu ukuze bafikelele kwiinkonzo ezifumanekayo kummandla wabo.
Lo vimba uxhobisa abantu ukuba bakwazi ukufikelela kwiinkonzo ezifumanekayo kwindawo ohlala kuyo.
Isalathiso sixhobisa abantu ukufikelela kwiinkonzo ezifumanekayo kwimimandla yabo.
Uluhlu olo luxhobisa abantu ukuba bafikelele kwiinkonzo ezifumaneka kwiindawo zabo. 
Lo vimba uxhobisa abantu ukuba bakwazi ukufikelela kwiinkonzo ezifumanekayo kwindawo ohlala kuyo.
Isalathiso sixhobisa abantu ukufikelela kwiinkonzo ezifumanekayo kwimimandla yabo.
Uluhlu olo luxhobisa abantu ukuba bafikelele kwiinkonzo ezifumaneka kwiindawo zabo. 
Olu luhlu luxhobisa abantu ukuze bafikelele kwiinkonzo ezifumanekayo kummandla wabo.
Isalathiso sixhobisa abantu ukufikelela kwiinkonzo ezifumanekayo kwimimandla yabo.
Uluhlu olo luxhobisa abantu ukuba bafikelele kwiinkonzo ezifumaneka kwiindawo zabo. 
Olu luhlu luxhobisa abantu ukuze bafikelele kwiinkonzo ezifumanekayo kummandla wabo.

Isalathiso sixhobisa abantu ukufikelela kwiinkonzo ezifumanekayo kwimimandla yabo.
Iindawo zoncedo ezinobubele kumaxhoba sezasekwakwizikhululo zamapolisa ezinoqhagamshelwano olusebenzayo.
Kwaye kwasekwa amaziko alungiselelwe ukuhlangabezana namaxhoba kwizikhululo zamapolisa kwiindawo ezinobundlobongela obuphezulu kakhulu.
Amalungiselelo anobuhlobo kumaxhoba asekiwe kwizikhululo zamapolisa zeendawo zezenzo ezininzi zolwaphumo-mthetho
Kusekwe izibonelelo ezilungele amaxhoba kwizikhululo zamapolisa eziphatha iziganeko ezininzi zolwaphulo-mthetho zokudibana ngqo.
Kwaye kwasekwa amaziko alungiselelwe ukuhlangabezana namaxhoba kwizikhululo zamapolisa kwiindawo ezinobundlobongela obuphezulu kakhulu.
Amalungiselelo anobuhlobo kumaxhoba asekiwe kwizikhululo zamapolisa zeendawo zezenzo ezininzi zolwaphumo-mthetho

Kwaqulunqwa iiNkundla zabaZimiseleyoekulweni amatyala eMpatho-gadalalakwezeSondo. 
Kwaye kwasekwa iiNkundla zoKujongana naMatyala angokokuXhatshazwa ngokweSondo. 
Iinkundla eziKhethekileyo zamaTyala ezeSondo ziphuhlisiwe.
Kuphuhliswe iiNkundla eziziNikele kwiziGaneko zolwaPhulo-mthetho phakathi kweZini. 
Kwaye kwasekwa iiNkundla zoKujongana naMatyala angokokuXhatshazwa ngokweSondo. 
Iinkundla eziKhethekileyo zamaTyala ezeSondo ziphuhlisiwe.

Iinkundla eziKhethekileyo zamaTyala ezeSondo ziphuhlisiwe.
UMthetho ojongene nobuNdlobongela kumaKhaya ubonelele ngeendawo zokuhlala amaxhoba ezinokwakhiwa.
Umqulu Wokuhlukunyezwa Ezindlini ubonelela ngokusekwa kwamaziko okhuseleko.
UmThetho woDushe lwaseKhaya ubonelele ngokuthi amakhusi asekwe. 
UMthetho wobuNdlobongela baseKhaya unolungiselelo lokusekwa kwamakhaya angamakhusi. 
Umqulu Wokuhlukunyezwa Ezindlini ubonelela ngokusekwa kwamaziko okhuseleko.
UmThetho woDushe lwaseKhaya ubonelele ngokuthi amakhusi asekwe. 
UMthetho wobuNdlobongela baseKhaya unolungiselelo lokusekwa kwamakhaya angamakhusi. 
UMthetho ojongene nobuNdlobongela kumaKhaya ubonelele ngeendawo zokuhlala amaxhoba ezinokwakhiwa.
UmThetho woDushe lwaseKhaya ubonelele ngokuthi amakhusi asekwe. 
UMthetho wobuNdlobongela baseKhaya unolungiselelo lokusekwa kwamakhaya angamakhusi. 
UMthetho ojongene nobuNdlobongela kumaKhaya ubonelele ngeendawo zokuhlala amaxhoba ezinokwakhiwa.
Umqulu Wokuhlukunyezwa Ezindlini ubonelela ngokusekwa kwamaziko okhuseleko.
UMthetho wobuNdlobongela baseKhaya unolungiselelo lokusekwa kwamakhaya angamakhusi. 
UMthetho ojongene nobuNdlobongela kumaKhaya ubonelele ngeendawo zokuhlala amaxhoba ezinokwakhiwa.
Umqulu Wokuhlukunyezwa Ezindlini ubonelela ngokusekwa kwamaziko okhuseleko.
UmThetho woDushe lwaseKhaya ubonelele ngokuthi amakhusi asekwe. 
Ngeli ixesha kukho iindawo zokuhlala amaxhoba ezingama-96 eMzantsi Afrika, ngo-2001 zazingama-39.
Ngoku kukho amaziko okhuseleko angama-96 eMzantsi Afrika ukususela kwangama-39 ngo-2001.
Njengangoku kukho amakhusi angama-96 eMzantsi Afrika, ukusuka kwangama-39 ngowama-2001.
Ngoku kukho amakhaya angamakhusi angama-96 eMzantsi Afrika, ukususela kwangama-39 ngo-2001.
Ngoku kukho amaziko okhuseleko angama-96 eMzantsi Afrika ukususela kwangama-39 ngo-2001.
Njengangoku kukho amakhusi angama-96 eMzantsi Afrika, ukusuka kwangama-39 ngowama-2001.
Ngoku kukho amakhaya angamakhusi angama-96 eMzantsi Afrika, ukususela kwangama-39 ngo-2001.
Ngeli ixesha kukho iindawo zokuhlala amaxhoba ezingama-96 eMzantsi Afrika, ngo-2001 zazingama-39.
Njengangoku kukho amakhusi angama-96 eMzantsi Afrika, ukusuka kwangama-39 ngowama-2001.
Ngoku kukho amakhaya angamakhusi angama-96 eMzantsi Afrika, ukususela kwangama-39 ngo-2001.
Ngeli ixesha kukho iindawo zokuhlala amaxhoba ezingama-96 eMzantsi Afrika, ngo-2001 zazingama-39.
Ngoku kukho amaziko okhuseleko angama-96 eMzantsi Afrika ukususela kwangama-39 ngo-2001.
Ngoku kukho amakhaya angamakhusi angama-96 eMzantsi Afrika, ukususela kwangama-39 ngo-2001.
Ngeli ixesha kukho iindawo zokuhlala amaxhoba ezingama-96 eMzantsi Afrika, ngo-2001 zazingama-39.
Ngoku kukho amaziko okhuseleko angama-96 eMzantsi Afrika ukususela kwangama-39 ngo-2001.
Njengangoku kukho amakhusi angama-96 eMzantsi Afrika, ukusuka kwangama-39 ngowama-2001.
Amalungelo  elamaXhoba uXwebhu lokukhuthaza ubulungisa, ngoku ayaguqulelwa ekubeni abe yinto yokwenene kumaxhoba olwaphulo-mthetho, lawo ahambisanayo neNkqubo yezobuLungisa obuchaseneyo noLwaphulo-mthetho. 
Amalungelo akuMqulu waMaxhoba ayafezekiswa ukulungiselela amaxhoba obundlobongela akwazi ukunxibelelana neNkqubo yezoBulungisa kuBundlobongela.
Amalungelo eTshata yamaXhoba aguqulwa ukuba yinyaniso ekhoyo malunga namaxhoba olwaphulo-mthetho ngokusebenzisana neNkqubo yoBulungisa yamaXhoba
Amalungelo oXwebhu lwamaLungelo amaXhoba aguqulelwa kwiimeko ezikhoyo ezilungele amaxhoba olwaphulo-mthetho asebenzisana neNkqubo yobuLungisa kulwaPhulo-mthetho. 
Amalungelo akuMqulu waMaxhoba ayafezekiswa ukulungiselela amaxhoba obundlobongela akwazi ukunxibelelana neNkqubo yezoBulungisa kuBundlobongela.
Amalungelo eTshata yamaXhoba aguqulwa ukuba yinyaniso ekhoyo malunga namaxhoba olwaphulo-mthetho ngokusebenzisana neNkqubo yoBulungisa yamaXhoba
Amalungelo oXwebhu lwamaLungelo amaXhoba aguqulelwa kwiimeko ezikhoyo ezilungele amaxhoba olwaphulo-mthetho asebenzisana neNkqubo yobuLungisa kulwaPhulo-mthetho. 
Amalungelo  elamaXhoba uXwebhu lokukhuthaza ubulungisa, ngoku ayaguqulelwa ekubeni abe yinto yokwenene kumaxhoba olwaphulo-mthetho, lawo ahambisanayo neNkqubo yezobuLungisa obuchaseneyo noLwaphulo-mthetho. 
Amalungelo eTshata yamaXhoba aguqulwa ukuba yinyaniso ekhoyo malunga namaxhoba olwaphulo-mthetho ngokusebenzisana neNkqubo yoBulungisa yamaXhoba
Amalungelo oXwebhu lwamaLungelo amaXhoba aguqulelwa kwiimeko ezikhoyo ezilungele amaxhoba olwaphulo-mthetho asebenzisana neNkqubo yobuLungisa kulwaPhulo-mthetho. 
Amalungelo  elamaXhoba uXwebhu lokukhuthaza ubulungisa, ngoku ayaguqulelwa ekubeni abe yinto yokwenene kumaxhoba olwaphulo-mthetho, lawo ahambisanayo neNkqubo yezobuLungisa obuchaseneyo noLwaphulo-mthetho. 
Amalungelo akuMqulu waMaxhoba ayafezekiswa ukulungiselela amaxhoba obundlobongela akwazi ukunxibelelana neNkqubo yezoBulungisa kuBundlobongela.
Amalungelo oXwebhu lwamaLungelo amaXhoba aguqulelwa kwiimeko ezikhoyo ezilungele amaxhoba olwaphulo-mthetho asebenzisana neNkqubo yobuLungisa kulwaPhulo-mthetho. 
Amalungelo  elamaXhoba uXwebhu lokukhuthaza ubulungisa, ngoku ayaguqulelwa ekubeni abe yinto yokwenene kumaxhoba olwaphulo-mthetho, lawo ahambisanayo neNkqubo yezobuLungisa obuchaseneyo noLwaphulo-mthetho. 
Amalungelo akuMqulu waMaxhoba ayafezekiswa ukulungiselela amaxhoba obundlobongela akwazi ukunxibelelana neNkqubo yezoBulungisa kuBundlobongela.
Amalungelo eTshata yamaXhoba aguqulwa ukuba yinyaniso ekhoyo malunga namaxhoba olwaphulo-mthetho ngokusebenzisana neNkqubo yoBulungisa yamaXhoba
Eli Phepha lamaLungelo liquka iMiqathango eYiyona iPhantsi ngeeNkonzo zamaXhoba oLwaphulo-mthetho, lona elimisele isikhokelo-nkqubo esisemthethweni esijongene namaxhoba ukuze kucaciswe ngamalungelo awo kwiinkonzo ezilindelekileyo kwiNkqubo yezobuLungisa echaseneyo noLwaphulo-mthetho.
Lo Mqulu waMalungelo uquka iiNqobo eZingephi zeeNkonzo zaMaxhoba oBundlobongela, neziseke inkqubo-sikhokelo yamaxhoba ukuze akwazi ukuphakamela amalungelo awo ngokuphathelele kwiinkonzo ezilindelekileyo kwiNkqubo yoBulungisa kuBundlobongela.
Le Tshata iqukiwe kwiiNkonzo zeyona Migangatho iPhantsi yeeNkozo zaMaxhoba oLwaphulo-mthetho, emisela isakhelo esisemthethweni samaxhoba ukubanga amalungelo awo eenkonzo ezilindelweyo kwiNkqubo yoBulungisa yaMaxhoba. 
Olu Xwebhu lwamaLungelo luquka imiGangatho eyiYona miNcinane ngeeNkonzo zamaXhoba olwaPhulo-mthetho, nechaza isikhokelo-nkqubo sasemthethweni samaXhoba ukuba abange amalungelo awo ngeenkonzo ezilindeleke kwiNkqubo yobuLungisa kulwaPhulo-mthetho.
Lo Mqulu waMalungelo uquka iiNqobo eZingephi zeeNkonzo zaMaxhoba oBundlobongela, neziseke inkqubo-sikhokelo yamaxhoba ukuze akwazi ukuphakamela amalungelo awo ngokuphathelele kwiinkonzo ezilindelekileyo kwiNkqubo yoBulungisa kuBundlobongela.
Le Tshata iqukiwe kwiiNkonzo zeyona Migangatho iPhantsi yeeNkozo zaMaxhoba oLwaphulo-mthetho, emisela isakhelo esisemthethweni samaxhoba ukubanga amalungelo awo eenkonzo ezilindelweyo kwiNkqubo yoBulungisa yaMaxhoba. 
Olu Xwebhu lwamaLungelo luquka imiGangatho eyiYona miNcinane ngeeNkonzo zamaXhoba olwaPhulo-mthetho, nechaza isikhokelo-nkqubo sasemthethweni samaXhoba ukuba abange amalungelo awo ngeenkonzo ezilindeleke kwiNkqubo yobuLungisa kulwaPhulo-mthetho.
Eli Phepha lamaLungelo liquka iMiqathango eYiyona iPhantsi ngeeNkonzo zamaXhoba oLwaphulo-mthetho, lona elimisele isikhokelo-nkqubo esisemthethweni esijongene namaxhoba ukuze kucaciswe ngamalungelo awo kwiinkonzo ezilindelekileyo kwiNkqubo yezobuLungisa echaseneyo noLwaphulo-mthetho.
Le Tshata iqukiwe kwiiNkonzo zeyona Migangatho iPhantsi yeeNkozo zaMaxhoba oLwaphulo-mthetho, emisela isakhelo esisemthethweni samaxhoba ukubanga amalungelo awo eenkonzo ezilindelweyo kwiNkqubo yoBulungisa yaMaxhoba. 
Olu Xwebhu lwamaLungelo luquka imiGangatho eyiYona miNcinane ngeeNkonzo zamaXhoba olwaPhulo-mthetho, nechaza isikhokelo-nkqubo sasemthethweni samaXhoba ukuba abange amalungelo awo ngeenkonzo ezilindeleke kwiNkqubo yobuLungisa kulwaPhulo-mthetho.
Eli Phepha lamaLungelo liquka iMiqathango eYiyona iPhantsi ngeeNkonzo zamaXhoba oLwaphulo-mthetho, lona elimisele isikhokelo-nkqubo esisemthethweni esijongene namaxhoba ukuze kucaciswe ngamalungelo awo kwiinkonzo ezilindelekileyo kwiNkqubo yezobuLungisa echaseneyo noLwaphulo-mthetho.
Lo Mqulu waMalungelo uquka iiNqobo eZingephi zeeNkonzo zaMaxhoba oBundlobongela, neziseke inkqubo-sikhokelo yamaxhoba ukuze akwazi ukuphakamela amalungelo awo ngokuphathelele kwiinkonzo ezilindelekileyo kwiNkqubo yoBulungisa kuBundlobongela.
Olu Xwebhu lwamaLungelo luquka imiGangatho eyiYona miNcinane ngeeNkonzo zamaXhoba olwaPhulo-mthetho, nechaza isikhokelo-nkqubo sasemthethweni samaXhoba ukuba abange amalungelo awo ngeenkonzo ezilindeleke kwiNkqubo yobuLungisa kulwaPhulo-mthetho.
Eli Phepha lamaLungelo liquka iMiqathango eYiyona iPhantsi ngeeNkonzo zamaXhoba oLwaphulo-mthetho, lona elimisele isikhokelo-nkqubo esisemthethweni esijongene namaxhoba ukuze kucaciswe ngamalungelo awo kwiinkonzo ezilindelekileyo kwiNkqubo yezobuLungisa echaseneyo noLwaphulo-mthetho.
Lo Mqulu waMalungelo uquka iiNqobo eZingephi zeeNkonzo zaMaxhoba oBundlobongela, neziseke inkqubo-sikhokelo yamaxhoba ukuze akwazi ukuphakamela amalungelo awo ngokuphathelele kwiinkonzo ezilindelekileyo kwiNkqubo yoBulungisa kuBundlobongela.
Le Tshata iqukiwe kwiiNkonzo zeyona Migangatho iPhantsi yeeNkozo zaMaxhoba oLwaphulo-mthetho, emisela isakhelo esisemthethweni samaxhoba ukubanga amalungelo awo eenkonzo ezilindelweyo kwiNkqubo yoBulungisa yaMaxhoba. 
Ngokusetyenziswa koXwebhu lwamaLungelo amaXhoba, inani leentsuku ezathathwayo ekugqibeni umbandela woLwaphulo-mthethokwezeSondo eNkundleni yamatyala, iintsuku ezazingama-285 zehlela kwi-142.
Ngokufezekiswa koMqulu waMaxhoba, inani leentsuku ezithathwayo ukuqukumbela amatyala asiwe kwiNKundla yaMatyala angokweSondo kwehlile ukusela kwangama-285 ukuya kwali-142.
Ngokuphumeza iTshata yaMaxhoba, inani leentsuku ezithathiweyo ukugqiba ityala kwiNkundla yeziTyholo zeSondo lehlile ukusuka kuma-285 ukuya kwi-142.
Ngenxa yempumezo yoXwebhu lwamaLungelo amaXhoba, liye lehla inani leentsuku ezisetyenziselwa ukuqoshelisa ingxoxo ngesiganeko kwiNkundla yolwaPhulo-mthetho phakathi kweZini ukususela kuma-285 ukuya kwi-142.
Ngokufezekiswa koMqulu waMaxhoba, inani leentsuku ezithathwayo ukuqukumbela amatyala asiwe kwiNKundla yaMatyala angokweSondo kwehlile ukusela kwangama-285 ukuya kwali-142.
Ngokuphumeza iTshata yaMaxhoba, inani leentsuku ezithathiweyo ukugqiba ityala kwiNkundla yeziTyholo zeSondo lehlile ukusuka kuma-285 ukuya kwi-142.
Ngenxa yempumezo yoXwebhu lwamaLungelo amaXhoba, liye lehla inani leentsuku ezisetyenziselwa ukuqoshelisa ingxoxo ngesiganeko kwiNkundla yolwaPhulo-mthetho phakathi kweZini ukususela kuma-285 ukuya kwi-142.

Ngokufezekiswa koMqulu waMaxhoba, inani leentsuku ezithathwayo ukuqukumbela amatyala asiwe kwiNKundla yaMatyala angokweSondo kwehlile ukusela kwangama-285 ukuya kwali-142.

UXwebhu lwamalungelo lukwayimfuno kuRhulumente woMzantsi Afrika ukuze kuhlangatyezwane nesibophelelo sawo samazwe ngamazwe ngokubhekiselele kwisiBhengezo seZizwe eziManyaneyo seMimiselo esisiSeko sobuLungisa esenzelwa amaXhoba oLwaphulo-mthetho nokuVuyelelwa kwawo ngabo baneGunya.
Lo Mqulu ukwayimfuneko ukuze urhulumente woMzantsi Afrika akwazi ukuhlangabezana nembophelelo anayo ngokweSibhambathiso seZizwe eZimanyeneyo (UN) seeNqobo ezinguNdoqo zoBulungisa ngakuMaxhoba oBundlobongela noKuxhatshazwa kwaMandla.
iTshata kananjalo yimfuneko malunga noRhulumente waseMzantsi Afrika ukwanelisa iimfanelo zakhe zezizwe ngezizwe ngokweSibhengezo seZizwe eziManyeneyo (UN) zesiSeko seeNqobo zoBulungisa ukwenzela amaXhoba oLwaphulo-mthetho noSetyenziso lwaMandla ngoBugwenxa.
UXwebhu lwamaLungelo lukwayimfuneko kaRhulumente waseMzantsi Afrika ukuze ahlangabeze isibophelelo malunga nesiBhengezo seZizwe eziManyeneyo (iUN) seMithetho-siseko esisiSeko nobuLungisa kumaXhoba olwaPhulo-mthetho nokuXhatshazwa kweGunya.
Lo Mqulu ukwayimfuneko ukuze urhulumente woMzantsi Afrika akwazi ukuhlangabezana nembophelelo anayo ngokweSibhambathiso seZizwe eZimanyeneyo (UN) seeNqobo ezinguNdoqo zoBulungisa ngakuMaxhoba oBundlobongela noKuxhatshazwa kwaMandla.

Ukusebenzisana namazwe ngamazwe ekuhlangabezeni imingeni yobundlobongela obenziwayo ebantwini ababhinqileyo nasebantwaneni
Ubambiswano lwamazwe ngamazwe ekuhlangabezaneni nemingeni yobundlobongela kumabhinqa nasebantwaneni.
Ukusebenzisana kwezizwe ngezizwe ukujongana nemiceli-mngeni yodushe ngokuchasene nabasetyhini nabantwana.
Intsebenziswano yeHlabathi ekuhlangabezeni imingeni yobundlobongela kumabhinqa nasebantwaneni.
Ubambiswano lwamazwe ngamazwe ekuhlangabezaneni nemingeni yobundlobongela kumabhinqa nasebantwaneni.

Ukusebenzisana namazwe ngamazwe ekuhlangabezeni imingeni yobundlobongela obenziwayo ebantwini ababhinqileyo nasebantwaneni
Ubambiswano lwamazwe ngamazwe ekuhlangabezaneni nemingeni yobundlobongela kumabhinqa nasebantwaneni.
Intsebenziswano yeHlabathi ekuhlangabezeni imingeni yobundlobongela kumabhinqa nasebantwaneni.
Ukusebenzisana namazwe ngamazwe ekuhlangabezeni imingeni yobundlobongela obenziwayo ebantwini ababhinqileyo nasebantwaneni
Ubambiswano lwamazwe ngamazwe ekuhlangabezaneni nemingeni yobundlobongela kumabhinqa nasebantwaneni.
Ukusebenzisana kwezizwe ngezizwe ukujongana nemiceli-mngeni yodushe ngokuchasene nabasetyhini nabantwana.
UMzantsi Afrika wayingenisa eyawo ingxelo ngenkqubela-phambili ekhoyo ngokusetyenziswa  kweNgqungquthela engokuShenxiswakwanokuCalucalulwa kwabantu ababhinqileyo  kwikomiti yeZizwe eziManyeneyo. 
UMzantsi Afrika ufake ingxelo kwinkqubela eyenziweyo ekufezekisweni kweSibhambathiso sokuBhangiswa kwanokucalulwa kwamabhinqa kwikomiti ye-UN ye-CEDAW.
UMzantsi Afrika unikele ngengxelo yawo yenkqubela eyenziweyo yokuphumeza iMvumelwano yokuNciphisa ucalucalulo ngokuchasene nabasetyhini kwikomiti ye-UN CEDAW.
UMzantsi Afrika unikele ingxelo yawo kwinkqubela eyenziweyo ngokuphunyezwa kweNgqungquthela ngokuPheliswa kocalucalulo lwamabhinqa ukuya kwikomiti yeCEDAW yeUN. 
UMzantsi Afrika ufake ingxelo kwinkqubela eyenziweyo ekufezekisweni kweSibhambathiso sokuBhangiswa kwanokucalulwa kwamabhinqa kwikomiti ye-UN ye-CEDAW.

UMzantsi Afrika unikele ngengxelo yawo yenkqubela eyenziweyo yokuphumeza iMvumelwano yokuNciphisa ucalucalulo ngokuchasene nabasetyhini kwikomiti ye-UN CEDAW.
UMzantsi Afrika wasingatha iNtlanganiso yaBaphathiswa beNgingqi yezoPhuhliso (SADC) lweAfrika eseMazantsi  (ngomhla wesi-9 ku-Okhtobha), injongo yayikukugqibezela isicwangciso seminyaka eli-10 sobuchule bokusebenza kwingingqi, eso sichase ukuthunyelwa  kwabantu kwamanye amazwe ngokungekho mthethweni, beza kusetyenziswa bengahlawulwa, okanye benyanzelelwa kwezesondo,  ingakumbi abantu ababhinqileyo nabantwana.  
UMzantsi Afrika usingathe iNtlanganiso yaBaphathiswa baMazwe aseMazantsi e-Afrika (SADC) (Okthobha 09) ukuze iqukumbele isicwangciso sobugcisa besithili malunga nomkhwa wokuthutyeleziswa kwabantu, ingakumbi abangamabhinqa kwanabantwana.
UMzantsi Afrika uhlinzeke iNtlanganiso ya Baphathiswa yoLuntu loPhuhliso lweAfrika eseZantsi (SADC) (ngomhla we-09 kweyeDwarha) ukuqukumbela isicwangciso seminyaka eli-10 sommandla sobuchule benyathelo elichasene nentengiso yabantu, ngokukodwa abasetyhini nabantwana.
UMzantsi Afrika usingethe iNtlanganiso yabaPhathiswa yeAfrika eseMzantsi yoPhuhliso loLuntu (iSADC) (ngomhla we-09 Okthobha) ukuze kuqosheliswe isicwangciso samanyathelo seminyaka eli-10 sesicwangciso-cebo sengingqi ngokuthengiswa kwabantu, ngakumbi amabhinqa nabantwana. 
UMzantsi Afrika usingathe iNtlanganiso yaBaphathiswa baMazwe aseMazantsi e-Afrika (SADC) (Okthobha 09) ukuze iqukumbele isicwangciso sobugcisa besithili malunga nomkhwa wokuthutyeleziswa kwabantu, ingakumbi abangamabhinqa kwanabantwana.

UMzantsi Afrika wasingatha iNtlanganiso yaBaphathiswa beNgingqi yezoPhuhliso (SADC) lweAfrika eseMazantsi  (ngomhla wesi-9 ku-Okhtobha), injongo yayikukugqibezela isicwangciso seminyaka eli-10 sobuchule bokusebenza kwingingqi, eso sichase ukuthunyelwa  kwabantu kwamanye amazwe ngokungekho mthethweni, beza kusetyenziswa bengahlawulwa, okanye benyanzelelwa kwezesondo,  ingakumbi abantu ababhinqileyo nabantwana.
