UMzantsi Afrika usingethe iNtlanganiso yabaPhathiswa yeAfrika eseMzantsi yoPhuhliso loLuntu (iSADC) (ngomhla we-09 Okthobha) ukuze kuqosheliswe isicwangciso samanyathelo seminyaka eli-10 sesicwangciso-cebo sengingqi ngokuthengiswa kwabantu, ngakumbi amabhinqa nabantwana. 
UMzantsi Afrika wasingatha iNtlanganiso yaBaphathiswa beNgingqi yezoPhuhliso (SADC) lweAfrika eseMazantsi  (ngomhla wesi-9 ku-Okhtobha), injongo yayikukugqibezela isicwangciso seminyaka eli-10 sobuchule bokusebenza kwingingqi, eso sichase ukuthunyelwa  kwabantu kwamanye amazwe ngokungekho mthethweni, beza kusetyenziswa bengahlawulwa, okanye benyanzelelwa kwezesondo,  ingakumbi abantu ababhinqileyo nabantwana.  
UMzantsi Afrika usingathe iNtlanganiso yaBaphathiswa baMazwe aseMazantsi e-Afrika (SADC) (Okthobha 09) ukuze iqukumbele isicwangciso sobugcisa besithili malunga nomkhwa wokuthutyeleziswa kwabantu, ingakumbi abangamabhinqa kwanabantwana.
UMzantsi Afrika uhlinzeke iNtlanganiso ya Baphathiswa yoLuntu loPhuhliso lweAfrika eseZantsi (SADC) (ngomhla we-09 kweyeDwarha) ukuqukumbela isicwangciso seminyaka eli-10 sommandla sobuchule benyathelo elichasene nentengiso yabantu, ngokukodwa abasetyhini nabantwana.
Isibhalo sokuqala soMnqophiso wabeNgingqi yoPhuhliso lweAfrika eseMazantsi, malunga neSini kunye noPhuhliso sithi, aMazwe angaMalungu eNgingqi yoPhuhliso lweAfrika eseMazantsi, ngo-2015 ayakube ewise umthetho okuchasayo ukudlakazeliswa kumcimbi wezesondo.
Isigqibo se-SADC malunga noBuni kwanoPhuhliso sithi Amazwe aphantsi kwe-SADC ngo-2015 azakube sele ewuqulunqile umthetho ozakulwa nokuxhatshazwa ngokwesondo. 
IsiVumelwano soMnqophiso seSADC seSini noPhuhliso  sichaza ukuba aMazwe angaMalungu e-SADC ngowama- 2015 aya kuba emisele umthetho olwa nempatho-mbi yezesondo.
ULandelo-mgaqo lweAfrika eseMzantsi yoPhuhliso loLuntu ngeZini noPhuhliso luchaza ukuthi iMibuso engamaLungu eAfrika eseMzantsi yoPhuhliso loLuntu iya kuba iwise umthetho ngo-2015 oza kulwa ukuphathwa kakubi ngokwesini.
Isigqibo se-SADC malunga noBuni kwanoPhuhliso sithi Amazwe aphantsi kwe-SADC ngo-2015 azakube sele ewuqulunqile umthetho ozakulwa nokuxhatshazwa ngokwesondo. 
IsiVumelwano soMnqophiso seSADC seSini noPhuhliso  sichaza ukuba aMazwe angaMalungu e-SADC ngowama- 2015 aya kuba emisele umthetho olwa nempatho-mbi yezesondo.
ULandelo-mgaqo lweAfrika eseMzantsi yoPhuhliso loLuntu ngeZini noPhuhliso luchaza ukuthi iMibuso engamaLungu eAfrika eseMzantsi yoPhuhliso loLuntu iya kuba iwise umthetho ngo-2015 oza kulwa ukuphathwa kakubi ngokwesini.
Isibhalo sokuqala soMnqophiso wabeNgingqi yoPhuhliso lweAfrika eseMazantsi, malunga neSini kunye noPhuhliso sithi, aMazwe angaMalungu eNgingqi yoPhuhliso lweAfrika eseMazantsi, ngo-2015 ayakube ewise umthetho okuchasayo ukudlakazeliswa kumcimbi wezesondo.
IsiVumelwano soMnqophiso seSADC seSini noPhuhliso  sichaza ukuba aMazwe angaMalungu e-SADC ngowama- 2015 aya kuba emisele umthetho olwa nempatho-mbi yezesondo.
ULandelo-mgaqo lweAfrika eseMzantsi yoPhuhliso loLuntu ngeZini noPhuhliso luchaza ukuthi iMibuso engamaLungu eAfrika eseMzantsi yoPhuhliso loLuntu iya kuba iwise umthetho ngo-2015 oza kulwa ukuphathwa kakubi ngokwesini.
Isibhalo sokuqala soMnqophiso wabeNgingqi yoPhuhliso lweAfrika eseMazantsi, malunga neSini kunye noPhuhliso sithi, aMazwe angaMalungu eNgingqi yoPhuhliso lweAfrika eseMazantsi, ngo-2015 ayakube ewise umthetho okuchasayo ukudlakazeliswa kumcimbi wezesondo.
Isigqibo se-SADC malunga noBuni kwanoPhuhliso sithi Amazwe aphantsi kwe-SADC ngo-2015 azakube sele ewuqulunqile umthetho ozakulwa nokuxhatshazwa ngokwesondo. 
ULandelo-mgaqo lweAfrika eseMzantsi yoPhuhliso loLuntu ngeZini noPhuhliso luchaza ukuthi iMibuso engamaLungu eAfrika eseMzantsi yoPhuhliso loLuntu iya kuba iwise umthetho ngo-2015 oza kulwa ukuphathwa kakubi ngokwesini.
Isibhalo sokuqala soMnqophiso wabeNgingqi yoPhuhliso lweAfrika eseMazantsi, malunga neSini kunye noPhuhliso sithi, aMazwe angaMalungu eNgingqi yoPhuhliso lweAfrika eseMazantsi, ngo-2015 ayakube ewise umthetho okuchasayo ukudlakazeliswa kumcimbi wezesondo.
Isigqibo se-SADC malunga noBuni kwanoPhuhliso sithi Amazwe aphantsi kwe-SADC ngo-2015 azakube sele ewuqulunqile umthetho ozakulwa nokuxhatshazwa ngokwesondo. 
IsiVumelwano soMnqophiso seSADC seSini noPhuhliso  sichaza ukuba aMazwe angaMalungu e-SADC ngowama- 2015 aya kuba emisele umthetho olwa nempatho-mbi yezesondo.
UMzantsi Afrika wasingatha iNdibano yeenkokeli zeNgingqi ezijongene nobuLungisa kwiSini (ngomhla wesi-9 ukuya kowe-10 ngoNovemba 2009), kweziwa nabameli bamazwe aseAfrika ukuze kwabelwane ngamava nangezona ndlela ziphucukileyo zokusebenza ukuze kushenxiswe ubundlobongela kwezesondo obusekelwe kwisini.  
UMzantsi Afrika ubambe iNKomfa ekhethekileyo yeNgingqi engoBulunga ngokweSini (ngomhla we9-10 kuNovemba 2009), udibanisa ndawonye abameli abasuka kumazwe aseAfrika ukuze abelane namava awo kwaneendlela eziwasebenzisayo ekupheliseni ukuxhatshazwa ngokwesondo kwanobundlobongela obungokwesini. 
UMzantsi Afrika uhlinzeke iNtlanganiso yaBaphathi baMazwe oMmandla yoBulungisa bezeSini (ngomhla we-9–10 kweyeNkanga 2009), ngokudibanisa abameli abavela kumazwe aseAfrika ukwabelana ngamava nezona nkqubo zilungileyo zokuphelisa udushe olusekelwe kwezesondo nesini.
UMzantsi Afrika usingethe iNgqungquthela yeNgingqi yobuLungisa ngeZini (ngomhla we-9 ukuya kowe-10 Novemba 2009), apho kuza kuhlangana khona abameli bamazwe aseAfrika ukuze babelane ngamava abo nangemisebenzi ebalaseleyo ekutshatyalalisweni kobundlobongela ngokwezini naphakathi kwezini.
UMzantsi Afrika ubambe iNKomfa ekhethekileyo yeNgingqi engoBulunga ngokweSini (ngomhla we9-10 kuNovemba 2009), udibanisa ndawonye abameli abasuka kumazwe aseAfrika ukuze abelane namava awo kwaneendlela eziwasebenzisayo ekupheliseni ukuxhatshazwa ngokwesondo kwanobundlobongela obungokwesini. 
UMzantsi Afrika uhlinzeke iNtlanganiso yaBaphathi baMazwe oMmandla yoBulungisa bezeSini (ngomhla we-9–10 kweyeNkanga 2009), ngokudibanisa abameli abavela kumazwe aseAfrika ukwabelana ngamava nezona nkqubo zilungileyo zokuphelisa udushe olusekelwe kwezesondo nesini.
UMzantsi Afrika usingethe iNgqungquthela yeNgingqi yobuLungisa ngeZini (ngomhla we-9 ukuya kowe-10 Novemba 2009), apho kuza kuhlangana khona abameli bamazwe aseAfrika ukuze babelane ngamava abo nangemisebenzi ebalaseleyo ekutshatyalalisweni kobundlobongela ngokwezini naphakathi kwezini.

Musani ukujonga kude, thathani amanyathelo ngempatho-gadalala.
Musa ukubethisa ngoyaba, thatha amanyathelo okulwa nokuhlukumeza
Musa ukujonga ecaleni, thatha inyathelo ngokuchasene nempatho-mbi
Musa ukujonga kwelinye icala, yilwa nokuxhaphaza

Uxwebhu oluyiNgxelo eseMthethweni
Ingxelo yokubasekhusini
INgxelo yoBuwedwa
INkcazo ngoBomi babuCala
Ingxelo yokubasekhusini
INgxelo yoBuwedwa
INkcazo ngoBomi babuCala
Uxwebhu oluyiNgxelo eseMthethweni
INgxelo yoBuwedwa
INkcazo ngoBomi babuCala
Uxwebhu oluyiNgxelo eseMthethweni
Ingxelo yokubasekhusini
INkcazo ngoBomi babuCala
Uxwebhu oluyiNgxelo eseMthethweni
Ingxelo yokubasekhusini
INgxelo yoBuwedwa
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini lizimisele ekukhuseleni imicimbi yenu yabucala nasekuqulunqeni iteknoloji eninika awona anamandla amava kwanokhuseleko kwi-intanethi.
ISebe lezeZindlu lizinikele ekukhuseleni ukubasekhuseni kwakho kwanasekusekeni ubugcisa obukwenza ubenokusebenzisa i-inthaneti ngeyona ndlela inobunganga kwanekhuselekileyo.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala lizinikele ukukhusela ubuwedwa bakho nophuhliso lobuchwepheshe olukunika awona mava anamandla nakhuselekileyo othungelwano lwe-inthanethi. 
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala lizinikele kukhuselo loBomi bakho babucala nakuphuhliso lobuchwepheshe obukunika amava okusebenzisa ikhompyutha ngeyona ndlela ikuxhobisayo nekhuselekileyo.
ISebe lezeZindlu lizinikele ekukhuseleni ukubasekhuseni kwakho kwanasekusekeni ubugcisa obukwenza ubenokusebenzisa i-inthaneti ngeyona ndlela inobunganga kwanekhuselekileyo.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala lizinikele ukukhusela ubuwedwa bakho nophuhliso lobuchwepheshe olukunika awona mava anamandla nakhuselekileyo othungelwano lwe-inthanethi. 
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala lizinikele kukhuselo loBomi bakho babucala nakuphuhliso lobuchwepheshe obukunika amava okusebenzisa ikhompyutha ngeyona ndlela ikuxhobisayo nekhuselekileyo.
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini lizimisele ekukhuseleni imicimbi yenu yabucala nasekuqulunqeni iteknoloji eninika awona anamandla amava kwanokhuseleko kwi-intanethi.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala lizinikele ukukhusela ubuwedwa bakho nophuhliso lobuchwepheshe olukunika awona mava anamandla nakhuselekileyo othungelwano lwe-inthanethi. 
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala lizinikele kukhuselo loBomi bakho babucala nakuphuhliso lobuchwepheshe obukunika amava okusebenzisa ikhompyutha ngeyona ndlela ikuxhobisayo nekhuselekileyo.
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini lizimisele ekukhuseleni imicimbi yenu yabucala nasekuqulunqeni iteknoloji eninika awona anamandla amava kwanokhuseleko kwi-intanethi.
ISebe lezeZindlu lizinikele ekukhuseleni ukubasekhuseni kwakho kwanasekusekeni ubugcisa obukwenza ubenokusebenzisa i-inthaneti ngeyona ndlela inobunganga kwanekhuselekileyo.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala lizinikele kukhuselo loBomi bakho babucala nakuphuhliso lobuchwepheshe obukunika amava okusebenzisa ikhompyutha ngeyona ndlela ikuxhobisayo nekhuselekileyo.
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini lizimisele ekukhuseleni imicimbi yenu yabucala nasekuqulunqeni iteknoloji eninika awona anamandla amava kwanokhuseleko kwi-intanethi.
ISebe lezeZindlu lizinikele ekukhuseleni ukubasekhuseni kwakho kwanasekusekeni ubugcisa obukwenza ubenokusebenzisa i-inthaneti ngeyona ndlela inobunganga kwanekhuselekileyo.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala lizinikele ukukhusela ubuwedwa bakho nophuhliso lobuchwepheshe olukunika awona mava anamandla nakhuselekileyo othungelwano lwe-inthanethi. 
Olu xwebhu luyiNgxelo eseMthethweni lusebenza kwiWebhusayithi yeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini, lulawula indlela yokusetyenziswa nokuqokelelwa kweenkcukacha.  
Le Ngxelo yoKubasekhusini yeyewebhusayithi yeSebe lezeZindlu kwaye ilawula ukuqokelewa kweenkcukacha  kwanokusetyenziswa kwazo.
Le Ngxelo yoBuwedwa isebenza kwiWebhusayithi yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala yaye ilawula uqokelelo lolwazi oluqokelelweyo nentsebenziso. 
Le Nkcazo yoBomi babuCala isetyenziswa kwiWebhusayithi yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala kwaye ilawula ukuqokelelwa nokusetyenziswa kweenkcukacha.
Le Ngxelo yoKubasekhusini yeyewebhusayithi yeSebe lezeZindlu kwaye ilawula ukuqokelewa kweenkcukacha  kwanokusetyenziswa kwazo.
Le Ngxelo yoBuwedwa isebenza kwiWebhusayithi yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala yaye ilawula uqokelelo lolwazi oluqokelelweyo nentsebenziso. 
Le Nkcazo yoBomi babuCala isetyenziswa kwiWebhusayithi yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala kwaye ilawula ukuqokelelwa nokusetyenziswa kweenkcukacha.
Olu xwebhu luyiNgxelo eseMthethweni lusebenza kwiWebhusayithi yeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini, lulawula indlela yokusetyenziswa nokuqokelelwa kweenkcukacha.  
Le Ngxelo yoBuwedwa isebenza kwiWebhusayithi yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala yaye ilawula uqokelelo lolwazi oluqokelelweyo nentsebenziso. 
Le Nkcazo yoBomi babuCala isetyenziswa kwiWebhusayithi yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala kwaye ilawula ukuqokelelwa nokusetyenziswa kweenkcukacha.
Olu xwebhu luyiNgxelo eseMthethweni lusebenza kwiWebhusayithi yeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini, lulawula indlela yokusetyenziswa nokuqokelelwa kweenkcukacha.  
Le Ngxelo yoKubasekhusini yeyewebhusayithi yeSebe lezeZindlu kwaye ilawula ukuqokelewa kweenkcukacha  kwanokusetyenziswa kwazo.
Le Nkcazo yoBomi babuCala isetyenziswa kwiWebhusayithi yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala kwaye ilawula ukuqokelelwa nokusetyenziswa kweenkcukacha.
Olu xwebhu luyiNgxelo eseMthethweni lusebenza kwiWebhusayithi yeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini, lulawula indlela yokusetyenziswa nokuqokelelwa kweenkcukacha.  
Le Ngxelo yoKubasekhusini yeyewebhusayithi yeSebe lezeZindlu kwaye ilawula ukuqokelewa kweenkcukacha  kwanokusetyenziswa kwazo.
Le Ngxelo yoBuwedwa isebenza kwiWebhusayithi yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala yaye ilawula uqokelelo lolwazi oluqokelelweyo nentsebenziso. 
Ngokusebenzisa iwebhusayithi yeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini, uyakwamkela okwenziwayo ngenkcukacha ezibhaliweyo nezichaziweyo kule ngxelo.
Ngokusebenzisa iwebhusayithi yeSebe lezeZindlu, uyavumelana neendlele ezibekiweyo zeekcukacha ezikule ngxelo.
Ngokusebenzisa iwebhusayithi yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, unikela ngemvume yemisebenzi yolwazi oluqokelelweyo ezichaziweyo kule ngxelo.
Ngokusebenzisa iwebhusayithi yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, uyavuzivuma iindlela zokusetyenziswa kweenkcukacha ezichazwa kule nkcazo.
Ngokusebenzisa iwebhusayithi yeSebe lezeZindlu, uyavumelana neendlele ezibekiweyo zeekcukacha ezikule ngxelo.
Ngokusebenzisa iwebhusayithi yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, unikela ngemvume yemisebenzi yolwazi oluqokelelweyo ezichaziweyo kule ngxelo.
Ngokusebenzisa iwebhusayithi yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, uyavuzivuma iindlela zokusetyenziswa kweenkcukacha ezichazwa kule nkcazo.
Ngokusebenzisa iwebhusayithi yeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini, uyakwamkela okwenziwayo ngenkcukacha ezibhaliweyo nezichaziweyo kule ngxelo.
Ngokusebenzisa iwebhusayithi yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, unikela ngemvume yemisebenzi yolwazi oluqokelelweyo ezichaziweyo kule ngxelo.
Ngokusebenzisa iwebhusayithi yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, uyavuzivuma iindlela zokusetyenziswa kweenkcukacha ezichazwa kule nkcazo.
Ngokusebenzisa iwebhusayithi yeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini, uyakwamkela okwenziwayo ngenkcukacha ezibhaliweyo nezichaziweyo kule ngxelo.
Ngokusebenzisa iwebhusayithi yeSebe lezeZindlu, uyavumelana neendlele ezibekiweyo zeekcukacha ezikule ngxelo.
Ngokusebenzisa iwebhusayithi yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, uyavuzivuma iindlela zokusetyenziswa kweenkcukacha ezichazwa kule nkcazo.
Ngokusebenzisa iwebhusayithi yeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini, uyakwamkela okwenziwayo ngenkcukacha ezibhaliweyo nezichaziweyo kule ngxelo.
Ngokusebenzisa iwebhusayithi yeSebe lezeZindlu, uyavumelana neendlele ezibekiweyo zeekcukacha ezikule ngxelo.
Ngokusebenzisa iwebhusayithi yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, unikela ngemvume yemisebenzi yolwazi oluqokelelweyo ezichaziweyo kule ngxelo.
Ukuqokelelwa kweeNkcukacha ezimalunga Nawe
Ukuqokelelwa kweeNkcukacha zakho zokoBuqu
Ingqokelelo yoLwazi lwakho loBuqu
Ukuqokelelwa kweeNkcukacha zoBuqu bakho
Ukuqokelelwa kweeNkcukacha zakho zokoBuqu
Ingqokelelo yoLwazi lwakho loBuqu
Ukuqokelelwa kweeNkcukacha zoBuqu bakho
Ukuqokelelwa kweeNkcukacha ezimalunga Nawe
Ingqokelelo yoLwazi lwakho loBuqu
Ukuqokelelwa kweeNkcukacha zoBuqu bakho
Ukuqokelelwa kweeNkcukacha ezimalunga Nawe
Ukuqokelelwa kweeNkcukacha zakho zokoBuqu
Ukuqokelelwa kweeNkcukacha zoBuqu bakho
Ukuqokelelwa kweeNkcukacha ezimalunga Nawe
Ukuqokelelwa kweeNkcukacha zakho zokoBuqu
Ingqokelelo yoLwazi lwakho loBuqu
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini liyaziqokelela ngokwalo iinkcukacha ezinokuchongwa, ezifana neyakho idilesi ye-imeyili, igama, idilesi yekhaya lakho okanye eyomsebenzi okuwo, okanye inombolo yefowuni.
ISebe lezeZindlu liqokelela iinkcukacha ezikuchazayo buqu, njengedilesi yakho ye-imeyile, igama, idilesi yasekhaya okanye eyasemsebenzini okanye inombolo yefowuni.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala liqokelela ulwazi lobuqu olunokuchongeka, olufana nedilesi yakho ye-imeyili, igama, idilesi yasekhaya okanye yasemsebenzini okanye inombolo yomnxeba. 
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala liqokelela iinkcukacha ezinobunini obuchongekayo, ezifana neadresi yeimeyili yakho, igama, iadresi yasekhaya okanye yasemsebenzini okanye inombolo yefowuni.
ISebe lezeZindlu liqokelela iinkcukacha ezikuchazayo buqu, njengedilesi yakho ye-imeyile, igama, idilesi yasekhaya okanye eyasemsebenzini okanye inombolo yefowuni.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala liqokelela ulwazi lobuqu olunokuchongeka, olufana nedilesi yakho ye-imeyili, igama, idilesi yasekhaya okanye yasemsebenzini okanye inombolo yomnxeba. 
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala liqokelela iinkcukacha ezinobunini obuchongekayo, ezifana neadresi yeimeyili yakho, igama, iadresi yasekhaya okanye yasemsebenzini okanye inombolo yefowuni.
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini liyaziqokelela ngokwalo iinkcukacha ezinokuchongwa, ezifana neyakho idilesi ye-imeyili, igama, idilesi yekhaya lakho okanye eyomsebenzi okuwo, okanye inombolo yefowuni.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala liqokelela ulwazi lobuqu olunokuchongeka, olufana nedilesi yakho ye-imeyili, igama, idilesi yasekhaya okanye yasemsebenzini okanye inombolo yomnxeba. 
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala liqokelela iinkcukacha ezinobunini obuchongekayo, ezifana neadresi yeimeyili yakho, igama, iadresi yasekhaya okanye yasemsebenzini okanye inombolo yefowuni.
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini liyaziqokelela ngokwalo iinkcukacha ezinokuchongwa, ezifana neyakho idilesi ye-imeyili, igama, idilesi yekhaya lakho okanye eyomsebenzi okuwo, okanye inombolo yefowuni.
ISebe lezeZindlu liqokelela iinkcukacha ezikuchazayo buqu, njengedilesi yakho ye-imeyile, igama, idilesi yasekhaya okanye eyasemsebenzini okanye inombolo yefowuni.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala liqokelela iinkcukacha ezinobunini obuchongekayo, ezifana neadresi yeimeyili yakho, igama, iadresi yasekhaya okanye yasemsebenzini okanye inombolo yefowuni.
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini liyaziqokelela ngokwalo iinkcukacha ezinokuchongwa, ezifana neyakho idilesi ye-imeyili, igama, idilesi yekhaya lakho okanye eyomsebenzi okuwo, okanye inombolo yefowuni.
ISebe lezeZindlu liqokelela iinkcukacha ezikuchazayo buqu, njengedilesi yakho ye-imeyile, igama, idilesi yasekhaya okanye eyasemsebenzini okanye inombolo yefowuni.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala liqokelela ulwazi lobuqu olunokuchongeka, olufana nedilesi yakho ye-imeyili, igama, idilesi yasekhaya okanye yasemsebenzini okanye inombolo yomnxeba. 
Kananjalo  iSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini liyaziqokelela iinkcukacha eliziphandele ngokwalo malunga nabaxumi, ezinye zinokungaqheleki kuwe mxumi, ezo zifana nekhowudi yeZIP, ubudala, isini, izinto onokuzikhetha,ezo unomdla kuzo kwanezona uzithandayo.
ISebe lezeZindlu likwaqokelela iinkcukacha zoluntu ezingabaluliyo, nezingakhethekanga kuwe, njengekhowudi yendawo, ubungakanani ngeminyaka, ubuni, izinto ezikhethwayo, izinto abanomdla kuzo kwanezo bakholwayo zizo.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala kananjalo liqokelela ulwazi lweenkcukacha zobuqu ezingenagama, ulungelulo olulodwa kuwe, olufana nekhowudi ye-ZIP, ubudala, isini, iziqhelo, imidla neentandokazi.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala liphinda liqokelele iinkcukacha zamanani ezintlu ezithile ezinobunini obungenakuchongwa, nezingabhekisi kuwe kuphela, ezifana nekhowudi yakho yeposi, ubudala, isini, imiba ekhethwayo, imidla nemiba ethandwayo.
ISebe lezeZindlu likwaqokelela iinkcukacha zoluntu ezingabaluliyo, nezingakhethekanga kuwe, njengekhowudi yendawo, ubungakanani ngeminyaka, ubuni, izinto ezikhethwayo, izinto abanomdla kuzo kwanezo bakholwayo zizo.

ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala kananjalo liqokelela ulwazi lweenkcukacha zobuqu ezingenagama, ulungelulo olulodwa kuwe, olufana nekhowudi ye-ZIP, ubudala, isini, iziqhelo, imidla neentandokazi.
Kwakhona kukho iinkcukacha ngobugoxo bokwakha ikhompyutha yakho kwanenkqubo eziqulathe indlela yokuyisebenzisa, iSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini liyazifumanela zona ngokuzenzekelayo.
Zikwakhona neenkcukacha ezingekhompyutha yakho neenkqubo zayo eziqokelwa ngokuzenzekela liSebe lezeZindlu.
Kukho kananjalo ulwazi malunga nobuxhakaxhaka bekhompyutha yakho nezisetyenziswa eziqokelelwa ngokuzenzekela liSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala. 
Kukho neenkcukacha ngeqokobhe nangeenkqubo zekhompyutha yakho eziqokelelwa ngendlela ezenzekelayo liSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala.
Zikwakhona neenkcukacha ezingekhompyutha yakho neenkqubo zayo eziqokelwa ngokuzenzekela liSebe lezeZindlu.
Kukho kananjalo ulwazi malunga nobuxhakaxhaka bekhompyutha yakho nezisetyenziswa eziqokelelwa ngokuzenzekela liSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala. 
Kukho neenkcukacha ngeqokobhe nangeenkqubo zekhompyutha yakho eziqokelelwa ngendlela ezenzekelayo liSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala.

Zikwakhona neenkcukacha ezingekhompyutha yakho neenkqubo zayo eziqokelwa ngokuzenzekela liSebe lezeZindlu.
Kukho kananjalo ulwazi malunga nobuxhakaxhaka bekhompyutha yakho nezisetyenziswa eziqokelelwa ngokuzenzekela liSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala. 
Ezi nkcukacha zingaquka: eyakho idilesi ye-IP, indlela yokufunda nje, amagama emihlaba ephantsi kolawulo, amaxesha okufikelela, iidilesi zeewebhusayithi odluliselwa kuzo.
Ezi nkcukacha zisenokuquka: idilesi yakho ye-IP, uhlobo lwebhrawuza, amagama edomeyini, amaxesha okungena kwi-inthaneti kunye neewebhusayithi ekungenwa kuzo.
Olu lwazi lungaquka: idilesi yakho ye-IP, uhlobo lwesikhangelisi, amagama emimandla, amaxesha ofikelelo kwakunye needilesi zewebhusayithi zokubhekisa. 
Ezi nkcukacha zinokuquka oku: iadresi yakho yenombolo yesazisi seintanethi, uhlobo lwesikhangelisi, amagama emimandla yemixholo, amaxesha okungena kunye neeadresi zeewebhusayithi ekuqinisekiswa kuzo.
Ezi nkcukacha zisenokuquka: idilesi yakho ye-IP, uhlobo lwebhrawuza, amagama edomeyini, amaxesha okungena kwi-inthaneti kunye neewebhusayithi ekungenwa kuzo.
Olu lwazi lungaquka: idilesi yakho ye-IP, uhlobo lwesikhangelisi, amagama emimandla, amaxesha ofikelelo kwakunye needilesi zewebhusayithi zokubhekisa. 
Ezi nkcukacha zinokuquka oku: iadresi yakho yenombolo yesazisi seintanethi, uhlobo lwesikhangelisi, amagama emimandla yemixholo, amaxesha okungena kunye neeadresi zeewebhusayithi ekuqinisekiswa kuzo.

Ezi nkcukacha zinokuquka oku: iadresi yakho yenombolo yesazisi seintanethi, uhlobo lwesikhangelisi, amagama emimandla yemixholo, amaxesha okungena kunye neeadresi zeewebhusayithi ekuqinisekiswa kuzo.

Ezi nkcukacha zisenokuquka: idilesi yakho ye-IP, uhlobo lwebhrawuza, amagama edomeyini, amaxesha okungena kwi-inthaneti kunye neewebhusayithi ekungenwa kuzo.
Ezi nkcukacha zinokuquka oku: iadresi yakho yenombolo yesazisi seintanethi, uhlobo lwesikhangelisi, amagama emimandla yemixholo, amaxesha okungena kunye neeadresi zeewebhusayithi ekuqinisekiswa kuzo.
Ezi nkcukacha zingaquka: eyakho idilesi ye-IP, indlela yokufunda nje, amagama emihlaba ephantsi kolawulo, amaxesha okufikelela, iidilesi zeewebhusayithi odluliselwa kuzo.
Ezi nkcukacha zisenokuquka: idilesi yakho ye-IP, uhlobo lwebhrawuza, amagama edomeyini, amaxesha okungena kwi-inthaneti kunye neewebhusayithi ekungenwa kuzo.
Olu lwazi lungaquka: idilesi yakho ye-IP, uhlobo lwesikhangelisi, amagama emimandla, amaxesha ofikelelo kwakunye needilesi zewebhusayithi zokubhekisa. 
Ezi nkcukacha zisetyenziswa liSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ukuze le nkonzo isebenze, kulondolozwe umgangatho wale nkonzo, kubonelelwe ngolwazi olumalunga nokusetyenziswa kwewebhusayithi yeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini. 
ISebe lezeZindlu lizakuzisebenzisa ezi nkcukacha kwimisebenzi yezi nkonzo ukuze kugcinwe iinkonzo zisemgangathweni kwanokubonelela ngeenkcukacha-manani ngokuphathelele ekusetyenzisweni kwewebhusayithi yeSebe lezeZindlu.
Olu lwazi lusetyenziswa liSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala malunga nokusebenza kwenkonzo, ukugcina udidi lwenkonzo, nokunikela ngeenkcukacha-manani ngokubanzi malunga nokusetyenziswa kwewebhusayithi yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala.
Ezi nkcukacha zisetyenziswa liSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ukwenzela ukusebenza kwenkonzo, ukuze kugcinwe umgangatho wenkonzo, nokunikela ngeengqokelelo-manani gabalala malunga nokusetyenziswa kwewebhusayithi yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala.
ISebe lezeZindlu lizakuzisebenzisa ezi nkcukacha kwimisebenzi yezi nkonzo ukuze kugcinwe iinkonzo zisemgangathweni kwanokubonelela ngeenkcukacha-manani ngokuphathelele ekusetyenzisweni kwewebhusayithi yeSebe lezeZindlu.
Olu lwazi lusetyenziswa liSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala malunga nokusebenza kwenkonzo, ukugcina udidi lwenkonzo, nokunikela ngeenkcukacha-manani ngokubanzi malunga nokusetyenziswa kwewebhusayithi yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala.

ISebe lezeZindlu lizakuzisebenzisa ezi nkcukacha kwimisebenzi yezi nkonzo ukuze kugcinwe iinkonzo zisemgangathweni kwanokubonelela ngeenkcukacha-manani ngokuphathelele ekusetyenzisweni kwewebhusayithi yeSebe lezeZindlu.

Ezi nkcukacha zisetyenziswa liSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ukuze le nkonzo isebenze, kulondolozwe umgangatho wale nkonzo, kubonelelwe ngolwazi olumalunga nokusetyenziswa kwewebhusayithi yeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini. 
ISebe lezeZindlu lizakuzisebenzisa ezi nkcukacha kwimisebenzi yezi nkonzo ukuze kugcinwe iinkonzo zisemgangathweni kwanokubonelela ngeenkcukacha-manani ngokuphathelele ekusetyenzisweni kwewebhusayithi yeSebe lezeZindlu.
Olu lwazi lusetyenziswa liSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala malunga nokusebenza kwenkonzo, ukugcina udidi lwenkonzo, nokunikela ngeenkcukacha-manani ngokubanzi malunga nokusetyenziswa kwewebhusayithi yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala.
Nceda ukhumbule ukuba xa wena ukhupha iinkcukacha ngokuthe ngqo ezinokuchongwa nemiyalezo okanye ulwazi olunobuzaza  kwiibhodi ezinemiyalezo zeSebe lokuHlaliswa, ezi nkcukacha zingaqokelelwa zize zisetyenziswe ngabanye abantu.
Nceda uhlale ukhumbula ukuba ukuba unikezela ngeenkcukacha ezinokukuchaza ukuba ungubani okanye iinkcukacha zakho zobuqu eziyimfihlo usebenzisa iibhodi zemiyalezo kawonkewonke zeSebe lezeZindlu, ezi nkcukacha zisenokuqokelelwa zize zisetyenziswe ngabanye.
Nceda ukhumbule ukuthi ukuba ubhengeza ngqo ulwazi lwakho lobuqu oluchongekayo okanye ulwazi oluqokelelweyo lobuqu oluntununtunu  ngeebhodi zemiyalezo yoluntu, olu lwazi lungaqokelelwa yaye lusetyenziswe ngabanye. 
Nceda khumbula ukuba xa uzityhila ngqo iinkcukacha ezinobunini obuchongekayo okanye iinkcukacha ezinobunini obuntununtunu ngokuzidlulisa kwiibhodi zemiyalezo yoluntu zeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, ezi nkcukacha zinokuqokelelwa zize zisetyenziswe ngabanye.
Nceda uhlale ukhumbula ukuba ukuba unikezela ngeenkcukacha ezinokukuchaza ukuba ungubani okanye iinkcukacha zakho zobuqu eziyimfihlo usebenzisa iibhodi zemiyalezo kawonkewonke zeSebe lezeZindlu, ezi nkcukacha zisenokuqokelelwa zize zisetyenziswe ngabanye.

Nceda khumbula ukuba xa uzityhila ngqo iinkcukacha ezinobunini obuchongekayo okanye iinkcukacha ezinobunini obuntununtunu ngokuzidlulisa kwiibhodi zemiyalezo yoluntu zeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, ezi nkcukacha zinokuqokelelwa zize zisetyenziswe ngabanye.

Nceda ukhumbule ukuba xa wena ukhupha iinkcukacha ngokuthe ngqo ezinokuchongwa nemiyalezo okanye ulwazi olunobuzaza  kwiibhodi ezinemiyalezo zeSebe lokuHlaliswa, ezi nkcukacha zingaqokelelwa zize zisetyenziswe ngabanye abantu.
Nceda uhlale ukhumbula ukuba ukuba unikezela ngeenkcukacha ezinokukuchaza ukuba ungubani okanye iinkcukacha zakho zobuqu eziyimfihlo usebenzisa iibhodi zemiyalezo kawonkewonke zeSebe lezeZindlu, ezi nkcukacha zisenokuqokelelwa zize zisetyenziswe ngabanye.
Nceda ukhumbule ukuthi ukuba ubhengeza ngqo ulwazi lwakho lobuqu oluchongekayo okanye ulwazi oluqokelelweyo lobuqu oluntununtunu  ngeebhodi zemiyalezo yoluntu, olu lwazi lungaqokelelwa yaye lusetyenziswe ngabanye. 
Qaphelani:  ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini alizifundi neziphi na iinkcukacha zenu zonxibelelwane ezikwi-intanethi.
Qaphela: ISebe lezeZnindlu alizifundi iimbalelwano zakho zonxibelelwano lwabucala olwenza kwi-inthaneti.
Qaphela: ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala alifundi naluphi unxibelelwano lwakho lwangasese kunxinbelelwano lweintanethi.
Qaphela: ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala alifundi naziphi na iinkcukacha zonxibelelwano lwakho lwabucala ngekhompyutha.
Qaphela: ISebe lezeZnindlu alizifundi iimbalelwano zakho zonxibelelwano lwabucala olwenza kwi-inthaneti.
Qaphela: ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala alifundi naluphi unxibelelwano lwakho lwangasese kunxinbelelwano lweintanethi.
Qaphela: ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala alifundi naziphi na iinkcukacha zonxibelelwano lwakho lwabucala ngekhompyutha.
Qaphelani:  ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini alizifundi neziphi na iinkcukacha zenu zonxibelelwane ezikwi-intanethi.
Qaphela: ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala alifundi naluphi unxibelelwano lwakho lwangasese kunxinbelelwano lweintanethi.
Qaphela: ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala alifundi naziphi na iinkcukacha zonxibelelwano lwakho lwabucala ngekhompyutha.
Qaphelani:  ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini alizifundi neziphi na iinkcukacha zenu zonxibelelwane ezikwi-intanethi.
Qaphela: ISebe lezeZnindlu alizifundi iimbalelwano zakho zonxibelelwano lwabucala olwenza kwi-inthaneti.
Qaphela: ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala alifundi naziphi na iinkcukacha zonxibelelwano lwakho lwabucala ngekhompyutha.
Qaphelani:  ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini alizifundi neziphi na iinkcukacha zenu zonxibelelwane ezikwi-intanethi.
Qaphela: ISebe lezeZnindlu alizifundi iimbalelwano zakho zonxibelelwano lwabucala olwenza kwi-inthaneti.
Qaphela: ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala alifundi naluphi unxibelelwano lwakho lwangasese kunxinbelelwano lweintanethi.
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini liyanikhuthaza ukuba niwaphonononge amaxwebhu  aziingxelo ezisemthethweni eewebhusayithi enikhetha ukudityaniswa kuwo lilo iSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini ukuze nazi indlela ezo webhusayithi eziqokelela, ezisebenzisa nezabelana ngazo ngezo nkcukacha.
ISebe lezeZindlu liyakukhuthaza ukuba uzihlaziye iingxelo zabucala zewebhusayithi okhetha ukuzizibandakanya nazo kwiSebe lezeZindlu ukwenzel’ ukuba uqonde ukuba ezo webhusayithi ziziqokelela, zizisebenzise kwaye zabelane njani na ngeenkcukacha zakho. 
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala likukhuthaza ukuhlola iingxelo zobuwedwa zeewebhusayithi okhetha ukuziqhagamshela ezivela kwiSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ukuze uqonde ukuba ezo webhusayithi ziqokelela, zisebenzisa yaye zabelana njani ngolwazi lwakho. 
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala liyakukhuthaza ukuba uziphengulule iinkcazo zobomi babucala zeewebhusayithi okhetha ukuzinxulumanisa nazo ezivela kwiSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ukuze uqonde ukuba ezo webhusayithi ziziqokelela njani, zizisebenzise futhi zabelane njani ngeenkcukacha zakho.

ISebe lezeZindlu liyakukhuthaza ukuba uzihlaziye iingxelo zabucala zewebhusayithi okhetha ukuzizibandakanya nazo kwiSebe lezeZindlu ukwenzel’ ukuba uqonde ukuba ezo webhusayithi ziziqokelela, zizisebenzise kwaye zabelane njani na ngeenkcukacha zakho. 
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala likukhuthaza ukuhlola iingxelo zobuwedwa zeewebhusayithi okhetha ukuziqhagamshela ezivela kwiSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ukuze uqonde ukuba ezo webhusayithi ziqokelela, zisebenzisa yaye zabelana njani ngolwazi lwakho. 
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini aliluthwali uxanduva lwamaxwebhu aziingxelo ezisemthethweni okanye ezinye iziqulatho ezikwiiwebhusayithi ezingekho kwiSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini  nolweewebhusayithi zeentsapho zeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini.
ISebe lezeZindlu alinaxanduva leengxelo zabucala okanye ezinye izinto ezikwiiwebhusayithi ezingenanto yakwenza neSebe lezeZindlu kwanezinye iiwebhusayithi ezilusapho lweSebe lezeZindlu.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala alinalo uxanduva lweengxelo zobuwedwa okanye esinye isiqulatho kwiiwebhusayithi ezingaphandle kweSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala kwakunye neewebhusayithi zosapho lweSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala alinaxanduva lweenkcazo zobomi babucala okanye ezinye iziqulatho ezikwiiwebhusayithi ezingaphandle kweSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala kunye nosapho lweewebhusayithi zeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala.

Ukusetyenziswa kweeNkcukacha zoBuqu bakho

Ukusetyenziswa kweeNkcukacha zakho zokoBuqu

Ukusetyenziswa kweeNkcukacha ezimalunga Nawe
Ukusetyenziswa kweeNkcukacha zakho zokoBuqu
Usetyenziso loLwazi lwakho loBuqu
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini liyaziqokelela lize lizisebenzise iinkcukacha ezimalunga nawe nezinokusetyenziswa kwiwebhusayithi yeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini, iinkonzo ozicelileyo kulo liyazinikezela.
ISebe lezeZindlu liqokelela lize lizisebenzise iinkcukacha zakho zobuqu ukuze lisebenze ngewebhusayiti yeSebe lezeZindlu lize linikezele ngeenkonzo ozicelileyo.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala liqokelela yaye lisebenzise ulwazi lwakho lobuqu ukuqhuba iwebhusayithi yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala nokunikela iinkonzo ozicelileyo. 
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala liqokelela lisebenzise iinkcukacha zobuqu bakho ukuze liqhube iwebhusayithi yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ngokunjalo linikele ngeenkonzo ozicelileyo. 
ISebe lezeZindlu liqokelela lize lizisebenzise iinkcukacha zakho zobuqu ukuze lisebenze ngewebhusayiti yeSebe lezeZindlu lize linikezele ngeenkonzo ozicelileyo.

ISebe lezeZindlu liqokelela lize lizisebenzise iinkcukacha zakho zobuqu ukuze lisebenze ngewebhusayiti yeSebe lezeZindlu lize linikezele ngeenkonzo ozicelileyo.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala liqokelela yaye lisebenzise ulwazi lwakho lobuqu ukuqhuba iwebhusayithi yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala nokunikela iinkonzo ozicelileyo. 
Kananjalo iSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini liyazisebenzisa iinkcukacha ezinokuchongwa ezizezakho ukuze likwazise ngezinye iimveliso okanye iinkonzo ezifumanekayo kwiSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini kunye neenkampani ezimanyene nalo.
ISebe lezeZindlu likwasebenzisa iinkcukacha zakho zokobuqu ezikuchazayo ukuze likwazise malunga nezinye iimveliso ezifumaneka kwiSebe lezeZindlu kwamahlakani alo.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala kananjalo lisebenzisa ulwazi lwakho lobuqu oluchongekayo ukukwazisa ngezinye iimveliso okanye iinkonzo ezifumanekayo kwiSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala neemanyano zalo. 
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala liphinda lisebenzise iinkcukacha zakho zobunini obuchongekayo ukukwazisa ngezinye iimveliso okanye iinkonzo ezifumaneka kwiSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala nakwabazimanye nalo. 
ISebe lezeZindlu likwasebenzisa iinkcukacha zakho zokobuqu ezikuchazayo ukuze likwazise malunga nezinye iimveliso ezifumaneka kwiSebe lezeZindlu kwamahlakani alo.

Kananjalo iSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini liyazisebenzisa iinkcukacha ezinokuchongwa ezizezakho ukuze likwazise ngezinye iimveliso okanye iinkonzo ezifumanekayo kwiSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini kunye neenkampani ezimanyene nalo.
ISebe lezeZindlu likwasebenzisa iinkcukacha zakho zokobuqu ezikuchazayo ukuze likwazise malunga nezinye iimveliso ezifumaneka kwiSebe lezeZindlu kwamahlakani alo.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala kananjalo lisebenzisa ulwazi lwakho lobuqu oluchongekayo ukukwazisa ngezinye iimveliso okanye iinkonzo ezifumanekayo kwiSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala neemanyano zalo. 
Kwakhona iSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini linganxibelelana nawe ngovavanyo ukuze kubekho uphengululo ngoluvo onalo ngeenkonzo ezinikezelwayo okanye ngezikhoyo iinkonzo ezintsha ezisenokunikezelwa.
ISebe lezeZindlu lisenokuqhagamshelana nawe ngokusebenzisa amaxwebhu ophando anemibuzo ebuzisa ngamava akho ngeenkonzo ezikhoyo ngoku okanye ngeenkonzo ezintsha ezisenokubakho.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala kananjalo linganxibelelana nawe ngeemvavanyo ukuqhuba uphando malunga noluvo lwakho ngeenkonzo zangoku okanye ngeenkonzo ezintsha ezinokwenziwa zinikelwe.
Kwakhona iSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala lisenokuzidibanisa nawe ngeentlobo zophengululo zokuqhuba uphando ngoluvo lwakho ngeenkonzo zangoku okanye ngeenkonzo ezintsha ezinokubakho ekunokunikelwa ngazo.
ISebe lezeZindlu lisenokuqhagamshelana nawe ngokusebenzisa amaxwebhu ophando anemibuzo ebuzisa ngamava akho ngeenkonzo ezikhoyo ngoku okanye ngeenkonzo ezintsha ezisenokubakho.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala kananjalo linganxibelelana nawe ngeemvavanyo ukuqhuba uphando malunga noluvo lwakho ngeenkonzo zangoku okanye ngeenkonzo ezintsha ezinokwenziwa zinikelwe.
Kwakhona iSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala lisenokuzidibanisa nawe ngeentlobo zophengululo zokuqhuba uphando ngoluvo lwakho ngeenkonzo zangoku okanye ngeenkonzo ezintsha ezinokubakho ekunokunikelwa ngazo.
Kwakhona iSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini linganxibelelana nawe ngovavanyo ukuze kubekho uphengululo ngoluvo onalo ngeenkonzo ezinikezelwayo okanye ngezikhoyo iinkonzo ezintsha ezisenokunikezelwa.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala kananjalo linganxibelelana nawe ngeemvavanyo ukuqhuba uphando malunga noluvo lwakho ngeenkonzo zangoku okanye ngeenkonzo ezintsha ezinokwenziwa zinikelwe.
Kwakhona iSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala lisenokuzidibanisa nawe ngeentlobo zophengululo zokuqhuba uphando ngoluvo lwakho ngeenkonzo zangoku okanye ngeenkonzo ezintsha ezinokubakho ekunokunikelwa ngazo.
Kwakhona iSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini linganxibelelana nawe ngovavanyo ukuze kubekho uphengululo ngoluvo onalo ngeenkonzo ezinikezelwayo okanye ngezikhoyo iinkonzo ezintsha ezisenokunikezelwa.
ISebe lezeZindlu lisenokuqhagamshelana nawe ngokusebenzisa amaxwebhu ophando anemibuzo ebuzisa ngamava akho ngeenkonzo ezikhoyo ngoku okanye ngeenkonzo ezintsha ezisenokubakho.
Kwakhona iSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala lisenokuzidibanisa nawe ngeentlobo zophengululo zokuqhuba uphando ngoluvo lwakho ngeenkonzo zangoku okanye ngeenkonzo ezintsha ezinokubakho ekunokunikelwa ngazo.
Kwakhona iSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini linganxibelelana nawe ngovavanyo ukuze kubekho uphengululo ngoluvo onalo ngeenkonzo ezinikezelwayo okanye ngezikhoyo iinkonzo ezintsha ezisenokunikezelwa.
ISebe lezeZindlu lisenokuqhagamshelana nawe ngokusebenzisa amaxwebhu ophando anemibuzo ebuzisa ngamava akho ngeenkonzo ezikhoyo ngoku okanye ngeenkonzo ezintsha ezisenokubakho.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala kananjalo linganxibelelana nawe ngeemvavanyo ukuqhuba uphando malunga noluvo lwakho ngeenkonzo zangoku okanye ngeenkonzo ezintsha ezinokwenziwa zinikelwe.
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini alithengisi, alihlawulisi ngokuhlala okanye aliqeshisi ngezindwe zabaxumi balo kwabanye abantu.
ISebe lezeZindlu alithengisi, aliqeshisi okanye alibolekisi kubangeneleli ngoluhlu olunamagama abaxumi.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala alithengisi, liqeshe okanye liqeshise ngezintlu zomthengi kwabanye abantu. 
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala alizithengisi, alizirentisi okanye aliziqeshisi izindwe zalo zabaxumi kumaqela esithathu.
ISebe lezeZindlu alithengisi, aliqeshisi okanye alibolekisi kubangeneleli ngoluhlu olunamagama abaxumi.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala alithengisi, liqeshe okanye liqeshise ngezintlu zomthengi kwabanye abantu. 
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala alizithengisi, alizirentisi okanye aliziqeshisi izindwe zalo zabaxumi kumaqela esithathu.

ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini linganakho, kumaxesha ngamaxesha, ukunxibelelana nawe egameni labangaphandle abasebenzisana nalo kwezoshishino, malunga nento ethile abayinikezelayo, leyo wena unokuba nomdla kuyo. 
ISebe lezeZindlu lisenokuqhagamshelana nawe, amaxesha ngamaxesha, egameni lwamahlakani oshishino malunga nengenelo onokuba nomdla kuzo.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala linganako, ngamaxesha ngamaxesha, ukuqhagamshelana nawe egameni labahlulelani balo beshishini bangaphandle malunga nomnikelo othile onokuba nomdla kuwo. 
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala linakho, kumaxesha ngamaxesha, ukuzidibanisa nawe egameni labahlulelane bangaphandle beshishini malunga nenkonzo ethile onokuba nomdla kuyo.
ISebe lezeZindlu lisenokuqhagamshelana nawe, amaxesha ngamaxesha, egameni lwamahlakani oshishino malunga nengenelo onokuba nomdla kuzo.

Kwiimeko ezinjalo, iinkcukacha zakho ezaziwayo (i-imeyili, igama, idilesi, inombolo yefowuni) azidluliselwa kwabanye abantu.
Kwezo meko, iinkcukacha zakho zobuqu ezikuchazayo (i-imeyile, igama, idilesi, inombolo yefowuni) azigqithiselwa kwabanye abangeneleli
Kwezo meko, ulwazi lwakho olulodwa lobuqu oluchongekayo (i-imeyili, igama, idilesi, inombolo yomnxeba) alugqithiselwa komnye umntu. 
Kwiziganeko ezinjalo, iinkcukacha ezichongeka njengezobuqu bakho (i-imeyili, igama, iadresi, inombolo yefowuni) azidluliselwa kwiqela lesithathu. 
Kwezo meko, iinkcukacha zakho zobuqu ezikuchazayo (i-imeyile, igama, idilesi, inombolo yefowuni) azigqithiselwa kwabanye abangeneleli
Kwezo meko, ulwazi lwakho olulodwa lobuqu oluchongekayo (i-imeyili, igama, idilesi, inombolo yomnxeba) alugqithiselwa komnye umntu. 
Kwiziganeko ezinjalo, iinkcukacha ezichongeka njengezobuqu bakho (i-imeyili, igama, iadresi, inombolo yefowuni) azidluliselwa kwiqela lesithathu. 
Kwiimeko ezinjalo, iinkcukacha zakho ezaziwayo (i-imeyili, igama, idilesi, inombolo yefowuni) azidluliselwa kwabanye abantu.

Kwiimeko ezinjalo, iinkcukacha zakho ezaziwayo (i-imeyili, igama, idilesi, inombolo yefowuni) azidluliselwa kwabanye abantu.
Kwezo meko, iinkcukacha zakho zobuqu ezikuchazayo (i-imeyile, igama, idilesi, inombolo yefowuni) azigqithiselwa kwabanye abangeneleli
Kwezo meko, ulwazi lwakho olulodwa lobuqu oluchongekayo (i-imeyili, igama, idilesi, inombolo yomnxeba) alugqithiselwa komnye umntu. 
Ukongeza apho, iSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini, lingabelana ngeenkcukacha neenkampani elisebenzisana nazo, oko kungalinceda ngohlalutyo lolwazi olufumanekileyo, ungathunyelwa i-imeyili okanye idilesi ekuposelwa kuyo, ungabonelelwa ngenkxaso yabaxumi, okanye kungalungiselelwa ukuba mawuziselwe impahla. 
Ukongeza, iSebe lezeZindlu lisenokwabelana ngeenkcukacha namahlakani athembakalayo ngelisinceda kuhlalutyo lweenkcukacha-manani, likuthumelele ne-imeyile okanye ngeposi, libonelele ngenkxaso kubaxumi, okanye lilungiselele ukuthunyelwa .
Ngaphezu koko, iSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala lingabelana ngolwazi oluqokelelweyo nabahlulelane abathembekileyo ukusinceda ukwenza uhlahlelo lweenkcukacha-manani, likuthumelele nge-imeyili okanye ngeposi, linikele ngenkxaso yomthengi, okanye lihlele malunga nezinto ezithunyelwayo. 
Ngaphezu koko, iSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala linakho ukwabelana ngeenkcukacha nabahlulelane abathenjiweyo ukunceda thina ngokwenza uhlalutyo lwengqokelelo-manani, ukuthumela kuwe i-imeyili okanye iposi, ukunikela ngenkxaso yabaxumi, okanye ukulungiselela ukunikela ngeenkonzo.
Ukongeza, iSebe lezeZindlu lisenokwabelana ngeenkcukacha namahlakani athembakalayo ngelisinceda kuhlalutyo lweenkcukacha-manani, likuthumelele ne-imeyile okanye ngeposi, libonelele ngenkxaso kubaxumi, okanye lilungiselele ukuthunyelwa .

Ngaphezu koko, iSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala linakho ukwabelana ngeenkcukacha nabahlulelane abathenjiweyo ukunceda thina ngokwenza uhlalutyo lwengqokelelo-manani, ukuthumela kuwe i-imeyili okanye iposi, ukunikela ngenkxaso yabaxumi, okanye ukulungiselela ukunikela ngeenkonzo.
Ukongeza apho, iSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini, lingabelana ngeenkcukacha neenkampani elisebenzisana nazo, oko kungalinceda ngohlalutyo lolwazi olufumanekileyo, ungathunyelwa i-imeyili okanye idilesi ekuposelwa kuyo, ungabonelelwa ngenkxaso yabaxumi, okanye kungalungiselelwa ukuba mawuziselwe impahla. 
Ukongeza, iSebe lezeZindlu lisenokwabelana ngeenkcukacha namahlakani athembakalayo ngelisinceda kuhlalutyo lweenkcukacha-manani, likuthumelele ne-imeyile okanye ngeposi, libonelele ngenkxaso kubaxumi, okanye lilungiselele ukuthunyelwa .
Ngaphezu koko, iSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala lingabelana ngolwazi oluqokelelweyo nabahlulelane abathembekileyo ukusinceda ukwenza uhlahlelo lweenkcukacha-manani, likuthumelele nge-imeyili okanye ngeposi, linikele ngenkxaso yomthengi, okanye lihlele malunga nezinto ezithunyelwayo. 
Zonke ezo nkampani zangaphandle ziyathintelwa ukuze zingazisebenzisi iinkcukacha zakho ngaphandle nje kokunikezelwa kweenkonzo kwiSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini, kulindeleke ukuba iinkampani zangaphandle ziyigcine imfihlelo emalunga neenkcukacha zomxumi.
Abangeneleli abanjalo bayathintelwa ekusebenziseni iinkcukacha zokobuqu ngaphandle nje kokubonelela ngeenkonzo kwiSebe lezeZindlu, kwaye kudingeka ukuba bazigcine iinkcukacha zakho zisekhusini.
Bonke abanye abantu abanjalo bathintelwe ekusebenziseni ulwazi lwakho lobuqu ngaphandle kokunikela ngezi nkonzo kwiSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, yaye kulindelwe ukuba balondoloze ubumfihlo bolwazi lwakho.
Onke amaqela esithathu anjengalawo athintelekile ekusebenziseni iinkcukacha zobuqu bakho ngaphandle kokuba anikela ezi nkonzo kwiSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, ngokunjalo xa kufuneka ukuba egcine iinkcukacha zakho njengemfihlelo.
Abangeneleli abanjalo bayathintelwa ekusebenziseni iinkcukacha zokobuqu ngaphandle nje kokubonelela ngeenkonzo kwiSebe lezeZindlu, kwaye kudingeka ukuba bazigcine iinkcukacha zakho zisekhusini.
Bonke abanye abantu abanjalo bathintelwe ekusebenziseni ulwazi lwakho lobuqu ngaphandle kokunikela ngezi nkonzo kwiSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, yaye kulindelwe ukuba balondoloze ubumfihlo bolwazi lwakho.
Onke amaqela esithathu anjengalawo athintelekile ekusebenziseni iinkcukacha zobuqu bakho ngaphandle kokuba anikela ezi nkonzo kwiSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, ngokunjalo xa kufuneka ukuba egcine iinkcukacha zakho njengemfihlelo.
Zonke ezo nkampani zangaphandle ziyathintelwa ukuze zingazisebenzisi iinkcukacha zakho ngaphandle nje kokunikezelwa kweenkonzo kwiSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini, kulindeleke ukuba iinkampani zangaphandle ziyigcine imfihlelo emalunga neenkcukacha zomxumi.
Bonke abanye abantu abanjalo bathintelwe ekusebenziseni ulwazi lwakho lobuqu ngaphandle kokunikela ngezi nkonzo kwiSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, yaye kulindelwe ukuba balondoloze ubumfihlo bolwazi lwakho.
Onke amaqela esithathu anjengalawo athintelekile ekusebenziseni iinkcukacha zobuqu bakho ngaphandle kokuba anikela ezi nkonzo kwiSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, ngokunjalo xa kufuneka ukuba egcine iinkcukacha zakho njengemfihlelo.
Zonke ezo nkampani zangaphandle ziyathintelwa ukuze zingazisebenzisi iinkcukacha zakho ngaphandle nje kokunikezelwa kweenkonzo kwiSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini, kulindeleke ukuba iinkampani zangaphandle ziyigcine imfihlelo emalunga neenkcukacha zomxumi.
Abangeneleli abanjalo bayathintelwa ekusebenziseni iinkcukacha zokobuqu ngaphandle nje kokubonelela ngeenkonzo kwiSebe lezeZindlu, kwaye kudingeka ukuba bazigcine iinkcukacha zakho zisekhusini.
Onke amaqela esithathu anjengalawo athintelekile ekusebenziseni iinkcukacha zobuqu bakho ngaphandle kokuba anikela ezi nkonzo kwiSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, ngokunjalo xa kufuneka ukuba egcine iinkcukacha zakho njengemfihlelo.
Zonke ezo nkampani zangaphandle ziyathintelwa ukuze zingazisebenzisi iinkcukacha zakho ngaphandle nje kokunikezelwa kweenkonzo kwiSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini, kulindeleke ukuba iinkampani zangaphandle ziyigcine imfihlelo emalunga neenkcukacha zomxumi.
Abangeneleli abanjalo bayathintelwa ekusebenziseni iinkcukacha zokobuqu ngaphandle nje kokubonelela ngeenkonzo kwiSebe lezeZindlu, kwaye kudingeka ukuba bazigcine iinkcukacha zakho zisekhusini.
Bonke abanye abantu abanjalo bathintelwe ekusebenziseni ulwazi lwakho lobuqu ngaphandle kokunikela ngezi nkonzo kwiSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, yaye kulindelwe ukuba balondoloze ubumfihlo bolwazi lwakho.
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini aliziniki mntu  iinkcukacha ezinobuzaza ezimalunga nawe ezifana nohlanga lwakho, nengqobhoko okanye nemibutho yezopolitiko ozimanye nayo, oko alikwenzi  lingakhange lifumane mvume yakho. 
ISebe lezeZindlu alizisebenzisi okanye lizithi pahaha iinkcukacha zakho zokobuqu eziyimfihlelo, ezinjengohlanga, inkolo, okanye ubulungu kwezopolitiko, lingafumana mvume icacileyo kuwe.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala alisebenzisi okanye libhengeze ulwazi lobuqu oluntununtunu, olufana nohlanga, unqulo, okanye umanyano lwezopolitiko, ngaphandle kwemvume yakho ecacileyo.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala alisebenzisi futhi lingazityhili iinkcukacha zobuqu bakho ezinobuntununtunu ezifana nohlanga lwakho, inkolo, okanye ezopolitiko ozimanye nalo, ngaphandle kwemvume yakho ecacileyo.
ISebe lezeZindlu alizisebenzisi okanye lizithi pahaha iinkcukacha zakho zokobuqu eziyimfihlelo, ezinjengohlanga, inkolo, okanye ubulungu kwezopolitiko, lingafumana mvume icacileyo kuwe.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala alisebenzisi okanye libhengeze ulwazi lobuqu oluntununtunu, olufana nohlanga, unqulo, okanye umanyano lwezopolitiko, ngaphandle kwemvume yakho ecacileyo.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala alisebenzisi futhi lingazityhili iinkcukacha zobuqu bakho ezinobuntununtunu ezifana nohlanga lwakho, inkolo, okanye ezopolitiko ozimanye nalo, ngaphandle kwemvume yakho ecacileyo.
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini aliziniki mntu  iinkcukacha ezinobuzaza ezimalunga nawe ezifana nohlanga lwakho, nengqobhoko okanye nemibutho yezopolitiko ozimanye nayo, oko alikwenzi  lingakhange lifumane mvume yakho. 
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala alisebenzisi okanye libhengeze ulwazi lobuqu oluntununtunu, olufana nohlanga, unqulo, okanye umanyano lwezopolitiko, ngaphandle kwemvume yakho ecacileyo.

ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala alisebenzisi okanye libhengeze ulwazi lobuqu oluntununtunu, olufana nohlanga, unqulo, okanye umanyano lwezopolitiko, ngaphandle kwemvume yakho ecacileyo.
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini liyawulandela umkhondo weewebhusayithi kunye namaphepha ekutyhilwa kuwo ngabaxumi kweli Sebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini, injongo yeyokuhlola ukuba zeziphi na ezona nkonzo zithandwayo zeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini.
ISebe lezeZindlu liyayigcina ingxelo yeewebhusayithi kwanamacwecwe andwendwelwa ngabaxumi bethu apha kwiSebe lezeZindlu, ukuze libone ukuba zeziphi iinkonzo zeSebe lezeZindlu ezizezona zithandwayo. 
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ligcina umkhondo weewebhusayithi namaphepha atyelelwa ngabathengi balo ngaphakathi kweSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, ngenjongo yokumisela ukuba zeziphi iinkonzo zeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ezithandwa ngokugqithisileyo. 
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala liyawulandela umkhondo weewebhusayithi namakhasi atyelelwa ngabaxumi bethu phakathi kweSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, ukuze kufunyaniswe ukuba zeziphi na iinkonzo ezithandwa kakhulu zeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala.
ISebe lezeZindlu liyayigcina ingxelo yeewebhusayithi kwanamacwecwe andwendwelwa ngabaxumi bethu apha kwiSebe lezeZindlu, ukuze libone ukuba zeziphi iinkonzo zeSebe lezeZindlu ezizezona zithandwayo.

ISebe lezeZindlu liyayigcina ingxelo yeewebhusayithi kwanamacwecwe andwendwelwa ngabaxumi bethu apha kwiSebe lezeZindlu, ukuze libone ukuba zeziphi iinkonzo zeSebe lezeZindlu ezizezona zithandwayo. 
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ligcina umkhondo weewebhusayithi namaphepha atyelelwa ngabathengi balo ngaphakathi kweSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, ngenjongo yokumisela ukuba zeziphi iinkonzo zeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ezithandwa ngokugqithisileyo. 
Ezi nkcukacha zisetyenziselwa ukuba zinikezelwe njengesiqulatho esilungisiweyo nekwazisiweyo ngaso kwabeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini abaxumi ababonakalisa ukuba nomdla kwimibandela othile.
Ezi nkcukacha zisetyenziselwa ukunikezela ngezinto kwanezibhengezo ezikhethekileyo kwiSebe lezeZindlu kubaxumi abanesimo ezibonisa ukuba banomdla kumba othile.
Olu lwazi oluqokelelweyo lusetyenziswa ukunikela ngesiqulatho esakhiweyo nokwazisa ngaphakathi kweSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala kubaxumi abo ukuziphatha kwabo kubonisa ukuba banomdla kwicandelo lomba othile.
Ezi nkcukacha zisetyenziselwa ukunikela ngeziqulatho ezilungiselelwe wena nokuthumela izaziso kubaxumi beSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala abaziphethe ngendlela eyalatha ukuba banomdla kumxholo othile.
Ezi nkcukacha zisetyenziselwa ukunikezela ngezinto kwanezibhengezo ezikhethekileyo kwiSebe lezeZindlu kubaxumi abanesimo ezibonisa ukuba banomdla kumba othile.
Olu lwazi oluqokelelweyo lusetyenziswa ukunikela ngesiqulatho esakhiweyo nokwazisa ngaphakathi kweSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala kubaxumi abo ukuziphatha kwabo kubonisa ukuba banomdla kwicandelo lomba othile.

Olu lwazi oluqokelelweyo lusetyenziswa ukunikela ngesiqulatho esakhiweyo nokwazisa ngaphakathi kweSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala kubaxumi abo ukuziphatha kwabo kubonisa ukuba banomdla kwicandelo lomba othile.
Ezi nkcukacha zisetyenziselwa ukunikela ngeziqulatho ezilungiselelwe wena nokuthumela izaziso kubaxumi beSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala abaziphethe ngendlela eyalatha ukuba banomdla kumxholo othile.
Ezi nkcukacha zisetyenziselwa ukuba zinikezelwe njengesiqulatho esilungisiweyo nekwazisiweyo ngaso kwabeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini abaxumi ababonakalisa ukuba nomdla kwimibandela othile.
Ezi nkcukacha zisetyenziselwa ukunikezela ngezinto kwanezibhengezo ezikhethekileyo kwiSebe lezeZindlu kubaxumi abanesimo ezibonisa ukuba banomdla kumba othile.
Ezi nkcukacha zisetyenziselwa ukunikela ngeziqulatho ezilungiselelwe wena nokuthumela izaziso kubaxumi beSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala abaziphethe ngendlela eyalatha ukuba banomdla kumxholo othile.
Ezi nkcukacha zisetyenziselwa ukuba zinikezelwe njengesiqulatho esilungisiweyo nekwazisiweyo ngaso kwabeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini abaxumi ababonakalisa ukuba nomdla kwimibandela othile.
Ezi nkcukacha zisetyenziselwa ukunikezela ngezinto kwanezibhengezo ezikhethekileyo kwiSebe lezeZindlu kubaxumi abanesimo ezibonisa ukuba banomdla kumba othile.
Olu lwazi oluqokelelweyo lusetyenziswa ukunikela ngesiqulatho esakhiweyo nokwazisa ngaphakathi kweSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala kubaxumi abo ukuziphatha kwabo kubonisa ukuba banomdla kwicandelo lomba othile.
Iiwebhusayithi zeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini lingazibhengeza iinkcukacha ezimalunga nawe lingakwazisanga, oko lingakwenza xa zifunwayo ngumthetho okanye xa libona ukuba siyimfuneko isenzo esinjalo:  (a) oko kuyahambelana nemimiselo yomthetho okanye kuyayithobela  inkqubo esemthethweni esetyenziswayo kweliSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini okanye newebhusayithi;(b) oko kuyawakhusela, kuyawaxhasa  amalungelookanye izindlu nemihlaba yeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini, kwaye, (c) kusetyenzwa phantsi kweemeko zentswelo nobunzima kukhuselwa abasebenzisi beSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini, okanye uluntu  jikelele.
Iiwebhusayithi zeSebe lezeZindlu zizakuzibeka elubala iinkcukacha zakho zokobuqu, ungaziswanga, kuphela ukuba oko kuyekwafuneka ngokusemthethweni okanye xa kukholeleka ukuba inyathelo elinjalo liyimfuneko ukuze: (a) kuhambisane nemimiselo yomthetho okanye ivumelane neenkqubo ezisemthethweni ezikwiSebe lezeZindlu okanye kwisiza; (b) kukhusela amalungelo okanye impahla yeSebe lezeZindlu; and, (c) lisebenze phantsi kweemeko zongxamiseko ukuze kukhuselwe ukhuseleko lokobuqu lwabo basebenzisa iSebe lezeZindlu, okanye uluntu ngokubanzi.
Iiwebhusayithi zeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ziya kuxela ulwazi lwakho lobuqu, ngaphandle kwesaziso, kuphela ukuba kufuneka lenze njalo ngumthetho okanye ngomoya omhle nenkolo yokuba inyathelo elinjalo liyafuneka ukuze: (a) kulungelelaniswe nemimiselo yomthetho okanye kuthotyelwe iinkqubo zomthetho ezithunyelwe kwiSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala okanye isiza; (b) kukhuselwe yaye kuthethelelwe amalungelo okanye impahla yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala; yaye, (c) kusetyenzwe phantsi kweemeko ezingxamisekileyo ukukhusela ukhuseleko lobuqu lwabasebenzisi beSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, okanye uluntu.
Iiwebhusayithi zeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ziya kuzityhila iinkcukacha zobuqu bakho, ngaphandle kwesaziso, kuphela xa zifunwa ngokomthetho okanye ngenxa yenkolelo yobulungisa ekubeni inyathelo elinjalo liyimfuneko ukuze: (a) kuqhutywe ngokwemimiselo yomthetho okanye kuthotyelwe inkqubo yasemthethweni elawula iSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala okanye isiza; (b) kukhuselwe futhi kuxhaswe amalungelo okanye impahla yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala; kananjalo, (c) kuthathwe amanyathelo angxamisekileyo ukuxhasa ukhuselo lobuqu babasebenzisi beSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala okanye loluntu.
Iiwebhusayithi zeSebe lezeZindlu zizakuzibeka elubala iinkcukacha zakho zokobuqu, ungaziswanga, kuphela ukuba oko kuyekwafuneka ngokusemthethweni okanye xa kukholeleka ukuba inyathelo elinjalo liyimfuneko ukuze: (a) kuhambisane nemimiselo yomthetho okanye ivumelane neenkqubo ezisemthethweni ezikwiSebe lezeZindlu okanye kwisiza; (b) kukhusela amalungelo okanye impahla yeSebe lezeZindlu; and, (c) lisebenze phantsi kweemeko zongxamiseko ukuze kukhuselwe ukhuseleko lokobuqu lwabo basebenzisa iSebe lezeZindlu, okanye uluntu ngokubanzi.
Iiwebhusayithi zeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ziya kuxela ulwazi lwakho lobuqu, ngaphandle kwesaziso, kuphela ukuba kufuneka lenze njalo ngumthetho okanye ngomoya omhle nenkolo yokuba inyathelo elinjalo liyafuneka ukuze: (a) kulungelelaniswe nemimiselo yomthetho okanye kuthotyelwe iinkqubo zomthetho ezithunyelwe kwiSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala okanye isiza; (b) kukhuselwe yaye kuthethelelwe amalungelo okanye impahla yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala; yaye, (c) kusetyenzwe phantsi kweemeko ezingxamisekileyo ukukhusela ukhuseleko lobuqu lwabasebenzisi beSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, okanye uluntu.
Iiwebhusayithi zeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ziya kuzityhila iinkcukacha zobuqu bakho, ngaphandle kwesaziso, kuphela xa zifunwa ngokomthetho okanye ngenxa yenkolelo yobulungisa ekubeni inyathelo elinjalo liyimfuneko ukuze: (a) kuqhutywe ngokwemimiselo yomthetho okanye kuthotyelwe inkqubo yasemthethweni elawula iSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala okanye isiza; (b) kukhuselwe futhi kuxhaswe amalungelo okanye impahla yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala; kananjalo, (c) kuthathwe amanyathelo angxamisekileyo ukuxhasa ukhuselo lobuqu babasebenzisi beSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala okanye loluntu.

Iiwebhusayithi zeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ziya kuzityhila iinkcukacha zobuqu bakho, ngaphandle kwesaziso, kuphela xa zifunwa ngokomthetho okanye ngenxa yenkolelo yobulungisa ekubeni inyathelo elinjalo liyimfuneko ukuze: (a) kuqhutywe ngokwemimiselo yomthetho okanye kuthotyelwe inkqubo yasemthethweni elawula iSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala okanye isiza; (b) kukhuselwe futhi kuxhaswe amalungelo okanye impahla yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala; kananjalo, (c) kuthathwe amanyathelo angxamisekileyo ukuxhasa ukhuselo lobuqu babasebenzisi beSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala okanye loluntu.
Iiwebhusayithi zeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini lingazibhengeza iinkcukacha ezimalunga nawe lingakwazisanga, oko lingakwenza xa zifunwayo ngumthetho okanye xa libona ukuba siyimfuneko isenzo esinjalo:  (a) oko kuyahambelana nemimiselo yomthetho okanye kuyayithobela  inkqubo esemthethweni esetyenziswayo kweliSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini okanye newebhusayithi;(b) oko kuyawakhusela, kuyawaxhasa  amalungelookanye izindlu nemihlaba yeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini, kwaye, (c) kusetyenzwa phantsi kweemeko zentswelo nobunzima kukhuselwa abasebenzisi beSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini, okanye uluntu  jikelele.
Iiwebhusayithi zeSebe lezeZindlu zizakuzibeka elubala iinkcukacha zakho zokobuqu, ungaziswanga, kuphela ukuba oko kuyekwafuneka ngokusemthethweni okanye xa kukholeleka ukuba inyathelo elinjalo liyimfuneko ukuze: (a) kuhambisane nemimiselo yomthetho okanye ivumelane neenkqubo ezisemthethweni ezikwiSebe lezeZindlu okanye kwisiza; (b) kukhusela amalungelo okanye impahla yeSebe lezeZindlu; and, (c) lisebenze phantsi kweemeko zongxamiseko ukuze kukhuselwe ukhuseleko lokobuqu lwabo basebenzisa iSebe lezeZindlu, okanye uluntu ngokubanzi.
Iiwebhusayithi zeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ziya kuxela ulwazi lwakho lobuqu, ngaphandle kwesaziso, kuphela ukuba kufuneka lenze njalo ngumthetho okanye ngomoya omhle nenkolo yokuba inyathelo elinjalo liyafuneka ukuze: (a) kulungelelaniswe nemimiselo yomthetho okanye kuthotyelwe iinkqubo zomthetho ezithunyelwe kwiSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala okanye isiza; (b) kukhuselwe yaye kuthethelelwe amalungelo okanye impahla yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala; yaye, (c) kusetyenzwe phantsi kweemeko ezingxamisekileyo ukukhusela ukhuseleko lobuqu lwabasebenzisi beSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, okanye uluntu.
Ukusetyenziswa kweekhukhi 
Ukusetyenziswa kwamaKhuki
Usetyenziso lwesiKhangelisi esincinci sekhompyutha
Ukusetyenziswa kweMiyalezo yeKhompyutha kuMsebenzisi
Ukusetyenziswa kwamaKhuki
Usetyenziso lwesiKhangelisi esincinci sekhompyutha
Ukusetyenziswa kweMiyalezo yeKhompyutha kuMsebenzisi
Ukusetyenziswa kweekhukhi 
Usetyenziso lwesiKhangelisi esincinci sekhompyutha
Ukusetyenziswa kweMiyalezo yeKhompyutha kuMsebenzisi
Ukusetyenziswa kweekhukhi 
Ukusetyenziswa kwamaKhuki
Ukusetyenziswa kweMiyalezo yeKhompyutha kuMsebenzisi
Ukusetyenziswa kweekhukhi 
Ukusetyenziswa kwamaKhuki
Usetyenziso lwesiKhangelisi esincinci sekhompyutha
Iwebhusayithi yeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini isebenzisa  “amakhukhi” ekukuncedeni ukuze ubenawo amava okusebenzisa i-intanethi.
Iwebhusayithi yeSebe lezeZindlu lisebenzisa ”iikhuki” ukukunceda ekusebenziseni kwakho kweenkonzo zeinthaneti kube kokwakho ngokobuqu.
Iwebhusayithi yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala isebenzisa "izikhangelisi ezincinci" ukukunceda ukwenza ukusebenza kwakho kwiwebhusayithi kube kokobuqu. 
Iwebhusayithi yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala isebenzisa imiyalezo yekhompyutha kumsebenzisi ukunceda wena ngokwenza amava akho ngekhompyutha ukuba abe ngawobuqu bakho.
Iwebhusayithi yeSebe lezeZindlu lisebenzisa ”iikhuki” ukukunceda ekusebenziseni kwakho kweenkonzo zeinthaneti kube kokwakho ngokobuqu.

Ikhukhi yifayile yemibhalo efakwa kwidiskhi yakho yinkqubo yekhompyutha.
iiKhuki yifayile eyiteksi ebekwe kwidiskhi efumaneka kwiseva kwicwecwe lewebhusayithi
Isikhangelisi esincinci yifayili yombhalo ebekwa kwidiski elikhuni ngumnikeli wekhasi lewebhusayithi. 
Umyalezo wekhompyutha kumsebenzisi yifayili yokubhaliweyo efakwa kwidiski yakho ngumniki-nkonzo wekhasi lewebhu.
iiKhuki yifayile eyiteksi ebekwe kwidiskhi efumaneka kwiseva kwicwecwe lewebhusayithi
Isikhangelisi esincinci yifayili yombhalo ebekwa kwidiski elikhuni ngumnikeli wekhasi lewebhusayithi.

Ikhukhi yifayile yemibhalo efakwa kwidiskhi yakho yinkqubo yekhompyutha.

iiKhuki yifayile eyiteksi ebekwe kwidiskhi efumaneka kwiseva kwicwecwe lewebhusayithi
Isikhangelisi esincinci yifayili yombhalo ebekwa kwidiski elikhuni ngumnikeli wekhasi lewebhusayithi. 
Iikhukhi azinakusetyenziselwa iinkqubo okanye azinakuzisa iivirusi kwikhompyutha yakho.
IKhuki ayinakusetyenziselwa iiprogramu okanye ukuthumela iivayirasi ekhumpyutheni yakho.
Izikhangelisi ezincinci azinako ukusetyenziswa ukuqhuba iinkqubo okanye ukuthumela iivirusi kwikhompyutha yakho. 
Imiyalezo yekhompyutha kumsebenzisi ayinakusetyenziselwa ukuqhuba iinkqubo okanye ukufaka iivayirasi ekhompyutheni yakho.
IKhuki ayinakusetyenziselwa iiprogramu okanye ukuthumela iivayirasi ekhumpyutheni yakho.

Iikhukhi azinakusetyenziselwa iinkqubo okanye azinakuzisa iivirusi kwikhompyutha yakho.
IKhuki ayinakusetyenziselwa iiprogramu okanye ukuthumela iivayirasi ekhumpyutheni yakho.
Izikhangelisi ezincinci azinako ukusetyenziswa ukuqhuba iinkqubo okanye ukuthumela iivirusi kwikhompyutha yakho. 
Amakhukhi alungiselelwa wena wedwa, zingafundwa kuphela yinkqubo yekhompyutha kwimihlaba ephantsi kolawule ethumele ezo fayile kuwe.
iiKhuki zithunyelwa kuwe ngokukodwa, kwaye zingafundwa kuphela yiseva yewebhu kwidomeyini ekuthumelele iiKhuki.
Izikhangelisi ezincinci zabelwa kuwe ngokukodwa, yaye zingafundwa kuphela ngumnikeli wewebhusayithi kummandla othumele isikhangelisi esincinci kuwe.
Imiyalezo yekhompyutha kumsebenzisi enikwa wena yeyakho kuphela, kwaye inokufundwa ngumniki-nkonzo wewebhu kummandla womxholo okunike umyalezo wekhompyutha.
iiKhuki zithunyelwa kuwe ngokukodwa, kwaye zingafundwa kuphela yiseva yewebhu kwidomeyini ekuthumelele iiKhuki.
Izikhangelisi ezincinci zabelwa kuwe ngokukodwa, yaye zingafundwa kuphela ngumnikeli wewebhusayithi kummandla othumele isikhangelisi esincinci kuwe.

Enye yeenjongo eziphambili zezo fayile kukubonelela wena ngobume obunokuyenza ibe lula imisebenzi yesiqhelo nobulongayo  ixesha lakho.
Enye yezona njongo ziphambili zeekhuki kukubonelela ngophawu oluluncedo oluzakukongela ixesha.
Enye yeenjongo ezingundoqo zezikhangelisi ezincinci kukunikela ngomqondiso oncedayo wokukongela ixesha. 
Enye yeenjongo eziphambili zemiyalezo yekhompyutha kumsebenzisi kukunikela ngophawu loncedo ukuze kongeke ixesha lakho.
Enye yezona njongo ziphambili zeekhuki kukubonelela ngophawu oluluncedo oluzakukongela ixesha.
Enye yeenjongo ezingundoqo zezikhangelisi ezincinci kukunikela ngomqondiso oncedayo wokukongela ixesha.

Enye yeenjongo eziphambili zezo fayile kukubonelela wena ngobume obunokuyenza ibe lula imisebenzi yesiqhelo nobulongayo  ixesha lakho.
Enye yezona njongo ziphambili zeekhuki kukubonelela ngophawu oluluncedo oluzakukongela ixesha.
Enye yeenjongo ezingundoqo zezikhangelisi ezincinci kukunikela ngomqondiso oncedayo wokukongela ixesha. 
Injongo yeekhukhi kukwazisa  inkqubo yekhompyutha ngokubuyela kwakho kwikhasi elikhethekileyo.
Injongo yeekhuki kukuchazela iseva yewebhu ukuba ubuyele kwicwecwe elithile.
Injongo yesikhangelisi esincinci kukuxelela umnikeli wewebhusayithi ukuthi ubuyile kwiphepha elingundoqo. 
Injongo yomyalezo wekhompyutha kumsebenzisi kukwazisa umniki-nkonzo wewebhu ukuba sowubuyele kwikhasi elithile.
Injongo yeekhuki kukuchazela iseva yewebhu ukuba ubuyele kwicwecwe elithile.
Injongo yesikhangelisi esincinci kukuxelela umnikeli wewebhusayithi ukuthi ubuyile kwiphepha elingundoqo. 
Injongo yomyalezo wekhompyutha kumsebenzisi kukwazisa umniki-nkonzo wewebhu ukuba sowubuyele kwikhasi elithile.
Injongo yeekhukhi kukwazisa  inkqubo yekhompyutha ngokubuyela kwakho kwikhasi elikhethekileyo.
Injongo yesikhangelisi esincinci kukuxelela umnikeli wewebhusayithi ukuthi ubuyile kwiphepha elingundoqo. 
Injongo yomyalezo wekhompyutha kumsebenzisi kukwazisa umniki-nkonzo wewebhu ukuba sowubuyele kwikhasi elithile.
Injongo yeekhukhi kukwazisa  inkqubo yekhompyutha ngokubuyela kwakho kwikhasi elikhethekileyo.
Injongo yeekhuki kukuchazela iseva yewebhu ukuba ubuyele kwicwecwe elithile.
Injongo yomyalezo wekhompyutha kumsebenzisi kukwazisa umniki-nkonzo wewebhu ukuba sowubuyele kwikhasi elithile.
Injongo yeekhukhi kukwazisa  inkqubo yekhompyutha ngokubuyela kwakho kwikhasi elikhethekileyo.
Injongo yeekhuki kukuchazela iseva yewebhu ukuba ubuyele kwicwecwe elithile.
Injongo yesikhangelisi esincinci kukuxelela umnikeli wewebhusayithi ukuthi ubuyile kwiphepha elingundoqo. 
Umzekelo, ukuba amakhasi eSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini uwenze awakho, okanye ubhalisa kwiwebhusayithi yeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini okanye kwiinkonzo zalo, iikhukhi inceda iSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini ukuba malizikhumbule iinkcukacha zakho ezikhethekileyo xa kutyelelwayo apho emva koko.
Umzekelo, ukuba uwenze awobuqu amacwecwe eSebe lezeZindlu, okanye ubhalise kwisayithi okanye kwiinkonzo zeSebe lezeZindlu, ikhukhi inceda iSebe lezeZindlu ukuba akhumbule iinkcukacha ezikhethekileyo kundwendwelo olulandelayo.
Ukwenza umzekelo, ukuba ushicilela isaziso sakho kumaphepha eSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, okanye ubhalisa kwisiza okanye kwiinkonzo zeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, isikhangelisi esincinci sinceda iSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ukubuyisa ulwazi lwakho olungundoqo  kumatyelelo alandelayo. 
Umzekelo, ukuba amakhasi eSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala uwenza awobuqu bakho, okanye ubhalisa kwisiza okanye kwiinkonzo zeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, umyalezo wekhompyutha kumsebenzisi unceda iSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ukuba libuyise iinkcukacha zakho ezithile kumathuba otyelelo alandelelanayo.
Umzekelo, ukuba uwenze awobuqu amacwecwe eSebe lezeZindlu, okanye ubhalise kwisayithi okanye kwiinkonzo zeSebe lezeZindlu, ikhukhi inceda iSebe lezeZindlu ukuba akhumbule iinkcukacha ezikhethekileyo kundwendwelo olulandelayo.
Ukwenza umzekelo, ukuba ushicilela isaziso sakho kumaphepha eSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, okanye ubhalisa kwisiza okanye kwiinkonzo zeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, isikhangelisi esincinci sinceda iSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ukubuyisa ulwazi lwakho olungundoqo  kumatyelelo alandelayo. 
Umzekelo, ukuba amakhasi eSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala uwenza awobuqu bakho, okanye ubhalisa kwisiza okanye kwiinkonzo zeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, umyalezo wekhompyutha kumsebenzisi unceda iSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ukuba libuyise iinkcukacha zakho ezithile kumathuba otyelelo alandelelanayo.
Umzekelo, ukuba amakhasi eSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini uwenze awakho, okanye ubhalisa kwiwebhusayithi yeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini okanye kwiinkonzo zalo, iikhukhi inceda iSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini ukuba malizikhumbule iinkcukacha zakho ezikhethekileyo xa kutyelelwayo apho emva koko.
Ukwenza umzekelo, ukuba ushicilela isaziso sakho kumaphepha eSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, okanye ubhalisa kwisiza okanye kwiinkonzo zeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, isikhangelisi esincinci sinceda iSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ukubuyisa ulwazi lwakho olungundoqo  kumatyelelo alandelayo. 
Umzekelo, ukuba amakhasi eSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala uwenza awobuqu bakho, okanye ubhalisa kwisiza okanye kwiinkonzo zeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, umyalezo wekhompyutha kumsebenzisi unceda iSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ukuba libuyise iinkcukacha zakho ezithile kumathuba otyelelo alandelelanayo.
Umzekelo, ukuba amakhasi eSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini uwenze awakho, okanye ubhalisa kwiwebhusayithi yeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini okanye kwiinkonzo zalo, iikhukhi inceda iSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini ukuba malizikhumbule iinkcukacha zakho ezikhethekileyo xa kutyelelwayo apho emva koko.
Umzekelo, ukuba uwenze awobuqu amacwecwe eSebe lezeZindlu, okanye ubhalise kwisayithi okanye kwiinkonzo zeSebe lezeZindlu, ikhukhi inceda iSebe lezeZindlu ukuba akhumbule iinkcukacha ezikhethekileyo kundwendwelo olulandelayo.
Umzekelo, ukuba amakhasi eSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala uwenza awobuqu bakho, okanye ubhalisa kwisiza okanye kwiinkonzo zeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, umyalezo wekhompyutha kumsebenzisi unceda iSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ukuba libuyise iinkcukacha zakho ezithile kumathuba otyelelo alandelelanayo.
Umzekelo, ukuba amakhasi eSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini uwenze awakho, okanye ubhalisa kwiwebhusayithi yeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini okanye kwiinkonzo zalo, iikhukhi inceda iSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini ukuba malizikhumbule iinkcukacha zakho ezikhethekileyo xa kutyelelwayo apho emva koko.
Umzekelo, ukuba uwenze awobuqu amacwecwe eSebe lezeZindlu, okanye ubhalise kwisayithi okanye kwiinkonzo zeSebe lezeZindlu, ikhukhi inceda iSebe lezeZindlu ukuba akhumbule iinkcukacha ezikhethekileyo kundwendwelo olulandelayo.
Ukwenza umzekelo, ukuba ushicilela isaziso sakho kumaphepha eSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, okanye ubhalisa kwisiza okanye kwiinkonzo zeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, isikhangelisi esincinci sinceda iSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ukubuyisa ulwazi lwakho olungundoqo  kumatyelelo alandelayo. 
Oku kuyenza lula inkqubo yokubhalwa kweenkcukacha ezizezakho, ezifana nedilesi ze-akhawunti, iidilesi zokuthumela ngeenqanawa, njalo-njalo. 
Oku kwenza inkqubo yokurekhoda iinkcukacha zakho ibelula, njengedilesi yebhili, iidilesi zeposi, njalo njalo.
Oku kwenza lula inkqubo yokubhalisa ulwazi lwakho lobuqu, olufana nedilesi zokuthumela izikweliti, iidilesi zokuthumela iimpahla, njalo njalo. 
Oku kuyenza lula inkqubo yokugcina iinkcukacha zobuqu bakho, ezifana neeadresi zokuthumela iimbalelwano zeentlawulo ezifunekayo, iiadresi zokuthumela impahla ngenqanawa, njalo njalo.
Oku kwenza inkqubo yokurekhoda iinkcukacha zakho ibelula, njengedilesi yebhili, iidilesi zeposi, njalo njalo.
Oku kwenza lula inkqubo yokubhalisa ulwazi lwakho lobuqu, olufana nedilesi zokuthumela izikweliti, iidilesi zokuthumela iimpahla, njalo njalo.

Oku kwenza inkqubo yokurekhoda iinkcukacha zakho ibelula, njengedilesi yebhili, iidilesi zeposi, njalo njalo.
Oku kwenza lula inkqubo yokubhalisa ulwazi lwakho lobuqu, olufana nedilesi zokuthumela izikweliti, iidilesi zokuthumela iimpahla, njalo njalo. 
Xa ubuyela kwakulaa webhusayithi yeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini, zingafumaneka iinkcukacha obunikezele ngazo, lilonke ungazisebenzisa  iimpawu obuzilungiselele zona zeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini
Xa ubuyela kwakule webhusayithi yeSebe lezeZindlu, iinkcukacha onikezele ngazo ngaphambili zisenokufumaneka ukuze ukwazi ukusebenzisa lula iimpawu zeSebe lezeZindlu ozikhethele zona wena.
Xa ubuyela kwiwebhusayithi efanayo yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, ulwazi onikele ngalo ngaphambili lungabuyiswa, ngako oko ungasebenzisa lula iimpawu zeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ozakhileyo.
Xa sowubuyela kwiwebhusayithi yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, iinkcukacha obuzinike ngaphambili zisenokubuyiswa, ngoko ke unakho ukuzisebenzisa lula iimpawu obuzilungiselele zona zeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala.
Xa ubuyela kwakule webhusayithi yeSebe lezeZindlu, iinkcukacha onikezele ngazo ngaphambili zisenokufumaneka ukuze ukwazi ukusebenzisa lula iimpawu zeSebe lezeZindlu ozikhethele zona wena.
Xa ubuyela kwiwebhusayithi efanayo yeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala, ulwazi onikele ngalo ngaphambili lungabuyiswa, ngako oko ungasebenzisa lula iimpawu zeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ozakhileyo.

Unesakhono sokuzamkela okanye sokungazamkeli iikhukhi.
Unaso isakhono sokuzamkela okanye sozikukhaba iikhuki.
Unako ukwamkela okanye ukulandula izikhangelisi ezincinci. 
Unesakhono sokuyamkela okanye sokuyikhaba imiyalezo yekhompyutha kumsebenzisi.
Unaso isakhono sokuzamkela okanye sozikukhaba iikhuki.
Unako ukwamkela okanye ukulandula izikhangelisi ezincinci. 
Unesakhono sokuyamkela okanye sokuyikhaba imiyalezo yekhompyutha kumsebenzisi.
Unesakhono sokuzamkela okanye sokungazamkeli iikhukhi.
Unako ukwamkela okanye ukulandula izikhangelisi ezincinci. 
Unesakhono sokuyamkela okanye sokuyikhaba imiyalezo yekhompyutha kumsebenzisi.
Unesakhono sokuzamkela okanye sokungazamkeli iikhukhi.
Unaso isakhono sokuzamkela okanye sozikukhaba iikhuki.
Unesakhono sokuyamkela okanye sokuyikhaba imiyalezo yekhompyutha kumsebenzisi.
Unesakhono sokuzamkela okanye sokungazamkeli iikhukhi.
Unaso isakhono sokuzamkela okanye sozikukhaba iikhuki.
Unako ukwamkela okanye ukulandula izikhangelisi ezincinci. 
Iinkqubo zokuzifundela nje kodwa kuyazenzekela ukuba zamkele amakhukhi, kodwa amalungiselelo akho okufunda nje kodwa ungawaguqula atsho akwazi ukungawamkeli amakhukhi xa ufuna ngolo hlobo.
Iibrawuza ezininzi zewebhusayithi ziyazamkela nje iikhuki, kodwa usenokuzihlaziya iindlela ozikhethileyo zokusebenzisa ibrawuza ukuze zizikhabe iikhuki ukuba ufuna ngolo hlobo.
Uninzi lwezikhangelisi zewebhusayithi zamkela izikhangelisi ezincinci ngokuzenzekelayo, kodwa ngamaxa amaninzi unganako ukulungisa isimo sesikhangelisi sakho ukulandula izikhangelisi ezincinci ukuba ukhetha njalo. 
Uninzi lwezikhangelisi zeewebhusayithi luyamkela ngendlela ezenzekelayo imiyalezo yekhompyutha kumsebenzisi kodwa usenakho nokusoloko uyihlengahlengisa indlela osete ngayo isikhangelisi sakho ukuze uyikhabe imiyalezo yekhompyutha kumsebenzisi yakho xa uthanda.
Iibrawuza ezininzi zewebhusayithi ziyazamkela nje iikhuki, kodwa usenokuzihlaziya iindlela ozikhethileyo zokusebenzisa ibrawuza ukuze zizikhabe iikhuki ukuba ufuna ngolo hlobo.
Uninzi lwezikhangelisi zewebhusayithi zamkela izikhangelisi ezincinci ngokuzenzekelayo, kodwa ngamaxa amaninzi unganako ukulungisa isimo sesikhangelisi sakho ukulandula izikhangelisi ezincinci ukuba ukhetha njalo.

Iibrawuza ezininzi zewebhusayithi ziyazamkela nje iikhuki, kodwa usenokuzihlaziya iindlela ozikhethileyo zokusebenzisa ibrawuza ukuze zizikhabe iikhuki ukuba ufuna ngolo hlobo.
Uninzi lwezikhangelisi zewebhusayithi zamkela izikhangelisi ezincinci ngokuzenzekelayo, kodwa ngamaxa amaninzi unganako ukulungisa isimo sesikhangelisi sakho ukulandula izikhangelisi ezincinci ukuba ukhetha njalo. 
Xa ukhetha ukungawamkeli amakhukhi,  usenokungakwazi ukuziqhelanisa nentsebenziswano kwiinkonzo zeSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini okanye neewebhusayithi otyhila kuzo.
Ukuba ukhetha ukuzikhaba iikhukhi, usenokungakwazi ukuzisebenzisa iimpawu zokufumana iinkonzo zeSebe lezeZindlu okanye iiwebhusayithi ongenayo kuzo.
Ukuba ukhetha ukulandula izikhangelisi ezincinci, kunokwenzeka ungabinako ukufumana amava apheleleyo eempawu ezisebenzisanayo zeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala okanye iiwebhusayithi ozityelelayo.
Ukuba ukhetha ukuyikhaba imiyalezo yekhompyutha kumsebenzisi, usenokungakwazi ukuzisebenzisa ngokupheleleyo iimpawu ezisebenzisanayo zeenkonzo zeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala okanye iiwebhusayithi ozityelelayo.
Ukuba ukhetha ukuzikhaba iikhukhi, usenokungakwazi ukuzisebenzisa iimpawu zokufumana iinkonzo zeSebe lezeZindlu okanye iiwebhusayithi ongenayo kuzo.
Ukuba ukhetha ukulandula izikhangelisi ezincinci, kunokwenzeka ungabinako ukufumana amava apheleleyo eempawu ezisebenzisanayo zeSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala okanye iiwebhusayithi ozityelelayo.
