UkuKhuseleka kweeNkcukacha ezimalunga Nawe
Ukhuselo lweeNkcukacha zakho zokoBuqu
Ukhuseleko loLwazi loBuqu
Ukhuselo lweeNkcukacha zoBuqu bakho
Ukhuselo lweeNkcukacha zakho zokoBuqu
Ukhuseleko loLwazi loBuqu
Ukhuselo lweeNkcukacha zoBuqu bakho
UkuKhuseleka kweeNkcukacha ezimalunga Nawe
Ukhuseleko loLwazi loBuqu
Ukhuselo lweeNkcukacha zoBuqu bakho
UkuKhuseleka kweeNkcukacha ezimalunga Nawe
Ukhuselo lweeNkcukacha zakho zokoBuqu
Ukhuselo lweeNkcukacha zoBuqu bakho
UkuKhuseleka kweeNkcukacha ezimalunga Nawe
Ukhuselo lweeNkcukacha zakho zokoBuqu
Ukhuseleko loLwazi loBuqu
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini likhusela iinkcukacha ezimalunga nawe ukuba kungafikelelwa kuzo ngaphandle kogunyaziso, mazingasetyenziswa okanye mazingabhengezwa.
ISebe lezeZindlu likhusela iinkcukacha zakho zokoBuqu zingafunyanwa, zisetyenziswa okanye zibhengezwe ngokungekho mthethweni.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala likhusela ulwazi lwakho lobuqu ukuba lufikelelwe, lusetyenziswe okanye lutyhilwe ngaphandle kogunyaziso. 
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala likhusela iinkcukacha zobuqu bakho kufikelelo olungagunyaziswanga, ekusetyenzisweni okanye ekutyhilweni kwazo.
ISebe lezeZindlu likhusela iinkcukacha zakho zokoBuqu zingafunyanwa, zisetyenziswa okanye zibhengezwe ngokungekho mthethweni.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala likhusela ulwazi lwakho lobuqu ukuba lufikelelwe, lusetyenziswe okanye lutyhilwe ngaphandle kogunyaziso. 
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala likhusela iinkcukacha zobuqu bakho kufikelelo olungagunyaziswanga, ekusetyenzisweni okanye ekutyhilweni kwazo.
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini likhusela iinkcukacha ezimalunga nawe ukuba kungafikelelwa kuzo ngaphandle kogunyaziso, mazingasetyenziswa okanye mazingabhengezwa.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala likhusela ulwazi lwakho lobuqu ukuba lufikelelwe, lusetyenziswe okanye lutyhilwe ngaphandle kogunyaziso. 
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala likhusela iinkcukacha zobuqu bakho kufikelelo olungagunyaziswanga, ekusetyenzisweni okanye ekutyhilweni kwazo.
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini likhusela iinkcukacha ezimalunga nawe ukuba kungafikelelwa kuzo ngaphandle kogunyaziso, mazingasetyenziswa okanye mazingabhengezwa.
ISebe lezeZindlu likhusela iinkcukacha zakho zokoBuqu zingafunyanwa, zisetyenziswa okanye zibhengezwe ngokungekho mthethweni.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala likhusela iinkcukacha zobuqu bakho kufikelelo olungagunyaziswanga, ekusetyenzisweni okanye ekutyhilweni kwazo.
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini likhusela iinkcukacha ezimalunga nawe ukuba kungafikelelwa kuzo ngaphandle kogunyaziso, mazingasetyenziswa okanye mazingabhengezwa.
ISebe lezeZindlu likhusela iinkcukacha zakho zokoBuqu zingafunyanwa, zisetyenziswa okanye zibhengezwe ngokungekho mthethweni.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala likhusela ulwazi lwakho lobuqu ukuba lufikelelwe, lusetyenziswe okanye lutyhilwe ngaphandle kogunyaziso. 
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini liyazikhusela iinkcukacha ezichongwayo onikezele ngazo kwikhompyutha ngokulawulekayo nangokukhuselekileyo, lifuna kungafikelelwa kuzo ngaphandle kogunyaziso, mazingasetyenziswa okanye mazingabhengezwa 
ISebe lezeZindlu likhusela iinkcukacha ezinokukuchaza wena buqu onikezele ngazo kwiiseva zekhompyutha ngendlela elawulwayo, kwindawo ekhuselekileyo, ekhuselweyo kwabangenalungelo lakungena, lakuzisebenzisa okanye elokubhengeza.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala likhusela ulwazi lobuqu oluchongekayo olunikela kwiinkonzo zekhompyutha ngendlela elawulwayo, kwimekobume yokhuseleko, ekhuselweyo ukufikelelwa ukusetyenziswa okanye ukutyhilwa ngaphandle kogunyaziso.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala likhusela iinkcukacha ezichonga ubunini onikela ngabo kwiziniki-nkonzo zekhompyutha kubume obulawulwayo, obukhuselweyo, obukhuselwe kufikelelo olungagunyaziswanga, ekusetyenzisweni okanye ekutyhilweni kwazo.
ISebe lezeZindlu likhusela iinkcukacha ezinokukuchaza wena buqu onikezele ngazo kwiiseva zekhompyutha ngendlela elawulwayo, kwindawo ekhuselekileyo, ekhuselweyo kwabangenalungelo lakungena, lakuzisebenzisa okanye elokubhengeza.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala likhusela ulwazi lobuqu oluchongekayo olunikela kwiinkonzo zekhompyutha ngendlela elawulwayo, kwimekobume yokhuseleko, ekhuselweyo ukufikelelwa ukusetyenziswa okanye ukutyhilwa ngaphandle kogunyaziso.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala likhusela iinkcukacha ezichonga ubunini onikela ngabo kwiziniki-nkonzo zekhompyutha kubume obulawulwayo, obukhuselweyo, obukhuselwe kufikelelo olungagunyaziswanga, ekusetyenzisweni okanye ekutyhilweni kwazo.
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini liyazikhusela iinkcukacha ezichongwayo onikezele ngazo kwikhompyutha ngokulawulekayo nangokukhuselekileyo, lifuna kungafikelelwa kuzo ngaphandle kogunyaziso, mazingasetyenziswa okanye mazingabhengezwa 
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala likhusela ulwazi lobuqu oluchongekayo olunikela kwiinkonzo zekhompyutha ngendlela elawulwayo, kwimekobume yokhuseleko, ekhuselweyo ukufikelelwa ukusetyenziswa okanye ukutyhilwa ngaphandle kogunyaziso.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala likhusela iinkcukacha ezichonga ubunini onikela ngabo kwiziniki-nkonzo zekhompyutha kubume obulawulwayo, obukhuselweyo, obukhuselwe kufikelelo olungagunyaziswanga, ekusetyenzisweni okanye ekutyhilweni kwazo.
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini liyazikhusela iinkcukacha ezichongwayo onikezele ngazo kwikhompyutha ngokulawulekayo nangokukhuselekileyo, lifuna kungafikelelwa kuzo ngaphandle kogunyaziso, mazingasetyenziswa okanye mazingabhengezwa 
ISebe lezeZindlu likhusela iinkcukacha ezinokukuchaza wena buqu onikezele ngazo kwiiseva zekhompyutha ngendlela elawulwayo, kwindawo ekhuselekileyo, ekhuselweyo kwabangenalungelo lakungena, lakuzisebenzisa okanye elokubhengeza.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala likhusela iinkcukacha ezichonga ubunini onikela ngabo kwiziniki-nkonzo zekhompyutha kubume obulawulwayo, obukhuselweyo, obukhuselwe kufikelelo olungagunyaziswanga, ekusetyenzisweni okanye ekutyhilweni kwazo.
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini liyazikhusela iinkcukacha ezichongwayo onikezele ngazo kwikhompyutha ngokulawulekayo nangokukhuselekileyo, lifuna kungafikelelwa kuzo ngaphandle kogunyaziso, mazingasetyenziswa okanye mazingabhengezwa 
ISebe lezeZindlu likhusela iinkcukacha ezinokukuchaza wena buqu onikezele ngazo kwiiseva zekhompyutha ngendlela elawulwayo, kwindawo ekhuselekileyo, ekhuselweyo kwabangenalungelo lakungena, lakuzisebenzisa okanye elokubhengeza.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala likhusela ulwazi lobuqu oluchongekayo olunikela kwiinkonzo zekhompyutha ngendlela elawulwayo, kwimekobume yokhuseleko, ekhuselweyo ukufikelelwa ukusetyenziswa okanye ukutyhilwa ngaphandle kogunyaziso.
Xa iinkcukacha ezizezakho (ezifana nenombolo yekhredithi-khadi) zidluliselwa kwezinye iiwebhusayithi, ziyakhuselwa ngeekhowudi ezithile ezifana nedrafti yesivumelwano  njengeThekhnoloji ekuMgangatho woKhuseleko (SSL).
Xa iinkcukacha zobuqu (ezinjengeenombolo zekhadi lebhanka letyala) zigqithiselwa kwezinye iiwebhusayithi, ziyakhuselwa ngokusebenzisa i-enkhrypshini efana neprothokholi yoMaleko oKhuselekileyo weSokhethi (SSL).
Xa ulwazi lobuqu (olufana nenombolo yekhadi lemali) ithunyelwa kwezinye iiwebhusayithi, ikhuselwa ngokusebenzisa umbhalo ofihlakeleyo, ofana nomthetho wokuziphatha woMaleko oKhuselekileyo weSiseko (SSL).
Xa iinkcukacha zobuqu (ezifana nenombolo yekhadi yemali yetyala) zidluliselwe kwezinye iiwebhusayithi, zikhuselwa ngokusebenzisa imigaqo yokufihla iinkcukacha, efana neprothokholi yoMaleko weGolonxa loKhuselo (iSSL).
Xa iinkcukacha zobuqu (ezinjengeenombolo zekhadi lebhanka letyala) zigqithiselwa kwezinye iiwebhusayithi, ziyakhuselwa ngokusebenzisa i-enkhrypshini efana neprothokholi yoMaleko oKhuselekileyo weSokhethi (SSL).
Xa ulwazi lobuqu (olufana nenombolo yekhadi lemali) ithunyelwa kwezinye iiwebhusayithi, ikhuselwa ngokusebenzisa umbhalo ofihlakeleyo, ofana nomthetho wokuziphatha woMaleko oKhuselekileyo weSiseko (SSL).
Xa iinkcukacha zobuqu (ezifana nenombolo yekhadi yemali yetyala) zidluliselwe kwezinye iiwebhusayithi, zikhuselwa ngokusebenzisa imigaqo yokufihla iinkcukacha, efana neprothokholi yoMaleko weGolonxa loKhuselo (iSSL).
Xa iinkcukacha ezizezakho (ezifana nenombolo yekhredithi-khadi) zidluliselwa kwezinye iiwebhusayithi, ziyakhuselwa ngeekhowudi ezithile ezifana nedrafti yesivumelwano  njengeThekhnoloji ekuMgangatho woKhuseleko (SSL).
Xa ulwazi lobuqu (olufana nenombolo yekhadi lemali) ithunyelwa kwezinye iiwebhusayithi, ikhuselwa ngokusebenzisa umbhalo ofihlakeleyo, ofana nomthetho wokuziphatha woMaleko oKhuselekileyo weSiseko (SSL).
Xa iinkcukacha zobuqu (ezifana nenombolo yekhadi yemali yetyala) zidluliselwe kwezinye iiwebhusayithi, zikhuselwa ngokusebenzisa imigaqo yokufihla iinkcukacha, efana neprothokholi yoMaleko weGolonxa loKhuselo (iSSL).
Xa iinkcukacha ezizezakho (ezifana nenombolo yekhredithi-khadi) zidluliselwa kwezinye iiwebhusayithi, ziyakhuselwa ngeekhowudi ezithile ezifana nedrafti yesivumelwano  njengeThekhnoloji ekuMgangatho woKhuseleko (SSL).
Xa iinkcukacha zobuqu (ezinjengeenombolo zekhadi lebhanka letyala) zigqithiselwa kwezinye iiwebhusayithi, ziyakhuselwa ngokusebenzisa i-enkhrypshini efana neprothokholi yoMaleko oKhuselekileyo weSokhethi (SSL).
Xa iinkcukacha zobuqu (ezifana nenombolo yekhadi yemali yetyala) zidluliselwe kwezinye iiwebhusayithi, zikhuselwa ngokusebenzisa imigaqo yokufihla iinkcukacha, efana neprothokholi yoMaleko weGolonxa loKhuselo (iSSL).
Xa iinkcukacha ezizezakho (ezifana nenombolo yekhredithi-khadi) zidluliselwa kwezinye iiwebhusayithi, ziyakhuselwa ngeekhowudi ezithile ezifana nedrafti yesivumelwano  njengeThekhnoloji ekuMgangatho woKhuseleko (SSL).
Xa iinkcukacha zobuqu (ezinjengeenombolo zekhadi lebhanka letyala) zigqithiselwa kwezinye iiwebhusayithi, ziyakhuselwa ngokusebenzisa i-enkhrypshini efana neprothokholi yoMaleko oKhuselekileyo weSokhethi (SSL).
Xa ulwazi lobuqu (olufana nenombolo yekhadi lemali) ithunyelwa kwezinye iiwebhusayithi, ikhuselwa ngokusebenzisa umbhalo ofihlakeleyo, ofana nomthetho wokuziphatha woMaleko oKhuselekileyo weSiseko (SSL).

IiNguqulelo ezikuyo le Ngxelo
Utshintsho kwiNgxelo
Iinguqu kule Ngxelo
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini ngamanye amaxesha lakuluhlaziya olu xwebhu luyiNgxelo eseMthethweni ukuze kuqinisekiswe ngezigqibo eziphakathi komxumi nenkampani.  
ISebe lezeZindlu liza kumane liyihlaziya le Ngxelo yaBucala ukuze ibonise ngeengcaciso kwaneempendulo zenkampani nezabaxumi.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ngamaxesha ngamaxesha liya kuhlaziya le Ngxelo yoBuwedwa ukubonakalisa iimpendulo zenkampani nomxumi. 
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala liya kumana liyihlaziya le Nkcazo yoBomi babuCala ukubonisa ingxelo yequmrhu neyabaxumi.
ISebe lezeZindlu liza kumane liyihlaziya le Ngxelo yaBucala ukuze ibonise ngeengcaciso kwaneempendulo zenkampani nezabaxumi.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ngamaxesha ngamaxesha liya kuhlaziya le Ngxelo yoBuwedwa ukubonakalisa iimpendulo zenkampani nomxumi. 
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala liya kumana liyihlaziya le Nkcazo yoBomi babuCala ukubonisa ingxelo yequmrhu neyabaxumi.

ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala liya kumana liyihlaziya le Nkcazo yoBomi babuCala ukubonisa ingxelo yequmrhu neyabaxumi.

ISebe lezeZindlu liza kumane liyihlaziya le Ngxelo yaBucala ukuze ibonise ngeengcaciso kwaneempendulo zenkampani nezabaxumi.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala ngamaxesha ngamaxesha liya kuhlaziya le Ngxelo yoBuwedwa ukubonakalisa iimpendulo zenkampani nomxumi. 
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini liyanikhuthaza ukuba kumaxesha ngamaxesha niyiphonononge le Ngxelo ukuze niyazi indlela elizikhusela ngayo iinkcukacha zenu  iSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini.
ISebe lezeZindlu liyakukhuthaza ukuba umane uyihlola le Ngxelo ukuze uhlale usazi ngendlela iSebe lezeZindlu elizikhusela ngayo iinkcukacha zakho.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala likukhuthaza ukuhlola ngamaxesha athile le Ngxelo ukwaziswa ngendlela iSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala likhusela ngayo ulwazi lwakho.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala likukhuthaza ukuba umane uyiphengulula le Nkcazo ukuze ube nolwazi lwendlela iSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala elizikhusela ngayo iinkcukacha zakho.
ISebe lezeZindlu liyakukhuthaza ukuba umane uyihlola le Ngxelo ukuze uhlale usazi ngendlela iSebe lezeZindlu elizikhusela ngayo iinkcukacha zakho.

Iinkcukacha zoqhagamshelwano
Ulwazi loQhagamshelwano
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini liyawamkela amagqabantshintshi eniwenzayo malunga nolu xwebhu luyiNgxelo eseMthethweni.
ISebe lezeZindlu liyazamkela izimvo zakho ngokuphathelele  kule Ngxelo yokuBasekhusini
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala liyawamkela amagqabantshintshi akho malunga nale Ngxelo yoBuwedwa. 
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala liyazamkela izimvo zakho malunga neNkcazo yabuCala.
ISebe lezeZindlu liyazamkela izimvo zakho ngokuphathelele  kule Ngxelo yokuBasekhusini
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala liyawamkela amagqabantshintshi akho malunga nale Ngxelo yoBuwedwa. 
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala liyazamkela izimvo zakho malunga neNkcazo yabuCala.
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini liyawamkela amagqabantshintshi eniwenzayo malunga nolu xwebhu luyiNgxelo eseMthethweni.
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala liyawamkela amagqabantshintshi akho malunga nale Ngxelo yoBuwedwa. 
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala liyazamkela izimvo zakho malunga neNkcazo yabuCala.
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini liyawamkela amagqabantshintshi eniwenzayo malunga nolu xwebhu luyiNgxelo eseMthethweni.
ISebe lezeZindlu liyazamkela izimvo zakho ngokuphathelele  kule Ngxelo yokuBasekhusini
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala liyazamkela izimvo zakho malunga neNkcazo yabuCala.
ISebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini liyawamkela amagqabantshintshi eniwenzayo malunga nolu xwebhu luyiNgxelo eseMthethweni.
ISebe lezeZindlu liyazamkela izimvo zakho ngokuphathelele  kule Ngxelo yokuBasekhusini
ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala liyawamkela amagqabantshintshi akho malunga nale Ngxelo yoBuwedwa. 
Xa ukholelwa ukuba iSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini alinamathelanga kule Ngxelo, nceda uqhagamshelane neSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini ku-webmaster@kznhousing.gov.za.
Ukuba ukholelwa kwelokuba iSebe lezeZindlu alibambelelanga kule Ngxelo, nceda uqhagamshelane neSebe lezeZindlu ku- webmaster@kznhousing.gov.za
Ukuba ukholwa ukuba iSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala alibambelelanga kule Ngxelo yoBuwedwa, ngesicelo nxibelelana neSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala kule dilesi webmaster@kznhousing.gov.za.
Ukuba ukholelwa ekubeni ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala alinamathelanga kule Nkcazo, nceda uqhagamshelane neSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala apha webmaster@kznhousing.gov.za.
Ukuba ukholelwa kwelokuba iSebe lezeZindlu alibambelelanga kule Ngxelo, nceda uqhagamshelane neSebe lezeZindlu ku- webmaster@kznhousing.gov.za
Ukuba ukholwa ukuba iSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala alibambelelanga kule Ngxelo yoBuwedwa, ngesicelo nxibelelana neSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala kule dilesi webmaster@kznhousing.gov.za.
Ukuba ukholelwa ekubeni ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala alinamathelanga kule Nkcazo, nceda uqhagamshelane neSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala apha webmaster@kznhousing.gov.za.
Xa ukholelwa ukuba iSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini alinamathelanga kule Ngxelo, nceda uqhagamshelane neSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini ku-webmaster@kznhousing.gov.za.
Ukuba ukholwa ukuba iSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala alibambelelanga kule Ngxelo yoBuwedwa, ngesicelo nxibelelana neSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala kule dilesi webmaster@kznhousing.gov.za.
Ukuba ukholelwa ekubeni ISebe leeNdawo zokuHlala alinamathelanga kule Nkcazo, nceda uqhagamshelane neSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala apha webmaster@kznhousing.gov.za.

Xa ukholelwa ukuba iSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini alinamathelanga kule Ngxelo, nceda uqhagamshelane neSebe lokuHlaliswa kwabantu ezindlwini ku-webmaster@kznhousing.gov.za.
Ukuba ukholelwa kwelokuba iSebe lezeZindlu alibambelelanga kule Ngxelo, nceda uqhagamshelane neSebe lezeZindlu ku- webmaster@kznhousing.gov.za
Ukuba ukholwa ukuba iSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala alibambelelanga kule Ngxelo yoBuwedwa, ngesicelo nxibelelana neSebe leeNdawo zokuHlala kule dilesi webmaster@kznhousing.gov.za.
Siza kusebenzisa iinzame ezibonisa ingqiqo kwezorhwebo ukuze ngoko nangoko sibe nezigqibo zokulungisa le  ngxaki.
Sizakusebenzisa iinzame ezifikelelekayo ukuze sifumanise size silungise ingxaki leyo.
Siya kusebenzisa iinzame ezamkelekileyo ngokwezoqoqosho ukumisela ngokukhawuleza nokulungisa ingxaki.
Siya kusebenzisa amalinge afanelekileyo ngokorhwebo ukuze sikhawuleze sifumanise ngokunjalo sisombulule ingxaki.
Sizakusebenzisa iinzame ezifikelelekayo ukuze sifumanise size silungise ingxaki leyo.
Siya kusebenzisa iinzame ezamkelekileyo ngokwezoqoqosho ukumisela ngokukhawuleza nokulungisa ingxaki.
Siya kusebenzisa amalinge afanelekileyo ngokorhwebo ukuze sikhawuleze sifumanise ngokunjalo sisombulule ingxaki.
Siza kusebenzisa iinzame ezibonisa ingqiqo kwezorhwebo ukuze ngoko nangoko sibe nezigqibo zokulungisa le  ngxaki.
Siya kusebenzisa iinzame ezamkelekileyo ngokwezoqoqosho ukumisela ngokukhawuleza nokulungisa ingxaki.
Siya kusebenzisa amalinge afanelekileyo ngokorhwebo ukuze sikhawuleze sifumanise ngokunjalo sisombulule ingxaki.
Siza kusebenzisa iinzame ezibonisa ingqiqo kwezorhwebo ukuze ngoko nangoko sibe nezigqibo zokulungisa le  ngxaki.
Sizakusebenzisa iinzame ezifikelelekayo ukuze sifumanise size silungise ingxaki leyo.
Siya kusebenzisa amalinge afanelekileyo ngokorhwebo ukuze sikhawuleze sifumanise ngokunjalo sisombulule ingxaki.
Siza kusebenzisa iinzame ezibonisa ingqiqo kwezorhwebo ukuze ngoko nangoko sibe nezigqibo zokulungisa le  ngxaki.
Sizakusebenzisa iinzame ezifikelelekayo ukuze sifumanise size silungise ingxaki leyo.
Siya kusebenzisa iinzame ezamkelekileyo ngokwezoqoqosho ukumisela ngokukhawuleza nokulungisa ingxaki.

Intetho yeNkulumbuso u-Ebrahim Rasool kwiTheko lokuBhiyozela abafundi abaphumelele iMatriki
Intetha kaNkulumbuso uEbrahim Rasool kuMsitho woKuvuyisana nabaphumelele iBanga leMatriki
Intetho yeNdunankulu u-Ebrahim Rasool kuMsitho wokuBhiyoza nabaFundi beMatriki
Intetho yeNkulumbuso uEbrahim Rasool kwiTheko lokuBhiyozela abaPhumelele iBanga leMatriki.
Intetha kaNkulumbuso uEbrahim Rasool kuMsitho woKuvuyisana nabaphumelele iBanga leMatriki
Intetho yeNdunankulu u-Ebrahim Rasool kuMsitho wokuBhiyoza nabaFundi beMatriki
Intetho yeNkulumbuso uEbrahim Rasool kwiTheko lokuBhiyozela abaPhumelele iBanga leMatriki.
Intetho yeNkulumbuso u-Ebrahim Rasool kwiTheko lokuBhiyozela abafundi abaphumelele iMatriki
Intetho yeNdunankulu u-Ebrahim Rasool kuMsitho wokuBhiyoza nabaFundi beMatriki

Intetha kaNkulumbuso uEbrahim Rasool kuMsitho woKuvuyisana nabaphumelele iBanga leMatriki
Intetho yeNkulumbuso uEbrahim Rasool kwiTheko lokuBhiyozela abaPhumelele iBanga leMatriki.
Intetho yeNkulumbuso u-Ebrahim Rasool kwiTheko lokuBhiyozela abafundi abaphumelele iMatriki
Intetha kaNkulumbuso uEbrahim Rasool kuMsitho woKuvuyisana nabaphumelele iBanga leMatriki
Intetho yeNdunankulu u-Ebrahim Rasool kuMsitho wokuBhiyoza nabaFundi beMatriki
Namhlanje size apha sizokuvuyisana nabo bakwinqanaba eliphezulu ekuphumeleleni izifundo zematriki.
Sihlangene apha namhlanje ukuzakuvuyisana  nabo baphumelele emagqabini kwibanga leshumi. 
Namhlanje size apha ukuvuyisana nabafundi bethu abaphumelele emagqabini bematriki.
Namhlanje size apha ukuze sivuyisane nabaphumelele emagqabini bethu.
Sihlangene apha namhlanje ukuzakuvuyisana  nabo baphumelele emagqabini kwibanga leshumi. 
Namhlanje size apha ukuvuyisana nabafundi bethu abaphumelele emagqabini bematriki.
Namhlanje size apha ukuze sivuyisane nabaphumelele emagqabini bethu.
Namhlanje size apha sizokuvuyisana nabo bakwinqanaba eliphezulu ekuphumeleleni izifundo zematriki.
Namhlanje size apha ukuvuyisana nabafundi bethu abaphumelele emagqabini bematriki.
Namhlanje size apha ukuze sivuyisane nabaphumelele emagqabini bethu.
Namhlanje size apha sizokuvuyisana nabo bakwinqanaba eliphezulu ekuphumeleleni izifundo zematriki.
Sihlangene apha namhlanje ukuzakuvuyisana  nabo baphumelele emagqabini kwibanga leshumi. 
Namhlanje size apha ukuze sivuyisane nabaphumelele emagqabini bethu.
Namhlanje size apha sizokuvuyisana nabo bakwinqanaba eliphezulu ekuphumeleleni izifundo zematriki.
Sihlangene apha namhlanje ukuzakuvuyisana  nabo baphumelele emagqabini kwibanga leshumi. 
Namhlanje size apha ukuvuyisana nabafundi bethu abaphumelele emagqabini bematriki.
Kubo sithi:  Ngxatsho ke! Siyazingca ngani, eli Phondo neli Lizwe linebhongo ngani, abazali benu banebhongo ngani, okona kubalulekileyo kukuba nani yibani nebhongo ngeziqu zenu.
Sithi kubo: Huntshu! Siyazingca ngani, iPhondo neLizwe ngokubanzi liyazingca ngani, abazali benu nabo bayazingca ngani, kwaye ke nani kufanele nibe nebhongo neqhayiya ngani.
Sithi kubo: Nisebenze kakuhle! Sinebhongo ngani, iPhondo neLizwe zinebhongo ngani, abazali benu banebhongo ngani, yaye okubaluleke kakhulu kufuneka nani nibe nebhongo ngeziqu zenu.
Sithi kubo: Huntshu! Sineqhayiya ngani, eli Phondo neLizwe lineqhayiya ngani, abazali benu baneqhayiya ngani, kanti okubaluleke kakhulu kukuba nani nifanele ukuba neqhayiya ngeziqu zenu.
Sithi kubo: Huntshu! Siyazingca ngani, iPhondo neLizwe ngokubanzi liyazingca ngani, abazali benu nabo bayazingca ngani, kwaye ke nani kufanele nibe nebhongo neqhayiya ngani.
Sithi kubo: Nisebenze kakuhle! Sinebhongo ngani, iPhondo neLizwe zinebhongo ngani, abazali benu banebhongo ngani, yaye okubaluleke kakhulu kufuneka nani nibe nebhongo ngeziqu zenu.
Sithi kubo: Huntshu! Sineqhayiya ngani, eli Phondo neLizwe lineqhayiya ngani, abazali benu baneqhayiya ngani, kanti okubaluleke kakhulu kukuba nani nifanele ukuba neqhayiya ngeziqu zenu.

Sithi kubo: Nisebenze kakuhle! Sinebhongo ngani, iPhondo neLizwe zinebhongo ngani, abazali benu banebhongo ngani, yaye okubaluleke kakhulu kufuneka nani nibe nebhongo ngeziqu zenu.
Sithi kubo: Huntshu! Sineqhayiya ngani, eli Phondo neLizwe lineqhayiya ngani, abazali benu baneqhayiya ngani, kanti okubaluleke kakhulu kukuba nani nifanele ukuba neqhayiya ngeziqu zenu.
Kubo sithi:  Ngxatsho ke! Siyazingca ngani, eli Phondo neli Lizwe linebhongo ngani, abazali benu banebhongo ngani, okona kubalulekileyo kukuba nani yibani nebhongo ngeziqu zenu.

Sithi kubo: Huntshu! Sineqhayiya ngani, eli Phondo neLizwe lineqhayiya ngani, abazali benu baneqhayiya ngani, kanti okubaluleke kakhulu kukuba nani nifanele ukuba neqhayiya ngeziqu zenu.
Kubo sithi:  Ngxatsho ke! Siyazingca ngani, eli Phondo neli Lizwe linebhongo ngani, abazali benu banebhongo ngani, okona kubalulekileyo kukuba nani yibani nebhongo ngeziqu zenu.
Sithi kubo: Huntshu! Siyazingca ngani, iPhondo neLizwe ngokubanzi liyazingca ngani, abazali benu nabo bayazingca ngani, kwaye ke nani kufanele nibe nebhongo neqhayiya ngani.
Sithi kubo: Nisebenze kakuhle! Sinebhongo ngani, iPhondo neLizwe zinebhongo ngani, abazali benu banebhongo ngani, yaye okubaluleke kakhulu kufuneka nani nibe nebhongo ngeziqu zenu.
Isizathu sokuba sivuselele ukuzingca ngomzuzu ofana nalo, kukuliqaphela eli thuba lempumelelo livelayo emva kwexesha elide lobunzima nokuzijula ijacu, kungokuba le mihla sikuyo imele umzuzu wengcaciso emva kwemeko esinokuyichaza kakuhle ngokuba intsonkothile.
Isizathu esibangela ukuba sikhuthaze ukuba abantu bazingce kwiimeko ezikumila kunje, ukunikel’ ingqalelo kumba wokuba ixesha lempumelelo alizi lula nje kuloko luza emva kwexesha elide lokusebenza nzima nokuzinikela, nokuba xa kunamhlanje sidandalazisa imeko enokuntsokotha.  
Isizathu sokuba sivuselele iqhayiya ngethuba elifana neli, kukuxabisa inyaniso yokuba ithuba lempumelelo liyavela kwixesha elidana lobunzima nokuzincama, into yokuba usuku lwanamhlanje limele ithuba lokucaca kwesiphumo seemeko ezingachazwa ngcono njengokuntsonkotha.
Isizathu sokuba sivuselele iqhayiya ngexesha elifana neli, sisekubaluleni inyaniso yokuba impumelelo yexesha elithile izalwa lixesha elide lobunzima nokuncama okuninzi, sisekubeni usuku lwanamhlanje lumele ithuba lengcaciso yemeko enokuchazwa ngokugqibeleleyo njengenobugocigoci.
Isizathu esibangela ukuba sikhuthaze ukuba abantu bazingce kwiimeko ezikumila kunje, ukunikel’ ingqalelo kumba wokuba ixesha lempumelelo alizi lula nje kuloko luza emva kwexesha elide lokusebenza nzima nokuzinikela, nokuba xa kunamhlanje sidandalazisa imeko enokuntsokotha.

Imatriki ilinqanaba elintsonkothileyo

Imatriki ilinqanaba elintsonkothileyo
Imatriki intsonkothile.
Imatriki intsonkothile.
Eminyakeni elishumi egqithileyo kuye kwafuneka ukuba inkqubo yonke yezemfundo masiyishenxise kwiinqobo zokugweba ezibhekiselele embusweni wokucalucalulwa kwabantu. 
Kule minyaka ilishumi idlulileyo kuye kwafuneka senze utshintsho lwayo yonke kwinkqubo yezemfundo ingabisaba yiyo leya yexesha localulo. 
Kwithuba leminyaka elishumi egqithileyo kuye kwafuneka sishenxise yonke inkqubo yemfundo ukuphuma kwisiqhelo sobandlululo. 
Kwiminyaka elishumi edlulileyo siye safanela ukutshintsha inkqubo yezemfundo iphelele kwisimbo sayo socalucalulo.
Kule minyaka ilishumi idlulileyo kuye kwafuneka senze utshintsho lwayo yonke kwinkqubo yezemfundo ingabisaba yiyo leya yexesha localulo. 
Kwithuba leminyaka elishumi egqithileyo kuye kwafuneka sishenxise yonke inkqubo yemfundo ukuphuma kwisiqhelo sobandlululo. 
Kwiminyaka elishumi edlulileyo siye safanela ukutshintsha inkqubo yezemfundo iphelele kwisimbo sayo socalucalulo.
Eminyakeni elishumi egqithileyo kuye kwafuneka ukuba inkqubo yonke yezemfundo masiyishenxise kwiinqobo zokugweba ezibhekiselele embusweni wokucalucalulwa kwabantu. 
Kwithuba leminyaka elishumi egqithileyo kuye kwafuneka sishenxise yonke inkqubo yemfundo ukuphuma kwisiqhelo sobandlululo. 
Kwiminyaka elishumi edlulileyo siye safanela ukutshintsha inkqubo yezemfundo iphelele kwisimbo sayo socalucalulo.
Eminyakeni elishumi egqithileyo kuye kwafuneka ukuba inkqubo yonke yezemfundo masiyishenxise kwiinqobo zokugweba ezibhekiselele embusweni wokucalucalulwa kwabantu. 
Kule minyaka ilishumi idlulileyo kuye kwafuneka senze utshintsho lwayo yonke kwinkqubo yezemfundo ingabisaba yiyo leya yexesha localulo. 
Kwiminyaka elishumi edlulileyo siye safanela ukutshintsha inkqubo yezemfundo iphelele kwisimbo sayo socalucalulo.
Eminyakeni elishumi egqithileyo kuye kwafuneka ukuba inkqubo yonke yezemfundo masiyishenxise kwiinqobo zokugweba ezibhekiselele embusweni wokucalucalulwa kwabantu. 
Kule minyaka ilishumi idlulileyo kuye kwafuneka senze utshintsho lwayo yonke kwinkqubo yezemfundo ingabisaba yiyo leya yexesha localulo. 
Kwithuba leminyaka elishumi egqithileyo kuye kwafuneka sishenxise yonke inkqubo yemfundo ukuphuma kwisiqhelo sobandlululo. 
Ibe nkulu impumelelo yethu malunga nentlanganisela emandla, isilabhasi enye neemviwo, amanani amakhulu abo bayibhalayo nabaphumeleleyo kwimatriki, nengqiqo yokuba imfundo ikwajongene neemfuno ezingaphaya komntu – eyokuba uqoqosho lulonke luxhomekeke kwizakhono ezahlukeneyo ekubonelelwa ngazo yinkqubo yezemfundo.
Kangangokuba sikwazile ukunqoba ngokuphathelele yobandakanyo ngokumandla, ekubeni nesilabhasi kwanoviwo olufanayo, nenani elivisayo labo bachophela iimviwo nabayiphumelelayo imatriki, kwanokufundisa ngomba wokuba imfundo ihlangabezana neemfuno ezingaphaya kwezo ezizomntu buqu – nokuba uqoqosho xa lulonke luxhomekeke kwizakhono ethi inkqubo yezemfundo ibonelele ngazo. 
Kumgama omkhulu siphumelele ngokwemimiselo yokudibanisa, isilabhasi eyodwa noviwo, amanani amakhulu abo babhale baze baphumelela imatriki, nokuqonda ukuba imfundo kananjalo yanelisa iimfuno ezingaphaya komntu – kwanokuthi uqoqosho lonke luxhomekeke kwizakhono ezinikelwa yinkqubo yemfundo.
Siphumelele kakhulu malunga nomanyaniso olwandileyo, uluhlu lwezifundo noviwo olunye, amanani athe kratya abo babhala imatriki futhi baphumelele, nakulwazi lokuba imfundo ikwahlangabeza izidingo ezingaphaya kwezabantu ngabanye - nasekubeni uqoqosho luphelele luxhomekeke kwiseti yezakhono zobuchule ezinikwa yinkqubo yemfundo.
Kangangokuba sikwazile ukunqoba ngokuphathelele yobandakanyo ngokumandla, ekubeni nesilabhasi kwanoviwo olufanayo, nenani elivisayo labo bachophela iimviwo nabayiphumelelayo imatriki, kwanokufundisa ngomba wokuba imfundo ihlangabezana neemfuno ezingaphaya kwezo ezizomntu buqu – nokuba uqoqosho xa lulonke luxhomekeke kwizakhono ethi inkqubo yezemfundo ibonelele ngazo. 
Kumgama omkhulu siphumelele ngokwemimiselo yokudibanisa, isilabhasi eyodwa noviwo, amanani amakhulu abo babhale baze baphumelela imatriki, nokuqonda ukuba imfundo kananjalo yanelisa iimfuno ezingaphaya komntu – kwanokuthi uqoqosho lonke luxhomekeke kwizakhono ezinikelwa yinkqubo yemfundo.
Siphumelele kakhulu malunga nomanyaniso olwandileyo, uluhlu lwezifundo noviwo olunye, amanani athe kratya abo babhala imatriki futhi baphumelele, nakulwazi lokuba imfundo ikwahlangabeza izidingo ezingaphaya kwezabantu ngabanye - nasekubeni uqoqosho luphelele luxhomekeke kwiseti yezakhono zobuchule ezinikwa yinkqubo yemfundo.
Ibe nkulu impumelelo yethu malunga nentlanganisela emandla, isilabhasi enye neemviwo, amanani amakhulu abo bayibhalayo nabaphumeleleyo kwimatriki, nengqiqo yokuba imfundo ikwajongene neemfuno ezingaphaya komntu – eyokuba uqoqosho lulonke luxhomekeke kwizakhono ezahlukeneyo ekubonelelwa ngazo yinkqubo yezemfundo.

Ibe nkulu impumelelo yethu malunga nentlanganisela emandla, isilabhasi enye neemviwo, amanani amakhulu abo bayibhalayo nabaphumeleleyo kwimatriki, nengqiqo yokuba imfundo ikwajongene neemfuno ezingaphaya komntu – eyokuba uqoqosho lulonke luxhomekeke kwizakhono ezahlukeneyo ekubonelelwa ngazo yinkqubo yezemfundo.

Eneneni ematriki intsonkothile.
Imatriki ngokwenene intsonkothile.
Enyanisweni imatriki inobugocigoci.
Eneneni ematriki intsonkothile.
Imatriki ngokwenene intsonkothile.
Enyanisweni imatriki inobugocigoci.
Ngokwenene iMatriki intsonkothile.
Imatriki ngokwenene intsonkothile.
Enyanisweni imatriki inobugocigoci.
Ngokwenene iMatriki intsonkothile.
Eneneni ematriki intsonkothile.
Enyanisweni imatriki inobugocigoci.
Ngokwenene iMatriki intsonkothile.
Eneneni ematriki intsonkothile.
Imatriki ngokwenene intsonkothile.
Iinkokeli zethu ezidibene apha eLeeuwenhof, ngokungathandabuzekiyo zingabona bantu bafanelekileyo, abazuze impumelelo enkulu, kwanabo bamele ukwamkelwa njengeendwalutho zeli Phondo.
Iinkokheli zethu ezithe nqwadalala apha eLeewenhof zeziphume izandla ngokungathandabuzekiyo, nezagqwesayo kwanezo zifanelwe kukufumana onke amawonga esinokuwafumana siliPhondo. 
Iinkokheli zethu ezidibene apha e-Leeuwenhof ngaphandle kokuthandabuza zezona zilungileyo esinazo, abo bagqwesileyo, nabo abafanelwe zizo zonke izincomo ezinokuhlanganiswa leli Phondo.
Ngokuqinisekileyo iinkokeli zethu ezibuthene apha eLeeuwenhof zezona zifanelekileyo, ngabantu abanempumelelo egqibeleleyo, zikwangabantu abazifanele zonke iimbasa ezamkelekileyo kweli Phondo. 
Iinkokheli zethu ezithe nqwadalala apha eLeewenhof zeziphume izandla ngokungathandabuzekiyo, nezagqwesayo kwanezo zifanelwe kukufumana onke amawonga esinokuwafumana siliPhondo. 
Iinkokheli zethu ezidibene apha e-Leeuwenhof ngaphandle kokuthandabuza zezona zilungileyo esinazo, abo bagqwesileyo, nabo abafanelwe zizo zonke izincomo ezinokuhlanganiswa leli Phondo.
Ngokuqinisekileyo iinkokeli zethu ezibuthene apha eLeeuwenhof zezona zifanelekileyo, ngabantu abanempumelelo egqibeleleyo, zikwangabantu abazifanele zonke iimbasa ezamkelekileyo kweli Phondo. 
Iinkokeli zethu ezidibene apha eLeeuwenhof, ngokungathandabuzekiyo zingabona bantu bafanelekileyo, abazuze impumelelo enkulu, kwanabo bamele ukwamkelwa njengeendwalutho zeli Phondo.
Iinkokheli zethu ezidibene apha e-Leeuwenhof ngaphandle kokuthandabuza zezona zilungileyo esinazo, abo bagqwesileyo, nabo abafanelwe zizo zonke izincomo ezinokuhlanganiswa leli Phondo.
Ngokuqinisekileyo iinkokeli zethu ezibuthene apha eLeeuwenhof zezona zifanelekileyo, ngabantu abanempumelelo egqibeleleyo, zikwangabantu abazifanele zonke iimbasa ezamkelekileyo kweli Phondo. 
Iinkokeli zethu ezidibene apha eLeeuwenhof, ngokungathandabuzekiyo zingabona bantu bafanelekileyo, abazuze impumelelo enkulu, kwanabo bamele ukwamkelwa njengeendwalutho zeli Phondo.
Iinkokheli zethu ezithe nqwadalala apha eLeewenhof zeziphume izandla ngokungathandabuzekiyo, nezagqwesayo kwanezo zifanelwe kukufumana onke amawonga esinokuwafumana siliPhondo. 
Ngokuqinisekileyo iinkokeli zethu ezibuthene apha eLeeuwenhof zezona zifanelekileyo, ngabantu abanempumelelo egqibeleleyo, zikwangabantu abazifanele zonke iimbasa ezamkelekileyo kweli Phondo. 
Iinkokeli zethu ezidibene apha eLeeuwenhof, ngokungathandabuzekiyo zingabona bantu bafanelekileyo, abazuze impumelelo enkulu, kwanabo bamele ukwamkelwa njengeendwalutho zeli Phondo.
Iinkokheli zethu ezithe nqwadalala apha eLeewenhof zeziphume izandla ngokungathandabuzekiyo, nezagqwesayo kwanezo zifanelwe kukufumana onke amawonga esinokuwafumana siliPhondo. 
Iinkokheli zethu ezidibene apha e-Leeuwenhof ngaphandle kokuthandabuza zezona zilungileyo esinazo, abo bagqwesileyo, nabo abafanelwe zizo zonke izincomo ezinokuhlanganiswa leli Phondo.
Ukanti iingcinga zethu ziyaya kubemi belizwe abangama-71%, benobudala obungaphezulu eminyakeni engama-20, abangazange bazigqibe izifundo zabo zasesekondari, abo basenokuba sisiqingatha sama-80 000, abangenela uGreyidi 1 kunye nani eminyakeni eli-12 eyadlulayo, abangazange bazibhale iimviwo ngo-2004 ngoba basuka basiyeka isikolo, kwanabaninzi ababhalayo kodwa ngenxa yokhetho lwezifundo zeeGreyidi, banezatifikethi zematriki ezingenakwamkelwa luqoqosho okanye ngabemfundo ephakamileyo.   
Nangona kunjalo, iingcinga zethu zijolise nakuma-71% esizwe athe kule minyaka ingama-20 akwazi ukuzigqiba izifundo zawo zamabanga aphezulu, phantse nama-80 000 wabo babhalisela ibanga 1 kwiminyaka eli-12 awakwazanga ukuchophela iimviwo ngo-2004 ngenxa yokuyeka phakathi esikolweni, kwaye nesininzi sababhalileyo banezatifikethi zematriki ezingakwaziyo ukubavulela amathuba ezoqoqosho okanye ukubafaka kumaziko emfundo ephakamileyo.
Ukanti iingcinga zethu ziya nakuma-71% esizwe kwithuba leminyaka engama-20 abangafezanga imfundo yasesekondari, ngokusondeleyo kwisiqingatha sama-80 000 sabo bangene kwiBanga loku-1 nani kwiminyaka eli-12 egqithileyo abangabhalanga iimviwo ngowama-2004 ngenxa yokuba bashiyeke endleleni, kwakunye nabaninzi ababhalileyo, kodwa ngenxa yesifundo nokhetho lwebanga, banazo iziqiniselo zematriki yaye abangenako ukwamkelwa luqoqosho okanye imfundo ephakamileyo.
Kodwa iingcinga zethu zisuka zifikelele kuma-71% enani labantu abangaphezu kweminyaka engama-20 ubudala abangayifezanga imfundo yabo yamabanga aphezulu, phantse isiqingatha sama-80 000 aqale nawe kwiBanga loku-1 kwiminyaka eli-12 edlulileyo esingazange sizibhale iimviwo zango-2004 kuba sawa endleleni, kanti abaninzi ababhalayo, ngenxa yendlela ababekhethe ngayo izifundo namanqanaba azo, nangona benazo izatifikethi zematriki abakwazi kungena kwezoqoqosho okanye kwimfundo ephakamileyo.
Nangona kunjalo, iingcinga zethu zijolise nakuma-71% esizwe athe kule minyaka ingama-20 akwazi ukuzigqiba izifundo zawo zamabanga aphezulu, phantse nama-80 000 wabo babhalisela ibanga 1 kwiminyaka eli-12 awakwazanga ukuchophela iimviwo ngo-2004 ngenxa yokuyeka phakathi esikolweni, kwaye nesininzi sababhalileyo banezatifikethi zematriki ezingakwaziyo ukubavulela amathuba ezoqoqosho okanye ukubafaka kumaziko emfundo ephakamileyo.

Imatriki intsonkothile nangaphezulu ngenxa yokuba nini abakumgangatho esiwuqwalaselayo xa sizikhangelela abasebenzi.
Imatriki intsonkothile ingakumbi ngenxa yokuba niyisiloko nibekwe emehlweni.
Imatriki imbaxa nangaphezulu kwenyaniso yokuba niziifestile zethu zevenkile. 
Imatriki intsonkothile ngakumbi ngenxa yenyaniso yokuba niziifestile zethu zeevenkile.
Imatriki intsonkothile ingakumbi ngenxa yokuba niyisiloko nibekwe emehlweni.
Imatriki imbaxa nangaphezulu kwenyaniso yokuba niziifestile zethu zevenkile. 
Imatriki intsonkothile ngakumbi ngenxa yenyaniso yokuba niziifestile zethu zeevenkile.
Imatriki intsonkothile nangaphezulu ngenxa yokuba nini abakumgangatho esiwuqwalaselayo xa sizikhangelela abasebenzi.
Imatriki imbaxa nangaphezulu kwenyaniso yokuba niziifestile zethu zevenkile. 
Imatriki intsonkothile ngakumbi ngenxa yenyaniso yokuba niziifestile zethu zeevenkile.
Imatriki intsonkothile nangaphezulu ngenxa yokuba nini abakumgangatho esiwuqwalaselayo xa sizikhangelela abasebenzi.
Imatriki intsonkothile ingakumbi ngenxa yokuba niyisiloko nibekwe emehlweni.
Imatriki intsonkothile ngakumbi ngenxa yenyaniso yokuba niziifestile zethu zeevenkile.
Imatriki intsonkothile nangaphezulu ngenxa yokuba nini abakumgangatho esiwuqwalaselayo xa sizikhangelela abasebenzi.
Imatriki intsonkothile ingakumbi ngenxa yokuba niyisiloko nibekwe emehlweni.
Imatriki imbaxa nangaphezulu kwenyaniso yokuba niziifestile zethu zevenkile. 
Isizwe sifikelela kwizigqibo ngekamva lethu ngokujongisisa indlela enisebenza ngayo.
Isizwe sisebenzisa indlela eniqhuba ngayo xa sihlola ikamva lethu.
Isizwe sigweba ingomso lethu ngokusebenza kwenu. 
Isizwe senza izigqibo ngekamva lethu ngokomgangatho wokusebenza kwenu.
Isizwe sisebenzisa indlela eniqhuba ngayo xa sihlola ikamva lethu.
Isizwe sigweba ingomso lethu ngokusebenza kwenu. 
Isizwe senza izigqibo ngekamva lethu ngokomgangatho wokusebenza kwenu.
Isizwe sifikelela kwizigqibo ngekamva lethu ngokujongisisa indlela enisebenza ngayo.
Isizwe sigweba ingomso lethu ngokusebenza kwenu. 
Isizwe senza izigqibo ngekamva lethu ngokomgangatho wokusebenza kwenu.
Isizwe sifikelela kwizigqibo ngekamva lethu ngokujongisisa indlela enisebenza ngayo.
Isizwe sisebenzisa indlela eniqhuba ngayo xa sihlola ikamva lethu.
Isizwe senza izigqibo ngekamva lethu ngokomgangatho wokusebenza kwenu.
Isizwe sifikelela kwizigqibo ngekamva lethu ngokujongisisa indlela enisebenza ngayo.
Isizwe sisebenzisa indlela eniqhuba ngayo xa sihlola ikamva lethu.
Isizwe sigweba ingomso lethu ngokusebenza kwenu. 
Abaphetheyo basekela kuyo ithemba ngempumelelo yabo.
Ithemba labo balisekelezela kwimpilontle yenu.
Baseka ithemba labo kwintlalontle yenu. 
Liseka inkuthazo yalo kwimpilontle yenu.

Baseka ithemba labo kwintlalontle yenu. 
Liseka inkuthazo yalo kwimpilontle yenu.
Abaphetheyo basekela kuyo ithemba ngempumelelo yabo.
Baseka ithemba labo kwintlalontle yenu. 
Liseka inkuthazo yalo kwimpilontle yenu.
Abaphetheyo basekela kuyo ithemba ngempumelelo yabo.
Ithemba labo balisekelezela kwimpilontle yenu.
Liseka inkuthazo yalo kwimpilontle yenu.
Abaphetheyo basekela kuyo ithemba ngempumelelo yabo.
Ithemba labo balisekelezela kwimpilontle yenu.
Baseka ithemba labo kwintlalontle yenu. 
Basekele ithemba labo ngekamva elilutyalomali kwinkqubo yezemfundo, nto leyo ihlangabezanayo nalo mzuzu sikuwo wokubhiyoza.
Ithemba labo balisekelezela kwikamva ngokwegalelo lethu esilenzayo kwinkqubo yezemfundo neli lisenze ukuba sibe sidibene apha ngalo mzuzu woku kubhiyoza.
Baseka ithemba labo kwingomso lotyalomali lwethu kwinkqubo yemfundo edibana ngeli thuba lokubhiyoza. 
Liseka ithemba lalo lekamva ngokotyalo-mali lwethu kwinkqubo yemfundo efezeka ngeli thuba lombhiyozo.
Ithemba labo balisekelezela kwikamva ngokwegalelo lethu esilenzayo kwinkqubo yezemfundo neli lisenze ukuba sibe sidibene apha ngalo mzuzu woku kubhiyoza.
Baseka ithemba labo kwingomso lotyalomali lwethu kwinkqubo yemfundo edibana ngeli thuba lokubhiyoza. 
Liseka ithemba lalo lekamva ngokotyalo-mali lwethu kwinkqubo yemfundo efezeka ngeli thuba lombhiyozo.

Liseka ithemba lalo lekamva ngokotyalo-mali lwethu kwinkqubo yemfundo efezeka ngeli thuba lombhiyozo.
Basekele ithemba labo ngekamva elilutyalomali kwinkqubo yezemfundo, nto leyo ihlangabezanayo nalo mzuzu sikuwo wokubhiyoza.
Ithemba labo balisekelezela kwikamva ngokwegalelo lethu esilenzayo kwinkqubo yezemfundo neli lisenze ukuba sibe sidibene apha ngalo mzuzu woku kubhiyoza.
Baseka ithemba labo kwingomso lotyalomali lwethu kwinkqubo yemfundo edibana ngeli thuba lokubhiyoza. 
Kwaye kunjalo, esona silayi sikhulu soqingqomali lwesizwe nolo lwamaphondo siya kwezemfundo.
Ewe, isixa esivisayo lwesabelo-mali selizwe nesephondo siya kwezemfundo. 
Yaye ewe, esona silayi sikhulu ngokubini solwabiwomali eselizwe nesephondo siya kwimfundo
Ewe ke, isixa esisesona sikhulu sohlahlo lwabiwo-mali lukazwelonke nolwamaphondo siya kwimfundo. 
Ewe, isixa esivisayo lwesabelo-mali selizwe nesephondo siya kwezemfundo. 
Yaye ewe, esona silayi sikhulu ngokubini solwabiwomali eselizwe nesephondo siya kwimfundo
Ewe ke, isixa esisesona sikhulu sohlahlo lwabiwo-mali lukazwelonke nolwamaphondo siya kwimfundo. 
Kwaye kunjalo, esona silayi sikhulu soqingqomali lwesizwe nolo lwamaphondo siya kwezemfundo.
Yaye ewe, esona silayi sikhulu ngokubini solwabiwomali eselizwe nesephondo siya kwimfundo
Ewe ke, isixa esisesona sikhulu sohlahlo lwabiwo-mali lukazwelonke nolwamaphondo siya kwimfundo. 
Kwaye kunjalo, esona silayi sikhulu soqingqomali lwesizwe nolo lwamaphondo siya kwezemfundo.
Ewe, isixa esivisayo lwesabelo-mali selizwe nesephondo siya kwezemfundo. 
Ewe ke, isixa esisesona sikhulu sohlahlo lwabiwo-mali lukazwelonke nolwamaphondo siya kwimfundo. 
Kwaye kunjalo, esona silayi sikhulu soqingqomali lwesizwe nolo lwamaphondo siya kwezemfundo.
Ewe, isixa esivisayo lwesabelo-mali selizwe nesephondo siya kwezemfundo. 
Yaye ewe, esona silayi sikhulu ngokubini solwabiwomali eselizwe nesephondo siya kwimfundo
Lo nyaka uwodwa, ukuze kulondolozwe abasebenzela ezemfundo abangama-2000, kuyekwa funeka imali singayithumeli kweminye imisebenzi yephondo, sisuke siyifake kwezemfundo. 
Kulo nyaka nje uwodwa, ngelizama ukukhusela abafundisi-ntsapho abangama-2000 siye sazama ukufaka imali kwezemfundo siyithatha kwamanye amasebe.
Lo nyaka kuphela, ukugcina ingqesho yootitshala abangama-2000 kuye kwafuneka siphambukise imali ukusuka kwelinye iphondo ukuya kwimfundo ukuya kweminye imisebenzi yemfundo. 
Kulo nyaka uwodwa, ukuze silondoloze ingqesho yabahlohli abangama-2000 siye sanyanzeleka ukuba sithathe kwimali yeminye imisebenzi yephondo siyifake kwezemfundo.
Kulo nyaka nje uwodwa, ngelizama ukukhusela abafundisi-ntsapho abangama-2000 siye sazama ukufaka imali kwezemfundo siyithatha kwamanye amasebe.
Lo nyaka kuphela, ukugcina ingqesho yootitshala abangama-2000 kuye kwafuneka siphambukise imali ukusuka kwelinye iphondo ukuya kwimfundo ukuya kweminye imisebenzi yemfundo. 
Kulo nyaka uwodwa, ukuze silondoloze ingqesho yabahlohli abangama-2000 siye sanyanzeleka ukuba sithathe kwimali yeminye imisebenzi yephondo siyifake kwezemfundo.
Lo nyaka uwodwa, ukuze kulondolozwe abasebenzela ezemfundo abangama-2000, kuyekwa funeka imali singayithumeli kweminye imisebenzi yephondo, sisuke siyifake kwezemfundo. 
Lo nyaka kuphela, ukugcina ingqesho yootitshala abangama-2000 kuye kwafuneka siphambukise imali ukusuka kwelinye iphondo ukuya kwimfundo ukuya kweminye imisebenzi yemfundo. 
Kulo nyaka uwodwa, ukuze silondoloze ingqesho yabahlohli abangama-2000 siye sanyanzeleka ukuba sithathe kwimali yeminye imisebenzi yephondo siyifake kwezemfundo.
Lo nyaka uwodwa, ukuze kulondolozwe abasebenzela ezemfundo abangama-2000, kuyekwa funeka imali singayithumeli kweminye imisebenzi yephondo, sisuke siyifake kwezemfundo. 
Kulo nyaka nje uwodwa, ngelizama ukukhusela abafundisi-ntsapho abangama-2000 siye sazama ukufaka imali kwezemfundo siyithatha kwamanye amasebe.
Kulo nyaka uwodwa, ukuze silondoloze ingqesho yabahlohli abangama-2000 siye sanyanzeleka ukuba sithathe kwimali yeminye imisebenzi yephondo siyifake kwezemfundo.
Lo nyaka uwodwa, ukuze kulondolozwe abasebenzela ezemfundo abangama-2000, kuyekwa funeka imali singayithumeli kweminye imisebenzi yephondo, sisuke siyifake kwezemfundo. 
Kulo nyaka nje uwodwa, ngelizama ukukhusela abafundisi-ntsapho abangama-2000 siye sazama ukufaka imali kwezemfundo siyithatha kwamanye amasebe.
Lo nyaka kuphela, ukugcina ingqesho yootitshala abangama-2000 kuye kwafuneka siphambukise imali ukusuka kwelinye iphondo ukuya kwimfundo ukuya kweminye imisebenzi yemfundo. 
Utyalomali lwethu kufuneka silwenze ngokungaphezulu kwezona zikolo zihlelelekileyo ukuze xa anyukayo amanani, ukulingana komgangatho wemfundo makuviwe ngenxa yokukholelwa kakhulu kwikamva lesikolo ngasinye selokishi. 
Kufuneka sisivule isandla ekutyaleni kwizikolo zabahlelelekileyo ukwenzela ukuba sithi xa siphucula amanani ube nomgangatho wezemfundo ubenokubonakala kwinkolelo emandla yokuba likho ikamva kwisikolo ngasinye sasezilokishini.  
Kufuneka sinyuse utyalomali lwethu ukuya kwizikolo ezingamahlwempu ukwenzela ukuba xa kusanda amanani ulingano lwemfundo luvakale ngenkolo enkulu kwingomso lesikolo komnye nomnye umzi-dolophu.
Sifanele ukwandisa utyalo-mali lwethu kwizikolo zabasweleyo ukuze naxa esanda amanani impatho elinganayo yemfundo ivakale njengenkolelo ethe kratya kwixesha elizayo kwisikolo ngasinye saselokishini.
Kufuneka sisivule isandla ekutyaleni kwizikolo zabahlelelekileyo ukwenzela ukuba sithi xa siphucula amanani ube nomgangatho wezemfundo ubenokubonakala kwinkolelo emandla yokuba likho ikamva kwisikolo ngasinye sasezilokishini.  
Kufuneka sinyuse utyalomali lwethu ukuya kwizikolo ezingamahlwempu ukwenzela ukuba xa kusanda amanani ulingano lwemfundo luvakale ngenkolo enkulu kwingomso lesikolo komnye nomnye umzi-dolophu.

Okona kubalulekileyo, uMphathiswa uDugmore neNtsumpa-Jikelele enguSwartz, inye into esimele ukuyenza ukuze sibe nobuChule kuMandla oLuntu, nto leyo iza kululungela lonke olu tyalomali.
Okona kubalulekileyo, Mphathiswa uDugmore nawe Ngqonyela Swartz, sifanele sibe naBasebenzi abanobuchule obukhethekileyo ukuze sikwazi ukufezekisa eli phulo lotyalo.
Okubaluleke nangakumbi, kukuba uMphathiswa u-Dugmore noMlawuli Jikelele u-Swartz, sinembumbulu enye ekuveliseni isiCwangciso seMithombo yabaSebenzi ukuthethelela lonke olu tyalomali. 
Okubaluleke kakhulu, Mphathiswa Dugmore noNjengele-Mongameli Swartz, sinomgqaliselo omnye wokuhlanganisela isiCwangciso-cebo sabaSebenzi sokunika izizathu ngalo lonke olu tyalo-mali.

Kufuneka sibe nabafundi abaphumeleleyo kwimatriki abaqinisekileyo ngentsingiselo yabo, abagqwesileyo kwiziphumo zabo, abalufaneleyo uqoqosho, abathembekileyo kwimimandla abakuyo nabaluncedo eluntwini.
Sidinga ukuvelisa baphumelele imatriki abamiliseleyo kwiinqobo zabo, abagqwesileyo kwiziphumo zabo, nabasenokuba nenxaxheba kwezoqoqosho, nabathembakeleyo eluntwini, kwanabo basenokuba yingenelo eluntwini.
Sidinga ukuvelisa abazuzi bematriki abangqongqo kwizinto abazixabisileyo, abaphume izandla kwiziphumo zabo, abafanelwe luqoqosho oluchanekileyo, abahambelana noqoqosho, abathembekile kuluntu labo, yaye abalulutho kuluntu.
Kufuneka sifumane abaphumelele imatriki abomeleleyo ekubambeleleni kwiimpawu zentsulungeko zabo, abaneziphumo ezisemagqabini, abalulungeleyo uqoqosho, abathembekileyo kuluntu lwabo, nabaluncedo ebantwini.
Sidinga ukuvelisa baphumelele imatriki abamiliseleyo kwiinqobo zabo, abagqwesileyo kwiziphumo zabo, nabasenokuba nenxaxheba kwezoqoqosho, nabathembakeleyo eluntwini, kwanabo basenokuba yingenelo eluntwini.

Nini abamele la mathemba njengoko sisakha iKhaya loMntu wonke.
Nina nimele la mathemba nanjengoko sizakhela iKhaya lethu Sisonke.
Nimele onke la mathemba njengoko sisakha iKhaya lethu Sonke. 
Sibhiyozela impumelelo yenu kuba nincame konke nasebenza ngokuzimisela, abazali benu bancame konke banigcina ezikolweni, abahlali bemimandla enikuyo bancame konke, utyalomali balufaka kwikamva lenu. 
Siyayibhiyozela impumelelo yenu ngenxa yokuba nizinikele nasebenza nzima, nabazali benu bayebazinikela benigcine nisesikolweni, kwanoluntu ngokubanzi luyelwazinikela lafaka isandla kwikamva lenu. 
Sibhiyozela iimpumelelo zenu ngenxa yokuba nizilile yaye nasebenza ngamandla, abazali benu bazilile yaye banigcina esikolweni, yaye noluntu lwenu lwazila yaye lwenza utyalomali kwingomso lenu.
Sibhiyozela iimpumelelo zenu kuba niye nancama konke futhi nasebenza nzima, abazali benu nabo baye bancama konke banigcina esikolweni, kanti noluntu lwenu luye lwancama konke ukuze lwenze utyalo-mali kwikamva lenu.
Siyayibhiyozela impumelelo yenu ngenxa yokuba nizinikele nasebenza nzima, nabazali benu bayebazinikela benigcine nisesikolweni, kwanoluntu ngokubanzi luyelwazinikela lafaka isandla kwikamva lenu. 
Sibhiyozela iimpumelelo zenu ngenxa yokuba nizilile yaye nasebenza ngamandla, abazali benu bazilile yaye banigcina esikolweni, yaye noluntu lwenu lwazila yaye lwenza utyalomali kwingomso lenu.
Sibhiyozela iimpumelelo zenu kuba niye nancama konke futhi nasebenza nzima, abazali benu nabo baye bancama konke banigcina esikolweni, kanti noluntu lwenu luye lwancama konke ukuze lwenze utyalo-mali kwikamva lenu.
Sibhiyozela impumelelo yenu kuba nincame konke nasebenza ngokuzimisela, abazali benu bancame konke banigcina ezikolweni, abahlali bemimandla enikuyo bancame konke, utyalomali balufaka kwikamva lenu. 
Sibhiyozela iimpumelelo zenu ngenxa yokuba nizilile yaye nasebenza ngamandla, abazali benu bazilile yaye banigcina esikolweni, yaye noluntu lwenu lwazila yaye lwenza utyalomali kwingomso lenu.

Sibhiyozela impumelelo yenu kuba nincame konke nasebenza ngokuzimisela, abazali benu bancame konke banigcina ezikolweni, abahlali bemimandla enikuyo bancame konke, utyalomali balufaka kwikamva lenu. 
Siyayibhiyozela impumelelo yenu ngenxa yokuba nizinikele nasebenza nzima, nabazali benu bayebazinikela benigcine nisesikolweni, kwanoluntu ngokubanzi luyelwazinikela lafaka isandla kwikamva lenu. 
Sibhiyozela iimpumelelo zenu kuba niye nancama konke futhi nasebenza nzima, abazali benu nabo baye bancama konke banigcina esikolweni, kanti noluntu lwenu luye lwancama konke ukuze lwenze utyalo-mali kwikamva lenu.
Sibhiyozela impumelelo yenu kuba nincame konke nasebenza ngokuzimisela, abazali benu bancame konke banigcina ezikolweni, abahlali bemimandla enikuyo bancame konke, utyalomali balufaka kwikamva lenu. 
Siyayibhiyozela impumelelo yenu ngenxa yokuba nizinikele nasebenza nzima, nabazali benu bayebazinikela benigcine nisesikolweni, kwanoluntu ngokubanzi luyelwazinikela lafaka isandla kwikamva lenu. 
Sibhiyozela iimpumelelo zenu ngenxa yokuba nizilile yaye nasebenza ngamandla, abazali benu bazilile yaye banigcina esikolweni, yaye noluntu lwenu lwazila yaye lwenza utyalomali kwingomso lenu.
Abaninzi bayalithandabuza ixabiso lokubhiyozela impumelelo kwimatriki ngenxa yezintsompothi zayo, nangenxa yokuba ezo zifundo zingaveza intshiyekela yenkqubo yokucalucalulwa kwabantu.
Abaninzi bayalithandabuza ixabiso lokubhiyozelwa kokuphumelela imatriki ingakumbi xa kujonwa ukuntsonkotha kwayo kwanomba wokuba oku kunenalo ifuthe lenkqubo yorhulumente wocalulo. 
Abaninzi bathandabuza ixabiso lokuvuyela iziphumo zematriki nezintsonkotho zazo nenyaniso yokuba isenokubonisa intsalela yenkqubo yocalucalulo. 
Baninzi abalithandabuzayo ixabiso lokubhiyozela iimpumelelo zematriki ngenxa yeemeko zobugocigoci nenyaniso yokuba zisenokuba zisabonisa intsalela yenkqubo yocalucalulo.
Abaninzi bayalithandabuza ixabiso lokubhiyozelwa kokuphumelela imatriki ingakumbi xa kujonwa ukuntsonkotha kwayo kwanomba wokuba oku kunenalo ifuthe lenkqubo yorhulumente wocalulo. 
Abaninzi bathandabuza ixabiso lokuvuyela iziphumo zematriki nezintsonkotho zazo nenyaniso yokuba isenokubonisa intsalela yenkqubo yocalucalulo. 
Baninzi abalithandabuzayo ixabiso lokubhiyozela iimpumelelo zematriki ngenxa yeemeko zobugocigoci nenyaniso yokuba zisenokuba zisabonisa intsalela yenkqubo yocalucalulo.

Abaninzi bayalithandabuza ixabiso lokubhiyozelwa kokuphumelela imatriki ingakumbi xa kujonwa ukuntsonkotha kwayo kwanomba wokuba oku kunenalo ifuthe lenkqubo yorhulumente wocalulo. 
Baninzi abalithandabuzayo ixabiso lokubhiyozela iimpumelelo zematriki ngenxa yeemeko zobugocigoci nenyaniso yokuba zisenokuba zisabonisa intsalela yenkqubo yocalucalulo.
Abaninzi bayalithandabuza ixabiso lokubhiyozela impumelelo kwimatriki ngenxa yezintsompothi zayo, nangenxa yokuba ezo zifundo zingaveza intshiyekela yenkqubo yokucalucalulwa kwabantu.
Abaninzi bayalithandabuza ixabiso lokubhiyozelwa kokuphumelela imatriki ingakumbi xa kujonwa ukuntsonkotha kwayo kwanomba wokuba oku kunenalo ifuthe lenkqubo yorhulumente wocalulo. 
Abaninzi bathandabuza ixabiso lokuvuyela iziphumo zematriki nezintsonkotho zazo nenyaniso yokuba isenokubonisa intsalela yenkqubo yocalucalulo. 
Nini kuphela abanokuyongamela le nto ngokuzimisela nidlamkile, nikwanengqiqo yokuzinikezela ekwakheni iKhaya loMntu Wonke, elo lingacaluliyo nelinolingano.
Nini kuphela abanokwazi ukukunqoba oku ngokuthi nizinikele ngako konke eninako ekwakhiweni kweKhaya lethu Sisonke, ikhaya elingacaluli ngokobuhlanga kwanelo linokulingana.
Nini kuphela abangoyisa oku ngokukhuthala nokuzimisela ngengqondo ukwakha iKhaya lethu Sonke, elo elingenalo ucalucalulo yaye elidibene nangakumbi.
Nini kuphela abanokuyoyisa le meko ngokuthi nizinikele ekuququzeleni nangokuba sezingqondweni ekwakheni iKhaya labo Bonke, elingenabuhlanga nelithe kratya ngempatho elinganayo.
Nini kuphela abanokwazi ukukunqoba oku ngokuthi nizinikele ngako konke eninako ekwakhiweni kweKhaya lethu Sisonke, ikhaya elingacaluli ngokobuhlanga kwanelo linokulingana.

Oku kufanele kubonakale kuzo zonke izigqibo enizithathayo ukususela ngalo mzuzu ukuya phambili.
Oku kufuneka kubonakale kuzo zonke izinto enizikhethayo ukusuka ngoku ukuya phambili.
Oku kufanele ukubonakala kuko konke enikukhethayo ukususela ngoku ukuya phambili.

Kude kube ngoku kuye kwafuneka nizikhethele indlela eniza kusebenza nzima ngayo.
Ukuza kuthi ga ngoku benikade nijongene nokusebenza nzima kuphela.
Ukuza kuthi ga ngoku bekufuneka nikhethe nje ukuba nisebenze nzima kangakanani. 
Kude kube ngoku benizikhethela ukuba niza kusebenza nzima kangakanani.
Ukuza kuthi ga ngoku benikade nijongene nokusebenza nzima kuphela.
Ukuza kuthi ga ngoku bekufuneka nikhethe nje ukuba nisebenze nzima kangakanani. 
Kude kube ngoku benizikhethela ukuba niza kusebenza nzima kangakanani.
Kude kube ngoku kuye kwafuneka nizikhethele indlela eniza kusebenza nzima ngayo.
Ukuza kuthi ga ngoku bekufuneka nikhethe nje ukuba nisebenze nzima kangakanani. 
Kude kube ngoku benizikhethela ukuba niza kusebenza nzima kangakanani.
Kude kube ngoku kuye kwafuneka nizikhethele indlela eniza kusebenza nzima ngayo.
Ukuza kuthi ga ngoku benikade nijongene nokusebenza nzima kuphela.
Kude kube ngoku benizikhethela ukuba niza kusebenza nzima kangakanani.
Kude kube ngoku kuye kwafuneka nizikhethele indlela eniza kusebenza nzima ngayo.
Ukuza kuthi ga ngoku benikade nijongene nokusebenza nzima kuphela.
Ukuza kuthi ga ngoku bekufuneka nikhethe nje ukuba nisebenze nzima kangakanani. 
Isatifikethi sakho sematriki siyakuvumela sikwakunyanzelela ekuthatheni izigqibo, nokuthi nizikhethele ukuba ingulowo ufuna ukuba ngumntu onjani na, nizikhethele nobomi enifuna ukubuphila.
Izatifikethi zenu zematriki zininceda kwaye zininyanzela ukuba nikwazi ukuthatha izigqibo  ezimalunga nohlobo lomntu enifuna ukuba nguye kwanokuba hlobo luni lwempilo ezifuna ukuba nayo.
Isatifiketi senu sematriki sinivumela nokuninyanzela ukwenza izigqibo nezinto enizikhethayo malunga nohlobo lomntu enifuna ukuba lulo nobomi enifuna ukubuphila.
Isatifikethi senu sematriki sinivumela siphinde sininyanzele ukwenza izigqibo nokukhetha malunga nohlobo lomntu enifuna ukuba nguye kwanohlobo lobomi enifuna ukubuphila.

Huntshu kwaye sininqwenelela impumelelo.
Sivuyisana nani yaye sininqwenelela amathamsanqa.

eli thuba lilodwa lokuzityand’ igila, lokwakha umanyano nokuzingca kwaboMzantsi Afrika 
kulisebenzisa kangangoko eli thuba elikhethekileyo lokudandalazisa kwanokwakha ubumbano kwanokuzingca kwabemi boMzantsi Afrika
ukwenza konke okusemandleni ngeli thuba elikhethekileyo ukwazisa nokuqhubeka ukwakha ubumbano nebhongo phakathi kwabemi boMzantsi Afrika
kukuzimisela kangangoko ngeli thuba lingafaniyo namanye ukubalula nokwakha ubunye obungaphaya neqhayiya phakathi kwabantu baseMzantsi Afrika

sidale imeko yonxibelelwano esincedayo ekusebenziseni eli thuba, sikhawulezise kwicala lophuhliso nasekwandiseni amathuba  
kudala ukuba kubekho imo yonxibelelwano enceda ukuba kusetyenziswe elithuba lokukhawulezisa uphuhliso kongezwe namanye amathuba
ukudala umoya wonxibelelwano onceda eli thuba ukukhawulezisa uphuhliso nokwandisa amathuba
kukudala umoya wonxibelelwano onceda ngokusetyenziswa kweli thuba ukuze kuxheshwe uphuhliso ngokunjalo kwandiswe amathuba

sakhe imbumba yama-Afrika.
kwakha ubumbano kwizwekazi laseAfrika.
ukwakha ubumbano lwamaAfrika.
kukwakha imbumba yamanyama yobuAfrika.
kwakha ubumbano kwizwekazi laseAfrika.
ukwakha ubumbano lwamaAfrika.
kukwakha imbumba yamanyama yobuAfrika.

ukwakha ubumbano lwamaAfrika.
kukwakha imbumba yamanyama yobuAfrika.
sakhe imbumba yama-Afrika.
kwakha ubumbano kwizwekazi laseAfrika.
kukwakha imbumba yamanyama yobuAfrika.
sakhe imbumba yama-Afrika.
kwakha ubumbano kwizwekazi laseAfrika.
ukwakha ubumbano lwamaAfrika.
Oku singakuzuza ngezi ndlela:
Oku kusenokuphunyezwa ngokuthi:
Oku kuya kufikelelwa ngokuthi:
Oku kuya kuphunyezwa:

Oku singakuzuza ngezi ndlela:
Oku kuya kufikelelwa ngokuthi:
Oku kuya kuphunyezwa:
Oku singakuzuza ngezi ndlela:
Oku kusenokuphunyezwa ngokuthi:
Oku kuya kuphunyezwa:
Oku singakuzuza ngezi ndlela:
Oku kusenokuphunyezwa ngokuthi:
Oku kuya kufikelelwa ngokuthi:
ngokubonelela ngobunkokeli nangolungelelwaniso ukuze sinxibelelane eburhulumenteni  kusenzelwa eyango-2010  iNdebe yeHlabathi
Kubonelelwe ngokhokelo kwanoyondelelaniso lonxibelelwano lwaseburhulumenteni lwale Ndebe yeHlabathi ka-2010
kubonelelwe ngobunkokheli nolungelelaniso lonxibelelwano lukarhulumente ukwenzela iNdebe yeHlabathi ka-2010
ngokunikela ngobunkokeli nangonxulumaniso ukulungiselela unxibelelwano lukarhulumente ukwenzela iNdebe yeHlabathi ka-2010
Kubonelelwe ngokhokelo kwanoyondelelaniso lonxibelelwano lwaseburhulumenteni lwale Ndebe yeHlabathi ka-2010
kubonelelwe ngobunkokheli nolungelelaniso lonxibelelwano lukarhulumente ukwenzela iNdebe yeHlabathi ka-2010
ngokunikela ngobunkokeli nangonxulumaniso ukulungiselela unxibelelwano lukarhulumente ukwenzela iNdebe yeHlabathi ka-2010
ngokubonelela ngobunkokeli nangolungelelwaniso ukuze sinxibelelane eburhulumenteni  kusenzelwa eyango-2010  iNdebe yeHlabathi
kubonelelwe ngobunkokheli nolungelelaniso lonxibelelwano lukarhulumente ukwenzela iNdebe yeHlabathi ka-2010
ngokunikela ngobunkokeli nangonxulumaniso ukulungiselela unxibelelwano lukarhulumente ukwenzela iNdebe yeHlabathi ka-2010
ngokubonelela ngobunkokeli nangolungelelwaniso ukuze sinxibelelane eburhulumenteni  kusenzelwa eyango-2010  iNdebe yeHlabathi
Kubonelelwe ngokhokelo kwanoyondelelaniso lonxibelelwano lwaseburhulumenteni lwale Ndebe yeHlabathi ka-2010
ngokunikela ngobunkokeli nangonxulumaniso ukulungiselela unxibelelwano lukarhulumente ukwenzela iNdebe yeHlabathi ka-2010
ngokubonelela ngobunkokeli nangolungelelwaniso ukuze sinxibelelane eburhulumenteni  kusenzelwa eyango-2010  iNdebe yeHlabathi
Kubonelelwe ngokhokelo kwanoyondelelaniso lonxibelelwano lwaseburhulumenteni lwale Ndebe yeHlabathi ka-2010
kubonelelwe ngobunkokheli nolungelelaniso lonxibelelwano lukarhulumente ukwenzela iNdebe yeHlabathi ka-2010
kusakhiwa ubudlelwane kwisizwe sabanxibelelanayo bawo onke amaqela abucala nawaseburhulumenteni, ekubumbeni ngobunono imizamo yokusebenzisana nabo sinxibelelana nabo kwizwekazi eli nabakwamanye amazwe ehlabathi, ukuze sisonke, kweli lethu ilizwe nakwizwekazi, singalixhamla eli thuba lobomi  
kwakhiwe ubambiswano lukazwelonke loosomlomo besizwe kwanabo babucala kumacandelo onke, ndawonye nokwakhiwo kwamafelandawonye nabanye oosomlomo bamazwe ezwekazi liphela nabazinze kumazwekazi angaphandle, ukwenzel’ ukuba ilizwe ngokubanzi nezwekazi ngokunjalo lulisebenzise eli thuba lonxibelelwano nolungazange lwabakho ngaphambili
ukwakha ulwahlulelwano lukazwelonke loluntu nabanxibelelani babucala kuzo zonke izifundo, kwakunye nokwenza ubudlelwane nabanxibelelani kwilizwekazi nokuthi saa kwezizwe, ukuze ngokudibeneyo ilizwe nelizwekazi zibe nako ukungcamla amathuba olu nxibelelwano lwethuba lobomi
ngokwakha ulwahlulelwano lwesizwe lwabanxibelelanisi bakarhulumente nababucala kuzo zonke iinkalo zemisebenzi, ngokunjalo nokuqhubela phambili iimanyano nabanxibelelanisi kwilizwekazi nakwebesizwe esinye bangaphandle, ukuze ilizwe ngokunjalo nelizwekazi zifumane uncedo kweli thuba lonxibelelwano lobude bobomi
kwakhiwe ubambiswano lukazwelonke loosomlomo besizwe kwanabo babucala kumacandelo onke, ndawonye nokwakhiwo kwamafelandawonye nabanye oosomlomo bamazwe ezwekazi liphela nabazinze kumazwekazi angaphandle, ukwenzel’ ukuba ilizwe ngokubanzi nezwekazi ngokunjalo lulisebenzise eli thuba lonxibelelwano nolungazange lwabakho ngaphambili
ukwakha ulwahlulelwano lukazwelonke loluntu nabanxibelelani babucala kuzo zonke izifundo, kwakunye nokwenza ubudlelwane nabanxibelelani kwilizwekazi nokuthi saa kwezizwe, ukuze ngokudibeneyo ilizwe nelizwekazi zibe nako ukungcamla amathuba olu nxibelelwano lwethuba lobomi
ngokwakha ulwahlulelwano lwesizwe lwabanxibelelanisi bakarhulumente nababucala kuzo zonke iinkalo zemisebenzi, ngokunjalo nokuqhubela phambili iimanyano nabanxibelelanisi kwilizwekazi nakwebesizwe esinye bangaphandle, ukuze ilizwe ngokunjalo nelizwekazi zifumane uncedo kweli thuba lonxibelelwano lobude bobomi
kusakhiwa ubudlelwane kwisizwe sabanxibelelanayo bawo onke amaqela abucala nawaseburhulumenteni, ekubumbeni ngobunono imizamo yokusebenzisana nabo sinxibelelana nabo kwizwekazi eli nabakwamanye amazwe ehlabathi, ukuze sisonke, kweli lethu ilizwe nakwizwekazi, singalixhamla eli thuba lobomi  
ukwakha ulwahlulelwano lukazwelonke loluntu nabanxibelelani babucala kuzo zonke izifundo, kwakunye nokwenza ubudlelwane nabanxibelelani kwilizwekazi nokuthi saa kwezizwe, ukuze ngokudibeneyo ilizwe nelizwekazi zibe nako ukungcamla amathuba olu nxibelelwano lwethuba lobomi
ngokwakha ulwahlulelwano lwesizwe lwabanxibelelanisi bakarhulumente nababucala kuzo zonke iinkalo zemisebenzi, ngokunjalo nokuqhubela phambili iimanyano nabanxibelelanisi kwilizwekazi nakwebesizwe esinye bangaphandle, ukuze ilizwe ngokunjalo nelizwekazi zifumane uncedo kweli thuba lonxibelelwano lobude bobomi
kusakhiwa ubudlelwane kwisizwe sabanxibelelanayo bawo onke amaqela abucala nawaseburhulumenteni, ekubumbeni ngobunono imizamo yokusebenzisana nabo sinxibelelana nabo kwizwekazi eli nabakwamanye amazwe ehlabathi, ukuze sisonke, kweli lethu ilizwe nakwizwekazi, singalixhamla eli thuba lobomi  
kwakhiwe ubambiswano lukazwelonke loosomlomo besizwe kwanabo babucala kumacandelo onke, ndawonye nokwakhiwo kwamafelandawonye nabanye oosomlomo bamazwe ezwekazi liphela nabazinze kumazwekazi angaphandle, ukwenzel’ ukuba ilizwe ngokubanzi nezwekazi ngokunjalo lulisebenzise eli thuba lonxibelelwano nolungazange lwabakho ngaphambili
ngokwakha ulwahlulelwano lwesizwe lwabanxibelelanisi bakarhulumente nababucala kuzo zonke iinkalo zemisebenzi, ngokunjalo nokuqhubela phambili iimanyano nabanxibelelanisi kwilizwekazi nakwebesizwe esinye bangaphandle, ukuze ilizwe ngokunjalo nelizwekazi zifumane uncedo kweli thuba lonxibelelwano lobude bobomi
kusakhiwa ubudlelwane kwisizwe sabanxibelelanayo bawo onke amaqela abucala nawaseburhulumenteni, ekubumbeni ngobunono imizamo yokusebenzisana nabo sinxibelelana nabo kwizwekazi eli nabakwamanye amazwe ehlabathi, ukuze sisonke, kweli lethu ilizwe nakwizwekazi, singalixhamla eli thuba lobomi  
kwakhiwe ubambiswano lukazwelonke loosomlomo besizwe kwanabo babucala kumacandelo onke, ndawonye nokwakhiwo kwamafelandawonye nabanye oosomlomo bamazwe ezwekazi liphela nabazinze kumazwekazi angaphandle, ukwenzel’ ukuba ilizwe ngokubanzi nezwekazi ngokunjalo lulisebenzise eli thuba lonxibelelwano nolungazange lwabakho ngaphambili
ukwakha ulwahlulelwano lukazwelonke loluntu nabanxibelelani babucala kuzo zonke izifundo, kwakunye nokwenza ubudlelwane nabanxibelelani kwilizwekazi nokuthi saa kwezizwe, ukuze ngokudibeneyo ilizwe nelizwekazi zibe nako ukungcamla amathuba olu nxibelelwano lwethuba lobomi
lokuqalisa amaphulo angundoqo okunxibelelana eburhulumenteni kusenzelwa eka-2010 yeBhola eKhatywayo iNdebe yeHlabathi. 
Kusekwe iiprojekthi ezingundoqo zonxibelelwano lwaseburhulumenteni zeNdebe yeBhola eKhetywayo yeHlabathi ka-2010.
Ukuthatha uxanduva oluphambili lweeprojekthi zikarhulumente zonxibelelwano lweNdebe yeSoka yeHlabathi yowama-2010.
ngokuqhuba iiprojekthi ezisentloko zonxibelelwano lukarhulumente ukwenzela iNdebe yeHlabathi yeBhola eKhatywayo ngo-2010.
Kusekwe iiprojekthi ezingundoqo zonxibelelwano lwaseburhulumenteni zeNdebe yeBhola eKhetywayo yeHlabathi ka-2010.
Ukuthatha uxanduva oluphambili lweeprojekthi zikarhulumente zonxibelelwano lweNdebe yeSoka yeHlabathi yowama-2010.
ngokuqhuba iiprojekthi ezisentloko zonxibelelwano lukarhulumente ukwenzela iNdebe yeHlabathi yeBhola eKhatywayo ngo-2010.
lokuqalisa amaphulo angundoqo okunxibelelana eburhulumenteni kusenzelwa eka-2010 yeBhola eKhatywayo iNdebe yeHlabathi. 
Ukuthatha uxanduva oluphambili lweeprojekthi zikarhulumente zonxibelelwano lweNdebe yeSoka yeHlabathi yowama-2010.
ngokuqhuba iiprojekthi ezisentloko zonxibelelwano lukarhulumente ukwenzela iNdebe yeHlabathi yeBhola eKhatywayo ngo-2010.
lokuqalisa amaphulo angundoqo okunxibelelana eburhulumenteni kusenzelwa eka-2010 yeBhola eKhatywayo iNdebe yeHlabathi. 
Kusekwe iiprojekthi ezingundoqo zonxibelelwano lwaseburhulumenteni zeNdebe yeBhola eKhetywayo yeHlabathi ka-2010.
ngokuqhuba iiprojekthi ezisentloko zonxibelelwano lukarhulumente ukwenzela iNdebe yeHlabathi yeBhola eKhatywayo ngo-2010.
lokuqalisa amaphulo angundoqo okunxibelelana eburhulumenteni kusenzelwa eka-2010 yeBhola eKhatywayo iNdebe yeHlabathi. 
Kusekwe iiprojekthi ezingundoqo zonxibelelwano lwaseburhulumenteni zeNdebe yeBhola eKhetywayo yeHlabathi ka-2010.
Ukuthatha uxanduva oluphambili lweeprojekthi zikarhulumente zonxibelelwano lweNdebe yeSoka yeHlabathi yowama-2010.

Ukulungiswa kweMiqathango kaZwelonke yokuhamba kweziThuthi eziNdleleni ngenjongo yokuphucula ukhuseleko ezindleleni.
Uhlengahlengiso lweMithetho yezeNdlela yeSizwe ukuze kuphuculwe ukhuseleko ezindleleni
Imimiselo yeSizwe yeNdlela yeziThuthi eLungisiweyo ukuphucula ukhuseleko ezindleleni
IMithetho yeSizwe ngokuSetyenziswa kweeNdlela iLungiselwe ukuphucula ukhuseleko lweendlela
Uhlengahlengiso lweMithetho yezeNdlela yeSizwe ukuze kuphuculwe ukhuseleko ezindleleni
Imimiselo yeSizwe yeNdlela yeziThuthi eLungisiweyo ukuphucula ukhuseleko ezindleleni
IMithetho yeSizwe ngokuSetyenziswa kweeNdlela iLungiselwe ukuphucula ukhuseleko lweendlela
Ukulungiswa kweMiqathango kaZwelonke yokuhamba kweziThuthi eziNdleleni ngenjongo yokuphucula ukhuseleko ezindleleni.

Ukulungiswa kweMiqathango kaZwelonke yokuhamba kweziThuthi eziNdleleni ngenjongo yokuphucula ukhuseleko ezindleleni.
Uhlengahlengiso lweMithetho yezeNdlela yeSizwe ukuze kuphuculwe ukhuseleko ezindleleni
Imimiselo yeSizwe yeNdlela yeziThuthi eLungisiweyo ukuphucula ukhuseleko ezindleleni
POLOKWANE: Seyilungisiwe iMiqathango kaZwelonke yokuhamba kweziThuthi eziNdleleni.
EPOLOKWANE: Sele ihlengahlengisiwe iMithetho yezeNdlela yeSizwe.
E-POLOKWANE: Imimiselo yeSizwe yeNdlela yeziThuthi ilungisiwe. 
EPOLOKWANE: IMithetho yeSizwe ngokuSetyenziswa kweeNdlela ilungisiwe.
EPOLOKWANE: Sele ihlengahlengisiwe iMithetho yezeNdlela yeSizwe.
E-POLOKWANE: Imimiselo yeSizwe yeNdlela yeziThuthi ilungisiwe. 
EPOLOKWANE: IMithetho yeSizwe ngokuSetyenziswa kweeNdlela ilungisiwe.
POLOKWANE: Seyilungisiwe iMiqathango kaZwelonke yokuhamba kweziThuthi eziNdleleni.
E-POLOKWANE: Imimiselo yeSizwe yeNdlela yeziThuthi ilungisiwe. 
EPOLOKWANE: IMithetho yeSizwe ngokuSetyenziswa kweeNdlela ilungisiwe.
POLOKWANE: Seyilungisiwe iMiqathango kaZwelonke yokuhamba kweziThuthi eziNdleleni.
EPOLOKWANE: Sele ihlengahlengisiwe iMithetho yezeNdlela yeSizwe.
EPOLOKWANE: IMithetho yeSizwe ngokuSetyenziswa kweeNdlela ilungisiwe.
POLOKWANE: Seyilungisiwe iMiqathango kaZwelonke yokuhamba kweziThuthi eziNdleleni.
EPOLOKWANE: Sele ihlengahlengisiwe iMithetho yezeNdlela yeSizwe.
E-POLOKWANE: Imimiselo yeSizwe yeNdlela yeziThuthi ilungisiwe. 
Esi sibizwa njengesiLungiso seShumi elinesiXhenxe esibe sisinyanzeliso emva kokushicilelwa.
Ibizwa ngokuba luHlengahlengiso lweShumi elinesixhenxe yaze yagunyanziswa ngokupapashwa kwayo.
Lubizwa uLungiso lweShumi elinesixhenxe yaye lungena entsebenzweni lakupapashwa.
Ibizwa ngokuba sisiLungiso Seshumi elinesiXhenxe saze saqalisa ngopapasho.
Ibizwa ngokuba luHlengahlengiso lweShumi elinesixhenxe yaze yagunyanziswa ngokupapashwa kwayo.
Lubizwa uLungiso lweShumi elinesixhenxe yaye lungena entsebenzweni lakupapashwa.
Ibizwa ngokuba sisiLungiso Seshumi elinesiXhenxe saze saqalisa ngopapasho.

Lubizwa uLungiso lweShumi elinesixhenxe yaye lungena entsebenzweni lakupapashwa.
Ibizwa ngokuba sisiLungiso Seshumi elinesiXhenxe saze saqalisa ngopapasho.
Esi sibizwa njengesiLungiso seShumi elinesiXhenxe esibe sisinyanzeliso emva kokushicilelwa.
Ibizwa ngokuba luHlengahlengiso lweShumi elinesixhenxe yaze yagunyanziswa ngokupapashwa kwayo.
Ibizwa ngokuba sisiLungiso Seshumi elinesiXhenxe saze saqalisa ngopapasho.
Esi sibizwa njengesiLungiso seShumi elinesiXhenxe esibe sisinyanzeliso emva kokushicilelwa.
Ibizwa ngokuba luHlengahlengiso lweShumi elinesixhenxe yaze yagunyanziswa ngokupapashwa kwayo.
Lubizwa uLungiso lweShumi elinesixhenxe yaye lungena entsebenzweni lakupapashwa.
ISebe leeNdlela nezoThutho lazisa abaqhubi bezithuthi ngezilungiso ezizezi:
ISebe lezeeNdlela nezoThutho lwazisa abaqhubi beemoto ngolu hlengahlengiso olulolu:
ISebe lezeeNdlela neziThuthi lazisa abaqhubi bezithuthi ngezilungiso ezi zezi:
ISebe leeNdlela noThutho lazisa abaqhubi beemoto ngezilungiso ezizezi:
ISebe lezeeNdlela nezoThutho lwazisa abaqhubi beemoto ngolu hlengahlengiso olulolu:
ISebe lezeeNdlela neziThuthi lazisa abaqhubi bezithuthi ngezilungiso ezi zezi:
ISebe leeNdlela noThutho lazisa abaqhubi beemoto ngezilungiso ezizezi:
ISebe leeNdlela nezoThutho lazisa abaqhubi bezithuthi ngezilungiso ezizezi:
ISebe lezeeNdlela neziThuthi lazisa abaqhubi bezithuthi ngezilungiso ezi zezi:
ISebe leeNdlela noThutho lazisa abaqhubi beemoto ngezilungiso ezizezi:
ISebe leeNdlela nezoThutho lazisa abaqhubi bezithuthi ngezilungiso ezizezi:
ISebe lezeeNdlela nezoThutho lwazisa abaqhubi beemoto ngolu hlengahlengiso olulolu:
ISebe leeNdlela noThutho lazisa abaqhubi beemoto ngezilungiso ezizezi:
ISebe leeNdlela nezoThutho lazisa abaqhubi bezithuthi ngezilungiso ezizezi:
ISebe lezeeNdlela nezoThutho lwazisa abaqhubi beemoto ngolu hlengahlengiso olulolu:
ISebe lezeeNdlela neziThuthi lazisa abaqhubi bezithuthi ngezilungiso ezi zezi:
Izithuthi ezitsha ezibhaliswe emva komhla woku-01 ngo-Agasti 2010 mazibe neenkcenkce ezineenombolo eziqiniswe ngezinamathiseli okanye ngezikhonkwane ezifutshane ezinamaqoqo.
Iimoto ezintsha ezibhaliswe emva komhla woku-01 kuAgasti 2010 kufuneka zibe neepleyiti zeenombolo zemoto ezincanyathiselweyo okanye ezibotshelelwe ngezikrufu.
Izithuthi zemoto ezintsha ezibhaliswe emva komhla woku-01 kweyeThupha 2010 kufuneka iipleyiti zenombolo zifakelwe ngeerivethi eziqhashumbayo okanye ngezikrufu.  
Izithuthi ezitsha eziziimoto ezibhaliswe emva komhla woku-01 August 2010 zifanele ukuba neepleyiti zeenombolo ezifakwa zize ziphume ngokutaka okanye ngezikrufu.
Iimoto ezintsha ezibhaliswe emva komhla woku-01 kuAgasti 2010 kufuneka zibe neepleyiti zeenombolo zemoto ezincanyathiselweyo okanye ezibotshelelwe ngezikrufu.
Izithuthi zemoto ezintsha ezibhaliswe emva komhla woku-01 kweyeThupha 2010 kufuneka iipleyiti zenombolo zifakelwe ngeerivethi eziqhashumbayo okanye ngezikrufu.  
Izithuthi ezitsha eziziimoto ezibhaliswe emva komhla woku-01 August 2010 zifanele ukuba neepleyiti zeenombolo ezifakwa zize ziphume ngokutaka okanye ngezikrufu.
Izithuthi ezitsha ezibhaliswe emva komhla woku-01 ngo-Agasti 2010 mazibe neenkcenkce ezineenombolo eziqiniswe ngezinamathiseli okanye ngezikhonkwane ezifutshane ezinamaqoqo.
Izithuthi zemoto ezintsha ezibhaliswe emva komhla woku-01 kweyeThupha 2010 kufuneka iipleyiti zenombolo zifakelwe ngeerivethi eziqhashumbayo okanye ngezikrufu.  
Izithuthi ezitsha eziziimoto ezibhaliswe emva komhla woku-01 August 2010 zifanele ukuba neepleyiti zeenombolo ezifakwa zize ziphume ngokutaka okanye ngezikrufu.
Izithuthi ezitsha ezibhaliswe emva komhla woku-01 ngo-Agasti 2010 mazibe neenkcenkce ezineenombolo eziqiniswe ngezinamathiseli okanye ngezikhonkwane ezifutshane ezinamaqoqo.
Iimoto ezintsha ezibhaliswe emva komhla woku-01 kuAgasti 2010 kufuneka zibe neepleyiti zeenombolo zemoto ezincanyathiselweyo okanye ezibotshelelwe ngezikrufu.
Izithuthi ezitsha eziziimoto ezibhaliswe emva komhla woku-01 August 2010 zifanele ukuba neepleyiti zeenombolo ezifakwa zize ziphume ngokutaka okanye ngezikrufu.
Izithuthi ezitsha ezibhaliswe emva komhla woku-01 ngo-Agasti 2010 mazibe neenkcenkce ezineenombolo eziqiniswe ngezinamathiseli okanye ngezikhonkwane ezifutshane ezinamaqoqo.
Iimoto ezintsha ezibhaliswe emva komhla woku-01 kuAgasti 2010 kufuneka zibe neepleyiti zeenombolo zemoto ezincanyathiselweyo okanye ezibotshelelwe ngezikrufu.
Izithuthi zemoto ezintsha ezibhaliswe emva komhla woku-01 kweyeThupha 2010 kufuneka iipleyiti zenombolo zifakelwe ngeerivethi eziqhashumbayo okanye ngezikrufu.  
Xa ingenakufakwa kwisithuthi, mayinamathiselwe ngesixhasi esivumelanayo ne-SANS 973.
Ukuba azikwazi kuncanyathiselwa emotweni kufunekwa zincanyathiselwe ngezinto ezihambisanayo ne-SANS 973.
Ukuba ayinako ukufakelwa kwisithuthi kufuneka ifakelwe kwibrakethi ethobela i-SANS 973. 
Ukuba azikwazi kufakeka kwisithuthi zifanele ukufakwa kwisixhasi esithobela iSANS 973.
Ukuba azikwazi kuncanyathiselwa emotweni kufunekwa zincanyathiselwe ngezinto ezihambisanayo ne-SANS 973.
Ukuba ayinako ukufakelwa kwisithuthi kufuneka ifakelwe kwibrakethi ethobela i-SANS 973. 
Ukuba azikwazi kufakeka kwisithuthi zifanele ukufakwa kwisixhasi esithobela iSANS 973.
Xa ingenakufakwa kwisithuthi, mayinamathiselwe ngesixhasi esivumelanayo ne-SANS 973.
Ukuba ayinako ukufakelwa kwisithuthi kufuneka ifakelwe kwibrakethi ethobela i-SANS 973. 
Ukuba azikwazi kufakeka kwisithuthi zifanele ukufakwa kwisixhasi esithobela iSANS 973.
Xa ingenakufakwa kwisithuthi, mayinamathiselwe ngesixhasi esivumelanayo ne-SANS 973.
Ukuba azikwazi kuncanyathiselwa emotweni kufunekwa zincanyathiselwe ngezinto ezihambisanayo ne-SANS 973.
Ukuba azikwazi kufakeka kwisithuthi zifanele ukufakwa kwisixhasi esithobela iSANS 973.
Xa ingenakufakwa kwisithuthi, mayinamathiselwe ngesixhasi esivumelanayo ne-SANS 973.
Ukuba azikwazi kuncanyathiselwa emotweni kufunekwa zincanyathiselwe ngezinto ezihambisanayo ne-SANS 973.
Ukuba ayinako ukufakelwa kwisithuthi kufuneka ifakelwe kwibrakethi ethobela i-SANS 973. 
Esi silungiso siza kunciphisa amathuba olwaphulo-mthetho namatyala ajongene nokuqhutywa kwezithuthi ezindleleni, bakuba sengxakini abaqhubi abanobuqhetseba bokuzisusa lula iinkcenkce ezineenombolo ngenxa yokuba begquka umkhondo wabo. 
Olu hlengahlengiso luzakunciphisa ubundlobongela kunye namatyala ezendlela enziwa ngabaqhubi beemoto nabavele bazisuse iipleyiti zeenombolo zemoto ukwenzela ukuba zibenokulandelelwa.
Olu lungiso luya kunciphisa amatyala nezenzo zolwaphulomthetho namatyala olwaphulomthetho awenziwa ngabaqhubi bezithuthi abasusa lula ipleyiti zeenombolo ukuze zingabinako ukulandelwa ngomkhondo. 
Esi silungiso siya kunciphisa ulwaphulo-mthetho nezenzo ezingekho mthethweni ngokusetyenziswa kwendlela ngabaqhubi beemoto abazikhupha lula iipleyiti ukuze ungabi nakulandelwa umkhondo wazo.
Olu hlengahlengiso luzakunciphisa ubundlobongela kunye namatyala ezendlela enziwa ngabaqhubi beemoto nabavele bazisuse iipleyiti zeenombolo zemoto ukwenzela ukuba zibenokulandelelwa.
Olu lungiso luya kunciphisa amatyala nezenzo zolwaphulomthetho namatyala olwaphulomthetho awenziwa ngabaqhubi bezithuthi abasusa lula ipleyiti zeenombolo ukuze zingabinako ukulandelwa ngomkhondo. 
Esi silungiso siya kunciphisa ulwaphulo-mthetho nezenzo ezingekho mthethweni ngokusetyenziswa kwendlela ngabaqhubi beemoto abazikhupha lula iipleyiti ukuze ungabi nakulandelwa umkhondo wazo.
Esi silungiso siza kunciphisa amathuba olwaphulo-mthetho namatyala ajongene nokuqhutywa kwezithuthi ezindleleni, bakuba sengxakini abaqhubi abanobuqhetseba bokuzisusa lula iinkcenkce ezineenombolo ngenxa yokuba begquka umkhondo wabo.

Esi silungiso siza kunciphisa amathuba olwaphulo-mthetho namatyala ajongene nokuqhutywa kwezithuthi ezindleleni, bakuba sengxakini abaqhubi abanobuqhetseba bokuzisusa lula iinkcenkce ezineenombolo ngenxa yokuba begquka umkhondo wabo. 
Olu hlengahlengiso luzakunciphisa ubundlobongela kunye namatyala ezendlela enziwa ngabaqhubi beemoto nabavele bazisuse iipleyiti zeenombolo zemoto ukwenzela ukuba zibenokulandelelwa.
Olu lungiso luya kunciphisa amatyala nezenzo zolwaphulomthetho namatyala olwaphulomthetho awenziwa ngabaqhubi bezithuthi abasusa lula ipleyiti zeenombolo ukuze zingabinako ukulandelwa ngomkhondo. 
Akuzokuba lula ukuyikhupha le nkcenkce ineenombolo, ize iphinde ibuyiselwe emva kwesenzo solwaphulo-mthetho, isizathu sesokuba lo msebenzi uza kusoloko ufuna ezinye iindleko.  
Akuzikuba lula ukususa ipleyiti yenombolo yemoto ize ibuyiselwe kwakhona emva kokucinywa kwetyala nanjengoko oko kuzakongeza kwiindleko.
Akunako ukubalula ukususa ipleyiti yeenombolo nokuyibuyisela emva kokwenza ulwaphulomthetho njengoko iya kudala iindleko ezongezelelweyo. 
Akusayi kuba lula ukukhupha ipleyiti yeenombolo ize ibuyiselwe emva kokwenziwa kolwaphulo-mthetho njengoko oko kuya kusoloko kuzongeza iindleko.
Akuzikuba lula ukususa ipleyiti yenombolo yemoto ize ibuyiselwe kwakhona emva kokucinywa kwetyala nanjengoko oko kuzakongeza kwiindleko.
Akunako ukubalula ukususa ipleyiti yeenombolo nokuyibuyisela emva kokwenza ulwaphulomthetho njengoko iya kudala iindleko ezongezelelweyo. 
Akusayi kuba lula ukukhupha ipleyiti yeenombolo ize ibuyiselwe emva kokwenziwa kolwaphulo-mthetho njengoko oko kuya kusoloko kuzongeza iindleko.
Akuzokuba lula ukuyikhupha le nkcenkce ineenombolo, ize iphinde ibuyiselwe emva kwesenzo solwaphulo-mthetho, isizathu sesokuba lo msebenzi uza kusoloko ufuna ezinye iindleko.

Akusayi kuba lula ukukhupha ipleyiti yeenombolo ize ibuyiselwe emva kokwenziwa kolwaphulo-mthetho njengoko oko kuya kusoloko kuzongeza iindleko.
Akuzokuba lula ukuyikhupha le nkcenkce ineenombolo, ize iphinde ibuyiselwe emva kwesenzo solwaphulo-mthetho, isizathu sesokuba lo msebenzi uza kusoloko ufuna ezinye iindleko.  
Akuzikuba lula ukususa ipleyiti yenombolo yemoto ize ibuyiselwe kwakhona emva kokucinywa kwetyala nanjengoko oko kuzakongeza kwiindleko.
Akusayi kuba lula ukukhupha ipleyiti yeenombolo ize ibuyiselwe emva kokwenziwa kolwaphulo-mthetho njengoko oko kuya kusoloko kuzongeza iindleko.
Akuzokuba lula ukuyikhupha le nkcenkce ineenombolo, ize iphinde ibuyiselwe emva kwesenzo solwaphulo-mthetho, isizathu sesokuba lo msebenzi uza kusoloko ufuna ezinye iindleko.  
Akuzikuba lula ukususa ipleyiti yenombolo yemoto ize ibuyiselwe kwakhona emva kokucinywa kwetyala nanjengoko oko kuzakongeza kwiindleko.
Akunako ukubalula ukususa ipleyiti yeenombolo nokuyibuyisela emva kokwenza ulwaphulomthetho njengoko iya kudala iindleko ezongezelelweyo. 
Le nkcenkce ineenombolo yenziwe nge-aluminiyam eyenza kube nzima ukuba mayitshe inkcenkce ide ingabi nakwaziwa kuloo ndawo yengozi.
Ipleyiti yeenombolo yemoto izakwenziwa ngesinyithi esizakwenza kubenzima ukuba sitshe ngokupheleleyo xa kuthe kwakho ingozi.
Ipleyiti yeenombolo yenziwe ngealuminiyam ekuya kuba nzima ukuyitshisa ngaphaya kokuqondwa kwindawo yengozi.
Ipleyiti yeenombolo yenziwa ngealuminium eya kwenza kube nzima ukuyitshisa kangangokuba ide ingabonakali ngethuba lengozi.
Ipleyiti yeenombolo yemoto izakwenziwa ngesinyithi esizakwenza kubenzima ukuba sitshe ngokupheleleyo xa kuthe kwakho ingozi.
Ipleyiti yeenombolo yenziwe ngealuminiyam ekuya kuba nzima ukuyitshisa ngaphaya kokuqondwa kwindawo yengozi.
