Le nkcenkce ineenombolo yenziwe nge-aluminiyam eyenza kube nzima ukuba mayitshe inkcenkce ide ingabi nakwaziwa kuloo ndawo yengozi.
Ipleyiti yeenombolo yemoto izakwenziwa ngesinyithi esizakwenza kubenzima ukuba sitshe ngokupheleleyo xa kuthe kwakho ingozi.
Ipleyiti yeenombolo yenziwa ngealuminium eya kwenza kube nzima ukuyitshisa kangangokuba ide ingabonakali ngethuba lengozi.
Le nkcenkce ineenombolo yenziwe nge-aluminiyam eyenza kube nzima ukuba mayitshe inkcenkce ide ingabi nakwaziwa kuloo ndawo yengozi.
Ipleyiti yeenombolo yemoto izakwenziwa ngesinyithi esizakwenza kubenzima ukuba sitshe ngokupheleleyo xa kuthe kwakho ingozi.
Ipleyiti yeenombolo yenziwe ngealuminiyam ekuya kuba nzima ukuyitshisa ngaphaya kokuqondwa kwindawo yengozi.
Ukususela ngomhla woku-1 ngoFebhuwari 2011, abantu abafumene amakhadi ayimvume yokuqhuba ngokhowudi C, C1, EC  okanye EC1 wokuqhuba izithuthi, abasayi kuvunyelwa ukuba baqhube isithuthi esifuna umntu abe nokhowudi B okanye ikhowudi EB, (ngentetho yakudala umntu onekhowudi 10, 11, 13 okanye 14 akanakusiqhuba isithuthi esifuna imvume yokuqhuba ngokhowudi 08).
Ukususela ngomhla woku-1 kuFebruwari ka-2011 abantu abafumana iilayisenisi zokuqhuba zekhowudi uC, C1, EC okanye uEC1 abasayi kuvumeleka ukuba baqhube iimoto ezifuna ubenelayisenisi kakhowudi B okanye ikhowudi EB (ngokwakudala, umntu onelayisenisi kakhowudi 10, 11, 13, 14 akanakuyiqhuba imoto efunisa ukuba ubenelayisenisi kakhowudi 08). 
Ukusuka ngomhla woku-1 kweyoMdumba 2011 abantu abafumana iilayisensi zokuqhuba zekhowudi ye-C, C1, EC okanye EC1 abanakuvunyelwa ukuqhuba imoto efuna ilayisensi yekhowudi engu-B okanye ikhowudi yelayisensi engu-EB (ngemimiselo emidala umntu onekhowudi engu-10, 11, 13 okanye  u-14 yelayisensi akanako ukuqhuba isithuthi esifuna ikhowudi yelayisensi engu-08).  
Ukususela ngomhla woku-1 Februwari 2011 abantu abafumana iilayisensi zokuqhuba malunga nelayisensi yokuqhuba yekhowudi iC, C1, EC okanye iEC1 abasayi kuvunyelwa ukuba baqhube imoto efuna ilayisensi yekhowudi iB okanye iEB ( ngokwendlela yakudala umntu onelayisensi yekhowudi i-10, 11, 13 okanye i-14 akanakuqhuba isithuthi esidinga ilayisensi yekhowudi i-08 ngayo)

Ukusuka ngomhla woku-1 kweyoMdumba 2011 abantu abafumana iilayisensi zokuqhuba zekhowudi ye-C, C1, EC okanye EC1 abanakuvunyelwa ukuqhuba imoto efuna ilayisensi yekhowudi engu-B okanye ikhowudi yelayisensi engu-EB (ngemimiselo emidala umntu onekhowudi engu-10, 11, 13 okanye  u-14 yelayisensi akanako ukuqhuba isithuthi esifuna ikhowudi yelayisensi engu-08).  
Oku kwakusebenza kwabatsha  abasandula ukufumana amakhadi ayimvume yokuqhuba.
Oku kuzakusebenza kwaba basandul’ ukufumana iilayisenisi.
Oku kuya kusebenza kuphela kubanini-layisensi abatsha. 
Oku kuya kusetyenziswa kubanini beelayisensi ezintsha.
Oku kuzakusebenza kwaba basandul’ ukufumana iilayisenisi.
Oku kuya kusebenza kuphela kubanini-layisensi abatsha. 
Oku kuya kusetyenziswa kubanini beelayisensi ezintsha.
Oku kwakusebenza kwabatsha  abasandula ukufumana amakhadi ayimvume yokuqhuba.
Oku kuya kusebenza kuphela kubanini-layisensi abatsha. 
Oku kuya kusetyenziswa kubanini beelayisensi ezintsha.
Oku kwakusebenza kwabatsha  abasandula ukufumana amakhadi ayimvume yokuqhuba.
Oku kuzakusebenza kwaba basandul’ ukufumana iilayisenisi.
Oku kuya kusetyenziswa kubanini beelayisensi ezintsha.
Oku kwakusebenza kwabatsha  abasandula ukufumana amakhadi ayimvume yokuqhuba.
Oku kuzakusebenza kwaba basandul’ ukufumana iilayisenisi.
Oku kuya kusebenza kuphela kubanini-layisensi abatsha. 
Abaninzi abafundela ukuzuza imvume yokuqhuba bafaka izicelo zemvume zezithuthi ezikhulu kunemvume yezithuthi ezincinane, babaleka uvavanyo nemiyalelo yokuzipaka  ngecala iimoto kwizithuba zokupaka, xa sisenza umzekelo. 
Inani elivisayo labasafundela ukufumana ilayisenisi yokuqhuba bafaka izicelo zeelayisenisi zokuqhuba izigadla ukwenzela ukuba umzekelo bakuphephe ukwenziwa uvavanyo lokupaka kwiindawo zeemoto ezincinci.
Inani elikhulu labaceli belayisensi yokufunda ukuqhuba bacela iilayisensi zokuqhuba izithuthi ezinzima ngokuphikisana neemoto ezilula ukuze baphephe iimvavanyo zokupakisha ngokuxwesa ukwenza umzekelo. 
Balinani elikhulu abaqhubi abangabafundi abafaka izicelo zeelayisensi zokuqhuba zezithuthi ezikhulu xa kuthelekiswa nabezithuthi ezincinane ukuze baphephe iimvavanyo zokupaka ngendlela enxusileyo njengomzekelo.
Inani elivisayo labasafundela ukufumana ilayisenisi yokuqhuba bafaka izicelo zeelayisenisi zokuqhuba izigadla ukwenzela ukuba umzekelo bakuphephe ukwenziwa uvavanyo lokupaka kwiindawo zeemoto ezincinci.
Inani elikhulu labaceli belayisensi yokufunda ukuqhuba bacela iilayisensi zokuqhuba izithuthi ezinzima ngokuphikisana neemoto ezilula ukuze baphephe iimvavanyo zokupakisha ngokuxwesa ukwenza umzekelo. 
Balinani elikhulu abaqhubi abangabafundi abafaka izicelo zeelayisensi zokuqhuba zezithuthi ezikhulu xa kuthelekiswa nabezithuthi ezincinane ukuze baphephe iimvavanyo zokupaka ngendlela enxusileyo njengomzekelo.

Balinani elikhulu abaqhubi abangabafundi abafaka izicelo zeelayisensi zokuqhuba zezithuthi ezikhulu xa kuthelekiswa nabezithuthi ezincinane ukuze baphephe iimvavanyo zokupaka ngendlela enxusileyo njengomzekelo.

Inani elivisayo labasafundela ukufumana ilayisenisi yokuqhuba bafaka izicelo zeelayisenisi zokuqhuba izigadla ukwenzela ukuba umzekelo bakuphephe ukwenziwa uvavanyo lokupaka kwiindawo zeemoto ezincinci.
Balinani elikhulu abaqhubi abangabafundi abafaka izicelo zeelayisensi zokuqhuba zezithuthi ezikhulu xa kuthelekiswa nabezithuthi ezincinane ukuze baphephe iimvavanyo zokupaka ngendlela enxusileyo njengomzekelo.
Abaninzi abafundela ukuzuza imvume yokuqhuba bafaka izicelo zemvume zezithuthi ezikhulu kunemvume yezithuthi ezincinane, babaleka uvavanyo nemiyalelo yokuzipaka  ngecala iimoto kwizithuba zokupaka, xa sisenza umzekelo. 
Inani elivisayo labasafundela ukufumana ilayisenisi yokuqhuba bafaka izicelo zeelayisenisi zokuqhuba izigadla ukwenzela ukuba umzekelo bakuphephe ukwenziwa uvavanyo lokupaka kwiindawo zeemoto ezincinci.
Inani elikhulu labaceli belayisensi yokufunda ukuqhuba bacela iilayisensi zokuqhuba izithuthi ezinzima ngokuphikisana neemoto ezilula ukuze baphephe iimvavanyo zokupakisha ngokuxwesa ukwenza umzekelo. 
Inyaniso yeyokuba xa sebewafumene amakhadi okuqhuba izithuthi ezikhulu, baqhuba iimoto ezincinane bengaziqhelisanga ulawulo lwazo, ngoku bagqibela ngokubandakanyeka ezingozini. 
Inyaniso yeyokuba bazifumene iilayisenisi zabo zokuqhuba izigadla, kodwa baqhuba iimoto ezincinci abangenalayisenisi zazo nabangazaziyo ukuba zilawulwa njani na baze baphele bedala iingozi.
Inyaniso yeyokuba bakuba befumene iilayisensi zezithuthi ezinzima, baqhuba izithuthi ezilula ezo bangaqhelanga izinto zokuzilawula yaye bagqibele bebandakanyeka ezingozini.
Inyaniso yeyokuba bakuba befumene iilayisensi zezithuthi ezikhulu, baqhuba izithuthi ezincinane abangayiqhelanga imigaqo yolawulo lwazo baze bagqibele ngokubandakanyeka ezingozini.
Inyaniso yeyokuba bazifumene iilayisenisi zabo zokuqhuba izigadla, kodwa baqhuba iimoto ezincinci abangenalayisenisi zazo nabangazaziyo ukuba zilawulwa njani na baze baphele bedala iingozi.
Inyaniso yeyokuba bakuba befumene iilayisensi zezithuthi ezinzima, baqhuba izithuthi ezilula ezo bangaqhelanga izinto zokuzilawula yaye bagqibele bebandakanyeka ezingozini.
Inyaniso yeyokuba bakuba befumene iilayisensi zezithuthi ezikhulu, baqhuba izithuthi ezincinane abangayiqhelanga imigaqo yolawulo lwazo baze bagqibele ngokubandakanyeka ezingozini.

Inyaniso yeyokuba bazifumene iilayisenisi zabo zokuqhuba izigadla, kodwa baqhuba iimoto ezincinci abangenalayisenisi zazo nabangazaziyo ukuba zilawulwa njani na baze baphele bedala iingozi.
Inyaniso yeyokuba bakuba befumene iilayisensi zezithuthi ezikhulu, baqhuba izithuthi ezincinane abangayiqhelanga imigaqo yolawulo lwazo baze bagqibele ngokubandakanyeka ezingozini.
Inyaniso yeyokuba xa sebewafumene amakhadi okuqhuba izithuthi ezikhulu, baqhuba iimoto ezincinane bengaziqhelisanga ulawulo lwazo, ngoku bagqibela ngokubandakanyeka ezingozini. 
Inyaniso yeyokuba bazifumene iilayisenisi zabo zokuqhuba izigadla, kodwa baqhuba iimoto ezincinci abangenalayisenisi zazo nabangazaziyo ukuba zilawulwa njani na baze baphele bedala iingozi.
Inyaniso yeyokuba bakuba befumene iilayisensi zezithuthi ezinzima, baqhuba izithuthi ezilula ezo bangaqhelanga izinto zokuzilawula yaye bagqibele bebandakanyeka ezingozini.
Kananjalo kulindeleke ukuba bonke abanamakhadi okuqhuba izithuthi ezinzima nezikhulu mababe neMvume yobuNgcaphephe bokuQhuba, kodwa  ingqokelela yamanani iveza okwahlukileyo.
Kwakhona kukwalindeleke ukuba abaqhubi abafumene iilayisenisi zokuqhuba iingadla kufuneka bafumane le nto kuthiwa ziiMvume zoKuqhuba ngokuSesikweni kodwa iinkcukacha-manani zibonisa into eyahlukileyo kuleyo.
Kananjalo kulindelwa ukuba bonke abo baqhubi abafumene iilayisensi zokuqhuba zezithuthi ezikhulu bafumane iiMvume zokuQhuba zobuNgcali, kodwa iinkcukacha-manani zibonisa into ehlukileyo. 
Kwakhona kulindeleke ukuba bonke abo baqhubi bafumene iilayisensi zokuqhuba izithuthi ezikhulu babe neeMvume zokuQhuba ngobuNgcali kodwa, ingqokelelo-manani ibonisa okwahlukileyo.
Kwakhona kukwalindeleke ukuba abaqhubi abafumene iilayisenisi zokuqhuba iingadla kufuneka bafumane le nto kuthiwa ziiMvume zoKuqhuba ngokuSesikweni kodwa iinkcukacha-manani zibonisa into eyahlukileyo kuleyo.

Kananjalo kulindelwa ukuba bonke abo baqhubi abafumene iilayisensi zokuqhuba zezithuthi ezikhulu bafumane iiMvume zokuQhuba zobuNgcali, kodwa iinkcukacha-manani zibonisa into ehlukileyo. 
Oku kudandalazisa ukuba abo bafaki bezicelo kwakufuneka benemvume yokuqhuba izithuthi ezincinane, ingengawo amakhadi okuqhuba izithuthi ezinzima nezikhulu.
Oku kubonisa ukuba abafaki-zicelo bebefuna iilayisenisi zokuqhuba iimoto ezincinci kungekona ezezigadla.
Oku kungqina inyaniso yokuba abenzi bezicelo bafuna ilayisensi yokuqhuba isithuthi esilula hayi izithuthi ezinzima.
Oku bubungqina bokuba abafaki-zicelo bebedinga iilayisensi zokuqhuba zezithuthi zemoto ezincinane ingezizo ezezithuthi zemoto ezikhulu.
Oku kubonisa ukuba abafaki-zicelo bebefuna iilayisenisi zokuqhuba iimoto ezincinci kungekona ezezigadla.
Oku kungqina inyaniso yokuba abenzi bezicelo bafuna ilayisensi yokuqhuba isithuthi esilula hayi izithuthi ezinzima.

Oku kungqina inyaniso yokuba abenzi bezicelo bafuna ilayisensi yokuqhuba isithuthi esilula hayi izithuthi ezinzima.
IziXhobo zokuLawula uZinzo ekuQhubeni iibhasi ezincinci, nokuqhuba eziphakathi ngokobukhulu, kuyafundiswa ngezi ziXhobo kwinkqubo ekhupha izatifikethi, nto leyo iyinxalenye yovavanyo lokulungela ukuzilawula ezindleleni.
Izixhobo soLawulo loZinziso loKhokelo zeeteksi nezeebhasi ziziswa ngokusebenzisa inkqubo yokukhutshwa ngezatifikethi neziyinxalenye yovavanyo lokulungela ukuba sendleleni.
IziXhobo zoLawulo lweCala lokuZinza ukwenzela iibhasi ezincinci neziphakathi zifakwe entsebenzweni ngenkqubo yesiqiniselo esiyinxenye yovavanyo lokulungela indlela.  
Izixhobo zoLawulo loziNziso lweNtsingiselo zeebhasi ezincinane neziphakathi zifundiswa ngenkqubo yokufumana izatifikethi njengenxenye. yovavanyo lokulungela ukuba sendleleni.
Izixhobo soLawulo loZinziso loKhokelo zeeteksi nezeebhasi ziziswa ngokusebenzisa inkqubo yokukhutshwa ngezatifikethi neziyinxalenye yovavanyo lokulungela ukuba sendleleni.
IziXhobo zoLawulo lweCala lokuZinza ukwenzela iibhasi ezincinci neziphakathi zifakwe entsebenzweni ngenkqubo yesiqiniselo esiyinxenye yovavanyo lokulungela indlela.

IziXhobo zoLawulo lweCala lokuZinza ukwenzela iibhasi ezincinci neziphakathi zifakwe entsebenzweni ngenkqubo yesiqiniselo esiyinxenye yovavanyo lokulungela indlela.  
Luyasetyenziswa kwezi bhasi zincinci, nezingaphezulu kunezo; azisetyenziselwa ukuqhuba izithuthi eziyimveliso entsha kuphela.    
Oku kusebenza kwiiteksi nakwiibhasi kungekona nje kwizithutho ezisandul’ ukuveliswa.
Sisebenza kuzo zonke iibhasi ezincinci neziphakathi yaye ingezizo kuphela izithuthi ezitsha ezisandula kwenziwa. 
Oku kusebenza nakwiibhasi ezincinane neziphakathi ingekuko kwizithuthi ezisandul’ ukwenziwa kuphela.
Oku kusebenza kwiiteksi nakwiibhasi kungekona nje kwizithutho ezisandul’ ukuveliswa.

Umnini wesithuthi obhalisiweyo okanye osayina endaweni yalowo kufuneka angenise uxwebhu i-DSCD ekubhalwe kulo zonke iinkcukacha kumzi wovavanyo lwezithuthi nabaqhubi.
Umnini-sithuthi okanye lowo unikwe igunya lokuqhuba eso sithuthi kufuneka afake kwisitishi sokuvavanya ifomu ye-DSCD egcwalisiweyo.
Umnini wesithuthi esibhalisiweyo okanye ummeli kufuneka anikele ngefomu ezaliswe ngokukuko ye-DSCD kwisikhululo sovavanyo. 
Umnini-sithuthi esiyimoto obhalisiweyo okanye omele yena makangenise ifomu ezalisiweyo yeDSCD efunekayo esikhululweni seemvavanyo.
Umnini-sithuthi okanye lowo unikwe igunya lokuqhuba eso sithuthi kufuneka afake kwisitishi sokuvavanya ifomu ye-DSCD egcwalisiweyo.
Umnini wesithuthi esibhalisiweyo okanye ummeli kufuneka anikele ngefomu ezaliswe ngokukuko ye-DSCD kwisikhululo sovavanyo. 
Umnini-sithuthi esiyimoto obhalisiweyo okanye omele yena makangenise ifomu ezalisiweyo yeDSCD efunekayo esikhululweni seemvavanyo.
Umnini wesithuthi obhalisiweyo okanye osayina endaweni yalowo kufuneka angenise uxwebhu i-DSCD ekubhalwe kulo zonke iinkcukacha kumzi wovavanyo lwezithuthi nabaqhubi.
Umnini wesithuthi esibhalisiweyo okanye ummeli kufuneka anikele ngefomu ezaliswe ngokukuko ye-DSCD kwisikhululo sovavanyo. 
Umnini-sithuthi esiyimoto obhalisiweyo okanye omele yena makangenise ifomu ezalisiweyo yeDSCD efunekayo esikhululweni seemvavanyo.
Umnini wesithuthi obhalisiweyo okanye osayina endaweni yalowo kufuneka angenise uxwebhu i-DSCD ekubhalwe kulo zonke iinkcukacha kumzi wovavanyo lwezithuthi nabaqhubi.
Umnini-sithuthi okanye lowo unikwe igunya lokuqhuba eso sithuthi kufuneka afake kwisitishi sokuvavanya ifomu ye-DSCD egcwalisiweyo.
Umnini-sithuthi esiyimoto obhalisiweyo okanye omele yena makangenise ifomu ezalisiweyo yeDSCD efunekayo esikhululweni seemvavanyo.
Umnini wesithuthi obhalisiweyo okanye osayina endaweni yalowo kufuneka angenise uxwebhu i-DSCD ekubhalwe kulo zonke iinkcukacha kumzi wovavanyo lwezithuthi nabaqhubi.
Umnini-sithuthi okanye lowo unikwe igunya lokuqhuba eso sithuthi kufuneka afake kwisitishi sokuvavanya ifomu ye-DSCD egcwalisiweyo.
Umnini wesithuthi esibhalisiweyo okanye ummeli kufuneka anikele ngefomu ezaliswe ngokukuko ye-DSCD kwisikhululo sovavanyo. 
IsiXhobo sokuLawula uZinzo ekuQhubeni seso sinqanda ukuba ithayari malingasuki kwintsimbi yalo xa ligqabhuka ngeli xesha sihambayo isithuthi.
Isixhobo esiLawula uKuzinza kweCla sisixhobo esikhusela ivili lingaphumi kwirim xa ligqabhuka ngeli lixa imoto ihambayo.
Isixhobo soLawulo lweCala lokuZinza sisixhobo esithintela ithayara ukuphuma kwirim xa ithayara ligqabhuka xeshikweni isithuthi sihamba.
Isixhobo soLawulo loziNziso lweNtsingiselo sisixhobo esithintela ithayara ekuphumeni kumphetho xa ithayara ligqabhuka sihamba isithuthi.

Isixhobo esiLawula uKuzinza kweCla sisixhobo esikhusela ivili lingaphumi kwirim xa ligqabhuka ngeli lixa imoto ihambayo.
Isixhobo soLawulo lweCala lokuZinza sisixhobo esithintela ithayara ukuphuma kwirim xa ithayara ligqabhuka xeshikweni isithuthi sihamba.
Isilungiso soMqathango 332 sashicilelwa kwaye sidwelisa iindlela enengcaciso yokuvavanya umoya ophefumlwayo onokusetyenziselwa ukuqokelela iisampulu ezicacileyo zomoya ophefumlweyo, kwaye isatifikethi esikhutshwayo yinkampani yeemveliso okanye exhobisayo singasetyenziswa njengobungqina ematyaleni ngenxa yemveliso leyo. 
Njengoko uhlengahlengiso loMthetho 332 lwapapashwa ludandalazisa iindlela zokuhlola ukwaphulwa kwemithetho okubonakalayo nezizakusetyenziselwa ukuqokelela ubungqina bokwaphulwa wemithetho kwaye nesatifikethi esikhutshiweyo ngumvelisi okanye umniki-nkonzo sisenokusetyenziswa njengobungqina kwiimeko, ngokuveliswa nje kukodwa.
Isilungiso kuMmiselo 332 sapapashwa yaye safakwa kuluhlu lobungqina bezivavanyi zomphefumlo ezinokusetyenziswa ukuqokelela ubungqina nesiqiniselo esikhutshwa ngumenzi okanye umboneleli yaye singasetyenziswa njengobungqina ematyaleni,  ngokuyivelisa nje. 
Isilungiso soMthetho wama-332 sapapashwa kwaye sidwelisa izixhobo zovavanyo lobungqina bomphefumlo ezinokusetyenziselwa ukuqokelela iisampulu zobungqina bomphefumlo ukuze isatifiketi esikhutshwe ngumenzi okanye ngumthengisi sisetyenziswe njengobungqina kwiziganeko ezithile, bokuba kwenziwe loo mveliso. 
Njengoko uhlengahlengiso loMthetho 332 lwapapashwa ludandalazisa iindlela zokuhlola ukwaphulwa kwemithetho okubonakalayo nezizakusetyenziselwa ukuqokelela ubungqina bokwaphulwa wemithetho kwaye nesatifikethi esikhutshiweyo ngumvelisi okanye umniki-nkonzo sisenokusetyenziswa njengobungqina kwiimeko, ngokuveliswa nje kukodwa.
Isilungiso kuMmiselo 332 sapapashwa yaye safakwa kuluhlu lobungqina bezivavanyi zomphefumlo ezinokusetyenziswa ukuqokelela ubungqina nesiqiniselo esikhutshwa ngumenzi okanye umboneleli yaye singasetyenziswa njengobungqina ematyaleni,  ngokuyivelisa nje. 
Isilungiso soMthetho wama-332 sapapashwa kwaye sidwelisa izixhobo zovavanyo lobungqina bomphefumlo ezinokusetyenziselwa ukuqokelela iisampulu zobungqina bomphefumlo ukuze isatifiketi esikhutshwe ngumenzi okanye ngumthengisi sisetyenziswe njengobungqina kwiziganeko ezithile, bokuba kwenziwe loo mveliso. 
Isilungiso soMqathango 332 sashicilelwa kwaye sidwelisa iindlela enengcaciso yokuvavanya umoya ophefumlwayo onokusetyenziselwa ukuqokelela iisampulu ezicacileyo zomoya ophefumlweyo, kwaye isatifikethi esikhutshwayo yinkampani yeemveliso okanye exhobisayo singasetyenziswa njengobungqina ematyaleni ngenxa yemveliso leyo. 
Isilungiso kuMmiselo 332 sapapashwa yaye safakwa kuluhlu lobungqina bezivavanyi zomphefumlo ezinokusetyenziswa ukuqokelela ubungqina nesiqiniselo esikhutshwa ngumenzi okanye umboneleli yaye singasetyenziswa njengobungqina ematyaleni,  ngokuyivelisa nje. 
Isilungiso soMthetho wama-332 sapapashwa kwaye sidwelisa izixhobo zovavanyo lobungqina bomphefumlo ezinokusetyenziselwa ukuqokelela iisampulu zobungqina bomphefumlo ukuze isatifiketi esikhutshwe ngumenzi okanye ngumthengisi sisetyenziswe njengobungqina kwiziganeko ezithile, bokuba kwenziwe loo mveliso. 
Isilungiso soMqathango 332 sashicilelwa kwaye sidwelisa iindlela enengcaciso yokuvavanya umoya ophefumlwayo onokusetyenziselwa ukuqokelela iisampulu ezicacileyo zomoya ophefumlweyo, kwaye isatifikethi esikhutshwayo yinkampani yeemveliso okanye exhobisayo singasetyenziswa njengobungqina ematyaleni ngenxa yemveliso leyo. 
Njengoko uhlengahlengiso loMthetho 332 lwapapashwa ludandalazisa iindlela zokuhlola ukwaphulwa kwemithetho okubonakalayo nezizakusetyenziselwa ukuqokelela ubungqina bokwaphulwa wemithetho kwaye nesatifikethi esikhutshiweyo ngumvelisi okanye umniki-nkonzo sisenokusetyenziswa njengobungqina kwiimeko, ngokuveliswa nje kukodwa.
Isilungiso soMthetho wama-332 sapapashwa kwaye sidwelisa izixhobo zovavanyo lobungqina bomphefumlo ezinokusetyenziselwa ukuqokelela iisampulu zobungqina bomphefumlo ukuze isatifiketi esikhutshwe ngumenzi okanye ngumthengisi sisetyenziswe njengobungqina kwiziganeko ezithile, bokuba kwenziwe loo mveliso. 
Isilungiso soMqathango 332 sashicilelwa kwaye sidwelisa iindlela enengcaciso yokuvavanya umoya ophefumlwayo onokusetyenziselwa ukuqokelela iisampulu ezicacileyo zomoya ophefumlweyo, kwaye isatifikethi esikhutshwayo yinkampani yeemveliso okanye exhobisayo singasetyenziswa njengobungqina ematyaleni ngenxa yemveliso leyo. 
Njengoko uhlengahlengiso loMthetho 332 lwapapashwa ludandalazisa iindlela zokuhlola ukwaphulwa kwemithetho okubonakalayo nezizakusetyenziselwa ukuqokelela ubungqina bokwaphulwa wemithetho kwaye nesatifikethi esikhutshiweyo ngumvelisi okanye umniki-nkonzo sisenokusetyenziswa njengobungqina kwiimeko, ngokuveliswa nje kukodwa.
Isilungiso kuMmiselo 332 sapapashwa yaye safakwa kuluhlu lobungqina bezivavanyi zomphefumlo ezinokusetyenziswa ukuqokelela ubungqina nesiqiniselo esikhutshwa ngumenzi okanye umboneleli yaye singasetyenziswa njengobungqina ematyaleni,  ngokuyivelisa nje. 
Esi silungiso sijolise ekuhlangabezeni umbandela owaphakanyiswayo malunga  nokuba semthethweni kwezixhobo zokuthelekelela ubungakanani botywala egazini ngokubhekiselele kwicandelo 65(7) loMthetho kaZwelonke wango-1996 ojongene neziThuthi eziNdleleni, othobelaiSABS 1793, kwaye ungasetyenziselwa ukuqinisekisa ngobuninzi botywala kumoya ophefumlwayo.
Olu hlengahlengiso lufuna ukuhlangabezana nomba owathi waphakanyiselwa ukujongana nokuba semthethweni kokusetyenziswa kwezivuthelisi ngokuphathelele kwicandelo 65(7) loMthetho weSizwe ngokuSetyenziswa kweeNdlela, ka-1996 kwaye iyahambisana neSABS 1793 kwaye lusenokusetyenziselwa ukuba ingaba utywala buyafumaneka kusini na xa ubani ephefumla.
Esi silungiso sifuna ukujongana nomba ophakanyiswe ngokunxulumene nokubasemthethweni kwesivavanyo somphefumlo ngokwemimiselo yecandelo 65(7) yoMthetho weSizwe weSiphithiphithi eNdleleni, owe-1996 yaye uthobela i-SABS 1793 yaye ingasetyenziswa ukuqinisekisa ubunzulu bealkoholi emphefumlweni. 
Esi silungiso sinenjongo yokulungisa umba obuphakanyisiwe ngokuba semthethweni wezihlalutyi zomphefumlo ngokwecandelo lama-65(7) loMthetho weSizwe ngokuSetyenziswa kweeNdlela, wango-1996 kwaye uthobela iSABS 1793 ngokunjalo unokusetyenziselwa ukuqinisekisa ubungakanani botywala emphefumlweni.
Olu hlengahlengiso lufuna ukuhlangabezana nomba owathi waphakanyiselwa ukujongana nokuba semthethweni kokusetyenziswa kwezivuthelisi ngokuphathelele kwicandelo 65(7) loMthetho weSizwe ngokuSetyenziswa kweeNdlela, ka-1996 kwaye iyahambisana neSABS 1793 kwaye lusenokusetyenziselwa ukuba ingaba utywala buyafumaneka kusini na xa ubani ephefumla.

Ezilandelayo zizixhobo ezimiselweyo:
Okulandelayo zizixhobo ezimiselweyo:
Ezi zilandelayo zizixhobo ezisekiweyo:
Ezilandelayo zizixhobo ezimiselweyo:
Okulandelayo zizixhobo ezimiselweyo:
Ezi zilandelayo zizixhobo ezimiselweyo:
Ezilandelayo zizixhobo ezimiselweyo:
Okulandelayo zizixhobo ezimiselweyo:
Ezi zilandelayo zizixhobo ezimiselweyo:
Ezi zilandelayo zizixhobo ezisekiweyo:
Okulandelayo zizixhobo ezimiselweyo:
Ezi zilandelayo zizixhobo ezimiselweyo:
Ezi zilandelayo zizixhobo ezisekiweyo:
Ezilandelayo zizixhobo ezimiselweyo:
“Oku kuyafuneka ngeli xesha leminyhadala enyakeni njengoko kuhlupheza imizamo yethu yokulwa nomkhwa wokuqhuba kwabantu ezindleleni zethu besele iindywala”, utsho uMphathiswa weeNdlela nezoThutho onguPinky Kekana. 
“Oku kubaluleke nangakumbi ngeli xesha leziyunguma zokuphela konyaka nanjengoko kuzakuncedisa kwiinzame zethu zokulwa nabaqhubi abaphantsi kweempembelelo zotywala kwiindlela zethu”, utshilo uMphathiswa wezeeNdlela nezoThutho, uPinky Kekana.
"Oku kufaneleke nangakumbi ngeli xesha lokuphumla njengoko lixhasa imizamo yethu yokulwa nokuqhutywa kunxiliwe ezindleleni zethu", kutsho i-MEC yeeNdlela noThutho yaseMpumalanga u-Pinky Kekana.
“Oku kufuneka ngakumbi ngethuba lemibhiyozo njengoko kunika uncedo olongezelelekileyo kumalinge ethu okulwa ukuqhuba phantsi kweempembelelo zotywala kwiindlela zethu” utsho uMphathiswa weeNdlela noThutho uPinky Kekana.
“Oku kubaluleke nangakumbi ngeli xesha leziyunguma zokuphela konyaka nanjengoko kuzakuncedisa kwiinzame zethu zokulwa nabaqhubi abaphantsi kweempembelelo zotywala kwiindlela zethu”, utshilo uMphathiswa wezeeNdlela nezoThutho, uPinky Kekana.
"Oku kufaneleke nangakumbi ngeli xesha lokuphumla njengoko lixhasa imizamo yethu yokulwa nokuqhutywa kunxiliwe ezindleleni zethu", kutsho i-MEC yeeNdlela noThutho yaseMpumalanga u-Pinky Kekana.
“Oku kufuneka ngakumbi ngethuba lemibhiyozo njengoko kunika uncedo olongezelelekileyo kumalinge ethu okulwa ukuqhuba phantsi kweempembelelo zotywala kwiindlela zethu” utsho uMphathiswa weeNdlela noThutho uPinky Kekana.
“Oku kuyafuneka ngeli xesha leminyhadala enyakeni njengoko kuhlupheza imizamo yethu yokulwa nomkhwa wokuqhuba kwabantu ezindleleni zethu besele iindywala”, utsho uMphathiswa weeNdlela nezoThutho onguPinky Kekana. 
"Oku kufaneleke nangakumbi ngeli xesha lokuphumla njengoko lixhasa imizamo yethu yokulwa nokuqhutywa kunxiliwe ezindleleni zethu", kutsho i-MEC yeeNdlela noThutho yaseMpumalanga u-Pinky Kekana.
“Oku kufuneka ngakumbi ngethuba lemibhiyozo njengoko kunika uncedo olongezelelekileyo kumalinge ethu okulwa ukuqhuba phantsi kweempembelelo zotywala kwiindlela zethu” utsho uMphathiswa weeNdlela noThutho uPinky Kekana.
“Oku kuyafuneka ngeli xesha leminyhadala enyakeni njengoko kuhlupheza imizamo yethu yokulwa nomkhwa wokuqhuba kwabantu ezindleleni zethu besele iindywala”, utsho uMphathiswa weeNdlela nezoThutho onguPinky Kekana. 
“Oku kubaluleke nangakumbi ngeli xesha leziyunguma zokuphela konyaka nanjengoko kuzakuncedisa kwiinzame zethu zokulwa nabaqhubi abaphantsi kweempembelelo zotywala kwiindlela zethu”, utshilo uMphathiswa wezeeNdlela nezoThutho, uPinky Kekana.
“Oku kufuneka ngakumbi ngethuba lemibhiyozo njengoko kunika uncedo olongezelelekileyo kumalinge ethu okulwa ukuqhuba phantsi kweempembelelo zotywala kwiindlela zethu” utsho uMphathiswa weeNdlela noThutho uPinky Kekana.
“Oku kuyafuneka ngeli xesha leminyhadala enyakeni njengoko kuhlupheza imizamo yethu yokulwa nomkhwa wokuqhuba kwabantu ezindleleni zethu besele iindywala”, utsho uMphathiswa weeNdlela nezoThutho onguPinky Kekana. 
“Oku kubaluleke nangakumbi ngeli xesha leziyunguma zokuphela konyaka nanjengoko kuzakuncedisa kwiinzame zethu zokulwa nabaqhubi abaphantsi kweempembelelo zotywala kwiindlela zethu”, utshilo uMphathiswa wezeeNdlela nezoThutho, uPinky Kekana.
"Oku kufaneleke nangakumbi ngeli xesha lokuphumla njengoko lixhasa imizamo yethu yokulwa nokuqhutywa kunxiliwe ezindleleni zethu", kutsho i-MEC yeeNdlela noThutho yaseMpumalanga u-Pinky Kekana.

IiNkozo zeMpilo zaPhambi kokuzala usana
IiNkonzo zeMpilo zaBakhulelweyo (zangaPhambi kokuBeleka)
IiNkonzo zeMpilo zaPhambi kokuBeleka
IiNkonzo zeMpilo zaPhambi kokuBeleka
IiNkonzo zeMpilo zaBakhulelweyo (zangaPhambi kokuBeleka)
IiNkonzo zeMpilo zaPhambi kokuBeleka
IiNkonzo zeMpilo zaPhambi kokuBeleka
IiNkozo zeMpilo zaPhambi kokuzala usana
IiNkonzo zeMpilo zaPhambi kokuBeleka
IiNkonzo zeMpilo zaPhambi kokuBeleka
IiNkozo zeMpilo zaPhambi kokuzala usana
IiNkonzo zeMpilo zaBakhulelweyo (zangaPhambi kokuBeleka)
IiNkonzo zeMpilo zaPhambi kokuBeleka
IiNkozo zeMpilo zaPhambi kokuzala usana
IiNkonzo zeMpilo zaBakhulelweyo (zangaPhambi kokuBeleka)
IiNkonzo zeMpilo zaPhambi kokuBeleka
Iintombi nabafazi zithunyelwa kwiinkonzo zokubelekisa okanye kumaCandelo eNzululwazi ngokuBelekisa (ama-MOU) kwimimandla yeedolophu, kwiikliniki ezakhiweyo okanye kwezixhomekeke kwezo  emaphandleni. 
Amantombazana namabhinqa akhulelweyo athunyelwa kwiiYunithi ezinikezela ngeenkonzo zabakhulelweyo okanye ezaBabelekisi (ii-MOUs) ezikwiindawo ezisezidolophini, kwiikliniki zethutyana nezizezesigxina kwiindawo ezisemaphandleni.
Amantombazana namakhosikazi akhulelweyo athunyelwa kwiinkonzo zabakhulelweyo okanye iiYunithi zaBongikazi zokuBeleka (MOUs) kwimimandla yasezidolophini, nakwiiklinikhi ezijikelezayo okanye ezisisigxina kwimimandla esemaphandleni. 
Iintombi noomama abakhulelweyo bathunyelwa kwiinkonzo zokubelekisa okanye kumaCandelo aBongi abaBelekisayo (iiMOU) kwiindawo ezisezidolophini, nakoonojikeleza beeklinikhi okanye ezisisigxina kwiindawo ezisemaphandleni.
Amantombazana namabhinqa akhulelweyo athunyelwa kwiiYunithi ezinikezela ngeenkonzo zabakhulelweyo okanye ezaBabelekisi (ii-MOUs) ezikwiindawo ezisezidolophini, kwiikliniki zethutyana nezizezesigxina kwiindawo ezisemaphandleni.
Amantombazana namakhosikazi akhulelweyo athunyelwa kwiinkonzo zabakhulelweyo okanye iiYunithi zaBongikazi zokuBeleka (MOUs) kwimimandla yasezidolophini, nakwiiklinikhi ezijikelezayo okanye ezisisigxina kwimimandla esemaphandleni. 
Iintombi noomama abakhulelweyo bathunyelwa kwiinkonzo zokubelekisa okanye kumaCandelo aBongi abaBelekisayo (iiMOU) kwiindawo ezisezidolophini, nakoonojikeleza beeklinikhi okanye ezisisigxina kwiindawo ezisemaphandleni.
Iintombi nabafazi zithunyelwa kwiinkonzo zokubelekisa okanye kumaCandelo eNzululwazi ngokuBelekisa (ama-MOU) kwimimandla yeedolophu, kwiikliniki ezakhiweyo okanye kwezixhomekeke kwezo  emaphandleni. 
Amantombazana namakhosikazi akhulelweyo athunyelwa kwiinkonzo zabakhulelweyo okanye iiYunithi zaBongikazi zokuBeleka (MOUs) kwimimandla yasezidolophini, nakwiiklinikhi ezijikelezayo okanye ezisisigxina kwimimandla esemaphandleni. 
Iintombi noomama abakhulelweyo bathunyelwa kwiinkonzo zokubelekisa okanye kumaCandelo aBongi abaBelekisayo (iiMOU) kwiindawo ezisezidolophini, nakoonojikeleza beeklinikhi okanye ezisisigxina kwiindawo ezisemaphandleni.
Iintombi nabafazi zithunyelwa kwiinkonzo zokubelekisa okanye kumaCandelo eNzululwazi ngokuBelekisa (ama-MOU) kwimimandla yeedolophu, kwiikliniki ezakhiweyo okanye kwezixhomekeke kwezo  emaphandleni. 
Amantombazana namabhinqa akhulelweyo athunyelwa kwiiYunithi ezinikezela ngeenkonzo zabakhulelweyo okanye ezaBabelekisi (ii-MOUs) ezikwiindawo ezisezidolophini, kwiikliniki zethutyana nezizezesigxina kwiindawo ezisemaphandleni.
Iintombi noomama abakhulelweyo bathunyelwa kwiinkonzo zokubelekisa okanye kumaCandelo aBongi abaBelekisayo (iiMOU) kwiindawo ezisezidolophini, nakoonojikeleza beeklinikhi okanye ezisisigxina kwiindawo ezisemaphandleni.
Iintombi nabafazi zithunyelwa kwiinkonzo zokubelekisa okanye kumaCandelo eNzululwazi ngokuBelekisa (ama-MOU) kwimimandla yeedolophu, kwiikliniki ezakhiweyo okanye kwezixhomekeke kwezo  emaphandleni. 
Amantombazana namabhinqa akhulelweyo athunyelwa kwiiYunithi ezinikezela ngeenkonzo zabakhulelweyo okanye ezaBabelekisi (ii-MOUs) ezikwiindawo ezisezidolophini, kwiikliniki zethutyana nezizezesigxina kwiindawo ezisemaphandleni.
Amantombazana namakhosikazi akhulelweyo athunyelwa kwiinkonzo zabakhulelweyo okanye iiYunithi zaBongikazi zokuBeleka (MOUs) kwimimandla yasezidolophini, nakwiiklinikhi ezijikelezayo okanye ezisisigxina kwimimandla esemaphandleni. 
Ama-MOU ajongene nokuzalwa kweentsana kwaye alawulwa ngabongikazi abaqeqeshelwe ukubelekisa abasezindaweni zabahlali, nabajongene nezigulana emazinonophelwe kwezempilo kwinqanaba lokuqala.
IiMOU ziiyunithi zokubelekisa ezilawulwa ngababelekisi basekuhlaleni ukunceda izigulane kumaziko ezempilo ekuqalwa kuwo.
Ii-MOUs ziiyunithi zokubelekela eziqhutywa ngabongikazi ababelekisayo kwimimandla yoluntu kwinkathalelo yokuqala yempilo yezigulane.  
IiMOU ngamacandelo okubelekisa aqhutywa ngabongi ababelekisayo phakathi koluntu ukwenzela ukhathalelo lwempilo yezigulana lwasekuqaleni.
IiMOU ziiyunithi zokubelekisa ezilawulwa ngababelekisi basekuhlaleni ukunceda izigulane kumaziko ezempilo ekuqalwa kuwo.
Ii-MOUs ziiyunithi zokubelekela eziqhutywa ngabongikazi ababelekisayo kwimimandla yoluntu kwinkathalelo yokuqala yempilo yezigulane.  
IiMOU ngamacandelo okubelekisa aqhutywa ngabongi ababelekisayo phakathi koluntu ukwenzela ukhathalelo lwempilo yezigulana lwasekuqaleni.
Ama-MOU ajongene nokuzalwa kweentsana kwaye alawulwa ngabongikazi abaqeqeshelwe ukubelekisa abasezindaweni zabahlali, nabajongene nezigulana emazinonophelwe kwezempilo kwinqanaba lokuqala.
Ii-MOUs ziiyunithi zokubelekela eziqhutywa ngabongikazi ababelekisayo kwimimandla yoluntu kwinkathalelo yokuqala yempilo yezigulane.  
IiMOU ngamacandelo okubelekisa aqhutywa ngabongi ababelekisayo phakathi koluntu ukwenzela ukhathalelo lwempilo yezigulana lwasekuqaleni.
Ama-MOU ajongene nokuzalwa kweentsana kwaye alawulwa ngabongikazi abaqeqeshelwe ukubelekisa abasezindaweni zabahlali, nabajongene nezigulana emazinonophelwe kwezempilo kwinqanaba lokuqala.
IiMOU ziiyunithi zokubelekisa ezilawulwa ngababelekisi basekuhlaleni ukunceda izigulane kumaziko ezempilo ekuqalwa kuwo.
IiMOU ngamacandelo okubelekisa aqhutywa ngabongi ababelekisayo phakathi koluntu ukwenzela ukhathalelo lwempilo yezigulana lwasekuqaleni.
Ama-MOU ajongene nokuzalwa kweentsana kwaye alawulwa ngabongikazi abaqeqeshelwe ukubelekisa abasezindaweni zabahlali, nabajongene nezigulana emazinonophelwe kwezempilo kwinqanaba lokuqala.
IiMOU ziiyunithi zokubelekisa ezilawulwa ngababelekisi basekuhlaleni ukunceda izigulane kumaziko ezempilo ekuqalwa kuwo.
Ii-MOUs ziiyunithi zokubelekela eziqhutywa ngabongikazi ababelekisayo kwimimandla yoluntu kwinkathalelo yokuqala yempilo yezigulane.  
Kuyacetyiswa ukuba oomama abakhulelweyo mabazicelele ukubhaliselwa utyelelo lwabo lokuqala phambi kweeveki ezingama-20 okanye kwangoko nangoko emva kwezo veki. 
Oomama abakhulelweyo bacetyiswa ukuba bafake amadinga abo okuqala ekliniki naphambi kweeveki ezingama-20 okanye ngokukhawuleza nje emva kwelo xesha.
Kucetyiswa ukuba oomama abalindele ukubeleka babhukishe utyelelo lwabo lokuqala laseklinikhi ngaphambi kweeveki ezingama-20 okanye ngokukhawuleza emva koko.
Oomama abakhulelweyo bacetyiswa ukuba babhukishe utyelelo lwabo lokuqala eklinikhi kwangaphambili ngeeveki eziyi-20 okanye msinyane kangangoko emva koko.
Oomama abakhulelweyo bacetyiswa ukuba bafake amadinga abo okuqala ekliniki naphambi kweeveki ezingama-20 okanye ngokukhawuleza nje emva kwelo xesha.

Kucetyiswa ukuba oomama abalindele ukubeleka babhukishe utyelelo lwabo lokuqala laseklinikhi ngaphambi kweeveki ezingama-20 okanye ngokukhawuleza emva koko.
Umama unikwa uhlolo olupheleleyo lokuqala kunye neengcebiso xa olokuqala utyelelo oluphambi kokuba abeleke, olo utyelelo kuthiwa lolokubhalisa.  
Umama unikwa uhlolo olupheleleyo kwaneengcebiso xa esiya okokuqala kwiziko lezempilo kundwendwelo lwangaphambi kokubeleka, nolwaziwa ngokuba lundwendwelo lokwenza idinga.
Umama unikwa uvavanyo olupheleleyo lokuqala neengcebiso xa esiza kutyelelo lwakhe lokuqala lwaphambi kokubeleka, nolukwaziwa njengotyelelo lokubhukisha.  
Umama unikwa uhlolo olupheleleyo lokuqala nodliwano-ndlebe lwamacebiso ngotyelelo lwakhe lokuqala lwaphambi kokubeleka, nolukwaziwa njengotyelelo lokubhukisha.
Umama unikwa uhlolo olupheleleyo kwaneengcebiso xa esiya okokuqala kwiziko lezempilo kundwendwelo lwangaphambi kokubeleka, nolwaziwa ngokuba lundwendwelo lokwenza idinga.

Umama unikwa uvavanyo olupheleleyo lokuqala neengcebiso xa esiza kutyelelo lwakhe lokuqala lwaphambi kokubeleka, nolukwaziwa njengotyelelo lokubhukisha.  
Ukukhulelwa kuphononongwa rhoqo kutyelelo ngalunye aluzeleyo apho.
Ukukhulelwa lulawulwa ngokuthi kuziwe kundwendwelo lolandelelo olwenziwa rhoqo.
Ukukhulelwa kubekwa iliso kuko kutyelelo lwarhoqo olulandelayo. 
Ukukhulelwa kuqwalaselwa ngokwenza amathuba otyelelo alandeliswayo rhoqo.
Ukukhulelwa lulawulwa ngokuthi kuziwe kundwendwelo lolandelelo olwenziwa rhoqo.
Ukukhulelwa kubekwa iliso kuko kutyelelo lwarhoqo olulandelayo. 
Ukukhulelwa kuqwalaselwa ngokwenza amathuba otyelelo alandeliswayo rhoqo.
Ukukhulelwa kuphononongwa rhoqo kutyelelo ngalunye aluzeleyo apho.
Ukukhulelwa kubekwa iliso kuko kutyelelo lwarhoqo olulandelayo. 
Ukukhulelwa kuqwalaselwa ngokwenza amathuba otyelelo alandeliswayo rhoqo.
Ukukhulelwa kuphononongwa rhoqo kutyelelo ngalunye aluzeleyo apho.
Ukukhulelwa lulawulwa ngokuthi kuziwe kundwendwelo lolandelelo olwenziwa rhoqo.
Ukukhulelwa kuqwalaselwa ngokwenza amathuba otyelelo alandeliswayo rhoqo.
Ukukhulelwa kuphononongwa rhoqo kutyelelo ngalunye aluzeleyo apho.
Ukukhulelwa lulawulwa ngokuthi kuziwe kundwendwelo lolandelelo olwenziwa rhoqo.
Ukukhulelwa kubekwa iliso kuko kutyelelo lwarhoqo olulandelayo. 
Kanti nempilo kamama iyaphononongwa ngokumandla.
Kwanempilo kamama nayo izakubekwa esweni.
Kukwabekwa iliso kakhulu kwimpilo kamama. 
Impilo kamama ikwaqwalaselelwa kufutshane.
Kwanempilo kamama nayo izakubekwa esweni.
Kukwabekwa iliso kakhulu kwimpilo kamama. 
Impilo kamama ikwaqwalaselelwa kufutshane.
Kanti nempilo kamama iyaphononongwa ngokumandla.
Kukwabekwa iliso kakhulu kwimpilo kamama. 
Impilo kamama ikwaqwalaselelwa kufutshane.
Kanti nempilo kamama iyaphononongwa ngokumandla.
Kwanempilo kamama nayo izakubekwa esweni.
Impilo kamama ikwaqwalaselelwa kufutshane.
Kanti nempilo kamama iyaphononongwa ngokumandla.
Kwanempilo kamama nayo izakubekwa esweni.
Kukwabekwa iliso kakhulu kwimpilo kamama. 
Ubunzima bakhe buza kulinganiselwa, kuthathwe uxinzelelo lwegazi lakhe, kuze kuxilongwe umchamo wakhe.
Kuzakuthathwa ubunzima bakhe bomzimba, noxinzelelo lwegazi kuze kwenziwe novavanyo lomchamo.
Kuya kujongwa ubunzima bakhe, kuthathwe uxinzelelo lwakhe lwegazi kuze kuvavanywe nomchamo.
Uyaveyishwa, kuqwalaselwe uxinzelelo lwegazi lwakhe kuvavanywe nomchamo.
Kuzakuthathwa ubunzima bakhe bomzimba, noxinzelelo lwegazi kuze kwenziwe novavanyo lomchamo.
Kuya kujongwa ubunzima bakhe, kuthathwe uxinzelelo lwakhe lwegazi kuze kuvavanywe nomchamo.
Uyaveyishwa, kuqwalaselwe uxinzelelo lwegazi lwakhe kuvavanywe nomchamo.
Ubunzima bakhe buza kulinganiselwa, kuthathwe uxinzelelo lwegazi lakhe, kuze kuxilongwe umchamo wakhe.
Kuya kujongwa ubunzima bakhe, kuthathwe uxinzelelo lwakhe lwegazi kuze kuvavanywe nomchamo.
Uyaveyishwa, kuqwalaselwe uxinzelelo lwegazi lwakhe kuvavanywe nomchamo.
Ubunzima bakhe buza kulinganiselwa, kuthathwe uxinzelelo lwegazi lakhe, kuze kuxilongwe umchamo wakhe.
Kuzakuthathwa ubunzima bakhe bomzimba, noxinzelelo lwegazi kuze kwenziwe novavanyo lomchamo.
Uyaveyishwa, kuqwalaselwe uxinzelelo lwegazi lwakhe kuvavanywe nomchamo.
Ubunzima bakhe buza kulinganiselwa, kuthathwe uxinzelelo lwegazi lakhe, kuze kuxilongwe umchamo wakhe.
Kuzakuthathwa ubunzima bakhe bomzimba, noxinzelelo lwegazi kuze kwenziwe novavanyo lomchamo.
Kuya kujongwa ubunzima bakhe, kuthathwe uxinzelelo lwakhe lwegazi kuze kuvavanywe nomchamo.
Xa kungekho zimeko zixhomisa amehlo, kufuneka aphinde abuyele kutyelelo lwakhe olulandela olokuqala emva kweeveki ezimbini, iinjongo yeyokuba makafumane iziphumo zengxilongo ngexesha ebezokubhalisa.
Ukuba akukho meko zixhalabisayo, uzakubuyela kwiziko kundwendwelo lolandelelo emva kweeveki ezimbini ukuze afumane iziphumo zovavanyo obelwenziwe xa ebezekundwendwelo lokwenza idinga. 
Ukuba akukho ziingxaki, kufuneka aphinde abuyele utyelelo lwakho lokuqala olulandelayo emva kweeveki ezimbini ukuze afumane iziphumo zovavanyo ngexesha lotyelelo lokubhukisha.
Ukuba akukho ziingxaki zivelayo, ufanele ukubuyela kutyelelo lwakhe lokuqala olulandeliswayo emva kweeveki ezimbini ukuze afumane iimvavanyo ezithathwe kutyelelo lokubhukisha.
Ukuba akukho meko zixhalabisayo, uzakubuyela kwiziko kundwendwelo lolandelelo emva kweeveki ezimbini ukuze afumane iziphumo zovavanyo obelwenziwe xa ebezekundwendwelo lokwenza idinga. 
Ukuba akukho ziingxaki, kufuneka aphinde abuyele utyelelo lwakho lokuqala olulandelayo emva kweeveki ezimbini ukuze afumane iziphumo zovavanyo ngexesha lotyelelo lokubhukisha.
Ukuba akukho ziingxaki zivelayo, ufanele ukubuyela kutyelelo lwakhe lokuqala olulandeliswayo emva kweeveki ezimbini ukuze afumane iimvavanyo ezithathwe kutyelelo lokubhukisha.
Xa kungekho zimeko zixhomisa amehlo, kufuneka aphinde abuyele kutyelelo lwakhe olulandela olokuqala emva kweeveki ezimbini, iinjongo yeyokuba makafumane iziphumo zengxilongo ngexesha ebezokubhalisa.
Ukuba akukho ziingxaki, kufuneka aphinde abuyele utyelelo lwakho lokuqala olulandelayo emva kweeveki ezimbini ukuze afumane iziphumo zovavanyo ngexesha lotyelelo lokubhukisha.

Xa kungekho zimeko zixhomisa amehlo, kufuneka aphinde abuyele kutyelelo lwakhe olulandela olokuqala emva kweeveki ezimbini, iinjongo yeyokuba makafumane iziphumo zengxilongo ngexesha ebezokubhalisa.
Ukuba akukho meko zixhalabisayo, uzakubuyela kwiziko kundwendwelo lolandelelo emva kweeveki ezimbini ukuze afumane iziphumo zovavanyo obelwenziwe xa ebezekundwendwelo lokwenza idinga. 
Ukuba akukho ziingxaki zivelayo, ufanele ukubuyela kutyelelo lwakhe lokuqala olulandeliswayo emva kweeveki ezimbini ukuze afumane iimvavanyo ezithathwe kutyelelo lokubhukisha.
Xa kungekho zimeko zixhomisa amehlo, kufuneka aphinde abuyele kutyelelo lwakhe olulandela olokuqala emva kweeveki ezimbini, iinjongo yeyokuba makafumane iziphumo zengxilongo ngexesha ebezokubhalisa.
Ukuba akukho meko zixhalabisayo, uzakubuyela kwiziko kundwendwelo lolandelelo emva kweeveki ezimbini ukuze afumane iziphumo zovavanyo obelwenziwe xa ebezekundwendwelo lokwenza idinga. 
Ukuba akukho ziingxaki, kufuneka aphinde abuyele utyelelo lwakho lokuqala olulandelayo emva kweeveki ezimbini ukuze afumane iziphumo zovavanyo ngexesha lotyelelo lokubhukisha.
Emva koku, makabuyele eklinikhi qho emva kweeveki ezintandathu kude kuphele iiveki ezingama-28, xa sezingama-34 iiveki, emva kokuba bemyalele abeeklinikhi/MOU (ukuquqa eziklinikhi kungohluka kummandla ngamnye).
Emva koku, kuzakufuneka ukuba abuyele ekliniki qho emva kweeveki ezintandathu ukuya kutsho kwiiveki ezingama-28 ekhulelwe, nakwiiveki ezingama-34 zokukhulelwa kuze emva koko eze ngokomyalelo wekliniki abasebenzi be-MOU (ukuqupha kondwendwelo kusenokwahluka ngokwengingqi nganye).
Emva koku, kufuneka abuyele eklinikhi rhoqo kwiiveki ezintandathu ukuya kwezingama-28, aphinde kwiiveki ezingama-34, emva koko njengoko ebonisiwe yikliniki/abasebenzi base-MOU (indlela ekuyiwa ngayo yohlukile ngokwemimandla).
Emva koku, kufuneka abuyele eklinikhi qho emva kweeveki ezintandathu kude kube ziiveki eziyi-28, aphinde eze kwiiveki eziyi-34, emva koko ngokomyalelo wabasebenzi baseklinikhi/iMOU (isantya samathuba otyelelo sinokwahluka ngokweendawo).
Emva koku, kuzakufuneka ukuba abuyele ekliniki qho emva kweeveki ezintandathu ukuya kutsho kwiiveki ezingama-28 ekhulelwe, nakwiiveki ezingama-34 zokukhulelwa kuze emva koko eze ngokomyalelo wekliniki abasebenzi be-MOU (ukuqupha kondwendwelo kusenokwahluka ngokwengingqi nganye).
Emva koku, kufuneka abuyele eklinikhi rhoqo kwiiveki ezintandathu ukuya kwezingama-28, aphinde kwiiveki ezingama-34, emva koko njengoko ebonisiwe yikliniki/abasebenzi base-MOU (indlela ekuyiwa ngayo yohlukile ngokwemimandla).
Emva koku, kufuneka abuyele eklinikhi qho emva kweeveki ezintandathu kude kube ziiveki eziyi-28, aphinde eze kwiiveki eziyi-34, emva koko ngokomyalelo wabasebenzi baseklinikhi/iMOU (isantya samathuba otyelelo sinokwahluka ngokweendawo).
Emva koku, makabuyele eklinikhi qho emva kweeveki ezintandathu kude kuphele iiveki ezingama-28, xa sezingama-34 iiveki, emva kokuba bemyalele abeeklinikhi/MOU (ukuquqa eziklinikhi kungohluka kummandla ngamnye).

Emva koku, kufuneka abuyele eklinikhi qho emva kweeveki ezintandathu kude kube ziiveki eziyi-28, aphinde eze kwiiveki eziyi-34, emva koko ngokomyalelo wabasebenzi baseklinikhi/iMOU (isantya samathuba otyelelo sinokwahluka ngokweendawo).
Emva koku, makabuyele eklinikhi qho emva kweeveki ezintandathu kude kuphele iiveki ezingama-28, xa sezingama-34 iiveki, emva kokuba bemyalele abeeklinikhi/MOU (ukuquqa eziklinikhi kungohluka kummandla ngamnye).
Emva koku, kuzakufuneka ukuba abuyele ekliniki qho emva kweeveki ezintandathu ukuya kutsho kwiiveki ezingama-28 ekhulelwe, nakwiiveki ezingama-34 zokukhulelwa kuze emva koko eze ngokomyalelo wekliniki abasebenzi be-MOU (ukuqupha kondwendwelo kusenokwahluka ngokwengingqi nganye).
Emva koku, kufuneka abuyele eklinikhi qho emva kweeveki ezintandathu kude kube ziiveki eziyi-28, aphinde eze kwiiveki eziyi-34, emva koko ngokomyalelo wabasebenzi baseklinikhi/iMOU (isantya samathuba otyelelo sinokwahluka ngokweendawo).
Emva koku, makabuyele eklinikhi qho emva kweeveki ezintandathu kude kuphele iiveki ezingama-28, xa sezingama-34 iiveki, emva kokuba bemyalele abeeklinikhi/MOU (ukuquqa eziklinikhi kungohluka kummandla ngamnye).
Emva koku, kuzakufuneka ukuba abuyele ekliniki qho emva kweeveki ezintandathu ukuya kutsho kwiiveki ezingama-28 ekhulelwe, nakwiiveki ezingama-34 zokukhulelwa kuze emva koko eze ngokomyalelo wekliniki abasebenzi be-MOU (ukuqupha kondwendwelo kusenokwahluka ngokwengingqi nganye).
Emva koku, kufuneka abuyele eklinikhi rhoqo kwiiveki ezintandathu ukuya kwezingama-28, aphinde kwiiveki ezingama-34, emva koko njengoko ebonisiwe yikliniki/abasebenzi base-MOU (indlela ekuyiwa ngayo yohlukile ngokwemimandla).
Oomama abakhulelweyo bajongwa ngesikrini kuhlolisiswa umngcipheko abanokuba kuwo ngokwasempilo okanye usana lungakazalwa.
Oomama abakhulelweyo bayahlolisisa ukuze kujongwe ukuba akukho meko zingumngcipheko empilweni yabo nakuleyo yabantwana ababathweleyo.
Oomama abakhulelweyo yabaskrinwa kujongwa iingozi ezisenokubakho empilweni yabo kunye nempilo yosana olungekazalwa.
Oomama abakhulelweyo bahluzwa ngenxa yemingcipheko enokubakho kwimpilo yabo nakwimpilo yosana olungekazalwa.

Iintombi eziselula namanenekazi akhulelweyo angaphezulu kweminyaka engama-35 yobudala, ezo ndidi zombini zithathwa njenge zozisenokuba semngciphekweni.
Amantombazana aselula namabhinqa angaphezu kweminyaka engama-35 bathathwa njengabona basemngciphekweni kakhulu.
Amantombazana aziithineyija kunye namakhosikazi angaphezulu kweminyaka engama-35 akhulelweyo athathwa njengasengozini ephezulu kakhulu.
Iintombi ezifikisayo kunye noomama abangaphezu kweminyaka eyi-35 ubudala babonwa njengabantu abasemngciphekweni ophezulu.

Oku kuthetha ukuba imeko yabo isenokuba yileyo ixhomisa amehlo ngeli xesha bakhulelweyo nangexesha lokubeleka kwabo iintsana. 
Oku kuthetha ukuba basenokuba semngciphekweni ngoku basakhulelweyo naxa babelekayo.
Oku kuthetha ukuba banganengxaki ngexesha lokukhulelwa nelokubeleka.
Oku kuthetha ukuba kungalindelwa kakhulu kubo ukuvela kweengxaki ngethuba lokukhulelwa okanye lokubeleka.
Oku kuthetha ukuba basenokuba semngciphekweni ngoku basakhulelweyo naxa babelekayo.
Oku kuthetha ukuba banganengxaki ngexesha lokukhulelwa nelokubeleka.
Oku kuthetha ukuba kungalindelwa kakhulu kubo ukuvela kweengxaki ngethuba lokukhulelwa okanye lokubeleka.
Oku kuthetha ukuba imeko yabo isenokuba yileyo ixhomisa amehlo ngeli xesha bakhulelweyo nangexesha lokubeleka kwabo iintsana. 
Oku kuthetha ukuba banganengxaki ngexesha lokukhulelwa nelokubeleka.
Oku kuthetha ukuba kungalindelwa kakhulu kubo ukuvela kweengxaki ngethuba lokukhulelwa okanye lokubeleka.
Oku kuthetha ukuba imeko yabo isenokuba yileyo ixhomisa amehlo ngeli xesha bakhulelweyo nangexesha lokubeleka kwabo iintsana. 
Oku kuthetha ukuba basenokuba semngciphekweni ngoku basakhulelweyo naxa babelekayo.
Oku kuthetha ukuba kungalindelwa kakhulu kubo ukuvela kweengxaki ngethuba lokukhulelwa okanye lokubeleka.
Oku kuthetha ukuba imeko yabo isenokuba yileyo ixhomisa amehlo ngeli xesha bakhulelweyo nangexesha lokubeleka kwabo iintsana. 
Oku kuthetha ukuba basenokuba semngciphekweni ngoku basakhulelweyo naxa babelekayo.
Oku kuthetha ukuba banganengxaki ngexesha lokukhulelwa nelokubeleka.
Amabhinqa akhulelweyo angathathwa njengabantu abasemngciphekweni ukuba luphezulu uxinzelelo lwegazi labo, banembali echaza ukungaphili kakuhle ngenxa yemfuza, xa bebekhulelwe kumaxesha angaphambili, naxa ngaphambili babekhe babelekiswa ngoqhaqho. 
Amabhinqa akhulelweyo basenokuba semngciphekweni kakhulu ukuba baneengxaki zokonyukelwa luxinzeleko lwegazi, kukho iingxaki zofuzo ezingaqhelekanga, bekhulelwe amawele kwanokuba bebekhe benziwa uqhaqho olufana nolokubeka ngomthungo.
Amakhosikazi akhulelweyo nawo angabonwa njengengozi ephezulu ukuba banoxinzelelo lwegazi olunyukileyo, imbali ngofuzo olungamanga kakuhle, ukukhulelwa okuninzi kwakunye nokuba bebetyandiwe ngaphambili njengotyando lokubeleka umntwana.
Kwakhona amabhinqa akhulelweyo anokubonwa njengomngcipheko ophezulu ukuba lunyukile uxinzelelo lwegazi lwabo, xa benembali yeziphene zofuzo, ukukhulelwa okungaphezu kolosana olunye naxa bebenze uqhaqho olufana nolokubeleka kwilixa elingaphambili.
Amabhinqa akhulelweyo basenokuba semngciphekweni kakhulu ukuba baneengxaki zokonyukelwa luxinzeleko lwegazi, kukho iingxaki zofuzo ezingaqhelekanga, bekhulelwe amawele kwanokuba bebekhe benziwa uqhaqho olufana nolokubeka ngomthungo.

Amabhinqa akhulelweyo angathathwa njengabantu abasemngciphekweni ukuba luphezulu uxinzelelo lwegazi labo, banembali echaza ukungaphili kakuhle ngenxa yemfuza, xa bebekhulelwe kumaxesha angaphambili, naxa ngaphambili babekhe babelekiswa ngoqhaqho. 
Amabhinqa akhulelweyo basenokuba semngciphekweni kakhulu ukuba baneengxaki zokonyukelwa luxinzeleko lwegazi, kukho iingxaki zofuzo ezingaqhelekanga, bekhulelwe amawele kwanokuba bebekhe benziwa uqhaqho olufana nolokubeka ngomthungo.
Amakhosikazi akhulelweyo nawo angabonwa njengengozi ephezulu ukuba banoxinzelelo lwegazi olunyukileyo, imbali ngofuzo olungamanga kakuhle, ukukhulelwa okuninzi kwakunye nokuba bebetyandiwe ngaphambili njengotyando lokubeleka umntwana.
Oomama abaxilongiweyo bafunyaniswa njengabo basemngciphekweni omkhulu baba seluhlwini oluthunyelwa kwiiklinikhi ezibahlola behlala emizini yabo, bakuhlolelwa kwizibhedlele abagqithiselwe kuzo ezineengcaphephe kwezonyango, apho baza kuhlolwa ngokumandla kubekho nengxilongo bejongisiswe ezikrinini ziingcaphephe.
Oomama ekufunyaniswe ukuba basemngciphekweni kakhulu bayebathunyelwe kwiikliniki yesibhedlele ekuye yabakhulelweyo abanyangwa bengalaliswa kwezo zibhedlele nalapho kuzakuthi kuphandwe nzulu kuze kwenziwe nolunye uvavanyo.
Oomama abafunyaniswe beyingozi ephezulu baziswa phambili kumgangatho wesibini okanye ophezulu kwizibhedlele zokubeleka zezigulane zangaphandle, apho uphando olubanzi novavanyo lokuskrinwa lwenziwa khona.
Oomama abafunyaniswe ngoxilongo ukuba basemngciphekweni ophezulu bathunyelwa phambili kwiikliniki zaphambi kokubeleka zabangalaliswayo kwizibhedlele zebanga eliphakathi okanye eliphezulu, apho kuqhutywa khona ngophando olungaphaya ukuze kwenziwe nezinye iimvavanyo zokuhluza.
Oomama ekufunyaniswe ukuba basemngciphekweni kakhulu bayebathunyelwe kwiikliniki yesibhedlele ekuye yabakhulelweyo abanyangwa bengalaliswa kwezo zibhedlele nalapho kuzakuthi kuphandwe nzulu kuze kwenziwe nolunye uvavanyo.
Oomama abafunyaniswe beyingozi ephezulu baziswa phambili kumgangatho wesibini okanye ophezulu kwizibhedlele zokubeleka zezigulane zangaphandle, apho uphando olubanzi novavanyo lokuskrinwa lwenziwa khona.
Oomama abafunyaniswe ngoxilongo ukuba basemngciphekweni ophezulu bathunyelwa phambili kwiikliniki zaphambi kokubeleka zabangalaliswayo kwizibhedlele zebanga eliphakathi okanye eliphezulu, apho kuqhutywa khona ngophando olungaphaya ukuze kwenziwe nezinye iimvavanyo zokuhluza.

Oomama ekufunyaniswe ukuba basemngciphekweni kakhulu bayebathunyelwe kwiikliniki yesibhedlele ekuye yabakhulelweyo abanyangwa bengalaliswa kwezo zibhedlele nalapho kuzakuthi kuphandwe nzulu kuze kwenziwe nolunye uvavanyo.
Oomama abafunyaniswe beyingozi ephezulu baziswa phambili kumgangatho wesibini okanye ophezulu kwizibhedlele zokubeleka zezigulane zangaphandle, apho uphando olubanzi novavanyo lokuskrinwa lwenziwa khona.
Oomama abakhulelweyo bekwasemngciphekweni bayacetyiswa ngokuya kwiikliniki zeengcali zokubelekisa ezibahlola behlala emizini yabo kwaye kufuneka baye qho kwezo ndawo ukuze baxilongwe. 
Oomama abakhulelweyo babebesemngciphekweni kakhulu bayebacetyiswe ukuba baye kangangoko banakho kwezi klinikhi zezibhedlele apho banyangwa bengalaliswanga.
Oomama abakhulelweyo abakwingozi ephezulu bacetyiswa ukuba baye kwiikliniki zokubelekela izigulane zangaphandle rhoqo.
Oomama abanokukhulelwa kwemingcipheko ephezulu bacetyiswa ukuba baye kwiiklinikhi zaphambi kokubeleka zabangalaliswayo kaninzi kangangoko kuyimfuneko.

Oomama abakhulelweyo babebesemngciphekweni kakhulu bayebacetyiswe ukuba baye kangangoko banakho kwezi klinikhi zezibhedlele apho banyangwa bengalaliswanga.
Oomama abakhulelweyo abakwingozi ephezulu bacetyiswa ukuba baye kwiikliniki zokubelekela izigulane zangaphandle rhoqo.
Xa ungumntu oqalayo ukutyelela kwiziko lezempilo, uza kucelwa ukuba uzalise uxwebhu ngenkcukacha ezifunwayo uze uvulelwe uxwebhu olujongene nawe kuphela.
Ukuba uyaqala ukuya kwiziko lezempilo, uza kucelwa ukuba ugcwalise ifomu uze uvulelwe ifayile.
Ukuba uya okokuqala kwisibonelelo sempilo, uya kucelwa ukuba ugcwalise ifomu ukuze uvulelwe ifowulda.
Ukuba uyaqala ukutyelela kwiziko lobonelelo lwempilo, uya kucelwa ukuba uzalise ifomu ukuze kuvulwe ifayili yakho.
Ukuba uyaqala ukuya kwiziko lezempilo, uza kucelwa ukuba ugcwalise ifomu uze uvulelwe ifayile.
Ukuba uya okokuqala kwisibonelelo sempilo, uya kucelwa ukuba ugcwalise ifomu ukuze uvulelwe ifowulda.
Ukuba uyaqala ukutyelela kwiziko lobonelelo lwempilo, uya kucelwa ukuba uzalise ifomu ukuze kuvulwe ifayili yakho.
Xa ungumntu oqalayo ukutyelela kwiziko lezempilo, uza kucelwa ukuba uzalise uxwebhu ngenkcukacha ezifunwayo uze uvulelwe uxwebhu olujongene nawe kuphela.
Ukuba uya okokuqala kwisibonelelo sempilo, uya kucelwa ukuba ugcwalise ifomu ukuze uvulelwe ifowulda.
Ukuba uyaqala ukutyelela kwiziko lobonelelo lwempilo, uya kucelwa ukuba uzalise ifomu ukuze kuvulwe ifayili yakho.
Xa ungumntu oqalayo ukutyelela kwiziko lezempilo, uza kucelwa ukuba uzalise uxwebhu ngenkcukacha ezifunwayo uze uvulelwe uxwebhu olujongene nawe kuphela.
Ukuba uyaqala ukuya kwiziko lezempilo, uza kucelwa ukuba ugcwalise ifomu uze uvulelwe ifayile.
Ukuba uyaqala ukutyelela kwiziko lobonelelo lwempilo, uya kucelwa ukuba uzalise ifomu ukuze kuvulwe ifayili yakho.
Xa ungumntu oqalayo ukutyelela kwiziko lezempilo, uza kucelwa ukuba uzalise uxwebhu ngenkcukacha ezifunwayo uze uvulelwe uxwebhu olujongene nawe kuphela.
Ukuba uyaqala ukuya kwiziko lezempilo, uza kucelwa ukuba ugcwalise ifomu uze uvulelwe ifayile.
Ukuba uya okokuqala kwisibonelelo sempilo, uya kucelwa ukuba ugcwalise ifomu ukuze uvulelwe ifowulda.
Phatha incwadana yakho enguMazisi, amayeza owasebenzisayo kunye nekhadi laseklinikhi okanye elasesibhedlele ukuba wawukhe wabhaliswa eklinikhi okanye esibhedlele.
Yiza neSazisi sakho, kunye nazonawaphi na amayeza owasebenzisayo kunye nekhadi leklinikhi okanye lesibhedlele, ukuba wawukhe wabhalisa kwelo ziko.
Yiza nencwadi yakho yesazisi i-ID, nawaphina amayeza owaselayo kunye nekhadi laseklinikhi okanye lasesibhedlele, ukuba ububhalisiwe ngaphambili kwisibonelelo.
Yiza nencwadi yakho yeID, nawaphi na amayeza owaselayo kunye nekhadi yaseklinikhi okanye yasesibhedlele, ukuba ububhalisiwe kwilixa elingaphambili kwiziko lobonelelo.
Yiza neSazisi sakho, kunye nazonawaphi na amayeza owasebenzisayo kunye nekhadi leklinikhi okanye lesibhedlele, ukuba wawukhe wabhalisa kwelo ziko.
Yiza nencwadi yakho yesazisi i-ID, nawaphina amayeza owaselayo kunye nekhadi laseklinikhi okanye lasesibhedlele, ukuba ububhalisiwe ngaphambili kwisibonelelo.
Yiza nencwadi yakho yeID, nawaphi na amayeza owaselayo kunye nekhadi yaseklinikhi okanye yasesibhedlele, ukuba ububhalisiwe kwilixa elingaphambili kwiziko lobonelelo.
Phatha incwadana yakho enguMazisi, amayeza owasebenzisayo kunye nekhadi laseklinikhi okanye elasesibhedlele ukuba wawukhe wabhaliswa eklinikhi okanye esibhedlele.
Yiza nencwadi yakho yesazisi i-ID, nawaphina amayeza owaselayo kunye nekhadi laseklinikhi okanye lasesibhedlele, ukuba ububhalisiwe ngaphambili kwisibonelelo.
Yiza nencwadi yakho yeID, nawaphi na amayeza owaselayo kunye nekhadi yaseklinikhi okanye yasesibhedlele, ukuba ububhalisiwe kwilixa elingaphambili kwiziko lobonelelo.

Yiza neSazisi sakho, kunye nazonawaphi na amayeza owasebenzisayo kunye nekhadi leklinikhi okanye lesibhedlele, ukuba wawukhe wabhalisa kwelo ziko.

Yiza neSazisi sakho, kunye nazonawaphi na amayeza owasebenzisayo kunye nekhadi leklinikhi okanye lesibhedlele, ukuba wawukhe wabhalisa kwelo ziko.

Abakhulelweyo bengekho mngciphekweni mkhulu bayaxilongwa  kuma- MOUs (lawo anabongikazi abelekisayo benonophela izigulana kwinqanaba lokuqala lezempilo) kwimimandla yeedolophu nasezindaweni ezixhomekeke kwiikliniki ezakhiwe emaphandleni. 
Abakhulelweyo kodwa babebengekho mngciphekweni bajongwa kwii-MOU (iiyunithi zokubelekela ezilawulwa ngababelekisi basekuhlaleni abalungiselelwe izigulane ezikumaziko empilo angawokuqala ekuyiwa kuwo) ezikwiindawo ezisezidolophini, kunye neeklinikhi zethutyana nezizezesigxina kwiindawo ezisemaphandleni
Ukukhulelwa okukwizinga eliphantsi luyalawuleka kwii-MOUs (iiyunithi zokubelekela eziqhutywa ngabongikazi ababelekisayo kwimimandla yoluntu kwinkathalelo yokuqala yezigulane) kwimimandla esemaphandleni.
Abanokhulelo lwemingcipheko engephi bancedwa kwiiMOUs (amacandelo okubelekisa aqhutywa ngabongi ababelekisayo eluntwini ukwenzela ukhathalelo lwempilo yezigulana) lwasekuqaleni kwiindawo ezisezidolophini, koonojikeleza beeklinikhi nakwezisisigxina kwiindawo ezisemaphandleni.
Abakhulelweyo kodwa babebengekho mngciphekweni bajongwa kwii-MOU (iiyunithi zokubelekela ezilawulwa ngababelekisi basekuhlaleni abalungiselelwe izigulane ezikumaziko empilo angawokuqala ekuyiwa kuwo) ezikwiindawo ezisezidolophini, kunye neeklinikhi zethutyana nezizezesigxina kwiindawo ezisemaphandleni
Ukukhulelwa okukwizinga eliphantsi luyalawuleka kwii-MOUs (iiyunithi zokubelekela eziqhutywa ngabongikazi ababelekisayo kwimimandla yoluntu kwinkathalelo yokuqala yezigulane) kwimimandla esemaphandleni.
Abanokhulelo lwemingcipheko engephi bancedwa kwiiMOUs (amacandelo okubelekisa aqhutywa ngabongi ababelekisayo eluntwini ukwenzela ukhathalelo lwempilo yezigulana) lwasekuqaleni kwiindawo ezisezidolophini, koonojikeleza beeklinikhi nakwezisisigxina kwiindawo ezisemaphandleni.
Abakhulelweyo bengekho mngciphekweni mkhulu bayaxilongwa  kuma- MOUs (lawo anabongikazi abelekisayo benonophela izigulana kwinqanaba lokuqala lezempilo) kwimimandla yeedolophu nasezindaweni ezixhomekeke kwiikliniki ezakhiwe emaphandleni. 
Ukukhulelwa okukwizinga eliphantsi luyalawuleka kwii-MOUs (iiyunithi zokubelekela eziqhutywa ngabongikazi ababelekisayo kwimimandla yoluntu kwinkathalelo yokuqala yezigulane) kwimimandla esemaphandleni.
Abanokhulelo lwemingcipheko engephi bancedwa kwiiMOUs (amacandelo okubelekisa aqhutywa ngabongi ababelekisayo eluntwini ukwenzela ukhathalelo lwempilo yezigulana) lwasekuqaleni kwiindawo ezisezidolophini, koonojikeleza beeklinikhi nakwezisisigxina kwiindawo ezisemaphandleni.
Abakhulelweyo bengekho mngciphekweni mkhulu bayaxilongwa  kuma- MOUs (lawo anabongikazi abelekisayo benonophela izigulana kwinqanaba lokuqala lezempilo) kwimimandla yeedolophu nasezindaweni ezixhomekeke kwiikliniki ezakhiwe emaphandleni. 
Abakhulelweyo kodwa babebengekho mngciphekweni bajongwa kwii-MOU (iiyunithi zokubelekela ezilawulwa ngababelekisi basekuhlaleni abalungiselelwe izigulane ezikumaziko empilo angawokuqala ekuyiwa kuwo) ezikwiindawo ezisezidolophini, kunye neeklinikhi zethutyana nezizezesigxina kwiindawo ezisemaphandleni
Abanokhulelo lwemingcipheko engephi bancedwa kwiiMOUs (amacandelo okubelekisa aqhutywa ngabongi ababelekisayo eluntwini ukwenzela ukhathalelo lwempilo yezigulana) lwasekuqaleni kwiindawo ezisezidolophini, koonojikeleza beeklinikhi nakwezisisigxina kwiindawo ezisemaphandleni.
Abakhulelweyo bengekho mngciphekweni mkhulu bayaxilongwa  kuma- MOUs (lawo anabongikazi abelekisayo benonophela izigulana kwinqanaba lokuqala lezempilo) kwimimandla yeedolophu nasezindaweni ezixhomekeke kwiikliniki ezakhiwe emaphandleni. 
Abakhulelweyo kodwa babebengekho mngciphekweni bajongwa kwii-MOU (iiyunithi zokubelekela ezilawulwa ngababelekisi basekuhlaleni abalungiselelwe izigulane ezikumaziko empilo angawokuqala ekuyiwa kuwo) ezikwiindawo ezisezidolophini, kunye neeklinikhi zethutyana nezizezesigxina kwiindawo ezisemaphandleni
Ukukhulelwa okukwizinga eliphantsi luyalawuleka kwii-MOUs (iiyunithi zokubelekela eziqhutywa ngabongikazi ababelekisayo kwimimandla yoluntu kwinkathalelo yokuqala yezigulane) kwimimandla esemaphandleni.
Abakhulelweyo besemngciphekweni omkhulu bayanonophelwa kwiikliniki nangona behlala emizini yabo, bayancedwa kwizibhedlele zemimandla yeedolophu nezasemaphandleni, kanti bayancedwa nakwizibhedlele abadluliselwa kuzo kuba zineengcaphephe zoogqirha.
Abakhulelweyo nabasemngciphekweni kakhulu bajongwa kwiikliniki zezibhedlele ezinyanga zingabalalisanga kwiindawo ezisezidolophini kunye nakwizibhedlele zengingqi nezezithili.
Ukukhulelwa okukwizinga eliphezulu luyalawuleka kwiikliniki zezigulane zangaphandle kwizibhedlele zemimandla esedolophini nasemaphandleni nezibhedlele eziphezulu.
Abanokukhulelwa kwemingcipheko ephezulu bancedwa kwiikliniki zabangalaliswayo kwizibhedlele zasezidolophini nezasemaphandleni zeengingqi nezikwibanga eliphezulu.
Abakhulelweyo nabasemngciphekweni kakhulu bajongwa kwiikliniki zezibhedlele ezinyanga zingabalalisanga kwiindawo ezisezidolophini kunye nakwizibhedlele zengingqi nezezithili.
Ukukhulelwa okukwizinga eliphezulu luyalawuleka kwiikliniki zezigulane zangaphandle kwizibhedlele zemimandla esedolophini nasemaphandleni nezibhedlele eziphezulu.
Abanokukhulelwa kwemingcipheko ephezulu bancedwa kwiikliniki zabangalaliswayo kwizibhedlele zasezidolophini nezasemaphandleni zeengingqi nezikwibanga eliphezulu.
Abakhulelweyo besemngciphekweni omkhulu bayanonophelwa kwiikliniki nangona behlala emizini yabo, bayancedwa kwizibhedlele zemimandla yeedolophu nezasemaphandleni, kanti bayancedwa nakwizibhedlele abadluliselwa kuzo kuba zineengcaphephe zoogqirha.
Ukukhulelwa okukwizinga eliphezulu luyalawuleka kwiikliniki zezigulane zangaphandle kwizibhedlele zemimandla esedolophini nasemaphandleni nezibhedlele eziphezulu.
Abanokukhulelwa kwemingcipheko ephezulu bancedwa kwiikliniki zabangalaliswayo kwizibhedlele zasezidolophini nezasemaphandleni zeengingqi nezikwibanga eliphezulu.
Abakhulelweyo besemngciphekweni omkhulu bayanonophelwa kwiikliniki nangona behlala emizini yabo, bayancedwa kwizibhedlele zemimandla yeedolophu nezasemaphandleni, kanti bayancedwa nakwizibhedlele abadluliselwa kuzo kuba zineengcaphephe zoogqirha.
Abakhulelweyo nabasemngciphekweni kakhulu bajongwa kwiikliniki zezibhedlele ezinyanga zingabalalisanga kwiindawo ezisezidolophini kunye nakwizibhedlele zengingqi nezezithili.
Abanokukhulelwa kwemingcipheko ephezulu bancedwa kwiikliniki zabangalaliswayo kwizibhedlele zasezidolophini nezasemaphandleni zeengingqi nezikwibanga eliphezulu.
Abakhulelweyo besemngciphekweni omkhulu bayanonophelwa kwiikliniki nangona behlala emizini yabo, bayancedwa kwizibhedlele zemimandla yeedolophu nezasemaphandleni, kanti bayancedwa nakwizibhedlele abadluliselwa kuzo kuba zineengcaphephe zoogqirha.
Abakhulelweyo nabasemngciphekweni kakhulu bajongwa kwiikliniki zezibhedlele ezinyanga zingabalalisanga kwiindawo ezisezidolophini kunye nakwizibhedlele zengingqi nezezithili.
Ukukhulelwa okukwizinga eliphezulu luyalawuleka kwiikliniki zezigulane zangaphandle kwizibhedlele zemimandla esedolophini nasemaphandleni nezibhedlele eziphezulu.

INkqubo yeSondlo eHlanganisiweyo
INkqubo eYondelelanisiweyo yOkudla okunesondlo
INkqubo eManyanisiweyo yeSondlo 
Inkqubo eManyanisiweyo yeZondlo
INkqubo eYondelelanisiweyo yOkudla okunesondlo
INkqubo eManyanisiweyo yeSondlo 
Inkqubo eManyanisiweyo yeZondlo
INkqubo yeSondlo eHlanganisiweyo
INkqubo eManyanisiweyo yeSondlo 
Inkqubo eManyanisiweyo yeZondlo
INkqubo yeSondlo eHlanganisiweyo
INkqubo eYondelelanisiweyo yOkudla okunesondlo
Inkqubo eManyanisiweyo yeZondlo
INkqubo yeSondlo eHlanganisiweyo
INkqubo eYondelelanisiweyo yOkudla okunesondlo
INkqubo eManyanisiweyo yeSondlo 
INkqubo yeSondlo eHlanganisiweyo (INP) inenjongo yokuphucula umgangatho wokondleka kwabantu bonke bephondo iNtshona Koloni. 
INkqubo eYondelelanisiweyo yoKondleka koMzimba (INP) ijolise ekuphuculeni izinga lokudla okunesondlo labo bonke abanti abahlala kwiphondo leNtshona Koloni.
INkqubo eManyanisiweyo yeSondlo (INP) ijolise ekuphuculeni izinga lesondlo sabantu bebonke abahlala kwiphondo laseNtshona Koloni. 
Inkqubo eManyanisiweyo yeZondlo (i-INP) inenjongo yokuphucula isimo sezondlo zabo bonke abahlala kwiphondo laseNtshona Koloni.
INkqubo eYondelelanisiweyo yoKondleka koMzimba (INP) ijolise ekuphuculeni izinga lokudla okunesondlo labo bonke abanti abahlala kwiphondo leNtshona Koloni.
INkqubo eManyanisiweyo yeSondlo (INP) ijolise ekuphuculeni izinga lesondlo sabantu bebonke abahlala kwiphondo laseNtshona Koloni. 
Inkqubo eManyanisiweyo yeZondlo (i-INP) inenjongo yokuphucula isimo sezondlo zabo bonke abahlala kwiphondo laseNtshona Koloni.
INkqubo yeSondlo eHlanganisiweyo (INP) inenjongo yokuphucula umgangatho wokondleka kwabantu bonke bephondo iNtshona Koloni. 
INkqubo eManyanisiweyo yeSondlo (INP) ijolise ekuphuculeni izinga lesondlo sabantu bebonke abahlala kwiphondo laseNtshona Koloni. 
Inkqubo eManyanisiweyo yeZondlo (i-INP) inenjongo yokuphucula isimo sezondlo zabo bonke abahlala kwiphondo laseNtshona Koloni.
INkqubo yeSondlo eHlanganisiweyo (INP) inenjongo yokuphucula umgangatho wokondleka kwabantu bonke bephondo iNtshona Koloni. 
INkqubo eYondelelanisiweyo yoKondleka koMzimba (INP) ijolise ekuphuculeni izinga lokudla okunesondlo labo bonke abanti abahlala kwiphondo leNtshona Koloni.
Inkqubo eManyanisiweyo yeZondlo (i-INP) inenjongo yokuphucula isimo sezondlo zabo bonke abahlala kwiphondo laseNtshona Koloni.
INkqubo yeSondlo eHlanganisiweyo (INP) inenjongo yokuphucula umgangatho wokondleka kwabantu bonke bephondo iNtshona Koloni. 
INkqubo eYondelelanisiweyo yoKondleka koMzimba (INP) ijolise ekuphuculeni izinga lokudla okunesondlo labo bonke abanti abahlala kwiphondo leNtshona Koloni.
INkqubo eManyanisiweyo yeSondlo (INP) ijolise ekuphuculeni izinga lesondlo sabantu bebonke abahlala kwiphondo laseNtshona Koloni. 
Mininzi imibandela ejongene nale nkqubo. 
Iliqela imiba ephathelene nale nkqubo.
Mininzi imiba ekule nkqubo.
Iliqela imiba ebandakanyeka kule nkqubo.
Iliqela imiba ephathelene nale nkqubo.
Mininzi imiba ekule nkqubo.
Iliqela imiba ebandakanyeka kule nkqubo.
Mininzi imibandela ejongene nale nkqubo. 
Mininzi imiba ekule nkqubo.
Iliqela imiba ebandakanyeka kule nkqubo.
Mininzi imibandela ejongene nale nkqubo. 
Iliqela imiba ephathelene nale nkqubo.
Iliqela imiba ebandakanyeka kule nkqubo.
Mininzi imibandela ejongene nale nkqubo. 
Iliqela imiba ephathelene nale nkqubo.
Mininzi imiba ekule nkqubo.
Kuyintoni ukungondleki?
Kukuthini ukungondleki?
Yintoni ukungondleki komzimba?
Yintoni ukungondleki kakuhle?
Kukuthini ukungondleki?
Yintoni ukungondleki komzimba?
Yintoni ukungondleki kakuhle?
Kuyintoni ukungondleki?
Yintoni ukungondleki komzimba?
Yintoni ukungondleki kakuhle?
Kuyintoni ukungondleki?
Kukuthini ukungondleki?
Yintoni ukungondleki kakuhle?
Kuyintoni ukungondleki?
Kukuthini ukungondleki?
Yintoni ukungondleki komzimba?
Ukungondleki yingxaki exhomisa amehlo eMzantsi Afrika kwaye kuyenye yezona zinto zinkulu nezinegalelo kwingulo yeentsana kwanokufa kwazo.
Ukungondleki yingxaki embi kakhulu eMzantsi Afrika kwaye yenye yamagalelo aphambili lezigulo nokufa kwabantwana abancinci.
Ukungondleki komzimba yingxaki enkulu eMzantsi Afrika futhi ikwayinxenye enkulu ekuguleni kwabantwana nokufa.
Ukungondleki kakuhle yingxaki exhalabisayo eMzantsi Afrika kwaye ngomnye woonobangela abakhulu kakhulu bokugula nokufa kwibanga lobuntwana.
Ukungondleki yingxaki embi kakhulu eMzantsi Afrika kwaye yenye yamagalelo aphambili lezigulo nokufa kwabantwana abancinci.
Ukungondleki komzimba yingxaki enkulu eMzantsi Afrika futhi ikwayinxenye enkulu ekuguleni kwabantwana nokufa.
Ukungondleki kakuhle yingxaki exhalabisayo eMzantsi Afrika kwaye ngomnye woonobangela abakhulu kakhulu bokugula nokufa kwibanga lobuntwana.
Ukungondleki yingxaki exhomisa amehlo eMzantsi Afrika kwaye kuyenye yezona zinto zinkulu nezinegalelo kwingulo yeentsana kwanokufa kwazo.
Ukungondleki komzimba yingxaki enkulu eMzantsi Afrika futhi ikwayinxenye enkulu ekuguleni kwabantwana nokufa.
Ukungondleki kakuhle yingxaki exhalabisayo eMzantsi Afrika kwaye ngomnye woonobangela abakhulu kakhulu bokugula nokufa kwibanga lobuntwana.
Ukungondleki yingxaki exhomisa amehlo eMzantsi Afrika kwaye kuyenye yezona zinto zinkulu nezinegalelo kwingulo yeentsana kwanokufa kwazo.
Ukungondleki yingxaki embi kakhulu eMzantsi Afrika kwaye yenye yamagalelo aphambili lezigulo nokufa kwabantwana abancinci.
Ukungondleki kakuhle yingxaki exhalabisayo eMzantsi Afrika kwaye ngomnye woonobangela abakhulu kakhulu bokugula nokufa kwibanga lobuntwana.
Ukungondleki yingxaki exhomisa amehlo eMzantsi Afrika kwaye kuyenye yezona zinto zinkulu nezinegalelo kwingulo yeentsana kwanokufa kwazo.
Ukungondleki yingxaki embi kakhulu eMzantsi Afrika kwaye yenye yamagalelo aphambili lezigulo nokufa kwabantwana abancinci.
Ukungondleki komzimba yingxaki enkulu eMzantsi Afrika futhi ikwayinxenye enkulu ekuguleni kwabantwana nokufa.
Kuqikelelwa ukuba malunga ne-30% yabantwana boMzantsi Afrika ukukhula kwabo kuthintelwa kukunqongophala kwesondlo esaneleyo eminyakeni yokuqala yobomi babo.
Kuqikelelwa kwelokuba ama-30% wabantwana basemZantsi Afrika bathityazwa kukunqongophala kokudla okunesondlo kwiminyaka yabo yokuqala yobomi babo.
Kuqikelelwa kuma-30% abantwana baseMzantsi Afrika ababonisa ukunqongophala kokondliwa ngokwaneleyo kwiminyaka yabo yokuqala ebomini babo.
Kuqikeleleka ukuba malunga nabantwana abayi 30% baseMzantsi Afrika banqaphele ngenxa yokungabikho kwezondlo kwiminyaka yokuqala yobomi babo.
Kuqikelelwa kwelokuba ama-30% wabantwana basemZantsi Afrika bathityazwa kukunqongophala kokudla okunesondlo kwiminyaka yabo yokuqala yobomi babo.
Kuqikelelwa kuma-30% abantwana baseMzantsi Afrika ababonisa ukunqongophala kokondliwa ngokwaneleyo kwiminyaka yabo yokuqala ebomini babo.
Kuqikeleleka ukuba malunga nabantwana abayi 30% baseMzantsi Afrika banqaphele ngenxa yokungabikho kwezondlo kwiminyaka yokuqala yobomi babo.
Kuqikelelwa ukuba malunga ne-30% yabantwana boMzantsi Afrika ukukhula kwabo kuthintelwa kukunqongophala kwesondlo esaneleyo eminyakeni yokuqala yobomi babo.
Kuqikelelwa kuma-30% abantwana baseMzantsi Afrika ababonisa ukunqongophala kokondliwa ngokwaneleyo kwiminyaka yabo yokuqala ebomini babo.
Kuqikeleleka ukuba malunga nabantwana abayi 30% baseMzantsi Afrika banqaphele ngenxa yokungabikho kwezondlo kwiminyaka yokuqala yobomi babo.
Kuqikelelwa ukuba malunga ne-30% yabantwana boMzantsi Afrika ukukhula kwabo kuthintelwa kukunqongophala kwesondlo esaneleyo eminyakeni yokuqala yobomi babo.
Kuqikelelwa kwelokuba ama-30% wabantwana basemZantsi Afrika bathityazwa kukunqongophala kokudla okunesondlo kwiminyaka yabo yokuqala yobomi babo.
Kuqikeleleka ukuba malunga nabantwana abayi 30% baseMzantsi Afrika banqaphele ngenxa yokungabikho kwezondlo kwiminyaka yokuqala yobomi babo.
Kuqikelelwa ukuba malunga ne-30% yabantwana boMzantsi Afrika ukukhula kwabo kuthintelwa kukunqongophala kwesondlo esaneleyo eminyakeni yokuqala yobomi babo.
Kuqikelelwa kwelokuba ama-30% wabantwana basemZantsi Afrika bathityazwa kukunqongophala kokudla okunesondlo kwiminyaka yabo yokuqala yobomi babo.
Kuqikelelwa kuma-30% abantwana baseMzantsi Afrika ababonisa ukunqongophala kokondliwa ngokwaneleyo kwiminyaka yabo yokuqala ebomini babo.
Ukutya ngokunganelisekiyo, ukugula noxinzelelo/nomenzakalo wengqondo kwezentlalo ngabona nobangela bakufutshane nabacacileyo bokungondleki.   
Ukungafumani ukudlala ngokwanelelyo, izigulo kwanokubikho kozinzo/ukuphatheka kakubi ngokwasengqondweni zezona zizathu ziphambili ezibangela ukungondleki.
Ukutya okunganelanga, ukugula nokudakumba kwasengqondweni nasentlalweni/ukwenzakala ngoonobangela abakhulu bokungondleki bomzimba
Ukufumana ukutya okungalingenanga, ukugula nodandatheko ngokokuziphatha-ngokwentlalo/ukwenzakala zezona zizathu zibabaluleke kakhulu ezikhawuleza zibangele ukungondleki kakuhle. 
Ukungafumani ukudlala ngokwanelelyo, izigulo kwanokubikho kozinzo/ukuphatheka kakubi ngokwasengqondweni zezona zizathu ziphambili ezibangela ukungondleki.
Ukutya okunganelanga, ukugula nokudakumba kwasengqondweni nasentlalweni/ukwenzakala ngoonobangela abakhulu bokungondleki bomzimba

Ubuhlwempu nokunqongophala kwezibonelelo zizinto ezisisiseko nezinegalelo kuko ukungondleki.
Intlupheko nokunqongophala kweziseko zoncedo zezona mbangi zokuqala ezinegalelo kumba wokungondleki.
Indlala nokunqongophala koovimba yimiba esisiseko enegalelo kukungondleki komzimba.
Intswelo nokungabi namithombo yoncedo yimibandela esisiseko enegalelo kwimeko yokungondleki kakuhle.

INkqubo yeSondlo eHlanganisiweyo iyazama ukuhlangabezana nale ndyikityha ibulalayo nethuleyo ngeendlela ezininzi.
i-INP izama ukuhlangabezana ngeendlela ngeendlela nale nalo bhubhane ungakhawulezi uqapheleke.
I-NIP izama ukujongana nesi sifo esithe cwaka ngendlela ezininzi. 
I-INP iyazama ukuhlangabeza lo bhubhane othe cwaka ngeendlela ezininzi.

Izongezo zezondlo zabantwana
Izongezo ezifanele abantwana
Iisaplimenti zabantwana
Izongezo zabantwana
Kwinqanaba lokuqala lokunonophelwa kwezempilo abantwana abaxilongwayo baze bafunyaniswe bengondlekanga (oku kuquka abantwana nabantu abadala abanentsholongwane kaGawulayo kunye nesifo semiphunga) bakunikwa ukutya okusisongezo okuquka umgubo wombona owomelezayo nesiselo esibandayo esinika amandla.
Kwizinga lonakekelo lwempilo lokuqala abantwana bahlolwa baze bathathwe njengabangondlekanga (oku kuquka abantwana nabantu abadala abanentsholongwane kaGawulayo kwanabanesifo sephepha) bazakunikwa iisaplimenti zokudla kuquka umgubo wombona onezakhamzimba kunye neziselo ezinika amandla.
Kumgangatho wokuqala wenkathalelo yempilo abantwana abaxilongiweyo kwaze kwafunyaniswa ukuba abondlekanga (oku kuquka abantwana nabantu abadala abanesifo se-HIV nesephepha) baya kunikwa izongezelelo zokutya ukuquka isidlo sombona esomeleziweyo kunye nesiselo esinikeza amandla amakhulu.
Kwinqanaba lokhathalelo lwasekuqaleni lwempilo abantwana abaxilongwa baze bachongwe njengabalambathayo ngezondlo (oku kuquka abantwana nabantu abadala abanentsholongwane yeHIV nabanesifo sephepha) baya kunikwa izongezo zokutya kuquka umgubo wombona oxhotyisiweyo nesiselo samandla aphezulu.
Kwizinga lonakekelo lwempilo lokuqala abantwana bahlolwa baze bathathwe njengabangondlekanga (oku kuquka abantwana nabantu abadala abanentsholongwane kaGawulayo kwanabanesifo sephepha) bazakunikwa iisaplimenti zokudla kuquka umgubo wombona onezakhamzimba kunye neziselo ezinika amandla.

Izongezo zinikwa abaxumi abachongiweyo ngokweenqobo ezilungileyo.
Iisaplimenti zinikwa abaxumi ababaluliweyo ngokwemigaqo.
Izongezelelo zinikezelwa kubaxhasi abaphawuliweyo ngokwamanqanaba.
Izongezo zokutya zinikwa abaxumi abachongwe ngokwemiqathango.
Iisaplimenti zinikwa abaxumi ababaluliweyo ngokwemigaqo.
Izongezelelo zinikezelwa kubaxhasi abaphawuliweyo ngokwamanqanaba.
Izongezo zokutya zinikwa abaxumi abachongwe ngokwemiqathango.
Izongezo zinikwa abaxumi abachongiweyo ngokweenqobo ezilungileyo.
Izongezelelo zinikezelwa kubaxhasi abaphawuliweyo ngokwamanqanaba.
Izongezo zokutya zinikwa abaxumi abachongwe ngokwemiqathango.
Izongezo zinikwa abaxumi abachongiweyo ngokweenqobo ezilungileyo.
Iisaplimenti zinikwa abaxumi ababaluliweyo ngokwemigaqo.
Izongezo zokutya zinikwa abaxumi abachongwe ngokwemiqathango.
Izongezo zinikwa abaxumi abachongiweyo ngokweenqobo ezilungileyo.
Iisaplimenti zinikwa abaxumi ababaluliweyo ngokwemigaqo.
Izongezelelo zinikezelwa kubaxhasi abaphawuliweyo ngokwamanqanaba.
Abanonopheli kwezempilo bakwanceda nangeengcebiso, ngolwazi, ngeemfundiso ngezidlo ezinika impilo nangezona ndlela zinika impilo zokulungiswa kokutya. 
Abezempilo bakwabonelela ngengcebiso, iinkcukacha kunye nokufundiswa ngokutya okusempilweni kwaneendlela ezisempilweni zokupheka nokulungisa ukutya.
Abasebenzi bezempilo bakwanikezela noncedo, ulwazi nemfundiso malunga nezidlo ezinempilo kwakunye nezona ndlela ezisempilweni zokwenza ukutya.
Abasebenzi becandelo lempilo baphinda banikele ngodliwano-ndlebe lwamacebiso, ngeenkcukacha nangemfundo malunga nezintlu zezidlo ezinempilo kunye neendlela ezizezona zinempilo zokulungisa ukutya.
Abezempilo bakwabonelela ngengcebiso, iinkcukacha kunye nokufundiswa ngokutya okusempilweni kwaneendlela ezisempilweni zokupheka nokulungisa ukutya.
Abasebenzi bezempilo bakwanikezela noncedo, ulwazi nemfundiso malunga nezidlo ezinempilo kwakunye nezona ndlela ezisempilweni zokwenza ukutya.
Abasebenzi becandelo lempilo baphinda banikele ngodliwano-ndlebe lwamacebiso, ngeenkcukacha nangemfundo malunga nezintlu zezidlo ezinempilo kunye neendlela ezizezona zinempilo zokulungisa ukutya.

Iincutshe kwizondlo nazo zibonelela iindawo zabahlali ngeenkonzo ezikhethekileyo.
Iingcali zokutya okusempilweni babonelela ngeenkonzo ezikhethekileyo eluntwini.
Iincutshe kwisondlo bakwanikezela iinkonzo ezizodwa kuluntu jikelele.
Iingcali zezintlu zezidlo zikwanikela ngeenkonzo ezizozodwa eluntwini.
Iingcali zokutya okusempilweni babonelela ngeenkonzo ezikhethekileyo eluntwini.
Iincutshe kwisondlo bakwanikezela iinkonzo ezizodwa kuluntu jikelele.
Iingcali zezintlu zezidlo zikwanikela ngeenkonzo ezizozodwa eluntwini.

Iincutshe kwizondlo nazo zibonelela iindawo zabahlali ngeenkonzo ezikhethekileyo.
Iingcali zokutya okusempilweni babonelela ngeenkonzo ezikhethekileyo eluntwini.
Iingcali zezintlu zezidlo zikwanikela ngeenkonzo ezizozodwa eluntwini.

Iingcali zokutya okusempilweni babonelela ngeenkonzo ezikhethekileyo eluntwini.

Ukuncancisa 
Ukuncancisa ibele
Ukunceda ekulweni ukungondleki ngeminyaka yokuqala yokukhula kwabantwana, abanonopheli kwezempilo bakhuthaza abafazi ukuba nancancise iintsana zabo ngokukhethekileyo zide zibe ndalakanga ngeenyanga ezintandathu kwaye emva koko baqhubeke ngokuzincancisa kusongezwa ngokuziqhelisa ukutya okufanelekileyo okusisongezo, ade umntwana abe mdala kangangeminyaka emibini.  
Ngelizama ukunceda ekulweni nokungondleki ebuntwaneni, abazempilo bakhuthaza amabhinqa ukuba bancancise abantwana babo de kuphele iinyanga ezintandathu ubudala nokuba baqhubeke bencancisa naxa sele abantwana beqaliswa ngokunye ukudla de umntwana abeneminyaka emibini.
Ukunceda ekulweni ukungondleki komzimba ebantwaneni abancinci, abasebenzi bezempilo bakhuthaza amakhosikazi ukuba ancancise abantwana babo ubisi lwebele ukuya kwiinyanga ezintandathu ubudala kuze emva koko baqhubekeke ngokuncancisa ubisi lwebele ukongeza ekuqalisweni kokutya okufanelekileyo okufezekisayo, ade umntwana abeneminyaka emibini.
Ukunceda ngokulwa ukungondleki kakuhle kwibanga lasekuqaleni lobuntwana abasebenzi bezempilo bakhuthaza amabhinqa ukuba ancancise abantwana babo ngaphandle kokukhetha bade babe neenyanga ezintandathu ukuze emva koko kuqhutywe ngokuncancisa ubisi lwebele ngaphezu kokuqaliswa kweentlobo zokutya ezifakelwayo ezifanelekileyo, ade umntwana abe neminyaka emibini. 
Ngelizama ukunceda ekulweni nokungondleki ebuntwaneni, abazempilo bakhuthaza amabhinqa ukuba bancancise abantwana babo de kuphele iinyanga ezintandathu ubudala nokuba baqhubeke bencancisa naxa sele abantwana beqaliswa ngokunye ukudla de umntwana abeneminyaka emibini.
Ukunceda ekulweni ukungondleki komzimba ebantwaneni abancinci, abasebenzi bezempilo bakhuthaza amakhosikazi ukuba ancancise abantwana babo ubisi lwebele ukuya kwiinyanga ezintandathu ubudala kuze emva koko baqhubekeke ngokuncancisa ubisi lwebele ukongeza ekuqalisweni kokutya okufanelekileyo okufezekisayo, ade umntwana abeneminyaka emibini.
Ukunceda ngokulwa ukungondleki kakuhle kwibanga lasekuqaleni lobuntwana abasebenzi bezempilo bakhuthaza amabhinqa ukuba ancancise abantwana babo ngaphandle kokukhetha bade babe neenyanga ezintandathu ukuze emva koko kuqhutywe ngokuncancisa ubisi lwebele ngaphezu kokuqaliswa kweentlobo zokutya ezifakelwayo ezifanelekileyo, ade umntwana abe neminyaka emibini. 
Ukunceda ekulweni ukungondleki ngeminyaka yokuqala yokukhula kwabantwana, abanonopheli kwezempilo bakhuthaza abafazi ukuba nancancise iintsana zabo ngokukhethekileyo zide zibe ndalakanga ngeenyanga ezintandathu kwaye emva koko baqhubeke ngokuzincancisa kusongezwa ngokuziqhelisa ukutya okufanelekileyo okusisongezo, ade umntwana abe mdala kangangeminyaka emibini.  
Ukunceda ekulweni ukungondleki komzimba ebantwaneni abancinci, abasebenzi bezempilo bakhuthaza amakhosikazi ukuba ancancise abantwana babo ubisi lwebele ukuya kwiinyanga ezintandathu ubudala kuze emva koko baqhubekeke ngokuncancisa ubisi lwebele ukongeza ekuqalisweni kokutya okufanelekileyo okufezekisayo, ade umntwana abeneminyaka emibini.
