IZiko lokuBelekisa iVredendal nelo liyiGroote Schuur, omabini aziziBhedlele ezinoBuhlobo kwiiNtsana kweli phondo ngokubhekiselele kwisiQalelo seziBhedlele ezinoBuntu kwiiNtsana.
Isibhedlele saseVredendal kunye neZiko lezoBelekiso laseGroote Schuur ziZibhedlele eZilungiselwe Abantwana apha ephondweni ngokuhambisana nePhulo leziBhedlele lokwenza Imeko iLungele Abantwana.
Isibhedlele i-Vredendal neZiko lokuBeleka e-Groote Schuur zizibhedlele ezineMpatho eNtle Ebantwaneni kwiphondo ngokweNyathelo leSibhedlele esinempatho entle Ebantwaneni.
Isibhedlele saseVredendal neZiko lokuBelekisa laseGroote Schuur ziziBhedlele eziThanda iiNtsana ngokwesiNdululo seziBhedlele ezithanda iiNtsana.

Ukuphononongwa  kokukhula
Ukubekwa esweni kokukhula
Ukubeka iliso ekukhuleni kwabantwana
Uqwalaselo lokukhula
Ukubekwa esweni kokukhula
Ukubeka iliso ekukhuleni kwabantwana
Uqwalaselo lokukhula
Ukuphononongwa  kokukhula
Ukubeka iliso ekukhuleni kwabantwana
Uqwalaselo lokukhula
Ukuphononongwa  kokukhula
Ukubekwa esweni kokukhula
Uqwalaselo lokukhula
Ukuphononongwa  kokukhula
Ukubekwa esweni kokukhula
Ukubeka iliso ekukhuleni kwabantwana
Buyalinganiselwa qho ubunzima babantwana bonke njengenxalenye yenkqubo yokuphononongwa kwendlela yokukhula, isalathiso esifuna iliso elibanzi ekubeni umntwana uyakhula na.
Buthathwa rhoqo ubunzima bomzimba babo bonke abantwana njengenxalenye yenkqubo yokubekwa esweni kokukhula, olulolona phawulungundoqo olubonisa ukuba ingaba umntwana uyakhula kusini na.
Bonke abantwana bafakwa esikalini rhoqo njengenxenye yenkqubo yokubeka iliso ekukhuleni kwabantwana, isalathisi esibuthathaka sokujonga ukuba umntwana uyakhula na. 
Bonke abantwana baveyishwa rhoqo njengenxenye yenkqubo yoqwalaselo lokukhula, isalathisi esichanekileyo sokubonisa ukuba ingaba umntwana uyakhula na.
Buthathwa rhoqo ubunzima bomzimba babo bonke abantwana njengenxalenye yenkqubo yokubekwa esweni kokukhula, olulolona phawulungundoqo olubonisa ukuba ingaba umntwana uyakhula kusini na.
Bonke abantwana bafakwa esikalini rhoqo njengenxenye yenkqubo yokubeka iliso ekukhuleni kwabantwana, isalathisi esibuthathaka sokujonga ukuba umntwana uyakhula na. 
Bonke abantwana baveyishwa rhoqo njengenxenye yenkqubo yoqwalaselo lokukhula, isalathisi esichanekileyo sokubonisa ukuba ingaba umntwana uyakhula na.
Buyalinganiselwa qho ubunzima babantwana bonke njengenxalenye yenkqubo yokuphononongwa kwendlela yokukhula, isalathiso esifuna iliso elibanzi ekubeni umntwana uyakhula na.
Bonke abantwana bafakwa esikalini rhoqo njengenxenye yenkqubo yokubeka iliso ekukhuleni kwabantwana, isalathisi esibuthathaka sokujonga ukuba umntwana uyakhula na. 
Bonke abantwana baveyishwa rhoqo njengenxenye yenkqubo yoqwalaselo lokukhula, isalathisi esichanekileyo sokubonisa ukuba ingaba umntwana uyakhula na.

Umlinganiselo wobunzima uyabhalwa uvele kwiNdlela eya kwiKhadi lezeMpilo.
Ubunzima bomzimba bufakwa kwiKhadi leNdlela eya Empilweni.
Ubunzima bakhe bufakwa kwiKhadi leNdlela eya eMpilweni. 
Ubunzima bomzimba bubhalwa kwiKhadi yeNdlela eya eMpilweni.
Ubunzima bomzimba bufakwa kwiKhadi leNdlela eya Empilweni.
Ubunzima bakhe bufakwa kwiKhadi leNdlela eya eMpilweni. 
Ubunzima bomzimba bubhalwa kwiKhadi yeNdlela eya eMpilweni.
Umlinganiselo wobunzima uyabhalwa uvele kwiNdlela eya kwiKhadi lezeMpilo.
Ubunzima bakhe bufakwa kwiKhadi leNdlela eya eMpilweni. 
Ubunzima bomzimba bubhalwa kwiKhadi yeNdlela eya eMpilweni.

Ubunzima bomzimba bufakwa kwiKhadi leNdlela eya Empilweni.
Ubunzima bomzimba bubhalwa kwiKhadi yeNdlela eya eMpilweni.
Umlinganiselo wobunzima uyabhalwa uvele kwiNdlela eya kwiKhadi lezeMpilo.
Ubunzima bomzimba bufakwa kwiKhadi leNdlela eya Empilweni.
Ubunzima bakhe bufakwa kwiKhadi leNdlela eya eMpilweni. 
Izizathu ezingunobangela wokwehla kobunzima ziyaqwalaselwa ukuze zicace xa  izizifo ezisulelayo, kukunqongophala kokutya  ekhaya nokungahoywa komntwana.
Oonobangela bokwehla kobunzima bomzimba bayaqwalaselwa njengezifo ezosulelayo, ukunqongophala kokudla ekhaya kunye nokungakhathalelwa kwabantwana.
Oonobangela bokwehla emzimbeni bayajongwa abanjengezifo ezosulelayo, ukunqongophala kokutya ekhaya nokungahoywa komntwana.
Kuqwalaselwa nezizathu eziyintsusa yokwehla kobunzima bomzimba ezinjengezifo ezisulelayo, ukunganeli kokutya ekhaya nokungahoywa komntwana. 
Oonobangela bokwehla kobunzima bomzimba bayaqwalaselwa njengezifo ezosulelayo, ukunqongophala kokudla ekhaya kunye nokungakhathalelwa kwabantwana.
Oonobangela bokwehla emzimbeni bayajongwa abanjengezifo ezosulelayo, ukunqongophala kokutya ekhaya nokungahoywa komntwana.

Izizathu ezingunobangela wokwehla kobunzima ziyaqwalaselwa ukuze zicace xa  izizifo ezisulelayo, kukunqongophala kokutya  ekhaya nokungahoywa komntwana.
Oonobangela bokwehla kobunzima bomzimba bayaqwalaselwa njengezifo ezosulelayo, ukunqongophala kokudla ekhaya kunye nokungakhathalelwa kwabantwana.
Oonobangela bokwehla emzimbeni bayajongwa abanjengezifo ezosulelayo, ukunqongophala kokutya ekhaya nokungahoywa komntwana.
Izifo ezisulelayo zidlala indima enkulu kuko ukungondleki kwaye le ngulo iyanyangwa kwinqanaba lokuqala lokunonophelwa kwempilo.  
Izifo ezosulelayo zidlala indima ephambili kwimiba yokungondleki kwaye nezi zigulo zinyangwa kumaziko onyango ekungawokuqala ekuyiwa kuwo.
Izifo ezosulelayo zidlala indima enkulu kwabo bangondlekanga kwaye ezi zigulo zinyangwa kumgangatho wokuqala wenkathalelo yempilo.
Izifo ezisulelayo zinendima enkulu emzimbeni ongondlekanga ngokwaneleyo kanti ezi zigulo zinyangwa kwinqanaba lokhathalelo lwasekuqaleni lwempilo.
Izifo ezosulelayo zidlala indima ephambili kwimiba yokungondleki kwaye nezi zigulo zinyangwa kumaziko onyango ekungawokuqala ekuyiwa kuwo.
Izifo ezosulelayo zidlala indima enkulu kwabo bangondlekanga kwaye ezi zigulo zinyangwa kumgangatho wokuqala wenkathalelo yempilo.
Izifo ezisulelayo zinendima enkulu emzimbeni ongondlekanga ngokwaneleyo kanti ezi zigulo zinyangwa kwinqanaba lokhathalelo lwasekuqaleni lwempilo.
Izifo ezisulelayo zidlala indima enkulu kuko ukungondleki kwaye le ngulo iyanyangwa kwinqanaba lokuqala lokunonophelwa kwempilo.  
Izifo ezosulelayo zidlala indima enkulu kwabo bangondlekanga kwaye ezi zigulo zinyangwa kumgangatho wokuqala wenkathalelo yempilo.
Izifo ezisulelayo zinendima enkulu emzimbeni ongondlekanga ngokwaneleyo kanti ezi zigulo zinyangwa kwinqanaba lokhathalelo lwasekuqaleni lwempilo.
Izifo ezisulelayo zidlala indima enkulu kuko ukungondleki kwaye le ngulo iyanyangwa kwinqanaba lokuqala lokunonophelwa kwempilo.  
Izifo ezosulelayo zidlala indima ephambili kwimiba yokungondleki kwaye nezi zigulo zinyangwa kumaziko onyango ekungawokuqala ekuyiwa kuwo.
Izifo ezisulelayo zinendima enkulu emzimbeni ongondlekanga ngokwaneleyo kanti ezi zigulo zinyangwa kwinqanaba lokhathalelo lwasekuqaleni lwempilo.
Izifo ezisulelayo zidlala indima enkulu kuko ukungondleki kwaye le ngulo iyanyangwa kwinqanaba lokuqala lokunonophelwa kwempilo.  
Izifo ezosulelayo zidlala indima ephambili kwimiba yokungondleki kwaye nezi zigulo zinyangwa kumaziko onyango ekungawokuqala ekuyiwa kuwo.
Izifo ezosulelayo zidlala indima enkulu kwabo bangondlekanga kwaye ezi zigulo zinyangwa kumgangatho wokuqala wenkathalelo yempilo.
Izifo ezibangela urhudo zayamene kakhulu nokungaphucuki kwezempilo kwindalo esingqongileyo (ugutyulo lwelindle nonikezelo lwamanzi) kunye nokungondleki ngokwaneleyo komntwana, nto leyo imbeka esichengeni sorhudo oluxhomisa amehlo nolungapheliyo. 
Isifo sorhudo sayamene kakhulu nokungabikho mgangathweni kwezococeko (ukufumaneka kweenkonzo zogutyulo namanzi) kunye nokudla kweentsana okungenasondlo okanye okungenasondlo ncam, nto leyo elwenza usana lubesesichengeni sokurhuda ngamandla kwaye sirhude ixesha elide.
Isifo sorhudo sinxulumene ikakhulu nokungacoceki kokusingqongileyo (unikezelo lococeko namanzi) nokungondliwa okanye izondlo ezingatshongo khona zosana, nezithi zilwenze lube sesichengeni kurhudo olukhulu noluthatha ixesha elide.
Isifo sorhudo sinxulumene kakhulu nobume obungqonge impilo (ubonelelo lococeko nolwamanzi) kanti ukondleka okunganelanga- okanye okulambathayo kwemveku, okusuka kumenze isisulu sorhudo oluxhalabisayo nolungapheliyo.
Isifo sorhudo sayamene kakhulu nokungabikho mgangathweni kwezococeko (ukufumaneka kweenkonzo zogutyulo namanzi) kunye nokudla kweentsana okungenasondlo okanye okungenasondlo ncam, nto leyo elwenza usana lubesesichengeni sokurhuda ngamandla kwaye sirhude ixesha elide.
Isifo sorhudo sinxulumene ikakhulu nokungacoceki kokusingqongileyo (unikezelo lococeko namanzi) nokungondliwa okanye izondlo ezingatshongo khona zosana, nezithi zilwenze lube sesichengeni kurhudo olukhulu noluthatha ixesha elide.
Isifo sorhudo sinxulumene kakhulu nobume obungqonge impilo (ubonelelo lococeko nolwamanzi) kanti ukondleka okunganelanga- okanye okulambathayo kwemveku, okusuka kumenze isisulu sorhudo oluxhalabisayo nolungapheliyo.
Izifo ezibangela urhudo zayamene kakhulu nokungaphucuki kwezempilo kwindalo esingqongileyo (ugutyulo lwelindle nonikezelo lwamanzi) kunye nokungondleki ngokwaneleyo komntwana, nto leyo imbeka esichengeni sorhudo oluxhomisa amehlo nolungapheliyo. 
Isifo sorhudo sinxulumene ikakhulu nokungacoceki kokusingqongileyo (unikezelo lococeko namanzi) nokungondliwa okanye izondlo ezingatshongo khona zosana, nezithi zilwenze lube sesichengeni kurhudo olukhulu noluthatha ixesha elide.

Isifo sorhudo sayamene kakhulu nokungabikho mgangathweni kwezococeko (ukufumaneka kweenkonzo zogutyulo namanzi) kunye nokudla kweentsana okungenasondlo okanye okungenasondlo ncam, nto leyo elwenza usana lubesesichengeni sokurhuda ngamandla kwaye sirhude ixesha elide.

Ukupheliswa kwentlupheko
Ukudanjiswa kwendlala
Imizi yabantu abathwaxwa bubuhlwempu iyachongwa ukuze ithunyelwe kwenye yeenkqubo zikarhulumente zokususwa kobuhlwempu. 
Amakhaya athwaxwa yindlala abonakala  kwaye athunyelwa kwenye yeenkqubo zikarhulumente zokupheliswa kwentlupheko.
Imizi ethwaxwa yindlala iphawuliwe yaze yagqithiselwa kwezinye zeenkqubo zikarhulumente zokudanjiswa kwendlala.
Amakhaya abethwa yintswelo ayachongwa aze athunyelwe kwenye yeenkqubo zikarhulumente zokugxotha intswelo.

Kuyaxoxwa kumacandelo ngokhuseleko lokutya kweentsapho  kwaye iintsapho ziyabonelelwa ngenkxaso nangolamlo olufanelekileyo.
Ukuhlala kufumaneka kokutya emakhayeni kujongwa kwiinkalo ngeenkalo kuze kubonelelwe ngamanyathelo nenkxaso efanelekileyo.
Ukhuseleko lokutya emizini luqwalaselwa ngokwamacandelo kwaye amanyathelo afanelekileyo nenkxaso ayanikezelwa.
Ubukho bokutya okwaneleyo emakhaya buhlangatyezwa phakathi kwamacandelo kuze kunikelwe ngamalinge ongenelelo afanelekileyo nangenkxaso.

Iisaplimenti zeevithamini
Izongezelelo zeevithamini
Ulawulo lokunqongophala kwezondlo ezisisiseko yeyona nto ifunekayo kule nkonzo. 
Ukulwa nezimo zokushokoxeka kwezakhamzimba kuyinxenye ebalulekileyo yezi nkonzo.
Ukulawula intswelo yesondlo esingephi yinxenye ebalulekileyo yale nkonzo.
Ukulawula unqongophalo lwezondlo zezixa ezincinane yinxenye ebalulekileyo yenkonzo.

Ukulawula unqongophalo lwezondlo zezixa ezincinane yinxenye ebalulekileyo yenkonzo.
Ulawulo lokunqongophala kwezondlo ezisisiseko yeyona nto ifunekayo kule nkonzo. 
Ukulwa nezimo zokushokoxeka kwezakhamzimba kuyinxenye ebalulekileyo yezi nkonzo.
Ukulawula intswelo yesondlo esingephi yinxenye ebalulekileyo yale nkonzo.
Izondlo ezisisiseko zizinto zendalo ezifabane evithamini kunye nezimbiwa, zifumaneka ngemiyinge emincinane ekutyeni kwaye zibaluleke kakhulu ekuyigcineni iphucukile impilo.
Izakhamzimba zizinto ezifumaneka kwindalo njengeevithamini neeminerali, ezifumaneka kwintwana nje yokudla kwaye zibaluleke kakhulu ekugcineni impilo isemgangathweni.
Izondlo ezingephi zizidlo zendalo ezinjengeevithamini neeminerali okanye izimbiwa, nezifumaneka zincinci ekutyeni kwaye zibaluleke kakhulu ekugcineni impilo efanelekileyo.
Izondlo zezixa ezincinane zizinto eziyindalo ezifana neevithamin kunye neetyuwa, ezifumaneka ngezixa ezincinane ekutyeni kanti zibaluleke kakhulu ekulondolozweni kwempilo entle.

INkqubo yeSondlo eHlanganisiweyo ibonelela ngezondlo kweVithamini A kwabo bantwana zijoliswe kubo.
I-INP ibonelela ngeesaplimenti zikaVithamini A kwabo bantwana kujoliswe kubo.
I-INP inikezela izongezelelo zikaVithamini A ebantwaneni ekujoliswe kubo.
I-INP inikela ngenkxaso yeVithamin A ebantwaneni ekujoliswe kubo.

I-INP ibonelela ngeesaplimenti zikaVithamini A kwabo bantwana kujoliswe kubo.
I-INP inikezela izongezelelo zikaVithamini A ebantwaneni ekujoliswe kubo.
Abantwana abanoVithamini A onqongopheleyo bayalahlekelwa bubunzima babo, bayasilela ekukhuleni ngokufanelekieyo kwaye basemngciphekweni wosulelo olunokujika lubabulale. 
Abantwana abanqongophalelwe nguVithamini babacekeceke, bangakwazi ukukhula kakuhle kwaye kuxhaphakile ukuba babenokusuleleka baze basweleke ngenxa yolo suleleko.
Abantwana abanokunqongophala kukaVithamini A abanamizimba mikhulu, abakwazi ukukhula ngendlela efanelekileyo futhi basesichengeni sokufumana izifo ezosulelayo futhi basweleke ngenxa yazo.
Abantwana abangafumani Vithamin A eyaneleyo balahlekelwa bubunzima bomzimba, abakhuli kakuhle kanti baba zizisulu zeentlobo zosuleleko ezisuka zibabulale.

Ukunqongophala kweVithamini A kananjalo konakalisa amehlo kwaye kungomnye woonobangela abaphambili bokuba ziimfama kwabantwana.
Ukunqongophala kukaVithamini A konakalisa amehlo kwaye kusesinye sezizathu eziphambili zokumfameka ebantwaneni.
Ukunqongophala kukaVithamini A kukonakalisa iliso futhi oku kokunye okungunobangela wokungaboni ebantwaneni.
Unqongophalo lweVithamin A luphinda lonakalise iliso kanti lusesinye sezizathu ezisentloko zokungaboni phakathi kwabantwana bethu.
Ukunqongophala kukaVithamini A konakalisa amehlo kwaye kusesinye sezizathu eziphambili zokumfameka ebantwaneni.

Ukunqongophala kukaVithamini A konakalisa amehlo kwaye kusesinye sezizathu eziphambili zokumfameka ebantwaneni.
Ukunqongophala kukaVithamini A kukonakalisa iliso futhi oku kokunye okungunobangela wokungaboni ebantwaneni.
Abantwana abazalwa benomlinganiselo wobunzima ophantsi banikwa ezikaVithamini A izingxobo ezinyibilikayo ezinamayeza, zomeleza isixokelelwano samandla zikwamnceda umntwana ukuze akhule. 
Abantwana abazelwe becekeceke emzimbenibanikwa iipilisi zikaVithamini A, evuselela amajoni omzimba zincedise ekukhuleni komntwana. 
Abantwana abanobunzima obuncinci xa bezalwa banikwa iipilisi zikaVithamini A, nezomeleza amajoni omzimba zikwanceda nophuhliso lokukhula komntwana.
Abantwana abazalwa benobunzima bomzimba obunganeno banikwa iipilisi zeVithamin A, ezomeleza inkqubo yokuzikhusela komzimba zize zincede ngokukhula kokuphuhla komntwana.
Abantwana abazelwe becekeceke emzimbenibanikwa iipilisi zikaVithamini A, evuselela amajoni omzimba zincedise ekukhuleni komntwana. 
Abantwana abanobunzima obuncinci xa bezalwa banikwa iipilisi zikaVithamini A, nezomeleza amajoni omzimba zikwanceda nophuhliso lokukhula komntwana.
Abantwana abazalwa benobunzima bomzimba obunganeno banikwa iipilisi zeVithamin A, ezomeleza inkqubo yokuzikhusela komzimba zize zincede ngokukhula kokuphuhla komntwana.
Abantwana abazalwa benomlinganiselo wobunzima ophantsi banikwa ezikaVithamini A izingxobo ezinyibilikayo ezinamayeza, zomeleza isixokelelwano samandla zikwamnceda umntwana ukuze akhule.

Iintsana eziqalela kwiinyanga ezi-6 ukuya kwezili-11 zinikwa ithamo leVithamini A (100 000 IU) ukuthintela ingulo enzima.
Iintsana ezineenyanga ezi 6-11 banikwa ithamo elinye likaVithamin A (100 000 IU) ngelikhusela izigulo ezimandundu.
Iintsana ezisusela kwiinyanga ezi-6-11 zifumana ithamo elinye likaVithamini A (100 000 IU) ukukhusela ukugula okukhulu.
Iimveku ezineenyanga ezisusela kwezi-6 ukuya kweziyi-11 zinikwa ithamo elinye leVithamin A (100 000 IU) ukuthintela ukugula okunobuzaza.

Iintsana ezisusela kwiinyanga ezi-6-11 zifumana ithamo elinye likaVithamini A (100 000 IU) ukukhusela ukugula okukhulu.

Abantwana abaqalela kwiinyanga ezili-12 ukuya eminyakeni emihlanu yobudala banikwa ithamo elinye le-200 000 IU xa beneenyanga ezili-12 baze banikwe ithamo le-200 000 IU qho emva kweenyanga ezintandathu bade babe badala kangangeminyaka emihlanu.
Abantwana abaneenyanga ezili-12 ukuya kwiminyaka emihlanu ubudala banikwa ithamo elinye le-200 000 IU kwiinyanga ezili-12 kunye nethamo le-200 000 IU qho emva kweenyanga ezintandathu de babe neminyaka emihlanu ubudala.
Abantwana ukususela kwiinyanga ezili-12 ukuya kwiminyaka emihlanu banikwa ithamo elinye le-200 000 IU kwiinyanga ezili-12 kunye nethamo le-200 000 IU rhoqo kwiinyanga ezintandathu de babe neminyaka emihlanu ubudala.
Abantwana abaneenyanga ezili-12 ukuya kwabaneminyaka emihlanu ubudala banikwa ithamo elinye le-200 000 IU kwiinyanga eziyi-12 emva koko ibe lithamo le-200 000 IU qho kwiinyanga ezintandathu bade babe neminyaka emihlanu ubudala.
Abantwana abaneenyanga ezili-12 ukuya kwiminyaka emihlanu ubudala banikwa ithamo elinye le-200 000 IU kwiinyanga ezili-12 kunye nethamo le-200 000 IU qho emva kweenyanga ezintandathu de babe neminyaka emihlanu ubudala.

Amathamo ongeziweyo kaVithamini A anikwa abantwana abangondlekanga ngendlela eyoyikekayo, okanye abasoloko benezifo ezisulelayo ezifana norhudo, uqilikwana okanye usulelo lwentsholongwane  kaGawulayo.
Amanye amathamo kaVithamini A anikwa abantwana abangondlekanga kakhulu, okanye abahlutshwa zizifo ezosulelayo ezingapheliyo njengorhudo, imasisi okanye usuleleko lwentsholongwane kaGawulayo.
Amathamo awongeziweyo kaVithamini A ayanikezelwa ebantwaneni abangondlekanga kakhulu, okanye abanezifo ezingapheliyo ezosulelayo ezinjengorhudo, imasisi nokosuleleka yintsholongwana kaGawulayo i-HIV. 
Amathamo ongezelelweyo eVithamin A anikwa abantwana abangondlekanga ngokuxhalabisayo, okanye abakholisa ukuba nezifo ezisulelayo ezifana norhudo, imasisi okanye usulelo lwentsholongwane yeHIV.
Amanye amathamo kaVithamini A anikwa abantwana abangondlekanga kakhulu, okanye abahlutshwa zizifo ezosulelayo ezingapheliyo njengorhudo, imasisi okanye usuleleko lwentsholongwane kaGawulayo.

Ukukhupha iintshulube
Ukukhutshwa   kweentshulube
Ukukhutshwa kweentshulube
Ukukhupha iintshulube
Ukukhutshwa   kweentshulube
Ukukhutshwa kweentshulube
Ukukhutshwa kweentshulube emzimbeni
Ukwehla komlinganiselo wobunzima ebantwaneni kungabangelwa bubukho beentsholongwane kwaye oku kunganyangwa yiklinikhi ngamayeza okukhupha iintshulube. 
Ukulahlekelwa ngumzimba kusenokubangelwa ziintshulube kwaye oku kusenokunyangwa ekliniki ngamayeza okukhupha iintshulube.
Ukwehla ngokwasemzimbeni ebantwaneni kungenziwa kukuhlaselwa ziintshulube kwaye oku kunganyangwa eklinikhi ngamayeza okukhupha iintshulube.
Ukulahlekelwa bubunzima bomzimba ebantwaneni busenokubangelwa luhlaselo lweentshulube kanti oku kunokunyangwa eklinikhi ngeyeza lokukhupha iintshulube.
Ukulahlekelwa ngumzimba kusenokubangelwa ziintshulube kwaye oku kusenokunyangwa ekliniki ngamayeza okukhupha iintshulube.
Ukwehla ngokwasemzimbeni ebantwaneni kungenziwa kukuhlaselwa ziintshulube kwaye oku kunganyangwa eklinikhi ngamayeza okukhupha iintshulube.

Iingcebiso ngesondlo kusenzelwa iimeko ezikhethekileyo
Iingcebiso ngokudla okunesondlo kwiimeko ezithile
Iingcebiso zezidlo kwiimeko ezithile
Amacebiso ngezondlo malunga neemeko ezithile 
Iingcebiso ngokudla okunesondlo kwiimeko ezithile
Iingcebiso zezidlo kwiimeko ezithile
Amacebiso ngezondlo malunga neemeko ezithile 
Iingcebiso ngesondlo kusenzelwa iimeko ezikhethekileyo
Iingcebiso zezidlo kwiimeko ezithile
Amacebiso ngezondlo malunga neemeko ezithile 
Iingcebiso ngesondlo kusenzelwa iimeko ezikhethekileyo
Iingcebiso ngokudla okunesondlo kwiimeko ezithile
Amacebiso ngezondlo malunga neemeko ezithile 
Iingcebiso ngesondlo kusenzelwa iimeko ezikhethekileyo
Iingcebiso ngokudla okunesondlo kwiimeko ezithile
Iingcebiso zezidlo kwiimeko ezithile
Izifundo ngesondlo, ngolwazi nangeengcebiso zinikezelwa kumkanqanaba onke okunonophela abantu ababekhe bashwabana, abanengxaki 
Ukufundiswa ngokudla okunesondlo, iinkcukacha kunye neengcebiso kuyanikezelwa ngazo kuwo onke amanqanaba onakekelo lwempilo ebantwini abayebabanesifo sokufa icala, abanoxinzelelo oluphezulo lwentliziyo, abanehayi-hayi, abanesifo seswekile, abane-HIV/AIDS nabanesifo sephepha.
Imfundiso ngezidlo, ulwazi neengcebiso ziyanikezelwa kwimigangatho iyonke yenkathalelo yabantu abathe banesifo sokushwabana okanye isitrowuku, igazi eliphezulu, uxinzelelo lwegazi oluphezulu, isifo seswekile, i-HIV/AIDS kunye nesifo sephepha.
Imfundo ngezondlo, inkcukacha nodliwano-ndlebe lwamacebiso kuwo onke amanqanaba okhathalelo lwabantu abakhe baphathwa sisitrowukhu, abanoxinzelelo oluphezulu lwegazi, isifo seswekile, iHIV/AIDS neSifo sePhepha.
Ukufundiswa ngokudla okunesondlo, iinkcukacha kunye neengcebiso kuyanikezelwa ngazo kuwo onke amanqanaba onakekelo lwempilo ebantwini abayebabanesifo sokufa icala, abanoxinzelelo oluphezulo lwentliziyo, abanehayi-hayi, abanesifo seswekile, abane-HIV/AIDS nabanesifo sephepha.
Imfundiso ngezidlo, ulwazi neengcebiso ziyanikezelwa kwimigangatho iyonke yenkathalelo yabantu abathe banesifo sokushwabana okanye isitrowuku, igazi eliphezulu, uxinzelelo lwegazi oluphezulu, isifo seswekile, i-HIV/AIDS kunye nesifo sephepha.
Imfundo ngezondlo, inkcukacha nodliwano-ndlebe lwamacebiso kuwo onke amanqanaba okhathalelo lwabantu abakhe baphathwa sisitrowukhu, abanoxinzelelo oluphezulu lwegazi, isifo seswekile, iHIV/AIDS neSifo sePhepha.
Izifundo ngesondlo, ngolwazi nangeengcebiso zinikezelwa kumkanqanaba onke okunonophela abantu ababekhe bashwabana, abanengxaki

Eyesikolo samabanga abaqalayo inkqubo yesondlo 
Inkqubo yokondliwa kwabantwana ezikolweni zamabanga aphantsi
Inkqubo yesondlo kwizikolo zamabanga aphantsi
Inkqubo yezondlo yezikolo zamabanga aphantsi
Inkqubo yokondliwa kwabantwana ezikolweni zamabanga aphantsi
Inkqubo yesondlo kwizikolo zamabanga aphantsi
Inkqubo yezondlo yezikolo zamabanga aphantsi
Eyesikolo samabanga abaqalayo inkqubo yesondlo 
Inkqubo yesondlo kwizikolo zamabanga aphantsi
Inkqubo yezondlo yezikolo zamabanga aphantsi
Eyesikolo samabanga abaqalayo inkqubo yesondlo 
Inkqubo yokondliwa kwabantwana ezikolweni zamabanga aphantsi
Inkqubo yezondlo yezikolo zamabanga aphantsi
Eyesikolo samabanga abaqalayo inkqubo yesondlo 
Inkqubo yokondliwa kwabantwana ezikolweni zamabanga aphantsi
Inkqubo yesondlo kwizikolo zamabanga aphantsi
EyesiKolo sabaQalayo iNkqubo yeSondlo iyafumaneka kwizikolo ezikhethekileyo nezichongelwe izikolo ezingaluhoyanga uqoqosho. 
INkqubo yoKondliwa kwabantwana eZikolweni zamaBanga asezantsi ikhona kwizikolo ezibalulwe njengezichaphazelekayo ngokwezoqoqosho.
INkqubo yeSondlo kwiZikolo zamaBanga aPhantsi kwizikolo ezizodwa ezithe zaphawulwa  ezinoqoqosho olungephi.
Inkqubo yezondlo yezikolo zamabanga aphantsi ifumaneka kwizikolo ezithile ezichongiweyo ezinoqoqosho olunganeno.
INkqubo yoKondliwa kwabantwana eZikolweni zamaBanga asezantsi ikhona kwizikolo ezibalulwe njengezichaphazelekayo ngokwezoqoqosho.
INkqubo yeSondlo kwiZikolo zamaBanga aPhantsi kwizikolo ezizodwa ezithe zaphawulwa  ezinoqoqosho olungephi.
Inkqubo yezondlo yezikolo zamabanga aphantsi ifumaneka kwizikolo ezithile ezichongiweyo ezinoqoqosho olunganeno.
EyesiKolo sabaQalayo iNkqubo yeSondlo iyafumaneka kwizikolo ezikhethekileyo nezichongelwe izikolo ezingaluhoyanga uqoqosho. 
INkqubo yeSondlo kwiZikolo zamaBanga aPhantsi kwizikolo ezizodwa ezithe zaphawulwa  ezinoqoqosho olungephi.
Inkqubo yezondlo yezikolo zamabanga aphantsi ifumaneka kwizikolo ezithile ezichongiweyo ezinoqoqosho olunganeno.
EyesiKolo sabaQalayo iNkqubo yeSondlo iyafumaneka kwizikolo ezikhethekileyo nezichongelwe izikolo ezingaluhoyanga uqoqosho. 
INkqubo yoKondliwa kwabantwana eZikolweni zamaBanga asezantsi ikhona kwizikolo ezibalulwe njengezichaphazelekayo ngokwezoqoqosho.
Inkqubo yezondlo yezikolo zamabanga aphantsi ifumaneka kwizikolo ezithile ezichongiweyo ezinoqoqosho olunganeno.
EyesiKolo sabaQalayo iNkqubo yeSondlo iyafumaneka kwizikolo ezikhethekileyo nezichongelwe izikolo ezingaluhoyanga uqoqosho. 
INkqubo yoKondliwa kwabantwana eZikolweni zamaBanga asezantsi ikhona kwizikolo ezibalulwe njengezichaphazelekayo ngokwezoqoqosho.
INkqubo yeSondlo kwiZikolo zamaBanga aPhantsi kwizikolo ezizodwa ezithe zaphawulwa  ezinoqoqosho olungephi.
La maphulo ayaqhutywa  kusetyenziswana neSebe lezeMfundo
Ezi nkqubo ngokunje ziqhutywa ngobambiswano neSebe lezeMfundo.
Ezi nkqubo ngokwangoku ziqhutywa ngokusebenzisana neSebe leMfundo.
La malinge olungiselelo ngoku aqhutywa ngokudityanelwa neSebe lezeMfundo.
Ezi nkqubo ngokunje ziqhutywa ngobambiswano neSebe lezeMfundo.
Ezi nkqubo ngokwangoku ziqhutywa ngokusebenzisana neSebe leMfundo.
La malinge olungiselelo ngoku aqhutywa ngokudityanelwa neSebe lezeMfundo.
La maphulo ayaqhutywa  kusetyenziswana neSebe lezeMfundo
Ezi nkqubo ngokwangoku ziqhutywa ngokusebenzisana neSebe leMfundo.
La malinge olungiselelo ngoku aqhutywa ngokudityanelwa neSebe lezeMfundo.
La maphulo ayaqhutywa  kusetyenziswana neSebe lezeMfundo
Ezi nkqubo ngokunje ziqhutywa ngobambiswano neSebe lezeMfundo.
La malinge olungiselelo ngoku aqhutywa ngokudityanelwa neSebe lezeMfundo.
La maphulo ayaqhutywa  kusetyenziswana neSebe lezeMfundo
Ezi nkqubo ngokunje ziqhutywa ngobambiswano neSebe lezeMfundo.
Ezi nkqubo ngokwangoku ziqhutywa ngokusebenzisana neSebe leMfundo.
Urhulumente wephondo unenjongo yokufikelela ebantwaneni abali-125, 000 ezikolweni zabaqalayo ezingama-847 kweli phondo ngo-2004 nenkqubo yokondla ezikolweni.  
Urhulumente wephondo uzimisele ukunceda abantwana abali-125, 000 kwizikolo zamabanga asezantsi ezingama-847 ephondweni liphela ngo-2004 esebenzisa le nkqubo yakhe yokondliwa kwabantwana ezikolweni.
Urhulumente wephondo ujolise ekufikeleleni kubantwana abangama-125, 000 kwizikolo zamabanga aphantsi ezingama-847 kwiphondo ngonyaka ka-2004 ngenkqubo yakhe yokondliwa kwezikolo. 
Urhulumente wephondo unenjongo yokufikelela ebantwaneni abayi-125,000 kwizikolo zamabanga aphantsi eziyi-847 kwiphondo ngo-2004 ngokusebenzisa inkqubo yezondlo yezikolo.
Urhulumente wephondo uzimisele ukunceda abantwana abali-125, 000 kwizikolo zamabanga asezantsi ezingama-847 ephondweni liphela ngo-2004 esebenzisa le nkqubo yakhe yokondliwa kwabantwana ezikolweni.
Urhulumente wephondo ujolise ekufikeleleni kubantwana abangama-125, 000 kwizikolo zamabanga aphantsi ezingama-847 kwiphondo ngonyaka ka-2004 ngenkqubo yakhe yokondliwa kwezikolo. 
Urhulumente wephondo unenjongo yokufikelela ebantwaneni abayi-125,000 kwizikolo zamabanga aphantsi eziyi-847 kwiphondo ngo-2004 ngokusebenzisa inkqubo yezondlo yezikolo.
Urhulumente wephondo unenjongo yokufikelela ebantwaneni abali-125, 000 ezikolweni zabaqalayo ezingama-847 kweli phondo ngo-2004 nenkqubo yokondla ezikolweni.  
Urhulumente wephondo ujolise ekufikeleleni kubantwana abangama-125, 000 kwizikolo zamabanga aphantsi ezingama-847 kwiphondo ngonyaka ka-2004 ngenkqubo yakhe yokondliwa kwezikolo. 
Urhulumente wephondo unenjongo yokufikelela ebantwaneni abayi-125,000 kwizikolo zamabanga aphantsi eziyi-847 kwiphondo ngo-2004 ngokusebenzisa inkqubo yezondlo yezikolo.
Urhulumente wephondo unenjongo yokufikelela ebantwaneni abali-125, 000 ezikolweni zabaqalayo ezingama-847 kweli phondo ngo-2004 nenkqubo yokondla ezikolweni.  
Urhulumente wephondo uzimisele ukunceda abantwana abali-125, 000 kwizikolo zamabanga asezantsi ezingama-847 ephondweni liphela ngo-2004 esebenzisa le nkqubo yakhe yokondliwa kwabantwana ezikolweni.
Urhulumente wephondo unenjongo yokufikelela ebantwaneni abayi-125,000 kwizikolo zamabanga aphantsi eziyi-847 kwiphondo ngo-2004 ngokusebenzisa inkqubo yezondlo yezikolo.
Urhulumente wephondo unenjongo yokufikelela ebantwaneni abali-125, 000 ezikolweni zabaqalayo ezingama-847 kweli phondo ngo-2004 nenkqubo yokondla ezikolweni.  
Urhulumente wephondo uzimisele ukunceda abantwana abali-125, 000 kwizikolo zamabanga asezantsi ezingama-847 ephondweni liphela ngo-2004 esebenzisa le nkqubo yakhe yokondliwa kwabantwana ezikolweni.
Urhulumente wephondo ujolise ekufikeleleni kubantwana abangama-125, 000 kwizikolo zamabanga aphantsi ezingama-847 kwiphondo ngonyaka ka-2004 ngenkqubo yakhe yokondliwa kwezikolo.

Ukutya  okusemazikweni
Ukutya kumaziko

Ukutya  okusemazikweni
Ukufumaneka kokudla kumaziko
Ukutya kumaziko
Ukutya  okusemazikweni
Ukufumaneka kokudla kumaziko
Ukutya kumaziko
INkqubo yeSondlo eHlanganisiweyo ikwanegalelo kunonophelo lwamaziko abaxumi ngezixokelelwano zenkonzo yokutya ukuze kubonelelwe ngesondlo enento yonke.
I-INP ikwafaka isandla kunakekelo lwabaxumi olwenziwa kumaziko kusetyenziswa inkqubo yeenkonzo zokufumaneka ukudla ukuze kubonelelwe ngokudla okunesondlo.
I-INP ikwaphosa igalelo kwinkathalelo yabaxhasi kumaziko kwiinkqubo zenkonzo yokutya kumalungiselelo esidlo esizinzileyo.
I-INP ikwanalo igalelo kukhathalelo lwabaxumi kumaziko ngokusebenzisa iinkqubo zeenkonzo zokutya zolungiselelo lwezondlo ezilungeleleneyo. 
I-INP ikwafaka isandla kunakekelo lwabaxumi olwenziwa kumaziko kusetyenziswa inkqubo yeenkonzo zokufumaneka ukudla ukuze kubonelelwe ngokudla okunesondlo.
I-INP ikwaphosa igalelo kwinkathalelo yabaxhasi kumaziko kwiinkqubo zenkonzo yokutya kumalungiselelo esidlo esizinzileyo.
I-INP ikwanalo igalelo kukhathalelo lwabaxumi kumaziko ngokusebenzisa iinkqubo zeenkonzo zokutya zolungiselelo lwezondlo ezilungeleleneyo. 
INkqubo yeSondlo eHlanganisiweyo ikwanegalelo kunonophelo lwamaziko abaxumi ngezixokelelwano zenkonzo yokutya ukuze kubonelelwe ngesondlo enento yonke.
I-INP ikwaphosa igalelo kwinkathalelo yabaxhasi kumaziko kwiinkqubo zenkonzo yokutya kumalungiselelo esidlo esizinzileyo.
I-INP ikwanalo igalelo kukhathalelo lwabaxumi kumaziko ngokusebenzisa iinkqubo zeenkonzo zokutya zolungiselelo lwezondlo ezilungeleleneyo. 
INkqubo yeSondlo eHlanganisiweyo ikwanegalelo kunonophelo lwamaziko abaxumi ngezixokelelwano zenkonzo yokutya ukuze kubonelelwe ngesondlo enento yonke.
I-INP ikwafaka isandla kunakekelo lwabaxumi olwenziwa kumaziko kusetyenziswa inkqubo yeenkonzo zokufumaneka ukudla ukuze kubonelelwe ngokudla okunesondlo.
I-INP ikwanalo igalelo kukhathalelo lwabaxumi kumaziko ngokusebenzisa iinkqubo zeenkonzo zokutya zolungiselelo lwezondlo ezilungeleleneyo. 
INkqubo yeSondlo eHlanganisiweyo ikwanegalelo kunonophelo lwamaziko abaxumi ngezixokelelwano zenkonzo yokutya ukuze kubonelelwe ngesondlo enento yonke.
I-INP ikwafaka isandla kunakekelo lwabaxumi olwenziwa kumaziko kusetyenziswa inkqubo yeenkonzo zokufumaneka ukudla ukuze kubonelelwe ngokudla okunesondlo.
I-INP ikwaphosa igalelo kwinkathalelo yabaxhasi kumaziko kwiinkqubo zenkonzo yokutya kumalungiselelo esidlo esizinzileyo.

Abaqalayo ukutyelela iklinikhi / isibhedlele ekudluliselwa kuso izigulana okanye isibhedlele esineengcaphephe kwiNzululwazi ngezifo baza kucelwa babhale iinkcukacha ezifunekayo kuxwebhu ukuze isigulana ngasinye sivulelwe eyaso ifayile.
Abantu abeza okokuqala ekliniki/kwisibhedlele sengingqi okanye kwesephondlo bazakucelwa ukuba kugcwaliswe ifomu size isigulane sivulelwe ifayile.
Abatyelela okokuqala eklinikhi/isibhedlele sesibini okanye esiphezulu baya kucelwa ukuba bangcwalise ifomu kuze kuvulwe ifowulda yesigulane eso.
Abaqalayo ukutyelela eklinikhi/esibhedlele bebanga lesibini okanye eliphezulu baya kucelwa ukuba bazalise ifomu kanti kuya kuvulwa ifayili yesigulana.
Abantu abeza okokuqala ekliniki/kwisibhedlele sengingqi okanye kwesephondlo bazakucelwa ukuba kugcwaliswe ifomu size isigulane sivulelwe ifayile.
Abatyelela okokuqala eklinikhi/isibhedlele sesibini okanye esiphezulu baya kucelwa ukuba bangcwalise ifomu kuze kuvulwe ifowulda yesigulane eso.

Fika  nencwadi yakho enguMazisi 
Yiza nencwadi yakho yeSazisi.
Yiza ne-ID yakho.
Yiza nencwadana yakho yeID.
Yiza nencwadi yakho yeSazisi.
Yiza ne-ID yakho.
Yiza nencwadana yakho yeID.
Fika  nencwadi yakho enguMazisi 
Yiza ne-ID yakho.
Yiza nencwadana yakho yeID.
Fika  nencwadi yakho enguMazisi 
Yiza nencwadi yakho yeSazisi.
Yiza nencwadana yakho yeID.
Fika  nencwadi yakho enguMazisi 
Yiza nencwadi yakho yeSazisi.
Yiza ne-ID yakho.
Ileta yokudlulisela evela eklinikhi iza kufuneka xa utyelela esibhedlele.
Kuzakufuneka ileta yokuthunyelwa esibhedlele esuka ekliniki xa usiya esibhedlele.
Incwadi yogqithiselo esuka eklinikhi iya kufuneka xa utyelela esibhedlele.
Kuya kufuneka ileta evela eklinikhi xa undwendwela esibhedlele.
Kuzakufuneka ileta yokuthunyelwa esibhedlele esuka ekliniki xa usiya esibhedlele.
Incwadi yogqithiselo esuka eklinikhi iya kufuneka xa utyelela esibhedlele.
Kuya kufuneka ileta evela eklinikhi xa undwendwela esibhedlele.
Ileta yokudlulisela evela eklinikhi iza kufuneka xa utyelela esibhedlele.
Incwadi yogqithiselo esuka eklinikhi iya kufuneka xa utyelela esibhedlele.
Kuya kufuneka ileta evela eklinikhi xa undwendwela esibhedlele.
Ileta yokudlulisela evela eklinikhi iza kufuneka xa utyelela esibhedlele.
Kuzakufuneka ileta yokuthunyelwa esibhedlele esuka ekliniki xa usiya esibhedlele.
Kuya kufuneka ileta evela eklinikhi xa undwendwela esibhedlele.
Ileta yokudlulisela evela eklinikhi iza kufuneka xa utyelela esibhedlele.
Kuzakufuneka ileta yokuthunyelwa esibhedlele esuka ekliniki xa usiya esibhedlele.
Incwadi yogqithiselo esuka eklinikhi iya kufuneka xa utyelela esibhedlele.
Izibhedlele ziza kucela iphetshana elichaza umvuzo elilelona usandula ukulifumana / elokuhlolwa kwemivuzo elinaba nobumba (IRP5). 
Izibhedlele zizakucela ukuba uzinike incwadi eyingxelo yomvuzo/uhlolo lomvuzo wakho (IRP5).
Izibhedlele ziya kufuna isiqinisekiso somvuzo wakho sakutshanje/uvavanyo lomvuzo (IRP5).
Izibhedlele ziya kukucela isiliphu esisesona sitsha/uhlalutyo lwengeniso (i-IRP5)
Izibhedlele zizakucela ukuba uzinike incwadi eyingxelo yomvuzo/uhlolo lomvuzo wakho (IRP5).
Izibhedlele ziya kufuna isiqinisekiso somvuzo wakho sakutshanje/uvavanyo lomvuzo (IRP5).
Izibhedlele ziya kukucela isiliphu esisesona sitsha/uhlalutyo lwengeniso (i-IRP5)
Izibhedlele ziza kucela iphetshana elichaza umvuzo elilelona usandula ukulifumana / elokuhlolwa kwemivuzo elinaba nobumba (IRP5). 
Izibhedlele ziya kufuna isiqinisekiso somvuzo wakho sakutshanje/uvavanyo lomvuzo (IRP5).
Izibhedlele ziya kukucela isiliphu esisesona sitsha/uhlalutyo lwengeniso (i-IRP5)
Izibhedlele ziza kucela iphetshana elichaza umvuzo elilelona usandula ukulifumana / elokuhlolwa kwemivuzo elinaba nobumba (IRP5). 
Izibhedlele zizakucela ukuba uzinike incwadi eyingxelo yomvuzo/uhlolo lomvuzo wakho (IRP5).
Izibhedlele ziya kukucela isiliphu esisesona sitsha/uhlalutyo lwengeniso (i-IRP5)
Izibhedlele ziza kucela iphetshana elichaza umvuzo elilelona usandula ukulifumana / elokuhlolwa kwemivuzo elinaba nobumba (IRP5). 
Izibhedlele zizakucela ukuba uzinike incwadi eyingxelo yomvuzo/uhlolo lomvuzo wakho (IRP5).
Izibhedlele ziya kufuna isiqinisekiso somvuzo wakho sakutshanje/uvavanyo lomvuzo (IRP5).
Yiza nelakho ikhadi  lesibhedlele xa wawukhe wabhaliswa esibhedlele. 
Yiza nekhadi lakho lasesibhedlele ukuba wawukhe waya kweso sibhedlele.
Yiza nekhadi lakho lasesibhedlele ukuba ubhalisiwe ngaphambili esibhedlele.
Yiza nekhadi yakho yasesibhedlele xa ububhalise esibhedlele kwilixa elingaphambili.
Yiza nekhadi lakho lasesibhedlele ukuba wawukhe waya kweso sibhedlele.
Yiza nekhadi lakho lasesibhedlele ukuba ubhalisiwe ngaphambili esibhedlele.
Yiza nekhadi yakho yasesibhedlele xa ububhalise esibhedlele kwilixa elingaphambili.
Yiza nelakho ikhadi  lesibhedlele xa wawukhe wabhaliswa esibhedlele. 
Yiza nekhadi lakho lasesibhedlele ukuba ubhalisiwe ngaphambili esibhedlele.
Yiza nekhadi yakho yasesibhedlele xa ububhalise esibhedlele kwilixa elingaphambili.
Yiza nelakho ikhadi  lesibhedlele xa wawukhe wabhaliswa esibhedlele. 
Yiza nekhadi lakho lasesibhedlele ukuba wawukhe waya kweso sibhedlele.
Yiza nekhadi yakho yasesibhedlele xa ububhalise esibhedlele kwilixa elingaphambili.
Yiza nelakho ikhadi  lesibhedlele xa wawukhe wabhaliswa esibhedlele. 
Yiza nekhadi lakho lasesibhedlele ukuba wawukhe waya kweso sibhedlele.
Yiza nekhadi lakho lasesibhedlele ukuba ubhalisiwe ngaphambili esibhedlele.

Intetho kaSekela Mphathiswa weMisebenzi kaRhulumente, uMnu. Ntopile Kganyago, iLungu lePalamente, kwitheko lokuqala lokwazisa uluntu ngeNkqubo yesiXeko iTshwane, kwiSakhiwo seyoMzantsi Afrika iBhanki yoLondolozo.
Intetha kaSekela Mphathiswa wezeMisebenzi kaRhulumente, uMnu Ntopile Kganyago, MP, kumsitho wophehlelelo lokuqala eluntwini kwiiNkqubo yesiZikithi sesiXeko saseTshwane, Isakhiwo seBhanki enguVimba oMzantsi Afrika, eTshwane 
Intetho nguSekela Mphathiswa weMisebenzi kaRhulumente, uMnu. Ntopile Kganyago, iLungu lePalamente, kwitheko lokuqala lephulo likarhulumente leNkqubo yoLuntu yeSixeko saseTshwane, kwiSakhiwo seBhanki enguVimba yoMzantsi Afrika
Intetho kaSekela-Mphathiswa weMisebenzi yoLuntu, uMnu. Ntopile Kganyago, iLungu lePalamente, kwitheko lokundululwa okokuqala eluntwini iNkqubo yesiZikithi sesiXeko saseTshwane, kwiSakhiwo seBhanki yeNgeniso, eTshwane
Intetha kaSekela Mphathiswa wezeMisebenzi kaRhulumente, uMnu Ntopile Kganyago, MP, kumsitho wophehlelelo lokuqala eluntwini kwiiNkqubo yesiZikithi sesiXeko saseTshwane, Isakhiwo seBhanki enguVimba oMzantsi Afrika, eTshwane 
Intetho nguSekela Mphathiswa weMisebenzi kaRhulumente, uMnu. Ntopile Kganyago, iLungu lePalamente, kwitheko lokuqala lephulo likarhulumente leNkqubo yoLuntu yeSixeko saseTshwane, kwiSakhiwo seBhanki enguVimba yoMzantsi Afrika
Intetho kaSekela-Mphathiswa weMisebenzi yoLuntu, uMnu. Ntopile Kganyago, iLungu lePalamente, kwitheko lokundululwa okokuqala eluntwini iNkqubo yesiZikithi sesiXeko saseTshwane, kwiSakhiwo seBhanki yeNgeniso, eTshwane
Intetho kaSekela Mphathiswa weMisebenzi kaRhulumente, uMnu. Ntopile Kganyago, iLungu lePalamente, kwitheko lokuqala lokwazisa uluntu ngeNkqubo yesiXeko iTshwane, kwiSakhiwo seyoMzantsi Afrika iBhanki yoLondolozo.
Intetho nguSekela Mphathiswa weMisebenzi kaRhulumente, uMnu. Ntopile Kganyago, iLungu lePalamente, kwitheko lokuqala lephulo likarhulumente leNkqubo yoLuntu yeSixeko saseTshwane, kwiSakhiwo seBhanki enguVimba yoMzantsi Afrika

Lindwendwe ezihloniphekileyo
Isigqibo esathathwa yiKhabhinethi ngo-1997 sokukhuthaza amasebe karhulumente kuzwelonke ukuba enze umbindi wesixeko saseTshwane ikhaya labo lanaphakade, oko kube ngumqondiso wemibono ebalulekileyo; ngelo xesha nangoku.
Isigqibo esithathwe yiKhabhinethi ngo-1997 sokukhuthaza amasebe esizwe karhulumente ukuba enze umbindi-sixeko saseTshwane ubelikhaya labo elisisigxina kubeluphawu lwembono entle; ngoko kwanangoku.
Isigqibo esithatyathwe yiKhabhinethi ngonyaka ka-1997 sokukhuthaza amasebe karhulumente kuZwelonke ekwenzeni umphakathi wesixeko saseTshwane ikhaya lawo elisisigxina yayikukubonisa imbono enkulu; ngoko nangoku.
Isigqibo esenziwa yiKhabhinethi ngo-1997 sokukhuthaza amasebe esizwe karhulumente ukuba enze isizikithi sesixeko saseTshwane ikhaya lawo lesigxina besingumboniso wombono omkhulu; ngoko nangoku.
Isigqibo esithathwe yiKhabhinethi ngo-1997 sokukhuthaza amasebe esizwe karhulumente ukuba enze umbindi-sixeko saseTshwane ubelikhaya labo elisisigxina kubeluphawu lwembono entle; ngoko kwanangoku.
Isigqibo esithatyathwe yiKhabhinethi ngonyaka ka-1997 sokukhuthaza amasebe karhulumente kuZwelonke ekwenzeni umphakathi wesixeko saseTshwane ikhaya lawo elisisigxina yayikukubonisa imbono enkulu; ngoko nangoku.
Isigqibo esenziwa yiKhabhinethi ngo-1997 sokukhuthaza amasebe esizwe karhulumente ukuba enze isizikithi sesixeko saseTshwane ikhaya lawo lesigxina besingumboniso wombono omkhulu; ngoko nangoku.
Isigqibo esathathwa yiKhabhinethi ngo-1997 sokukhuthaza amasebe karhulumente kuzwelonke ukuba enze umbindi wesixeko saseTshwane ikhaya labo lanaphakade, oko kube ngumqondiso wemibono ebalulekileyo; ngelo xesha nangoku.

Isigqibo esathathwa yiKhabhinethi ngo-1997 sokukhuthaza amasebe karhulumente kuzwelonke ukuba enze umbindi wesixeko saseTshwane ikhaya labo lanaphakade, oko kube ngumqondiso wemibono ebalulekileyo; ngelo xesha nangoku.
Isigqibo esithathwe yiKhabhinethi ngo-1997 sokukhuthaza amasebe esizwe karhulumente ukuba enze umbindi-sixeko saseTshwane ubelikhaya labo elisisigxina kubeluphawu lwembono entle; ngoko kwanangoku.
Isigqibo esithatyathwe yiKhabhinethi ngonyaka ka-1997 sokukhuthaza amasebe karhulumente kuZwelonke ekwenzeni umphakathi wesixeko saseTshwane ikhaya lawo elisisigxina yayikukubonisa imbono enkulu; ngoko nangoku.
Isiphumo silicebo elenziwe kakuhle lokudibanisa uhlaziyo lwezixeko zethu kubizo lukarhulumente lokuhlaziywa kwemimandla yeedolophu nezinye iziqalelo zophuhliso lwezinye izithuba, luyilelwe ukuphucula ulawulo lwemimandla yeedolophu kwimithetho yentlalo yabantu abathile newasabelayo amalungelo oluntu, iindawo zobubele, ezophuhliso loqoqosho nokunamathelana koluntu.
Esi siphumo sibe licebo lobuchule lokudibanisa ukuvuselelwa lwezixeko zethu nekhwelo likarhulumente lokuvuselelwa kweedolophu kwanamanye amaphulo okuphuhlisa alungiselelwe ukukhuthaza umoya wokuvuselelwa kweendawo ezisedolophini nto leyo ehambisanayo namalungelo oluntu, iindawo ezilungele ukuhlalwa ngabantu, uphuhliso lwezoqoqosho kunye nokwakha umanyano ngobambiswano loluntu.
Isiphumo sisicwangciso esiyilwe ngenene sokudibanisa ukuhlaziyeka kwezixeko zethu kubizo lukarhulumente lokuhlaziywa kweedolophu kunye namanye amanyathelo ophuhliso lwendawo ayilelwe ukunyusa umgangatho wolawulo lwedolophu oluphendula amalungelo oluntu, iindawo ezifanelekileyo zezilwanyana nezityalo, uphuhliso lwezoqoqosho nokumanyana kwasentlalweni.
Isiphumo sibe sisicwangciso esicwangciselwe kakuhle sokunxulumanisa ukulungiswa ngokutsha kwezixeko zethu ukuya kwisibhengezo ngokuhlaziywa kweendawo ezisezidolophini nezinye izindululo zophuhliso lwezithuba ezinokusetyenziswa eziyilelwe izimvo ezixatyisiweyo zolawulo lweedolophu nezihambelana namalungelo abantu, amakhaya obubele kwiindwendwe, uphuhliso lwezoqoqosho nokubambana entlalweni. 
Esi siphumo sibe licebo lobuchule lokudibanisa ukuvuselelwa lwezixeko zethu nekhwelo likarhulumente lokuvuselelwa kweedolophu kwanamanye amaphulo okuphuhlisa alungiselelwe ukukhuthaza umoya wokuvuselelwa kweendawo ezisedolophini nto leyo ehambisanayo namalungelo oluntu, iindawo ezilungele ukuhlalwa ngabantu, uphuhliso lwezoqoqosho kunye nokwakha umanyano ngobambiswano loluntu.
Isiphumo sisicwangciso esiyilwe ngenene sokudibanisa ukuhlaziyeka kwezixeko zethu kubizo lukarhulumente lokuhlaziywa kweedolophu kunye namanye amanyathelo ophuhliso lwendawo ayilelwe ukunyusa umgangatho wolawulo lwedolophu oluphendula amalungelo oluntu, iindawo ezifanelekileyo zezilwanyana nezityalo, uphuhliso lwezoqoqosho nokumanyana kwasentlalweni.

Isiphumo sisicwangciso esiyilwe ngenene sokudibanisa ukuhlaziyeka kwezixeko zethu kubizo lukarhulumente lokuhlaziywa kweedolophu kunye namanye amanyathelo ophuhliso lwendawo ayilelwe ukunyusa umgangatho wolawulo lwedolophu oluphendula amalungelo oluntu, iindawo ezifanelekileyo zezilwanyana nezityalo, uphuhliso lwezoqoqosho nokumanyana kwasentlalweni.
Namhlanje njengoko siqalisa ukuyiqaphela le mbono, kananjalo sibhiyozela uhambo esiluhambileyo kude kube namhlanje. 
Namhlanje njengokuba zibeka ilitye lokuqala kwesi sivivane sokufezekiswa kwale mbono, sikwabhiyozela umgama esisele siwuhambile ukuza kuthi ga ngoku.
Namhlanje xa siphonononga ingqiqo yalo mbono, sikwabhiyozela uhambo esiluhambileyo kude kube ngoku.
Namhlanje njengoko silahlela ilitye lokuqala ukubonisa ukuwamkela loo mbono, sikwabhiyozela uhambo esilufezileyo kude kube namhla.
Namhlanje njengokuba zibeka ilitye lokuqala kwesi sivivane sokufezekiswa kwale mbono, sikwabhiyozela umgama esisele siwuhambile ukuza kuthi ga ngoku.
Namhlanje xa siphonononga ingqiqo yalo mbono, sikwabhiyozela uhambo esiluhambileyo kude kube ngoku.
Namhlanje njengoko silahlela ilitye lokuqala ukubonisa ukuwamkela loo mbono, sikwabhiyozela uhambo esilufezileyo kude kube namhla.
Namhlanje njengoko siqalisa ukuyiqaphela le mbono, kananjalo sibhiyozela uhambo esiluhambileyo kude kube namhlanje. 
Namhlanje xa siphonononga ingqiqo yalo mbono, sikwabhiyozela uhambo esiluhambileyo kude kube ngoku.
Namhlanje njengoko silahlela ilitye lokuqala ukubonisa ukuwamkela loo mbono, sikwabhiyozela uhambo esilufezileyo kude kube namhla.
Namhlanje njengoko siqalisa ukuyiqaphela le mbono, kananjalo sibhiyozela uhambo esiluhambileyo kude kube namhlanje. 
Namhlanje njengokuba zibeka ilitye lokuqala kwesi sivivane sokufezekiswa kwale mbono, sikwabhiyozela umgama esisele siwuhambile ukuza kuthi ga ngoku.
Namhlanje njengoko silahlela ilitye lokuqala ukubonisa ukuwamkela loo mbono, sikwabhiyozela uhambo esilufezileyo kude kube namhla.
Namhlanje njengoko siqalisa ukuyiqaphela le mbono, kananjalo sibhiyozela uhambo esiluhambileyo kude kube namhlanje. 
Namhlanje njengokuba zibeka ilitye lokuqala kwesi sivivane sokufezekiswa kwale mbono, sikwabhiyozela umgama esisele siwuhambile ukuza kuthi ga ngoku.
Namhlanje xa siphonononga ingqiqo yalo mbono, sikwabhiyozela uhambo esiluhambileyo kude kube ngoku.
Ukubonisana ngokumandla okusoloko kubalulwa ziingxoxo ezinzulu ngeemfuno nangamacebo avulekileyo kumasebe karhulumente, malunga nokubonakalayo okuwangqongileyo, oko akusikhuphanga sonke endleleni ejoliswe kwiimbono zamandulo,  ezo zikukuphuculwa  kwemo esinggongileyo ekusetyenzwa phantsi kwayo  ngamasebe karhulumente kuMbindi wesixeko iTshwane.
Uthethathethwano olumandla ludla ngokubandakanya ziingxoxo-mpikisano ezimalunga nezidingo kwanemimandla amasebe karhulumente anokunyathela phezu kwawo ngokuphathelele kwiindawo ezisingqongileyo akusiphambukisanga sonke ekufezekiseni iinjongo eziphambili, ezikukuphucula iindawo zamasebe karhulumente ekusetyenzelwa kuzo ezikumbindi-sixeko waseTshwane.
Iingcebiso ezimandundu zarhoqo ezihambisana ngengxoxo ezikwanjalo ezimalunga neemfuno nokungokunye okunokwenziwa ngamasebe karhulumente ngokunxulumene nendalo esinggongileyo, oko akusikhuphanga endleleni sisonke kwiinjongo eziphambili zamandulo, oko kukuthi, uphuculo lwendawo yokusebenzela kumasebe karhulumente kumphakathi wesixeko saseTshwane.
Iindibano zokucebisana ezishushu bezikholisa ukuphawuleka kwangeengxoxo-mpikiswano ezikwashushu ngolo hlobo malunga nezidingo nemigaqo enokukhethwa ngamasebe karhulumente ngokuphathelele kubume obungqonge okuphathekayo kwawo okungasiphambukisanga endleleni thina sonke kwiinjongo zamandulo, ezikukuphucula ubume obungqonge ukusebenza kwamasebe karhulumente kwisizikithi sesixeko saseTshwane.
Uthethathethwano olumandla ludla ngokubandakanya ziingxoxo-mpikisano ezimalunga nezidingo kwanemimandla amasebe karhulumente anokunyathela phezu kwawo ngokuphathelele kwiindawo ezisingqongileyo akusiphambukisanga sonke ekufezekiseni iinjongo eziphambili, ezikukuphucula iindawo zamasebe karhulumente ekusetyenzelwa kuzo ezikumbindi-sixeko waseTshwane.
Iingcebiso ezimandundu zarhoqo ezihambisana ngengxoxo ezikwanjalo ezimalunga neemfuno nokungokunye okunokwenziwa ngamasebe karhulumente ngokunxulumene nendalo esinggongileyo, oko akusikhuphanga endleleni sisonke kwiinjongo eziphambili zamandulo, oko kukuthi, uphuculo lwendawo yokusebenzela kumasebe karhulumente kumphakathi wesixeko saseTshwane.
Iindibano zokucebisana ezishushu bezikholisa ukuphawuleka kwangeengxoxo-mpikiswano ezikwashushu ngolo hlobo malunga nezidingo nemigaqo enokukhethwa ngamasebe karhulumente ngokuphathelele kubume obungqonge okuphathekayo kwawo okungasiphambukisanga endleleni thina sonke kwiinjongo zamandulo, ezikukuphucula ubume obungqonge ukusebenza kwamasebe karhulumente kwisizikithi sesixeko saseTshwane.
Ukubonisana ngokumandla okusoloko kubalulwa ziingxoxo ezinzulu ngeemfuno nangamacebo avulekileyo kumasebe karhulumente, malunga nokubonakalayo okuwangqongileyo, oko akusikhuphanga sonke endleleni ejoliswe kwiimbono zamandulo,  ezo zikukuphuculwa  kwemo esinggongileyo ekusetyenzwa phantsi kwayo  ngamasebe karhulumente kuMbindi wesixeko iTshwane.
Iingcebiso ezimandundu zarhoqo ezihambisana ngengxoxo ezikwanjalo ezimalunga neemfuno nokungokunye okunokwenziwa ngamasebe karhulumente ngokunxulumene nendalo esinggongileyo, oko akusikhuphanga endleleni sisonke kwiinjongo eziphambili zamandulo, oko kukuthi, uphuculo lwendawo yokusebenzela kumasebe karhulumente kumphakathi wesixeko saseTshwane.

Iingcebiso ezimandundu zarhoqo ezihambisana ngengxoxo ezikwanjalo ezimalunga neemfuno nokungokunye okunokwenziwa ngamasebe karhulumente ngokunxulumene nendalo esinggongileyo, oko akusikhuphanga endleleni sisonke kwiinjongo eziphambili zamandulo, oko kukuthi, uphuculo lwendawo yokusebenzela kumasebe karhulumente kumphakathi wesixeko saseTshwane.
Kwangelo xesha linye kufuneka sibe negalelo elimiliselweyo siwenze mtsha umbindi wesixeko, sisihlaziye.
Kwangaxeshanye kufuneka sibenegalelo ekuvuselelweni nasekuphuculweni kombindi-sixeko.
Kwangaxeshanye, kukwafuneka siphose igalelo kuhlaziyeko nophuculo lomphakathi wesixeko.
Ngaxeshanye sifanele ukufaka igalelo nxamnye kuhlaziyo nasekulungisweni ngokutsha kwesizikithi sesixeko.
Kwangaxeshanye kufuneka sibenegalelo ekuvuselelweni nasekuphuculweni kombindi-sixeko.
Kwangaxeshanye, kukwafuneka siphose igalelo kuhlaziyeko nophuculo lomphakathi wesixeko.
Ngaxeshanye sifanele ukufaka igalelo nxamnye kuhlaziyo nasekulungisweni ngokutsha kwesizikithi sesixeko.
Kwangelo xesha linye kufuneka sibe negalelo elimiliselweyo siwenze mtsha umbindi wesixeko, sisihlaziye.
Kwangaxeshanye, kukwafuneka siphose igalelo kuhlaziyeko nophuculo lomphakathi wesixeko.
Ngaxeshanye sifanele ukufaka igalelo nxamnye kuhlaziyo nasekulungisweni ngokutsha kwesizikithi sesixeko.
Kwangelo xesha linye kufuneka sibe negalelo elimiliselweyo siwenze mtsha umbindi wesixeko, sisihlaziye.
Kwangaxeshanye kufuneka sibenegalelo ekuvuselelweni nasekuphuculweni kombindi-sixeko.
Ngaxeshanye sifanele ukufaka igalelo nxamnye kuhlaziyo nasekulungisweni ngokutsha kwesizikithi sesixeko.
Kwangelo xesha linye kufuneka sibe negalelo elimiliselweyo siwenze mtsha umbindi wesixeko, sisihlaziye.
Kwangaxeshanye kufuneka sibenegalelo ekuvuselelweni nasekuphuculweni kombindi-sixeko.
Kwangaxeshanye, kukwafuneka siphose igalelo kuhlaziyeko nophuculo lomphakathi wesixeko.
Ezinye iinjongo ezikwabalulekileyo ziquka intshiseko yokutsala utyalomali lweenkampanizabucala, lokuphuhlisa umfuziselo weTshwane njengesixeko esilikomkhulu elibalulekileyo eAfrika nokukhuthazwa kwendlela yokuxhobisa ngoqoqosho lwabamnyama.
Ezinye iinjongo nazo ezibalulekileyo, ziquka ikhwelo lokutsal’ umdla wabatyali becandelo loshishino lwabucala, ukuphucula indlela ejongeka ngayo iTshwane njengesixeko esingundlunkulu kwanesibalulekileyo eAfrika nesikhuthaza uphuhliso lwabantsundu kwezoqoqosho.
Ezinye iinjongo eziphambili ezingenako ukubonwa njengezibaluleke kancinci zibandakanya inkqubo yokudala umtsalane kwinzaliso-mali ngamacandelo abucala, uphuhliso lwenkangeleko yaseTshwane njengekapitali esisixeko esibalulekileyo e-Afrika nokunyusa umgangatho wophuhliso loqoqosho lwabamnyama.
Ezinye iinjongo phofu ezibaluleke kangako nazo ziquka ulangazelelo lokuba nomtsalane kutyalo-mali lwamacandelo abucala, ukuphuhlisa imbonakalo yeTshwane njengesixeko esilikomkhulu leAfrika nokuphuhlisa ukuxhotyiswa kwabamnyama ngoqoqosho.
Ezinye iinjongo nazo ezibalulekileyo, ziquka ikhwelo lokutsal’ umdla wabatyali becandelo loshishino lwabucala, ukuphucula indlela ejongeka ngayo iTshwane njengesixeko esingundlunkulu kwanesibalulekileyo eAfrika nesikhuthaza uphuhliso lwabantsundu kwezoqoqosho.

Ezinye iinjongo eziphambili ezingenako ukubonwa njengezibaluleke kancinci zibandakanya inkqubo yokudala umtsalane kwinzaliso-mali ngamacandelo abucala, uphuhliso lwenkangeleko yaseTshwane njengekapitali esisixeko esibalulekileyo e-Afrika nokunyusa umgangatho wophuhliso loqoqosho lwabamnyama.
Urhulumente ngoyena mnini ubalulekileyo wemihlaba nezakhiwo, kwaye kubatyalimali abaphambili ebomini bezoqoqosho lukarhulumente wemimandla ingakumbi  iJwanasbhege neTshwane  kwiGauteng. 
Urhulumente ngoyena unezakhiwo ezininzi kwanoyena utyalomali uphambilinkwicandelo lezoqoqosho kurhulumente wasekhaya ingakumbi kwiZixeko ezimbaxa zaseRhawutini naseTshwane kwiphondo laseGauteng.
Urhulumente ngumnini omkhulu wemihlaba nezakhiwo kwakunye nomzalisi-mali ophambili kubomi boqoqosho lukarhulumente wengingqi ingakumbi kulawulo lweNqila yaseGoli naseTshwane eGauteng.
URhulumente ngoyena mnini-mpahla mkhulu nongomnye wabatyali-mali abaphambili kubomi boqoqosho bukarhulumente wendawo ngakumbi kwiziPhaluka zeziXeko eziKhulu zaseGoli naseTshwane eGauteng.
Urhulumente ngoyena unezakhiwo ezininzi kwanoyena utyalomali uphambilinkwicandelo lezoqoqosho kurhulumente wasekhaya ingakumbi kwiZixeko ezimbaxa zaseRhawutini naseTshwane kwiphondo laseGauteng.
Urhulumente ngumnini omkhulu wemihlaba nezakhiwo kwakunye nomzalisi-mali ophambili kubomi boqoqosho lukarhulumente wengingqi ingakumbi kulawulo lweNqila yaseGoli naseTshwane eGauteng.

Urhulumente ngoyena unezakhiwo ezininzi kwanoyena utyalomali uphambilinkwicandelo lezoqoqosho kurhulumente wasekhaya ingakumbi kwiZixeko ezimbaxa zaseRhawutini naseTshwane kwiphondo laseGauteng.
Urhulumente ngumnini omkhulu wemihlaba nezakhiwo kwakunye nomzalisi-mali ophambili kubomi boqoqosho lukarhulumente wengingqi ingakumbi kulawulo lweNqila yaseGoli naseTshwane eGauteng.
Amasebe afuna iindawo zokusebenzela neofisi ukuze kubekho iindibano zesinyanzelo sokunikezelwa kweenkonzo  kutsho kuzaliseke amagunya aseburhulumenteni.
Amasebe adinga iindawo ezihlangabezanayo nezidingo nezizakuba zii-ofisi ukuze zikwazi ukuhlangabezana nembopheleleko zokunikezela ngeenkonzo eluntwini nokuze afezekise oko kulindelekileyo.
Amasebe adinga okusebenzayo kwakunye neendawo yee-ofisi ekufezekiseni iimfanelo zonikezelo lweenkonzo eluntwini kuzalisekiso lwamagunya awo.
Amasebe adinga indawo esebenzisekayo ngokunjalo neeofisi ukuze akwazi ukuhlangabeza izibophelelo zawo zokunikela ngeenkonzo zoluntu kwimpumezo yemisebenzi yogunyaziso lwawo.
Amasebe adinga iindawo ezihlangabezanayo nezidingo nezizakuba zii-ofisi ukuze zikwazi ukuhlangabezana nembopheleleko zokunikezela ngeenkonzo eluntwini nokuze afezekise oko kulindelekileyo.
Amasebe adinga okusebenzayo kwakunye neendawo yee-ofisi ekufezekiseni iimfanelo zonikezelo lweenkonzo eluntwini kuzalisekiso lwamagunya awo.
Amasebe adinga indawo esebenzisekayo ngokunjalo neeofisi ukuze akwazi ukuhlangabeza izibophelelo zawo zokunikela ngeenkonzo zoluntu kwimpumezo yemisebenzi yogunyaziso lwawo.
Amasebe afuna iindawo zokusebenzela neofisi ukuze kubekho iindibano zesinyanzelo sokunikezelwa kweenkonzo  kutsho kuzaliseke amagunya aseburhulumenteni.
Amasebe adinga okusebenzayo kwakunye neendawo yee-ofisi ekufezekiseni iimfanelo zonikezelo lweenkonzo eluntwini kuzalisekiso lwamagunya awo.
Amasebe adinga indawo esebenzisekayo ngokunjalo neeofisi ukuze akwazi ukuhlangabeza izibophelelo zawo zokunikela ngeenkonzo zoluntu kwimpumezo yemisebenzi yogunyaziso lwawo.
Amasebe afuna iindawo zokusebenzela neofisi ukuze kubekho iindibano zesinyanzelo sokunikezelwa kweenkonzo  kutsho kuzaliseke amagunya aseburhulumenteni.
Amasebe adinga iindawo ezihlangabezanayo nezidingo nezizakuba zii-ofisi ukuze zikwazi ukuhlangabezana nembopheleleko zokunikezela ngeenkonzo eluntwini nokuze afezekise oko kulindelekileyo.
Amasebe adinga indawo esebenzisekayo ngokunjalo neeofisi ukuze akwazi ukuhlangabeza izibophelelo zawo zokunikela ngeenkonzo zoluntu kwimpumezo yemisebenzi yogunyaziso lwawo.
Amasebe afuna iindawo zokusebenzela neofisi ukuze kubekho iindibano zesinyanzelo sokunikezelwa kweenkonzo  kutsho kuzaliseke amagunya aseburhulumenteni.
Amasebe adinga iindawo ezihlangabezanayo nezidingo nezizakuba zii-ofisi ukuze zikwazi ukuhlangabezana nembopheleleko zokunikezela ngeenkonzo eluntwini nokuze afezekise oko kulindelekileyo.
Amasebe adinga okusebenzayo kwakunye neendawo yee-ofisi ekufezekiseni iimfanelo zonikezelo lweenkonzo eluntwini kuzalisekiso lwamagunya awo.
Yinto eyaziwayo eyokuba inkoliso yezakhiwo zikarhulumente ikwimeko encomekayo nefanelekileyo xa ithelekiswa neyona iphucukileyo ngokwemeko ezikuyo. 
Kuqhelekile ukuba izakhiwo ezininzi zikarhulumente zikwizinga elincomekayo neliphakathi endaweni yokuba zigqwese ngokwenkangeleko.
Lulwazi oluqhelekileyo ukuba uninzi lwezakhiwo zikarhulumente zikwinqanaba lobuhle ukuya ekufanelekeni endaweni yokuba zibalasele ngokobume bazo.
Lulwazi olwaziwa ngabaninzi ukuba inkoliso yezakhiwo zikarhulumente zikuluhlu olulungileyo ukuya kolwamkelekileyo xa kuthelekiswa nokugqibelela ngokweemeko zazo.
Kuqhelekile ukuba izakhiwo ezininzi zikarhulumente zikwizinga elincomekayo neliphakathi endaweni yokuba zigqwese ngokwenkangeleko.
Lulwazi oluqhelekileyo ukuba uninzi lwezakhiwo zikarhulumente zikwinqanaba lobuhle ukuya ekufanelekeni endaweni yokuba zibalasele ngokobume bazo.
Lulwazi olwaziwa ngabaninzi ukuba inkoliso yezakhiwo zikarhulumente zikuluhlu olulungileyo ukuya kolwamkelekileyo xa kuthelekiswa nokugqibelela ngokweemeko zazo.

Lulwazi oluqhelekileyo ukuba uninzi lwezakhiwo zikarhulumente zikwinqanaba lobuhle ukuya ekufanelekeni endaweni yokuba zibalasele ngokobume bazo.
Lulwazi olwaziwa ngabaninzi ukuba inkoliso yezakhiwo zikarhulumente zikuluhlu olulungileyo ukuya kolwamkelekileyo xa kuthelekiswa nokugqibelela ngokweemeko zazo.

Kuqhelekile ukuba izakhiwo ezininzi zikarhulumente zikwizinga elincomekayo neliphakathi endaweni yokuba zigqwese ngokwenkangeleko.
Lulwazi olwaziwa ngabaninzi ukuba inkoliso yezakhiwo zikarhulumente zikuluhlu olulungileyo ukuya kolwamkelekileyo xa kuthelekiswa nokugqibelela ngokweemeko zazo.
Yinto eyaziwayo eyokuba inkoliso yezakhiwo zikarhulumente ikwimeko encomekayo nefanelekileyo xa ithelekiswa neyona iphucukileyo ngokwemeko ezikuyo. 
Kuqhelekile ukuba izakhiwo ezininzi zikarhulumente zikwizinga elincomekayo neliphakathi endaweni yokuba zigqwese ngokwenkangeleko.
Lulwazi oluqhelekileyo ukuba uninzi lwezakhiwo zikarhulumente zikwinqanaba lobuhle ukuya ekufanelekeni endaweni yokuba zibalasele ngokobume bazo.
Ukwakhiwa ngokutsha, ukuphuculwa nokulungiswa kwakuxhokonxa inkcitho ezizixhobo zokuvelisa neziligalelo kwisigaba se-BEE kuMbindi wesiXeko iTshwane.
Uphuculo, ukuhlaziywa kunye nokulungiswa kuzakubasisiqalo sokunyusa iingxowa-mali kwanokufak’ isandla kwicandelo leBEE leProjekthi loMbindi-Sixeko saseTshwane. 
Uhlaziyo, uphuculo nolungiso luya kukhokela inkcitho yekhapitali negalelo kwi-BEE yeProjekthi yomPhakathi weSixeko saseTshwane.
Ukuhlaziya, ukunyusa umgangatho nokulungisa kuya kuba sisiqalo senkcitho futhi kube negalelo kwicandelo leBEE kwiProjekthi yesiZikithi sesiXeko saseTshwane.
Uphuculo, ukuhlaziywa kunye nokulungiswa kuzakubasisiqalo sokunyusa iingxowa-mali kwanokufak’ isandla kwicandelo leBEE leProjekthi loMbindi-Sixeko saseTshwane. 
Uhlaziyo, uphuculo nolungiso luya kukhokela inkcitho yekhapitali negalelo kwi-BEE yeProjekthi yomPhakathi weSixeko saseTshwane.
Ukuhlaziya, ukunyusa umgangatho nokulungisa kuya kuba sisiqalo senkcitho futhi kube negalelo kwicandelo leBEE kwiProjekthi yesiZikithi sesiXeko saseTshwane.
Ukwakhiwa ngokutsha, ukuphuculwa nokulungiswa kwakuxhokonxa inkcitho ezizixhobo zokuvelisa neziligalelo kwisigaba se-BEE kuMbindi wesiXeko iTshwane.
Uhlaziyo, uphuculo nolungiso luya kukhokela inkcitho yekhapitali negalelo kwi-BEE yeProjekthi yomPhakathi weSixeko saseTshwane.
Ukuhlaziya, ukunyusa umgangatho nokulungisa kuya kuba sisiqalo senkcitho futhi kube negalelo kwicandelo leBEE kwiProjekthi yesiZikithi sesiXeko saseTshwane.
Ukwakhiwa ngokutsha, ukuphuculwa nokulungiswa kwakuxhokonxa inkcitho ezizixhobo zokuvelisa neziligalelo kwisigaba se-BEE kuMbindi wesiXeko iTshwane.
Uphuculo, ukuhlaziywa kunye nokulungiswa kuzakubasisiqalo sokunyusa iingxowa-mali kwanokufak’ isandla kwicandelo leBEE leProjekthi loMbindi-Sixeko saseTshwane. 
Ukuhlaziya, ukunyusa umgangatho nokulungisa kuya kuba sisiqalo senkcitho futhi kube negalelo kwicandelo leBEE kwiProjekthi yesiZikithi sesiXeko saseTshwane.
Ukwakhiwa ngokutsha, ukuphuculwa nokulungiswa kwakuxhokonxa inkcitho ezizixhobo zokuvelisa neziligalelo kwisigaba se-BEE kuMbindi wesiXeko iTshwane.
Uphuculo, ukuhlaziywa kunye nokulungiswa kuzakubasisiqalo sokunyusa iingxowa-mali kwanokufak’ isandla kwicandelo leBEE leProjekthi loMbindi-Sixeko saseTshwane. 
Uhlaziyo, uphuculo nolungiso luya kukhokela inkcitho yekhapitali negalelo kwi-BEE yeProjekthi yomPhakathi weSixeko saseTshwane.
Qho ngonyaka urhulumente kazwelonke, ngeSebe leMisebenzi kaRhulumente wasebenzisa ngaphezu kwe (2 izigidigidi zeeRandi) zokuhlawulela ukuqeshisa kwanezinye iintlawulo ezinxulumene nolawulo lwemihlaba ezifana nerhafu kunye neenkonzo, kuzwelonke, kuwo omabini amacandelo, kubaxhamli bamashishini abucalanaba karhulumente wemimandla. 
Qho ngonyaka urhulumente kazwelonke esebenzisa iSebe leMisebenzi kaRhulumente lichitha ngaphezu kwezigidi-gidi ezimbini zeerandi (R2 bhiliyoni) ukuze lihlawule iindleko zokuqesha kwanezinye iindleko ezinokwenza nolawulo lwezakhiwo njengeerhafu neenkonzo ezihlawulelwayo kuzwelonke jikelele, apho ingamacandelo abucala kunye noorhulumente beengingqi njengabaxhamali.
Rhoqo ngonyaka urhulumente kazwelonke kwiSebe leMisebenzi kaRhulumente usebenzise iibhiliyoni ezimbini zeerandi (R2 bhiliyoni) ekuhlawuleni imali yengqeshiso kwakunye neerhafu ezingezinye ezinxulumene nemihlaba nezakhiwo ezinjengerhafu neenkonzo, kuZwelonke jikelele, kufumana inzuzo icandelo labucala kunye norhulumente wengingqi.
Ngonyaka ngamnye urhulumente kazwelonke ngokusebenzisa iSebe leMisebenzi yoLuntu uchithe ngaphezu kweebhiliyoni ezimbini zeerandi (R2 bhiliyoni) ukuze ahlawule iindawo aziqeshileyo kunye nezinye iimali ezihlawulwayo ezinonxulumano nolawulo lwempahla njengeemali ezihlawulwa isigxina neenkonzo, kuzwelonke, apho icandelo labucala norhulumente wendawo beziindlalifa khona.
Qho ngonyaka urhulumente kazwelonke esebenzisa iSebe leMisebenzi kaRhulumente lichitha ngaphezu kwezigidi-gidi ezimbini zeerandi (R2 bhiliyoni) ukuze lihlawule iindleko zokuqesha kwanezinye iindleko ezinokwenza nolawulo lwezakhiwo njengeerhafu neenkonzo ezihlawulelwayo kuzwelonke jikelele, apho ingamacandelo abucala kunye noorhulumente beengingqi njengabaxhamali.
Rhoqo ngonyaka urhulumente kazwelonke kwiSebe leMisebenzi kaRhulumente usebenzise iibhiliyoni ezimbini zeerandi (R2 bhiliyoni) ekuhlawuleni imali yengqeshiso kwakunye neerhafu ezingezinye ezinxulumene nemihlaba nezakhiwo ezinjengerhafu neenkonzo, kuZwelonke jikelele, kufumana inzuzo icandelo labucala kunye norhulumente wengingqi.
Ngonyaka ngamnye urhulumente kazwelonke ngokusebenzisa iSebe leMisebenzi yoLuntu uchithe ngaphezu kweebhiliyoni ezimbini zeerandi (R2 bhiliyoni) ukuze ahlawule iindawo aziqeshileyo kunye nezinye iimali ezihlawulwayo ezinonxulumano nolawulo lwempahla njengeemali ezihlawulwa isigxina neenkonzo, kuzwelonke, apho icandelo labucala norhulumente wendawo beziindlalifa khona.

Ngonyaka ngamnye urhulumente kazwelonke ngokusebenzisa iSebe leMisebenzi yoLuntu uchithe ngaphezu kweebhiliyoni ezimbini zeerandi (R2 bhiliyoni) ukuze ahlawule iindawo aziqeshileyo kunye nezinye iimali ezihlawulwayo ezinonxulumano nolawulo lwempahla njengeemali ezihlawulwa isigxina neenkonzo, kuzwelonke, apho icandelo labucala norhulumente wendawo beziindlalifa khona.
Qho ngonyaka urhulumente kazwelonke, ngeSebe leMisebenzi kaRhulumente wasebenzisa ngaphezu kwe (2 izigidigidi zeeRandi) zokuhlawulela ukuqeshisa kwanezinye iintlawulo ezinxulumene nolawulo lwemihlaba ezifana nerhafu kunye neenkonzo, kuzwelonke, kuwo omabini amacandelo, kubaxhamli bamashishini abucalanaba karhulumente wemimandla. 
Qho ngonyaka urhulumente kazwelonke esebenzisa iSebe leMisebenzi kaRhulumente lichitha ngaphezu kwezigidi-gidi ezimbini zeerandi (R2 bhiliyoni) ukuze lihlawule iindleko zokuqesha kwanezinye iindleko ezinokwenza nolawulo lwezakhiwo njengeerhafu neenkonzo ezihlawulelwayo kuzwelonke jikelele, apho ingamacandelo abucala kunye noorhulumente beengingqi njengabaxhamali.
Rhoqo ngonyaka urhulumente kazwelonke kwiSebe leMisebenzi kaRhulumente usebenzise iibhiliyoni ezimbini zeerandi (R2 bhiliyoni) ekuhlawuleni imali yengqeshiso kwakunye neerhafu ezingezinye ezinxulumene nemihlaba nezakhiwo ezinjengerhafu neenkonzo, kuZwelonke jikelele, kufumana inzuzo icandelo labucala kunye norhulumente wengingqi.
Ngokungaguquguqukiyo ikwangaba bachaphazelekayo ekulindeleke ukuba baluphehle uhlaziyo lwenkqubo yombindi wesixeko iTshwane, mhlawumbi ngentatho-nxaxheba kaRhulumente wePhondo iGauteng, ngeeprojekhthi zakhe eziphambili zotyalomali ngokuxhaswa yi-Arhente yoPhuhliso loQoqosho  kwiGauteng (GEDA).  
Ngendlela efanayo ikwangabo bantu bachaphazelekayo abalindeleke ukuqhuba inkqubo yohlaziyo lwesizikithi sesixeko saseTshwane, masithi mhlawumbi nenxaxheba kaRhulumente wePhondo laseGauteng kwiiprojekthi zabo ezinkulu lotyalomali njengoko zixhaswa yi-Arhente yaseGauteng yoPhuhliso loQoqosho (i-GEDA).
Kwixesha elininzi iba ngamaqela achaphazelekayo amanye ekulindeleke ukuba aqhube inkqubo yohlaziyo lomphakathi wesixeko saseTshwane, mhlawumbi ngokuthatha inxaxheba kukaRhulumente wePhondo laseGauteng kwiiprojekthi ezinkulu zenzaliso-mali yabo  ngokuxhaswa yi-Gauteng Economic Development Agency (GEDA).
Ngendlela engaguquguqukiyo ikwangabo bantu bachaphazelekayo abalindeleke ukuqhuba inkqubo yohlaziyo lwesizikithi sesixeko saseTshwane, masithi mhlawumbi nenxaxheba kaRhulumente wePhondo laseGauteng kwiiprojekthi zabo ezinkulu zotyalo-mali njengoko zixhaswa yiArhente yaseGauteng yoPhuhliso loQoqosho (iGEDA).
Ngendlela efanayo ikwangabo bantu bachaphazelekayo abalindeleke ukuqhuba inkqubo yohlaziyo lwesizikithi sesixeko saseTshwane, masithi mhlawumbi nenxaxheba kaRhulumente wePhondo laseGauteng kwiiprojekthi zabo ezinkulu lotyalomali njengoko zixhaswa yi-Arhente yaseGauteng yoPhuhliso loQoqosho (i-GEDA).
Kwixesha elininzi iba ngamaqela achaphazelekayo amanye ekulindeleke ukuba aqhube inkqubo yohlaziyo lomphakathi wesixeko saseTshwane, mhlawumbi ngokuthatha inxaxheba kukaRhulumente wePhondo laseGauteng kwiiprojekthi ezinkulu zenzaliso-mali yabo  ngokuxhaswa yi-Gauteng Economic Development Agency (GEDA).
Ngendlela engaguquguqukiyo ikwangabo bantu bachaphazelekayo abalindeleke ukuqhuba inkqubo yohlaziyo lwesizikithi sesixeko saseTshwane, masithi mhlawumbi nenxaxheba kaRhulumente wePhondo laseGauteng kwiiprojekthi zabo ezinkulu zotyalo-mali njengoko zixhaswa yiArhente yaseGauteng yoPhuhliso loQoqosho (iGEDA).
Ngokungaguquguqukiyo ikwangaba bachaphazelekayo ekulindeleke ukuba baluphehle uhlaziyo lwenkqubo yombindi wesixeko iTshwane, mhlawumbi ngentatho-nxaxheba kaRhulumente wePhondo iGauteng, ngeeprojekhthi zakhe eziphambili zotyalomali ngokuxhaswa yi-Arhente yoPhuhliso loQoqosho  kwiGauteng (GEDA).  
Kwixesha elininzi iba ngamaqela achaphazelekayo amanye ekulindeleke ukuba aqhube inkqubo yohlaziyo lomphakathi wesixeko saseTshwane, mhlawumbi ngokuthatha inxaxheba kukaRhulumente wePhondo laseGauteng kwiiprojekthi ezinkulu zenzaliso-mali yabo  ngokuxhaswa yi-Gauteng Economic Development Agency (GEDA).
Ngendlela engaguquguqukiyo ikwangabo bantu bachaphazelekayo abalindeleke ukuqhuba inkqubo yohlaziyo lwesizikithi sesixeko saseTshwane, masithi mhlawumbi nenxaxheba kaRhulumente wePhondo laseGauteng kwiiprojekthi zabo ezinkulu zotyalo-mali njengoko zixhaswa yiArhente yaseGauteng yoPhuhliso loQoqosho (iGEDA).
Ngokungaguquguqukiyo ikwangaba bachaphazelekayo ekulindeleke ukuba baluphehle uhlaziyo lwenkqubo yombindi wesixeko iTshwane, mhlawumbi ngentatho-nxaxheba kaRhulumente wePhondo iGauteng, ngeeprojekhthi zakhe eziphambili zotyalomali ngokuxhaswa yi-Arhente yoPhuhliso loQoqosho  kwiGauteng (GEDA).  
Ngendlela efanayo ikwangabo bantu bachaphazelekayo abalindeleke ukuqhuba inkqubo yohlaziyo lwesizikithi sesixeko saseTshwane, masithi mhlawumbi nenxaxheba kaRhulumente wePhondo laseGauteng kwiiprojekthi zabo ezinkulu lotyalomali njengoko zixhaswa yi-Arhente yaseGauteng yoPhuhliso loQoqosho (i-GEDA).
Ngendlela engaguquguqukiyo ikwangabo bantu bachaphazelekayo abalindeleke ukuqhuba inkqubo yohlaziyo lwesizikithi sesixeko saseTshwane, masithi mhlawumbi nenxaxheba kaRhulumente wePhondo laseGauteng kwiiprojekthi zabo ezinkulu zotyalo-mali njengoko zixhaswa yiArhente yaseGauteng yoPhuhliso loQoqosho (iGEDA).
Ngokungaguquguqukiyo ikwangaba bachaphazelekayo ekulindeleke ukuba baluphehle uhlaziyo lwenkqubo yombindi wesixeko iTshwane, mhlawumbi ngentatho-nxaxheba kaRhulumente wePhondo iGauteng, ngeeprojekhthi zakhe eziphambili zotyalomali ngokuxhaswa yi-Arhente yoPhuhliso loQoqosho  kwiGauteng (GEDA).  
Ngendlela efanayo ikwangabo bantu bachaphazelekayo abalindeleke ukuqhuba inkqubo yohlaziyo lwesizikithi sesixeko saseTshwane, masithi mhlawumbi nenxaxheba kaRhulumente wePhondo laseGauteng kwiiprojekthi zabo ezinkulu lotyalomali njengoko zixhaswa yi-Arhente yaseGauteng yoPhuhliso loQoqosho (i-GEDA).
Kwixesha elininzi iba ngamaqela achaphazelekayo amanye ekulindeleke ukuba aqhube inkqubo yohlaziyo lomphakathi wesixeko saseTshwane, mhlawumbi ngokuthatha inxaxheba kukaRhulumente wePhondo laseGauteng kwiiprojekthi ezinkulu zenzaliso-mali yabo  ngokuxhaswa yi-Gauteng Economic Development Agency (GEDA).
Kwimeko yeNkqubo yoMbindi wesiXeko iTshwane, eyaziwa njenge-“ReKgabisa Tshwane"  nenesihlokwana esithi  “INdawo ePhucukileyo yokuSebenza”,  kugxilwe ikakhulu ebantwini (abasebenza kurhulumente nakuluntu jikelele), njengoko kunjalo kwizithuba ezikhoyo abazithintelayo xa benikezela naxa bezuza iinkonzo zikarhulumente ezifunekayo.
Xa kusiziwa kumba weNkqubo yoMbindi-Sixeko weTshwane, ezakwaziwa ukusuka ngoku ukuya phambili, ngokuba yi-“Re Kgabisa Tshwane” nebhalwe ngokuba “Indawo Yokusebenzela eNgcono kakhulu”, kuzakugxilwa ebantwini kakhulu (abasebenzi noluntu ngokubanzi), nanjengoko iziindawo abazisebenzisayo ekuhambiseni nasekwamkeleni iinkonzo zoluntu ezingundoqo. 
Kwiimeko zeNkqubo yoMphakathi yeSixeko saseTshwane, neyaziwa njenge-"Re Kgabisa Tshwane" nesihloko esingezantsi esithi  "Indawo eNgcono yokuSebenza", ingqwalaselo ikakhulu isebantwini (abasebenzi bakarhulumente kwakunye noluntu jikelele), njengoko behlala kwiindawo ezibonakalayo ngexa kunikezelwa kukwafunyanwa iinkonzo ezifanelekileyo zikarhulumente. 
Ngokubhekiselele kwiNkqubo yesiZikithi sesiXeko saseTshwane, eyaziwa ukususela ngoku ngokuthi “Sihombisa iTshwane” ukuze isihloko esonganyelweyo sithi “Indawo eBhetele yokuSebenza”, umgqaliselo usebantwini ubukhulu becala (kubasebenzi bakarhulumente naseluntwini), njengoko kunjalo kwizithuba ezibonwa ngamehlo abahlala kuzo xa kunikelwa naxa kusamkelwa iinkonzo eziphambili zoluntu.
Xa kusiziwa kumba weNkqubo yoMbindi-Sixeko weTshwane, ezakwaziwa ukusuka ngoku ukuya phambili, ngokuba yi-“Re Kgabisa Tshwane” nebhalwe ngokuba “Indawo Yokusebenzela eNgcono kakhulu”, kuzakugxilwa ebantwini kakhulu (abasebenzi noluntu ngokubanzi), nanjengoko iziindawo abazisebenzisayo ekuhambiseni nasekwamkeleni iinkonzo zoluntu ezingundoqo. 
Kwiimeko zeNkqubo yoMphakathi yeSixeko saseTshwane, neyaziwa njenge-"Re Kgabisa Tshwane" nesihloko esingezantsi esithi  "Indawo eNgcono yokuSebenza", ingqwalaselo ikakhulu isebantwini (abasebenzi bakarhulumente kwakunye noluntu jikelele), njengoko behlala kwiindawo ezibonakalayo ngexa kunikezelwa kukwafunyanwa iinkonzo ezifanelekileyo zikarhulumente. 
Ngokubhekiselele kwiNkqubo yesiZikithi sesiXeko saseTshwane, eyaziwa ukususela ngoku ngokuthi “Sihombisa iTshwane” ukuze isihloko esonganyelweyo sithi “Indawo eBhetele yokuSebenza”, umgqaliselo usebantwini ubukhulu becala (kubasebenzi bakarhulumente naseluntwini), njengoko kunjalo kwizithuba ezibonwa ngamehlo abahlala kuzo xa kunikelwa naxa kusamkelwa iinkonzo eziphambili zoluntu.
Kwimeko yeNkqubo yoMbindi wesiXeko iTshwane, eyaziwa njenge-“ReKgabisa Tshwane"  nenesihlokwana esithi  “INdawo ePhucukileyo yokuSebenza”,  kugxilwe ikakhulu ebantwini (abasebenza kurhulumente nakuluntu jikelele), njengoko kunjalo kwizithuba ezikhoyo abazithintelayo xa benikezela naxa bezuza iinkonzo zikarhulumente ezifunekayo.
