Kwimeko yeNkqubo yoMbindi wesiXeko iTshwane, eyaziwa njenge-“ReKgabisa Tshwane"  nenesihlokwana esithi  “INdawo ePhucukileyo yokuSebenza”,  kugxilwe ikakhulu ebantwini (abasebenza kurhulumente nakuluntu jikelele), njengoko kunjalo kwizithuba ezikhoyo abazithintelayo xa benikezela naxa bezuza iinkonzo zikarhulumente ezifunekayo.
Xa kusiziwa kumba weNkqubo yoMbindi-Sixeko weTshwane, ezakwaziwa ukusuka ngoku ukuya phambili, ngokuba yi-“Re Kgabisa Tshwane” nebhalwe ngokuba “Indawo Yokusebenzela eNgcono kakhulu”, kuzakugxilwa ebantwini kakhulu (abasebenzi noluntu ngokubanzi), nanjengoko iziindawo abazisebenzisayo ekuhambiseni nasekwamkeleni iinkonzo zoluntu ezingundoqo. 
Ngokubhekiselele kwiNkqubo yesiZikithi sesiXeko saseTshwane, eyaziwa ukususela ngoku ngokuthi “Sihombisa iTshwane” ukuze isihloko esonganyelweyo sithi “Indawo eBhetele yokuSebenza”, umgqaliselo usebantwini ubukhulu becala (kubasebenzi bakarhulumente naseluntwini), njengoko kunjalo kwizithuba ezibonwa ngamehlo abahlala kuzo xa kunikelwa naxa kusamkelwa iinkonzo eziphambili zoluntu.
Kwimeko yeNkqubo yoMbindi wesiXeko iTshwane, eyaziwa njenge-“ReKgabisa Tshwane"  nenesihlokwana esithi  “INdawo ePhucukileyo yokuSebenza”,  kugxilwe ikakhulu ebantwini (abasebenza kurhulumente nakuluntu jikelele), njengoko kunjalo kwizithuba ezikhoyo abazithintelayo xa benikezela naxa bezuza iinkonzo zikarhulumente ezifunekayo.
Xa kusiziwa kumba weNkqubo yoMbindi-Sixeko weTshwane, ezakwaziwa ukusuka ngoku ukuya phambili, ngokuba yi-“Re Kgabisa Tshwane” nebhalwe ngokuba “Indawo Yokusebenzela eNgcono kakhulu”, kuzakugxilwa ebantwini kakhulu (abasebenzi noluntu ngokubanzi), nanjengoko iziindawo abazisebenzisayo ekuhambiseni nasekwamkeleni iinkonzo zoluntu ezingundoqo. 
Kwiimeko zeNkqubo yoMphakathi yeSixeko saseTshwane, neyaziwa njenge-"Re Kgabisa Tshwane" nesihloko esingezantsi esithi  "Indawo eNgcono yokuSebenza", ingqwalaselo ikakhulu isebantwini (abasebenzi bakarhulumente kwakunye noluntu jikelele), njengoko behlala kwiindawo ezibonakalayo ngexa kunikezelwa kukwafunyanwa iinkonzo ezifanelekileyo zikarhulumente. 
Xa kusaziswa ngekarhulumente iNkqubo yokuSebenza ka-2004, uMongameli uMnu. Thabo Mbeki wabongoza amasebe kazwelonke eMisebenzi kaRhulumente,abeNkonzo naboLawulo ukuba ngentsebenziswano mababhexeshe le projekhthi yokuphucula indawo yokusebenza ebangqongileyo yamasebe karhulumente kunye nabasebenzi bakarhulumente. 
Xa wayesenza isaziso ngeNkqubo yaManyathelo karhulumente yango-2004, uMongameli uThabo Mbeki wamema onke amasebe kazwelonke ezeMisebenzi kaRhulumente ndawonye nelaBasebenzi Baseburhulumenteni noLawulo ukuba abambisane ekuqhubeni le projekthi ukuze kuphuculwe iindawo zamasebe karhulumente ekusetyenzelwa kuzo kwanabasebenzi baseburhulumenteni.
Ngexa kwakusaziswa iNyathelo leNkqubo ka-2004, uPrezidanti, uMnu. Thabo Mbeki wacela amasebe karhulumente kuZwelonke eMisebenzi kaRhulumente kwakunye nawoLawulo lweNkonzo kaRhulumente ekubeni asebenzisane ekuqhubeni le projekthi ekuphuculeni indawo yokusebenzela amasebe karhulumente nabasebenzi bakarhulumente. 
Xa kwakubhengezwa iNkqubo yaManyathelo kaRhulumente yango-2004, uMongameli, uMnu. uThabo Mbeki wayalela amasebe esizwe eMisebenzi yoLuntu ngokunjalo neeNkonzo zoLuntu noLawulo ukuba omabini abhexeshe le projekthi ukuze iphucule ubume obungqonge umsebenzi owenziwa ngamasebe karhulumente nangabasebenzi bakarhulumente.
Xa wayesenza isaziso ngeNkqubo yaManyathelo karhulumente yango-2004, uMongameli uThabo Mbeki wamema onke amasebe kazwelonke ezeMisebenzi kaRhulumente ndawonye nelaBasebenzi Baseburhulumenteni noLawulo ukuba abambisane ekuqhubeni le projekthi ukuze kuphuculwe iindawo zamasebe karhulumente ekusetyenzelwa kuzo kwanabasebenzi baseburhulumenteni.
Ngexa kwakusaziswa iNyathelo leNkqubo ka-2004, uPrezidanti, uMnu. Thabo Mbeki wacela amasebe karhulumente kuZwelonke eMisebenzi kaRhulumente kwakunye nawoLawulo lweNkonzo kaRhulumente ekubeni asebenzisane ekuqhubeni le projekthi ekuphuculeni indawo yokusebenzela amasebe karhulumente nabasebenzi bakarhulumente. 
Xa kwakubhengezwa iNkqubo yaManyathelo kaRhulumente yango-2004, uMongameli, uMnu. uThabo Mbeki wayalela amasebe esizwe eMisebenzi yoLuntu ngokunjalo neeNkonzo zoLuntu noLawulo ukuba omabini abhexeshe le projekthi ukuze iphucule ubume obungqonge umsebenzi owenziwa ngamasebe karhulumente nangabasebenzi bakarhulumente.
Xa kusaziswa ngekarhulumente iNkqubo yokuSebenza ka-2004, uMongameli uMnu. Thabo Mbeki wabongoza amasebe kazwelonke eMisebenzi kaRhulumente,abeNkonzo naboLawulo ukuba ngentsebenziswano mababhexeshe le projekhthi yokuphucula indawo yokusebenza ebangqongileyo yamasebe karhulumente kunye nabasebenzi bakarhulumente. 
Ngexa kwakusaziswa iNyathelo leNkqubo ka-2004, uPrezidanti, uMnu. Thabo Mbeki wacela amasebe karhulumente kuZwelonke eMisebenzi kaRhulumente kwakunye nawoLawulo lweNkonzo kaRhulumente ekubeni asebenzisane ekuqhubeni le projekthi ekuphuculeni indawo yokusebenzela amasebe karhulumente nabasebenzi bakarhulumente. 
Xa kwakubhengezwa iNkqubo yaManyathelo kaRhulumente yango-2004, uMongameli, uMnu. uThabo Mbeki wayalela amasebe esizwe eMisebenzi yoLuntu ngokunjalo neeNkonzo zoLuntu noLawulo ukuba omabini abhexeshe le projekthi ukuze iphucule ubume obungqonge umsebenzi owenziwa ngamasebe karhulumente nangabasebenzi bakarhulumente.
Xa kusaziswa ngekarhulumente iNkqubo yokuSebenza ka-2004, uMongameli uMnu. Thabo Mbeki wabongoza amasebe kazwelonke eMisebenzi kaRhulumente,abeNkonzo naboLawulo ukuba ngentsebenziswano mababhexeshe le projekhthi yokuphucula indawo yokusebenza ebangqongileyo yamasebe karhulumente kunye nabasebenzi bakarhulumente. 
Xa wayesenza isaziso ngeNkqubo yaManyathelo karhulumente yango-2004, uMongameli uThabo Mbeki wamema onke amasebe kazwelonke ezeMisebenzi kaRhulumente ndawonye nelaBasebenzi Baseburhulumenteni noLawulo ukuba abambisane ekuqhubeni le projekthi ukuze kuphuculwe iindawo zamasebe karhulumente ekusetyenzelwa kuzo kwanabasebenzi baseburhulumenteni.
Xa kwakubhengezwa iNkqubo yaManyathelo kaRhulumente yango-2004, uMongameli, uMnu. uThabo Mbeki wayalela amasebe esizwe eMisebenzi yoLuntu ngokunjalo neeNkonzo zoLuntu noLawulo ukuba omabini abhexeshe le projekthi ukuze iphucule ubume obungqonge umsebenzi owenziwa ngamasebe karhulumente nangabasebenzi bakarhulumente.
Xa kusaziswa ngekarhulumente iNkqubo yokuSebenza ka-2004, uMongameli uMnu. Thabo Mbeki wabongoza amasebe kazwelonke eMisebenzi kaRhulumente,abeNkonzo naboLawulo ukuba ngentsebenziswano mababhexeshe le projekhthi yokuphucula indawo yokusebenza ebangqongileyo yamasebe karhulumente kunye nabasebenzi bakarhulumente. 
Xa wayesenza isaziso ngeNkqubo yaManyathelo karhulumente yango-2004, uMongameli uThabo Mbeki wamema onke amasebe kazwelonke ezeMisebenzi kaRhulumente ndawonye nelaBasebenzi Baseburhulumenteni noLawulo ukuba abambisane ekuqhubeni le projekthi ukuze kuphuculwe iindawo zamasebe karhulumente ekusetyenzelwa kuzo kwanabasebenzi baseburhulumenteni.
Ngexa kwakusaziswa iNyathelo leNkqubo ka-2004, uPrezidanti, uMnu. Thabo Mbeki wacela amasebe karhulumente kuZwelonke eMisebenzi kaRhulumente kwakunye nawoLawulo lweNkonzo kaRhulumente ekubeni asebenzisane ekuqhubeni le projekthi ekuphuculeni indawo yokusebenzela amasebe karhulumente nabasebenzi bakarhulumente. 
I-infrastrakhtsha ephathekayo karhulumente iyinjini yokunikezelwa kweenkonzo, kwaye amagosa karhulumente ngawo azizibaso eziphehla injini ukuze igqume ngokukhawuleza, ngokufanelekileyo nangendlela esebenzayo.
Iindawo zaseburhulumenteni ziyinjini yokunikezelwa kweenkonzo kwaye namagosa akwarhulumente angamafutha abhexesha le njini nayenza ukuba iphakamise iinyawo ngokusebenzayo nangokuyimpumelelo. 
Izibonelelo zemisebenzi yoluntu ziyinjini yonikezelo lweenkonzo kwaye amagosa karhulumente angamafutha awenza ukuba injini isebenze, ayenze ivuthuze ngokukhawuleza, ngokufanelekileyo nangenkuthalo.
Isiseko sezibonelelo zoluntu yinjini yokunikelwa kweenkonzo ukuze amagosa karhulumente abe zizibaseli eziqhuba injini ziyenze ukuba ikhawulezise, isebenze ngobuchule kwaye ibe nempumezo.
Iindawo zaseburhulumenteni ziyinjini yokunikezelwa kweenkonzo kwaye namagosa akwarhulumente angamafutha abhexesha le njini nayenza ukuba iphakamise iinyawo ngokusebenzayo nangokuyimpumelelo. 
Izibonelelo zemisebenzi yoluntu ziyinjini yonikezelo lweenkonzo kwaye amagosa karhulumente angamafutha awenza ukuba injini isebenze, ayenze ivuthuze ngokukhawuleza, ngokufanelekileyo nangenkuthalo.
Isiseko sezibonelelo zoluntu yinjini yokunikelwa kweenkonzo ukuze amagosa karhulumente abe zizibaseli eziqhuba injini ziyenze ukuba ikhawulezise, isebenze ngobuchule kwaye ibe nempumezo.
I-infrastrakhtsha ephathekayo karhulumente iyinjini yokunikezelwa kweenkonzo, kwaye amagosa karhulumente ngawo azizibaso eziphehla injini ukuze igqume ngokukhawuleza, ngokufanelekileyo nangendlela esebenzayo.
Izibonelelo zemisebenzi yoluntu ziyinjini yonikezelo lweenkonzo kwaye amagosa karhulumente angamafutha awenza ukuba injini isebenze, ayenze ivuthuze ngokukhawuleza, ngokufanelekileyo nangenkuthalo.
Isiseko sezibonelelo zoluntu yinjini yokunikelwa kweenkonzo ukuze amagosa karhulumente abe zizibaseli eziqhuba injini ziyenze ukuba ikhawulezise, isebenze ngobuchule kwaye ibe nempumezo.
I-infrastrakhtsha ephathekayo karhulumente iyinjini yokunikezelwa kweenkonzo, kwaye amagosa karhulumente ngawo azizibaso eziphehla injini ukuze igqume ngokukhawuleza, ngokufanelekileyo nangendlela esebenzayo.
Iindawo zaseburhulumenteni ziyinjini yokunikezelwa kweenkonzo kwaye namagosa akwarhulumente angamafutha abhexesha le njini nayenza ukuba iphakamise iinyawo ngokusebenzayo nangokuyimpumelelo. 
Isiseko sezibonelelo zoluntu yinjini yokunikelwa kweenkonzo ukuze amagosa karhulumente abe zizibaseli eziqhuba injini ziyenze ukuba ikhawulezise, isebenze ngobuchule kwaye ibe nempumezo.
I-infrastrakhtsha ephathekayo karhulumente iyinjini yokunikezelwa kweenkonzo, kwaye amagosa karhulumente ngawo azizibaso eziphehla injini ukuze igqume ngokukhawuleza, ngokufanelekileyo nangendlela esebenzayo.
Iindawo zaseburhulumenteni ziyinjini yokunikezelwa kweenkonzo kwaye namagosa akwarhulumente angamafutha abhexesha le njini nayenza ukuba iphakamise iinyawo ngokusebenzayo nangokuyimpumelelo. 
Izibonelelo zemisebenzi yoluntu ziyinjini yonikezelo lweenkonzo kwaye amagosa karhulumente angamafutha awenza ukuba injini isebenze, ayenze ivuthuze ngokukhawuleza, ngokufanelekileyo nangenkuthalo.
Ngexesha leprojekhthi lokuhlolwa kweemfuno, abasebenzi abaninzi bakarhulumente ekuboniswene nabo bagxininisa ngokubaluleka kokubakho kwezithuba zokusebenzela, eziluncedo ngexesha lomsebenzi, kwaye oku kuquka okusingqongileyo okungaphakathi nokungaphandle, kungoko kufuneka intsebenziswano nesiXeko iTshwane, sona sinoxanduva lokulawula imibandela yeedolophu efana nezithuthi, ucoceko, ukhuseleko nokhuselo kunye nenzululwazi ngothando lobuhle.
Ngexesha lokuhlolwa kwezidingo lale projekthi, abasebenzi abaninzi baseburhulumenteni bagxininise ekubalulekeni kokubakho kweendawo zokusebenzela ezisemgangathweni, nezihambisanayo noko kulindeleke kubo kwaye ezi ziquka iindawo ezingaphakathi nezingaphandle nto leyo eyenze ukuba kubekho ubambiswano ne-Metro yaseTshwane, nekuyeyona enoxanduva lokulawula iinkalo eziliqela zasedolophini ezifana nezeendlela, ucoceko, ukhuseleko, ukhuselo kunye nokubukeka.
Ngexesha lenqanaba lovavanyo lweemfuno zeprojekthi, abasebenzi abaninzi bakarhulumente ababuziweyo bagxininise ukubaluleka kokuba neendawo zokusebenzela ezifanelekileyo, nezifanele ubizo lwabo emsebenzini kwaye oku kubandakanya ngaphakathi nangaphandle kokusingqongileyo, njengoko imfuno yokusebenzisana noLawulo lweNqila yaseTshwane, nenoxanduva lwemiba emininzi kuhlaziyo lweedolophu ezinjengezihamba-ndlela, ucoceko, ukhuseleko, ukhuselo nobuhle bokusingqongileyo.
Ngexesha lesigaba seprojekthi sohlalutyo lwezidingo, abaqeshwa bakarhulumente abaninzi ababuziweyo bagxininise ukubaluleka kokuba neendawo zokusebenzela ezigqibeleleyo, ezilufaneleyo ubizo lwabo lomsebenzi kanti ezi ndawo ziquka ubume obungqonge okwangaphakathi nobungqonge okwangaphandle kungako kukho imfuneko yolwahlulelwano nesiXeko iTshwane, esinoxanduva lwenkoliso yemiba yolawulo lweedolophu efana nokusetyenziswa kweendlela, ucoceko, ukhuseleko, ukhuselo nokubukeka.  
Ngexesha lokuhlolwa kwezidingo lale projekthi, abasebenzi abaninzi baseburhulumenteni bagxininise ekubalulekeni kokubakho kweendawo zokusebenzela ezisemgangathweni, nezihambisanayo noko kulindeleke kubo kwaye ezi ziquka iindawo ezingaphakathi nezingaphandle nto leyo eyenze ukuba kubekho ubambiswano ne-Metro yaseTshwane, nekuyeyona enoxanduva lokulawula iinkalo eziliqela zasedolophini ezifana nezeendlela, ucoceko, ukhuseleko, ukhuselo kunye nokubukeka.
Ngexesha lenqanaba lovavanyo lweemfuno zeprojekthi, abasebenzi abaninzi bakarhulumente ababuziweyo bagxininise ukubaluleka kokuba neendawo zokusebenzela ezifanelekileyo, nezifanele ubizo lwabo emsebenzini kwaye oku kubandakanya ngaphakathi nangaphandle kokusingqongileyo, njengoko imfuno yokusebenzisana noLawulo lweNqila yaseTshwane, nenoxanduva lwemiba emininzi kuhlaziyo lweedolophu ezinjengezihamba-ndlela, ucoceko, ukhuseleko, ukhuselo nobuhle bokusingqongileyo.
Ngexesha lesigaba seprojekthi sohlalutyo lwezidingo, abaqeshwa bakarhulumente abaninzi ababuziweyo bagxininise ukubaluleka kokuba neendawo zokusebenzela ezigqibeleleyo, ezilufaneleyo ubizo lwabo lomsebenzi kanti ezi ndawo ziquka ubume obungqonge okwangaphakathi nobungqonge okwangaphandle kungako kukho imfuneko yolwahlulelwano nesiXeko iTshwane, esinoxanduva lwenkoliso yemiba yolawulo lweedolophu efana nokusetyenziswa kweendlela, ucoceko, ukhuseleko, ukhuselo nokubukeka.  
Ngexesha leprojekhthi lokuhlolwa kweemfuno, abasebenzi abaninzi bakarhulumente ekuboniswene nabo bagxininisa ngokubaluleka kokubakho kwezithuba zokusebenzela, eziluncedo ngexesha lomsebenzi, kwaye oku kuquka okusingqongileyo okungaphakathi nokungaphandle, kungoko kufuneka intsebenziswano nesiXeko iTshwane, sona sinoxanduva lokulawula imibandela yeedolophu efana nezithuthi, ucoceko, ukhuseleko nokhuselo kunye nenzululwazi ngothando lobuhle.

Ngexesha leprojekhthi lokuhlolwa kweemfuno, abasebenzi abaninzi bakarhulumente ekuboniswene nabo bagxininisa ngokubaluleka kokubakho kwezithuba zokusebenzela, eziluncedo ngexesha lomsebenzi, kwaye oku kuquka okusingqongileyo okungaphakathi nokungaphandle, kungoko kufuneka intsebenziswano nesiXeko iTshwane, sona sinoxanduva lokulawula imibandela yeedolophu efana nezithuthi, ucoceko, ukhuseleko nokhuselo kunye nenzululwazi ngothando lobuhle.
Ngexesha lokuhlolwa kwezidingo lale projekthi, abasebenzi abaninzi baseburhulumenteni bagxininise ekubalulekeni kokubakho kweendawo zokusebenzela ezisemgangathweni, nezihambisanayo noko kulindeleke kubo kwaye ezi ziquka iindawo ezingaphakathi nezingaphandle nto leyo eyenze ukuba kubekho ubambiswano ne-Metro yaseTshwane, nekuyeyona enoxanduva lokulawula iinkalo eziliqela zasedolophini ezifana nezeendlela, ucoceko, ukhuseleko, ukhuselo kunye nokubukeka.
Ngexesha lenqanaba lovavanyo lweemfuno zeprojekthi, abasebenzi abaninzi bakarhulumente ababuziweyo bagxininise ukubaluleka kokuba neendawo zokusebenzela ezifanelekileyo, nezifanele ubizo lwabo emsebenzini kwaye oku kubandakanya ngaphakathi nangaphandle kokusingqongileyo, njengoko imfuno yokusebenzisana noLawulo lweNqila yaseTshwane, nenoxanduva lwemiba emininzi kuhlaziyo lweedolophu ezinjengezihamba-ndlela, ucoceko, ukhuseleko, ukhuselo nobuhle bokusingqongileyo.
Mandithathe eli thuba lokubulela kubalawuli beTshwane nakwiinkokeli ngembono yabo yangaphambili ekuyamkeleni le projekhthi ngoba sebeyilungelelanisile nezabo iziCwangciso zoPhuhliso lweNtlanganisela. 
Mandithathe eli thuba ndibulele abaphathi neenkokeli zaseTshwane ngegalelo labo ekuyamkeleni ngazo zozibini le projekthi ngokuthi bayibandakanye kwiZicwangciso zabo zoPhuliso oluYondelelanisiweyo.
Mandithathe eli thuba ndibulele abalawuli baseTshwane neenkokheli ngengqiqo yabo ekwamkeleni le projekthi ngokuyilungelelanisa neziCwangciso zabo zoPhuhliso oluManyanisiweyo.
Mandithathe eli thuba lokubulela abaphathi neenkokeli zaseTshwane ngombono wazo wantlandlolo wokuyamkela le projekthi ngokuyilungelelanisa lula neziCwangciso zabo eziManyanisiweyo zoPhuhliso.
Mandithathe eli thuba ndibulele abaphathi neenkokeli zaseTshwane ngegalelo labo ekuyamkeleni ngazo zozibini le projekthi ngokuthi bayibandakanye kwiZicwangciso zabo zoPhuliso oluYondelelanisiweyo.
Mandithathe eli thuba ndibulele abalawuli baseTshwane neenkokheli ngengqiqo yabo ekwamkeleni le projekthi ngokuyilungelelanisa neziCwangciso zabo zoPhuhliso oluManyanisiweyo.
Mandithathe eli thuba lokubulela abaphathi neenkokeli zaseTshwane ngombono wazo wantlandlolo wokuyamkela le projekthi ngokuyilungelelanisa lula neziCwangciso zabo eziManyanisiweyo zoPhuhliso.
Mandithathe eli thuba lokubulela kubalawuli beTshwane nakwiinkokeli ngembono yabo yangaphambili ekuyamkeleni le projekhthi ngoba sebeyilungelelanisile nezabo iziCwangciso zoPhuhliso lweNtlanganisela. 
Mandithathe eli thuba ndibulele abalawuli baseTshwane neenkokheli ngengqiqo yabo ekwamkeleni le projekthi ngokuyilungelelanisa neziCwangciso zabo zoPhuhliso oluManyanisiweyo.
Mandithathe eli thuba lokubulela abaphathi neenkokeli zaseTshwane ngombono wazo wantlandlolo wokuyamkela le projekthi ngokuyilungelelanisa lula neziCwangciso zabo eziManyanisiweyo zoPhuhliso.
Mandithathe eli thuba lokubulela kubalawuli beTshwane nakwiinkokeli ngembono yabo yangaphambili ekuyamkeleni le projekhthi ngoba sebeyilungelelanisile nezabo iziCwangciso zoPhuhliso lweNtlanganisela. 
Mandithathe eli thuba ndibulele abaphathi neenkokeli zaseTshwane ngegalelo labo ekuyamkeleni ngazo zozibini le projekthi ngokuthi bayibandakanye kwiZicwangciso zabo zoPhuliso oluYondelelanisiweyo.
Mandithathe eli thuba lokubulela abaphathi neenkokeli zaseTshwane ngombono wazo wantlandlolo wokuyamkela le projekthi ngokuyilungelelanisa lula neziCwangciso zabo eziManyanisiweyo zoPhuhliso.
Mandithathe eli thuba lokubulela kubalawuli beTshwane nakwiinkokeli ngembono yabo yangaphambili ekuyamkeleni le projekhthi ngoba sebeyilungelelanisile nezabo iziCwangciso zoPhuhliso lweNtlanganisela. 
Mandithathe eli thuba ndibulele abaphathi neenkokeli zaseTshwane ngegalelo labo ekuyamkeleni ngazo zozibini le projekthi ngokuthi bayibandakanye kwiZicwangciso zabo zoPhuliso oluYondelelanisiweyo.
Mandithathe eli thuba ndibulele abalawuli baseTshwane neenkokheli ngengqiqo yabo ekwamkeleni le projekthi ngokuyilungelelanisa neziCwangciso zabo zoPhuhliso oluManyanisiweyo.
Phofu okweNgqiqo okuBhaliweyo nokugcinelwe ixesha elizayo  (MOU) esiza kukungenisa msinyane kwanamhlanje phakathi kweSebe leMisebenzi kaRhulumente nesiXeko semimandla yeTshwane, kusisiqinisekiso sokufunyaniswa kombandela ekuza kusukwa kuwo kuyiwe phambili. 
Eneneni iSivumelwano soKuqondana (MOU) ekuzakungenwa kuso kungekudala nje namhlanje esiphakathi kweSebe lezeMisebenzi kaRhulumente kunye ne-Metro yeSixeko saseTshwane, sisisiqinisekiso sokuba mxhelomnye nekuzakunyathelelwa phezu kwawo.
Kengoko i-Memorandam yokuQondana (MOU) esiza kungena kuyo kwixeshana elingephi namhlanje Phakathi kweSebe likazwelonke leMisebenzi kaRhuluemente noLawulo lweNqila yeSixeko saseTshwane sisiqinisekiso sokufumana indlela yokuqalisa inkqubela-phambili.   
Enyanisweni iMemorandam yeNgqiqo (iMOU) esiza kungena kuyo kwanamhlanje phakathi kweSebe leSizwe leMisebenzi yoLuntu kunye neziPhaluka zesiXeko saseTshwane, ibubungqina bokufunyaniswa kommandla wemvumelwano ekunokundulukelwa kuwo. 
Eneneni iSivumelwano soKuqondana (MOU) ekuzakungenwa kuso kungekudala nje namhlanje esiphakathi kweSebe lezeMisebenzi kaRhulumente kunye ne-Metro yeSixeko saseTshwane, sisisiqinisekiso sokuba mxhelomnye nekuzakunyathelelwa phezu kwawo.

Kengoko i-Memorandam yokuQondana (MOU) esiza kungena kuyo kwixeshana elingephi namhlanje Phakathi kweSebe likazwelonke leMisebenzi kaRhuluemente noLawulo lweNqila yeSixeko saseTshwane sisiqinisekiso sokufumana indlela yokuqalisa inkqubela-phambili.   
Kukubhengezwa  kwenjongo yokusebenzisana kwiziqalelo nakwiiprojekthi eziluncedo ngokufanayo kula maqela mabini.
Sisivumelwano senjongo yokubambisana ngamaphulo neeprojekthi aza kutsho axhamle omabini amaqela kuzo.
Kukudizwe kweenjongo zokusebenzisana kumanyathelo amatsha neeprojekthi eziyinzuzo efanayo kumaqela omabini.
Sisibhengezo senjongo ukusebenzisana malunga nezindululo kunye neeprojekthi eziza kuba luncedo kuwo omabini la maqela.
Sisivumelwano senjongo yokubambisana ngamaphulo neeprojekthi aza kutsho axhamle omabini amaqela kuzo.
Kukudizwe kweenjongo zokusebenzisana kumanyathelo amatsha neeprojekthi eziyinzuzo efanayo kumaqela omabini.
Sisibhengezo senjongo ukusebenzisana malunga nezindululo kunye neeprojekthi eziza kuba luncedo kuwo omabini la maqela.
Kukubhengezwa  kwenjongo yokusebenzisana kwiziqalelo nakwiiprojekthi eziluncedo ngokufanayo kula maqela mabini.
Kukudizwe kweenjongo zokusebenzisana kumanyathelo amatsha neeprojekthi eziyinzuzo efanayo kumaqela omabini.
Sisibhengezo senjongo ukusebenzisana malunga nezindululo kunye neeprojekthi eziza kuba luncedo kuwo omabini la maqela.

Sisivumelwano senjongo yokubambisana ngamaphulo neeprojekthi aza kutsho axhamle omabini amaqela kuzo.
Sisibhengezo senjongo ukusebenzisana malunga nezindululo kunye neeprojekthi eziza kuba luncedo kuwo omabini la maqela.
Kukubhengezwa  kwenjongo yokusebenzisana kwiziqalelo nakwiiprojekthi eziluncedo ngokufanayo kula maqela mabini.
Sisivumelwano senjongo yokubambisana ngamaphulo neeprojekthi aza kutsho axhamle omabini amaqela kuzo.
Kukudizwe kweenjongo zokusebenzisana kumanyathelo amatsha neeprojekthi eziyinzuzo efanayo kumaqela omabini.
Umyalezo esininika wona namhlanje ngowokuba  “umsebenzi uqalile”  kwaye iminyaka ezayo eli-10 iza kubona isongezo esingaphezulu kwezigidigidi ezisibhozo (8 bhiliyoni) esingumsebenzi karhulumente kazwelonke nowecandelo labucala kusetyenziswa uqingqomali oluzizibonelelo zokusebenza, ukuphuculwa kwendlela yokuqeshisa kunye namaqela karhulumente ekunye nawabucala.
Umyaleza wethu namhlanje  uthi “umsebenzi  sele uqalisile” kwaye le minyaka ili-10 izayo izakubanokungenisa ngaphezu kwezigidi-gidi ezisibhozo zeerandi (R8 bhiliyoni) oko kusenziwa ngurhulumente kazwelonke kunye namacandelo oshishino lwabucala kusetyenziswa iingxowa zolwabiwo-mali, ukuphuculwa kwempahla ekubanjiswe ngayo kwimboleko-mali kunye nobambiswano lwaseburhulumenteni noshishino lwabucala.
Umyalezo wethu kuni namhlanje kukuba “umsebenzi uqalile” kwaye kule minyaka eli-10 ezayo iya kubona unikezelo olungaphezulu kweebhiliyoni ezisibhozo zeerandi (R8 billion) kurhulumente kazwelonke namacandelo abucala kuhlahlo lwabiwo-mali lwekapitali, uphuculo lwengqeshiso nobuhlulelane-boluntu-babucala.
Umyalezo wethu kuwe namhlanje uthi “uqalile umsebenzi” kanti iminyaka eli-10 ezayo iza kubona ubonelelo olungaphezu kweebhiliyoni ezisibhozo (R8 bhiliyoni) oluvela kurhulumente kazwelonke nakwicandelo labucala ngokusebenzisa uhlahlo-lwabiwo-mali lwemali ekhoyo, ukuphuculwa kweengqeshiso nangolwahlulelwano-loluntu-lwabucala.
Umyaleza wethu namhlanje  uthi “umsebenzi  sele uqalisile” kwaye le minyaka ili-10 izayo izakubanokungenisa ngaphezu kwezigidi-gidi ezisibhozo zeerandi (R8 bhiliyoni) oko kusenziwa ngurhulumente kazwelonke kunye namacandelo oshishino lwabucala kusetyenziswa iingxowa zolwabiwo-mali, ukuphuculwa kwempahla ekubanjiswe ngayo kwimboleko-mali kunye nobambiswano lwaseburhulumenteni noshishino lwabucala.
Umyalezo wethu kuni namhlanje kukuba “umsebenzi uqalile” kwaye kule minyaka eli-10 ezayo iya kubona unikezelo olungaphezulu kweebhiliyoni ezisibhozo zeerandi (R8 billion) kurhulumente kazwelonke namacandelo abucala kuhlahlo lwabiwo-mali lwekapitali, uphuculo lwengqeshiso nobuhlulelane-boluntu-babucala.
Umyalezo wethu kuwe namhlanje uthi “uqalile umsebenzi” kanti iminyaka eli-10 ezayo iza kubona ubonelelo olungaphezu kweebhiliyoni ezisibhozo (R8 bhiliyoni) oluvela kurhulumente kazwelonke nakwicandelo labucala ngokusebenzisa uhlahlo-lwabiwo-mali lwemali ekhoyo, ukuphuculwa kweengqeshiso nangolwahlulelwano-loluntu-lwabucala.

Umyalezo wethu kuwe namhlanje uthi “uqalile umsebenzi” kanti iminyaka eli-10 ezayo iza kubona ubonelelo olungaphezu kweebhiliyoni ezisibhozo (R8 bhiliyoni) oluvela kurhulumente kazwelonke nakwicandelo labucala ngokusebenzisa uhlahlo-lwabiwo-mali lwemali ekhoyo, ukuphuculwa kweengqeshiso nangolwahlulelwano-loluntu-lwabucala.
Umyalezo esininika wona namhlanje ngowokuba  “umsebenzi uqalile”  kwaye iminyaka ezayo eli-10 iza kubona isongezo esingaphezulu kwezigidigidi ezisibhozo (8 bhiliyoni) esingumsebenzi karhulumente kazwelonke nowecandelo labucala kusetyenziswa uqingqomali oluzizibonelelo zokusebenza, ukuphuculwa kwendlela yokuqeshisa kunye namaqela karhulumente ekunye nawabucala.
Umyaleza wethu namhlanje  uthi “umsebenzi  sele uqalisile” kwaye le minyaka ili-10 izayo izakubanokungenisa ngaphezu kwezigidi-gidi ezisibhozo zeerandi (R8 bhiliyoni) oko kusenziwa ngurhulumente kazwelonke kunye namacandelo oshishino lwabucala kusetyenziswa iingxowa zolwabiwo-mali, ukuphuculwa kwempahla ekubanjiswe ngayo kwimboleko-mali kunye nobambiswano lwaseburhulumenteni noshishino lwabucala.
Umyalezo wethu kuwe namhlanje uthi “uqalile umsebenzi” kanti iminyaka eli-10 ezayo iza kubona ubonelelo olungaphezu kweebhiliyoni ezisibhozo (R8 bhiliyoni) oluvela kurhulumente kazwelonke nakwicandelo labucala ngokusebenzisa uhlahlo-lwabiwo-mali lwemali ekhoyo, ukuphuculwa kweengqeshiso nangolwahlulelwano-loluntu-lwabucala.
Umyalezo esininika wona namhlanje ngowokuba  “umsebenzi uqalile”  kwaye iminyaka ezayo eli-10 iza kubona isongezo esingaphezulu kwezigidigidi ezisibhozo (8 bhiliyoni) esingumsebenzi karhulumente kazwelonke nowecandelo labucala kusetyenziswa uqingqomali oluzizibonelelo zokusebenza, ukuphuculwa kwendlela yokuqeshisa kunye namaqela karhulumente ekunye nawabucala.
Umyaleza wethu namhlanje  uthi “umsebenzi  sele uqalisile” kwaye le minyaka ili-10 izayo izakubanokungenisa ngaphezu kwezigidi-gidi ezisibhozo zeerandi (R8 bhiliyoni) oko kusenziwa ngurhulumente kazwelonke kunye namacandelo oshishino lwabucala kusetyenziswa iingxowa zolwabiwo-mali, ukuphuculwa kwempahla ekubanjiswe ngayo kwimboleko-mali kunye nobambiswano lwaseburhulumenteni noshishino lwabucala.
Umyalezo wethu kuni namhlanje kukuba “umsebenzi uqalile” kwaye kule minyaka eli-10 ezayo iya kubona unikezelo olungaphezulu kweebhiliyoni ezisibhozo zeerandi (R8 billion) kurhulumente kazwelonke namacandelo abucala kuhlahlo lwabiwo-mali lwekapitali, uphuculo lwengqeshiso nobuhlulelane-boluntu-babucala.
Malunga noLawulo lweNkqubo, kusekwe iKomiti yokuBhexesha phakathi kweSebe leNkonzo kaRhulumente kunye noLawulo, iSebe leMisebenzi kaRhulumente, iofisi kaNondyebo kuZwelonke kunye nesiXeko saseTshwane. 
Ngokuphathelele kuLawulo lweprojekthi, kuyekwasekwa iKomiti yaBabhexeshi equka iSebe lezaBasebenzi baseBurhulumenteni noLawulo, iSebe lezeMisebenzi kaRhulumente, uNondyebo weSizwe kunye neSixeko saseTshwane.
NgokoLawulo lweNkqubo, iKomiti eQuquzelelayo sele isekiwe Phakathi kweSebe leeNkonzo zikaRhulumente noLawulo, iSebe leMisebenzi kaRhulumente, iNgxowa-mali kaZwelonke neSixeko saseTshwane.
Malunga noLawulo lweNkqubo, kusekwe iKomiti eBhexeshayo phakathi kweSebe leMisebenzi yoLuntu noLawulo, iSebe leMisebenzi yoLuntu, uNondyebo kaZwelonke kunye nesiXeko saseTshwane.
Ngokuphathelele kuLawulo lweprojekthi, kuyekwasekwa iKomiti yaBabhexeshi equka iSebe lezaBasebenzi baseBurhulumenteni noLawulo, iSebe lezeMisebenzi kaRhulumente, uNondyebo weSizwe kunye neSixeko saseTshwane.
NgokoLawulo lweNkqubo, iKomiti eQuquzelelayo sele isekiwe Phakathi kweSebe leeNkonzo zikaRhulumente noLawulo, iSebe leMisebenzi kaRhulumente, iNgxowa-mali kaZwelonke neSixeko saseTshwane.
Malunga noLawulo lweNkqubo, kusekwe iKomiti eBhexeshayo phakathi kweSebe leMisebenzi yoLuntu noLawulo, iSebe leMisebenzi yoLuntu, uNondyebo kaZwelonke kunye nesiXeko saseTshwane.
Malunga noLawulo lweNkqubo, kusekwe iKomiti yokuBhexesha phakathi kweSebe leNkonzo kaRhulumente kunye noLawulo, iSebe leMisebenzi kaRhulumente, iofisi kaNondyebo kuZwelonke kunye nesiXeko saseTshwane. 
NgokoLawulo lweNkqubo, iKomiti eQuquzelelayo sele isekiwe Phakathi kweSebe leeNkonzo zikaRhulumente noLawulo, iSebe leMisebenzi kaRhulumente, iNgxowa-mali kaZwelonke neSixeko saseTshwane.
Malunga noLawulo lweNkqubo, kusekwe iKomiti eBhexeshayo phakathi kweSebe leMisebenzi yoLuntu noLawulo, iSebe leMisebenzi yoLuntu, uNondyebo kaZwelonke kunye nesiXeko saseTshwane.
Malunga noLawulo lweNkqubo, kusekwe iKomiti yokuBhexesha phakathi kweSebe leNkonzo kaRhulumente kunye noLawulo, iSebe leMisebenzi kaRhulumente, iofisi kaNondyebo kuZwelonke kunye nesiXeko saseTshwane. 
Ngokuphathelele kuLawulo lweprojekthi, kuyekwasekwa iKomiti yaBabhexeshi equka iSebe lezaBasebenzi baseBurhulumenteni noLawulo, iSebe lezeMisebenzi kaRhulumente, uNondyebo weSizwe kunye neSixeko saseTshwane.
Malunga noLawulo lweNkqubo, kusekwe iKomiti eBhexeshayo phakathi kweSebe leMisebenzi yoLuntu noLawulo, iSebe leMisebenzi yoLuntu, uNondyebo kaZwelonke kunye nesiXeko saseTshwane.
Malunga noLawulo lweNkqubo, kusekwe iKomiti yokuBhexesha phakathi kweSebe leNkonzo kaRhulumente kunye noLawulo, iSebe leMisebenzi kaRhulumente, iofisi kaNondyebo kuZwelonke kunye nesiXeko saseTshwane. 
Ngokuphathelele kuLawulo lweprojekthi, kuyekwasekwa iKomiti yaBabhexeshi equka iSebe lezaBasebenzi baseBurhulumenteni noLawulo, iSebe lezeMisebenzi kaRhulumente, uNondyebo weSizwe kunye neSixeko saseTshwane.
NgokoLawulo lweNkqubo, iKomiti eQuquzelelayo sele isekiwe Phakathi kweSebe leeNkonzo zikaRhulumente noLawulo, iSebe leMisebenzi kaRhulumente, iNgxowa-mali kaZwelonke neSixeko saseTshwane.
Phakathi kwezinye, iKomiti le iza kutshotsha entla kule nkqubo, iza kuhlola ize iphonononge wonke umsebenzi, yenze izigqibo ngobuchule bokusebenza ize iqinisekise ngozalisekiso olulungelelanisiweyo.
Le Komiti, phakathi kweminye yemisebenzi yayo izakuququzelela le Nkqubo, yongamele ize ijongane nokuphunyezwa, ukuqukunjelwa kwendlela yokonyusa iingxowa-mali ize iqinisekise ukuba ukuphunyezwa kokuyondelelanisiweyo.
Phakathi kokunye, iKomiti iya kukhokela inkqubo, ibone konke ize ibeke iliso kuzalisekiso, iququmbele inkqubo-sikhokelo yengxowa-mali futhi iqinisekise ngozalisekiso olulungelelanisiweyo.
Phakathi kwezinye izinto iKomiti iza kukhokela inkqubo, yongamele iphinde iqwalasele impumezo, iqoshelise isicwangciso-cebo senkxaso-mali ngokunjalo iqinisekise impumezo enonxulumano.
Le Komiti, phakathi kweminye yemisebenzi yayo izakuququzelela le Nkqubo, yongamele ize ijongane nokuphunyezwa, ukuqukunjelwa kwendlela yokonyusa iingxowa-mali ize iqinisekise ukuba ukuphunyezwa kokuyondelelanisiweyo.
Phakathi kokunye, iKomiti iya kukhokela inkqubo, ibone konke ize ibeke iliso kuzalisekiso, iququmbele inkqubo-sikhokelo yengxowa-mali futhi iqinisekise ngozalisekiso olulungelelanisiweyo.
Phakathi kwezinye izinto iKomiti iza kukhokela inkqubo, yongamele iphinde iqwalasele impumezo, iqoshelise isicwangciso-cebo senkxaso-mali ngokunjalo iqinisekise impumezo enonxulumano.
Phakathi kwezinye, iKomiti le iza kutshotsha entla kule nkqubo, iza kuhlola ize iphonononge wonke umsebenzi, yenze izigqibo ngobuchule bokusebenza ize iqinisekise ngozalisekiso olulungelelanisiweyo.
Phakathi kokunye, iKomiti iya kukhokela inkqubo, ibone konke ize ibeke iliso kuzalisekiso, iququmbele inkqubo-sikhokelo yengxowa-mali futhi iqinisekise ngozalisekiso olulungelelanisiweyo.
Phakathi kwezinye izinto iKomiti iza kukhokela inkqubo, yongamele iphinde iqwalasele impumezo, iqoshelise isicwangciso-cebo senkxaso-mali ngokunjalo iqinisekise impumezo enonxulumano.
Phakathi kwezinye, iKomiti le iza kutshotsha entla kule nkqubo, iza kuhlola ize iphonononge wonke umsebenzi, yenze izigqibo ngobuchule bokusebenza ize iqinisekise ngozalisekiso olulungelelanisiweyo.
Le Komiti, phakathi kweminye yemisebenzi yayo izakuququzelela le Nkqubo, yongamele ize ijongane nokuphunyezwa, ukuqukunjelwa kwendlela yokonyusa iingxowa-mali ize iqinisekise ukuba ukuphunyezwa kokuyondelelanisiweyo.
Phakathi kwezinye izinto iKomiti iza kukhokela inkqubo, yongamele iphinde iqwalasele impumezo, iqoshelise isicwangciso-cebo senkxaso-mali ngokunjalo iqinisekise impumezo enonxulumano.
Phakathi kwezinye, iKomiti le iza kutshotsha entla kule nkqubo, iza kuhlola ize iphonononge wonke umsebenzi, yenze izigqibo ngobuchule bokusebenza ize iqinisekise ngozalisekiso olulungelelanisiweyo.
Le Komiti, phakathi kweminye yemisebenzi yayo izakuququzelela le Nkqubo, yongamele ize ijongane nokuphunyezwa, ukuqukunjelwa kwendlela yokonyusa iingxowa-mali ize iqinisekise ukuba ukuphunyezwa kokuyondelelanisiweyo.
Phakathi kokunye, iKomiti iya kukhokela inkqubo, ibone konke ize ibeke iliso kuzalisekiso, iququmbele inkqubo-sikhokelo yengxowa-mali futhi iqinisekise ngozalisekiso olulungelelanisiweyo.
ISebe linyule uMnu. Dumisani Dlamini njengeSekela loMlawuli-Jikelele othwele uxanduva lokuyilawula yonke le nkqubo.
iSebe liyelonyula uMnu Dumisani Dlamini njengoSekela Mlawuli-Jikelele ozakujongana nolawulo lwayo yonke le nkqubo.
ISebe liqeshe uMnu. Dumisani Dlamini njengeSekela loMlawuli Jikelele onoxanduva lokulawula le nkqubo iyonke.
ISebe lityumbe uMnu. uDumisani Dlamini njengoSekela Njengele-Mlawuli onoxanduva lolawulo lwayo yonke inkqubo.

Inenekazi elinguSomlomo, eBekekileyo iNkulumbuso yePhondo, amaHlakani akwiKhabhinethi, amaLungu eNdlu yeNdibano, iindwendwe eziBekekileyo, amagosa esebe lezindlu, amalungu osasazo lweendaba kunye noluntu ngokubanzi, nonke ndiyanamkela ngobubele.
Mama uSomlomo, Obekekileyo iNkulumbuso, Baphathiswa, Malungu ale Ndlu, ziiNdwendwe eziBekekileyo, magosa esebe lezezindlu, malungu ezosasazo kwanoluntu ngokubanzi, siyanamkela.
Inenekazi elinguSomlomo, Nkulumbuso eBekekileyo, Malungu eKhabhinethi, Malungu eNdlu, Zindwendwe ezibekekileyo, amagosa esebe lolwakhiwo-zindlu, amalungu amajelo eendaba kunye noluntu ngokubanzi, namkelekile ninonke.
Nkosikazi Somlomo, Nkulumbuso eBekekileyo, Makholwane eKhabhinethi, Malungu eNdlu, ziNdwendwe eziBekekileyo, amagosa esebe leendawo zokuhlala, malungu osasazo lweendaba noluntu ngokubanzi, namkeleke kangangoko.
Mama uSomlomo, Obekekileyo iNkulumbuso, Baphathiswa, Malungu ale Ndlu, ziiNdwendwe eziBekekileyo, magosa esebe lezezindlu, malungu ezosasazo kwanoluntu ngokubanzi, siyanamkela.

La mazwi manenekazi namanene amalunga nezopolitiko kuMzantsi Afrika, ingakumbi eNtshona Koloni.
Manene namanenekazi, la mazwi anyathela kwezopolitiko zoMzantsi Afrika, ingakumbi eNtshona Koloni.
La mazwi manene namanenekazi abonakalisa ipolitiki yaseMzantsi Afrika, ingakumbi eNtshona Koloni.
La mazwi manenekazi namanene akhanyisa ezopolitiko zaseMzantsi Afrika, ngakumbi eNtshona Koloni.
Manene namanenekazi, la mazwi anyathela kwezopolitiko zoMzantsi Afrika, ingakumbi eNtshona Koloni.
La mazwi manene namanenekazi abonakalisa ipolitiki yaseMzantsi Afrika, ingakumbi eNtshona Koloni.
La mazwi manenekazi namanene akhanyisa ezopolitiko zaseMzantsi Afrika, ngakumbi eNtshona Koloni.
La mazwi manenekazi namanene amalunga nezopolitiko kuMzantsi Afrika, ingakumbi eNtshona Koloni.
La mazwi manene namanenekazi abonakalisa ipolitiki yaseMzantsi Afrika, ingakumbi eNtshona Koloni.
La mazwi manenekazi namanene akhanyisa ezopolitiko zaseMzantsi Afrika, ngakumbi eNtshona Koloni.
La mazwi manenekazi namanene amalunga nezopolitiko kuMzantsi Afrika, ingakumbi eNtshona Koloni.
Manene namanenekazi, la mazwi anyathela kwezopolitiko zoMzantsi Afrika, ingakumbi eNtshona Koloni.
La mazwi manenekazi namanene akhanyisa ezopolitiko zaseMzantsi Afrika, ngakumbi eNtshona Koloni.
La mazwi manenekazi namanene amalunga nezopolitiko kuMzantsi Afrika, ingakumbi eNtshona Koloni.
Manene namanenekazi, la mazwi anyathela kwezopolitiko zoMzantsi Afrika, ingakumbi eNtshona Koloni.
La mazwi manene namanenekazi abonakalisa ipolitiki yaseMzantsi Afrika, ingakumbi eNtshona Koloni.
Akukhathaliseki nokuba abantu beli lizwe bangasebenza nzima, ngokuzimisela nangokuthanda inkqubela, ubizo lwabanye abantu  lusoloko luwuthatha njengemfitshimfitshi lo msebenzi umangalisayo  wenziweyo ngulo rhulumente ukhathalayo nowenzeke ngelona xesha lifutshane ephethe urhulumente.
Akukhathaliseki ukuba bazinikele kangakanani kwanokuba basebenza kangakanani na abantu beli lizwe abathanda inkqubela, injongo yabanye abantu iyakusoloko ikukuwusengela phantsi umsebenzi omhle osele wenziwe ngulo rhulumente ukhathalayo ngexeshana nje elingephi eselulawuleni.
Nokuba basebenza nzima kangakanani bekwathanda nenkqubela-phambili abantu beli lizwe, umnqophiso wabanye abantu uhlala njalo ikukucekisa umsebenzi omangalisayo owenziwe ngulo rhulumente unenkathalelo kwixesha elingephi ephethe.
Akukhathaliseki ukuba abantu beli lizwe basebenza ngokuzinikela nzima  nokuthi bathanda inkqubela kangakanani, ubizo lwabanye abantu kukusoloko belithoba ixabiso lomsebenzi ongummangaliso owenziwe ngulo rhulumente unenkathalo ngelona thutyana lifutshane lokuba se-ofisini kwakhe.
Akukhathaliseki ukuba bazinikele kangakanani kwanokuba basebenza kangakanani na abantu beli lizwe abathanda inkqubela, injongo yabanye abantu iyakusoloko ikukuwusengela phantsi umsebenzi omhle osele wenziwe ngulo rhulumente ukhathalayo ngexeshana nje elingephi eselulawuleni.
Nokuba basebenza nzima kangakanani bekwathanda nenkqubela-phambili abantu beli lizwe, umnqophiso wabanye abantu uhlala njalo ikukucekisa umsebenzi omangalisayo owenziwe ngulo rhulumente unenkathalelo kwixesha elingephi ephethe.

Akukhathaliseki ukuba abantu beli lizwe basebenza ngokuzinikela nzima  nokuthi bathanda inkqubela kangakanani, ubizo lwabanye abantu kukusoloko belithoba ixabiso lomsebenzi ongummangaliso owenziwe ngulo rhulumente unenkathalo ngelona thutyana lifutshane lokuba se-ofisini kwakhe.

Nokuba basebenza nzima kangakanani bekwathanda nenkqubela-phambili abantu beli lizwe, umnqophiso wabanye abantu uhlala njalo ikukucekisa umsebenzi omangalisayo owenziwe ngulo rhulumente unenkathalelo kwixesha elingephi ephethe.
Manenekazi namanene, abantu abaninzi sebekhe baphikisana ngokuba zimalunga nantoni na iindawo zokuhlala, kodwa ndivumeleni ndinichazele ngenye indlela. 
Manene namanenekazi, abantu abaninzi bathethile malunga nokuba kuthetha ukuthini na ukuba nezindlu, kodwa ke ndivumeleni ukuba ndinichubele.
Manene namanenekazi, abantu abaninzi bayaphikisana malunga nokuba ulwakhiwo-zindlu olu luyintoni, kodwa ke ndivumeleni ndininike inguqulelo engenye.
Manenekazi namanene, baninzi abantu abaxoxa ngento oluyiyo ubonelelo lweendawo zokuhlala, kodwa ndivumeleni ndinibonise elinye icala.
Manene namanenekazi, abantu abaninzi bathethile malunga nokuba kuthetha ukuthini na ukuba nezindlu, kodwa ke ndivumeleni ukuba ndinichubele.

Ngokokwam ukucinga, indawo yokuhlala ayipheleli kwikhusi elinophahla.
Ngokunokwam, ukubanendlu ayikokuba nendawo nje yokufihla intloko.
Kum, ulwakhiwo-zindlu asiyondawo yokuhlala kuphela.
Kum, ubonelelo lweendawo zokuhlala alubandakanyi ikhusi kuphela.

Imalunga nabantu abazithwalisa uxanduva lokuyenza ibe nozinzo indalo ebangqongileyo nangokulibumba ikamva labo.
Kumalunga nabantu abathathela ezandleni zabo ukunakekela iindawo zabo kwanokuzakhela ikamva.
Lumalunga nabantu ngokwabo bethathela kubo uxanduva lokugcina indalo yabo ebangqongileyo futhi belungisa ikamva labo.
Lumalunga nabantu abazithwalela uxanduva ngokwabo lokulondoloza ubume obubangqongileyo kunye nokuzoba imilo yekamva labo.
Kumalunga nabantu abathathela ezandleni zabo ukunakekela iindawo zabo kwanokuzakhela ikamva.

Imalunga nabantu abazithwalisa uxanduva lokuyenza ibe nozinzo indalo ebangqongileyo nangokulibumba ikamva labo.
Kumalunga nabantu abathathela ezandleni zabo ukunakekela iindawo zabo kwanokuzakhela ikamva.
Lumalunga nabantu ngokwabo bethathela kubo uxanduva lokugcina indalo yabo ebangqongileyo futhi belungisa ikamva labo.
Imalunga nokudalwa kweendawo zokuhlala eziphilisayo nangokusingqongileyo okunozinzo entlalweni.
Kumalunga nokuseka iindawo zokuhlala ezifanelekileyo kwaneendawo zokuhlala ezinokugcinala nezinokuphuhla.
Lumalunga nokuyila imimandla yoluntu ephilayo neendawo zokuhlala ezigcinekileyo.
Lumalunga nokudala amaqela oluntu aphilayo nobume obubangqongileyo obulondolozekayo nobuphilayo.
Kumalunga nokuseka iindawo zokuhlala ezifanelekileyo kwaneendawo zokuhlala ezinokugcinala nezinokuphuhla.

Kumalunga nokuseka iindawo zokuhlala ezifanelekileyo kwaneendawo zokuhlala ezinokugcinala nezinokuphuhla.
Lumalunga nokuyila imimandla yoluntu ephilayo neendawo zokuhlala ezigcinekileyo.
Imalunga nokuchuma komanyano ngenxa yothelelwano phakathi kweenkampani zabucala, kwamacandelo karhulumente, kweMibutho engekho phantsi koRhulumente, kodwa okona kubalulekileyo, ngabahlali abanobudlelwane.
Kumalunga nophuhliso ngobambiswano phakathi koshishino lwabucala, urhulumente, Imibutho engekho phantsi kukaRhulumente, kodwa okona kubalulekileyo, noluntu ngokubanzi.
Lumalunga nempumelelo kubumbano lwentsebenziswano phakathi kwecandelo labucala, icandelo likarhulumente, iMibutho engekho phantsi kukaRhulumente kodwa okubaluleke kakhulu, imimandla yoluntu.
Lumalunga nenkqubela ngobunye ngokusebenzisa ulwahlulelwano phakathi kwecandelo labucala, icandelo loluntu, iMibutho Engekho Phantsi kukaRhulumente, kodwa okona kubalulekileyo, ngamaqela oluntu.
Kumalunga nophuhliso ngobambiswano phakathi koshishino lwabucala, urhulumente, Imibutho engekho phantsi kukaRhulumente, kodwa okona kubalulekileyo, noluntu ngokubanzi.

Ngokokwam ukucinga iindawo zokuhlala zingachazwa njengenkqubo, ebandakanya ucwangciso olwenziwa nabantu ngokuchaseneyo nocwangciso olwenzelwa abantu.
Ukuba nezindlu kum kungachazwa njengenkqubela, equka ukwenza izicwangciso kunye nabantu endaweni yokwenzela abantu izicwangciso. 
Ulwakhiwo-zindlu lungacaciswa ngcono kum njengenkqubo, ebandakanya ucwangciso nabantu kunokuba kuthiwe lucwangciso olwenzelwa abantu.
Ubonelelo lweendawo zokuhlala lunokuchazwa njengenkqubo, ebandakanya ukwenza izicwangciso nabantu, kungekuko ukwenzela abantu izicwangciso.
Ukuba nezindlu kum kungachazwa njengenkqubela, equka ukwenza izicwangciso kunye nabantu endaweni yokwenzela abantu izicwangciso. 
Ulwakhiwo-zindlu lungacaciswa ngcono kum njengenkqubo, ebandakanya ucwangciso nabantu kunokuba kuthiwe lucwangciso olwenzelwa abantu.

Iindawo zokuhlala ngokwemeko yoMzantsi Afrika aziyomveliso nje kodwa, ziyinkqubo esekelwe kwiimpawu zedemokhrasi abayilwela nzima abantu beli lizwe.
NgokwasemZantsi Afrika, ukuba nezindlu akuyonto nje kuloko kukwayinkqubo esekelwe kwiinqobo zedemokhrasi neyalwelwa nzima ngabantu beli lizwe.
Ulwakhiwo-zindlu kwimeko yaseMzantsi Afrika asiyomveliso nje kuphela, koko lukwayinkqubo esekelwe kwiinqobo ezisemgangathweni ezalelwa nzima ngabantu beli lizwe.
Ubonelelo lweendawo zokuhlala kwimeko yaseMzantsi Afrika aluyomveliso kuphela, kodwa luphinda lube yinkqubo esekwe kwiintsulungeko zolawulo ngentando yoninzi abazilwela nzima kangako abantu beli lizwe.
NgokwasemZantsi Afrika, ukuba nezindlu akuyonto nje kuloko kukwayinkqubo esekelwe kwiinqobo zedemokhrasi neyalwelwa nzima ngabantu beli lizwe.

Yinkqubo ebamamelayo abantu, ebavumelayo abantu bayisebenzise ngokufanelekileyo intando yoninzi ukuze kukhethwe uhlobo lweendawo zokuhlala kunye nemimandla abafuna ukwakhelwa izindlu kuyo.
Yinkqubo ebaphulaphulayo abantu, evumela abantu ukuba balixhamle ilungelo labo kwedemokhrasi lokuba bazikhethele uhlobo lwezindlu kunye neendawo abafuna zakhiwe khona izindlu zabo.
Yinkqubo emamela abantu, evumela abantu ekubeni basebenzise amalungelo abo ekukhetheni uhlobo lolwakhiwo-zindlu nemimandla apho bafuna kwakhiwa khona izindlu zabo.
Luyinkqubo emamela abantu, evumela abantu ukusebenzisa ilungelo labo kulawulo ngentando yoninzi ukuba bakhethe uhlobo lweendawo zokuhlala neziphaluka abafuna zakhiwe kuzo izindlu zabo.
Yinkqubo ebaphulaphulayo abantu, evumela abantu ukuba balixhamle ilungelo labo kwedemokhrasi lokuba bazikhethele uhlobo lwezindlu kunye neendawo abafuna zakhiwe khona izindlu zabo.

Lilonke ayikho into ethoba isidima sabantu nengeyiyo intando yoninzi engaphezu kokuvimba abantu ilungelo labo elisisiseko nelikukuzikhethela. 
Ngoko ke akukho nto isisinyeliso nekwanxamnye nedemokhrasi njengokuphuca abantu ilungelo labo elingundoqo elikukuzikhethela.
Kengoko, ayikho into eyenza uzive ungengomntu futhi ungakwazi ukuzikhethela izinto njengokwehlutha abantu ilungelo labo elisisiseko lokuzikhethela.
Ngoko ke akukho nto ethoba isidima somntu nechasene nolawulo ngentando yoninzi ngaphezu kokwalela abantu ilungelo lokuzikhethela elisisiseko.
Ngoko ke akukho nto isisinyeliso nekwanxamnye nedemokhrasi njengokuphuca abantu ilungelo labo elingundoqo elikukuzikhethela.
Kengoko, ayikho into eyenza uzive ungengomntu futhi ungakwazi ukuzikhethela izinto njengokwehlutha abantu ilungelo labo elisisiseko lokuzikhethela.
Ngoko ke akukho nto ethoba isidima somntu nechasene nolawulo ngentando yoninzi ngaphezu kokwalela abantu ilungelo lokuzikhethela elisisiseko.

Ngokungafaniyo nolawulo loontamolukhuni, njengamatshantliziyo kwintlalo, abantu basembindini wembono kunye nobuchule endibusebenzisayo bokunikezela ngeendawo zokuhlala.
Ngokungafaniyo ke nenkqubo karhulumente wocalulo, nanjengetshantliziyo, abantu bayintsusa-mabandla yembono kwanecebo lam lokunikezela ngezindlu.
Ngokungafaniyo nangexesha likarhulumente wengcinezelo, njengomzabalazi wasekuhlaleni, abantu basembindini wembono yam neqhinga-buchule bonikezelo lolwakhiwo-zindlu.
Ngokungafaniyo nolawulo localucalulo, njengetsha-ntliziyo, abantu basesizikithini sombono wam nesicwangciso-cebo sokunikelwa kweendawo zokuhlala.
Ngokungafaniyo ke nenkqubo karhulumente wocalulo, nanjengetshantliziyo, abantu bayintsusa-mabandla yembono kwanecebo lam lokunikezela ngezindlu.
Ngokungafaniyo nangexesha likarhulumente wengcinezelo, njengomzabalazi wasekuhlaleni, abantu basembindini wembono yam neqhinga-buchule bonikezelo lolwakhiwo-zindlu.
Ngokungafaniyo nolawulo localucalulo, njengetsha-ntliziyo, abantu basesizikithini sombono wam nesicwangciso-cebo sokunikelwa kweendawo zokuhlala.

Ngokungafaniyo nolawulo loontamolukhuni, njengamatshantliziyo kwintlalo, abantu basembindini wembono kunye nobuchule endibusebenzisayo bokunikezela ngeendawo zokuhlala.
Ngokungafaniyo ke nenkqubo karhulumente wocalulo, nanjengetshantliziyo, abantu bayintsusa-mabandla yembono kwanecebo lam lokunikezela ngezindlu.
Ngokungafaniyo nangexesha likarhulumente wengcinezelo, njengomzabalazi wasekuhlaleni, abantu basembindini wembono yam neqhinga-buchule bonikezelo lolwakhiwo-zindlu.
Manenekazi namanene, ngale mvakwemini ndonwabile xa ndizathuzayo kuni ngodlwabevu lwam oluluqingqomali lwesibini njengoMphathiswa wePhondo ojongene neeNdawo zokuHlala 
Manene namanenekazi, ndinovuyo ngale mvakwemini, njengoMphathiswa wezeZindlu, lokunandlalela ngolwabiwo-mali lwam lwesibini.
Manene namanenekazi, ndiyavuya ngale mvakwemini ndigqithisa kuni ingxelo yam yohlahlo-lwabiwo-mali lwesibini njengoMphathiswa wePhondo kuLwakhiwo-zindlu.
Manenekazi naManene, ndinovuyo ngale mva kwemini lokuninika ingcaciso ngentetho yam yesibini yohlahlo lwabiwo-mali njengoMphathiswa wePhondo weeNdawo zokuHlala.
Manene namanenekazi, ndinovuyo ngale mvakwemini, njengoMphathiswa wezeZindlu, lokunandlalela ngolwabiwo-mali lwam lwesibini.
Manene namanenekazi, ndiyavuya ngale mvakwemini ndigqithisa kuni ingxelo yam yohlahlo-lwabiwo-mali lwesibini njengoMphathiswa wePhondo kuLwakhiwo-zindlu.
Manenekazi naManene, ndinovuyo ngale mva kwemini lokuninika ingcaciso ngentetho yam yesibini yohlahlo lwabiwo-mali njengoMphathiswa wePhondo weeNdawo zokuHlala.
Manenekazi namanene, ngale mvakwemini ndonwabile xa ndizathuzayo kuni ngodlwabevu lwam oluluqingqomali lwesibini njengoMphathiswa wePhondo ojongene neeNdawo zokuHlala 
Manene namanenekazi, ndiyavuya ngale mvakwemini ndigqithisa kuni ingxelo yam yohlahlo-lwabiwo-mali lwesibini njengoMphathiswa wePhondo kuLwakhiwo-zindlu.

Manene namanenekazi, ndinovuyo ngale mvakwemini, njengoMphathiswa wezeZindlu, lokunandlalela ngolwabiwo-mali lwam lwesibini.

Kananjalo ndinebhongo ngokuzathuza ngolu qingqomali ngengokuhlwa yese-10 isiKhumbuzo sedemokhrasi yethu.
Ndiyazingca kananjalo ngokunikezela ngolu lwabiwomali ngosuku oluphambi kweSikhumbuzo seminyaka eli-10 yedemokhrasi yethu.
Ndikwanebhongo lokuba ndigqithisa le ngxelo yohlahlo-lwabiwo-mali ngorhatya lwesikhumbuzo seminyaka eli-10 yedemokrasi yethu.
Kwakhona ndinebhongo ngokunika ingcaciso ngentetho yohlahlo-lwabiwo-mali ngosuku oluphambi kwesiKhumbuzo soNyaka we-10 wolawulo lwethu ngentando yoninzi.
Ndiyazingca kananjalo ngokunikezela ngolu lwabiwomali ngosuku oluphambi kweSikhumbuzo seminyaka eli-10 yedemokhrasi yethu.
Ndikwanebhongo lokuba ndigqithisa le ngxelo yohlahlo-lwabiwo-mali ngorhatya lwesikhumbuzo seminyaka eli-10 yedemokrasi yethu.

Kukho ubungqina obuphathekayo bokuba urhulumente okhokelwa yi-ANC sele ezuze lukhulu ngexesha elingaphantsi eminyakeni elishumi ilawula  ngokwedemokhrasi nangaphezu kokuba lilawule neliphi na ilizwe ehlabathini lonke.
Kukho ubungqina obubambekayo bokuba kuninzi okuphunyezwe ngurhulumente we-ANC kwisithuba nje esingaphantsi kweminyaka elishumi yolawulo lwayo lwedemokhrasi ngaphezu kwalo naliphi na ilizwe kwihlabathi jikelele.
Obu bubungqina benene bokuba urhulumente okhokelwa yi-ANC sele uphumeze okuninzi kwiminyakana nje engaphantsi kweshumi yolawulo lwedemokrasi kungekho nalinye ilizwe elingelinye elakhe lenza njalo kwihlabathi jikelele. 
Kukho ubungqina obubambekayo bokuba urhulumente okhokelwa yiANC uphumeze okukhulu kwiminyaka engaphantsi kwelishumi yolawulo lwakhe ngentando yoninzi ngaphezu nakokuphi okwakhe kwenziwa naleliphi ilizwe ehlabathini.
Kukho ubungqina obubambekayo bokuba kuninzi okuphunyezwe ngurhulumente we-ANC kwisithuba nje esingaphantsi kweminyaka elishumi yolawulo lwayo lwedemokhrasi ngaphezu kwalo naliphi na ilizwe kwihlabathi jikelele.

Sisebenzile – Siphumeze okuninzi.
Ngokwentetho evakalayo, kumathuba eendawo zokuhlala eziyi-1.4 yezigidi ezizindlu ezinikezelweyo ngurhulumente, ndiyazingca ngokwazisa ukuba sezikhona kweli lethu iphondo kule minyaka isithoba idlulileyo, kwanikezelwa ngeyunithi ezili-167 000, leyo yi-11% yezindlu zesizwe sonke.
Ngokuphandle, kumathuba okufumana izindlu azizigidi ezi-1.4 anikezele ngawo urhulumente, ndiziva ndinelunda lokuchaza ukuba iphondo lethu linikezele ngezindlu ezili-167 000 kule minyaka ilithoba idlulileyo, nto leyo engu-11% kuzwelonke.
Ngokwentetho evakalayo, kumathuba ali-1.4 esigidi solwakhiwo-zindlu ezinikezelwe nguRhulumente, ndiyazingca ngokwazisa ukuba iphondo lethu lithe, kwiminyaka elithoba edlulileyo, lanikezela ngeeyunithi ezili-167 000, neziyi-11% kwikeyiki kazwelonke. 
Ngendlela ebambekayo, kwiindawo zokuhlala ezizizigidi ezi-1.4 ezinikelwe ngurhulumente, ndineqhayiya ngokubhengeza ukuba iphondo lethu kwiminyaka elithoba, linikele ngezindlu eziyi-167 000, inani eliyi-11% kwezikazwelonke.
Ngokuphandle, kumathuba okufumana izindlu azizigidi ezi-1.4 anikezele ngawo urhulumente, ndiziva ndinelunda lokuchaza ukuba iphondo lethu linikezele ngezindlu ezili-167 000 kule minyaka ilithoba idlulileyo, nto leyo engu-11% kuzwelonke.
Ngokwentetho evakalayo, kumathuba ali-1.4 esigidi solwakhiwo-zindlu ezinikezelwe nguRhulumente, ndiyazingca ngokwazisa ukuba iphondo lethu lithe, kwiminyaka elithoba edlulileyo, lanikezela ngeeyunithi ezili-167 000, neziyi-11% kwikeyiki kazwelonke.

Oku, kweyam imbono, kungumsebenzi obalaseleyo ngokwawo nowuphi na umgangatho.
Oku, ngokunokwam, ngowona msebenzi ubalaseleyo.
Oku, ngokubona kwam ngumsebenzi obalaseleyo kakhulu kuwo nawuphina umgangatho.
Ngokoluvo lwam, lo ngumsebenzi obalaseleyo nangawuphi na umgangatho.
Oku, ngokunokwam, ngowona msebenzi ubalaseleyo.
Oku, ngokubona kwam ngumsebenzi obalaseleyo kakhulu kuwo nawuphina umgangatho.
Ngokoluvo lwam, lo ngumsebenzi obalaseleyo nangawuphi na umgangatho.

Kwakhona ndingathanda ukuthi unyaka ophelileyo ubuzele yimingeni, ethe yakuchaphazela kakubi ukunikezelwa kwezindlu elizweni lonke, ingakumbi kweli lethu iphondo.
Ndingathanda kwakhona ukubeka elubala into yokuba lo nyaka uphelileyo ubenemingeni kakhulu nto leyo ebenefuthe elibi ekunikezelweni kwezindlu kuzwelonke jikelele, ngokungakumbi apha ephondweni.
Ndingathanda nokubhalisa ukuba lo nyaka udlulileyo ubugcwele yimicela imngeni, nethe yanempembelelo engentlanga kunikezelo lolwakhiwo-zindlu elizweni lethu lilonke, kodwa ikakhulu kwiphondo.
Kwakhona ndinqwenela ukuphawula ukuba unyaka ophelileyo ebenemingeni emininzi, ebinefuthe elibi ekunikweni kweendawo zokuhlala kulo lonke ilizwe, ngakumbi kweli phondo.
Ndingathanda kwakhona ukubeka elubala into yokuba lo nyaka uphelileyo ubenemingeni kakhulu nto leyo ebenefuthe elibi ekunikezelweni kwezindlu kuzwelonke jikelele, ngokungakumbi apha ephondweni.
Ndingathanda nokubhalisa ukuba lo nyaka udlulileyo ubugcwele yimicela imngeni, nethe yanempembelelo engentlanga kunikezelo lolwakhiwo-zindlu elizweni lethu lilonke, kodwa ikakhulu kwiphondo.

Le mingeni ibangelwe kukwaziswa ngemimiselo emitsha yemigaqo-nkqubo nangendlela yokusetyenziswa kwayo efana negalelo labaxhamli eliyi-R2 479 kunye nokwaziswa ngoLungiselelo lwesiQinisekiso seBhodi eBhalisayo yaBakhi beziNdlu kuZwelonke ngokubhekiselele kwizindlu ezinikezelwayo ngurhulumente.
Le mingeni ibiziziphumo yemigaqo kwaneendlela ezitsha ezibekiweyo ezinjengegalelo lomxhamli elungama-R2 479 kunye nokwaziswa kweNkqubo yeSiqinisekiso yeQumrhu loKubhalisa kwizindlu ezifumana inkxaso kurhulumente.
Le mingeni ibangelwe kukuqaliswa kwemimiselo neendlela zomgaqo-nkqubo omtsha onjengegalelo lalowo ofumana inzuzo lama-R2 479 kwakunye nokuqaliswa kweNkqubo yoGunyaziso lweBhunga loBhaliso lwaBakhi bamaKhaya kuZwelonke kwizindlu ezixhaswa ngezimali ngurhulumente.
Le mingeni ibisisiphumo sokuqaliswa kwemimiselo emitsha yemigaqo-nkqubo neendlela zokusebenza ezifana negalelo lendlalifa eliyi-R2 479 kunye nokuqaliswa kwesiCwangciso sesiQinisekiso seBhunga leSizwe lokuBhalisa aBakhi bamaKhaya kubonelelo lweendawo zokuhlala oluxhaswa ngurhulumente.
Le mingeni ibiziziphumo yemigaqo kwaneendlela ezitsha ezibekiweyo ezinjengegalelo lomxhamli elungama-R2 479 kunye nokwaziswa kweNkqubo yeSiqinisekiso yeQumrhu loKubhalisa kwizindlu ezifumana inkxaso kurhulumente.

Le mingeni ibangelwe kukwaziswa ngemimiselo emitsha yemigaqo-nkqubo nangendlela yokusetyenziswa kwayo efana negalelo labaxhamli eliyi-R2 479 kunye nokwaziswa ngoLungiselelo lwesiQinisekiso seBhodi eBhalisayo yaBakhi beziNdlu kuZwelonke ngokubhekiselele kwizindlu ezinikezelwayo ngurhulumente.
Le mingeni ibangelwe kukuqaliswa kwemimiselo neendlela zomgaqo-nkqubo omtsha onjengegalelo lalowo ofumana inzuzo lama-R2 479 kwakunye nokuqaliswa kweNkqubo yoGunyaziso lweBhunga loBhaliso lwaBakhi bamaKhaya kuZwelonke kwizindlu ezixhaswa ngezimali ngurhulumente.
Le mingeni ibisisiphumo sokuqaliswa kwemimiselo emitsha yemigaqo-nkqubo neendlela zokusebenza ezifana negalelo lendlalifa eliyi-R2 479 kunye nokuqaliswa kwesiCwangciso sesiQinisekiso seBhunga leSizwe lokuBhalisa aBakhi bamaKhaya kubonelelo lweendawo zokuhlala oluxhaswa ngurhulumente.
Le mingeni ibangelwe kukwaziswa ngemimiselo emitsha yemigaqo-nkqubo nangendlela yokusetyenziswa kwayo efana negalelo labaxhamli eliyi-R2 479 kunye nokwaziswa ngoLungiselelo lwesiQinisekiso seBhodi eBhalisayo yaBakhi beziNdlu kuZwelonke ngokubhekiselele kwizindlu ezinikezelwayo ngurhulumente.
Le mingeni ibiziziphumo yemigaqo kwaneendlela ezitsha ezibekiweyo ezinjengegalelo lomxhamli elungama-R2 479 kunye nokwaziswa kweNkqubo yeSiqinisekiso yeQumrhu loKubhalisa kwizindlu ezifumana inkxaso kurhulumente.

Le mingeni ibangelwe kukuqaliswa kwemimiselo neendlela zomgaqo-nkqubo omtsha onjengegalelo lalowo ofumana inzuzo lama-R2 479 kwakunye nokuqaliswa kweNkqubo yoGunyaziso lweBhunga loBhaliso lwaBakhi bamaKhaya kuZwelonke kwizindlu ezixhaswa ngezimali ngurhulumente.
Injongo yala malungiselelo ayikokulubambezela unikezelo kuyaqinisekiswa ukuba abantu bethu bafumana izindlu ezisemgangathweni nabanokuzigcina zifanelekile.
La manyathelo awajoliswanga ekucothiseni ukunikezela ngezindlu kuloko ekuqinisekiseni ukuba abantu bethu bafumana izindlu ezisemgangathweni nezifikelelekayo.
Le milinganiselo ayijoliswanga ekucothiseni unikezelo koko ekuqinisekiseni ukuba abantu bethu bafumana izindlu ezisemgangathweni nezifikelelekayo.
La manyathelo awajoliswanga ekubanjezelweni kokunikelwa komsebenzi kodwa injongo kukuqinisekisa ukuba abantu bethu bafumana iindawo zokuhlala ezisemgangathweni nezifikelelekayo.
La manyathelo awajoliswanga ekucothiseni ukunikezela ngezindlu kuloko ekuqinisekiseni ukuba abantu bethu bafumana izindlu ezisemgangathweni nezifikelelekayo.

Le mfundiso siyizuzayo ngokusebenzisa le migaqo-nkqubo ilubambezele unikezelo noxa kunjalo.  
Ukukhawulelana nokuphunyezwa kwale migaqo-nkqubo kuye kwalucotisa unikezelo ngezindlu.
Okuyimfundiso esiyifundayo ekuzalisekiseni le migaqo-nkqubo kuthe kodwa kwacothisa unikezelo.
Esikufunda kwimpumezo yethu yale migaqo-nkqubo nangona kunjalo, kukubambezele ukunikelwa komsebenzi.
Ukukhawulelana nokuphunyezwa kwale migaqo-nkqubo kuye kwalucotisa unikezelo ngezindlu.

Okwenze izinto zonakala kakhulu kukuba elam isebe lasebenza lingenaye uMlawuli oyiNtloko kangangeenyanga ezisithoba.
Okona kwenze iimeko zibe mbi nangakumbi ibengumba wokuba isebe belingenaye uMlawuli oyiNtloko ixesha eligangeenyanga ezilithoba.
Ukwenza iimeko zibenzima kakhulu kukuba isebe lam lisebenze ngaphandle koMlawuli oyiNtloko kangangeenyanga ezilithoba.
Okwenze izinto zabambi ngakumbi yinyaniso yokuba isebe lam belisebenza ngaphandle koMlawuli oyiNtloko kwiinyanga ezilithoba.

Oku kwayibambezela kakhulu le nkqubo.
Oku kuyiqhwalelisile inkqubela ngeyona ndlela emangalisayo.
Oku kucothise inkqubela-phambili kwinqanaba elikhulu kakhulu.
Oku kuyidodobalalise kakhulu inkqubela.
Oku kuyiqhwalelisile inkqubela ngeyona ndlela emangalisayo.

Oku kwayibambezela kakhulu le nkqubo.

Oku kwayibambezela kakhulu le nkqubo.

Oku kuyidodobalalise kakhulu inkqubela.
Oku kwayibambezela kakhulu le nkqubo.
Oku kuyiqhwalelisile inkqubela ngeyona ndlela emangalisayo.
Oku kucothise inkqubela-phambili kwinqanaba elikhulu kakhulu.
Ngenxa yoko ndinyule omnye, uMnu. Seth Maqethuka, owazalelelwayo waza wakhulela kweli Kapa, unamava kurhulumente wommandla nakurhulumente kazwelonke, ndingathanda ukuvuyisana naye ndikwamamkela nangona oko sendikwenze amaxesha amaninzi.
Sele ndimqeshile omnye, uMnu Seth Maqethuka, oyinzalelwane yalapha eKapa nonamava okusebenza kuzwelonke nasephondweni, bendithanda ukuhalalisela nokumamkela, nangona sekuzizikhandlo ngezihlandlo ndikwenza oko.
Ndiye ndamqesha ke uMnu. Seth Maqethuka, ozalelwe waze wakhulela apha eKapa okwanamava kurhulumente wengingqi nakuzwelonke, nendingathanda ukuvuyisana naye ndikwamamkela nangona ndikwenze oko amatyeli amaninzi.
Ukususela ngoko ndityumbe omnye, uMnu. uSeth Maqethuka, ozelwe waze wakhulela eKapa nonamava karhulumente kazwelonke nowendawo, kwaye ndinqwenela ukuvuyisana naye kananjalo ndiyamamkela nangona sendikwenze kumaxa amaninzi oko.
Sele ndimqeshile omnye, uMnu Seth Maqethuka, oyinzalelwane yalapha eKapa nonamava okusebenza kuzwelonke nasephondweni, bendithanda ukuhalalisela nokumamkela, nangona sekuzizikhandlo ngezihlandlo ndikwenza oko.
Ndiye ndamqesha ke uMnu. Seth Maqethuka, ozalelwe waze wakhulela apha eKapa okwanamava kurhulumente wengingqi nakuzwelonke, nendingathanda ukuvuyisana naye ndikwamamkela nangona ndikwenze oko amatyeli amaninzi.

Sele ndimqeshile omnye, uMnu Seth Maqethuka, oyinzalelwane yalapha eKapa nonamava okusebenza kuzwelonke nasephondweni, bendithanda ukuhalalisela nokumamkela, nangona sekuzizikhandlo ngezihlandlo ndikwenza oko.
Ndiye ndamqesha ke uMnu. Seth Maqethuka, ozalelwe waze wakhulela apha eKapa okwanamava kurhulumente wengingqi nakuzwelonke, nendingathanda ukuvuyisana naye ndikwamamkela nangona ndikwenze oko amatyeli amaninzi.
Kuyo yonke le mingeni noku kunyanzelwa, ndinebhongo ngokwazisa abantu bakowethu ukuba elam isebe likwazile ukusebenzisa izigidi ezingama-R348, leyo yi-92% eyabelwe izindlu eNtshona Koloni.  
Nangani ibikhona le mingeni nemiqobo, ndiziva ndinelunda lokwazisa uluntu lwethu ukuba isebe lam likwazile ukuchitha izigidi ezingama 348 zeerandi, nto leyo engama-92% esabelo sezindlu eNtshona Koloni.
Kuyo yonke le micela imngeni nezithintelo, ndinebhongo lokwazisa ebantwini bethu ukuba isebe lam likwazile ukusebenzisa ama-R348 ezigidi, nengama-92% yolwabiwo-mali lolwakhiwo-zindlu eNtshona Koloni.
Nangona bekukho yonke le mingeni nezithintelo, ndineqhayiya ngokubhengeza kubantu bethu ukuba isebe lam likwazile ukuchitha izigidi eziyi-R348, eziyi-92% yolwabiwo-mali lweendawo zokuhlala kwiNtshona Koloni. 
Nangani ibikhona le mingeni nemiqobo, ndiziva ndinelunda lokwazisa uluntu lwethu ukuba isebe lam likwazile ukuchitha izigidi ezingama 348 zeerandi, nto leyo engama-92% esabelo sezindlu eNtshona Koloni.
Kuyo yonke le micela imngeni nezithintelo, ndinebhongo lokwazisa ebantwini bethu ukuba isebe lam likwazile ukusebenzisa ama-R348 ezigidi, nengama-92% yolwabiwo-mali lolwakhiwo-zindlu eNtshona Koloni.
Nangona bekukho yonke le mingeni nezithintelo, ndineqhayiya ngokubhengeza kubantu bethu ukuba isebe lam likwazile ukuchitha izigidi eziyi-R348, eziyi-92% yolwabiwo-mali lweendawo zokuhlala kwiNtshona Koloni.

Amanye amaphondo awakwazanga nokusebenzisa ama-52 % oqingqomali lwawo.
Amanye amaphondo awachitha nama-52% la wesabelo-mali sawo.
Amanye amaphondo awakwazanga nokusebenzisa ama-52% kuhlahlo-lwabiwo-mali lawo.
Amanye amaphondo awakwazanga nokuchitha i-52% yohlahlo lwabiwo-mali lwawo. 
Amanye amaphondo awachitha nama-52% la wesabelo-mali sawo.
Amanye amaphondo awakwazanga nokusebenzisa ama-52% kuhlahlo-lwabiwo-mali lawo.

Oku kubangele ukuba kuvunyelwe malunga nama-25 000 kwinkxaso yezindlu.
Oku kukhokelele ekupasisweni kwama-25 000 esabelo-mali yokuncedisa kwizindlu.
Oku kubangele ulwamkelo olumalunga nama-25 000 kwinkxaso-mali yolwakhiwo-zindlu.
Oku kubangele ukwamkelwa kweenkxaso-mali zeendawo zokuhlala ezimalunga nama-25 000.

Oku kubangele ukwamkelwa kweenkxaso-mali zeendawo zokuhlala ezimalunga nama-25 000.
Oku kubangele ukuba kuvunyelwe malunga nama-25 000 kwinkxaso yezindlu.
Oku kukhokelele ekupasisweni kwama-25 000 esabelo-mali yokuncedisa kwizindlu.
Oku kubangele ulwamkelo olumalunga nama-25 000 kwinkxaso-mali yolwakhiwo-zindlu.
Imfumba yeentsapho ezihluphekileyo iza kufumana ithuba lokonwatyiswa ziziqhamo zedemokhrasi yethu.
Amakhaya amaninzi ahluphekileyo azakufumana ithuba lokonwabela iziqhamo zedemokhrasi.
Iintsapho ezininzi ezihlwempuzekileyo ziza kufumana ithuba lokonwabela iziqhamo zedemokhrasi yethu.
Ziyanda ngokwanda iintsapho ezisweleyo eziya kufumana ithuba lokonwabela iziqhamo zolawulo lwethu ngentando yoninzi.

Oku manenekazi namanene, kuthetha ukongezeleleka kwama-3000 eeyunithi xa kuthelekiswa nonyaka ophelileyo.
Oku manene namanenekazi, kumele isongezo esibonakalayo sezindlu ezingama-3000 xa kuthelekiswa nakunyaka ophelileyo.
Oku, manenekazi namanene kumele ukwanda okukhulu kweyunithi ezingama-3000 xa sithelekisa nonyaka odlulileyo.
Oku manenekazi namanene, kumele ukwanda okukhulu kwezindlu eziyi-3000 xa kuthelekiswa nonyaka ophelileyo.

Kule  meko, ndingathanda ukwazisa ngenxaxheba ebalulekileyo ethathwe ngoomasipala beli phondo lethu.
Ngokuphathelele koku, ndikwabulela nendima ebalulekileyo edlalwe ngomasipala kweli phondo.
Ngoko ke, ndingathanda ukuvuma indima ebalulekileyo edlalwe ngoomasipala ngaphakathi kwiphondo lethu.
Malunga noku, ndinqwenela ukubulela indima ebalulekileyo edlalwe ngoomasipala kwiphondo lethu.

Xa bebengakhange bazimisele ngokusebenza benyanisekile, ngesingakhange sikwazi ukuba nenkcitho. 
Ngaphandle kokuzinikela kwabo nangomsebenzi oncomekayo abawenzileyo, besingeke sikwazi ukuyisebenzisa le mali.
Ngaphandle kokuzibophelela kwabo nomsebenzi obalaseleyo, ngesingakwazanga ukuyisebenzisa.
Ngaphandle kokuzinikela kwabo nomsebenzi wabo wodidi oluphezulu, ngesingakwazanga ukuchitha imali.

Ngokufanayo, ndingathanda ukuvuyisana nesiXeko saseKapa ngokusebenzisa malunga nama-70% kuqingqomali lwethu.
Kwangamxhelomnye, ndikwahalalisela iSixeko saseKapa ngokuchitha malunga nama-70% wesabelo sakhe.
Kwangomoya omnye, ndingathanda ukuvuyisana neSixeko saseKapa ngokusebenzisa ama-70% ohlahlo-lwabiwo-mali lwethu.
Ngamxhelomnye, ndinqwenela ukuvuyisana nesiXeko saseKapa ngokuchitha malunga ne-70% yohlahlo-lwabiwo-mali lwethu.

Andiwalibelanga amagosa am ngokusebenza nzima nangegalelo lawo kwimbono yethu yokufaka abantu ezindlwini.
Ndingawalibalanga amagosa ngokuzinikela kwabo kwanangegalelo labo kumbono wethu wokunikezela ngezindlu kwisizwe.
Andiwalibelanga amagosa ethu ngokusebenza kwawo nzima negalelo lawo kwimibono yethu yokwakha izindlu zesizwe.
Kwakhona andinakuwalibala amagosa am ngokusebenza nzima kwawo negalelo lawo kumbono wethu ngobonelelo lwesizwe lweendawo zokuhlala.

Manenekazi namanene, ndakuba andinyanisekanga kwizazela zam ezindithunukayo xa ndinokunichazela ngezinto ezintle kuphela kwinkqubo yokunikezelwa kweendawo zokuhlala.
Manene namanenekazi, ndakube ndenze intsomi emini ukuba ndingenza ngokungathi inkqubo yokunikezela ngezindlu ibimthebelele.
Manenekazi namanene, ndiyakube andinyanisekanga kwimiyalelo yesazela sam ukuba ndinikezele ngomfanekiso omhle kwinkqubo yonikezelo lolwakhiwo-zindlu kuphela.
Manenekazi namanene, ndiya kuba andisimameli isazela sam xa ndinokunika umfanekiso ohonjisiweyo wenkqubo yokunikwa kweendawo zokuhlala.
Manene namanenekazi, ndakube ndenze intsomi emini ukuba ndingenza ngokungathi inkqubo yokunikezela ngezindlu ibimthebelele.

Kusekho izikhewu ezingavalekanga kwinkqubo yethu yokunikezelwa kweendawo zokuhlala.
Kusekho imisantsa ekhoyo kwinkqubo yethu yokunikezela ngezindlu.
Ezi zizithuba ezisashiyekileyo kwinkqubo yethu yonikezelo.
Kusekho imiba yobuthathaka kwinkqubo yethu yokunikela ngemisebenzi.

Ezi zizithuba ezisashiyekileyo kwinkqubo yethu yonikezelo.

Kusekho imiba yobuthathaka kwinkqubo yethu yokunikela ngemisebenzi.

Kusekho imisantsa ekhoyo kwinkqubo yethu yokunikezela ngezindlu.

Kude kube ngoku, kusafuneka siphucule le mibandela isasitshisayo:
Ukuza kuthi ga ngoku, kusafuneka siphucule kule miba ilandelayo netshisa ibunzi:
Kude kube ngoku, kusafuneka siphuhlise ezi ndawo zingxamisekileyo zilandelayo:
Kude kube ngoku, kusafuneka siphucule imibandela elandelayo engxamisekileyo:
Ukuza kuthi ga ngoku, kusafuneka siphucule kule miba ilandelayo netshisa ibunzi:
Kude kube ngoku, kusafuneka siphuhlise ezi ndawo zingxamisekileyo zilandelayo:
Kude kube ngoku, kusafuneka siphucule imibandela elandelayo engxamisekileyo:
Kude kube ngoku, kusafuneka siphucule le mibandela isasitshisayo:
Kude kube ngoku, kusafuneka siphuhlise ezi ndawo zingxamisekileyo zilandelayo:
Kude kube ngoku, kusafuneka siphucule imibandela elandelayo engxamisekileyo:
Kude kube ngoku, kusafuneka siphucule le mibandela isasitshisayo:
Ukuza kuthi ga ngoku, kusafuneka siphucule kule miba ilandelayo netshisa ibunzi:
Kude kube ngoku, kusafuneka siphucule imibandela elandelayo engxamisekileyo:
Kude kube ngoku, kusafuneka siphucule le mibandela isasitshisayo:
Ukuza kuthi ga ngoku, kusafuneka siphucule kule miba ilandelayo netshisa ibunzi:
Kude kube ngoku, kusafuneka siphuhlise ezi ndawo zingxamisekileyo zilandelayo:
Izindlu zethu ezininzi azikaluthobeli ushenxiso olukhankanyiweyo kumgaqonkqubo oluthetha ukungaleqi ukwakha izindlu ezininzi, kusuke kugxilwe ekwakheni izindlu ezikowona mgangatho uphezulu nowamkelekileyo. 
Uninzi lwezindlu zethu azikahambisani nokutshintsha komgaqonkqubo ukusukela kwizindlu ezininzi ukuya kwezisemgangathweni
Uninzi lwezindlu zethu azikathobelani nokutshintsha komgaqo-nkqubo osuka kwinani ukuya kumgangatho wezindlu.
Uninzi lwezindlu zethu azikayithobeli inguquko yomgaqo-nkqubo ukususela kubonelelo lweendawo zokuhlala ngamanani aphezulu ukuya kolusemgangathweni ophezulu.
Uninzi lwezindlu zethu azikahambisani nokutshintsha komgaqonkqubo ukusukela kwizindlu ezininzi ukuya kwezisemgangathweni
Uninzi lwezindlu zethu azikathobelani nokutshintsha komgaqo-nkqubo osuka kwinani ukuya kumgangatho wezindlu.
Uninzi lwezindlu zethu azikayithobeli inguquko yomgaqo-nkqubo ukususela kubonelelo lweendawo zokuhlala ngamanani aphezulu ukuya kolusemgangathweni ophezulu.
Izindlu zethu ezininzi azikaluthobeli ushenxiso olukhankanyiweyo kumgaqonkqubo oluthetha ukungaleqi ukwakha izindlu ezininzi, kusuke kugxilwe ekwakheni izindlu ezikowona mgangatho uphezulu nowamkelekileyo. 
Uninzi lwezindlu zethu azikathobelani nokutshintsha komgaqo-nkqubo osuka kwinani ukuya kumgangatho wezindlu.
Uninzi lwezindlu zethu azikayithobeli inguquko yomgaqo-nkqubo ukususela kubonelelo lweendawo zokuhlala ngamanani aphezulu ukuya kolusemgangathweni ophezulu.
Izindlu zethu ezininzi azikaluthobeli ushenxiso olukhankanyiweyo kumgaqonkqubo oluthetha ukungaleqi ukwakha izindlu ezininzi, kusuke kugxilwe ekwakheni izindlu ezikowona mgangatho uphezulu nowamkelekileyo. 
Uninzi lwezindlu zethu azikahambisani nokutshintsha komgaqonkqubo ukusukela kwizindlu ezininzi ukuya kwezisemgangathweni
Uninzi lwezindlu zethu azikayithobeli inguquko yomgaqo-nkqubo ukususela kubonelelo lweendawo zokuhlala ngamanani aphezulu ukuya kolusemgangathweni ophezulu.
Izindlu zethu ezininzi azikaluthobeli ushenxiso olukhankanyiweyo kumgaqonkqubo oluthetha ukungaleqi ukwakha izindlu ezininzi, kusuke kugxilwe ekwakheni izindlu ezikowona mgangatho uphezulu nowamkelekileyo. 
Uninzi lwezindlu zethu azikahambisani nokutshintsha komgaqonkqubo ukusukela kwizindlu ezininzi ukuya kwezisemgangathweni
Uninzi lwezindlu zethu azikathobelani nokutshintsha komgaqo-nkqubo osuka kwinani ukuya kumgangatho wezindlu.
Kusafuneka siyiguqule le nkqubo yokunikezela ngezindlu esuka ekunikezelweni kwesikhundla esinophahla,makugxilwe ekwakheni iindawo ezinozinzo ezikufaneleyo ukuhlala kwabantu.
Kusafuneka sitshintshe inkqubo yokunikezelwa kwezindlu ukususela kuleyo yokwenza nje iindawo zokufihla intloko ukuya ekusekweni kweendawo zokuhlala ezinokuhlala ixesha elide.
Kusafuneka sitshintshe inkqubo yonikezelo lwezindlu ukusuka kuleyo yokunikezela indawo yokufihla intloko ukuya kuleyo yokuyila iindawo zokuhlala ezigcinekileyo.
Kusafuneka siguqule inkqubo yobonelelo lweendawo zokuhlala ukususela ekunikeni ikhusi ukuya ekwakheni iindawo zokuhlala abantu ezilondolozekayo.
Kusafuneka sitshintshe inkqubo yokunikezelwa kwezindlu ukususela kuleyo yokwenza nje iindawo zokufihla intloko ukuya ekusekweni kweendawo zokuhlala ezinokuhlala ixesha elide.
Kusafuneka sitshintshe inkqubo yonikezelo lwezindlu ukusuka kuleyo yokunikezela indawo yokufihla intloko ukuya kuleyo yokuyila iindawo zokuhlala ezigcinekileyo.
Kusafuneka siguqule inkqubo yobonelelo lweendawo zokuhlala ukususela ekunikeni ikhusi ukuya ekwakheni iindawo zokuhlala abantu ezilondolozekayo.
Kusafuneka siyiguqule le nkqubo yokunikezela ngezindlu esuka ekunikezelweni kwesikhundla esinophahla,makugxilwe ekwakheni iindawo ezinozinzo ezikufaneleyo ukuhlala kwabantu.
Kusafuneka sitshintshe inkqubo yonikezelo lwezindlu ukusuka kuleyo yokunikezela indawo yokufihla intloko ukuya kuleyo yokuyila iindawo zokuhlala ezigcinekileyo.
Kusafuneka siguqule inkqubo yobonelelo lweendawo zokuhlala ukususela ekunikeni ikhusi ukuya ekwakheni iindawo zokuhlala abantu ezilondolozekayo.
Kusafuneka siyiguqule le nkqubo yokunikezela ngezindlu esuka ekunikezelweni kwesikhundla esinophahla,makugxilwe ekwakheni iindawo ezinozinzo ezikufaneleyo ukuhlala kwabantu.
Kusafuneka sitshintshe inkqubo yokunikezelwa kwezindlu ukususela kuleyo yokwenza nje iindawo zokufihla intloko ukuya ekusekweni kweendawo zokuhlala ezinokuhlala ixesha elide.
Kusafuneka siguqule inkqubo yobonelelo lweendawo zokuhlala ukususela ekunikeni ikhusi ukuya ekwakheni iindawo zokuhlala abantu ezilondolozekayo.
Kusafuneka siyiguqule le nkqubo yokunikezela ngezindlu esuka ekunikezelweni kwesikhundla esinophahla,makugxilwe ekwakheni iindawo ezinozinzo ezikufaneleyo ukuhlala kwabantu.
Kusafuneka sitshintshe inkqubo yokunikezelwa kwezindlu ukususela kuleyo yokwenza nje iindawo zokufihla intloko ukuya ekusekweni kweendawo zokuhlala ezinokuhlala ixesha elide.
Kusafuneka sitshintshe inkqubo yonikezelo lwezindlu ukusuka kuleyo yokunikezela indawo yokufihla intloko ukuya kuleyo yokuyila iindawo zokuhlala ezigcinekileyo.
Kusafuneka siyiguqule intathonxaxheba yabaxhamli ukuze bangabi ngababukeli nabamkeli nje kodwa,  mabasebenze ngokudlamkileyo.
Kufuneka sitshintshe uthatho-nxaxheba lwabaxhamli bangabi ngabamkeli nje kuloko babandakanyeke nabo.
Kufuneka siguqule ukuthatha inxaxheba kwabantu abafumana inzuzo ukusuka ekuthatheni inxaxheba okutyhafileyo ukuya kokudlamkileyo.
Sifanele ukuguqula inxaxheba yeendlalifa ukususela ekusongeni izandla ukuya kwinxaxheba yokuququzela.
Kufuneka sitshintshe uthatho-nxaxheba lwabaxhamli bangabi ngabamkeli nje kuloko babandakanyeke nabo.
Kufuneka siguqule ukuthatha inxaxheba kwabantu abafumana inzuzo ukusuka ekuthatheni inxaxheba okutyhafileyo ukuya kokudlamkileyo.
Sifanele ukuguqula inxaxheba yeendlalifa ukususela ekusongeni izandla ukuya kwinxaxheba yokuququzela.
Kusafuneka siyiguqule intathonxaxheba yabaxhamli ukuze bangabi ngababukeli nabamkeli nje kodwa,  mabasebenze ngokudlamkileyo.
Kufuneka siguqule ukuthatha inxaxheba kwabantu abafumana inzuzo ukusuka ekuthatheni inxaxheba okutyhafileyo ukuya kokudlamkileyo.
Sifanele ukuguqula inxaxheba yeendlalifa ukususela ekusongeni izandla ukuya kwinxaxheba yokuququzela.
Kusafuneka siyiguqule intathonxaxheba yabaxhamli ukuze bangabi ngababukeli nabamkeli nje kodwa,  mabasebenze ngokudlamkileyo.
Kufuneka sitshintshe uthatho-nxaxheba lwabaxhamli bangabi ngabamkeli nje kuloko babandakanyeke nabo.
Sifanele ukuguqula inxaxheba yeendlalifa ukususela ekusongeni izandla ukuya kwinxaxheba yokuququzela.
Kusafuneka siyiguqule intathonxaxheba yabaxhamli ukuze bangabi ngababukeli nabamkeli nje kodwa,  mabasebenze ngokudlamkileyo.
Kufuneka sitshintshe uthatho-nxaxheba lwabaxhamli bangabi ngabamkeli nje kuloko babandakanyeke nabo.
Kufuneka siguqule ukuthatha inxaxheba kwabantu abafumana inzuzo ukusuka ekuthatheni inxaxheba okutyhafileyo ukuya kokudlamkileyo.
Kusafuneka siyiguqule indlela yokucinga kwabantu bethuukuze bakwazi ukuqalisa bejonga ezi zindlu zinikezelwa ngurhulumente njengeendawo ezinexabiso, ingezizo iimveliso nje kodwa.
Kufuneka sitshintshe iingqondo zabantu bethu ukwenzela ukuba baqalise ukucinga ngezindlu ezifumana inkxaso esisabelo sikarhulumente njengempahla yexabiso endaweni yezindlu nje. 
Kufuneka sitshintshe iingqondo zabantu bethu ukuze baqale ukujonga izindlu ezixhaswa ngemali karhulumente njengemveliso engephi koko njengee-aseti.
Sidinga ukuguqula iindlela abacinga ngazo abantu bethu ukuze baqale ngokujonga izindlu ezifumana inkxaso-mali karhulumente njengempahla yexabiso endaweni yokuba ibe ziimveliso kuphela.
Kufuneka sitshintshe iingqondo zabantu bethu ukwenzela ukuba baqalise ukucinga ngezindlu ezifumana inkxaso esisabelo sikarhulumente njengempahla yexabiso endaweni yezindlu nje. 
Kufuneka sitshintshe iingqondo zabantu bethu ukuze baqale ukujonga izindlu ezixhaswa ngemali karhulumente njengemveliso engephi koko njengee-aseti.
Sidinga ukuguqula iindlela abacinga ngazo abantu bethu ukuze baqale ngokujonga izindlu ezifumana inkxaso-mali karhulumente njengempahla yexabiso endaweni yokuba ibe ziimveliso kuphela.
Kusafuneka siyiguqule indlela yokucinga kwabantu bethuukuze bakwazi ukuqalisa bejonga ezi zindlu zinikezelwa ngurhulumente njengeendawo ezinexabiso, ingezizo iimveliso nje kodwa.
Kufuneka sitshintshe iingqondo zabantu bethu ukuze baqale ukujonga izindlu ezixhaswa ngemali karhulumente njengemveliso engephi koko njengee-aseti.
Sidinga ukuguqula iindlela abacinga ngazo abantu bethu ukuze baqale ngokujonga izindlu ezifumana inkxaso-mali karhulumente njengempahla yexabiso endaweni yokuba ibe ziimveliso kuphela.
Kusafuneka siyiguqule indlela yokucinga kwabantu bethuukuze bakwazi ukuqalisa bejonga ezi zindlu zinikezelwa ngurhulumente njengeendawo ezinexabiso, ingezizo iimveliso nje kodwa.
Kufuneka sitshintshe iingqondo zabantu bethu ukwenzela ukuba baqalise ukucinga ngezindlu ezifumana inkxaso esisabelo sikarhulumente njengempahla yexabiso endaweni yezindlu nje. 
Sidinga ukuguqula iindlela abacinga ngazo abantu bethu ukuze baqale ngokujonga izindlu ezifumana inkxaso-mali karhulumente njengempahla yexabiso endaweni yokuba ibe ziimveliso kuphela.
Kusafuneka siyiguqule indlela yokucinga kwabantu bethuukuze bakwazi ukuqalisa bejonga ezi zindlu zinikezelwa ngurhulumente njengeendawo ezinexabiso, ingezizo iimveliso nje kodwa.
Kufuneka sitshintshe iingqondo zabantu bethu ukwenzela ukuba baqalise ukucinga ngezindlu ezifumana inkxaso esisabelo sikarhulumente njengempahla yexabiso endaweni yezindlu nje. 
Kufuneka sitshintshe iingqondo zabantu bethu ukuze baqale ukujonga izindlu ezixhaswa ngemali karhulumente njengemveliso engephi koko njengee-aseti.

UKUKHUSELWA  KOLUNTU NGOKWAHLULA  AMAPOLISA  NGOKWAMAQELA
ICANDELO LOPOLISO NOLUNTU LIYASEBENZA
UMSEBENZI WOBUPOLISA KUMACANDELO
IMISEBENZI YOBUPOLISA BAMACANDELO
ICANDELO LOPOLISO NOLUNTU LIYASEBENZA
UMSEBENZI WOBUPOLISA KUMACANDELO
IMISEBENZI YOBUPOLISA BAMACANDELO
UKUKHUSELWA  KOLUNTU NGOKWAHLULA  AMAPOLISA  NGOKWAMAQELA
UMSEBENZI WOBUPOLISA KUMACANDELO
IMISEBENZI YOBUPOLISA BAMACANDELO
UKUKHUSELWA  KOLUNTU NGOKWAHLULA  AMAPOLISA  NGOKWAMAQELA
ICANDELO LOPOLISO NOLUNTU LIYASEBENZA
IMISEBENZI YOBUPOLISA BAMACANDELO
UKUKHUSELWA  KOLUNTU NGOKWAHLULA  AMAPOLISA  NGOKWAMAQELA
ICANDELO LOPOLISO NOLUNTU LIYASEBENZA
UMSEBENZI WOBUPOLISA KUMACANDELO
Watsho waphumla umama nomntwana xa uJames Busakwe omdala ngeentsuku ezili-16 wabuyiselwa ebazalini bakhe bokwenene ngomhla wesi-7 ngo-Epreli  2006.
Umama nomntwana wakhe bafumene isiqabu akudityaniswa nomama wakhe omzalayo uJames Busakwe oneminyaka eli-16 ngomhla we-7 kuApreli 2006.
Ibikukuxola okukhulu kumama kunye nomntwana ngexa uJames Busakwe oneentsuku ezili-16 ubudala ethe wadityaniswa nomama wakhe omzalayo ngomhla we-7 Epreli 2006.
Saba sikhulu isiqabu kumama nomntwana xa uJames Busakwe weentsuku eziyi-16 ubudala wayebuyela kumama wakhe wegazi ngomhla wesi-7 Epreli 2006.
Umama nomntwana wakhe bafumene isiqabu akudityaniswa nomama wakhe omzalayo uJames Busakwe oneminyaka eli-16 ngomhla we-7 kuApreli 2006.
Ibikukuxola okukhulu kumama kunye nomntwana ngexa uJames Busakwe oneentsuku ezili-16 ubudala ethe wadityaniswa nomama wakhe omzalayo ngomhla we-7 Epreli 2006.
Saba sikhulu isiqabu kumama nomntwana xa uJames Busakwe weentsuku eziyi-16 ubudala wayebuyela kumama wakhe wegazi ngomhla wesi-7 Epreli 2006.
Watsho waphumla umama nomntwana xa uJames Busakwe omdala ngeentsuku ezili-16 wabuyiselwa ebazalini bakhe bokwenene ngomhla wesi-7 ngo-Epreli  2006.
Ibikukuxola okukhulu kumama kunye nomntwana ngexa uJames Busakwe oneentsuku ezili-16 ubudala ethe wadityaniswa nomama wakhe omzalayo ngomhla we-7 Epreli 2006.
Saba sikhulu isiqabu kumama nomntwana xa uJames Busakwe weentsuku eziyi-16 ubudala wayebuyela kumama wakhe wegazi ngomhla wesi-7 Epreli 2006.
