Umama nomntwana wakhe bafumene isiqabu akudityaniswa nomama wakhe omzalayo uJames Busakwe oneminyaka eli-16 ngomhla we-7 kuApreli 2006.
Saba sikhulu isiqabu kumama nomntwana xa uJames Busakwe weentsuku eziyi-16 ubudala wayebuyela kumama wakhe wegazi ngomhla wesi-7 Epreli 2006.
Watsho waphumla umama nomntwana xa uJames Busakwe omdala ngeentsuku ezili-16 wabuyiselwa ebazalini bakhe bokwenene ngomhla wesi-7 ngo-Epreli  2006.
Umama nomntwana wakhe bafumene isiqabu akudityaniswa nomama wakhe omzalayo uJames Busakwe oneminyaka eli-16 ngomhla we-7 kuApreli 2006.
Ibikukuxola okukhulu kumama kunye nomntwana ngexa uJames Busakwe oneentsuku ezili-16 ubudala ethe wadityaniswa nomama wakhe omzalayo ngomhla we-7 Epreli 2006.
Ingxaki yaqala mhla unina wosana olunguJames wafika kwisiBhedlele saseKlerksdorp ngomhla wesi-6 ngo-Epreli etyelela usana lwakhe, abongikazi baqaphela ukuba usana lwanikezelwa komnye umama, yena wathi ungoyena nina wosana ngosuku olungaphambili kolo.
Eli shwangusha laqala mhla umama wosana olungu-James wathi wagaleleka kwisibhedlele saseKlerksdorp ngomhla we-6 kuApreli ezoubona unyana wakhe, aze amanesi aqaphela ukuba umntwana wanikezelwa komnye umama, owathi ungunina wosana olo ngosuku olungaphambi kolo.
Esi silingo esinzima siqale ngexa umama wosana olunguJames efika kwisibhedlele saseKlerksdorp ngomhla we-6 Epreli etyelela unyana wakhe, baze abongikazi baqaphela ukuba umntwana unikwe enye inkosikazi, ebange ukuba ingunina ozala lomntwana ngezolo.
Esi silingo saqala mhla umama wosana uJames wafika esiBhedlele saseKlerksdorp ngomhla wesi-6 Epreli eye kutyelela unyana wakhe, baze abongi bafumanisa ukuba umntwana unikelwe kwelinye ibhinqa, elathi lingumama wegazi womntwana ngezolo. 
Eli shwangusha laqala mhla umama wosana olungu-James wathi wagaleleka kwisibhedlele saseKlerksdorp ngomhla we-6 kuApreli ezoubona unyana wakhe, aze amanesi aqaphela ukuba umntwana wanikezelwa komnye umama, owathi ungunina wosana olo ngosuku olungaphambi kolo.
Esi silingo esinzima siqale ngexa umama wosana olunguJames efika kwisibhedlele saseKlerksdorp ngomhla we-6 Epreli etyelela unyana wakhe, baze abongikazi baqaphela ukuba umntwana unikwe enye inkosikazi, ebange ukuba ingunina ozala lomntwana ngezolo.
Esi silingo saqala mhla umama wosana uJames wafika esiBhedlele saseKlerksdorp ngomhla wesi-6 Epreli eye kutyelela unyana wakhe, baze abongi bafumanisa ukuba umntwana unikelwe kwelinye ibhinqa, elathi lingumama wegazi womntwana ngezolo. 
Ingxaki yaqala mhla unina wosana olunguJames wafika kwisiBhedlele saseKlerksdorp ngomhla wesi-6 ngo-Epreli etyelela usana lwakhe, abongikazi baqaphela ukuba usana lwanikezelwa komnye umama, yena wathi ungoyena nina wosana ngosuku olungaphambili kolo.
Esi silingo esinzima siqale ngexa umama wosana olunguJames efika kwisibhedlele saseKlerksdorp ngomhla we-6 Epreli etyelela unyana wakhe, baze abongikazi baqaphela ukuba umntwana unikwe enye inkosikazi, ebange ukuba ingunina ozala lomntwana ngezolo.
Esi silingo saqala mhla umama wosana uJames wafika esiBhedlele saseKlerksdorp ngomhla wesi-6 Epreli eye kutyelela unyana wakhe, baze abongi bafumanisa ukuba umntwana unikelwe kwelinye ibhinqa, elathi lingumama wegazi womntwana ngezolo. 
Ingxaki yaqala mhla unina wosana olunguJames wafika kwisiBhedlele saseKlerksdorp ngomhla wesi-6 ngo-Epreli etyelela usana lwakhe, abongikazi baqaphela ukuba usana lwanikezelwa komnye umama, yena wathi ungoyena nina wosana ngosuku olungaphambili kolo.

Eli shwangusha laqala mhla umama wosana olungu-James wathi wagaleleka kwisibhedlele saseKlerksdorp ngomhla we-6 kuApreli ezoubona unyana wakhe, aze amanesi aqaphela ukuba umntwana wanikezelwa komnye umama, owathi ungunina wosana olo ngosuku olungaphambi kolo.
Esi silingo esinzima siqale ngexa umama wosana olunguJames efika kwisibhedlele saseKlerksdorp ngomhla we-6 Epreli etyelela unyana wakhe, baze abongikazi baqaphela ukuba umntwana unikwe enye inkosikazi, ebange ukuba ingunina ozala lomntwana ngezolo.
Kwangoko emva kokuba kubhaqiwe oko, abongikazi baxelela uMzi wamaPolisa iKanana ngoba inenekazi elalizenza umama kaJames laliyinike abongikazi idilesi yaseKanana.
Ngoko nangoko emva kokufumanisa ngale nto, amanesi akubika oku kwiSikhululo saMapolisa saseKanana, nanjengoko umfazi owathi ungunina kaJames wayebanike idilesi yaseKanana.
Ngokukhawuleza emva kokufumanisa oku, abongikazi bazise iSikhululo samaPolisa saseKanana, njengoko inkosikazi ethathe uJames inikezele idilesi eKanana.
Kwamsinyane emva kokufunyaniswa koko, abongi banika ingxelo kwisiKhululo samaPolisa iKanana, njengoko ibhinqa elalithathe uJames lalinikele ngeadresi eKanana.
Ngoko nangoko emva kokufumanisa ngale nto, amanesi akubika oku kwiSikhululo saMapolisa saseKanana, nanjengoko umfazi owathi ungunina kaJames wayebanike idilesi yaseKanana.
Ngokukhawuleza emva kokufumanisa oku, abongikazi bazise iSikhululo samaPolisa saseKanana, njengoko inkosikazi ethathe uJames inikezele idilesi eKanana.
Kwamsinyane emva kokufunyaniswa koko, abongi banika ingxelo kwisiKhululo samaPolisa iKanana, njengoko ibhinqa elalithathe uJames lalinikele ngeadresi eKanana.

Yafunwa le ndawo wayebaxelele ngayo  kodwa zange ifumaneke.
Yakhangelwa le dilesi kodwa zange ifumaneke.
Idilesi ikhangelwe kodwa akwabikho mpumelelo.
Iadresi yaqwalaselwa kodwa ngaphandle kwempumelelo.
Yakhangelwa le dilesi kodwa zange ifumaneke.
Idilesi ikhangelwe kodwa akwabikho mpumelelo.
Iadresi yaqwalaselwa kodwa ngaphandle kwempumelelo.
Yafunwa le ndawo wayebaxelele ngayo  kodwa zange ifumaneke.
Idilesi ikhangelwe kodwa akwabikho mpumelelo.
Iadresi yaqwalaselwa kodwa ngaphandle kwempumelelo.
Yafunwa le ndawo wayebaxelele ngayo  kodwa zange ifumaneke.
Yakhangelwa le dilesi kodwa zange ifumaneke.
Iadresi yaqwalaselwa kodwa ngaphandle kwempumelelo.
Yafunwa le ndawo wayebaxelele ngayo  kodwa zange ifumaneke.
Yakhangelwa le dilesi kodwa zange ifumaneke.
Idilesi ikhangelwe kodwa akwabikho mpumelelo.
Igama lenenekazi nenkcazelo ngayo zazingaziwa mntu kule dilesi.
Akukho namnye onelo gama okanye onezo mpawu zalo mfazi owayesaziwa kule dilesi.
Akukho mntu onegama okanye inkcazelo ngale nkosikazi owaziwayo kule dilesi.
Akukho mntu owayenegama okanye inkcazelo yebhinqa owayesaziwa kuloo adresi.
Akukho namnye onelo gama okanye onezo mpawu zalo mfazi owayesaziwa kule dilesi.
Akukho mntu onegama okanye inkcazelo ngale nkosikazi owaziwayo kule dilesi.
Akukho mntu owayenegama okanye inkcazelo yebhinqa owayesaziwa kuloo adresi.
Igama lenenekazi nenkcazelo ngayo zazingaziwa mntu kule dilesi.
Akukho mntu onegama okanye inkcazelo ngale nkosikazi owaziwayo kule dilesi.
Akukho mntu owayenegama okanye inkcazelo yebhinqa owayesaziwa kuloo adresi.
Igama lenenekazi nenkcazelo ngayo zazingaziwa mntu kule dilesi.
Akukho namnye onelo gama okanye onezo mpawu zalo mfazi owayesaziwa kule dilesi.
Akukho mntu owayenegama okanye inkcazelo yebhinqa owayesaziwa kuloo adresi.
Igama lenenekazi nenkcazelo ngayo zazingaziwa mntu kule dilesi.
Akukho namnye onelo gama okanye onezo mpawu zalo mfazi owayesaziwa kule dilesi.
Akukho mntu onegama okanye inkcazelo ngale nkosikazi owaziwayo kule dilesi.
Ngengokuhlwa yomhla wesi-6 ngo-EpreliiGqiza elijongene noLwaphulo-mthetho laseKanana laba nentlanganiso.
Ngobusuku bange-6 kuApreli iCFP yaseKanana yabamba intlanganiso.
Ngorhatya lomhla we-6 Epreli, iKanana CPF yabamba intlanganiso.
Ngentshonalanga yomhla wesi-6 Epreli iCPF yaseKanana yabamba intlanganiso.
Ngobusuku bange-6 kuApreli iCFP yaseKanana yabamba intlanganiso.
Ngorhatya lomhla we-6 Epreli, iKanana CPF yabamba intlanganiso.
Ngentshonalanga yomhla wesi-6 Epreli iCPF yaseKanana yabamba intlanganiso.

Ibambela elingumkhomishinari wesitishi lachazela eli gqiza ngokugcinwa kolo sana kujongwe inzuzo laza lacela wonke umntu ukuba makavule amehlo neendlebe.
Ibambela mkomishinala yesikhululo yabikela abantu ababesentlanganisweni malunga nokuxhwilwa kosana laze lacela wonke ubani ukuba bahlale bevule amehlo neendlebe.
UMkhomishinala wesikhululo abambeleyo wazisa intlanganiso malunga ngomntwana othinjiweyo waze wacela wonke umntu ukuba agcine amehlo neendlebe zakhe zivulekile.
Ikhomishina yesikhululo eyayibambe isikhundla yaxelela intlanganiso ngomntwana obiweyo yaze yacela ukuba wonke umntu agcine amehlo neendlebe zakhe zivulekile.

Malunga ne-23:00  kwangobo busuku, omnye kubahlali waxelela amapolisa ukuba umfazi ohlala kwindawo yabo, ebengaziwa njengomntu okhulelweyo kodwa ubonwa sele enosana oluyinkwenkwe. 
Malunga nesithuba sika-23:00 kwangobo busuku, elinye ilungu lasekuhlaleni lachazela amapolisa ngomfazi ohlala kwakuloo ndawo nongazange wabonwa ekhulelwe, kodwa owayenosana oluyinkwenkwe.
Malunga nentsimbi ye-23:00 kwangobo busuku, elinye lamalungu asekuhlaleni lafowunela amapolisa liwachazela ukuba inkosikazi ehlala kwicandelo labo, nongaziwayo ngexa ekhulelwe, ngephanyazo ubonwe sele enomntwana oyinkwenkwe.
Kuthe ngentsimbi ye-23:00 kwangobo busuku, omnye phakathi koluntu watsalela umnxeba emapoliseni esithi ufumanise ukuba kukho ibhinqa kwindawo ahlala kuyo elingakhange libonwe likhulelwe, kodwa ngephanyazo linosana oluyinkwenkwe.

Amapolisa alandela lo mkhondo, ngokwenene alifumana elo nenekazi nolo sana.
Amapolisa alanda ekhondweni ngokweenkcukacha aze eneneni amfumana umfazi nomntwana.
Amapolisa alandele olu lwazi aze ayifumana inkosikazi kunye nomntwana.
Amapolisa alandela ezi nkcukacha ngenene alifumana ibhinqa elalinomntwana.

Abesibhedlele kwayiwa kubo baza kwangoko balwazi olo sana, nomfazi lowo wayemthathe kweso sibhedlele bamnakana abasebenzi. 
Abasebenzi basesibhedlele babizwa baze bamazi umntwana kwanomfazi lowo owaxhwila umntana lowo esibhedlele.
Abasebenzi basesibhedlele babizwa ukuze bafanise umntwana kunye nenkosikazi emthimbileyo imthatha esibhedlele.
Kwabizwa abasebenzi basesibhedlele baze bamazi kwangoko umntwana, ngokunjalo nalo eli bhinqa elalimbe esibhedlele.

Ubungqina obahlukeneyo, obuqukaibhantana yeplastikhi eyayifakwe esihlahleni sosana sisibhedlele, nayo yafunyanwa kwindlu yomrhanelwa lowo.
Bubebuninzi ubungqina, kuquka nebhadi lepastiki lasesibhedlele lokuzazisa, lafunyanwa kwindlu yomrhanelwa.
Ubungqina obuninzi, ukuquka neplastiki efakwa esihlahleni somntwana esibhedlele yafunyanwa kule ndlu yomrhanelwa.
Kwafunyanwa nobunye ubungqina obahluka-hlukileyo endlwini yomrhanelwa, kuquka isacholo seplastikhi sasesibhedlele.
Bubebuninzi ubungqina, kuquka nebhadi lepastiki lasesibhedlele lokuzazisa, lafunyanwa kwindlu yomrhanelwa.

Lo mfazi wabanjwa, usana olwalungenzakaliswanga lwabuyiselwa esibhedlele, lwanikezelwa kunina walo wokwenene ngentsasa elandelayo.
Wabanjwa lo mfazi waze umntwana wabuyiselwa esibhedlele engenzakaliswangwa, nalapho wathi wadityaniswa nonina wakhe wokwenene kwakhona ngentseni elandelayo.
Le nkosikazi yabanjwa waze umntwana ongonzakalanga wabuyiselwa esibhedlele ukuze adityaniswe nomama wakhe wenene kwintsasa elandelayo.
Ibhinqa labanjwa kanti akukho nto imbi eyenzeka emntwaneni owabuyiselwa esibhedlele, apho waphinda wadityaniswa khona nomama wakhe wenene ngentsasa elandelayo.
Wabanjwa lo mfazi waze umntwana wabuyiselwa esibhedlele engenzakaliswangwa, nalapho wathi wadityaniswa nonina wakhe wokwenene kwakhona ngentseni elandelayo.

Isenzo sabahlali sokubandakanyeka ekufunyanweni kosana, masiqhwatyelwe izandla, kungokuba siliqaqambisile ixabiso lokuSebenzisana kwabahlali namaPolisa kusiliwa ulwaphulo-mthetho. 
Kufanele ziqhwatyelwe izandla iintshukumo zabantu basekuhlaleni ababandakanyekayo ekufunyanweni kwalo mntwana, nanjengoko zaphakamisa phezulu ukuxabiseka kooGijima.
Inyathelo elithathwe ngamalungu asekuhlaleni ekufumaneni umntwana kufuneka uqhwatyelwe izandla njengoko ubonisa ukubaluleka kobuPolisa basekuHlaleni.
Amanyathelo amalungu oluntu malunga nokufunyaniswa komntwana, afanele ukunconywa, njengoko akhanyisa ixabiso lobuPolisa boLuntu.

Inyathelo elithathwe ngamalungu asekuhlaleni ekufumaneni umntwana kufuneka uqhwatyelwe izandla njengoko ubonisa ukubaluleka kobuPolisa basekuHlaleni.
Ixabiso lokwaHlulwa kweGqiza lamaPolisa esitishi eliphunyezwe lalondolozwa ngokuchanekileyo, akufuneki lijongelwe phantsi.
Akufanelanga lijongelwe phantsi ixabiso looGijima xa liphunyezwe laze lagcinakala ngokufanelekileyo.
Ukubaluleka kobuPolisa basekuHlaleni obuzalisekiswe futhi bagcinwa ngokuchanekileyo kufuneka bungaze bujongelwe phantsi.
Ixabiso lobuPolisa bamaCandelo obuphunyezwe baze balondolozwa ngokuchanekileyo, mabungaze budelwe.
Akufanelanga lijongelwe phantsi ixabiso looGijima xa liphunyezwe laze lagcinakala ngokufanelekileyo.
Ukubaluleka kobuPolisa basekuHlaleni obuzalisekiswe futhi bagcinwa ngokuchanekileyo kufuneka bungaze bujongelwe phantsi.
Ixabiso lobuPolisa bamaCandelo obuphunyezwe baze balondolozwa ngokuchanekileyo, mabungaze budelwe.
Ixabiso lokwaHlulwa kweGqiza lamaPolisa esitishi eliphunyezwe lalondolozwa ngokuchanekileyo, akufuneki lijongelwe phantsi.
Ukubaluleka kobuPolisa basekuHlaleni obuzalisekiswe futhi bagcinwa ngokuchanekileyo kufuneka bungaze bujongelwe phantsi.
Ixabiso lobuPolisa bamaCandelo obuphunyezwe baze balondolozwa ngokuchanekileyo, mabungaze budelwe.
Ixabiso lokwaHlulwa kweGqiza lamaPolisa esitishi eliphunyezwe lalondolozwa ngokuchanekileyo, akufuneki lijongelwe phantsi.
Akufanelanga lijongelwe phantsi ixabiso looGijima xa liphunyezwe laze lagcinakala ngokufanelekileyo.
Ixabiso lobuPolisa bamaCandelo obuphunyezwe baze balondolozwa ngokuchanekileyo, mabungaze budelwe.
Ixabiso lokwaHlulwa kweGqiza lamaPolisa esitishi eliphunyezwe lalondolozwa ngokuchanekileyo, akufuneki lijongelwe phantsi.
Akufanelanga lijongelwe phantsi ixabiso looGijima xa liphunyezwe laze lagcinakala ngokufanelekileyo.
Ukubaluleka kobuPolisa basekuHlaleni obuzalisekiswe futhi bagcinwa ngokuchanekileyo kufuneka bungaze bujongelwe phantsi.

Wugcineni lo msebenzi umhle kangaka Kanana CPF!
Wuqhubeni umsebenzi omhle, Kanana CPF!

Diye Nkosikazi
Ndiyaqonda kwaba lithamsanqa okanye inyhweba ukuba mandigqithe kumzi wamapolisa eMondeor, lilonke ndaqubisana neyeNkonzo yamaPolisa oMzantsi Afrika iJenali.
Ndicinga ukuba ibe lithamsanqa into yokuba ndigqithe kwisikhululo senu samapolisa aseMondeor, ndaze ndabona ijenali yenu ye-SAPS.
Ndiyacinga ukuba ibe lithamsanqa okanye okuhle kodwa okwenze ukuba ndigqithe kwisikhululo sakho samapolisa eMondeor, ndaze ndabona iJenali yenu ye-SAPS.
Ndicinga ukuba kwaba lithamsanqa okanye mhlawumbi kwaba yinto entle ukuba ndigqithe kwisikhululo samapolisa senu eMondeor, ndaze ngokwenza njalo ndadibana neJenali yenu yeSAPS.
Ndicinga ukuba ibe lithamsanqa into yokuba ndigqithe kwisikhululo senu samapolisa aseMondeor, ndaze ndabona ijenali yenu ye-SAPS.
Ndiyacinga ukuba ibe lithamsanqa okanye okuhle kodwa okwenze ukuba ndigqithe kwisikhululo sakho samapolisa eMondeor, ndaze ndabona iJenali yenu ye-SAPS.
Ndicinga ukuba kwaba lithamsanqa okanye mhlawumbi kwaba yinto entle ukuba ndigqithe kwisikhululo samapolisa senu eMondeor, ndaze ngokwenza njalo ndadibana neJenali yenu yeSAPS.
Ndiyaqonda kwaba lithamsanqa okanye inyhweba ukuba mandigqithe kumzi wamapolisa eMondeor, lilonke ndaqubisana neyeNkonzo yamaPolisa oMzantsi Afrika iJenali.
Ndiyacinga ukuba ibe lithamsanqa okanye okuhle kodwa okwenze ukuba ndigqithe kwisikhululo sakho samapolisa eMondeor, ndaze ndabona iJenali yenu ye-SAPS.

Ndiyaqonda ishicilelwa kanye ngenyanga, kwandenza ndanomdla endakufundayo kuyo.
Ndiyathemba ukuba niyayishicilela kanye ngenyanga, kwaye ndiyifumanise inik’ umdla kakhulu.
Ndiyacinga ukuba ipapashwa kanye ngenyanga, futhi ndifumanise ukuba inomdla kakhulu xa uyifunda.
Ndicinga ukuba ipapashwa kanye ngenyanga, kanti ndifumanise ukuba iwutsala kakhulu umdla wokuyifunda.
Ndiyathemba ukuba niyayishicilela kanye ngenyanga, kwaye ndiyifumanise inik’ umdla kakhulu.
Ndiyacinga ukuba ipapashwa kanye ngenyanga, futhi ndifumanise ukuba inomdla kakhulu xa uyifunda.

Ndiyaqonda ishicilelwa kanye ngenyanga, kwandenza ndanomdla endakufundayo kuyo.
Ndiyathemba ukuba niyayishicilela kanye ngenyanga, kwaye ndiyifumanise inik’ umdla kakhulu.
Ndiyacinga ukuba ipapashwa kanye ngenyanga, futhi ndifumanise ukuba inomdla kakhulu xa uyifunda.
Mna nenkosikazi yam saqalisa ishishini saza sathanda ukumema wonke umntu, okanye nabani na kubasebenzi benu xa besendaweni yethu, sasifuna bangene bafumane ikomityi yekofu okanye eyeti, kunjalo sasiza kubanika ibhiskiti okanye ke zibe mbini ezinokufumaneka.
Mna nenkosikazi yam sisandul’ ukuqala ishishini elitsha kwaye singathanda ukunimema nonke, okanye nawaphi na amagosa enu xa elapha ekuhlaleni, ukuba agqithe athobe unxano ngekomiti yekofu okanye eyiti mahala kwaye ndiyathemba ukuba banokufumana amaqebengwana nokuba mabini.
Mna nenkosikazi yam siqalise ishishini elitsha kwaye ndingathanda ukunimema ninonke, okanye abanye babasebenzi benu xa nikhona engingqini, nize nifumane ikomityi yekofu okanye iti, futhi ndiyathemba siya kuba nawo namaqebengwana angephi abo.
Mna nenkosikazi yam sisandul’ ukuqalisa ishishini elitsha kwaye sinomnqweno wokunimema nonke, okanye nokuba ngoobani kubasebenzi benu xa bekwindawo yethu, ukuba beze kufumana ikomityi yekofu okanye yeti kwaye ngethemba sakuba nayo nebhisikithi nokuba zimbini ukuze bafumane nazo.
Mna nenkosikazi yam sisandul’ ukuqala ishishini elitsha kwaye singathanda ukunimema nonke, okanye nawaphi na amagosa enu xa elapha ekuhlaleni, ukuba agqithe athobe unxano ngekomiti yekofu okanye eyiti mahala kwaye ndiyathemba ukuba banokufumana amaqebengwana nokuba mabini.
Mna nenkosikazi yam siqalise ishishini elitsha kwaye ndingathanda ukunimema ninonke, okanye abanye babasebenzi benu xa nikhona engingqini, nize nifumane ikomityi yekofu okanye iti, futhi ndiyathemba siya kuba nawo namaqebengwana angephi abo.
Mna nenkosikazi yam sisandul’ ukuqalisa ishishini elitsha kwaye sinomnqweno wokunimema nonke, okanye nokuba ngoobani kubasebenzi benu xa bekwindawo yethu, ukuba beze kufumana ikomityi yekofu okanye yeti kwaye ngethemba sakuba nayo nebhisikithi nokuba zimbini ukuze bafumane nazo.

Mna nenkosikazi yam siqalise ishishini elitsha kwaye ndingathanda ukunimema ninonke, okanye abanye babasebenzi benu xa nikhona engingqini, nize nifumane ikomityi yekofu okanye iti, futhi ndiyathemba siya kuba nawo namaqebengwana angephi abo.
Njengoko ndiqinisekile nawe uza kuqonda, akululanga ukuqalisa ishishini elitsha kwaye kusetyenzwa nzima, ininzi imali efunekayo.
Ndiyathemba ukuba uyayiqonda into yokuba ukuqala ishishini elitsha asiyondwan’ iyanetha kwaye ngumsebenzi ofunisa imali eninzi yokuliqala.
Njengoko ndiqinisekile ukuba niyakuqonda ukuba ukuqalisa ishishini elitsha akululanga kwaye oko ngumsebenzi omninzi nothatha imali eninzi.
Njengoko nani nisazi, ukuqalisa ishishini elitsha akululanga kwaye kudinga ukusebenza nzima nemali yeshishini.
Ndiyathemba ukuba uyayiqonda into yokuba ukuqala ishishini elitsha asiyondwan’ iyanetha kwaye ngumsebenzi ofunisa imali eninzi yokuliqala.

Nangona kunjalo, siyakholelwa ekubeni amapolisa namanye amasebe anyanzelisayo ngomthetho abalulekile kakhulu kubemi bonke boMzantsi Afrika.
Nangani kunjalo, sisakholelwa kwelokuba amapolisa kunye nawo onke amasebe ogcino-cwangco nemithetho abaluleke kakhulu kubo bonke abemi basemZantsi Afrika.
Kodwa ke, siyathemba ukuba amapolisa kunye nawo onke amasebe ogunyaziso lomthetho abaluleke kakhulu kubemi bebonke boMzantsi Afrika.
Nangona kunjalo, sisakholwa ukuba amapolisa kunye nawo onke amasebe okuqinisekiswa komthetho abaluleke kakhulu kubo bonke abemi baseMzantsi Afrika.
Nangani kunjalo, sisakholelwa kwelokuba amapolisa kunye nawo onke amasebe ogcino-cwangco nemithetho abaluleke kakhulu kubo bonke abemi basemZantsi Afrika.

Le yinto esithanda ukuninika yona sibulela ngokuzinikezela kwenu niqinisekisa ukuba thina, bemi belizwe, singaqhubeka nobomi bethu bemihla ngemihla. 
Le yinto engephi esifuna ukunenzela yona ngelibulela ukuzinikela kwenu ekuqinisekiseni ukuba thina, bemi beli, siyaqhubeka nobomi bethu bemihla ngemihla.
Oku yinto nje encinci esingathanda ukuyinikezela kuni nonke ukunibulela ngokuzinikela kwenu ekuqinisekiseni ukuba thina, njengabemi, singaqhubekeka nobomi bethu bemihla ngemihla.
Oku yinto nje encinane esifuna ukunipha yona nonke sibulele konke enikuncamileyo ukuqinisekisa ukuba thina, njengabemi, sinakho ukuqhubela phambili ngobomi bethu bemihla ngemihla.
Le yinto engephi esifuna ukunenzela yona ngelibulela ukuzinikela kwenu ekuqinisekiseni ukuba thina, bemi beli, siyaqhubeka nobomi bethu bemihla ngemihla.
Oku yinto nje encinci esingathanda ukuyinikezela kuni nonke ukunibulela ngokuzinikela kwenu ekuqinisekiseni ukuba thina, njengabemi, singaqhubekeka nobomi bethu bemihla ngemihla.
Oku yinto nje encinane esifuna ukunipha yona nonke sibulele konke enikuncamileyo ukuqinisekisa ukuba thina, njengabemi, sinakho ukuqhubela phambili ngobomi bethu bemihla ngemihla.

Le yinto engephi esifuna ukunenzela yona ngelibulela ukuzinikela kwenu ekuqinisekiseni ukuba thina, bemi beli, siyaqhubeka nobomi bethu bemihla ngemihla.
Oku yinto nje encinci esingathanda ukuyinikezela kuni nonke ukunibulela ngokuzinikela kwenu ekuqinisekiseni ukuba thina, njengabemi, singaqhubekeka nobomi bethu bemihla ngemihla.
Sisalindele ukuva, okanye kungakuhle, ukubona abanye abasebenzi benxibe impahla yomsebenzi, bengena kwivenkile yethu ukuze sazane kakuhle nabo. 
Singakuvuyela ukuva kuni, ingakumbi ukubona abanye bamagosa enu egaxele iyunifom egaleleka evenkileni yethu ukuze sibanzi ngcono.
Sinethemba lokuba niya kuqhagamshelana nathi, okanye, okungcono kakhulu, ukunibona abanye benu ninxibe iyunifomu, ningena kwivenkilana yethu ukuze sazane ngcono.
Sijonge phambili apho siya kuva khona, okanye side sibone abanye benu basebenzi benxibe iyunifomu, beze evenkileni yethu encinane futhi sibazi bhetele.
Singakuvuyela ukuva kuni, ingakumbi ukubona abanye bamagosa enu egaxele iyunifom egaleleka evenkileni yethu ukuze sibanzi ngcono.
Sinethemba lokuba niya kuqhagamshelana nathi, okanye, okungcono kakhulu, ukunibona abanye benu ninxibe iyunifomu, ningena kwivenkilana yethu ukuze sazane ngcono.
Sijonge phambili apho siya kuva khona, okanye side sibone abanye benu basebenzi benxibe iyunifomu, beze evenkileni yethu encinane futhi sibazi bhetele.
Sisalindele ukuva, okanye kungakuhle, ukubona abanye abasebenzi benxibe impahla yomsebenzi, bengena kwivenkile yethu ukuze sazane kakuhle nabo. 
Sinethemba lokuba niya kuqhagamshelana nathi, okanye, okungcono kakhulu, ukunibona abanye benu ninxibe iyunifomu, ningena kwivenkilana yethu ukuze sazane ngcono.
Sijonge phambili apho siya kuva khona, okanye side sibone abanye benu basebenzi benxibe iyunifomu, beze evenkileni yethu encinane futhi sibazi bhetele.
Sisalindele ukuva, okanye kungakuhle, ukubona abanye abasebenzi benxibe impahla yomsebenzi, bengena kwivenkile yethu ukuze sazane kakuhle nabo. 
Singakuvuyela ukuva kuni, ingakumbi ukubona abanye bamagosa enu egaxele iyunifom egaleleka evenkileni yethu ukuze sibanzi ngcono.
Sijonge phambili apho siya kuva khona, okanye side sibone abanye benu basebenzi benxibe iyunifomu, beze evenkileni yethu encinane futhi sibazi bhetele.
Sisalindele ukuva, okanye kungakuhle, ukubona abanye abasebenzi benxibe impahla yomsebenzi, bengena kwivenkile yethu ukuze sazane kakuhle nabo. 
Singakuvuyela ukuva kuni, ingakumbi ukubona abanye bamagosa enu egaxele iyunifom egaleleka evenkileni yethu ukuze sibanzi ngcono.
Sinethemba lokuba niya kuqhagamshelana nathi, okanye, okungcono kakhulu, ukunibona abanye benu ninxibe iyunifomu, ningena kwivenkilana yethu ukuze sazane ngcono.
Siyaphinda siyabulela, kubanyanzelisi bomthetho baseMzantsi Afrika, ngokusebenza nzima nangokuzimisela ekuwugcineni ukhuselekile uMzantsi Afrika.
Siyakubulela kwakhona kuni, basebenzi bezogcino-cwangco nomthetho eMzantsi Afrika, ngomsebenzi wenu ophume izandla nokuzinikela ekugcineni uMzantsi Afrika ukhuselekile.
Ndiyabulela kwakhona kuni, abasebenzi bogunyaziso lomthetho boMzantsi Afrika, ngokusebenza kwenu kanzima ekugcineni uMzantsi Afrika ukhuselekile.
Kwakhona siyanibulela, basebenzi bokuqinisekiswa komthetho eMzantsi Afrika, ngawo wonke umsebenzi wenu eniwenza ngokuzimisela ngenjongo yokugcina uMzantsi Afrika ukhuselekile.
Siyakubulela kwakhona kuni, basebenzi bezogcino-cwangco nomthetho eMzantsi Afrika, ngomsebenzi wenu ophume izandla nokuzinikela ekugcineni uMzantsi Afrika ukhuselekile.
Ndiyabulela kwakhona kuni, abasebenzi bogunyaziso lomthetho boMzantsi Afrika, ngokusebenza kwenu kanzima ekugcineni uMzantsi Afrika ukhuselekile.
Kwakhona siyanibulela, basebenzi bokuqinisekiswa komthetho eMzantsi Afrika, ngawo wonke umsebenzi wenu eniwenza ngokuzimisela ngenjongo yokugcina uMzantsi Afrika ukhuselekile.
Siyaphinda siyabulela, kubanyanzelisi bomthetho baseMzantsi Afrika, ngokusebenza nzima nangokuzimisela ekuwugcineni ukhuselekile uMzantsi Afrika.
Ndiyabulela kwakhona kuni, abasebenzi bogunyaziso lomthetho boMzantsi Afrika, ngokusebenza kwenu kanzima ekugcineni uMzantsi Afrika ukhuselekile.
Kwakhona siyanibulela, basebenzi bokuqinisekiswa komthetho eMzantsi Afrika, ngawo wonke umsebenzi wenu eniwenza ngokuzimisela ngenjongo yokugcina uMzantsi Afrika ukhuselekile.
Siyaphinda siyabulela, kubanyanzelisi bomthetho baseMzantsi Afrika, ngokusebenza nzima nangokuzimisela ekuwugcineni ukhuselekile uMzantsi Afrika.
Siyakubulela kwakhona kuni, basebenzi bezogcino-cwangco nomthetho eMzantsi Afrika, ngomsebenzi wenu ophume izandla nokuzinikela ekugcineni uMzantsi Afrika ukhuselekile.
Kwakhona siyanibulela, basebenzi bokuqinisekiswa komthetho eMzantsi Afrika, ngawo wonke umsebenzi wenu eniwenza ngokuzimisela ngenjongo yokugcina uMzantsi Afrika ukhuselekile.
Siyaphinda siyabulela, kubanyanzelisi bomthetho baseMzantsi Afrika, ngokusebenza nzima nangokuzimisela ekuwugcineni ukhuselekile uMzantsi Afrika.
Siyakubulela kwakhona kuni, basebenzi bezogcino-cwangco nomthetho eMzantsi Afrika, ngomsebenzi wenu ophume izandla nokuzinikela ekugcineni uMzantsi Afrika ukhuselekile.
Ndiyabulela kwakhona kuni, abasebenzi bogunyaziso lomthetho boMzantsi Afrika, ngokusebenza kwenu kanzima ekugcineni uMzantsi Afrika ukhuselekile.
Iileta ezimfutshane ezineengongoma ezibalulekileyo zingathunyelwa kuMhleli ngefeksi okanye nge-imeyili.
Ngokufutshane, iileta ezineenkcukacha zingafekselwe okanye zithunyelwe kuMhleli nge-imeyile.
Iileta ezimfutshane zenene zingathunyelwa ngefeksi okanye nge-imeyile kuMhleli.
Iileta ezimfutshane, eziqulethe iinyaniso zinokuthunyelwa ngefeksi okanye ngeimeyili kuMhleli.
Ngokufutshane, iileta ezineenkcukacha zingafekselwe okanye zithunyelwe kuMhleli nge-imeyile.
Iileta ezimfutshane zenene zingathunyelwa ngefeksi okanye nge-imeyile kuMhleli.
Iileta ezimfutshane, eziqulethe iinyaniso zinokuthunyelwa ngefeksi okanye ngeimeyili kuMhleli.
Iileta ezimfutshane ezineengongoma ezibalulekileyo zingathunyelwa kuMhleli ngefeksi okanye nge-imeyili.
Iileta ezimfutshane zenene zingathunyelwa ngefeksi okanye nge-imeyile kuMhleli.
Iileta ezimfutshane, eziqulethe iinyaniso zinokuthunyelwa ngefeksi okanye ngeimeyili kuMhleli.
Iileta ezimfutshane ezineengongoma ezibalulekileyo zingathunyelwa kuMhleli ngefeksi okanye nge-imeyili.
Ngokufutshane, iileta ezineenkcukacha zingafekselwe okanye zithunyelwe kuMhleli nge-imeyile.
Iileta ezimfutshane, eziqulethe iinyaniso zinokuthunyelwa ngefeksi okanye ngeimeyili kuMhleli.
Iileta ezimfutshane ezineengongoma ezibalulekileyo zingathunyelwa kuMhleli ngefeksi okanye nge-imeyili.
Ngokufutshane, iileta ezineenkcukacha zingafekselwe okanye zithunyelwe kuMhleli nge-imeyile.
Iileta ezimfutshane zenene zingathunyelwa ngefeksi okanye nge-imeyile kuMhleli.
Sinelungelo lokuhlela okanye siyishwankathele imibhalo ekwezo leta.
Ilungelo lokuhlela okanye lokuzishunqulela ezi leta zinkonyiwe.
Sigcine ilungelo lokuhlela okanye lokuzenza mfutshane ezi leta. 
Sigcine ilungelo lokuhlela okanye lokufinyeza iileta.
Ilungelo lokuhlela okanye lokuzishunqulela ezi leta zinkonyiwe.
Sigcine ilungelo lokuhlela okanye lokuzenza mfutshane ezi leta. 
Sigcine ilungelo lokuhlela okanye lokufinyeza iileta.
Sinelungelo lokuhlela okanye siyishwankathele imibhalo ekwezo leta.
Sigcine ilungelo lokuhlela okanye lokuzenza mfutshane ezi leta. 
Sigcine ilungelo lokuhlela okanye lokufinyeza iileta.
Sinelungelo lokuhlela okanye siyishwankathele imibhalo ekwezo leta.
Ilungelo lokuhlela okanye lokuzishunqulela ezi leta zinkonyiwe.
Sigcine ilungelo lokuhlela okanye lokufinyeza iileta.
Sinelungelo lokuhlela okanye siyishwankathele imibhalo ekwezo leta.
Ilungelo lokuhlela okanye lokuzishunqulela ezi leta zinkonyiwe.
Sigcine ilungelo lokuhlela okanye lokuzenza mfutshane ezi leta.

UBIZO LOKUSEBENZA
ISIMEMO 
ISIMEMO SOKUTHATHA INYATHELO
UBIZO LOKUTHATHA AMANYATHELO
ISIMEMO

UBIZO LOKUTHATHA AMANYATHELO
UBIZO LOKUSEBENZA

UBIZO LOKUSEBENZA

ISIMEMO SOKUTHATHA INYATHELO
Ngomhla we-14 ngoJuni 2007, kwelinye lamanqaku eSAPS Journal Online (www.sapsjournalon-line.gov.za) kwachazwa ngokubanjwa kwamapolisa amabini eCandelo laseWelkom lokuChongwa kweziThuthi ngenxa yezenzo zenkohlakalo nobuqhetseba. 
Ngomhla we-14 kuJuni ka-2007, elinye lamanqaku iJenali ye-SAPS etholakala kukhompyutha (www.sapsjournalonline.gov.za) lichaze ngendlela amapolisa amabini eCandelo loKubhaliswa kweZithuthi laseWelkom athe abanjwa ngayo ngenxa yorhwaphilizo nobuqhetseba.
Ngomhla we-14 Juni 2007, elinye lamanqaku eJenali ye-SAPS Onlayini (www.sapsjournalon-line.gov.za) lichaze indlela amapolisa amabini eCandelo lokuPhawulwa kweZithuthi eWelkom abanjwe ngayo ebanjelwa urhwaphilizo nobuqhetseba.
Ngomhla we-14 Juni 2007, elinye lamanqaku kwiJenali ekwi-Intanethi yeeSAPS (www.sapsjournalonline.gov.za) lachaza indlela amagosa amabini amapolisa eCandelo laseWelkom lokuChongwa kweziThuthi abanjelwa urhwaphilizo nobuqhetseba.

Ngokwengxelo esi sibini, intsumpa kunye nomhloli, sathengisa izithuthi ezazibhaqwe ngamapolisa, isibini esi sasifuna inzuzo.
Kuthiwa esi sibini, intsumpa kunye nomhloli, sithengise izithuthi eziyezathinjwa ngamapolisa ukuze kungenelwe sona.
Ngokwengxelo aba babini, intsumpa kunye nomhloli bathengise izithuthi ezifunyenwe ngamapolisa, njengenzuzo kubo.
Ingxelo ithi aba babini, umongameli nomhloli, bathengise izithuthi ebezifunyenwe ngamapolisa, besenzela inzuzo eyeyabo.
Kuthiwa esi sibini, intsumpa kunye nomhloli, sithengise izithuthi eziyezathinjwa ngamapolisa ukuze kungenelwe sona.
Ngokwengxelo aba babini, intsumpa kunye nomhloli bathengise izithuthi ezifunyenwe ngamapolisa, njengenzuzo kubo.
Ingxelo ithi aba babini, umongameli nomhloli, bathengise izithuthi ebezifunyenwe ngamapolisa, besenzela inzuzo eyeyabo.

Ngokwengxelo aba babini, intsumpa kunye nomhloli bathengise izithuthi ezifunyenwe ngamapolisa, njengenzuzo kubo.
Ingxelo ithi aba babini, umongameli nomhloli, bathengise izithuthi ebezifunyenwe ngamapolisa, besenzela inzuzo eyeyabo.
Ngokwengxelo esi sibini, intsumpa kunye nomhloli, sathengisa izithuthi ezazibhaqwe ngamapolisa, isibini esi sasifuna inzuzo.
Kuthiwa esi sibini, intsumpa kunye nomhloli, sithengise izithuthi eziyezathinjwa ngamapolisa ukuze kungenelwe sona.
Ingxelo ithi aba babini, umongameli nomhloli, bathengise izithuthi ebezifunyenwe ngamapolisa, besenzela inzuzo eyeyabo.
Ngokwengxelo esi sibini, intsumpa kunye nomhloli, sathengisa izithuthi ezazibhaqwe ngamapolisa, isibini esi sasifuna inzuzo.
Kuthiwa esi sibini, intsumpa kunye nomhloli, sithengise izithuthi eziyezathinjwa ngamapolisa ukuze kungenelwe sona.
Ngokwengxelo aba babini, intsumpa kunye nomhloli bathengise izithuthi ezifunyenwe ngamapolisa, njengenzuzo kubo.
Aba barhanelwa bobabini bavela enkundleni yamatyala ngomhla we-12 kuJuni kwaye ityala larhoxiselwa umhla wama-21 ngo-Agasti 2007.
Bobabini abarhanelwa bavela enkundleni ngomhla we-12 kuJuni laze netyala lahlehliselwa umhla wama-21 kuAgasti 2007.
Omabini amaxhoba avele enkundleni ngomhla we-12 Juni laze ityala lamiselwa umhla wama-21 Agasti 2007.
Bobabini aba barhanelwa bavele ngomhla we-12 Juni laze ityala lamiselwa umhla we-21 Agasti 2007.

Sekudlule usuku, ngomhla we-15 ngoJuni 2007, isihloko seendaba ze-News24 sasisithi:  “Amapolisa amabini abanjelwe ukuphanga exhobile”.
Ngosuku nje emva koko, ngomhla we-15 kuJuni 2007, inqaku eliphambili leNews24: “Amapolisa amabini abanjelwe ubusela”.
Kusuku olulandelayo, ngomhla we-15 Juni 2007 iingongoma zeendaba zabakwa-News24 zibhengeze ukuba: “Amapolisa amabini abanjelwe ukuphanga exhobile”.
Kusuku olusemva koko, ngomhla we-15 Juni 2007, isihloko seNews24 sibhengeze oku: Amapolisa amabini atyholwa ngokuphanga exhobile”.
Ngosuku nje emva koko, ngomhla we-15 kuJuni 2007, inqaku eliphambili leNews24: “Amapolisa amabini abanjelwe ubusela”.
Kusuku olulandelayo, ngomhla we-15 Juni 2007 iingongoma zeendaba zabakwa-News24 zibhengeze ukuba: “Amapolisa amabini abanjelwe ukuphanga exhobile”.
Kusuku olusemva koko, ngomhla we-15 Juni 2007, isihloko seNews24 sibhengeze oku: Amapolisa amabini atyholwa ngokuphanga exhobile”.
Sekudlule usuku, ngomhla we-15 ngoJuni 2007, isihloko seendaba ze-News24 sasisithi:  “Amapolisa amabini abanjelwe ukuphanga exhobile”.
Kusuku olulandelayo, ngomhla we-15 Juni 2007 iingongoma zeendaba zabakwa-News24 zibhengeze ukuba: “Amapolisa amabini abanjelwe ukuphanga exhobile”.
Kusuku olusemva koko, ngomhla we-15 Juni 2007, isihloko seNews24 sibhengeze oku: Amapolisa amabini atyholwa ngokuphanga exhobile”.
Sekudlule usuku, ngomhla we-15 ngoJuni 2007, isihloko seendaba ze-News24 sasisithi:  “Amapolisa amabini abanjelwe ukuphanga exhobile”.
Ngosuku nje emva koko, ngomhla we-15 kuJuni 2007, inqaku eliphambili leNews24: “Amapolisa amabini abanjelwe ubusela”.

Ngosuku nje emva koko, ngomhla we-15 kuJuni 2007, inqaku eliphambili leNews24: “Amapolisa amabini abanjelwe ubusela”.
Kusuku olulandelayo, ngomhla we-15 Juni 2007 iingongoma zeendaba zabakwa-News24 zibhengeze ukuba: “Amapolisa amabini abanjelwe ukuphanga exhobile”.
Ngesi isihlandlo yayilipolisa elisaqeqeshwayo nelinye elingumhloli, ngokwengxelo baxhomisa abasebenzi kwivenkile ethengisa izinxibo eMarble Hall, kwabiwa  imali, iibhulukhwe kunye nehempe.
Ngeli ityeli ibeligosa ukonstabile kunye nomhloli abatyholwa ngokuxhomisa ivenkile yeempahla eMarble Hall, beba nemali, iibhulukhwe kunye neehempe.
Ngeli tyeli yayingukhonstabhile ongumfundi nomhloli nabaxhobise kwivenkile yeempahla kwiHolo iMarble, beba imali, iibhulukhwe nehempe.
Ngeli lixa yayilipolisa elingumfundi nelingumhloli ekwanikwa ingxelo ngabo yokuba bangene evenkileni yempahla eMarble Hall, beba imali, iblukhwe nehempe.
Ngeli ityeli ibeligosa ukonstabile kunye nomhloli abatyholwa ngokuxhomisa ivenkile yeempahla eMarble Hall, beba nemali, iibhulukhwe kunye neehempe.
Ngeli tyeli yayingukhonstabhile ongumfundi nomhloli nabaxhobise kwivenkile yeempahla kwiHolo iMarble, beba imali, iibhulukhwe nehempe.
Ngeli lixa yayilipolisa elingumfundi nelingumhloli ekwanikwa ingxelo ngabo yokuba bangene evenkileni yempahla eMarble Hall, beba imali, iblukhwe nehempe.
Ngesi isihlandlo yayilipolisa elisaqeqeshwayo nelinye elingumhloli, ngokwengxelo baxhomisa abasebenzi kwivenkile ethengisa izinxibo eMarble Hall, kwabiwa  imali, iibhulukhwe kunye nehempe.
Ngeli tyeli yayingukhonstabhile ongumfundi nomhloli nabaxhobise kwivenkile yeempahla kwiHolo iMarble, beba imali, iibhulukhwe nehempe.
Ngeli lixa yayilipolisa elingumfundi nelingumhloli ekwanikwa ingxelo ngabo yokuba bangene evenkileni yempahla eMarble Hall, beba imali, iblukhwe nehempe.
Ngesi isihlandlo yayilipolisa elisaqeqeshwayo nelinye elingumhloli, ngokwengxelo baxhomisa abasebenzi kwivenkile ethengisa izinxibo eMarble Hall, kwabiwa  imali, iibhulukhwe kunye nehempe.
Ngeli ityeli ibeligosa ukonstabile kunye nomhloli abatyholwa ngokuxhomisa ivenkile yeempahla eMarble Hall, beba nemali, iibhulukhwe kunye neehempe.
Ngeli lixa yayilipolisa elingumfundi nelingumhloli ekwanikwa ingxelo ngabo yokuba bangene evenkileni yempahla eMarble Hall, beba imali, iblukhwe nehempe.
Ngesi isihlandlo yayilipolisa elisaqeqeshwayo nelinye elingumhloli, ngokwengxelo baxhomisa abasebenzi kwivenkile ethengisa izinxibo eMarble Hall, kwabiwa  imali, iibhulukhwe kunye nehempe.
Ngeli ityeli ibeligosa ukonstabile kunye nomhloli abatyholwa ngokuxhomisa ivenkile yeempahla eMarble Hall, beba nemali, iibhulukhwe kunye neehempe.
Ngeli tyeli yayingukhonstabhile ongumfundi nomhloli nabaxhobise kwivenkile yeempahla kwiHolo iMarble, beba imali, iibhulukhwe nehempe.
Amapolisa kufuneka ayiyeke inkohlakalo.
Lubhangisiwe urhwaphilizo kwezamapolisa.
Urhwaphilizo emapoliseni kufuneka luphele tu.
Urhwaphilizo lufanele ukuphela ebupoliseni.

Amapolisa kufuneka ayiyeke inkohlakalo.
Lubhangisiwe urhwaphilizo kwezamapolisa.

Lubhangisiwe urhwaphilizo kwezamapolisa.
Urhwaphilizo emapoliseni kufuneka luphele tu.
Nangona abanye bethu benyanisekile, bengabemi abasebenza nzima, ambalwa amagosa angamapolisa awabonisi kuzihlonipha, awazihloniphi izinxibo zawo zomsebenzi okanye awazihloniphi iziBhambathiso zokuziPhatha kwamaPolisa.
Nangona uninzi lwethu lunyanisekile, lusebenza nzima, likhona igcuntswana lamapolisa elibonisa ukungazihloniphi bona, iyunifom elinxibayo okanye iiNqobo zokuziphatha zaMapolisa.
Ngexa uninzi lwethu lungabemi abathembekileyo, abasebenza nzima, igcuntswana lamapolisa aluzihloniphi, iiyunifomu zabo okanye uMgaqo wokuziPhatha wasemaPoliseni.
Nangona uninzi lwethu lungabemi abathembekileyo, abasebenza nzima, kukho amagosa ambalwa amapolisa angazihloneliyo, engahloneli neyunifomu yabo okanye iKhowudi yokuziPhatha yobuPolisa.
Nangona uninzi lwethu lunyanisekile, lusebenza nzima, likhona igcuntswana lamapolisa elibonisa ukungazihloniphi bona, iyunifom elinxibayo okanye iiNqobo zokuziphatha zaMapolisa.

Lifikile ixesha lokuba i-SAPS siyahlukanise kube kanye, kususwe kwaphela lawo anezenzo ezingalunganga.
Lilixa lokuba silikhucule isebe le-SAPS kube kanye qwaba zingabisabakho le mikhwa mibi.
Lifikile ixesha lokuba sahlukanise i-SAPS kube kanye nazo zonke ezi zinto zingalunganga.
Lifikile ixesha lokuba iSAPS iyikhuphele ngaphandle kwayo yonke imikhwa emibi.

Kwaye ngoku unganceda ngokwahlukana namapolisa akhohlakeleyo, ngokuwabhenca kumnxeba onika ingxelo ngolwaphulo-mthetho.
Kwaye ngoku nawe ungancedisa siwasuse endleleni la mapolisa ngokuwantama kwinombolo yefowuni ejongene nolwaphulo-mthetho.
Ngoku ungasinceda sitshabalalise urhwaphilizo emapoliseni ngokubaveza kwilayini entsha yolwaphulo-mthetho.
Ngoku unakho ukuncedisa ngokukhuphela ngaphandle onke amapolisa arhwaphilizayo ngokuwaxela kumnxeba omtsha wolwaphulo-mthetho.
Kwaye ngoku nawe ungancedisa siwasuse endleleni la mapolisa ngokuwantama kwinombolo yefowuni ejongene nolwaphulo-mthetho.

Xa urhanela ukuba omnye enisebenza naye uzimisele kwizenzo ezingalunganga, okanye xa ekhona ongomnye omaziyo, nokuba ngamapolisa, ngabantu bakokwenu, ngabo usebenza nabo, ngabamelwane okanye ngabantu ongabaqhelanga, abazibandakanyayo okanye abanezicwangciso zokuzibandakanya kulwaphulo-mthetho, kuphela thumela iSMS kwinombolo 32211.
Ukuba ukrokrela ukuba omnye wabo usebenza nabo banomkhuba abaphezu kwawo, okanye ukuba ukhona omnye omaziyo, nokuba lipolisa, amalungu osapho, osebenza nabo, abamelwane okanye abantu ongabaziyo, ababandakanyekayo okanye abaceba ukuzibandakanya kwizenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho, oko ufanele ukwenze kukuthumela i-SMS tu-3211.
Ukuba ukrokrela ukuba umntu osebenza naye ikhona into engalunganga ayenzayo, okanye ukhona umntu omaziyo, nokuba ngamapolisa, amalungu osapho, abantu osebenza nabo, abamelwane okanye abantu ongabaziyo abathatha inxaxheba okanye abaceba ukuthatha inxaxheba kwimisebenzi yolwaphulo-mthetho, konke okufuneka ukwenzile, kukuthumela i-SMS ku-32211. 
Ukuba ukrokrela ukuba omnye wabantu osebenza nabo akalunganga, okanye ukuba ukhona omnye omaziyo, nokuba ngamagosa amapolisa, amalungu osapho, abantu osebenza nabo, abamelwane okanye abantu ongabaziyo, ababandakanyeka okanye abaceba ukuzibandakanya kwimisebenzi yolwaphulo-mthetho, inye into ofanele ukuyenza, kukuthumela iSMS apha 32211.
Ukuba ukrokrela ukuba omnye wabo usebenza nabo banomkhuba abaphezu kwawo, okanye ukuba ukhona omnye omaziyo, nokuba lipolisa, amalungu osapho, osebenza nabo, abamelwane okanye abantu ongabaziyo, ababandakanyekayo okanye abaceba ukuzibandakanya kwizenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho, oko ufanele ukwenze kukuthumela i-SMS tu-3211.

Lowo ngumnxeba omtsha wesizwe, ojongene nolwaphulo-mthetho nosandula ukundululwa yiPrimedia eSandton.
Leyo yinombolo entsha kazwelonke yokuntama ulwaphulo-mthetho nebisandula ukubhengezwa ngabakwa-Primedia e-Sandton.
Le yinombolo entsha yelayini yolwaphulo-mthetho kuZwelonke neyaziswe kutshanje yi-Primedia eSandton.
Le yinombolo entsha yesizwe yomnxeba wolwaphulo-mthetho esandul’ ukusungulwa yiPrimedia eSandton.
Leyo yinombolo entsha kazwelonke yokuntama ulwaphulo-mthetho nebisandula ukubhengezwa ngabakwa-Primedia e-Sandton.

Usenokuthumela i-SMS ku-32211 (ebiza iR1 inye) okanye uye ku-www.crime-line.co.za
Ungathumela i-SMS ku-32211 (ngexabiso eliyi-R1 inye) okanye uye ku-www.crime-line.co.za. 
Unakho mhlawumbi ukuthumela iSMS apha 32211 (ngeendleko zeR1 inye) okanye uye apha www.crime-line.co.za.

Abathathi beenkcukacha abaqeqeshiweyo balindele ukugqithisela ezo nkcukacha emapoliseni, wona aza kusebenze ngazo kwangoko!
Abafaki-zinkcukacha abaqeqeshiweyo bahleli belindele ukuzigqithisela emapoliseni ezo nkcukacha, mapolisa lawo  aza kuthatha amanyathelo ngoko nangoko!
Abafaki bolwazi abaqeqeshiweyo balindele ukugqithisa ulwazi emapoliseni, nayakuthi athathe inyathelo ngokukhawuleza!
Iingcali eziqeqeshiweyo zokuqokelela iinkcukacha zilindele ukugqithisela iinkcukacha emapoliseni, aza kusebenza ngazo kwangoko!
Abafaki-zinkcukacha abaqeqeshiweyo bahleli belindele ukuzigqithisela emapoliseni ezo nkcukacha, mapolisa lawo  aza kuthatha amanyathelo ngoko nangoko!
Abafaki bolwazi abaqeqeshiweyo balindele ukugqithisa ulwazi emapoliseni, nayakuthi athathe inyathelo ngokukhawuleza!
Iingcali eziqeqeshiweyo zokuqokelela iinkcukacha zilindele ukugqithisela iinkcukacha emapoliseni, aza kusebenza ngazo kwangoko!

Iingcali eziqeqeshiweyo zokuqokelela iinkcukacha zilindele ukugqithisela iinkcukacha emapoliseni, aza kusebenza ngazo kwangoko!
Abathathi beenkcukacha abaqeqeshiweyo balindele ukugqithisela ezo nkcukacha emapoliseni, wona aza kusebenze ngazo kwangoko!
Abafaki-zinkcukacha abaqeqeshiweyo bahleli belindele ukuzigqithisela emapoliseni ezo nkcukacha, mapolisa lawo  aza kuthatha amanyathelo ngoko nangoko!
Iingcali eziqeqeshiweyo zokuqokelela iinkcukacha zilindele ukugqithisela iinkcukacha emapoliseni, aza kusebenza ngazo kwangoko!
Abathathi beenkcukacha abaqeqeshiweyo balindele ukugqithisela ezo nkcukacha emapoliseni, wona aza kusebenze ngazo kwangoko!
Abafaki-zinkcukacha abaqeqeshiweyo bahleli belindele ukuzigqithisela emapoliseni ezo nkcukacha, mapolisa lawo  aza kuthatha amanyathelo ngoko nangoko!
Abafaki bolwazi abaqeqeshiweyo balindele ukugqithisa ulwazi emapoliseni, nayakuthi athathe inyathelo ngokukhawuleza!
Okona kulungileyo kukuba uya kuhlala ungaziwa ukuba ungubani na.
Eyona nto ibalulekileyo yeyokuba akukho bani uyakukwazi ukuba ungubani.
Inxenye engcono kukuba uya kuhlala ungazichazi.
Eyona nto imnandi kukuba igama lakho liya kuhlala lingaziwa.
Eyona nto ibalulekileyo yeyokuba akukho bani uyakukwazi ukuba ungubani.
Inxenye engcono kukuba uya kuhlala ungazichazi.
Eyona nto imnandi kukuba igama lakho liya kuhlala lingaziwa.
Okona kulungileyo kukuba uya kuhlala ungaziwa ukuba ungubani na.
Inxenye engcono kukuba uya kuhlala ungazichazi.

Ngoku unawo amandla okunceda ulwe nolwaphulo-mthetho ungakhange uzifake ezingozini.
Ngoku unawo amandla okuncedisa ekulweni nolwaphulo-mthetho ube ungazibekanga esichengeni.
Ngoku unamandla okunceda ekulweni ulwaphulo-mthetho ngaphandle kokuzifaka engozini.
Ngoku unamandla okulwa nolwaphulo-mthetho ngaphandle kokuzifaka engozini.

Iphulo lePrimedia iyathembisa ukuba ayikho into enokukuchaphazela.
Iphulo labakwa-Primedia lithembisa ukuba akusayi kubakho mivuka.
Inyathelo labakwa-Primedia lithembisa ukungabuyi ngamva.
Isindululo sePrimedia sithembisa ngokuba asiyi kubuyela emva.

 UYusuf  Abramjee, ongumLungelelanisi weProjekhthi yePrimedia eChaseneyo noLwaphulomthetho uthe:  “Asilifuni igama lakho okanye idilesi ngaphandle kokuba nguwe othande ukusinika kwaye akukho mfuneko yeengxelo okanye yokuvela ezinkundleni zamatyala.
UYusuf Abramjee, uMququzeleli weProjekthi  yakwa-Primedia yoKulwa noLwaphulo-mthetho, uthe: “Asifuni gama okanye dilesi yakho ngaphandle kokuba wena usinika ngokuzithandela kwaye akukho mfuneko yakwenza ngxelo okanye uvele enkundleni.  
U-Yusuf Abramjee, uMlungelelanisi weProjekthi elwa uLwaphulo-mthetho e-Primedia, uthi:  "Asifuni gama lakho okanye idilesi ngaphandle kokuba uzigqatse uligqithise kuthi futhi akukho mfuneko yazo naziphina iingxelo okanye ukuvela enkundleni. 
UYusuf Abramjee, uMququzeleli weProjekthi yePrimedia yoKulwa noLwaphulo-mthetho, uthe: “Asifuni gama ne-adresi yakho ngaphandle kokuba uyathanda ukusinika zona futhi akukho mfuneko yazo naziphi iinkcazo okanye ukuvela ezinkundleni zamatyala. 
UYusuf Abramjee, uMququzeleli weProjekthi  yakwa-Primedia yoKulwa noLwaphulo-mthetho, uthe: “Asifuni gama okanye dilesi yakho ngaphandle kokuba wena usinika ngokuzithandela kwaye akukho mfuneko yakwenza ngxelo okanye uvele enkundleni.

Eli phulo litsha, lezigidigidi zeeRandi, lichase ulwaphulo-mthetho kuzwelonke, belindululwa yiPrimedia eSandton ngomhla wesi-7 ngoJuni 2007.
Eli phulo litsha likazwelonke lokulwa nolwahulo-mtheto, nelibiza izigidi ngezigidi zeerandi, laphehlelelwa ngabakwa-Primedia eSandton ngomhla we-7 kuJuni ka-2007.
Eli phulo litsha lokulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho lwezigidigidi zeerandi liqaliswe ngabakwa-Primedia eSandton ngomhla wesi-7 Juni 2007.
Eli phulo litsha lesizwe lokulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho, leerandi zezigidi ngezigidi, lisungulwe yiPrimedia eSandton ngomhla wesi-7 Juni 2007.

Yintsebenziswano ephakathi kwabahlali, kwamajelo osasazo lweendaba nee-arhente ezinyanzelisayo ngomthetho kwaye layilelwa ukunqanda ulwaphulo-mthetho nokubagcina bekhuselekile abahlali.
Lubambiswano oluphakathi koluntu, abezeendaba kunye nee-arhente zonyanzeliso-mthetho nolusekelwe ukulwa nolwaphulo-mthetho kwanokugcina abahlali bekhuselekile.
Yintsebenziswano phakathi koluntu kwimimandla, amajelo eendaba nee-arhente zogunyaziso lomthetho kwaye iyilelwe ukulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho futhi igcine abahlali bekhuselekile.
Lulwahlulelwano phakathi koluntu, abosasazo lweendaba neearhente zokuqinisekisa umthetho kwaye lwaluyilelwe ukutshabalalisa ulwaphulo-mthetho nokugcina abahlali bekhuselekile. 
Lubambiswano oluphakathi koluntu, abezeendaba kunye nee-arhente zonyanzeliso-mthetho nolusekelwe ukulwa nolwaphulo-mthetho kwanokugcina abahlali bekhuselekile.
Yintsebenziswano phakathi koluntu kwimimandla, amajelo eendaba nee-arhente zogunyaziso lomthetho kwaye iyilelwe ukulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho futhi igcine abahlali bekhuselekile.
Lulwahlulelwano phakathi koluntu, abosasazo lweendaba neearhente zokuqinisekisa umthetho kwaye lwaluyilelwe ukutshabalalisa ulwaphulo-mthetho nokugcina abahlali bekhuselekile. 
Yintsebenziswano ephakathi kwabahlali, kwamajelo osasazo lweendaba nee-arhente ezinyanzelisayo ngomthetho kwaye layilelwa ukunqanda ulwaphulo-mthetho nokubagcina bekhuselekile abahlali.
Yintsebenziswano phakathi koluntu kwimimandla, amajelo eendaba nee-arhente zogunyaziso lomthetho kwaye iyilelwe ukulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho futhi igcine abahlali bekhuselekile.
Lulwahlulelwano phakathi koluntu, abosasazo lweendaba neearhente zokuqinisekisa umthetho kwaye lwaluyilelwe ukutshabalalisa ulwaphulo-mthetho nokugcina abahlali bekhuselekile. 
Yintsebenziswano ephakathi kwabahlali, kwamajelo osasazo lweendaba nee-arhente ezinyanzelisayo ngomthetho kwaye layilelwa ukunqanda ulwaphulo-mthetho nokubagcina bekhuselekile abahlali.
Lubambiswano oluphakathi koluntu, abezeendaba kunye nee-arhente zonyanzeliso-mthetho nolusekelwe ukulwa nolwaphulo-mthetho kwanokugcina abahlali bekhuselekile.
Lulwahlulelwano phakathi koluntu, abosasazo lweendaba neearhente zokuqinisekisa umthetho kwaye lwaluyilelwe ukutshabalalisa ulwaphulo-mthetho nokugcina abahlali bekhuselekile. 
Yintsebenziswano ephakathi kwabahlali, kwamajelo osasazo lweendaba nee-arhente ezinyanzelisayo ngomthetho kwaye layilelwa ukunqanda ulwaphulo-mthetho nokubagcina bekhuselekile abahlali.
Lubambiswano oluphakathi koluntu, abezeendaba kunye nee-arhente zonyanzeliso-mthetho nolusekelwe ukulwa nolwaphulo-mthetho kwanokugcina abahlali bekhuselekile.
Yintsebenziswano phakathi koluntu kwimimandla, amajelo eendaba nee-arhente zogunyaziso lomthetho kwaye iyilelwe ukulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho futhi igcine abahlali bekhuselekile.
Kule mihla sikuyo, zimalunga ne-1 200 iinkqubo zabaThinteli boLwaphulo-mthetho ehlabathini lonke ezisebenza emazweni angama-20 asebenzisa iinkcukacha azinikiweyo ngabahlali ekuncedeni ngezisombululo zolwaphulo-mthetho.
Namhlanje, kuneenkqubo zaBalwa noLwaphulo-mthetho ezimalunga ne-1 200 kwihlabathi jikelele nezisbenzela kumazwe angama-20 asebenzisa iinkcukacha ezigqithisiweyo luluntu ukuze zincede ekusonjululweni kwezenze zolwaphulo-mthetho.
Namhlanje, kukho malunga ne-1 200 yeenkqubo zaBaphelisi boLwaphulo-Mthetho kwihlabathi lilonke jikelele kumazwe angama-20 asebenzisa ulwazi olunikezelwe luluntu kwimimandla ekuncedeni ekusombululeni ulwaphulo-mthetho. 
Namhlanje, kukho iinkqubo zabaPhelisi boLwaphulo-mthetho eziyi-1 200 kwihlabathi liphelele eziqhuba emazweni ayi-20 asebenzisa iinkcukacha ezinikelwe luluntu ekuncediseni ngokusombulula ulwaphulo-mthetho. 
Namhlanje, kuneenkqubo zaBalwa noLwaphulo-mthetho ezimalunga ne-1 200 kwihlabathi jikelele nezisbenzela kumazwe angama-20 asebenzisa iinkcukacha ezigqithisiweyo luluntu ukuze zincede ekusonjululweni kwezenze zolwaphulo-mthetho.
Namhlanje, kukho malunga ne-1 200 yeenkqubo zaBaphelisi boLwaphulo-Mthetho kwihlabathi lilonke jikelele kumazwe angama-20 asebenzisa ulwazi olunikezelwe luluntu kwimimandla ekuncedeni ekusombululeni ulwaphulo-mthetho. 
Namhlanje, kukho iinkqubo zabaPhelisi boLwaphulo-mthetho eziyi-1 200 kwihlabathi liphelele eziqhuba emazweni ayi-20 asebenzisa iinkcukacha ezinikelwe luluntu ekuncediseni ngokusombulula ulwaphulo-mthetho. 
Kule mihla sikuyo, zimalunga ne-1 200 iinkqubo zabaThinteli boLwaphulo-mthetho ehlabathini lonke ezisebenza emazweni angama-20 asebenzisa iinkcukacha azinikiweyo ngabahlali ekuncedeni ngezisombululo zolwaphulo-mthetho.
Namhlanje, kukho malunga ne-1 200 yeenkqubo zaBaphelisi boLwaphulo-Mthetho kwihlabathi lilonke jikelele kumazwe angama-20 asebenzisa ulwazi olunikezelwe luluntu kwimimandla ekuncedeni ekusombululeni ulwaphulo-mthetho.

Ngokwe-CEO yakwa-Primedia Ltd, uMnu William Kirsh, ezi nkqubo zincedisile ekubanjweni kwemigewu engama-600 000! 
Ngokuka-CEO we-Primedia Ltd, uMnu. William Kirsh, ezi nkqubo zincedise ekubambeni izikrelemnqa ezingama-600 000!

Ekufuneka likwazile ipolisa ngalinye ngeli phulo litsha lichaseneyo nolwaphulomthetho kukuba, lixhaswe ngokupheleleyo nguMphathiswa woKhuselo noKhuseleko, uMnu. Charles Nqakula kunye noMkhomishinari weNkonzo yamaPolisa kuZwelonke onguJackie Selebi. 
Okumele kwaziwe lipolisa ngalinye malunga neli phulo litsha lokulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho, yinto yokuba lixhaswa ngokupheleleyo nguMphathiswa wezoKhuseleko noKhuselo, uMnu Charles Nqakula kunye noMkomishinala kaZwelonke we-SAPS, uMkomishinala uJackie Selebi.
Into ekufuneka yaziwe lipolisa ngalinye kukuba eli phulo litsha lokulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho kukuba linenkxaso epheleleyo yoMphathiswa woKhuseleko noKhuselo, uMnu. Charles Nqakula kunye noMkhomishinala kaZwelonke we-SAPS, uMkhomishinala uJackie Selebi.
Into efanele ukwaziwa ligosa ngalinye lasebupoliseni ngeli phulo litsha lokulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho, kukuba linenkxaso epheleleyo yoMphathiswa woKhuseleko noKhuselo, uMnu. uCharles Nqakula kunye neKhomishina yeSizwe yeSAPS, iKhomishina uJackie Selebi. 
Okumele kwaziwe lipolisa ngalinye malunga neli phulo litsha lokulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho, yinto yokuba lixhaswa ngokupheleleyo nguMphathiswa wezoKhuseleko noKhuselo, uMnu Charles Nqakula kunye noMkomishinala kaZwelonke we-SAPS, uMkomishinala uJackie Selebi.

UMkhomishinari onguSelebi wathembisa ukuba  “njengombutho, sakwenza ngako konke okusemandleni ukuze eli phulo lisebenze.”
UMkomishinala uSelebi wathembisa ukuba “njengombutho, siza kwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukwenza le projekthi isebenze.”
UMkhomishinala uSelebi uthembise ukuba “njengombutho, sizakwenza konke ekusemandleni ethu ekubeni le projekthi isebenze”.
IKhomishina uSelebi uthembise wathi "njengombutho, siza kwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukuba le projekthi isebenze." 
UMkomishinala uSelebi wathembisa ukuba “njengombutho, siza kwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukwenza le projekthi isebenze.”
UMkhomishinala uSelebi uthembise ukuba “njengombutho, sizakwenza konke ekusemandleni ethu ekubeni le projekthi isebenze”.
IKhomishina uSelebi uthembise wathi "njengombutho, siza kwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukuba le projekthi isebenze." 
UMkhomishinari onguSelebi wathembisa ukuba  “njengombutho, sakwenza ngako konke okusemandleni ukuze eli phulo lisebenze.”
UMkhomishinala uSelebi uthembise ukuba “njengombutho, sizakwenza konke ekusemandleni ethu ekubeni le projekthi isebenze”.
IKhomishina uSelebi uthembise wathi "njengombutho, siza kwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukuba le projekthi isebenze." 
UMkhomishinari onguSelebi wathembisa ukuba  “njengombutho, sakwenza ngako konke okusemandleni ukuze eli phulo lisebenze.”
UMkomishinala uSelebi wathembisa ukuba “njengombutho, siza kwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukwenza le projekthi isebenze.”
IKhomishina uSelebi uthembise wathi "njengombutho, siza kwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukuba le projekthi isebenze." 
UMkhomishinari onguSelebi wathembisa ukuba  “njengombutho, sakwenza ngako konke okusemandleni ukuze eli phulo lisebenze.”
UMkomishinala uSelebi wathembisa ukuba “njengombutho, siza kwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukwenza le projekthi isebenze.”
UMkhomishinala uSelebi uthembise ukuba “njengombutho, sizakwenza konke ekusemandleni ethu ekubeni le projekthi isebenze”.
Umbuzo ngowokuba nina nakwenza ntoni ngalo?  
Umbuzo uthi wena uzakwenza ntoni ngaloo nto?
Umbuzo kukuba uza kwenza ntoni  ngaloo nto?
Umbuzo uthi wena uza kwenza ntoni ngayo? 
Umbuzo uthi wena uzakwenza ntoni ngaloo nto?
Umbuzo kukuba uza kwenza ntoni  ngaloo nto?
Umbuzo uthi wena uza kwenza ntoni ngayo? 
Umbuzo ngowokuba nina nakwenza ntoni ngalo?  
Umbuzo kukuba uza kwenza ntoni  ngaloo nto?
Umbuzo uthi wena uza kwenza ntoni ngayo? 
Umbuzo ngowokuba nina nakwenza ntoni ngalo?  
Umbuzo uthi wena uzakwenza ntoni ngaloo nto?
Umbuzo uthi wena uza kwenza ntoni ngayo? 
Umbuzo ngowokuba nina nakwenza ntoni ngalo?  
Umbuzo uthi wena uzakwenza ntoni ngaloo nto?
Umbuzo kukuba uza kwenza ntoni  ngaloo nto?
Inkxaso epheleleyo yomntu wonke iyafuneka, ayijoliswanga ekuthatheni inxaxheba ngoko nangoko xa ufumene iinkcukacha kwiziko leminxeba echazayo ngolwaphulomthetho, kuyafuneka nokuba sinike iinkcukacha ngeli phulo nakweyiphi na indawo umntu anokuba kuyo.
Iyadingeka inkxaso epheleleyo yabo bonke abantu, kungekhona nje ukulungiselela ukuthatha amanyathelo ngoko nangoko wakube ufumene iinkcukacha kwiziko lefowuni lokuntama ulwaphulo-mthetho, kodwa kwanokuthetha ngeli phulo qho ithuba livela.
Inkxaso yomntu wonke iyafuneka, ingekuko ukuthatha inyathelo ngokukhawuleza kukodwa xa uthe wafumana ulwazi olusuka kwiziko lolwaphulo-mthetho, koko nokurhweba ngeli nyathelo naphina apho unako ukwenza oko.
Kufuneka inkxaso epheleleyo yakhe wonke ubani, kungekuko kuphela ukusabela kwangoko xa ufumana iinkcukacha kwiziko lomnxeba ngolwaphulo-mthetho, kodwa nangokusithengisa esi sindululo naphi na apho unokukwenza oko. 
Iyadingeka inkxaso epheleleyo yabo bonke abantu, kungekhona nje ukulungiselela ukuthatha amanyathelo ngoko nangoko wakube ufumene iinkcukacha kwiziko lefowuni lokuntama ulwaphulo-mthetho, kodwa kwanokuthetha ngeli phulo qho ithuba livela.
Inkxaso yomntu wonke iyafuneka, ingekuko ukuthatha inyathelo ngokukhawuleza kukodwa xa uthe wafumana ulwazi olusuka kwiziko lolwaphulo-mthetho, koko nokurhweba ngeli nyathelo naphina apho unako ukwenza oko.
Kufuneka inkxaso epheleleyo yakhe wonke ubani, kungekuko kuphela ukusabela kwangoko xa ufumana iinkcukacha kwiziko lomnxeba ngolwaphulo-mthetho, kodwa nangokusithengisa esi sindululo naphi na apho unokukwenza oko. 
Inkxaso epheleleyo yomntu wonke iyafuneka, ayijoliswanga ekuthatheni inxaxheba ngoko nangoko xa ufumene iinkcukacha kwiziko leminxeba echazayo ngolwaphulomthetho, kuyafuneka nokuba sinike iinkcukacha ngeli phulo nakweyiphi na indawo umntu anokuba kuyo.

Inkxaso yomntu wonke iyafuneka, ingekuko ukuthatha inyathelo ngokukhawuleza kukodwa xa uthe wafumana ulwazi olusuka kwiziko lolwaphulo-mthetho, koko nokurhweba ngeli nyathelo naphina apho unako ukwenza oko.
Xelela abantu, amaGqiza okuThintela uLwaphulomthetho, izikolo, abantu bakowenu nabahlobo ngeli phulo.
Chazela abantu, ii-CPF, izikolo, usapho lwakho nabahlobo ngeli phulo.
Xelela abantu, ii-CPF, izikolo, usapho lwakho nabahlobo malunga neli nyathelo litsha.
Xelela abantu, iiCPF, izikolo, usapho lwakho nabahlobo ngesi sindululo. 
Chazela abantu, ii-CPF, izikolo, usapho lwakho nabahlobo ngeli phulo.
Xelela abantu, ii-CPF, izikolo, usapho lwakho nabahlobo malunga neli nyathelo litsha.
Xelela abantu, iiCPF, izikolo, usapho lwakho nabahlobo ngesi sindululo. 
Xelela abantu, amaGqiza okuThintela uLwaphulomthetho, izikolo, abantu bakowenu nabahlobo ngeli phulo.
Xelela abantu, ii-CPF, izikolo, usapho lwakho nabahlobo malunga neli nyathelo litsha.
Xelela abantu, iiCPF, izikolo, usapho lwakho nabahlobo ngesi sindululo. 
Xelela abantu, amaGqiza okuThintela uLwaphulomthetho, izikolo, abantu bakowenu nabahlobo ngeli phulo.
Chazela abantu, ii-CPF, izikolo, usapho lwakho nabahlobo ngeli phulo.
Xelela abantu, iiCPF, izikolo, usapho lwakho nabahlobo ngesi sindululo. 
Xelela abantu, amaGqiza okuThintela uLwaphulomthetho, izikolo, abantu bakowenu nabahlobo ngeli phulo.
Chazela abantu, ii-CPF, izikolo, usapho lwakho nabahlobo ngeli phulo.
Xelela abantu, ii-CPF, izikolo, usapho lwakho nabahlobo malunga neli nyathelo litsha.
Qinisekisa ukuba banengqiqo yokuba eli phulo liyathembisa ngokuba akukho loyiko lokuchaphazelwa ziziphumo, awasayi kukhankanywa amagama abo nokuba sekutheni na.
Qinisekisa ukuba uyayiqonda into yokuba eli phulo liyathembisa ukuba akusayi kubakho mivuka, nokuba bayakuhlala bengaziwa ukuba bangoobani nokuba sekutheni na.
Qinisekisa ukuba bayaqonda ngokuba iphulo lithembisa ukungabuyi ngamva, futhi baya kuhlala bengazichazi nokuba kutheni. 
Qiniseka ukuba bayaqonda ukuba eli phulo lithembisa ukungabuyeli kubo, nokuthi baya kuhlala bengaziwa nokuba sekutheni. 
Qinisekisa ukuba uyayiqonda into yokuba eli phulo liyathembisa ukuba akusayi kubakho mivuka, nokuba bayakuhlala bengaziwa ukuba bangoobani nokuba sekutheni na.
Qinisekisa ukuba bayaqonda ngokuba iphulo lithembisa ukungabuyi ngamva, futhi baya kuhlala bengazichazi nokuba kutheni. 
Qiniseka ukuba bayaqonda ukuba eli phulo lithembisa ukungabuyeli kubo, nokuthi baya kuhlala bengaziwa nokuba sekutheni. 
Qinisekisa ukuba banengqiqo yokuba eli phulo liyathembisa ngokuba akukho loyiko lokuchaphazelwa ziziphumo, awasayi kukhankanywa amagama abo nokuba sekutheni na.
Qinisekisa ukuba bayaqonda ngokuba iphulo lithembisa ukungabuyi ngamva, futhi baya kuhlala bengazichazi nokuba kutheni. 
Qiniseka ukuba bayaqonda ukuba eli phulo lithembisa ukungabuyeli kubo, nokuthi baya kuhlala bengaziwa nokuba sekutheni. 
Qinisekisa ukuba banengqiqo yokuba eli phulo liyathembisa ngokuba akukho loyiko lokuchaphazelwa ziziphumo, awasayi kukhankanywa amagama abo nokuba sekutheni na.
Qinisekisa ukuba uyayiqonda into yokuba eli phulo liyathembisa ukuba akusayi kubakho mivuka, nokuba bayakuhlala bengaziwa ukuba bangoobani nokuba sekutheni na.
Qiniseka ukuba bayaqonda ukuba eli phulo lithembisa ukungabuyeli kubo, nokuthi baya kuhlala bengaziwa nokuba sekutheni. 
Qinisekisa ukuba banengqiqo yokuba eli phulo liyathembisa ngokuba akukho loyiko lokuchaphazelwa ziziphumo, awasayi kukhankanywa amagama abo nokuba sekutheni na.
Qinisekisa ukuba uyayiqonda into yokuba eli phulo liyathembisa ukuba akusayi kubakho mivuka, nokuba bayakuhlala bengaziwa ukuba bangoobani nokuba sekutheni na.
Qinisekisa ukuba bayaqonda ngokuba iphulo lithembisa ukungabuyi ngamva, futhi baya kuhlala bengazichazi nokuba kutheni.

Abantu kufuneka bagqithise ingxelo kwinombolo yexesha likaxakeka u-10111 okanye kwizikhululo zamapolisa ezikufutshane nabo.

Abezeendaba nabo basolulile isandla emapoliseni besebenzisa eli phulo lolwaphulo-mthetho.
Kweli phulo lokulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho, amajelo eendaba anikezele uncedo emapoliseni.

Kwisindululo sephulo lomnxeba ochazayo ngolwaphulo-mthetho, uJohn Robbie  ongumsingathi  we-Talk Radio 702 unikezele ngoomatshini abazizixhobo  zokuChonga abangama-65 kwi-SAPS. 
Xa kwakuphehlelelwa eli phulo lefowuni yokuntama ulwaphulo-mthetho, uJohn Robbie, umsasazi weshowu yakusasa kwi-Talk Radio 702, wanikezela kwi-SAPS ngoomatshini abangama-65 beZixhobo ze-ID.
Kwiphulo lenyathelo lolwaphulo-mthetho, uJohn Robbie, oququzelela inkqubo yakusasa kwi-Talk Radio 702 unikezele ngoomatshini abangama-65 be-ID Tool kwi-SAPS.
Kusungulo lwesindululo somnxeba wolwaphulo-mthetho, uJohn Robbie, osingatha usasazo lwakusasa lweTalk Radio 702, unikele ngoomatshini abayi-65 abaziziXhobo zeID kwiSAPS.

UMnu. Robbie kutshanje ubabongozile abaphulaphuli emoyeni ukuba mabathembise ngokuzinikezela kwaba matshini baziziXhobo zokuChonga
UMnu Robbie ubesandula ukwenza isicelo emoyeni kubaphulaphuli sokuba bazinikele ngokufak’ isandla kwaba matshini beZixhobo ze-ID.
UMnu. Robbie kutshanje ubongoze emoyeni abaphulaphuli ekubeni bathembise ngaba matshini be-ID Tool.
UMnu. Robbie usandul’ ukwenza isicelo kubaphulaphuli ukuba benze isithembiso somnikelo waba matshini abazizixhobo zeID.

UMnu. Robbie kutshanje ubongoze emoyeni abaphulaphuli ekubeni bathembise ngaba matshini be-ID Tool.
Abathengisa oomatshini, abeTeknoloji yoBuso, nabo bebesezingxoxweni, ixabiso loomatshini balithobile, nto leyo eyenze iinkampani ebezisele zithembise ngokuthenga umatshini omnye ngemali eninzi, zatsho zakwazi ukubathenga babe babini.
Abathengisi beematshini, i-Face Technology, nabo bazibandakanya ngokuthi bohlise amaxabiso ezi matshini zibe zezifikelelekayo, nto leyo eyenze ukuba iinkampani ezazizinikela ekufakeni isandla ngemali eyanele ukuthenga umatshini omnye zathenga yamibini.   
Umthengisi woomatshini i-Face Technology, nayo ize ngaphambili, yanciphisa ixabiso loomatshini, nokwenze oko ukuba iinkampani ebesele zithembise imali eninzi ekuthengeni umatshini omnye zithenge babe babini.
Umthengisi woomatshini, ubuChwepheshe ngoBuso, naye uthathe inxaxheba, ngesaphulelo asinikileyo kwixabiso layo ukuze anciphise iindleko, aze amaqumrhu abethembise ngemali elingene umatshini omnye akwazi ukuthenga ababini.
Abathengisi beematshini, i-Face Technology, nabo bazibandakanya ngokuthi bohlise amaxabiso ezi matshini zibe zezifikelelekayo, nto leyo eyenze ukuba iinkampani ezazizinikela ekufakeni isandla ngemali eyanele ukuthenga umatshini omnye zathenga yamibini.

Khanifunde neliphi na kumabali empumelelo kwiJenaliekwi-intanethi yeSAPS Afrika kwaye nakuyibona indlela asombululwe ngayo amatyala ngoncedo lwabahlali. 
Funda nawaphi na amabali empumelelo kwiiJenali ye-SAPS  nakwiiJenali ye-SAPS etholakala kukhompyutha kwaye uyakufumanisa ngendlela asonjululwa ngayo amatyala ngoncedo lwabantu basekuhlaleni.
Funda naliphina kumabali empumelelo kwiJenali ye-SAPS okanye kwiJenali ye-SAPS Onlayini apho uyakuzibonela indlela asonjululwe ngayo amatyala ngenxa yoncedo lwamalungu oluntu ekuhlaleni.
Funda nawaphi na amabali empumelelo kwiJenali yeSAPS okanye kwiJenali yeIntanethi yeSAPS apho uza kubona khona indlela asonjululwe ngayo amatyala ngoncedo lwamalungu oluntu.
Funda nawaphi na amabali empumelelo kwiiJenali ye-SAPS  nakwiiJenali ye-SAPS etholakala kukhompyutha kwaye uyakufumanisa ngendlela asonjululwa ngayo amatyala ngoncedo lwabantu basekuhlaleni.
Funda naliphina kumabali empumelelo kwiJenali ye-SAPS okanye kwiJenali ye-SAPS Onlayini apho uyakuzibonela indlela asonjululwe ngayo amatyala ngenxa yoncedo lwamalungu oluntu ekuhlaleni.
Funda nawaphi na amabali empumelelo kwiJenali yeSAPS okanye kwiJenali yeIntanethi yeSAPS apho uza kubona khona indlela asonjululwe ngayo amatyala ngoncedo lwamalungu oluntu.
Khanifunde neliphi na kumabali empumelelo kwiJenaliekwi-intanethi yeSAPS Afrika kwaye nakuyibona indlela asombululwe ngayo amatyala ngoncedo lwabahlali.

Funda nawaphi na amabali empumelelo kwiJenali yeSAPS okanye kwiJenali yeIntanethi yeSAPS apho uza kubona khona indlela asonjululwe ngayo amatyala ngoncedo lwamalungu oluntu.
Khanifunde neliphi na kumabali empumelelo kwiJenaliekwi-intanethi yeSAPS Afrika kwaye nakuyibona indlela asombululwe ngayo amatyala ngoncedo lwabahlali. 
Funda nawaphi na amabali empumelelo kwiiJenali ye-SAPS  nakwiiJenali ye-SAPS etholakala kukhompyutha kwaye uyakufumanisa ngendlela asonjululwa ngayo amatyala ngoncedo lwabantu basekuhlaleni.
Funda nawaphi na amabali empumelelo kwiJenali yeSAPS okanye kwiJenali yeIntanethi yeSAPS apho uza kubona khona indlela asonjululwe ngayo amatyala ngoncedo lwamalungu oluntu.
Khanifunde neliphi na kumabali empumelelo kwiJenaliekwi-intanethi yeSAPS Afrika kwaye nakuyibona indlela asombululwe ngayo amatyala ngoncedo lwabahlali. 
Funda nawaphi na amabali empumelelo kwiiJenali ye-SAPS  nakwiiJenali ye-SAPS etholakala kukhompyutha kwaye uyakufumanisa ngendlela asonjululwa ngayo amatyala ngoncedo lwabantu basekuhlaleni.
Funda naliphina kumabali empumelelo kwiJenali ye-SAPS okanye kwiJenali ye-SAPS Onlayini apho uyakuzibonela indlela asonjululwe ngayo amatyala ngenxa yoncedo lwamalungu oluntu ekuhlaleni.
Ngeli phulo litsha likhoyo lichaseneyo nolwaphulomthetho , abaphulimthetho, kuqukwa nabo bambalwa banenkohlakalo kwiindawo abaphangela kuzo, ngokuqinisekileyo inye into abanokwazi ... imihla yabo ibaliwe.
Ngokubakho kweli phulo litsha lokulwa nolwaphulo-mthetho, imigewu, kuquka nabo bambalwa barhwaphilizayo emsebenzini, bangaqiniseka ngenyo nje ibenye … iintsuku zabo zibaliwe.
Ngeli phulo litsha lokulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho likhoyo, izaphuli-mthetho, ukuquka nabo bambalwa abenza imisebenzi yorhwaphilizo kwinkonzo mabazi into enye esiqinisekileyo ngayo… iintsuku zabo zibaliwe.
Ngenxa yobukho beli phulo litsha lokulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho, abaphuli-mthetho, kuquka nabo bambalwa barhwaphiliza besenkonzweni, baya kwazi into enye ngokuqinisekileyo … iintsuku zabo zibaliwe.
Ngokubakho kweli phulo litsha lokulwa nolwaphulo-mthetho, imigewu, kuquka nabo bambalwa barhwaphilizayo emsebenzini, bangaqiniseka ngenyo nje ibenye … iintsuku zabo zibaliwe.
Ngeli phulo litsha lokulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho likhoyo, izaphuli-mthetho, ukuquka nabo bambalwa abenza imisebenzi yorhwaphilizo kwinkonzo mabazi into enye esiqinisekileyo ngayo… iintsuku zabo zibaliwe.
Ngenxa yobukho beli phulo litsha lokulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho, abaphuli-mthetho, kuquka nabo bambalwa barhwaphiliza besenkonzweni, baya kwazi into enye ngokuqinisekileyo … iintsuku zabo zibaliwe.
Ngeli phulo litsha likhoyo lichaseneyo nolwaphulomthetho , abaphulimthetho, kuqukwa nabo bambalwa banenkohlakalo kwiindawo abaphangela kuzo, ngokuqinisekileyo inye into abanokwazi ... imihla yabo ibaliwe.
Ngeli phulo litsha lokulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho likhoyo, izaphuli-mthetho, ukuquka nabo bambalwa abenza imisebenzi yorhwaphilizo kwinkonzo mabazi into enye esiqinisekileyo ngayo… iintsuku zabo zibaliwe.

Imiqathango esebenzayo kwaboQinisekiso loMgangatho weMfundo noQeqesho (ETQA) phantsi  koLawulo lweZiqinisekiso zeMfundo lwaseMzantsi Afrika (SAQA)  ifuna ukuba abanikezeli bemfundo noqeqesho bafake isicelo sokunikwa elo wonga ngabe-ETQA.
Imithetho emisiweyo kumaqumrhu oQinisekiso Olufezekileyo lwezeMfundo noQeqesho (ETQA) phantsi koLawulo lweZiqinisekiso zeMfundo lwaseMzantsi Afrika (SAQA) ifuna ukuba abaniki-nkonzo bezemfundo noqeqesho bafake izicelo zokuqinisekiswa kwi-ETQA.
Imimiselo esebenza kwiqumrhu lesiQinisekiso  soMgangatho weMfundo noQeqesho (ETQA) phantsi koGunyaziso lweziNgqiniso eMzantsi Afrika (SAQA) ifuna ukuba abanikezeli bemfundo noqeqesho bafake isicelo sokuqinisekiswa kwi-ETQA. 
Imithetho esebenza kumaqela oQinisekiso lomGangatho weMfundo noQeqesho (iETQA) phantsi koGunyaziwe waseMzantsi Afrika weziQinisekiso zeMfundo (iSAQA) ifuna ukuba ababoneleli bemfundo noqeqesho bafake izicelo zeziqinisekiso zokwamkeleka kwiETQA.  
Imithetho emisiweyo kumaqumrhu oQinisekiso Olufezekileyo lwezeMfundo noQeqesho (ETQA) phantsi koLawulo lweZiqinisekiso zeMfundo lwaseMzantsi Afrika (SAQA) ifuna ukuba abaniki-nkonzo bezemfundo noqeqesho bafake izicelo zokuqinisekiswa kwi-ETQA.

Imithetho esebenza kumaqela oQinisekiso lomGangatho weMfundo noQeqesho (iETQA) phantsi koGunyaziwe waseMzantsi Afrika weziQinisekiso zeMfundo (iSAQA) ifuna ukuba ababoneleli bemfundo noqeqesho bafake izicelo zeziqinisekiso zokwamkeleka kwiETQA.  
Imiqathango esebenzayo kwaboQinisekiso loMgangatho weMfundo noQeqesho (ETQA) phantsi  koLawulo lweZiqinisekiso zeMfundo lwaseMzantsi Afrika (SAQA)  ifuna ukuba abanikezeli bemfundo noqeqesho bafake isicelo sokunikwa elo wonga ngabe-ETQA.
Imithetho emisiweyo kumaqumrhu oQinisekiso Olufezekileyo lwezeMfundo noQeqesho (ETQA) phantsi koLawulo lweZiqinisekiso zeMfundo lwaseMzantsi Afrika (SAQA) ifuna ukuba abaniki-nkonzo bezemfundo noqeqesho bafake izicelo zokuqinisekiswa kwi-ETQA.
Imimiselo esebenza kwiqumrhu lesiQinisekiso  soMgangatho weMfundo noQeqesho (ETQA) phantsi koGunyaziso lweziNgqiniso eMzantsi Afrika (SAQA) ifuna ukuba abanikezeli bemfundo noqeqesho bafake isicelo sokuqinisekiswa kwi-ETQA. 
Ukuze uzuze eli wonga, abanikezela ngemfundo noqeqesho kufuneka babe babhalisile ngokubhekiselele kuwisomthetho olusebenzayo.
Ukuze babenokuqinisekiswa, abaniki-nkonzo bezemfundo noqeqesho kufuneka babhalise ngokomthetho obekiweyo.
Ukuze uqinisekiswe, abanikezeli bemfundo noqeqesho kufuneka babhalise ngokomthetho osebenzayo.
Ukuze babe neziqinisekiso zokwamkeleka, ababoneleli bemfundo noqeqesho bafanele ukubhaliswa ngokowiso-mthetho olufanelekileyo.
Ukuze babenokuqinisekiswa, abaniki-nkonzo bezemfundo noqeqesho kufuneka babhalise ngokomthetho obekiweyo.
Ukuze uqinisekiswe, abanikezeli bemfundo noqeqesho kufuneka babhalise ngokomthetho osebenzayo.
Ukuze babe neziqinisekiso zokwamkeleka, ababoneleli bemfundo noqeqesho bafanele ukubhaliswa ngokowiso-mthetho olufanelekileyo.
Ukuze uzuze eli wonga, abanikezela ngemfundo noqeqesho kufuneka babe babhalisile ngokubhekiselele kuwisomthetho olusebenzayo.
Ukuze uqinisekiswe, abanikezeli bemfundo noqeqesho kufuneka babhalise ngokomthetho osebenzayo.
Ukuze babe neziqinisekiso zokwamkeleka, ababoneleli bemfundo noqeqesho bafanele ukubhaliswa ngokowiso-mthetho olufanelekileyo.
Ukuze uzuze eli wonga, abanikezela ngemfundo noqeqesho kufuneka babe babhalisile ngokubhekiselele kuwisomthetho olusebenzayo.
Ukuze babenokuqinisekiswa, abaniki-nkonzo bezemfundo noqeqesho kufuneka babhalise ngokomthetho obekiweyo.
Ukuze babe neziqinisekiso zokwamkeleka, ababoneleli bemfundo noqeqesho bafanele ukubhaliswa ngokowiso-mthetho olufanelekileyo.
Ukuze uzuze eli wonga, abanikezela ngemfundo noqeqesho kufuneka babe babhalisile ngokubhekiselele kuwisomthetho olusebenzayo.
Ukuze babenokuqinisekiswa, abaniki-nkonzo bezemfundo noqeqesho kufuneka babhalise ngokomthetho obekiweyo.
Ukuze uqinisekiswe, abanikezeli bemfundo noqeqesho kufuneka babhalise ngokomthetho osebenzayo.
Uwisomthetho ngokubhekiselele kwiMfundo ePhakamileyo neMfundo eyaNdisiweyo lufuna ukuba bonke abanikezela ngemfundo noqeqesho baveze ubungqina obungamaxwebhu anenkcazelo yezifundo abanazo  ukuze babhaliswe kwiSebe lezeMfundo. 
Umthetho ophathelene neMfundo ePhezulu kwaneMfundo ePhakamileyo ufuna ukuba bonke abaniki-nkonzo bezemfundo noqeqesho ababikezela ngeziqinisekiso ezipheleleyo babhalise kwiSebe lezeMfundo.
Uwiso-mthetho oluhambelana neMfundo yamaBanga aPhakamileyo neYandisiweyo lufuna ukuba bonke abanikezeli bemfundo noqeqesho abanikezela ngezingqiniso babhalise kwiSebe leMfundo.
Uwiso-mthetho malunga neMfundo ePhakamileyo neMfundo eyoNgezelelweyo lufuna ukuba bonke ababoneleli bemfundo noqeqesho abanikela ngeziqinisekiso zemfundo ezipheleleyo babhaliswe kwiSebe leMfundo. 
Umthetho ophathelene neMfundo ePhezulu kwaneMfundo ePhakamileyo ufuna ukuba bonke abaniki-nkonzo bezemfundo noqeqesho ababikezela ngeziqinisekiso ezipheleleyo babhalise kwiSebe lezeMfundo.
Uwiso-mthetho oluhambelana neMfundo yamaBanga aPhakamileyo neYandisiweyo lufuna ukuba bonke abanikezeli bemfundo noqeqesho abanikezela ngezingqiniso babhalise kwiSebe leMfundo.
Uwiso-mthetho malunga neMfundo ePhakamileyo neMfundo eyoNgezelelweyo lufuna ukuba bonke ababoneleli bemfundo noqeqesho abanikela ngeziqinisekiso zemfundo ezipheleleyo babhaliswe kwiSebe leMfundo. 
Uwisomthetho ngokubhekiselele kwiMfundo ePhakamileyo neMfundo eyaNdisiweyo lufuna ukuba bonke abanikezela ngemfundo noqeqesho baveze ubungqina obungamaxwebhu anenkcazelo yezifundo abanazo  ukuze babhaliswe kwiSebe lezeMfundo. 
Uwiso-mthetho oluhambelana neMfundo yamaBanga aPhakamileyo neYandisiweyo lufuna ukuba bonke abanikezeli bemfundo noqeqesho abanikezela ngezingqiniso babhalise kwiSebe leMfundo.
Uwiso-mthetho malunga neMfundo ePhakamileyo neMfundo eyoNgezelelweyo lufuna ukuba bonke ababoneleli bemfundo noqeqesho abanikela ngeziqinisekiso zemfundo ezipheleleyo babhaliswe kwiSebe leMfundo. 
Uwisomthetho ngokubhekiselele kwiMfundo ePhakamileyo neMfundo eyaNdisiweyo lufuna ukuba bonke abanikezela ngemfundo noqeqesho baveze ubungqina obungamaxwebhu anenkcazelo yezifundo abanazo  ukuze babhaliswe kwiSebe lezeMfundo. 
Umthetho ophathelene neMfundo ePhezulu kwaneMfundo ePhakamileyo ufuna ukuba bonke abaniki-nkonzo bezemfundo noqeqesho ababikezela ngeziqinisekiso ezipheleleyo babhalise kwiSebe lezeMfundo.
Uwiso-mthetho malunga neMfundo ePhakamileyo neMfundo eyoNgezelelweyo lufuna ukuba bonke ababoneleli bemfundo noqeqesho abanikela ngeziqinisekiso zemfundo ezipheleleyo babhaliswe kwiSebe leMfundo. 
Uwisomthetho ngokubhekiselele kwiMfundo ePhakamileyo neMfundo eyaNdisiweyo lufuna ukuba bonke abanikezela ngemfundo noqeqesho baveze ubungqina obungamaxwebhu anenkcazelo yezifundo abanazo  ukuze babhaliswe kwiSebe lezeMfundo. 
Umthetho ophathelene neMfundo ePhezulu kwaneMfundo ePhakamileyo ufuna ukuba bonke abaniki-nkonzo bezemfundo noqeqesho ababikezela ngeziqinisekiso ezipheleleyo babhalise kwiSebe lezeMfundo.
Uwiso-mthetho oluhambelana neMfundo yamaBanga aPhakamileyo neYandisiweyo lufuna ukuba bonke abanikezeli bemfundo noqeqesho abanikezela ngezingqiniso babhalise kwiSebe leMfundo.
Onikezela ngemfundo noqeqesho kufuneka anikezele ngemigangatho yamanqanaba kunye/okanye ngezifundo zemimandla yengqwalasela yokuqala yesiQinisekiso soMgangatho weMfundo noQeqesho, (ETQA), ibhodi yeziFundo zamaCandelo nooGunyaziwe kwezoQeqesho  (SETA) okanye zeBhodi yezifundo zobuNgcali.
Umniki-nkonzo wezemfundo noqeqesho kufuneka abonelele ngezifundo kunye/okanye ngeziqinisekiso ezihambelanayo neenkalo ezingundoqo ekugxininiswa kuzo zequmrhu loQinisekiso Olufezekileyo lwezeMfundo noQeqesho (ETQA) noLawulo lweZiqinisekiso zeMfundo lwaseMzantsi Afrika (SETA) okanye iQumrhu loBungcali.
Umnikezeli wemfundo noqeqesho kufuneka anikezele imigangatho yeeyunithi kunye/okanye izingqiniso eziwela ngaphakathi kokujoliswe kuko kokuqala liqumrhu lesiQinisekiso soMgangatho weMfundo noQeqesho (ETQA) loGunyaziso lweCandelo leMfundo noQeqesho (SETA) okanye iQumrhu elisiSigxina.
Umboneleli wemfundo noqeqesho ufanele ukunikela ngezifundo ezihamba zodwa kunye/okanye iziqinisekiso zemfundo ezingena phantsi kwenkalo yogqaliselo esentloko yeqela loQinisekiso lomGangatho weMfundo noQeqesho (iETQA) loGunyaziwe weCandelo leMfundo noQeqesho (iSETA) okanye iQela leeNgcali.
Umniki-nkonzo wezemfundo noqeqesho kufuneka abonelele ngezifundo kunye/okanye ngeziqinisekiso ezihambelanayo neenkalo ezingundoqo ekugxininiswa kuzo zequmrhu loQinisekiso Olufezekileyo lwezeMfundo noQeqesho (ETQA) noLawulo lweZiqinisekiso zeMfundo lwaseMzantsi Afrika (SETA) okanye iQumrhu loBungcali.
Umnikezeli wemfundo noqeqesho kufuneka anikezele imigangatho yeeyunithi kunye/okanye izingqiniso eziwela ngaphakathi kokujoliswe kuko kokuqala liqumrhu lesiQinisekiso soMgangatho weMfundo noQeqesho (ETQA) loGunyaziso lweCandelo leMfundo noQeqesho (SETA) okanye iQumrhu elisiSigxina.
Umboneleli wemfundo noqeqesho ufanele ukunikela ngezifundo ezihamba zodwa kunye/okanye iziqinisekiso zemfundo ezingena phantsi kwenkalo yogqaliselo esentloko yeqela loQinisekiso lomGangatho weMfundo noQeqesho (iETQA) loGunyaziwe weCandelo leMfundo noQeqesho (iSETA) okanye iQela leeNgcali.
Onikezela ngemfundo noqeqesho kufuneka anikezele ngemigangatho yamanqanaba kunye/okanye ngezifundo zemimandla yengqwalasela yokuqala yesiQinisekiso soMgangatho weMfundo noQeqesho, (ETQA), ibhodi yeziFundo zamaCandelo nooGunyaziwe kwezoQeqesho  (SETA) okanye zeBhodi yezifundo zobuNgcali.
Umnikezeli wemfundo noqeqesho kufuneka anikezele imigangatho yeeyunithi kunye/okanye izingqiniso eziwela ngaphakathi kokujoliswe kuko kokuqala liqumrhu lesiQinisekiso soMgangatho weMfundo noQeqesho (ETQA) loGunyaziso lweCandelo leMfundo noQeqesho (SETA) okanye iQumrhu elisiSigxina.

Okufunekayo nokufanele elo wonga:
Izinto ezidingekayo ukuze kwenziwe uqiniseko:
Iimfuno zokuqinisekiswa:
Iimfuneko zesiqinisekiso sokwamkeleka:
